verse_text: Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ko ɑ̀ ci Dɑfidi ize, Abulɛmɑ ize, ɑ̀ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom tirɑ neyɑ.
Abulɛmɑ nɑ Isɑɑkɑ hɛi. Isɑɑkɑ nɑ Yɑkɔfu hɛi. Yɑkɔfu mo nɑ Yudɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom hɛi.
Yudɑ mo nɑ Fɑresi ndɑ Zerɑ hɛi Tɑmɑrɑ gɑɑ. Fɑresi nɑ Esirɑm hɛi. Esirɑm nɑ Arɑm hɛi.
Arɑm mo nɑ Aminɑdɑbu hɛi. Aminɑdɑbu mo nɑ Nɑɑsɑm hɛi. Nɑɑsɑm nɑ Sulumi hɛi.
Sulumi mo nɑ Boɑzu hɛi Lɑhɑbu gɑɑ. Boɑzu nɑ Obe hɛi Lutɑ gɑɑ. Obe mo nɑ Yɑsɑi hɛi.
Yɑsɑi nɑ Kpe Dɑfidi hɛi. Kpe Dɑfidi mo nɑ Sɑlomɔ hɛi Uri wɛndɛ zeenɑ gɑɑ.
Sɑlomɔ nɑ Lobuɑm hɛi. Lobuɑm nɑ Abiɑ hɛi. Abiɑ nɑ Asɑ hɛi.
Asɑ mo nɑ Yosufɑ hɛi. Yosufɑ nɑ Yorɑm hɛi. Yorɑm nɑ Uziɑ hɛi.
Uziɑ mo nɑ Yotɑm hɛi. Yotɑm nɑ Ahɑzɑ hɛi. Ahɑzɑ nɑ Ezeciɑ hɛi.
Ezeciɑ mo nɑ Mɑnɑse hɛi. Mɑnɑse nɑ Amɔ hɛi. Amɔ nɑ Yosiɑ hɛi.
Yosiɑ mo nɑ Yekoniɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom hɛi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dii kɑ kpeindei Bɑbiloni lɑɑbu.
Ǹ diiyom kɑ kpeindei Bɑbiloni lɑɑbu bɑndɑ no, Yekoniɑ mo nɑ Sɑlɑtilu hɛi. Sɑlɑtilu mo nɑ Zorobɑbe hɛi.
Zorobɑbe nɑ Abiude hɛi. Abiude nɑ Eliɑkim hɛi. Eliɑkim mo nɑ Azoro hɛi.
Azoro mo nɑ Sɑdoki hɛi. Sɑdoki nɑ Akim hɛi. Akim nɑ Heludɑ hɛi.
Heludɑ nɑ Heliɑzuru hɛi. Heliɑzuru mo nɑ Mɑtɑm hɛi. Mɑtɑm nɑ Yɑkɔfu hɛi.
Yɑkɔfu mo nɑ Yosɛfu hɛi, Mɑriɑmɑ kunye no. Mɑriɑmɑ nɑ Yesu hɛi, ngɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Mɛsiyɑ.

Cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom di kulu zɑ Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ kɑlɑ Dɑfidi gɑɑ, ǹ kulu cɛɛ wei cindi tɑɑci no. Zɑ Dɑfidi mo gɑɑ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dii kɑ kpeindei Bɑbiloni lɑɑbu di, cɛɛ wei cindi tɑɑci no. Zɑ ǹ kpeindei Bɑbiloni lɑɑbu di mo kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ cɛɛ wei cindi tɑɑci no.
Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɛiyom zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ neyɑ. À nyɑ Mɑriɑmɑ yɑ Yosɛfu hundiyo no. Hɑli ǹ meigu cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ gunde dɑm Mɑriɑmɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɔgɔ Yosɛfu ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu. À si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ hɑwɑndi. À go miilɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ fee tugu kunɑ.

Kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ nge yom di lɑsɑbu tɛ, cɔfɔ Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɑndiri kunɑ. À cii: Yosɛfu, Dɑfidi ize, si hɑmburu ndɑ n hundiyo Mɑriɑmɑ zɑɑyom ɑ̀ mɑ ci n wɛndɛ. N mɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
À kɑɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ no Yesu zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ gɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ fɑɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ dulum yom.
Hɛ wɔ kulu tɛ mo no zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ Kpe cii ɑndebi gɑɑ mɑ tɔ sɛ.
Andebi di cii: “Gunɑ, hundiyo kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑru bei, ɑ̀ kɑɑ kunu. À bine kɑɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Emɑnuɛli.” À mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci Ikpɛ goono i bɑndɑ.
Kɑ Yosɛfu tunu ngɑ jiibi kunɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ ɑ̀ no fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ hundiyɑ hiji.
Ammɑ Yosɛfu si ɑ̀ bei kɑlɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo sintine hɛi. À nɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ dɑm Yesu.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu hɛi Bɛtɛlɛm kpɑɑrɑ Yude lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ Hirodu kpetɛrɛ wɑtɛ. Cɔfɔ beirekpɛ yom hunu zɑ weenuhune kɑ kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Ǹ cii: Mɑni Yuifu yom gɑndɑkpɛ di kɑ ǹ hɛi goono? I di ɑ̀ hɑndɑriyɑize weenuhune hɛrɛ. I kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi no.
Ammɑ kɑ Kpe Hirodu mɑɑ ngɑ di, bɑɑru di nɑ ɑ̀ butugu, ngɑ ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm kulu.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom meigu ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑ ǹ hã nungu kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɛi.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɛtɛlɛm kpɑɑrɑ Yude lɑɑbu zɑmɑ ɑndebi nɑ wɔne hɑntum kɑ cii,
Ni Bɛtɛlɛm, Yude lɑɑbu n mɑnɑ ci Yude kpɑɑrɑ beeri yom ŋmɔne icɛnɑ. N kunɑ no meirekpɛ fɔ kɑɑ hunu. À gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ kurum.
Hirodu nɑ beirekpɛ yom cɛɛ tugu kunɑ kɑ ǹ hã cimi cimi lɔkɑci kɑ hɑndɑriyɑize di hunutɛrɛ.
À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Bɛtɛlɛm kpɑɑrɑ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei hã ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑ simbɑ ndɑ koo di. De wom di ɑ̀, wɑ nɑm yɑ mɑɑ. Hɛɛ mo yɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Ngei mo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpe di sɛ, ǹ kpei. Cɔfɔ hɑndɑriyɑizɑ kɑ ǹ di weenuhune hɛrɛ, ɑ̀ go ǹ jine bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ cɛ nungu kɑ koo di goono.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di hɑndɑriyɑizɑ cɛ, ǹ fɑihã ndɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ.
Kɑ ǹ huro fuuɑ kunɑ, ǹ di koo di ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ Mɑriɑmɑ. Ǹ jɛndɛbiri kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ngei hɑibɑrikɑ feeri. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no wurɑ ndɑ dugubi ndɑ wɑidi kɑɑnɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ mire.
Hɑndiri kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ beirekpɛ yom kɑɑbɑɑru ǹ mɑ si ye Hirodu dɔ. Ǹ ye ngei lɑɑbu ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni fɔ.

Sɑɑ kɑ beirekpɛ yom di dirɑ, cɔfɔ Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ hunutɛrɛ Yosɛfu sɛ hɑndiri kunɑ. À cii: Tunu kɑ koo cɛnɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ zɑɑ kɑ zuuru ndei kɑ kpei Eziputu lɑɑbu. N mɑ gɔrɔ Eziputu lɑɑbu kɑlɑ yɑ cii n sɛ zɑmɑ Hirodu bɑ koo cɛnɑ di ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Yosɛfu mo tunu kɑ koo di ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ zɑɑ ciini kɑ kpei ndei Eziputu lɑɑbu.
Nungu di no ɑ̀ goono kɑlɑ Hirodu bu zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ Kpe cii ɑndebi gɑɑ mɑ tɔ sɛ. À cii: “A nɑ ɑ koo cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu Eziputu lɑɑbu”.

Kɑ Hirodu bei beirekpɛ yom di nɑ ngɑ zɑmbɑ, ɑ̀ bine tɔ hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ mɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono Bɛtɛlɛm kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ kulu wi. Ǹ mɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ yom wi zɑ jiiri hinkɑ ize mee kɑ ye gɑndɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu beirekpɛ yom di sendɑ bɔm.
Bine, hɛ kɑ ɑndebi Yeremi cii mɑ tɔ, kɑ ɑ̀ cii:
“Ǹ mɑɑ jinde fɔ Lɑmɑ kpɑɑrɑ, bɛrɛɛ ndɑ hɛ̃ni ndɑ zɑlibɑ yom bɑmbɑtɑ. Lɑsɛli go hɛ̃ ngɑ koo yom sɛ. À mɑnɑ du suurɑndiyom zɑmɑ ɑ̀ koo yom bu.”
Ammɑ kɑ Hirodu bu, cɔfɔ Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ hunutɛrɛ Yosɛfu sɛ hɑndiri kunɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu.
À cii: Tunu kɑ koo di ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindei Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go koo cɛnɑ di hundi ceeci, ǹ bu.
Yosɛfu bine tunu kɑ koo cɛnɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ zɑɑ kɑ kɑɑ Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu.
Ammɑ kɑ Yosɛfu mɑɑ ǹ cii Akelu go kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ Hirodu guribi, ɑ̀ hɑmburu ngɑ mɑ kpei nungu di. Kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑbɑɑru hɑndiri kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
À kɑɑ gɔrɔ kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nɑzɑrɛtu. À kɑɑ gɔrɔ Nɑzɑrɛtu zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑndebi yom mee gɑɑ di mɑ tɔ sɛ kɑ ǹ cii: "Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ”.
Hɑnu nge yom di gɑɑ, Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ ko wɑɑzu Yude lɑɑbu gɑnji kunɑ.
À cii: Wɑ tuubi zɑmɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni.
Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ci ngɑ kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi nɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ. À jinde cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɔ sɔlu. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔize yom cɛɑndi.
Yohɑnnɑ bumbum go yoo hɑmini kpɛ dɑm ndɑ kunɑcendi kuuru ŋmɔne ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ. À ŋmɑɑri yɑ ci doo ndɑ gɑnji yu.
Bine, Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kulu bɔrɔ yom ndɑ lɑɑbu yom kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑni Yudum isɑ gɑɑ, ǹ kulu hunu kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
À nɑ ǹ mirɑndi Yudum isɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei dulum yom cii.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ di Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ boobo ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go kɑɑ ngɑ mirɑndiyomɑ dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Gɑzɑmɑ dimi yom, mee yɑ nɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru wom mɑ zuuru binetɔnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ sɛ?
Ngɑ di sɛ wɑ wom tɛgbei cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ tuubiyom.
Wom bumbum mɑ si lɑsɑbu kɑ cii: I gundɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ. A go cii wom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hini kɑ tondi yom wɔ bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ ize yom Abulɛmɑ sɛ.
Ǹ bine nɑ deesi dɑm tuurinyɑ yom kɑɑji gɑɑ kɔ. Ngɑ di sɛ tuurinyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si ize hinno hɛi, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumbu no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go wom mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri tuubiyom sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛɛ gɑɑbi. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom zɑɑ. Ngɑ wɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi no ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ nini mo.
À funsu gɑɑsu goono ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À gɑ ngɑ fɑruyom dɔ hinnɑndi sã sã kɑ ngɑ mɔsɔngu dɑm boo. Ammɑ duuɑ wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu ndɑ nini kɑ ɑ̀ si wi.
Sɑɑ di no Yesu hunu zɑ Gɑlile kɑ kɑɑ Yudum isɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ mirɑndi.
Ammɑ Yohɑnnɑ go hungu ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ̀ himɑ ni, n mɑ ɑ mirɑndi, cɔfɔ n kɑɑ ɑ dɔ?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ yɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑsɑbɑndi i sɛ kɑ i mɑ cɛyom susu kulu tɔnɑndi. Yohɑnnɑ mɑnɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Kɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ Yesu mirɑndi, ɑ̀ hunu mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ hɑri di kunɑ. Cɔfɔ bɛɛnɛ feeri ɑ̀ sɛ. À di Ikpɛ Biyɑ go zumbu kɑ sɔm ngɑ bɔm zɑngɑ gutu.
Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ mo hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ du binekɑɑne.
À bɑndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ Yesu boi ko kpeindɑɑ̀ gɑnji kunɑ Ibilisi mɑ ɑ̀ sui.
À meehɔ zɑɑ jiribi weitɑɑci ndɑ ciini weitɑɑci. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ.
Suikɔ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: De ni Ikpɛ Ize no, cii tondi yom wɔ mɑ bɛrɛ buuru.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii, “Bɔrɔ si hunɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri hinne ɑmmɑ ndɑ sendi kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu Ikpɛ mee kunɑ”.
Ibilisi bine kpeindɑ Yesu wɑngɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ yɔlɔ bɔm.
À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ni Ikpɛ Ize no, ǹ mɑ zimbi gɑndɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii: Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom no fɔndɔ kɑ simbɑ ni. Ǹ gɑ n tɛmbɛ ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ n cee mɑ si sɑm tondi gɑɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii kpɛɛnɛ, "N mɑ si Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Kpe sui”.
Ibilisi kpeindɑ Yesu tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ hɑndunyɑ kpetɛrɛ yom kulu ndɑ ǹ deizɑ.
À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ n no hɛ yom wɔ kulu de n go jɛndɛbiri ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi.
Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, Setɑm. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii: “N mɑ Kpe n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ngɑ hinne sɛ”.
Ibilisi bine nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom di mɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo.
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ǹ cii ǹ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɑm kɑsu, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ ɑ̀ kpei gɔrɔ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ Zɑbulu lɑɑbu ndɑ Nefitɑli lɑɑbu gɑme.
À kpei nungu di zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi cii mɑ tɔ sɛ. À cii:
Zɑbulu lɑɑbu ndɑ Nefitɑli lɑɑbu goono buulɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ Yudum bisɑntɛ Gɑlile lɑɑbu dimi cindei gɔrɛ dɔ.
Nge yom kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ kube kunɑ ǹ di kɑɑri bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ bu bicire kunɑ, ǹ sɛ no kɑɑri hunutɛrɛ.
Zɑ sɑɑ di no Yesu sinti kɑ wɑɑzu. À go cii: Wɑ tuubi zɑmɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni.
Kɑ Yesu go Gɑlile buulɑ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ di cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ fɔ, Simɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Andɛrɛ. Ǹ go biriji see buulɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ sɔrɔkɔ yom no.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ gɑnɑ. Zɑngɑ sɔrɔkɔ cini ciifi ceeci, ɑ kɑɑ wom tɛ bɔrɔ ceecikɔ yom.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ngei biriji yom nɑm kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
À bisɑ nungu di kɑ tɔ jinɑ. À di cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ fɔ mo kpɛɛnɛ, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Yohɑnnɑ, Zɑbɑdi koo yom. Ǹ goono hɑrihi kunɑ ndɑ ǹ bɑɑbɑ Zɑbɑdi. Ǹ go kɑ ngei biriji yom hinsɑ. À nɑ ǹ cɛɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɑrihiɑ nɑm kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Yesu go Gɑlile lɑɑbu kulu yɑɑli ko cooɑndi ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm. À go doorikom kulu ndɑ zɛnjɛkom kulu no bɑɑni jɑmɑ kunɑ.

Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɑɑru hunu Siriɑ lɑɑbu mee ndɑ mee kunɑ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ zɛnjɛkom yom kulu kɑ ǹ go tɑɑbi ndɑ doori ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ hɔllɛkpɛ yom ndɑ hɔllɔkom yom ndɑ leebɑntɛ yom mo. À nɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑlɑ Dekɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu. Zɑ nungu di no ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ kɑlɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ.
À sinti kɑ ǹ cooɑndi kɑ cii:
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, beerem kɑ ǹ bine kunɑ ǹ go lɑsɑbu ngei si hini kɑ tɔ ngei bɔm sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ sɛ no bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ goono.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom mo no, beerem kɑ ǹ bine go sɑrɑ zɑmɑ ngei wɔ no ǹ gɑ ǹ yɑmɑrɑndi.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, beerem kɑ ǹ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom zɑmɑ ngei yɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ tubu.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ cɛyom susu zɑngɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ ndɑ jo, zɑmɑ ngei yɑ kɑɑ kungu.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, beerem kɑ ǹ go suuji cɛbɛ zɑmɑ ǹ sɛ no ǹ suuji tɛ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, beerem kɑ ǹ bine yom go hinne zɑmɑ ngei yɑ di Ikpɛ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, beerem kɑ ǹ go sɑsɑbɑndiyom tɛ zɑmɑ ngei wɔ ǹ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ Ikpɛ ize yom.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom mo no, beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi cɛyom susu sɑbu sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ sɛ no bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ goono.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no wom, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom woo kɑ wom guruguzɑndi kɑ hɛ lɑlɔ dimi kulu cii wom gɑɑ tɑngɑri bɔm ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Wom mɑ fɑihã. Wom bine mɑ kɑɑni mo kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ wom tukunsi beeri bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Yɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑndebi yom kɑ ǹ nɑ wom jinɑ mo guruguzɑndi.
Wom goono no zɑngɑ ciiri hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ de ciiri tɑru, hɛ fɔ no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ ndɑ? À si boori hɛ fɔ kulu gɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ munu beerem mɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu.
Wom goono no zɑngɑ kɑɑri hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono tondi kuku bɔm si hini kɑ tugu.
Ǹ si fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ dɑm cilɑ cire. Ammɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ jisi fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ ɑ̀ mo kɑɑri no beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ goono fuu kunɑ.
Wom ŋmɔne kɑɑri ɑ̀ mo kɑɑri yɑ di iburɑdɑm yom jine hɑli ǹ mɑ di wom gbei hinno yom. À gɑɑ no ǹ mɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Wom mɑ si tɑmmɑ ɑ kɑɑ no kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ wi wɑlɑ kɑ ɑndebi yom fɔndɔ wi. A mɑnɑ kɑɑ ǹ wiyom ɑmmɑ kɑ ǹ tɔnɑndi.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ mɑnɑ beeni bɑ tombi fɔ wɑlɑ biiriize tombi fɔ si dɛrɛ Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ kɑlɑ hɛ kulu mɑ tɔ.

Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go meire yom wɔ ŋmɔne icɛnɑ fɔ dɑɑrum kɑ beerem cooɑndi yɑ di, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ beerem kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ kɑ cooɑndi ndei, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ wɔ cɛɛ bɔrɔ beeri bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
A go cii wom sɛ kɑ de wom cɛyom susu mɑnɑ bisɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ŋmɔne ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ŋmɔne, wom si huro bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ di kunɑ pɑi.
Wom mɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii dom bɔrɔ yom sɛ, n mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ wi, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti.

Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bine tɔ ngɑ nyɑize sɛ sɑbɑbu si, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ nyɑize sɛ sɑmu, Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cii ni, hɔllɔkom, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Ngɑ di sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ n go kɑɑndɑ n gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ cɔfɔ n go hɔngɔ kɑ n nyɑize fɔ gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ni.
Sɑɑ di gɑɑ n mɑ n sɑrɑɑ di nɑm bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ jine. N mɑ kpei sɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑize di jinɑ. Sɑɑ di n mɑ kɑɑ kɑ sɑrɑɑ no.
N mɑ sɑbɑ dɑm ndɑ wɑɑsi ni ndɑ n zojikɑri gɑme zɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom goono fɔndɔ bɔm. N mɑ sɑbɑ dɑm zɑmɑ n zojikɑri mɑ si n dɑm ciitikɔ kɑmbɛ, ciitikɔ mo mɑ si n dɑm dogɑri kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ n dɑm kɑsu.
Cimi no, ɑ go cii n sɛ, n si hunu nungu di kɑlɑ n mɑ nooru bɑnɑ, bɑ dɑlɑ mɑ si cindi n gɑɑ.
Wom mɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii dom bɔrɔ yom sɛ: "N mɑ si zinɑ”.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ weibɔrɔ gunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bine, ɑkpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zinɑ kɔ ngɑ bine kunɑ.
Ammɑ de n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ moo tɛ n sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ dɔgu kɑ cetu ɑ̀ mɑ mooru ni. N gɑɑhɑm nungu fɔ mɑ hɑlɑci ɑ̀ bisɑ, ǹ mɑ n gɑɑhɑm kulu cetu nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Bine, de n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ yɑ tɛ n sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ, ɑ̀ dumbu kɑ cetu ɑ̀ mɑ mooru ni. N gɑɑhɑm nungu fɔ mɑ hɑlɑci ɑ̀ bisɑ, ǹ mɑ n gɑɑhɑm kulu cetu nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Ǹ cii dom bɔrɔ yom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: “Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ no hije wiyom tirɑ”.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zinɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm zinɑ fɔndɔ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ǹ fee hiji, ɑkpɛ go zinɑ.
Wom mɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ǹ cii dom bɔrɔ yom sɛ: “N mɑ si tɑngɑri ze tɛ, ɑmmɑ n mɑ n zeyom tɛ Ikpɛ jine”.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ si ze pɑti pɑti. Wom mɑ si ze ndɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ.
Wom mɑ si ze ndɑ gɑndɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ. Wom mɑ si ze ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Kpe Dɑbɑrikpɛ wɑngɑrɑ.
N mɑ si ze mo ndɑ n bɔm zɑmɑ n si hini kɑ n bɔm hɑmini bɑ ɑfɔ bɛrɛ ikpɑrɛ wɑlɑ ibi.
Ammɑ wom sendi mɑ ci oò, oò, wɑlɑ de ɑwo mo no ɑ̀ mɑ ci ɑwo. Hɛ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ cii ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, zɑ Ilɑlɔ dɔ no ɑ̀ go hunu.
Wom mɑɑ ǹ cii kpɛɛnɛ: “De bɔrɔ nɑ n moo fɔ kɑɑ, n mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne kɑɑ. De bɔrɔ nɑ n hinje fɔ kɑɑ, n mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne kɑɑ”.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ si hungu bɔrɔ lɑlɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ n sɑm kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ jɛrɛbɛ gɑɑ, n mɑ kɑmbɛwo mo ŋmɔne sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ mo ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ ni ciitikɔ dɔ kɑ n kpɛ gɑndɑ tɑ n gɑɑ, n mɑ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ di mo nɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Bine, de bɔrɔ go kɑ n tilɑsi n mɑ kilo fɔ diro tɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ kilomɛti hinkɑ tɛ ndɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ n mɑ ngɑ gɑrɔ, n mɑ si bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Wom mɑɑ ǹ cii: “N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine, n mɑ hungu n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ”.

Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ bɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom. Beerem kɑ ǹ go wom lɑɑli, wom mɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ hɛ hinno tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go hungu wom. Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go hɛ lɑlɔ yom tɛ wom sɛ ko wom guruguzɑndi.

À gɑɑ no wom tɛ wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ize yom. Ngɑ yɑ go nɑm ngɑ weenu go tunu bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom ndɑ bɔrɔ hinno yom bɔm. À go nɑm bɛɛnɛ hɑri mɑ kɑm beerem kɑ ǹ cɛsusu ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛsusu bɔm.
De wom go bɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ wom, tukunsi fɔ no wom gundɑ? Yɑ no ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom mo go tɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Bine, de wom go wom nyɑize yom hinne fɔɔ, ifɔ no wom go tɛ kɑ bisɑ cindei? Yɑ no dimi cindei mo go tɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ tɔɑntɛ yom zɑngɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ ci tɔɑntɛ.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli wom mɑ si wom gbei hinno yom tɛ beerem jine ǹ mɑ di wom. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ wom sindɑ bɑnɑndi wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ dɔ.

Ngɑ di sɛ sɑɑ kɑ n go sɑrɑɑ tɛ n mɑ si ɑ̀ fɛɛ zɑngɑ munɑfici yom go tɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ dɛbɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ go tɛ yɑ di zɑmɑ iburɑdɑm yom mɑ ngei bɛɛrɑndi sɛ. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ ǹ du ngei bɑnɑndi kɔ.
Ammɑ ni, sɑɑ kɑ n go sɑrɑɑ tɛ n kɑmbɛwo mɑ si bei hɛ kɑ n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ go tɛ.
N sɑrɑɑ tɛyom mɑ ci tugu kunɑ. N Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go di tugu kunɑ ɑ̀ gɑ n bɑnɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.

Sɑɑ kɑ wom go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ mo, wom mɑ si tɛ zɑngɑ munɑfici yom. Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ cɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ wɑlɑ dɛbɛ yom bɔm ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ǹ go tɛ yɑ di zɑmɑ beerem mɑ di ei. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ ǹ du ngei bɑnɑndi kɔ.
Ammɑ ni, sɑɑ kɑ n go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ n mɑ huro n fuu kunɑ kɑ gɑmbu dɑɑbu ko kɑ n Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ tugu kunɑ. N Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go di tugu kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ n bɑnɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom mɑ si sendi kɔnu yom yɑɑrɑ yɑɑrɑ zɑngɑ dimi cindei. Ǹ go tɑmmɑ sendi boobo di gɑɑ no Ikpɛ mɑɑ kɑ tu ngei sɛ.
Wom mɑ si himɑ ngei zɑmɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ go bei hɛ kɑ wom go bɑɑ kɔ hɑli wom gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ: I Bɑɑbɑ kɑ n goono bɛɛnɛ, n mɑɑ mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ.
N kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ. N binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ bɛɛnɛ.
N mɑ i no hunkunɑ ŋmɑɑri.
N mɑ i dɛrɛyom yɑɑfɑ i sɛ zɑngɑ i yom mo i go beerem kɑ ǹ dɛrɛ i sɛ yɑɑfɑ.
N mɑ si kpeindɑ i yom suiyom dɔ, ɑmmɑ n mɑ i kɔm Ilɑlɔ kɑmbɛ. N ŋmɔne no kpetɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ deizɑ, jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
De wom nɑ beerem yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ǹ tɑɑli yom, wom Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ go wom yɑɑfɑ.
Ammɑ de wom si beerem yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ǹ tɑɑli yom, wom Bɑɑbɑ mo si wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom.

Sɑɑ kɑ wom go meehɔ zɑɑ, wom mɑ si meehɔ zɑɑ zɑngɑ munɑfici yom. Ǹ go binesɛrɛ cɛbɛ ngei moodumɑ yom gɑɑ. Sisibi no ǹ go dɑm ngei moodumɑ yom gɑɑ hɑli iburɑdɑm yom mɑ bei kɑ ngei go meehɔ zɑɑ. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ǹ du ngei bɑnɑndi kɔ.
Ammɑ ni wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ n go meehɔ zɑɑ, n mɑ jii tusu n bɔm gɑɑ kɑ n moodumɑ nyunu.
N mɑ si meehɔ zɑɑ hɑli beerem mɑ bei. Ammɑ n mɑ ngɑ di tɛ n Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugu kunɑ sɛ. N Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go di tugu kunɑ ɑ̀ gɑ n bɑnɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Wom mɑ si hɑizici meigu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Nungu di nɑnɑbɑnu ndɑ kɛdiɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ sɑrɑ. Nungu wɔ zee yom mo huro kɑ ɑ̀ zee.
Ammɑ wɑ hɑizici meigu bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, nungu kɑ zɑ nɑnɑbɑnu zɑ kɛdiɑ ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si ɑ̀ sɑrɑ. Nungu wɔ zee yom mo si huro kɑ ɑ̀ zee.
Nungu kɑ n hɑizici goono, n bine mo kɑɑ goono.
Moo goono no zɑngɑ fitilɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ, de n moo go boori, n gɑɑhɑm kulu tɔ ndɑ kɑɑri.
Ammɑ de n moo ci ilɑlɔ, n gɑɑhɑm kulu kɑɑ tɔ ndɑ kube. Ngɑ di sɛ, kɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ de ɑ̀ tɛ kube, kube di beeri fɑ.
Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kpɛ hinkɑ sɛ mefɔ. À kɑɑ hungu ɑfɔ kɑ bɑɑ ɑfɔ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑni ɑfɔ sɛ kɑ dondɑ ɑfɔ. Wom si hini kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ sɛ mefɔ.

À sɛ no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wɑ si kɑrihã wom hundi yom sɛ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ hɑm wɑlɑ ndɑ jiine kɑ wom kɑɑ dɑm gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. Hundi bisɑ ŋmɑɑri. Gɑɑhɑm mo bisɑ jiine kɑ dɑm. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Wɑ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ ciro yom gɑɑ. Ǹ si dumɑ. Ǹ si wi. Ǹ si heeni meigu mo boo yom kunɑ. Wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ go kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɑndi. Wom bisɑ ciro yom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Wom kunɑ mee no kɑrihã kunɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ kɑmbɛ kɑru fɔ tɔntɔnu ngɑ kuyom gɑɑ?
Ifɔ sɛ no wom gundɑ jiine kɑ dɑm kɑrihã? Wom mɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ gɑnji kunɑ boosi yom go beeri. Ǹ si gbei tɛ. Ǹ si silli tɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ mo, bɑ Sɑlomɔ ɑ̀ deizɑ kulu kunɑ mɑnɑ tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ.
De Ikpɛ go gɑnji kunɑ subu yom tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ yɑ kɑ ǹ goono hunkunɑ ɑmmɑ subɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu, hɑli yɑ mo wom, nɑɑne cɛnɑkpɛ yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si kɑrihã kɑ cii: Ifɔ no i kɑɑ ŋmɑɑ? Ifɔ no i kɑɑ hɑm? Ifɔ no i gɑ i bɔm kɑimɑ ndɑ?
Hɛ yom wɔ kulu dimi cindei yɑ go kɑ ǹ ceeci. Wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ go bei kɑ wom go bɑɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu.
Wɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛyom susu ceeci sintine. À kɑɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu tɔntɔnu wom sɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ si kɑrihã ndɑ subɑ zɑmɑ subɑ bumbum gundɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑrihã. Hɑnu kulu ndɑ ngɑ tɑɑbi no, ɑ̀ wɑsɑ hɑnu di sɛ.
Wom mɑ si ciiti zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si wom ciiti sɛ.
Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom ciiti no ndɑ ciitiyom dimi kɑ wom go ciiti. Ǹ kɑɑ wom neesi ndɑ neesiji kɑ wom go neesi ndɑ.
Ifɔ sɛ n go di subuize kɑ ɑ̀ goono n nyɑize moo kunɑ, ɑmmɑ n si di bundu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bumbum moo kunɑ?
Wɑlɑ mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ cii n nyɑize di sɛ: Cɛ yɑ subuize wɔ kɑɑ n sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n moo kunɑ? E, bundu no n sɛ moo kunɑ yɑ fɑ.
Munɑfici, bundu wɔ kɑɑ n moo kunɑ jinɑ. À gɑɑ no n di ihinno kɑ subuize di kɑ ɑ̀ goono n nyɑize moo kunɑ kɑɑ.
Wom mɑ si hɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ no hɑnsi yom sɛ. Wom mɑ si wom kɔlibɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom cetu kpisɔ yom jine. N mɑ si ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ ǹ gɑ ǹ tɑɑmu. Ǹ bɛrɛ mo kɑ ye kɑ wom nɑmɑ kɑ pɑti pɑti.
Wo ŋmɑɑrɛ, ǹ kɑɑ wom no. Wo ceeci, wom kɑɑ du. Wo kobi, ǹ kɑɑ feeri wom sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑrɛ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ceeci mo, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kobi mo, ǹ kɑɑ feeri ɑ̀ sɛ.
Wom kunɑ mee yɑ gɑ ngɑ koo no tondi, de ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ buuru?
Wɑlɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ciifi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no gondi?
Bine, wom kɑ wom ci bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom, wom ŋmɑɑni kɑ hɛ hinno yom no wom koo yom sɛ. Yɑ mo no wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ go hɛ hinno yom no beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ kulu kɑ wom go bɑɑ beerem mɑ tɛ wom sɛ, yɑ no wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ngei mo sɛ zɑmɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom mo go kɑ ngɑ di cii.
Wɑ huro ndɑ mee kɑnkɑmɑntɛ. Mee hɛɑntɛ ndɑ fɔndɔ bɑmbɑtɑ yɑ kpei hɑlɑciyom dɔ. Bɔrɔ bɑyom yɑ huro ndɑ.
Ammɑ mee kɑnkɑmɑntɑ ndɑ fɔndɔ mɑriyo yɑ kpei hundi dɔ. Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ yɑ du ɑ̀.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli mo ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑ ǹ go feeji kuuru yom dɑm kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ɑmmɑ sɑgɑli yom no kunɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ go kɔm.
Wom kɑɑ kɑ ǹ bei ǹ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Beerem si lɛzɛ̃ize kɑɑ kɑriji nyɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ si jee kɑɑ dɛnfɛnɛ kɑriji nyɑ gɑɑ mo. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Zɑngɑ yɑ no tuurinyɑ hinno kulu go kɑ ize hinno hɛi. Ammɑ tuurinyɑ lɑlɔ mo go kɑ ize lɑlɔ hɛi.
Tuurinyɑ hinno si hini kɑ ize lɑlɔ hɛi. Yɑ no tuurinyɑ lɑlɔ mo si hini kɑ ize hinno hɛi.
Tuurinyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si ize hinno hɛi, ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dumbu no. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cetu nini kunɑ mo.
Zɑngɑ yɑ no wom gɑ ǹ bei ǹ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ.
À nɑ ci beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ sɛ, Kpe, Kpe yɑ kɑɑ huro bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ binebɑɑ tɛ, ngei yɑ huro.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ cii ɑ sɛ hɑnu ngɑ di: Kpe, Kpe i nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ. I nɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ. I nɑ dɑbɑri gbei boobo tɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Cɔfɔ hɛɛ mo, yɑ cii ǹ sɛ: A si wom bei pɑi. Wɑ gɑnɑ ɑ sɛ, wom gbei lɑlɔ tɛkɔ yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ ɑ sendi wɔne yom kɑ ǹ dɑm ngɑ tɛgbei kunɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ himɑndi no zɑngɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ fuu cini tondi bɔm.
Hɑri kɑm. Gooru yom tɔ hɑli ǹ munu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Hɛo tɛ. À nɑ fuu di kɑru ɑmmɑ fuuɑ mɑnɑ kɑm zɑmɑ tondi bɔm no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sinji.
Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ɑ sendi wɔne yom kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ tɛgbei kunɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ himɑndi no zɑngɑ bɔmsikpɛ. À nɑ ngɑ fuu cini tɑɑsi bɔm.
Hɑri kɑm. Gooru yom tɔ hɑli ǹ munu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Hɛo tɛ. À nɑ fuu di Fuuɑ kɑm. À kulu kɑm duru duru.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ meecine wɔne yom beeni, jɑmɑ di go mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ.
Ǹ go mɑmɑci zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ cooɑndi no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini. À mɑnɑ cooɑndi zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu zumbu zɑ tondi kukuɑ bɔm, bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Cɔfɔ, jire fɔ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. À cii: Kpe, de n bɑɑ n hini kɑ ɑ hinnɑndi.
Yesu nɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ. À cii: A go bɑɑ, n mɑ hinne. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hinne ɑ̀ jiretɛrɛ di gɑɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ lɑɑkɑli n mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ, ɑmmɑ n mɑ kpei kɑ n bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ sɛ. N mɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
Kɑ Yesu kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ. À ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ:
Kpe, ɑ gbeiize fɔ go kɑni fuu ndɑ gɑɑhɑm buyom futu. À go tɑɑbi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
Wɑnguize yom jinehune di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, yɑ nɑ tɔ kɑ n mɑ huro ɑ fuu kunɑ. N mɑ sendi fɔlɔnku hinne cii, ɑ gbeiize di kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
Hɛɛ mo, wɑnguize fɔ hini cire no ɑ goono. Wɑnguize yom mo goono ɑ cire. De ɑ cii ɑfɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei, ɑ̀ kpei. De ɑ cii ɑfɔ mo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. De ɑ cii ɑ bɑnyɑ mo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ tɛ.
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di, mɑmɑci nɑ ɑ̀ dii. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɑ Isirɑilɑ kunɑ yɑ nɑ di nɑɑne beeri yɑ wɔ.
A go cii wom sɛ mo kɑ bɔrɔ boobo go kɑɑ zɑ weenuhune hɛrɛ ndɑ weenukɑne hɛrɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Ammɑ kpetɛrɛ ize yom tɛrɛ kube kunɑ no ǹ gɑ ǹ cetu. Nungu di no hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
Yesu cii wɑnguize yom jinehune sɛ: Kpei, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ n sɛ zɑngɑ n nɑɑne. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di gɑɑ no gbeiize di du bɑɑni.
À bɑndɑ, Yesu kɑɑ huro Piɛɛ fuu. À di Piɛɛ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse.
À nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ hɑmɑ. À gɑɑwɑse di bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ ǹ yɑrɛ.
Kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ ǹ kɑɑndɑ hɔllɛkpɛ boobo Yesu sɛ. À nɑ hɔllɛ yom di gɑɑrɛ ndɑ ngɑ sendi fɔ. Beerem mo kulu kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɑɑni, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
Ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑndebi Esɑyi mee gɑɑ mɑ tɔ sɛ. Esɑyi cii: Ngɑ bumbum nɑ i hinɑbunutɛrɛ zɑɑ kɑ i doori yom jɛrɛ.
Kɑ Yesu di bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ngɑ dɑm bindi ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɔ no ngei mɑ kpei yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ.
Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ n gɑnɑ nungu kulu kɑ n go kpei.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑɑbi yom gundɑ guusu yom. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom mo gundɑ gɔrɛ dɔ. Ammɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ sindɑ nungu kɑ ɑ mɑ ɑ bɔm dɛcɛ.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, tu ɑ sɛ jinɑ yɑ kpei kɑ ɑ bɑɑbɑ fiji.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A gɑnɑ. Nɑm bukɔ yom mɑ ngei bukɔ yom fiji.
Kɑ Yesu huro hɑrihi, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Cɔfɔ hɛo beeri fɔ tunu buulɑ bɔm kɑlɑ hɑri boosu yom go hɑrihiɑ kɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu. Ammɑ Yesu wɔ go jiibi.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di mɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Ǹ cii: Kpe, i fɑɑbɑ. I go hɑlɑci.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɑmburu, wom nɑɑne cɛnɑkpɛ yom? À tunu kɑ deeni hɛo di ndɑ buulɑ di gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ nungu tɛ sɑkɑi.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑmɑci kɑ cii: Mee dimi no bɔrɔ wɔ hɑli bɑ hɛo ndɑ buulɑ mo go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ?
Kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gegesene lɑɑbu hɔllɛkpɛ hinkɑ fɔ hunu sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ǹ futu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ fɔndɔ ngɑ di gɑnɑ.
Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ goono ni ndɑ i yom gɑme, Yesu Ikpɛ Ize? N kɑɑ kɑ i bɔnɑndi no bɑ, zɑ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ?
Hɑli ǹ moorɑntɛ, kpisɔ gɑɑ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ go kurum.
Hɔllɛ yom di go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: De n nɑ i gɑɑrɛ, n mɑ nɑm i mɑ kpei huro kpisɔ gɑɑ wɔ kunɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei. Ǹ hunu kɑ kpei huro kpisɔ gɑɑ di kunɑ. Cɔfɔ kpisɔ gɑɑ di kulu go pito ko gungure zɑ tondi bɔm kɑ kɑm buulɑ di kunɑ. Ǹ bu hɑri kunɑ.
Ǹ kurukɔ yom zuuru kɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ deede hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ hɔllɛkpɛ yom di.
Cɔfɔ kpɑɑrɑ di kulu hunu kɑ kɑɑ Yesu kube. Zɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngei lɑɑbu kunɑ.
Kɑ Yesu ye kɑ huro hɑrihi ɑ̀ nɑ buulɑ dem kɑ kpei ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ mɔngɔlɔ fɔ dɑɑri bɔm. Kɑ Yesu di nɑɑne kɑ ǹ gundɑ, ɑ̀ cii mɔngɔlɔ di sɛ: A koo, n lɑɑkɑli mɑ kɑni. A nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom cii ngei bine kunɑ: Bɔrɔ wɔ go kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi.
Zɑ kɑ Yesu go kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɛ lɑlɔ lɑsɑbu wom bine kunɑ?
Wɔ fɔ yɑ fɑɑlɑ kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ mɑ cii ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom wɑlɑ bɔrɔ mɑ cii tunu kɑ dirɑ?
Bine, wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gundɑ hini hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɑ dulum yom yɑɑfɑ. À sɛ no Yesu go sendi mɔngɔlɔ wɔ sɛ: Tunu kɑ n dɑɑri zɑɑ kɑ kpei fuu.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ kpei fuu.
Kɑ jɑmɑ di ngɑ di mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hini wɔne no iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu bisɑ nungu di kɑ tɔ jine, ɑ̀ di bɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Mɑtiyu. À go gɔrɔ bɑɑlici ɑlikɑsi tɑyom dɔ. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ. À tunu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ fuu kunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ boobo ndɑ dulumkoni boobo kɑɑ ko ŋmɑɑ ndɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom di ɑ̀. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no wom Coobɑɑbɑ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom wɔ ndɑ dulumkoni yom wɔ?
Ammɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑɑni, ǹ si bɑɑ lokotoro kɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɑɑni.
Ammɑ wɑ kpei dendeni hɛ kɑ wɔne cii: “Hɛɛ wɔ, suuji no ɑ go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci gɑrɑndi”. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi ɑmmɑ dulumkoni yom.
Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom bine kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no i yom wɔ ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, i cini meehɔ zɑɑ ɑmmɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom si meehɔ zɑɑ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi yom bine yom si hini kɑ sɑrɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑruhiji goono ndei. Ammɑ hɑnu yom kɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑ hɑruhiji gɑnɑndi ǹ dɔ. Sɑɑ di no ǹ kɑɑ meehɔ zɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ si zɑrɑ teji dumbɑri dɑm jiine zeenɔ gɑɑ zɑmɑ dumbɑri di, ɑ̀ gɑ izeenɑ jɛrɛ fɔ zɑɑ no. Pɑti di kɑɑ tɔntɔnu.
Yɑ no beerem si dufɛ̃ teji dɑm hɑmburu zeenɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ hɑmburu yom di bɔgu no. Dufɛ̃ di kɑɑ bɑmbɑri. Hɑmburu yom mo sɑrɑ. Ammɑ ǹ go dufɛ̃ teji dɑm hɑmburu teji kunɑ. Ǹ kulu mo kɑimɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go hɛ nge yom di cii ǹ sɛ, cɔfɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ fɔ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. À cii: A koo hundiyo bu mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. Ammɑ kɑɑ kɑ n kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ.
Yesu tunu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Yɑ no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ kuri go dooru ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. À mɑɑni ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hɑngɑ hɑmɑ.
À go cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: De ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hɑngɑ hinne hɑmɑ, ɑ du bɑɑni.
Ammɑ Yesu bɛrɛ kɑ di ɑ̀. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo hundiyo, n lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. N nɑɑne nɑ n no bɑɑni. Weibɔrɔ di du bɑɑni zɑ sɑɑ ngɑ di.
Kɑ Yesu kɑɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di hundi ɑ̀ di gɑsiɑkɑri yom ndɑ jɑmɑ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ go kɔsɔngu.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ wom bɔm cendi zɑmɑ koo hundiyo di mɑnɑ bu. À go jiibi no. Cɔfɔ ǹ go Yesu hɑɑru.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ di kɑɑ tɛrɛ ɑ̀ huro kɑ hundiyo kɑmbɛ di. Koo hundiyo di tunu.
Bɑɑru ngɑ di kpei lɑɑbu di nungu kulu.
Kɑ Yesu bisɑ nungu di kɑ tɔ jinɑ, dɑnɑm hinkɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ni, Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu tɔ fuu kunɑ dɑnɑm yom di mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom nɑɑne kɑ ɑ hini kɑ hɛ wɔ tɛ? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ, Oò Kpe.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ moo yom hɑmɑ kɑ cii: À mɑ tɛ wom sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ wom nɑɑne goono ndɑ.
Ǹ moo yom feeri. Yesu nɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ cii: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bei.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ dirɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ fɛɛ lɑɑbu di nungu kulu.
Kɑ ǹ go hunu, cɔfɔ beerem kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ bɛbɛ hɔllɛkpɛ fɔ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɔllɛ di gɑɑrɛ, bɛbɛ di go sendi. Mɑmɑci nɑ jɑmɑ dii. Ǹ cii: Hɛ wɔ dimi mɑnɑ tɛ Isirɑilɑ kunɑ bɑ ce fɔ.
Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom cii: À go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ no ndɑ hɔllɛ yom kpe.
Yesu bine go wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kulu yɑɑli ko cooɑndi ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. À go Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Ikpɛ bɔm. À go doorikom kulu ndɑ zɛnjɛkom kulu no bɑɑni jɑmɑ kunɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ di, sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ fɑrigɑ goono ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑru kɑ see mo zɑngɑ feeji yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ kurukɔ.
Bine, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Fɑri wiyom bɑ gumo, ɑmmɑ gbeiteeri yom si bɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ hemɑrukpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gbeiteeri yom sɑmbɑ ngɑ hemɑru kunɑ.
Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ ǹ no hini hɔllɛ yom bɔm ǹ mɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ mɑ doorikom kulu ndɑ zɛnjɛkom kulu no bɑɑni mo.
Diyɑ wei cindi hinkɑ di mɑɑ yom neyɑ: Sintine, Simɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Andɛrɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Zɑbɑdi koo ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Yohɑnnɑ,
ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Bɑɑtɛlɛmi ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Mɑtiyu, ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Alifɛ koo ndɑ Lebe kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ mɑɑdɛcɛ Tɑde,
ndɑ Simɔ Kɑnɑnɑ bɔrɔ ndɑ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Yesu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di dɔntɔm kɑ ǹ no fɔndɔ. À cii: Wom mɑ si kpei dimi cindei dɔ. Wom mɑ si huro mo Sɑmɑri bɔrɔ yom kpɑɑrɑ yom kunɑ.
Ammɑ wom mɑ kpei Isirɑilɑ ize yom dɔ kɑ ǹ goono zɑngɑ feeji yom kɑ ǹ dɛrɛ.
Wom mɑ kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ cii: Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni.
Wom mɑ doorikom yom no bɑɑni. Wom mɑ jire yom hinnɑndi. Wom mɑ bukɔ yom tunɑndi. Wom mɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. Gomini no wom du, wom mɑ gomini no.
Wom mɑ si wurɑ nooru guziri zɑɑ wɑlɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu nooru wɑlɑ nooru ciire wom zɑlifɔntɔ yom kunɑ.
Wom mɑ si nɑɑruyom fɔɔlɔ zɑɑ wɑlɑ kpɛ jinde hinkɑ wɑlɑ tɑɑmu yom wɑlɑ goobu yom. Wom mɑ si nge yom di zɑɑ zɑmɑ gbeiteeri tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ du ngɑ ŋmɑɑri.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ fɔ yom kunɑ wɑlɑ kpɑɑrɑ fɔ yom kunɑ wom mɑ hã nungu di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ kpɑɑrɑ di kɑlɑ wom mɑ dirɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom go huro fuu kunɑ, wom mɑ bɑɑni ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
De bine fuu di tɔ ngɑ bɔm, wom bɑɑni mɑ zumbu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɔ ngɑ bɔm, wom bɑɑni ŋmɑɑrɛyom mɑ ye wom gɑɑ.
De bɔrɔ mɑnɑ wom yotɛrɛ tɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑngɑ dɑm wom sendi yom sɛ mo, wom mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ wom cee si, wom kɑmbɛ si. Wom mɑ hunu fuu ngɑ di kunɑ wɑlɑ kpɑɑrɑ ngɑ di kunɑ.
Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ ciiti hɑnu hine kɑ bisɑ kpɑɑrɑ ngɑ di.
Gunɑ, ɑ go wom dɔntɔm no zɑngɑ feeji yom sɑgɑli yom bindi bindi. Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom zɑngɑ gondi yom. Wom mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom zɑngɑ gutu yom.
Ammɑ wom mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom bulɑɑlɑ ngei mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom gɑɑbikoni yom jine mo ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ɑ sɑbu sɛ hɑli wom mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ǹ sɛ ndɑ dimi cindei sɛ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ, wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si dirigo ndɑ zɑngɑ wom kɑɑ sendi wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ cii. Ǹ kɑɑ wom no hɛ kɑ wom mɑ cii lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ.
Sɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ nɑ ci wom yɑ go sendi. Wom Bɑɑbɑ Biyɑ yɑ go sendi wom kunɑ.
Ammɑ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑɑ cɛrɛ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Yɑ no bɑɑbɑ mo ngɑ koo. Koo yom mo kɑɑ tunu kɑ ngei bɑhɛi yom dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ǹ wi.
Ǹ kulu kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini suuru kɑlɑ mee ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ kɑɑ tɑɑbi di kunɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom guruguzɑndi wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ wom mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei ɑfɔ ŋmɑni kunɑ. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom si Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu yɑɑli kɑ beeni kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, yɑ kɑɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize si bisɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ. Bɑnyɑ mo si bisɑ ngɑ kpe.
À himɑ no coobɑɑbɑize mɑ goono zɑngɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ. Bɑnyɑ mo mɑ goono zɑngɑ ngɑ kpe. De ǹ nɑ hundikpɛ cɛɛ Bezɑbulɑ, yɑ mo no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ fuu bɔrɔ yom mo cɛɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si hɑmburei zɑmɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ kube kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ cii kɑɑri kunɑ. Hɛ kɑ ǹ go ciine wom sɛ mo, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ fuu yom yɔlɔ yom bɔm.
Wom mɑ si hɑmburu gɑɑhɑm wikɔ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ hundi wi. Ammɑ wom mɑ hɑmburu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hundi ndɑ gɑɑhɑm hɑlɑci nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Ǹ cini bulɑngɑ ciro hinkɑ neerɑ dɑlɑ tɑɑci. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑm gɑndɑ mo de ɑ̀ nɑ ci wom Bɑɑbɑ bine go bɑɑ.
Wom wɔ, bɑ wom bɔm hɑmini yom ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu kɑbu no.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ si hɑmburu. Wom bisɑ bulɑngɑ ciro boobo.
À sɛ no, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii iburɑdɑm yom jine ngɑ ci ɑ ŋmɔne, hɛɛ mo ɑ kɑɑ cii ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ jine ɑkpɛ yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne no.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ ze iburɑdɑm yom jine kɑ cii ngɑ si ɑ bei, hɛɛ mo ɑ kɑɑ cii ɑ si ɑ̀ bei ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ jine.
Wom mɑ si tɑmmɑ ɑ kɑɑ no kɑ bɑɑni dɑm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɑɑni dɑm ɑmmɑ tɑkubɑ.
A kɑɑ feefee dɑm bɔrɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ gɑme, koo hundiyo ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gɑme, koo hɑibɔrɔ wɛndɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ gɑme.
Bɔrɔ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑɑ ci ɑ̀ fuu bɔrɔ yom.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ kɑ bisɑ hɛɛ, ɑkpɛ mo mɑnɑ tɔ hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ koo weibɔrɔ wɑlɑ ngɑ koo weibɔrɔ kɑ bisɑ hɛɛ ɑkpɛ mo mɑnɑ tɔ hɛɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ mo mɑnɑ tɔ hɛɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi mo ɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ kɑɑ du ɑ̀.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom tɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bine, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ, ɑkpɛ go wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm tɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebi fɔ tɑ ɑndebi mɑɑ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ du tukunsi ɑndebi ŋmɔne. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu tɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ kɑɑ du bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu tukunsi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go coobɑɑbɑize yom wɔ ŋmɔne icɛnɑ fɔ no gulɑize fɔ hinne hɑri yeenɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ coobɑɑbɑize, cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑkpɛ tukunsi si dɛrɛ ɑkpɛ sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di no fɔndɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ hunu nodi kɑ kpei cooɑndi kɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ ǹ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ.
Sɑɑ ngɑ di no Yohɑnnɑ goono kɑsu kunɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ gbei yom bɑɑru ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ǹ ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm Yesu dɔ.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu hã: Ni, n ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ di wɑlɑ bɔrɔ teji no i mɑ bɑtu?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei cii Yohɑnnɑ sɛ hɛ yom kɑ wom go mɑɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ wom go di.
Dɑnɑm yom moo yom feeri. Leebɑntɛ yom go dirɑ. Jire yom go du hinnɑndiyom. Lutu yom go mɑɑ. Ǹ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi. Ǹ go Bɑɑru Hinno mo wɑɑzu tɛ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ yɑ nɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di go dirɑ, Yesu sinti kɑ sendi jɑmɑ di sɛ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm. À cii: Ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ gɑnji kunɑ? Sɑɑri kɑ hɛo go zinji no bɑ?
Ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ? Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go jiine bɑɑnɔ dɑm no? Gunɑ, jiine bɑɑnɔ dɑmkɔ yom di gɑndɑkpɛ yom fuu yom kunɑ no ǹ goono.
Ammɑ ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ? Andebi fɔ? Oò, ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑ̀ bisɑ ɑndebi.
Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii: “Gunɑ, ɑ go bɔrɔ fɔ sɑmbɑ n jine, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ n fɔndɔ sɔlu n jine”.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ iburɑdɑm yom kunɑ weibɔrɔ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔrɔ yom kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ ŋmɔne.
Zɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ hɑnu yom kɑlɑ mɑɑsɑ, guruje no ǹ go bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ zɑɑ ndɑ. Gurujekɑri yom go kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi.
Andebi yom kulu ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ no kɑlɑ Yohɑnnɑ gɑɑ.
De bine wom tu hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ wɔ, bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ ci Eli kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Ammɑ ifɔ no ɑ mɑ zɑmɑni wɔ himɑndi ndɑ? À himɑ no zɑngɑ koo yom kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ ko kɑ ngei kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ.
Ǹ go cii: I nɑ gɑɑsiɑ kɑru wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ gɑɑni. I nɑ bɛrɛɛ dɔɔni yom tɛ wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ bɛrɛɛ hɛ̃.
Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑm kɑlɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ.
Ammɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize kɑɑ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ go hɑm kɑlɑ ǹ go cii ŋmɑɑri bɑɑkɔ no, dufɛ̃ hɑmkɔ no. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom kpɑɑsi no. Ammɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ cɛɑntɛ susu hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ.
Yesu sinti kɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kɔnkɔm zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tuubi bɑ kɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom di kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑbɑri gbei boobo tɛ.

Yesu cii: Kɑito, ni Kɔlɑzim kpɑɑrɑ. Kɑito, ni Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Dɑbɑri gbei yom kɑ ǹ tɛ wom kunɑ, de ǹ nɑ ǹ tɛ Tiru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ, ɑ̀ si jɛ kɑ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ soojiine dɑm kɑ gɔrɔ boosu kunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ: Tiru ndɑ Sidom kɑɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ ciiti hɑnu kɑ bisɑ wom.
Ni mo Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑli bɛɛnɛ, ǹ gɑ n cɛnɑndi kɑlɑ ciyomɑ. Dɑbɑri gbei yom kɑ ǹ tɛ n kunɑ, de ǹ nɑ ǹ tɛ Sodum kpɑɑrɑ mo kunɑ dom, ɑ̀ bo goono kɑlɑ hunkunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, Sodum kɑɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ ciiti hɑnu kɑ bisɑ ni.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no Yesu nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ cii: E Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ go kɑ n sɑɑbu, ni kɑ n ci Bɛɛnɛ Kpe ndɑ Gɑndɑ Kpe zɑmɑ n nɑ hɛ nge yom di tugu hɑikusu yom ndɑ fɑhɑmkpɛ yom sɛ. N nɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ koo cɛnɑ yom sɛ.
Oò Bɑɑbɑ, n nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ kɑɑni n sɛ.
A Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ kɑmbɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si ɑ bei, hɛɛ Ize, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si Bɑɑbɑ di mo bei de ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛɛ Ize ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑkpɛ sɛ.
Wɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ wom kulu kɑ wom fɑrigɑ ndɑ jɛrɔ timɔ jɛrɛyom. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ kɑɑ wom no hulonzom.
Wom mɑ ɑ jinde bɑndɑ zuu wɔ zɑɑ wom bɔm kɑ ɑ dendeni. Hɛɛ yɑ bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ bine kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ du wom hulonzom wom hundi sɛ.
Dɔgɔnɑntɛ no ɑ jinde bɑndɑ zuu di goono. A jɛrɔ di mo si tim.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no hulonzom hɑnu hine Yesu go fɑri yom tooru kɑ bisɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ ǹ sinti kɑ cɛtɛ yom pɑti kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom di ngɑ di. Cɔfɔ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, n coobɑɑbɑize yom go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli beerem mɑ tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom coo bɑ hɛ kɑ Dɑfidi tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, ngɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ?
À huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ kunɑ. À nɑ buuru jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑrɑɑ ŋmɑɑ. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. À hɑlɑli gɑrɑndikɔ yom hinne sɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ.
Wom coo mo Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine yom gɑrɑndikɔ yom cini hulonzom hɑnu di dɑɑrum Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑmmɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli. Wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ goono nee wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ.
De bine wom bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: “Suuji no ɑ go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci gɑrɑndi”, dom wom si beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli yom ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, hɛɛ yɑ ci hulonzom hɑnu Kpe mo.
Kɑ Yesu hunu nungu di, ɑ̀ kpei huro ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu. Yuifu yom nɑ Yesu hã hɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ. Ǹ cii: À hɑlɑli ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ no bɑɑni hulonzom hɑnu hine bɑ?
Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kunɑ, mee no de ɑ̀ gundɑ feeji fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm guusu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine, ɑ̀ si ɑ̀ dii ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑ kɑɑ tɛrɛ?
Bɔrɔ bisɑ feeji fɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ̀ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ hɛ hinno tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine.
Yesu cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: N kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ tɛ bɑɑni zɑngɑ kɑmbɛwo di.
Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom hunu, ǹ go sɑwɑrɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Yesu bei, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ hunu nungu di. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À nɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si ngɑ mɑɑ fɛɛ
Ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑndebi Esɑyi mee gɑɑ mɑ tɔ sɛ. Esɑyi cii.
Gunɑ, ɑ Gbeiteeri kɑ ɑ suubɑ go, ɑ Binegɑnji wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ du binekɑɑne. A gɑ ɑ Biyɑ zumɑndi ɑ̀ bɔm. À kɑɑ cimi ciiti bɑɑru cii dimi cindei sɛ.
À si zogu. À si kuwɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mo si mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde fɔndɔ yom bɔm.
À si sɑɑri kunkunɑntɛ ceeri. À si buzubuzu kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ bu wi kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm cimi ciiti mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ jinɑ.
À mɑɑ gɑɑ mo dimi cindei kɑɑ bɛɛjɛ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ hɔllɛkpɛ dɑnɑm bɛbɛ fɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni hɑli bɛbɛtɛrɛ di beeni. À go sendi. À go di.
Ngɑ di nɑ jɑmɑ kulu jirisi. Ǹ cii: À nɑ ci Dɑfidi ize di dee?
Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go mɑɑ ngɑ di ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ no ndɑ Bezɑbulɑ hɔllɛ yom kpe.

Ammɑ Yesu go bei hɛ kɑ ǹ go lɑsɑbu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Kpetɛrɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑ fee ihinkɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tuusu. Kpɑɑrɑ kulu wɑlɑ fuu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑ fee ihinkɑ, ɑ̀ si cɛ pɑi.
De Setɑm nɑ ngɑ bɔm gɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm fee ihinkɑ noyɑ. Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cɛ?
De hɛɛ wɔ, Bezɑbulɑ no ɑ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ, wom koo yom mo bine, hɛ fɔ no ǹ go kɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ ndɑ? À sɛ no, ngei bumbum kɑɑ tɛ wom ciitikɔ yom.
Ammɑ de Ikpɛ Biyɑ no ɑ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ, dom Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
Wɑlɑ mɛtɛ bɔrɔ tɛ kɑ hini kɑ huro bɑliji fuu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kuu de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑkpɛ hɔ jinɑ? Sɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ du kɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kuu.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si meigu ndɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑkpɛ yɑ seekɔ no.
À sɛ no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ Ikpɛ go iburɑdɑm yom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ dulum kulu ndɑ ǹ sendi yɑmɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi ndɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi yɑmu kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cɛnɑndi, ɑkpɛ si du yɑɑfɑyom.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sendi kɑ hungu hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sendi kɑ hungu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ǹ si ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ɑkpɛ sɛ, zɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kunɑ hɑli zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ.
De tuurinyɑ boori, ɑ̀ ize mo boori. De tuurinyɑ si boori, ɑ̀ ize mo si boori. Tuuriize gɑɑ no ǹ go tuurinyɑ bei.
Gɑzɑmɑ dimi yom, wom kɑ wom ci bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom, mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ hini kɑ hɛ hinno yom cii? Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bine tɔnɑndi, ngɑ no mee go sendi.
Bɔrɔ hinno, ɑ̀ bine jisiri hinno kunɑ no ɑ̀ gɑ ihinno yom kɑɑ tɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ lɑlɔ mo, ɑ̀ bine jisiri lɑlɔ kunɑ no ɑ̀ gɑ ilɑlɔ yom kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, sendi kɔnu kulu kɑ beerem go cii ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ deede ciiti hɑnu hine.
N sendi yom gɑɑ no, ǹ gɑ n cɛɑndi susu. N sendi yom gɑɑ mo no, ǹ gɑ n ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bɑɑ i mɑ di ɑlɑmu fɔ n dɔ.
Yesu mo tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑmɑni bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci zɑngɑ zinɑteeri yom, ǹ go kɑ ɑlɑmu ceeci. Ikpɛ bine si ɑlɑmu no ǹ sɛ kɑlɑ ɑndebi Yonɑsi ɑlɑmu.
Zɑngɑ Yonɑsi tɛ zɑɑri hinzɑ ndɑ ciini hinzɑ tɛku ciifi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ gunde, yɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ tɛ zɑɑri hinzɑ ndɑ ciini hinzɑ gɑndɑ bine kunɑ.
Ninife wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ tunu ciiti hɑnu hine ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri zɑmɑ ǹ tuubi Yonɑsi bɑɑru fɛɛyom gɑɑ. Gunɑ, Bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Yonɑsi.

Weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ dɔ hɛrɛ weibɔrɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑɑ tunu ciiti hɑnu hine ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Zɑ hɑndunyɑ mee no weibɔrɔ di kɑɑ ngɑ mɑ mɑɑ Sɑlomɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Gunɑ, Bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Sɑlomɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ hunu bɔrɔ fɔ bɑndɑ, nungu kɔgɔ yom no ɑ̀ bo dirɑ kɑ hulonzom dɔ ceeci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si du ɑ̀.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ go cii: A fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ hunu no, ɑ kɑɑ ye. Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ di ye fuu di, ɑ̀ gɑru hɛ fɔ kulu si ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑbu kɑ booriɑndi.

À bine kpei hɔllɛ iye kpɛɛnɛ zɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ngei wɔ hɑnyɑ fute bisɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne. Ǹ kɑɑ huro kɑ gɔrɔ fuu di kunɑ. Bɔrɔ ngɑ di ɑ̀ kɔkɔrɔ jɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sintine goonoyom. Yɑ no ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ zɑmɑni bɔrɔ hɑnyɑ futu yom sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi jɑmɑ di sɛ, ɑ̀ nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom go cɛ tɛrɛ ko bɑɑ ngei mɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N nyɑ ndɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom go cɛ tɛrɛ. Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ sendi n sɛ.
À tu ɑkpɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Mee yɑ ci ɑ nyɑ? Mee yom yɑ ci ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom?
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑɑ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ nyɑ ndɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ yɑ ci ɑ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ ɑ weimɑ ndɑ ɑ nyɑ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di no Yesu hunu fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei gɔrɔ buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ kɑɑ meigu ɑ̀ jɛrɛ gɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ huro hɑrihi kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ buulɑ bɔm. Jɑmɑ di mo go cɛ jɔbu mee.
À nɑ hɛ boobo sendi ǹ sɛ yɑɑse yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, dimiize seekɔ fɔ hunu kɑ dimiizei see.
Kɑ ɑ̀ go see dimiize fɔ yom kɑm fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Ciro yom kɑɑ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm tondi dɑɑru bɔm, nungu kɑ lɑɑbu boobo si. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ zei zɑmɑ gɑndɑ di sindɑ lɑɑbu no.
Sɑɑ kɑ weenu hunu kɑ dungu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɔgɑndi zɑmɑ ǹ sindɑ kɑɑji hinno.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm kɑriji nyɑ yom kunɑ. Kɑriji nyɑ yom beeri kɑ ǹ dii.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ. Ǹ go hɛi. Afɔ yom hɛi ize zɑngu. Afɔ yom hɛi ize weidu. Afɔ yom hɛi ize wɑrɑnzɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ n go sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom?
À tu coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii: Wom sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ duje beiyom no. Ngei wɔ bine ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ǹ sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ, bɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom, zɑmɑ diyom gɑɑ ǹ si di. Mɑɑyom gɑɑ mo ǹ si mɑɑ, ǹ si fɑhɑm.
Nge yom di gɑɑ bine no ǹ nɑ Esɑyi ɑndebitɛrɛ tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Mɑɑyom gɑɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ, ɑmmɑ wom si fɑhɑm. Gunɑyom gɑɑ wom kɑɑ gunɑ, ɑmmɑ wom si di.

Jɑmɑ wɔ binesɛndɔ yom no, ǹ nɑ ngei hɑngɑ linji sendɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ngei moo yom dɑɑbu. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, ǹ kɑɑ di ndɑ ngei moo yom. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ ndɑ ngei hɑngɑ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ fɑɑhɑm mo ndɑ ngei bine yom kɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ hɑli yɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
Ammɑ ǹ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm wom moo yom gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go di, ndɑ wom hɑngɑ yom gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go mɑɑ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑndebi boobo ndɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu boobo guuri ngei mɑ di hɛ kɑ wom go di, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀. Ǹ guuri ngei mɑ mɑɑ hɛ kɑ wom go mɑɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ rɑ.
Bine, wom mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm seekɔ di yɑɑse sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go mɑɑ kpetɛrɛ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ, Ilɑlɔ go kɑɑ kɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ dumɑ ɑ̀ bine kunɑ di kɔm. Ngɑ yɑ ci dimiize kɑ ǹ see fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Dimiize kɑ ǹ see tondi dɑɑru yom bɔm yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ Sendɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ kɑɑji hinno ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ. Bɑndɑ fɔ gɑnɑkɔ no zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ tɑɑbi wɑlɑ guruguze kɑɑ Sendɑ sɑbu sɛ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɑ.
Dimiize kɑ ǹ see kɑriji yom kunɑ di ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Ammɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kɑrihã ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom fɑfɑguɛ go Sendɑ nɑɑni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bɑrikɑ hɛi.
Dimiize kɑ ǹ see lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ ko fɑhɑm ndɑ Sendɑ. Cimi no ɑ̀ du bɑrikɑ kɑ hɛi. Afɔ yom hɛi ize zɑngu. Afɔ yom hɛi ize weidu. Afɔ yom mo hɛi ize wɑrɑnzɑ.
À nɑ yɑɑse fɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ go bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dimiize hinno dumɑ ngɑ fɑri kunɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ gbeiteeri yom go jiibi, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ kɑɑ kɑ bɔ dumɑ ɑ̀ dumɑi di kunɑ kɑ dirɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ dumɑi di zei kɑ beeri, bɔ di mo tunu.
Hundikpɛ di ŋmɔne tɑm yom kɑɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ̀ nɑ ci dumɑi hinno no n tɛ n fɑri di kunɑ bɑ? Mɑni no ɑ̀ hunu kɑ du bɔ dɑ?
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ no ɑ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Tɑm yom di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɑɑ i mɑ kpei kɑ ǹ dɔgu bɑ?
Hundikpɛ mo cii: Awo. Wom mɑ si ǹ dɔgu zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ bɔ yom di dɔguyom gɑɑ wom mɔsɔngu dɔgu ndei.
Wɑ nɑm ǹ kulu mɑ beeri kɑlɑ wiyom. Wiyom lɔkɑci ɑ kɑɑ cii wikɔ yom sɛ: Wɑ bɔ yom di wi sintine kɑ hɔ bɔkɔ bɔkɔ kɑ tɔnu. Ammɑ wom mɑ mɔsɔngu di meigu ɑ boo kunɑ.
À nɑ yɑɑse fɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ mogure kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ dumɑ ngɑ fɑri kunɑ.
Ngɑ yɑ cɛnɑ kɑ bisɑ dimiize mogure kulu. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri ɑ̀ bisɑ dumɑiize yom kulu. À tɛ tuurinyɑ hɑli bɛɛnɛ ciro yom go kɑɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom bɔm.
À yɛ kɑ yɑɑse fɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ buuru hɑmini kɑsɑmi kɑ weibɔrɔ zɑɑ. À go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm buuru hɑmini zɑkɑ mee hinzɑ kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tunu.
Yesu nɑ nge yom di kulu cii jɑmɑ di sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse. À mɑnɑ sendi ǹ sɛ yɑɑse si.
À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑndebi cii di mɑ tɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: A gɑ ɑ mee feeri ndɑ yɑɑse yom. A kɑɑ hɛ yom kɑɑtɛrɛ kɑ ǹ goono tugɑntɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom.
Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm kɑ huro fuu kunɑ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: N mɑ bɔ yom di yɑɑse feeri i sɛ.
À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Dimiize hinno seekɔ yɑ ci hɛɛ, Adɑmize.
Fɑri di mo yɑ ci hɑndunyɑ. Dimiize hinno di mo yɑ ci kpetɛrɛ ize yom. Ammɑ bɔ yom di yɑ ci Ilɑlɔ ize yom.
Ibɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dumɑ mo yɑ ci Ibilisi. Wiyomɑ mo yɑ ci zɑmɑni beenɑntɛ. Wikɔ yom mo yɑ ci Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑngɑ ǹ go bɔ yom di wi kɑ tɔnu, yɑ no ǹ kɑɑ tɛ zɑmɑni wɔ beenɑntɛ.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑmbɑ ǹ mɑ dɛrɛyom kulu kɑɑ ɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Ǹ mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei lɑlɔ tɛ kɑɑ mo.
Ǹ gɑ ǹ cetu nini futu kunɑ, nungu kɑ hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
Sɑɑ di bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom mo kɑɑ kɑɑri zɑngɑ weenu ngei Bɑɑbɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ hɑizici tugɑntɛ fɑri fɔ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑru. À ye kɑ ɑ̀ tugu. Ngɑ di binekɑɑne kunɑ no, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ngɑ hɛ kulu neerɑ kɑ fɑri di dei.
Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ tenkuize kɑ ɑ̀ go kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ hinno yom ceeci.
Kɑ ɑ̀ di kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɑɑdɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hɛ kulu neerɑ kɑ kɔlibɛ di dei.
Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ biriji kɑ ǹ see buulɑ kunɑ kɑ ciifi dimi dimi kulu meigu.
Sɑɑ kɑ birijɑ tɔ, sɔrɔkɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑ kɑɑ tɛrɛ. Ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ ihinno yom suubɑ kɑ dɑm kpɑɑnu bɑmbɑtɑ yom kunɑ. Wɔ kɑ yom si boori mo, ǹ nɑ ǹ furu.
Zɑngɑ yɑ no zɑmɑni wɔ beeniyom gɑɑ, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑɑ hunu kɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom zɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom kunɑ.
Ǹ gɑ ǹ cetu nini futu kunɑ, nungu kɑ hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ kulu? Ǹ tu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Oò, Kpe.
À ye kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: À sɛ no, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ coobɑɑbɑize, ɑ̀ himɑ no zɑngɑ hundikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ teji yom ndɑ hɛ zeenɔ yom kɑɑ tɛrɛ ngɑ jisiri hinno yom kunɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ yɑɑse yom di tɛ kɑ beeni ɑ̀ hunu nungu di.
À kpei ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ. À go cooɑndi ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ kɑlɑ ǹ go mɑmɑci kɑ cii: Mɑni no bɔrɔ wɔ du hɑikusutɛrɛ wɔne ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom wɔ?
Bɔrɔ kpɛ sece koo no. À nyɑ mɑɑ no Mɑriɑmɑ, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yose ndɑ Simɔ ndɑ Yudɑ bɛɛrɛ no.
À weimɑ yom kulu mo goono i gɑme kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Mɑni no hɛ yom wɔ go hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ se?
À gɑɑ no, Yesu tɛ ǹ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ. Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Andebi sindɑ bɛɛrɛ ngɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ ngɑ hundi kunɑ.
À mɑnɑ dɑbɑri gbei boobo tɛ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no Hirodu kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ gbeiteeri yom sɛ: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ no. À tunu bukɔei gɑme. À sɛ no dɑbɑri gbei yom go tɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Dom Hirodu cii ǹ mɑ Yohɑnnɑ dii kɑ hɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu mo ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Filipu wɛndɛ Hirodɑ sɑbu sɛ.
À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Yohɑnnɑ cii Hirodu sɛ: À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli n sɛ n mɑ Hirodɑ hiji.
À go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Yohɑnnɑ wi ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go hɑmburu jɑmɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go cii Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go Hirodu hɛiyom zɑɑri kpɑtɑ tɛ, Hirodɑ koo hundiyo fɔ gɑɑni ǹ kulu jine. À kɑɑni Hirodu sɛ.
A sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ kɑ ze ngɑ mɑ hundiyɑ no hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Kɑ hundiyo di nyɑ nɑ ɑ̀ fum ɑ̀ cii: A no Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm pɛrɛnti fɔ kunɑ nee wɔ.
Gɑndɑkpɛ di bine sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ zeyom di kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ŋmɑɑri dɔ, ǹ sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɔ no ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei Yohɑnnɑ bɔm kɑɑ kɑsuɑ kunɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɔm di pɛrɛnti fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no koo hundiyɑ sɛ. À kpeindɑɑ̀ ngɑ nyɑ dɔ.
Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo kɑɑ kɑ gɑɑhɑmɑ zɑɑ kɑ fiji. Ǹ kpei cii Yesu sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ bɑɑru ngɑ di, ɑ̀ tunu nungu di kɑ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ. À kpei kɑmbu gɑnji ŋmɑni fɔ kunɑ. Kɑ jɑmɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ kpei, ǹ hunu kpɑɑrɑ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmine cee gɑɑ.
Kɑ Yesu hunu, ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ. Cɔfɔ sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii ǹ sɛ. À nɑ ǹ doorikom yom no bɑɑni.
Kɑ wiciri kɑmbu bɑ tɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Nungu wɔ gɑnji no. Lɔkɑci mo mooru. Jɑmɑ wɔ tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ yom kunɑ kɑ ngei ŋmɑɑri dei kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: À nɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ. Wom bumbum, wɑ ǹ no ŋmɑɑri ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ngei mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Buuru gu ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ hinne no i sɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Wɑ kɑɑndei ɑ̀ sɛ nee wɔ.

Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di no mei ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ gɑndɑ subu gɑni fɔ kunɑ. À nɑ buuru gu di ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ di zɑɑ. À nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À nɑ buuru yom di zenji zenji kɑ ǹ no coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo fɑrisi jɑmɑ sɛ.
Ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu. Ǹ nɑ zenje yom kɑ ǹ cindi meigu cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ mefɔ.
Zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu sɑrɑ yɑ ŋmɑɑ, weibɔrɔ yom ndɑ koo cɛnɑ yom bɑ si.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di tilɑsi ǹ mɑ huro hɑrihi kɑ jinɑ ngɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ hɑli ngɑ mɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À goono tondi kuku di dɔ ngɑ fɔ kɑlɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ.
Hɑrihi di mo tɔ buulɑ bindi bindi. Cɔfɔ hɑri di boosu yom go kɑ ɑ̀ teeni zɑmɑ hɑrihiɑ goono hɛo bɑndɑ.
Ciini guuru hinzɑ no, Yesu kpei ǹ dɔ ko dirɑ hɑri di bɔm.
Kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di Yesu go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm, ǹ lɑɑkɑli tunu. Ǹ go cii: Gɑndɑ bukɔ no. Ǹ kuwɑ ndɑ hɑmburu.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ kɑni. Hɛɛ no. Wɑ si hɑmburu.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, de ni no, nɑm yɑ dirɑ hɑri wɔ bɔm kɑ kɑɑ ǹ dɔ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑɑ. Piɛɛ hunu hɑrihi di kunɑ ko dirɑ buulɑ bɔm kɑ kpei Yesu dɔ.
Ammɑ kɑ Piɛɛ di hɛo di go futu, ɑ̀ hɑmburu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti ko miri. À kuwɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ fɑɑbɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dii. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, nɑɑne cɛnɑkpɛ, ifɔ sɛ n go siikɑ?
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ huro hɑrihi di kunɑ, cɔfɔ hɛo di kɑni.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono hɑrihiɑ kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ cii; Cimi no, ni wɔ, Ikpɛ Ize no.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ ǹ kpei Gɛnɛsɑrɑtɑ lɑɑbu.
Kɑ lɑɑbu di bɔrɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ bei ǹ kpeindɑ bɑɑru kpɑɑrɑ hundɑntɛ yom kulu kunɑ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ doorikom yom kulu
Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hɑngɑ hinne hɑmɑ. Doorikom yom kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ, ǹ du bɑɑni sã sã.
Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom hunu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ cii:
Ifɔ sɛ no n coobɑɑbɑize yom go hɑikusu yom ɑlɑɑdɑ dɑɑrum? Ǹ si ngei kɑmbɛ yom nyunu kɑ du kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu mo tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom bine, ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ Ikpɛ meire dɑɑrum wom ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ sɑbu sɛ?
Ikpɛ mei kɑ cii: “N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ woo, ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi”.
Ammɑ wom go cii, de bɔrɔ cii ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ ǹ gɑɑ ndɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. À si bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ sɛ bɑ cɛnɑ.
Wom nɑ Ikpɛ meire tɛ kɔnu wom ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Wom munɑfici yom, Esɑyi nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ cɑu cɑu wom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ cii:
Mee gɑɑ no jɑmɑ wɔne go bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ ǹ bine yom si ɑ gɑɑ.
Ǹ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi no kɔnu zɑmɑ cɛbɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ mo iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom no.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ di cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ fɑhɑm.
À nɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go huro mee kunɑ yɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi, ɑmmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu mee kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bei kɑ sendi wɔ kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Tuuriize kulu kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ mɑnɑ tilɑm, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ dɔgu no.
Wɑ ǹ nɑm. Dɑnɑm yom no kɑ ǹ go dɑnɑm cendi. De dɑnɑm go dɑnɑm cendi, guusu kunɑ no ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kulu kɑm.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Yɑɑse wɔne feeri i sɛ.
Yesu cii: Wom sindɑ fɑhɑm no kpɛɛnɛ?
Wom mɑnɑ jinɑ kɑ fɑhɑm no kɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ huro mee kunɑ gunde kunɑ no ɑ̀ go kpei. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ hunu.
Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go hunu mee kunɑ, zɑ bine kunɑ no ǹ go hunu. Hɛ nge yom di yɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
Bine kunɑ no lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ yom go hunu ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ meiguyom zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ zeetɛrɛ ndɑ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom.
Nge yom di yɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi ɑmmɑ ŋmɑɑyom ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nyunu si bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
Yesu tunu kɑ kpei Tiru ndɑ Sidom lɑɑbu yom.
Cɔfɔ Kɑnɑnɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu di hunu ndɑ kuwɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: E Kpe, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ. A koo hundiyo yɑ go tɑɑbi ndɑ hɔllɛ ifutu futu.
Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bihi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kuwɑ i bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu mo tu kɑ cii: Isirɑilɑ ize yom kɑ ǹ himɑ zɑngɑ feeji yom kɑ ǹ dɛrɛ, ǹ sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Weibɔrɔ di kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ gɑɑ.
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii. À mɑnɑ hegu ǹ mɑ koo yom ŋmɑɑri zɑɑ kɑ cetu hɑnsiize yom sɛ.
Ammɑ weibɔrɔ di cii: Oò Kpe, ɑmmɑ hɑnsiize yom go kɑ ngei kpe yom ŋmɑɑri buruburu yom kɑ ǹ go kɑm tɑbulu cire ŋmɑɑ.
Yesu ye kɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii. E wei wɔ, n nɑɑne beeri. À mɑ tɛ n sɛ zɑngɑ n go bɑɑ. Zɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di no ɑ̀ koo hundiyo di du bɑɑni.
Kɑ Yesu hunu nungu di mo ɑ̀ kɑɑ Gɑlile buulɑ dɔ hɛrɛ. À kɑɑru tondi kuku bɔm kɑ gɔrɔ.
Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ sumbɑrikɔ yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom ndɑ bɛbɛ yom ndɑ mɔngɔlɔ yom ndɑ doorikom ŋmɑni fɔ yom kɑ jisi ɑ̀ jine. À nɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
Jɑmɑ di kulu mɑmɑci kɑ ǹ di bɛbɛ yom go sendi, leebɑntɛ yom du bɑɑni, sumbɑrikɔ yom go dirɑ, dɑnɑm yom go di. Ǹ nɑ Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.

Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ cii: Sisibi go kɑ ɑ dii jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ jiribi hinzɑ neyɑ kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ. A si bɑɑ mo yɑ ǹ tɑm ndɑ hɛrɛɛ ǹ mɑ mɔngɔ fɔndɔ bɔm.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni i du ŋmɑɑri gɑnji wɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ beeri wɔ kungɑndi?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Buuru mɛrɛjɛ no wom sɛ? Ǹ cii: Iye ndɑ ciifi cɛnɑ fɔ yom.
À nɑ jɑmɑ di no mei ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ gɑndɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ buuru iye di zɑɑ ndɑ ciifi yom di kɑ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji kɑ ǹ no ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
Ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu. Ǹ nɑ zenje yom kɑ ǹ cindi meigu cilɑ beeri iye tɔnɑndi.
Hɑibɔrɔ dubu tɑɑci yɑ ŋmɑɑ, weibɔrɔ yom ndɑ koo cɛnɑ yom bɑ si.
Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ huro hɑrihi kɑ kɑɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ko Yesu sui. Ǹ nɑ hã ɑ̀ mɑ ngei cɛbɛ bɛɛnɛ ɑlɑmu fɔ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Sɑɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ wom cini cii hɑri si kɑɑ zɑmɑ bɛɛnɛ ciire.
Susubɑ mo wom cini cii, hunkunɑ bɛɛnɛ hiiri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go ciire ciire kɑ kube. Munɑfici yom, wom ŋmɑɑni kɑ bɛɛnɛ tɑkɑri fɑyɑnkɑ, ɑmmɑ ifɔ sɛ wom si hini kɑ lɔkɑci yom ɑlɑmu yom deede?
Zɑmɑni bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom ko ǹ ci zɑngɑ zinɑteeri yom ǹ go ɑlɑmu fɔ ceeci. Ikpɛ bine si zɑmɑni wɔ no ɑlɑmu ŋmɑni fɔ de ɑ̀ nɑ ci ɑndebi Yonɑsi ɑlɑmu. À nɑ ǹ nɑm kɑ dirɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di dinigɑ kɑ buuru zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kpei yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ gunɑ. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom buuru kɑsɑmi.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di go ciine cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: À go cii yɑ zɑmɑ i mɑnɑ buuru zɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu bei hɛ kɑ ǹ go cii, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Nɑɑne cɛnɑkpɛ yom, ifɔ sɛ no wom go sendi wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑme zɑmɑ wom mɑnɑ buuru zɑɑ sɛ?
Wom si fɑhɑm kpɛɛnɛ no, wɑlɑ wom si hɔngɔ buuru gu di ndɑ bɔrɔ dubu gu di no kpɛɛnɛ? Cilɑ mɛrɛjɛ no wom tɔnɑndi?
Wɑlɑ buuru iye di ndɑ bɔrɔ dubu tɑɑci di, cilɑ mɛrɛjɛ no wom tɔnɑndi?
Ifɔ sɛ no wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ? À mɑnɑ ci buuru bɔm no ɑ sendi, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom buuru kɑsɑmi.
Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di fɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci buuru kɑsɑmi no ɑ̀ cii ngei mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, ǹ ŋmɔne cɛbɛ yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu kɑɑ Kɑsɑriɑ Filipu kpɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hã kɑ cii: Mee no beerem go cii hɛɛ dɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize?
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ no. Afɔ yom mo go cii Eli no. Afɔ yom mo go cii Yeremi no wɑlɑ dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no.
Yesu nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Wom bine, mee no wom go cii hɛɛ dɑ?
Cɔfɔ Simɔ Piɛɛ tu kɑ cii: Ni no Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ Ize.
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm n gɑɑ Simɔ, Yonɑsi koo. Iburɑdɑm mɑnɑ ngɑ di kɑɑtɛrɛ n sɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ n sɛ.
Hɛɛ mo, ɑ go cii n sɛ kɑ ni no Piɛɛ. Tondi wɔ bɔm no ɑ gɑ ɑ mɑrgɑ cini. Ciyomɑ dɑbɑri si hini hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
A gɑ n no bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ sɔkɔ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ feeri yom hɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ n go hɔ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɔ bɛɛnɛ mo kunɑ. Hɛ kulu mo kɑ n go feeri hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ feeri bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑbɑɑru ǹ mɑ si kpei cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.

Zɑ sɑɑ ngɑ di no, Yesu sinti ko cɛbɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ tilɑsi no ngɑ mɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm. À mɑ tɑɑbi mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ mo ɑ̀ ye kɑ tunu.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ ye ndɑ Yesu kɑmbu kɑ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm. À cii: Awo, Kpe. Ikpɛ mɑ n hɑlɑsi ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Tɑɑbi wɔ si tɔ ni pɑi.
Yesu bɛrɛ kɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Ye ɑ bɑndɑ Setɑm. N go ci ɑ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ zɑmɑ n lɑsɑbu yom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom ɑmmɑ iburɑdɑm yom ŋmɔne yom.
Sɑɑ di no, Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ: De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ hungu ngɑ bɔm sɛ. À mɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ mo kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ kɑɑ du ɑ̀.
Hɑnfɑni fɔ no bɔrɔ sɛ de ɑ̀ du hɑndunyɑ kulu ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi? Hɛ fɔ no bɔrɔ kɑɑ no kɑ hundi fɑnsɑ ndɑ?
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom. Sɑɑ di no ɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑkpɛ gbei yom goono ndɑ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cɛ nee kɑ ǹ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ, Adɑmize ɑ go kɑɑ ɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Jiribi idu bɑndɑ Yesu nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Yohɑnnɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. À kpeindei kɑmbu tondi kuku fɔ bɔm.
À tɑkɑri bɛrɛ ǹ jine. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ moodumɑ go kɑɑri zɑngɑ weenu. À jiine yom ye ikpɑrɛ zɑngɑ kɑɑri.
Cɔfɔ Moisi ndɑ Eli hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ ko sendi ndɑ Yesu.
À gɑɑ no, Piɛɛ sendi Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ̀ boori i mɑ gɔrɔ nee. De n bɑɑ i mɑ bukɑ hinzɑ tɛ, ɑfɔ n sɛ, ɑfɔ Moisi sɛ, ɑfɔ mo Eli sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono sendi wɔne gɑɑ, cɔfɔ buru kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi fɔ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ buru di kunɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ du binekɑɑne. Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di mɑɑ jinde di ǹ ye gɑndɑ ngei moodumɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ go hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Yesu mɑɑni kɑ ǹ hɑmɑ kɑ cii: Wɑ tunu. Wɑ si hɑmburu.
Ǹ nɑ bɔm sombu ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ Yesu hinne.
Kɑ ǹ go zumbu tondi kukuɑ bɔm, Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii: Wom mɑ si diyom wɔ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ hɑli hɛɛ, Adɑmize ǹ nɑ ɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go cii kɑlɑ de Eli mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no, Eli mɑ jinɑ kɑ kɑɑ kɑ ye kɑ hɛ kulu gɔrɛndi.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ kɑ Eli kɑɑ kɔ. Beerem mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ ǹ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ bɑɑ. Yɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ bɑ tɑɑbi ǹ kɑmbɛ.
À gɑɑ no, coobɑɑbɑize yom di fɑhɑm kɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ sendi no ɑ̀ go tɛ ngei sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ jɑmɑ dɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ mɑɑni kɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
A cii: Kpe, suuji cɛbɛ ɑ koo wɔ sɛ. Jirikpɑkpɑ no ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À go guruguze kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ hɑitɑ hɑitɑ ɑ̀ cini kɑm nini kunɑ ndɑ hɑri kunɑ.
Hɛɛ mo, ɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ n coobɑɑbɑize yom wɔ dɔ. Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
Yesu tu kɑ cii: E zɑmɑni wɔ beerem, zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom, siirekpɛ yom, kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ no ɑ bo goono ndɑ wom? Kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ no ɑ wom jɛrɛ? Wɑ kɑɑndɑ koo di ɑ sɛ nee.
Yesu deeni hɔllɛ di gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Zɑ sɑɑ ngɑ di, koo di du bɑɑni.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑmbu kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no i mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ?

Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom zɑm kɑ nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, de wom gundɑ nɑɑne zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ, wom kɑɑ cii tondi kuku wɔ sɛ, kpeindɑ n bɔm nee ndɑ yɔngɔ. À mɑ kpeindɑ ngɑ bɔm Hɛ fɔ si mɔngɔ wom sɛ.
Ammɑ wɔne dimi si hunu kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑduwɑ ndɑ meehɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono Gɑlile lɑɑbu, Yesu cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ bɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize dɑm beerem kɑmbɛ.
Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ tunɑndi. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ, Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ jɑngɑli tɑkɔ yom kɑɑ Piɛɛ dɔ kɑ cii: Wom coobɑɑbɑ cini jɑngɑli bɑnɑ bɑ?
À cii: Oò. Kɑ Piɛɛ huro fuu kunɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ himɑ n sɛ Simɔ? Mee no hɑndunyɑ kpe yom cini boode wɑlɑ kɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑ, ǹ ize yom gɑɑ dee wɑlɑ yo yom gɑɑ?
Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yo yom gɑɑ. Yesu mo cii ɑ̀ se: Ize yom bɑ si.
Ammɑ kɑ i mɑ si ǹ dɛrɑndi sɛ, kpei buulɑ kɑ fɑsɑ furu. Ciifi kɑ n du sintine n mɑ ɑ̀ mee fiti. N kɑɑ di nooru ɑ̀ kunɑ. À zɑɑ kɑ no ǹ sɛ, ɑ ŋmɔne ndɑ n ŋmɔne.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ no coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Mee yɑ beeri ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ?
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ koo cɛnɑ fɔ cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngei bindi kunɑ.
À cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, de wom mɑnɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ yom, wom si huro bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ wɔ, ɑkpɛ yɑ beeri ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go koo cɛnɑ fɔ zɑngɑ wɔne tɑ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ɑ tɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɛrɑndi ǹ mɑ fufuyom tondi hɔ ɑkpɛ jinde gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cetu buulɑ nungu guusu kunɑ, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
Kɑito hɑndunyɑ, dɛrɛyom sɑbu sɛ. Tilɑsi no dɛrɛyom mɑ kɑɑ, ɑmmɑ kɑito, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ dɛrɑndiyom kɑɑ.

De bine, n kɑmbɛ wɑlɑ n cee yɑ tɛ n dɛrɑndikɔ, n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu kɑ cetu ɑ̀ mɑ mooru ni. N mɑ huro hundi kunɑ ndɑ cee fɔ wɑlɑ leebɑntɛ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ kɑmbɛ hinkɑ wɑlɑ cee hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom kunɑ.
De n moo yɑ tɛ n dɛrɑndikɔ, ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑ cetu ɑ̀ mɑ mooru ni. N mɑ huro hundi kunɑ ndɑ moo fɔ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ moo hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑ si dondɑ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ. A go cii wom sɛ, bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom goono ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ gunɑyom gɑɑ moo ndɑ moo.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ no ɑ mɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ fɑɑbɑ.
Mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ himɑ wom sɛ? Zɑngɑ sendi, bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ feeji zɑngu. Cɔfɔ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɛrɛ. Akpɛ mɑ zɑngu ɑfɔ di nɑm no kɑ kpei tondi kuku yom bɔm ngɑ mɑ feeji kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ di ceeci. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Kɑ ɑ̀ du ɑ̀, cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ go fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ di kɑ bisɑ zɑngu ɑfɔ si di kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ dɛrɛ.
Yɑ no ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ binebɑɑ, koo yom wɔ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ mɑ hɑlɑci.
De n nyɑize nɑ tɑɑli tɛ n sɛ, n mɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm, ni ndɑ ɑ̀ hinne gɑme. De ɑ̀ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ, nyɑizetɛrɛ gɔrɔ noyɑ.
Ammɑ de ɑ̀ si hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ, n mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ wɑlɑ ihinkɑ zɑɑ n bɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ hinkɑ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ sendi kulu gɔrɛndi.
De bine ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ cii mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ. Bine de ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom mo sɛ, nyɑize ngɑ di mɑ tɛ n sɛ zɑngɑ dimi cindei, zɑngɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛ kulu kɑ wom go hɔ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Hɛ kulu mo kɑ wom go feeri hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ feeri bɛɛnɛ mo.
A go cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ de wom kunɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ nɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku tu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ, hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
Nungu kulu kɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ meigu ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ goono ǹ bindi kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Kpe, ce mɛrɛjɛ yɑ ɑ nyɑize yɑɑfɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ ɑ sɛ yɑ? Hɑli ce iye?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ cii n sɛ hɑli ce iye ɑmmɑ ce weiye hɑli sɔrɔ iye.
À sɛ no bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ zɑngɑ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ nooru yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ tɑm yom dɔ kɑbu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti kɑbuyom di, ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ bɑnyɑ fɔ kɑ fɔɔtɔ gu hɑli dubu weigu goono ɑ̀ dɔ.
Kɑ bɑnyɑ di sindɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ, ɑ̀ kpe di nɑ fɔndɔ no ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ. À mɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ koo yom ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑli bɑnɑndi mɑ tɛ.
Cɔfɔ bɑnyɑ di sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. À ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, hini suuru, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ kulu bɑnɑ n sɛ.
Sisibi nɑ bɑnyɑ di kpeɑ dii. À nɑ bɑnyɑ di tɑm kɑ gɑrɔ di yɑɑfɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.

Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ bɑnyɑ di hunu nungu di ɑ̀ kube ndɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi bɑnyɑ yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nooru kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ hɑndu tɑɑci bɑnɑndi goono ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ kɔɔtɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A bɑnɑ ɑ nooru kɑ ɑ̀ goono n gɑɑ.
À kpɑɑsi bɑnyɑ di sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. À ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: Suuru tɛ ɑ sɛ. A gɑ ǹ kulu bɑnɑ n sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ hungu kɑ suuru tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. À kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ dɑm kɑsu kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑrɔ di bɑnɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kpɑɑsi bɑnyɑ cindei di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ǹ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ kpei cii ngei kpeɑ sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Kpeɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ cii: Bɑnyɑ lɑlɔ, ɑ nɑ gɑrɔ wɔ kulu yɑɑfɑ n sɛ zɑmɑ n nɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ suuru sɛ.
À himɑ sisibi mɑ n dii n kpɑɑsi bɑnyɑ sɛ zɑngɑ hɛɛ wɔ, sisibi nɑ ɑ dii n sɛ.
À kpeɑ bine tɔ. À nɑ bɑnyɑ di dɑm bɔnɑndikɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ gɑrɔ di kulu bɑnɑ.
Yɑ no ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ de wom kunɑ ɑfɔ fɔ kulu si tɑɑli yom yɑɑfɑ ngɑ nyɑize sɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ meecine yom tɛ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ no ɑ̀ tunu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ kpei Yude lɑɑbu hɑli Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ.
Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Nungu di mo ɑ̀ nɑ doorikom yom no bɑɑni.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sui. Ǹ cii: À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee sɑbɑbu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ no?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ coo bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii sintine gɑɑ “Tɑkɑkɔ nɑ ǹ tɛ hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ”?
À cii: "À sɛ no hɑibɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ nɑm kɑ dɔbu ngɑ wɛndɛ gɑɑ. Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di, ǹ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku.”
Zɑngɑ yɑ no ǹ si tɛ ihinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ di sɛ no, hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ bɔrɔ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
Cɔfɔ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no Moisi no fɔndɔ no ǹ mɑ hije wiyom tirɑ no kɑ du kɑ wɛndɛ fee?
Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Wom binesɛndɑ sɑbu sɛ no Moisi tu kɑ wom mɑ wom wɛndɛ yom fee. Ammɑ zɑ sintine ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ di.
A go cii wom sɛ mo, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zinɑ sɑbu sɛ, kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji ɑkpɛ go zinɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ fee hiji, ɑkpɛ go zinɑ.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De yɑ no kunye ndɑ wɛndɛ gɑme ɑ̀ si himɑ bɔrɔ mɑ hiji.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ sendi wɔne tɑ ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ no.

Beerem goono kɑ ǹ hɑibɔrɔtɛrɛ bu. Yɑ no ǹ nɑ ǹ hɛi zɑ ǹ nyɑ yom gunde kunɑ. Beerem goono mo kɑ iburɑdɑm yom yɑ nɑ ǹ hɑibɔrɔtɛrɛ wi. Beerem goono kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ mɑntɑm yom bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ koo cɛnɑ yom zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di go kɑɑndɑkɔ yom yɑɑyɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu cii: Wɑ nɑm koo cɛnɑ yom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ. Wɑ si ǹ gɑnji zɑmɑ beerem zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ.
À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ nodi.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ hinno, hɛ hinno fɔ no yɑ tɛ kɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ n go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ihinno? Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno kɑlɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ. Ammɑ de n go bɑɑ n mɑ huro hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ, kɑlɑ n mɑ meire yom gɑnɑ.
Bɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wɔ fɔ yom? Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: “N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ.
N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ. N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm.”
Hɑiwɑsu di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A nɑ nge yom di kulu gɑnɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsuize. Ifɔ yɑ gɑziɑ ɑ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n go bɑɑ n mɑ ci tɔɑntɛ, n mɑ kpei hɛ kulu kɑ n gundɑ neerɑ, kɑ noorɑ fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. N kɑɑ du hɑizici jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. N mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ mo.
Kɑ hɑiwɑsu di mɑɑ sendi ngɑ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ dirɑ ndɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ hɑibɑrikɑ no ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
Yesu bine cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑɑbu fɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mɑ huro bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
A go cii wom sɛ mo kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑlɑ yoo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ sɑnɑ fune kunɑ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑ ngɑ di, mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii: Dee, mee yɑ hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ dɑ?
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Iburɑdɑm yom dɔ ngɑ di si hini kɑ tɛ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ dɔ hɛ kulu hini kɑ tɛ.
Piɛɛ mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, i nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ n gɑnɑ, hɛ fɔ i yom wɔ i kɑɑ du dɑ?

Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛ kulu tejɑndiyom gɑɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑrigɑ deizɑkpɛ bɔm. Sɑɑ ngɑ di, wom kɑ wom no ɑ gɑnɑ, wom kɑɑ gɔrɔ kɑrigɑ wei cindi hinkɑ bɔm kɑ ciiti lsirɑilɑ dimi wei cindi hinkɑ sɛ.

Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fuu yom nɑm wɑlɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ weimɑ yom wɑlɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ nyɑ wɑlɑ wɛndɛ wɑlɑ koo yom wɑlɑ fɑri yom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ kɑɑ du ɑ̀ cine zɑngu. À kɑɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni mo tubu.
Ammɑ sintine bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom. Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom.
Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ hundikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine kɑ gbeiteeri yom zingɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu sɛ.
Hundikpɛɑ ndɑ gbeiteeri yom di sɑbɑ gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi bɔm. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɑm ngɑ lɑmbuɑ kunɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ hunu susubɑ guuru ɛgɑ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ di bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo go cɛ hebu kunɑ kɔnu. Ǹ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ.
À cii ngei mo sɛ: Wom mo, wɑ kpei ɑ lɑmbu. A wom bɑnɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
Ǹ tunu kɑ kpei. À ye kɑ hunu zɑɑri bindi ndɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ kɑmbɛ kpɛɛnɛ. À ye kɑ du bɔrɔ fɔ yom yɑ di.
À hunu kpɛɛnɛ wiciri guuru gu kɑmbɛ. À di bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cɛ hebu kunɑ kɔnu. À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go cɛ hɑnu kulu wom si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ?
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ i zɑɑ gbei sɛ no. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mo, wɑ kpei ɑ lɑmbu. Wom du hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
Wiciri kɑmbu bɑ tɔ. Hundikpɛ di cii ngɑ nooru jisikɔ sɛ: Gbeiteeri yom di cɛɛ kɑ ǹ bɑnɑ. N mɑ sinti zɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom di gɑɑ kɑlɑ sintine bɔrɔ yom gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ zɑɑ wiciri guuru gu kɑmbɛ di kɑɑ, ɑfɔ kulu du gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi.
Kɑ sintine bɔrɔ yom di mo kɑɑ, ǹ tɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ ngei bɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ yɑ di. Ammɑ ngei mo gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi no bɔrɔ fɔ kulu du.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bɑnɑ yɑ di, cɔfɔ ǹ go gunugunu hundikpɛ di gɑɑ.
Ǹ cii: Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom wɔ guuru fɔ hinne no ǹ nɑ gbei tɛ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ i yom, i yom kɑ i nɑ hɑnu fɑrigɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dunguɛ zɑɑ.
Ammɑ hundikpɛɑ tu kɑ cii ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, ɑ si ǹ zee. I sɑbɑ gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi bɔm. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
N ŋmɔne zɑɑ kɑ kpei, ni ndɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom wɔ no. A go bɑɑ yɑ bɑnɑ sɑrɑ fɔ.
À hɑlɑli ɑ sɛ yɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ndɑ ɑ ŋmɔne. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? A gomini tɛyom gɑɑ no, n bine futu bɑ?
Yɑ no kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom. Sintine bɔrɔ yom mo kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom. Ǹ go kɑ iboobo cɛɛ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ suubɑ si bɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, ɑ̀ kpeindɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di kɑmbu.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, i go ziji Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ bine gɑ ɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑ ɑ wi.
Ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ dondɑ hɛɛ kɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ kɑnji. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ no ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
Zɑbɑdi koo yom nyɑ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ndɑ ngɑ koo yom. À sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɛ fɔ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ n go bɑɑ? Wei di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tu ɑ koo hinkɑ wɔ sɛ ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ, ɑfɔ n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑfɔ mo n kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ n kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu tu kɑ cii: Wom si bei hɛ kɑ wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ. Tɑɑbi kɑ ɑ bɑ hɑm, wom hini kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm bɑ? Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom hini kɑ du ɑ̀ bɑ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I hini.

Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no, wom gɑ ɑ tɑɑbi hɑm. Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom kɑɑ du ɑ̀. Ammɑ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ gɔrɛ di ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ, ǹ ŋmɔne no.
Kɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei di mɑɑ ngɑ di cɔfɔ ǹ bine tɔ ihinkɑ di sɛ.
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu cɛɛ kɑ cii: Wom bei kɑ dimi cindei hinikpɛ yom go kɑ ngei dɑbɑri cɛbɛ dimi cindei bɔm. Gɑɑbikoni yom mo go kɑ ngei dɑbɑri cɛbɛ ǹ bɔm.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ si ci yɑ di wom gɑme. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci ibeeri wom kunɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom gbeiize.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci jinɑ wom kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom sɛ tɑm.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ kɑɑ no yɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ hundi no beerem sɛ. A kɑɑ no yɑ ci fɑnsɑ hɛ jɑmɑ guribi.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go hunu Yeriko kpɑɑrɑ, jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Cɔfɔ dɑnɑm hinkɑ fɔ mo go gɔrɔ fɔndɑ hɑngɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑɑ ǹ cii Yesu go bisɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: E Kpe, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
Jɑmɑ di deeni ǹ gɑɑ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ dɛnjɛ. Ammɑ ǹ go kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ tɔntɔnu. Ǹ cii: E Kpe, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
Yesu cɛ kɑ ǹ cɛɛ. À cii: Ifɔ no wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ wom sɛ?
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe i go bɑɑ no i moo yom wɔ mɑ feeri.
Sisibi nɑ Yesu dii. A nɑ ǹ moo yom hɑmɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ tɛ moo. Ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ǹ tɔ Betɑfɑji kpɑɑrɑ tondi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. Yesu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ dɔntɔm.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom jine. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ wom kɑɑ di fɑrikɑ nyɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɔɑntɛ ndɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ. Wom mɑ ǹ feeri kɑ kɑɑndei ɑ sɛ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ hɛ fɔ cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ cii Kpe yɑ gundɑ ǹ murɑdu. À gɑ ǹ yeti ɑkpɛ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Ngɑ di kulu tɛ zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑndebi cii mɑ tɔ sɛ. À cii:
Wɑ cii Sionɑ koo hundiyo sɛ: Gunɑ, n Kpe go kɑɑ n dɔ. Bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ no. À goono fɑrikɑ bɔm, fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu bɔm.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kpei kpɑɑrɑ di. Ǹ tɛ zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ no fɔndɔ ǹ mo tɛ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ fɑrikɑ nyɑ di ndɑ binci hɑiwɑsu di kɑ ngei jiine yom dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm. Yesu kɑɑru fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu bɔm.
Jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo go kɑ ngei jiine yom dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm. Afɔ yom mo go tuuri kɔsu yom pɑti ko kɑ ǹ dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm.

Jɑmɑ mo goono jine ko kpei. Jɑmɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mo. Ǹ kulu go kuwɑ ko cii: “I go kɑ n sifɑ, Dɑfidi Ize. Bɑrikɑkpɛ no Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ. I go kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ hɑli sɑmɑu.”
Kɑ ɑ̀ go huro Yerusɑlɛm, wɑngɑrɑ di kulu lɑɑkɑli tunu kɑ cii: Mee no bɔrɔ kpɛ?
Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go cii: Yesu wɔ ɑndebi no, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Yesu huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ neerɑkɔ yom ndɑ deikɔ yom gɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ nooru bɑrimekɔ yom tɑbulu yom ndɑ gutu neerɑkɔ yom citɑ yom hɑngɑsɑndi.
A cii ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii: “Ǹ gɑ ɑ gɔrɛ dɔ cɛɛ no ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ”. Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ lɔkɔ zee yom ŋmɔne.
Dɑnɑm yom ndɑ sumbɑrikɔ yom kɑɑ Yesu dɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom di mɑmɑci yom kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ǹ mɑɑ koo yom mo kɑ ǹ go jinde zɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ko cii: I go kɑ n sifɑ Dɑfidi Ize. À gɑɑ no, ǹ bine tɔ.
Ǹ cii Yesu sɛ: N go mɑɑ hɛ kɑ koo yom wɔ go cii bɑ? Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Oò, ɑ go mɑɑ. Wom nɑ wɔne coo bɑ? "Koo cɛnɑ yom ndɑ nɑnɑndi yom mee gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ sifɑyom gɔrɛndi.”
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ nɑm kɑ hunu wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. À kpei Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ kɑ kɑni nodi.
Susubɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ye wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di jee nyɑ fɔ fɔndɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. À kpei ɑ̀ dɔ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɔsu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ize bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si tɛ n gɑɑ pɑi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ jee nyɑ di kɔgu.
Mɑmɑci nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom dii. Ǹ cii: Mɛtɛ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ jee nyɑ di kɔgu dɑ?

Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, de wom gundɑ nɑɑne, wom si siikɑ mo, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ jee nyɑ wɔ sɛ hinne no wom kɑɑ tɛ. Ammɑ bɑ wom bumbum, de wom cii tondi kuku wɔ sɛ, gɑnɑ kɑ kɑm buulɑ wɔ kunɑ, dom ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ.
