Hɛ kulu mo kɑ wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑduwɑ kunɑ, de wom go nɑɑne, wom kɑɑ du ɑ̀.
Yesu huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã: Hini fɔ no n go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ? Mee yɑ nɑ n no hini wɔ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mo, ɑ wom hã hɛ fɔ. De wom nɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ mo yɑ cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ.
Mirɑndiyomɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ, mɑni no ɑ̀ hunu, Ikpɛ dɔ no dee wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no? Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi cɛrɛ gɑme kɑ cii: De i cii Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii i sɛ yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ sɛ no wom mɑnɑ ɑ nɑɑne?
Ammɑ de i cii iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu jɑmɑ wɔ no i go hɑmburu zɑmɑ ǹ kulu tɑbɑi Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no.
Ǹ tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: I si bei. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ no hɛɛ mo, ɑ si cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ go hɛ yom di tɛ ndɑ.
Ammɑ mɛtɛ no wɔne himɑ wom sɛ? Bɔrɔ fɔ yɑ gundɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ. À kɑɑ sintinɑ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo, hunkunɑ n mɑ kpei gbei tɛ ɑ lɑmbu kunɑ.
Koo di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A si kpei. Ammɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tuubi, ɑ̀ kpei.
Bɑɑbɑ kɑɑ ihinkɑntɛ di mo dɔ. À cii ngɑ mo sɛ yɑ di. Koo di mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii. A kpei, bɑɑbɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kpei.
Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kunɑ, mee yɑ nɑ bɑɑbɑ di binebɑɑ tɛ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sintine bɔrɔ di. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ weikuru yom go wom jinɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ no wom dɔ cɛyom susu fɔndɔ kunɑ. Wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cimɑndi. Ammɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ weikuru yom nɑ ɑ̀ cimɑndi. Wom mo, kɑ wom di ngɑ di, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu wom mɑnɑ tuubi kɑ ɑ̀ cimɑndi.

Wɑ mɑɑ yɑɑse wɔne mo kpɛɛnɛ. Hundikpɛ fɔ yɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ lɛzɛ̃ tuuri yom tilɑm. À nɑ ǹ kɑkɑ. À nɑ guusu fɔ fɑnsi lɛzɛ̃ hɑri kɑnkɑmyom sɛ. À no tɑndɑ fɔ mo tɛ. À nɑ lɑmbuɑ dɑm hɑifɑri yom kɑmbɛ kɑ nɑɑru. À kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni.
Sɑɑ kɑ tuuriize kɔsuyom wɑtɛ tɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom dɔntɔm hɑifɑri di yom dɔ ǹ mɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ize yom zɑɑ.
Hɑifɑri yom di nɑ ɑ̀ bɑnyɑ yom di dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mo cetu cetu ndɑ tondi yom.
Hundikpɛɑ ye kɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ yom mo dɔntɔm kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑ bisɑ sintine ŋmɔne yom di. Hɑifɑri yom di tɛ ngei mo sɛ yɑ di.
Ammɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ koo dɔntɔm ǹ dɔ kɑ cii: Ǹ kɑɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ koo sɛ.
Ammɑ kɑ hɑifɑri yom di koo di, ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci tubukɔɑ. Wɑ kɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Tubuɑ mɑ ci i ŋmɔne.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ cetu lɑmbuɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
To. Sɑɑ kɑ hundikpɛɑ kɑɑ, ifɔ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ hɑifɑri yom di sɛ?

Beerem cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À mɑ wiyom futu tɛ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom wɔ sɛ kɑ hɑifɑri teji yom zɑɑ ngɑ lɑmbuɑ sɛ. Beerem wɔ gɑ ɑ̀ tuuriize yom kɔsu kɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nini. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom cii:
“Tondi kɑ fuu cinikɔ yom hungu, ngɑ yɑ ci mimbɑri cire tondi sintine. Zɑ Kpe dɔ no wɔne hunu. A tɛ mɑmɑci mo i moo yom sɛ.” Wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
À sɛ no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ wɔ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑndi wom gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no dimi fɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm tondi wɔ bɔm, ɑkpɛ tutubu no. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm tondɑ kɑm mo, tondɑ gɑ ɑkpɛ fufu no.
Sɑɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ yɑɑse yom di, ǹ go bei ngei gɑɑ no ɑ̀ go sendi.
Ǹ go ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑmmɑ ǹ go hɑmburu jɑmɑ zɑmɑ beerem go tɑbɑi Yesu yɑ ɑndebi no.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom kpɛɛnɛ.
À cii: Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ mo zɑngɑ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hije tɛ ngɑ koo sɛ.
À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei beerem cɛɛ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ hije di dɔ ɑmmɑ beerem hungu kɑ kɑɑ.
À nɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ yom mo dɔntɔm kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ cii beerem kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ di sɛ: Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑri tɛ. A nɑ hɑuyeji yom ndɑ memunu nɑɑsɔ yom wi. À nɑ hɛ kulu sɔlu kɔ. Wɑ kɑɑ hijɑ dɔ.
Ammɑ ngei wɔ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɛ fɔ. Ǹ nɑ ngei kpeiyom tɛ. Afɔ kpei ngɑ fɑri. Afɔ mo kpei ngɑ tenku.
Afɔ yom mo nɑ bɑnyɑ yom dii kɑ ǹ woo. Ǹ nɑ ǹ wi.
Kɑ gɑndɑkpɛ di mɑɑ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bine tɔ hɑli ɑ̀ futu. À nɑ ngɑ wɑngɑri yom dɔntɔm Ǹ yom di wi kɑ ǹ wɑngɑrɑ di kulu tɔnu.
Bine ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom sɛ: Hijɑ sɔlu kube ɑmmɑ beerem kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ, ǹ mɑnɑ tɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ kpei dɛbɛ yom bɔm, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ wom di wom mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ hijɑ dɔ.
Bɑnyɑ yom di hunu kɑ kpei dɛbɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ nɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ di cɛɛ kɑ meigu zɑ ilɑlɔ yom hɑli ihinno yom. Hije fuuɑ tɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ.
Gɑndɑkpɛɑ huro kɑ gunɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ. À di bɔrɔ fɔ nungu di kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hije kpɛ dɑm.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ huro nee, n sindɑ hije kpɛ? Ammɑ bɔrɔ di mɑnɑ mee feeri kɑ sendi.
Gɑndɑkpɛ di cii gbeiize yom di sɛ: Wɑ ɑ̀ hɔ cee ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ zɑɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ kube kunɑ. Nungu di no hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
Ǹ go kɑ iboobo cɛɛ ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ suubɑ si bɑ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kpei sɑwɑrɑ kɑ ngei mɑ Yesu hiri ɑ̀ sendi yom gɑɑ.

Ǹ nɑ ngei coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Hirodu bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bei kɑ ni yɑ ci cimikpɛ. N go beerem cooɑndi Ikpɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ cimi. N sindɑ bɑɑbɑɑ. N si iburɑdɑm yom tɑkɑri gunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, cii i sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ n sɛ. À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ bɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli?
Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei hɑnyɑ fute kɑ ǹ gundɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no wom go kɑ ɑ bubure, munɑfici yom?
Wɑ ɑ cɛbɛ ɑlikɑsi wɔkɔkɔize fɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Mee bɔm no ǹ tɛ nooru wɔ gɑɑ ndɑ jeeri wɔ?
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑisɑ ŋmɔne no. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Kɑisɑ hɛ yom no Kɑisɑ sɛ. Wɑ Ikpɛ hɛ yom mo no Ikpɛ sɛ.
Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑ di, cɔfɔ mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ nɑ Yesu nɑm kɑ dirɑ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di no, Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cii bukɔ tunondiyom si, ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii:
Coobɑɑbɑ, Moisi cii de bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du hɛiyom bu, ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ mɑ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ hiji kɑ hɛi ndɑ, bukɔɑ sɛ.
Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ iye goono i kunɑ. Sintinɑ hiji. À bu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛi. À nɑ ngɑ wɛndɑ nɑm ngɑ cɛɛnɛ sɛ.
Ihinkɑntɛ di ndɑ ihinzɑntɛ mo tɛ yɑ di kɑlɑ iyɑntɛ gɑɑ.
Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ, weibɔrɔ di mo bu.
Tunɑndiyom hine, bɔrɔ iye di kunɑ, mee wɛndɛ no zɑmɑ ǹ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ wɛndɛ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom go dɛrɛ fɑ kɑ wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri.
Bukɔei tunɑndiyom hine, ǹ si hiji, ǹ si hijɑndi. Ammɑ beerem bo goono zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom, Ikpɛ cii:
“Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ”. Wom no ngɑ di coo bɑ? Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ci bukɔei ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ɑmmɑ bɑhunɑ yom ŋmɔne no.
Kɑ jɑmɑ di mɑɑ ngɑ di, mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ yom di.
Ammɑ kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo mɑɑ Yesu nɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mee hɔ, ǹ meigu dɔ fɔ.
Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ bubure.
À cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, wɔ fɔ yɑ ci meire bɑmbɑtɑ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "N mɑ bɑɑ Kpe n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ n bine kulu ndɑ n hundi kulu ndɑ n lɑsɑbu kulu”.
Ngɑ di yɑ meire beeri. Ngɑ di mo yɑ ci meire sintine.
Ihinkɑntɛ mo himɑ meire di kɑ ɑ̀ cii: “N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm”.
Meire hinkɑ wɔ bɔm nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ kulu ndɑ ɑndebi yom sendi yom kulu go kɔtɔ.
Ammɑ zɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go meigu, Yesu nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii:
Ifɔ no Mɛsiyɑ himɑ wom sɛ? Mee ize no? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Dɑfidi ize no.
Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Mɛtɛ no Dɑfidi nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ cii:
Kpe cii ɑ Kpeɑ sɛ, n mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee yom dɛcɛyom dɔ.
De Dɑfidi go kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ci ɑ̀ Ize?
Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ hini kɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bɑ sendi kpɛsɛ fɔ. Zɑ hɑnu ngɑ di mo no bɔrɔ kulu hɑmburu ndɑ ɑ̀ hãyom.
Yesu sendi jɑmɑ di sɛ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii:
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go gɔrɔ Moisi nungu kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ, wɑ ǹ jɛ kɑ ǹ tɛ. Ammɑ wɑ si tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ tɛgbei yom goono ndɑ, zɑmɑ ngei wɔ go cii no ɑmmɑ ǹ si tɛ.
Ǹ go jɛrɔ timɔ hɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑyom gɑɑbu kɑ dɛcɛ beerem jɛsɛ bɔm. Ammɑ ǹ si bɑ kɑ ngei kɑmbeize fɔ dɑm kɑ jɛrɔɑ zinji.
Ǹ go kɑ ngei gbei yom kulu tɔ no beerem mɑ di sɛ. Ǹ go tirɑize beeri yom kɑ ɑyɑ yom goono ǹ kunɑ dɑm. Ǹ go kɑ ngei kpɛ hɑngɑ tɑɑlɑm hɛɑndi kɑ tɔntɔnu.
Jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ no ǹ go bɑɑ jingɑru ŋmɑɑyom dɔ. Ǹ go bɑɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ.
Ǹ go bɑɑ mo no beerem mɑ cini kɑ ngei fɔɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ go bɑɑ mo beerem mɑ ngei cɛɛ Coobɑɑbɑ, Coobɑɑbɑ.
Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom mɑ si tu ǹ mɑ wom cɛɛ cɛbɛkɔ zɑmɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci wom Cɛbɛkɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Wom wɔ, wom kulu nyɑize yom no.
Wom mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu cɛɛ bɑɑbɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci wom Bɑɑbɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ.
Wom mɑ si tu mo ǹ mɑ cii wom sɛ cɛbɛkɔ yom zɑmɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci wom cɛbɛkɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
Ammɑ wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ wom kulu, ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ ci wom gbeiize.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Ammɑ kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ dɑɑbu beerem sɛ. Wom si huro wom bumbum, wom si nɑm beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ huro mo sɛ ǹ mɑ huro.

Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go sokoni yom hɑibɑrikɑ yom ŋmɑɑ. Wom go kɑ ɑduwɑ kuku tɛ wom mɑ himɑ zɑngɑ gɑnɑkɔ hinno yom. Ngɑ di sɛ no, ǹ kɑɑ wom ciiti kɑ jɑɑsɑ ǹ kulu.

Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, wom munɑfici yom. Wom go tɛku ndɑ gɑndɑ yɑɑli kɑ du bɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku kɑ bɛrɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑkpɛ bɛ, wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi ŋmɔne ize ce hinkɑ kɑ bisɑ wom.
Kɑito wom, dɑnɑm yom kɑ ǹ go dɑnɑm yom cendi. Wom go cii bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ di wurɑ, ɑ̀ ze di gɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Sɑmu yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom no wom bɑrɑ. Ǹ kunɑ wɔ fɔ yɑ beeri ndɑ ɑfɔ, wurɑ no de wɑlɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go wurɑ di hɑlɑɑlɑndi no?
Wom go cii bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ gɑrɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ ze di gɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Sɑmu yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom no wom bɑrɑ. Ǹ kunɑ wɔ fɔ yɑ beeri ndɑ ɑfɔ, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi no dee wɑlɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑrɑndi hɛ hɑlɑɑlɑndi?
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ ze ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɔm mo.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑkpɛ ze ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ mo.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ bɛɛnɛ mo ɑ̀ go ze ndɑ Ikpɛ kɑrigɑ noyɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm.

Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go gɑbu ndɑ mɑɑri ndɑ yɑzi yom zɑkɑ. Ammɑ wom go fɔndɑ ŋmɔne hɛ beeri yom nɑm zɑngɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ suuji ndɑ nɑɑne. Nge yom yɑ himɑ wom mɑ tɛ dom, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ si zɑkɑ di mo nɑm.
Wom dɑnɑm yom kɑ wom go dɑnɑm yom cendi, wom go filifiliwɑ sɔgu kɑ yoo gonu.
Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go gulɑize ndɑ combu bɑndɑ nyunu ɑmmɑ ǹ kunɑ go tɔ ndɑ zeetɛrɛ ndɑ bɔm hiniyom zɑme.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ, dɑnɑm kɑ n go ci, n mɑ gulɑize di ndɑ combu di kunɑ nyunu jinɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mo mɑ hinne.
Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom himɑ no zɑngɑ sɑɑrɛ yom kɑ ǹ kpɑrɑndi. Ǹ go boori moo gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kunɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ bukɔ biri yom ndɑ ziibi dimi kulu.
Yɑ no wom mo, moo gɑɑ wom go himɑ beerem sɛ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ cɛsusu ɑmmɑ kunɑ kunɑ wom tɔ ndɑ munɑficitɛrɛ ndɑ bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ.
Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go ɑndebi yom sɑɑrɛ yom cini. Wom go bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom sɑɑrɛ yom tɑɑlɑm.
Wom go cii: De i goono i cɛɛ yom wɑtɛ dom, i si meigu ndei kɑ ɑndebi yom wi.
Zɑngɑ yɑ wom go sɛdɑ wom bɔm noyɑ kɑ wom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑndebi yom wi ize yom.
Wom go wom cɛɛ yom bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi.
Gondi yom, gɑzɑmɑ ize yom no wom bɑrɑ. Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ kɔmɑ nini ciiti kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi?

À sɛ no, gunɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go ɑndebi yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ cɛbɛkɔ yom dɔntɔm wom dɔ. Wom bine gɑ ɑfɔ yom wi kɑ ǹ kɑnji. Afɔ yom mo wom gɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ wom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Wom gɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ.

À sɛ no, bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu kuri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ munu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑndi mɑ kɑm wom bɔm. Kuri wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ munu hunu zɑ Abɛli kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu gɑɑ kɑlɑ Zɑkɑri Bɑlɑsi koo kɑ wom wi Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ gɑme.
Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑɑ kɑm zɑmɑni wɔ bɔm.

E Yerusɑlɛm, Yerusɑlɛm, ni kɑ n go ɑndebi yom wi kɑ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm n dɔ cetu ndɑ tondi. Ce mɛrɛjɛ no ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ n koo yom meigu zɑngɑ gɔrɔngɔnyɑ cini kɑ ngɑ ize yom meigu ngɑ fɑtɑ yom cire. Ammɑ wom mɑnɑ tu.
Gunɑ, ǹ nɑ wom fuu nɑm kɔnu.
A go cii wom sɛ, wom si di hɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ zɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑlɑ wom mɑ cii: Binekɑɑnekpɛ no wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Yesu bine hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ cinɑri yom.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom go di hɛ yom wɔ kulu bɑ? Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɑ tondi fɔ si cindi tondi bɔm kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ see.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go gɔrɔ Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ bɔm, coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑmbu. Ǹ cii: Cii i sɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ yom di kɑɑ tɛ. Alɑmu fɔ mo yɑ tɛ n kɑɑyom gɑɑ ndɑ zɑmɑni beeniyom gɑɑ?
Cɔfɔ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi.
Bɔrɔ boobo go kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Ǹ bine kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɛrɑndi.
Wom kɑɑ mɑɑ wɑngu yom bɑɑru ndɑ wɑngu yom kɔsɔngu. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. Tilɑsi no nge yom di mɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ beeniyom mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
Dimi kɑɑ tunu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ dimi. Kpetɛrɛ yom kɑɑ tunu kpetɛrɛ gɑɑ. Hɛrɛɛ ndɑ bɑlɑu kɑɑ tɛ. Gɑndɑ zinji yom kɑɑ tɛ nungu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni.
Hɛ nge yom di kulu bɔnei sintiyom no.
À bɑndɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ kɑ wom bɔnɑndi. Ǹ kɑɑ wom wi. Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu mo kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ dɛrɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ cɛrɛ dɑm kɑmbɛ kɑ hungu ngei cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ.
Andebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri boobo kɑɑ tunu kɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɛrɑndi.
Bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ kɑɑ tɛ kɑ bɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo bɑɑkɑsine kɑɑ ye ndɑ bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hini suuru kɑlɑ mee, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ kɑɑ tɑɑbi yom di kɑmbɛ.
Ǹ kɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ bɔm hɑndunyɑ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ dimi cindei kulu sɛ. Cɔfɔ beenɑntɛ mɑ kɑɑ.
Andebi Dɑniɛlo sendi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ fɛntɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑlɑkɑ tɛ. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ go cɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go coo, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑhɑm fɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei tondi kuku yom bɔm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu yɔlɔ bɔm, ɑ̀ mɑ si zumbu kɑ huro ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ hɛ fɔ zɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɑri mo mɑ si ye bɑndɑ kɑ ngɑ kpɛ zɑɑ.
Ammɑ kɑito weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ kunu ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ go nɑnɑndi hɑnu nge yom di.
Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom zuure mɑ si tɛ hɑrigu wɑtɛ wɑlɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine.
Guruguze bɑmbɑtɑ kɑɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom hɑli kɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ dimi si tɛ kpɛɛnɛ pɑi.
De bine ǹ si hɑnu nge yom di dunguriɑndi ǹ si bɑhunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ kɑɑ tɑɑbi yom di kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ suubɑntɛ yom sɑbu sɛ ǹ kɑɑ hɑnu nge yom di dunguriɑndi.
Bine, bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ go cii wom sɛ: Gunɑ, Mɛsiyɑ go nee wɑlɑ gunɑ ɑ̀ go yɔngɔ wɑ si ɑ̀ no cimi.
Mɛsiyɑ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ tunu. Ǹ gɑ ɑlɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom cɛbɛ hɑli de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ bɑ suubɑntɛ yom dɛrɑndi.
Gunɑ, ɑ jinɑ kɑ cii wom sɛ kɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de ǹ go cii wom sɛ: Gunɑ, ɑ̀ goono gɑnji kunɑ, wɑ si hunu. Wɑlɑ ǹ go cii: Gunɑ, ɑ̀ goono fuu yom kpɛsɛndi yom kunɑ, wɑ si ɑ̀ no cimi.
Zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ cini tɛ nyɑlɑu zɑ weenuhune kɑ kpei weenukɑne, yɑ no hɛɛ, Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑyom.
Nungu kɑ jifɑ goono, nungu di no yobereku yom cini meigu.
Hɑnu nge yom di tɑɑbi futuɑ bɑndɑ, “mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ weenu kɑɑ ye kube. Hɑndu si ngɑ kɑɑri no. Hɑndɑriyɑize yom kɑɑ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri yom kɑɑ zinji.”
A gɑɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ ŋmɔne ɑlɑmu kɑɑ hunu bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kulu mo kɑɑ wuuru. Ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ, Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ deizɑ bɑmbɑtɑ.
Sɑɑ di gɑɑ yɑ ɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑmbɑ ndɑ kuluu funsuyom beeri. Ǹ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne suubɑntɛ yom meigu zɑ hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci kulu gɑɑ kɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ, zɑ ɑ̀ mee nee hɛrɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mee yɑ hɛrɛ.
Ammɑ wom mɑ dendeni yɑɑse kɑ jee nyɑ di go wom no. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ cɛnɑ yom bɑɑni ɑ̀ go kɔsu teji fiyo, wom go bei kɛdiɑ go mɑɑni.
Yɑ no wom mo, sɑɑ kɑ wom go di hɛ nge yom di kulu, wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go mɑɑni mee gɑɑ noyɑ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑmɑni wɔne si beeni pɑi kɑlɑ de hɛ nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ.
Bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ kɑɑ beeni ɑmmɑ ɑ sendi yom si beeni pɑi.
Ammɑ hɑnu ngɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si ɑ̀ bei, bɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom. A Bɑɑbɑ ngɑ fɔlɔnku go kɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Ammɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Nowe hɑnu yom gɑɑ di, yɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑyom.
Zɑngɑ zɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri mɑnɑ kɑɑ beerem go ŋmɑɑ, ǹ go hɑm, ǹ go hiji, ǹ go hijɑndi kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ Nowe huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ.
Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu dɑm sɑɑlu kɑlɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri di nɑ ǹ jirisi kɑ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ no, hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑyom.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ goono fɑri. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
Weibɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ fufu tondi gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mo bɑtu zɑmɑ wom si bei lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom Kpe go kɑɑ.
Ammɑ wom mɑ wɔne bei kɑ de hundikpɛ bei sɑɑ kɑ zee go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu. À si nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ fuu funu.
À sɛ no, wom mo wɑ sɔlu zɑmɑ lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom si tɑmmɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ.
Mee yɑ ci tɑm nɑɑnekpɛ, lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kpe nɑ ɑ̀ jisi kɑ ngɑ fuu tɑm yom kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ no ǹ ŋmɑɑri lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ?
Binekɑɑnekpɛ no, tɑm ngɑ di kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kpe go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑru ɑ̀ mo tɛ yɑ di.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ.
Ammɑ de tɑm lɑlɔ wɔ go cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: A kpe wɔ si kɑɑ tɑmbɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mo kɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi tɑm yom kɑru. À mo ŋmɑɑ ko hɑm ndɑ bɑjiwi yom.
Tɑm ngɑ di, ɑ̀ kpeɑ go kɑɑ no hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑtu, lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ si bei.
Kpeɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dumbu ihinkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dɑm munɑfici yom bɑndɑ. Nungu di no hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
Bine ǹ go bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi zɑngɑ hundiyo wei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑru bei. Ǹ nɑ ngei fitilɑ yom zɑɑ. Ǹ hunu kɑ kpei hɑruhiji kubeyom.
Ǹ kunɑ gundɑ igu lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ ndɑ igu sɑmɔ.
Sɑmɔ yom di nɑ ngei fitilɑ yom zɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ jii zɑɑ.
Ammɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom di nɑ ngei jii yom zɑɑ gɑɑsu yom kunɑ ndɑ ngei fitilɑ yom.
Kɑ hɑruhiji jɛ, cɔfɔ ǹ kulu dusungu kɑ jiibi.
Ciini bindi cɔfɔ cilili tɛ: Gunɑ, hɑruhijɑ go kɑɑ. Wɑ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ kube.
Ǹ kulu tunu kɑ ngei fitilɑ yom hinsɑ kɑ zɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ sɑmu yom di cii lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom di sɛ: Wɑ i no wom jii yom di gɑɑ zɑmɑ i fitilɑ yom go bu.
Ammɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom di cii ǹ sɛ: Awo. À mɑnɑ wɑsɑ i yom mo hɑli ndɑ wom sɛ. Wɑ kpei neerɑkɔ yom dɔ kɑ dei wom bɔm sɛ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kpei deiyom, cɔfɔ hɑruhijɑ kɑɑ. Wɔ kɑ yom sɔlu kɔ, ǹ huro hijɑ dɔ ndɑ hɑruhijɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ gɑmbuɑ mee dɑɑbu.
À bɑndɑ no cindei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑru bei mo kɑɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, kpe feeri i sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si wom bei.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ bɑtu zɑmɑ wom si hɑnu bei. Wom si lɔkɑci bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ.
Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑru kɑ kpei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ mooru. À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom cɛɛ kɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
À nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu no ɑfɔ sɛ. À nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ no ɑfɔ mo sɛ. À nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ no ihinzɑntɛ sɛ. À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hini. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑɑru kɑ kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu no di, ɑ̀ kpei tenku ndɑ. À du ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Yɑ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ no di mo, ɑ̀ du ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ no di wɔ, gɑndɑ no ɑ̀ fɑnsi kɑ ngɑ kpeɑ nooru dɑm kɑ tugu.
Hɑli kɑ jɛ tɑm yom di kpe kɑɑ nooru kɑbuyom ǹ dɔ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu no di kɑɑ. À kɑɑndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ cii: Kpe, n nooru neyɑ kɑ n no ɑ sɛ. Gunɑ, n noorɑ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu hɛi kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
À kpeɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À boori bɑnyɑ hinno, nɑɑnekpɛ. N tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ iboobo dɑm n kɑmbɛ. Huro n kpe fɑihã kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ no di mo kɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n noorɑ neyɑ kɑ n no ɑ sɛ. Gunɑ, n noorɑ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ hɛi kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
A kpeɑ cii ngɑ mo sɛ: À boori, bɑnyɑ hinno nɑɑnekpɛ. N tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ gɑɑ. A gɑ iboobo dom n kɑmbɛ. Huro n kpe fɑihã kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ no di mo kɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ nɑ n bei kɑ ni bɔrɔ gɑɑbɔ no. N wi no nungu kɑ n mɑnɑ dumɑ kɑ meigu nungu kɑ n mɑnɑ see.
Kɑ ɑ hɑmburu, gɑndɑ kunɑ no ɑ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ di dɑm kɑ tugu. Gunɑ, n ŋmɔne neyɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpe di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑnyɑ lɑlɔ, yofuno. N bei kɑ ɑ cini wi no nungu kɑ yɑ nɑ dumɑ kɑ meigu, nungu kɑ yɑ nɑ see.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ̀ himɑ n mɑ ɑ nooru jisi nungu ko ɑ̀ mɑ tɔntɔnu. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ yɑ du hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ndɑ ɑ liibɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ di tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ iwei di sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo bɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Wɑ bɑnyɑ kɔnu wɔ cetu tɛrɛ kube kunɑ, nungu kɑ hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
Sɑɑ kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ ɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ yom kulu ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑrigɑ deizɑkpɛ bɔm.
Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kɑɑ meigu ɑ jine. A gɑ ǹ fee cɛrɛ zɑngɑ kurukɔ cini kɑ ngɑ feeji yom fee ndɑ hɑncine yom.
A kɑɑ feeji yom jisi ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ hɑncine yom jisi ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
Hɛɛ Kpe, ɑ kɑɑ cii beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ wom kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm wom gɑɑ. Wom mɑ kpetɛrɑ tubu kɑ ǹ sɔlu wom sɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom.
A mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, wom nɑ ɑ no ŋmɑɑri. A mɑɑ jo, wom nɑ ɑ no hɑri. A ci yo, wom nɑ ɑ kunfɑ.
A gɔrɔ bumbum, wom nɑ jiine dɑm ɑ gɑɑ. A gɔrɔ kɑ zɛnjɛ, wom nɑ ɑ kunfɑ. A gɔrɔ kɑsu kunɑ, wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ.
Sɑɑ di bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu kɑɑ tu kɑ cii: Kpe, sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, i nɑ n no ŋmɑɑri wɑlɑ n go mɑɑ jo, i nɑ n no hɑri?
Sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni yo kɑ n kunfɑ wɑlɑ bumbum kɑ jiine dɑm n gɑɑ?
Sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n go zɛnjɛ wɑlɑ n goono kɑsu kunɑ i kpei n dɔ?
Hɛɛ mo Kpe, yɑ kɑɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ nyɑizei ŋmɔne icɛnɑ fɔ sɛ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ noyɑ.
Bine, ɑ kɑɑ cii wɔ kɑ yom goono ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ sɛ: Wɑ gɑnɑ ɑ sɛ wom lɑɑliɑntɛ yom. Wɑ kpei huro nini kɑ ɑ̀ si bu pɑi kɑ ǹ sɔlu Ibilisi ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔneize yom sɛ.
A mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ no ŋmɑɑri. A mɑɑ jo, wom mɑnɑ ɑ no hɑri.
A ci yo, wom mɑnɑ ɑ kunfɑ. A gɔrɔ bumbum, wom mɑnɑ jiine dɑm ɑ gɑɑ. A go zɛnjɛ kɑ gɔrɔ kɑsu kunɑ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ kunfɑ.
Ngei mo bine kɑɑ tu ɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ wɑlɑ n go mɑɑ jo? Sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n ci yo wɑlɑ n goono bumbum wɑlɑ n go zɛnjɛ wɑlɑ n goono kɑsu kunɑ, i mɑnɑ n kunfɑ?
A kɑɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑ kɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ icɛnɑ yom wɔ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ sɛ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ noyɑ.
Ngei wɔ kɑɑ kpei ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom wɔ mo kɑɑ huro hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ meecine nge yom di tɛ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ:
Wom bei kɑ jiribi hinkɑ gɑme Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru no. Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ kɑnji.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom meigu gɑrɑndikɔ beeri kɑtɑ kunɑ. À mɑɑ no Kɑifɑ.
Ǹ go sɑwɑrɑ ngei mɑ Yesu dii ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ kɑ wi.
Ammɑ ǹ ci: À mɑ si tɛ jingɑruɑ hine zɑmɑ butugu mɑ si tɛ jɑmɑ di gɑme sɛ.
Yesu goono Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ Simɔ jire fɔ fuu kunɑ.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑlibɑti. À mefɔ ndɑ wɑidi dimi fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɑɑdɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ munu Yesu bɔm sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ ǹ bine tɔ. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɑidi wɔ sɑrɑyom mɑɑsɑ?
À himɑ no dom, ǹ mɑ wɑidi wɔ neerɑ cɑɑdɑ kɑ nooru di fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei sendi kɑ ǹ go tɛ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no wom go wei wɔ tɑɑbɑndi? Gbei hinno no ɑ̀ go tɛ ɑ sɛ.
Tɑlikɑ yom bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu ɑmmɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu.
Ammɑ wei wɔ, ɑ̀ wɑidi wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ munu ɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no ɑ gɑɑhɑm fijiyom sɛ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, nungu kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ fɛɛ hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ mo tɛ deede kɑ hɔngɔɑ̀.
Coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu, ɑ̀ kpei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ no wom gɑ ɑ no yɑ Yesu dɑm wom kɑmbɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ nooru ɑnzɛrɛfu wɔkɔkɔ wɑrɑnzɑ no ɑ̀ sɛ.
Zɑ sɑɑ di no ɑ̀ go ceeci zɑngɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu sintinɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑ sendi Yesu sɛ. Ǹ cii: Mɑni no n go bɑɑ i mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru wɔ sɔlu n mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei wɑngɑrɑ ŋmɑne dɔ. Wom mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑ cii ngɑ lɔkɑci mɑɑni. À kɑɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru tɛ n kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di tɛ zɑngɑ Yesu cii ǹ mɑ tɛ. Ǹ nɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ kulu sinti kɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Kpe, hɛɛ no? Kpe, hɛɛ no?
À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm combu ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ yɑ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kpei ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize dɑm kɑmbɛ. À boori dom ǹ mɑ si ɑkpɛ hɛi pɑi.
Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ mo tu kɑ cii: À nɑ ci hɛɛ no Coobɑɑbɑ? Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n nɑ ɑ̀ cii.
Kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ Yesu nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. A nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ fɑrisi coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ tɑ, wɑ ŋmɑɑ. Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑhɑm.
À nɑ gulɑize fɔ mo zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ngɑ di mo no ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom kulu mɑ ɑ̀ hɑm.
Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛyom ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ munu bɔrɔ boobo guribi dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si lɛzɛ̃ hɑri wɔ hɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm ndɑ wom ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ betu fɔ tɛ, ǹ hunu kɑ kpei Olibe zugu tondi kuku dɔ.
Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kulu kɑɑ du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ ɑ gɑɑ ciini wɔ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii: “A kɑɑ kurukɔ kɑru. Kuru feeji yom mo kɑɑ kɑru kɑ see.”
Ammɑ ɑ tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ, ɑ wom jinɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑ de ǹ kulu du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ n gɑɑ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ n gɑɑ pɑi.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii n sɛ, ciini wɔ hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑ de yɑ bu n bɑndɑ, ɑ si n ze. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kulu cii yɑ di.
Yesu bine ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di tɔ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gɛtɑsemɑni. À cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ gɔrɔ nee hɑli yɑ kpei yɔngɔ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
À nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Zɑbɑdi koo hinkɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. Yesu bine sinti kɑ sɑrɑ. À lɑɑkɑli go tunu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Bine, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Binesɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ ɑ bine dii kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bu gɑɑ. Wɑ gɔrɔ nee kɑ bɑtu ndɑ hɛɛ.
À kpei jinɑ cɛnɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ jɛndɛbiri kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À cii: A Bɑɑbɑ, de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ n mɑ nɑm tɑɑbi wɔ mɑ bisɑ kɑ mooru hɛɛ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ si ci hɛ kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ kɑlɑ hɛ kɑ n bine go bɑɑ.
À kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ kɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ go jiibi. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: To. Wom mɑnɑ hini kɑ bɑtu ndɑ hɛɛ bɑ guuru fɔ?
Wom mo bɑtu ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ. Bine, cɛ tu ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm yɑ hinɑbunu no.
À ye kɑ kpei ce hinkɑntɛ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À cii: A Bɑɑbɑ, de ɑ̀ si tɛ tɑɑbi wɔ mɑ mooru hɛɛ kɑlɑ yɑ ɑ̀ hɑm, n binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ.
Kɑ Yesu kɑɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ ǹ gɑru jiibi gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ moo yom tim.
À nɑ ǹ nɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑ kpei kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ce hinzɑntɛ ndɑ sendi fɔlɔnku yom.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ kɑ cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu, wom jiibi kɑ hulonzom bɑ? Gunɑ, lɔkɑci mɑɑni. Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ go kɑ ɑ dɑm dulumkoni yom kɑmbɛ.
Wɑ tunu. I mɑ kpei. Gunɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ di, ɑ̀ tɔ kpɑɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi, cɔfɔ Yudɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom yɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm.
Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ di, ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ di no ɑlɑmu fɔ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum, ngɑ noyɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
Zɑ ǹ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ cɔfɔ Yudɑ cii: Fɔɔ, Coobɑɑbɑ. À hiyɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A kpɑɑsi, ifɔ yɑ kɑɑndɑ ni? Cɔfɔ beerem nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Yesu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ Yesu, ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ tɑkubɑ hoobu. À nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ beri kɑ hɑngɑ fɔ kɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N tɑkubɑ di yeti ɑ̀ nyɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑkubɑ zɑɑ, tɑkubɑ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
N tɑmmɑ ɑ si hini kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ mɑɑsɑ no, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ no ɑ̀ bisɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kuru wei cindi hinkɑ?
Ammɑ de yɑ no, mɛtɛ no Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kɑɑ tɛ kɑ tɔ kɑ ǹ cii tilɑsi kɑlɑ de yɑ di mɑ tɛ?
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no Yesu cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Wom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom zɑngɑ zee? Hɑnu kulu mo ɑ go gɔrɔ wom gɑme ko cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ dii.
Ammɑ wɔne wɔ kulu go tɛ no zɑmɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom mɑ tɔ sɛ. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di kulu nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm kɑ zuuru.
Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu dii kpeindɑɑ̀ Kɑifɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dɔ, nungu kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom go meigu.
Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu hɑmine, zɑ nungu mooru kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑtɑ dɔ. À huro kɑ gɔrɔ gbeiteeri yom dɔ kɑ di zɑngɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ beeni ndɑ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom go tɑngɑri sɛdɑ fɔ ceeci Yesu bɔm ngei mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du ɑ̀, bɑ kɑ tɑngɑri sɛdɑkpɛ boobo kɑɑ. Hɑli kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ no tɑngɑri sɛdɑkpɛ hinkɑ fɔ kɑɑ.
Ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ cii ngɑ hini kɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri kɑ ye kɑ ɑ̀ cini jiribi hinzɑ gɑme.
Cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri di tunu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N si tu ndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu bɑ? Hɛ fɔ sɛdɑ beerem wɔ go tɛ n bɔm?
Ammɑ Yesu go dɛnjɛ. Bine gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A go kɑ n dɑm, n mɑ ze ndɑ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ. N mɑ cii i sɛ de ni yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Ize.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n nɑ ɑ̀ cii. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ, zɑ mɑɑsɑ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ mo gɔrɔ Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom kɑɑ di mo ɑ go kɑɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom bɔm.

Cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ pɑti pɑti Yesu sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ. A cii: A nɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi. Sɛdɑ fɔ no i go bɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ? Gunɑ, mɑɑsɑnkulu wom mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendi yɑmɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi.
Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ himɑ wom sɛ? Ǹ tu kɑ cii: À tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
À gɑɑ no ǹ go yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ moodumɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ lunkutɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛmbɛ dɛmbɛ.
Ǹ go cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Andebitɛrɛ tɛ i sɛ, Mɛsiyɑ. Mee yɑ nɑ n kɑru?
Piɛɛ goono hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ ko gɔrɔ. Cɔfɔ gbeiize hundiyo fɔ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii. Ni bine, n goono Yesu Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ di bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ ze ǹ kulu jine kɑ cii: Yɑ nɑ bei hɛ kɑ n go cii.
Kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ ko kpei kɑtɑ dɔ, hundiyo ŋmɑni fɔ mo di ɑ̀. Ngɑ mo cii beerem kɑ ǹ goono nungu di sɛ: Bɔrɔ kpɛ goono Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɑndɑ.
Piɛɛ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ze. À cii: A si bɔrɔ kpɛ bei.
Hɑli cɛnɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono nungu di mɑɑni kɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Siikɑ si ni mo, n goono beerem di kunɑ zɑmɑ bɑ n dɛɛnɛ sendi gɑɑ ǹ go kɑ n bei.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ sinti kɑ bɔm lɑɑliyom tɛ kɑ ze. À cii: A si bɔrɔ kpɛ bei. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ.
Bine Piɛɛ hɔngɔ Yesu sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ, n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ. Piɛɛ hunu tɛrɛ ko hɛ̃ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Kɑ mo bo gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom kulu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom sɑwɑrɑ Yesu bɔm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu hɔ ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ dɑm Pɔnse Pilɑtu kɑmbɛ, lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni fɔ.
Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ di ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri, ɑ̀ himɑ ngɑ bɔm sɛ sisibi. À kpeindɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɔkɔkɔ wɑrɑnzɑ di gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom dɔ.
A cii: A nɑ dulum tɛ kɑ ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑli dɑm kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom wɔ i bɑ fɔ. À ci n sendi.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ noorɑ cetu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ hundi kunɑ. Bine, ɑ̀ kpei kɑ ngɑ bɔm hɔ kɑ kɔtɔ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom di nɑ noorɑ zɑɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ dɑm jisiri kunɑ zɑmɑ kuri deiyom nooru no.
Ǹ sɑwɑrɑ kɑ kusu tɛkɔ fɔ fɑri dei ndɑ noorɑ yo yom fijiyom sɛ.
À sɛ no kɑlɑ hunkunɑ ǹ go cii fɑri ngɑ di sɛ, kuri fɑri.
Yɑ no ǹ nɑ sendɑ tɔnɑndi kɑ ǹ cii ɑndebi Yeremi mee gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: “Ǹ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɔkɔkɔ wɑrɑnzɑ zɑɑ, nooru hɛ kɑ ǹ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ, kɑ Isirɑilɑ ize fɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ǹ nɑ kusu tɛkɔ fɔ fɑri dei ndɑ zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ɑ no fɔndɔ.”
Yesu cɛ gɑɑbikonɑ jine. À nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Ni no Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ? Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n cii.
Kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii.
Pilɑtu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N si mɑɑ sendi boobo wɔ kɑ ǹ go sɛdɑ n bɔm no?
À mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bihi kɑlɑ gɑɑbikoni di mɑmɑci ndɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru kulu gɑɑ bine, gɑɑbikoni di cini kɑsuize fɔ tɑm jɑmɑ sɛ wɔ kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ tɑm.
Kɑsuize fɔ goono mo kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑrɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Bine kɑ ǹ meigu, Pilɑtu cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Wɔ fɔ wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɑm, Bɑrɑbɑ dee wɑlɑ Yesu di kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ?
Pilɑtu cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ cɛnsɛ yɑ nɑm ǹ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pilɑtu go gɔrɔ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm ɑ̀ wɛndɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: N mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ Bɔrɔ Cɛsusu wɔ sɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ tɑɑbi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hunkunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ di hɑndiri kunɑ.
Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ jɑmɑ di bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm kɑ Yesu wi.
Gɑɑbikoni di tu kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ hinkɑ di, wɔ fɔ no wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɑm? Cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Bɑrɑbɑ, Bɑrɑbɑ.
Pilɑtu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ no yɑ tɛ Yesu di mo sɛ kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ? Ǹ kulu cii: Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Ammɑ gɑɑbikonɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ? Hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Pilɑtu go di ngɑ si du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ kɑ kɔsɔngu di go tɔntɔnu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri kɑɑ kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom nyunu jɑmɑ di jine. À cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, tɑɑli si ɑ bɔm Bɔrɔ Cɛsusu wɔ wiyom gɑɑ. À ci wom sendi.
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kulu tu kɑ cii: À kuri bɑnɑndi mɑ kɑm i bɔm ndɑ i koo yom bɔm.
Pilɑtu bine nɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm ǹ sɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu bulɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Gɑɑbikoni di wɑnguize yom kpeindɑ Yesu ciiti kɑtɑ. Wɑnguize yom kuru meigu ɑ̀ bɔm.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ kpɛ siini kuku fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ǹ nɑ kɑriji cɛ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ kɑ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ sɑɑri fɔ mo dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ kunɑ. Ǹ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ kɑ cii: Fɔɔ, Yuifu yom Kpe.
Ǹ nɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ sɑɑri di zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɔtɛ ndɑ, bɔm gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ kpɛ kuku di kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bumbum jiine yom dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ tɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu cɔfɔ ǹ kube ndɑ Sileni bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Simɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ.
Ǹ tɔ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gologɑtɑ. À feeriji yɑ ci Bɔm Kurumbu nungu.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no hɑri mɔrɔ kɑ ǹ meigu ndɑ gɑdusɑndi sɑfɑri ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm. Kɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑɑ ɑ̀ hungu kɑ hɑm.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ̀ jiine yom bɔm kɑ du kɑ ǹ fɑrisi. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Sendi yom kɑ ɑndebi cii mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ ɑ jiine yom fɑrisi ngei gɑme. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ jiine yom bɔm.”
Ǹ hɑnnɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ dɔ nungu di ko bɑtu.
Ǹ nɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ hɑntum. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji ɑ̀ bɔm dɔ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: BƆRƆ WƆ YA CI YESU, YUIFU YOM KPE.
Ǹ nɑ zee beeri hinkɑ fɔ mo kɑnji ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mo kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
Bisɑkɔ yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ woo kɑ cɔɔrɔ.
Ǹ go cii: Ni, n cii n hini kɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri kɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini jiribi hinzɑ gɑme. De ni, n ci Ikpɛ Ize n mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ. N mɑ zumbu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm.
Yɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom, nge yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru.
Ǹ cii: À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom fɑɑbɑ fɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm fɑɑbɑ. De Isirɑilɑ Kpe no, ɑ̀ mɑ zumbu mɑɑsɑnkulu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm. I gɑ ɑ̀ no cimi.
À nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ mɑɑsɑnkulu de Ikpɛ go bɑɑ fɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Ize.
Zee beeri yom di mo kɑ ǹ kɑnji ndɑ, ngei mo nɑ ɑ̀ woo zɑngɑ yɑ di.
Ammɑ zɑ zɑɑri bɔm bindi cɔfɔ kube tɛ lɑɑbu di kulu kunɑ kɑlɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ.
Wiciri guuru hinzɑ di cɔfɔ Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À cii: “Eli, Eli lɑmɑ sɑbɑtɑni”. À feeriji yɑ ci, “A ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ifɔ sɛ n zuuru ɑ gɑɑ”?
Cɔfɔ ɑfɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ go Eli cɛɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ zuuru kɑ kpei sɑku zɑɑ kɑ miti dufɛ̃ mɔrɔ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ sɑɑri gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ Yesu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ sumsum.
Ammɑ cindei go cii: Wɑ nɑm. I mɑ di hɑli Eli go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ no.
Kɑ Yesu ye kɑ kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ jinde beeri, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
Cɔfɔ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑbude kɔɔtu ihinkɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ gɑndɑ. Gɑndɑ mo zinji. Tondi beeri yom kɔɔtu.
Sɑɑrɛ yom feeri. Hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ boobo mo kɑ ǹ bu tunu.
Ǹ hunu sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ Yesu tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ kɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. Ǹ hunu tɛrɛ jɑmɑ sɛ.
Wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ go Yesu bɑtu. Kɑ ǹ di gɑndɑ zinji yom di ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ, ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii: Siikɑ si bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ, Ikpɛ Ize no.
Weibɔrɔ boobo mo goono hɑli jinɑ ko gunɑ. Zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu no ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ ko tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ǹ kunɑ no Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ goono ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yose nyɑ ndɑ Zɑbɑdi koo yom, ǹ nyɑ.
Wiciri tɔ, Alimɑte kpɑɑrɑ hɑibɑrikɑkpɛ fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yosɛfu. Yesu coobɑɑbɑize no ngɑ mo.
Bɔrɔ di yɑ kpei Pilɑtu dɔ kɑ Yesu bukɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Pilɑtu nɑ fɔndɔ no ǹ mɑ bukɔ di no ɑ̀ sɛ.
Yosɛfu nɑ bukɔɑ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ hinnɑntɛ kunɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tondi sɑɑrɛ teji fɔ kɑ ǹ zozobu kunɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tondi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ gungure kɑ sɑɑrɛ di mee dɑɑbu ndɑ, ɑ̀ dirɑ.
Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ di mo goono nungu di ko gɔrɔ sɑɑrɛ di jine.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mo bo sɔluyom hɑnu bɑndɑ cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu kɑ kpei Pilɑtu dɔ.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I jinɑ, i hɔngɔ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ zɑmbɑntɛ wɔ go hunɑ ɑ̀ cii jiribi hinzɑntɛ ngɑ tunu.

Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ fɔndɔ no ǹ mo sɑɑrɛ di bɑtu kɑlɑ jiribi hinzɑntɛ di. Ngɑ di mɑ tɛ zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zee ciini kɑ cii beerem sɛ, ɑ̀ tunu bu kunɑ. Ngɑ di bɑ si kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ zɑmbɑ di, ɑ̀ kɑɑ jɑɑsɑ sintine wɔne.
Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom gundɑ bɑtukɔ yom. Wɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ dɑhirɑndi ihinno zɑngɑ wom hini kulu.
Ǹ kpei. Ǹ nɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɑhirɑndi kɑ sɛdɑ dɑm tondɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ bɑtukɔ yom dɑm mo.
Hulonzom hɑnu hine bisɑ. Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑlɑhɑdi, kɑ mo bɑ bo Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ di kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di gunɑyom.
Cɔfɔ gɑndɑ zinjiyom bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ. Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ kɑɑ tondɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi. À go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm.
À tɑkɑri go himɑ zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu. À jiine mo ikpɑrɛ no tɑi tɑi tɑi.
Hɑmburu nɑ bɑtukɔ yom dii kɑlɑ ǹ go gɑsi. Ǹ ye zɑngɑ bukɔ yom.
Bine Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii weibɔrɔ yom di sɛ: Wom wɔ, wɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ ɑ bei Yesu kɑ ǹ kɑnji di no wom go ceeci.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ si nee zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii di. Wɑ kɑɑ di nungu kɑ Kpe kɑni.
Wom mɑ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À bine go kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ nungu di. Gunɑ, ɑ cii wom sɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ hunu sɑɑrɛ di dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei bɑɑru no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kpei bɑɑru di no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ, cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ kube. À cii: A go wom fɔɔ. Ǹ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cee yom dii kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Bine Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si hɑmburu. Wɑ kpei bɑɑru no wom nyɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ nungu di.
Weibɔrɔ yom di go kpei. Sɑɑ di no bɑtukɔ yom mo ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom huro wɑngɑrɑ kɑ deede gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Kɑ ǹ meigu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ sɑwɑrɑ, ǹ nɑ nooru beeri no bɑtukɔ yom di sɛ.
Ǹ cii: Wom mɑ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom yɑ kɑɑ ciini kɑ ɑ̀ zee sɑɑ kɑ wom go jiibi.
De gɑɑbikonɑ mɑɑ yɑ di, i hini kɑ ɑ̀ suurɑndi kɑ wom kɑɑ tɑɑbi kunɑ.
Ǹ nɑ noorɑ tɑ kɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ cii ǹ mɑ cii di. Bɑɑru ngɑ di yɑ kɑru kɑ see Yuifu yom gɑme hɑli hunkunɑ.
Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi fɔ di kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu tondi kuku fɔ bɔm, nungu kɑ Yesu jisi ǹ mɑ kpei.
Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi ɑmmɑ ɑfɔ yom siikɑ.
Yesu mɑɑni ǹ dɔ kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ. À cii: Hini kulu no ǹ nɑ ɑ no bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ kpei dimi yom kulu ǹ mɑ tɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Wom mɑ ǹ mirɑndi Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ize ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Wom mɑ ǹ cooɑndi ǹ mɑ hɛ yom kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom no ǹ fɔndɔ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ bo goono wom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu kɑlɑ zɑmɑni beenɑntɛ. Ami.
Bɑɑru Hinno Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛ Ize bɔm, ɑ̀ sintiyom neyɑ.
Zɑngɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum ngei tirɑ yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ go bɔrɔ fɔ sɑmbɑ n jine, wɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ n fɔndɔ sɔlu.
Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ. À jinde cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɑ sɔlu. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔize yom cɛɑndi.
Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ ko beerem mirɑndi gɑnji kunɑ. À go wɑɑzu beerem mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ kɑ du mirɑndiyom.
Yude lɑɑbu bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kulu hunu kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ. Yohɑnnɑ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi Yudum isɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei dulum yom cii.
Yohɑnnɑ go kpɛ fɔ dɑm kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ yoo hɑmini. À gundɑ kunɑcendi kuuru ŋmɔne fɔ ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ. À go doo ndɑ gɑnji yu ŋmɑɑ.
À go wɑɑzu kɑ cii: À go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛɛ gɑɑbi. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ye gɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ nɑ wom mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ngɑ wɔ, ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi.
Jiribi nge yom di kunɑ no, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ Yesu kɑɑ zɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Yohɑnnɑ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi Yudum isɑ kunɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hunu hɑri kunɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di bɛɛnɛ go feeri. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go zumbu ɑ̀ bɔm zɑngɑ gutu.
Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ cii ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. N gɑɑ nɑ ɑ du ɑ binekɑɑne.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ Yesu fum gɑnji kunɑ.
À tɛ jiribi weitɑɑci gɑnji di kunɑ. Setɑm go kɑ ɑ̀ sui. Ngɑ ndɑ gɑnji hɑm yom no. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom nɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo.
Ǹ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ. À bɑndɑ Yesu kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm.
À cii: Lɔkɑci tɔ. Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni. Wɑ tuubi. Wɑ nɑɑne Bɑɑru Hinno gɑɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ go Gɑlile buulɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ di Simɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Andɛrɛ. Ǹ go biriji see buulɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ sɔrɔkɔ yom no.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ gɑnɑ. Zɑngɑ sɔrɔkɔ cini ciifi ceeci, ɑ kɑɑ wom tɛ bɔrɔ ceecikɔ yom.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ngei biriji yom nɑm kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
À bisɑ nodi kɑ tɔ jinɑ cɛnɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di Yɑkɔfu, Zɑbɑdi koo ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Yohɑnnɑ. Ngei mo goono hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ ko biriji yom hinsɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nge yom mo cɛɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɑɑbɑ Zɑbɑdi nɑm hɑrihiɑ kunɑ ndɑ gbeiteeri fɔ yom kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
Ǹ huro Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu kɑ cooɑndi.
Bɔrɔ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu cɛbɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ cooɑndi no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini. À mɑnɑ cooɑndi zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom.
Ǹ mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ. Cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di kɑɑti.
À cii: Wɑ i nɑm. Ifɔ yɑ goono ni ndɑ i yom gɑme, Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu? N kɑɑ n mɑ i hɑlɑci no? A go kɑ n bei. Ni yɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
Yesu deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Dɛnjɛ. N mɑ hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ bɑndɑ.
Cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ zinji zinji ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii kɑlɑ ǹ nɑ cɛrɛ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ no wɔne? Cɛbɛ teji fɔ dimi no wɔne? Bɑ hɔllɛ yom, Yesu go kɑ ǹ no mei ndɑ hini. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ.
Yesu bɑɑru hunu mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ kulu.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ hunu Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ. Ǹ kpei huro Simɔ ndɑ Andɛrɛ fuu. Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ goono ǹ bɑndɑ.
Simɔ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ bine go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ Yesu sɛ.
Yesu mɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑɑwɑse di bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ yɑrɛ.
Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, weenu kɑm. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ zɛnjɛkom yom kulu ndɑ hɔllɛkpɛ yom.
Wɑngɑrɑ di sukutum kulu meigu fuuɑ mee gɑɑ.
À nɑ bɔrɔ boobo no bɑɑni kɑ ǹ go tɑɑbi ndɑ doori ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. À nɑ hɔllɛ boobo mo gɑɑrɛ. À mɑnɑ tu hɔllɛ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ sendi zɑmɑ hɔllei mo gɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Yesu tunu zɑ ɑsubɑ beeri kɑ hunu. À kpei gɑnji kunɑ, nungu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ nodi.
Zɑ Simɔ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ kulu kpei ɑ̀ ceeciyom.
Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu go kɑ n ceeci.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: I mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ fɔ ndɑ cɛrɛ yom kunɑ yɑ du kɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu yom di mo zɑmɑ ngɑ di sɛ no ɑ kɑɑ.
À go wɑɑzu ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kulu. À nɑ hɔllɛ yom mo gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ.
Jire fɔ kɑɑ sɔmbu Yesu jine kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n bɑɑ, n hini kɑ ɑ hinnɑndi.
Sisibi bine nɑ Yesu dii. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A go bɑɑ, n mɑ hinne.
Kɑ Yesu sendi yɑ di, cɔfɔ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ jiretɛrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. À hinne.
Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ndɑ gɑɑbi. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm ndɑ wɑɑsi.
À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ lɑɑkɑli n mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ kpei kɑ n bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ sɛ. N mɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii di tɛ n hinneyom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ beerem sɛ sɛdɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ bɔrɔ di hunu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ Yesu bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu kulu. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ Yesu si hini kɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cɛ gɑnji fɔ kunɑ. Beerem hunu nungu kulu kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
À tɛ jiribi yom, Yesu ye kɑ huro Kɑpɛnɑum wɑngɑrɑ. Cɔfɔ beerem mɑɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ goono fuu.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ boobo meigu kɑlɑ tɛrɛ si bɑ hundɑ mee mɑɑnɑntɛ. À nɑ ǹ wɑɑzu ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
Beerem kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ mɔngɔlɔ fɔ kɑ bɔrɔ tɑɑci nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ.
Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du kɑ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ bɔrɔ bɑyom sɑbu sɛ, ǹ kɑɑru kɑ fuuɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ Yesu goono bɔm feeri kɑ ɑ̀ funu. Ǹ nɑ dɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ mɔngɔlɑ goono ko kɑni zumɑndi fuuɑ kunɑ.
Kɑ Yesu di nɑɑne kɑ ǹ gundɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii mɔngɔlɔ di sɛ: A koo, ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom bine go gɔrɔ nodi kɑ lɑsɑbu ngei bine kunɑ.
Ǹ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no bɔrɔ kpɛ go sendi yɑ wɔ? À go kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi no. Mee yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ?
Yesu go bei ngɑ bine kunɑ kɑ ǹ go lɑsɑbu ngɑ di tɛ ngei binei kunɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go lɑsɑbu wɔne tɛ wom bine yom kunɑ?
Wɔ fɔ yɑ fɑɑlɑ kɑ bisɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ cii mɔngɔlɔ sɛ, ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom wɑlɑ bɔrɔ mɑ cii, tunu kɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ?
Bine wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gundɑ hini hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ sendi mɔngɔlɑ sɛ.
À cii: Tunu kɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ kpei fuu.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu. À nɑ ngɑ dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ hunu ǹ kulu jine. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ cii: I mɑnɑ di wɔne dimi bɑ ce fɔ.
Yesu ye kɑ hunu kpɛɛnɛ ko buulɑ gɑnɑ. Jɑmɑ di kulu nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À nɑ ǹ cooɑndi.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go bisɑ, ɑ̀ di Lefi Alifɛ koo kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ bɑɑlici ɑlikɑsi tɑyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ. À tunu kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ, Yesu go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ Lefi fuu kunɑ. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ boobo ndɑ dulumkoni boobo ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom go ŋmɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ngei yɑ ci bɔrɔ tutumɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.

Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom di ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom. Cɔfɔ ǹ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom wɔ?
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑɑni, ǹ si bɑɑ lokotoro kɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɑɑni. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi ɑmmɑ dulumkoni yom.

Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom bine ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom go meehɔ zɑɑ hɑnu wɔ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom go meehɔ zɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ coobɑɑbɑize yom si meehɔ zɑɑ?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi yom si hini kɑ meehɔ zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑruhijɑ goono ndei. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Sɑɑ kulu kɑ hɑruhijɑ goono ndei, ǹ si meehɔ zɑɑ.
Ammɑ hɑnu yom kɑɑ kɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑruhijɑ gɑnɑndi ǹ dɔ, ǹ kɑɑ meehɔ zɑɑ hɑnu ngɑ di.
Bɔrɔ si zɑɑrɑ teji dumbɑri tɑɑ jiine zeenɔ gɑɑ, zɑmɑ dumbɑri di gɑ izeenɑ jɛrɛ fɔ zɑɑ no. Pɑti di kɑɑ tɔntɔnu.
Yɑ no bɔrɔ si dufɛ teji dɑm hɑmburu zeenɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ dufɛ gɑ ǹ bɔgu no. Dufɛ di kɑɑ bɑmbɑri. Hɑmburu yom mo kɑɑ sɑrɑ. Ammɑ ǹ go dufɛ teji dɑm hɑmburu teji kunɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom go fɑri yom tooru hulonzom hɑnu hine, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Fɔndɑ bɔm coobɑɑbɑize yom sinti kɑ cɛtɛ yom pɑti.
Cɔfɔ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom cii Yesu sɛ: Gunɑ, ifɔ sɛ ǹ go tɛ yɑ di hulonzom hɑnu hine hɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑli?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom coo bɑ hɛ kɑ Dɑfidi tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono tilɑsi kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom?
À huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri Abiɑtɑ wɑtɛ. À nɑ buuru jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑrɑɑ ŋmɑɑ. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom hinne sɛ. Dɑfidi nɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo no.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ hulonzom hɑnu tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ tɛ hulonzom hɑnu sɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ no, hɛɛ Adɑmize, hɛɛ yɑ ci hulonzom hɑnu Kpe mo.
Yesu huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono nodi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu.
Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom go Yesu gunɑ kɑ di hɑli ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni hulonzom hɑnu hine, ngei mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
Yesu cii bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu di sɛ: Tunu ǹ kulu jine.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ihinno tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine bɑ wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ? À mɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ wi? Ǹ kulu tɛ sɑkɑi.
Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ ndɑ bine. À bine sɑrɑ ndɑ ǹ binesɛndɛ di. À cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: N kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ tɛ bɑɑni zɑngɑ kɑmbɛwo di.
Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom hunu, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ sɑwɑrɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ Hirodu bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑ ye buulɑ mee gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ hunu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Ǹ hunu mo zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Idume lɑɑbu ndɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ ndɑ Tiru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ hundɑntɛ. Kɑ bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ mɑɑ hɛ yom kɑ Yesu go tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
À cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ du hɑrihi cɛnɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi ngɑ sɛ jɑmɑ di mɑ si ngɑ gɑmɑ.
À nɑ bɔrɔ boobo no bɑɑni hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ guruguze lɑlɔ yom go kuriyo ɑ̀ bɔm ngei mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ yom di ɑ̀, ǹ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ni wɔ, ni yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no.
Yesu mo nɑ ǹ dɑm ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii ǹ mɑ si ngɑ mɑɑ fɛɛ.
À bɑndɑ Yesu kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ beerem kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ cɛɛ. Ǹ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
À nɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ suubɑ kɑ ǹ mo goono ngɑ bɑndɑ, ngɑ mɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ.
Ǹ mɑ du hini mo kɑ zɛnjɛkom yom no bɑɑni. Ǹ mɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ mo.
Bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom neyɑ: Simɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Piɛɛ
ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Zɑbɑdi koo ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ, Yɑkɔfu cɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ǹ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Bɔnɑje. À feeriji yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛyom himɑ bɑɑnɑ.
À nɑ Andɛrɛ suubɑ mo ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Bɑtelemɑ ndɑ Mɑtiyu ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Alifɛ koo ndɑ Tɑde ndɑ Simɔ Kɑnɑnɑ bɔrɔ
ndɑ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ. Ǹ huro fuu fɔ kunɑ.
Jɑmɑ di ye kɑ meigu kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ hini bɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Kɑ Yesu fuuize yom mɑɑ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dii, zɑmɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ bɔm yɑ see.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ cii: Bezɑbulɑ no ɑ̀ bɔm, hɔllɛ yom kpɛ. Bezɑbulɑ ngɑ di no, ɑ̀ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ.
Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ cɛɛ kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom. À cii: Mɛtɛ Setɑm tɛ kɑ hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm gɑɑrɛ?
De kpetɛrɛ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑ fee ihinkɑ, kpetɛrɛ ngɑ di si hini kɑ cɛ.
De bine fuu gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ fee ihinkɑ. Fuu ngɑ di si hini kɑ cɛ.
De Setɑm gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm ɑ̀ fee ihinkɑ. À si hini kɑ cɛ. À kpetɛrɛ tɔ ngɑ mee noyɑ.
Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ huro bɑliji fuu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kuu de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑkpɛ hɔ jinɑ. Sɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ du kɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kuu.
Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, Ikpɛ gɑ iburɑdɑm yom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ dulum kulu ndɑ ǹ sendi yɑmɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi ndɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi yɑmu kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cɛnɑndi, ɑkpɛ si du yɑɑfɑyom pɑi. Ammɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
Yesu sendi zɑngɑ yɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ kɑɑ cɛ tɛrɛ kɑ bɔrɔ dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
Bɔrɔ boobo bine gɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bindi. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, n nyɑ ndɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom no tɛrɛ yɑ, ǹ go kɑ n ceeci.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Mee yɑ ci ɑ nyɑ, wɑlɑ mee yom yɑ ci ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom?
À nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bindi gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ. À cii: Gunɑ, ɑ nyɑ ndɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom neyɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ yɑ ci ɑ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ ɑ weimɑ ndɑ ɑ nyɑ.
Yesu ye ko cooɑndi buulɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ fɔ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ buulɑ bɔm. Jɑmɑ di kulu mo cɛ buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
À gɔ kɑ ǹ cooɑndi hɛ boobo yɑɑse yom kunɑ. À cooɑndiyomɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ go cii ǹ sɛ:
Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. Gunɑ, dimiize seekɔ fɔ hunu kɑ dimiize yom see.
Seeyomɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ dimiize fɔ yom kɑm fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm tondi dɑɑru bɔm, nungu kɑ lɑɑbu boobo si. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ǹ zei zɑmɑ gɑndɑ di sindɑ lɑɑbu no.
Sɑɑ kɑ weenu hunu kɑ dungu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɔgɑndi zɑmɑ ǹ sindɑ kɑɑji hinno.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm kɑriji nyɑ yom kunɑ. Kɑriji nyɑ yom beeri kɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ. Ǹ go zei. Ǹ go beeri kɑ tɔntɔnu hɑli ǹ go bɑrikɑ hɛi mo. Afɔ yom hɛi ize wɑrɑnzɑ. Afɔ yom hɛi ize weidu. Afɔ yom mo hɛi ize zɑngu.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu ye kɑmbu, beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ hã yɑɑse di feeriji.
A cii ǹ sɛ: Wom sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ duje beiyom no, ɑmmɑ tɛrɛ bɔrɔ yom sɛ hɛ kulu yɑɑse kunɑ no ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
Ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ "gunɑyom gɑɑ ǹ mɑ gunɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ si di. Mɑɑyom gɑɑ ǹ mɑ mɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ si fɑhɑm. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, ǹ kɑɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ kɑ du dulum yɑɑfɑyom."
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ yɑɑse wɔne no? Dee mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ yɑɑse yom kulu dɑ?
Dimiize seekɔɑ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ see.
Dimiizei kɑ ǹ see kɑmbu, ngei yɑ ci nungu kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ see. Kɑ beerem go mɑɑ, Setɑm kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑ ǹ see ǹ bine yom kunɑ kɔm.
Yɑ di no dimiizei kɑ ǹ kɑm tondi dɑɑrɑ bɔm mo, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ mo mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
Ammɑ ǹ sindɑ kɑɑji ngei kunɑ. Bɑndɑ fɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom no. Sɑɑ kɑ tɑɑbi wɑlɑ guruguze kɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ sɑbu sɛ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ǹ kɑmbɑ.
Dimiizei kɑ ǹ see kɑriji yom kunɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
Ammɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kɑrihã ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom fɑfɑguɛ ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu go huro. Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ nɑɑni hɑli ɑ̀ si bɑrikɑ hɛi.
Dimiizei mo kɑ ǹ go see lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Ǹ go bɑrikɑ hɛi. Afɔ yom hɛi ize wɑrɑnzɑ. Afɔ yom hɛi ize weidu. Afɔ yom mo hɛi ize zɑngu.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Beerem si fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ gɑɑsu gum ɑ̀ bɔm, wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑni dɔ cire. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ diiɑndi no kɑ jisi fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ mo ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ jisi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom go mɑɑ. Neesiji kɑ wom go neesi ndɑ, ngɑ no ǹ kɑɑ neesi ndɑ wom sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ mo.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo, bɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Dimiize kɑ ɑ go zei ngɑ bɔm sɛ yɑɑse neyɑ
À cii mo: Yɑ wɔ no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dimiize see.
À go jiibi kɑ tunu ciini ndɑ zɑɑri. Dimiizɑ zei kɑ beeri ngɑ bɔm sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei zɑngɑ no.
Gɑndɑ go kɑ ize hɛi ngɑ bɔm sɛ, sintine kɔsu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kpɑri, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ cɛtɛ, cɔfɔ moodɑmyom.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nini, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go kɔmɑ dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɔ wiyom.
Yesu cii kpɛɛnɛ: Ifɔ no i mɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi ndɑ, wɑlɑ yɑɑse fɔ no i gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ?
À himɑ no zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ mogure. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ see gɑndɑ bɔm ɑ̀ cɛnɑ ndɑ dimiize kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ see, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ zei. À beeri kɑ bisɑ tuuriize yom kulu. À go kɑmbɛ beeri yom tɛ hɑli bɛɛnɛ ciro yom hini kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kɔsu kunɑ.
Yɑɑse boobo gɑɑ zɑngɑ nge yom di, Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ hini kɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
À mɑnɑ sendi ǹ sɛ yɑɑse si ɑmmɑ kɑmbu ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kulu feeri ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di kɑ wiciri tɔ, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ. I mɑ kpei yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm, coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ Yesu zɑɑ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ goono. Hɑrihi fɔ yom mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Cɔfɔ hɛo beeri fɔ tunu buulɑ bɔm. Hɑri boosu yom go hɑrihiɑ kɑɑru kɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ go tɔ ndɑ hɑri kɔ.
Yesu wɔ goono bɑndɑ kɑ hɑngɑsu ko jiibi funukɔ citɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, n bɑ si ndɑ i hɑlɑciyom bɑ?
À tunu kɑ deeni hɛo di gɑɑ. À cii buulɑ sɛ: N mee dii, dɛnjɛ. Hɛo di cɛ, nungu tɛ sɑkɑi.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɑmburu zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ? Mɛtɛ no, wom sindɑ nɑɑne no?
Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Mee dimi no bɔrɔ wɔ hɑli bɑ hɛo ndɑ buulɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ?
Ǹ tɔ buulɑ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gɑdɑrɑncei lɑɑbu.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu hɑrihiɑ kunɑ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ fɔ hunu sɑɑrɛ yom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kube.
À gɔrɛ dɔ goono sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ bɑ ndɑ nyɔri.
Ce boobo ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ seseri ndɑ nyɔri yom. À nɑ nyɔri yom pɑti. À nɑ seseri yom ceeri ceeri. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ foorɑ.
Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ɑ̀ goono sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ ndɑ tondi kuku yom bɔm ko kɑɑti. À go kɑ ngɑ bɔm leebɑndi ndɑ tondi yom.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu hunne hɑli jinɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ goono hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme Yesu, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Ize? A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑndɑ n mɑ si ɑ bɔnɑndi.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ wɔ.
Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ n mɑɑ? À tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: A mɑɑ no Jɑmɑ zɑmɑ i bɑ no.
Hɔllɛ di bine go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑkɑkɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si ngei gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ lɑɑbuɑ kunɑ.
Kpisɔ gɑɑ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mo goono tondi kuku fɔ dɔ ko kurum.
Hɔllɛ yom di kulu nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: I yeti i mɑ huro kpisɔ gɑɑ wɔ kunɑ.
Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ. Kɑ ǹ hunu cɔfɔ ǹ huro kpisɔ gɑɑ di kunɑ. Kpisɔ gɑɑ di kulu pito ko gungure zɑ tondi bɔm kɑ kɑm buulɑ di kunɑ. Hɑri nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ. Kpisɔ yom di tɔ zɑngɑ dubu hinkɑ sɑrɑ.
Ǹ kurukɔ yom zuuru kɑ kpeindɑ bɑɑru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom kunɑ. Beerem hunu kɑ kpei di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ di bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ. À nɑ jiine dɑm. À goono ngɑ lɑɑkɑli gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii.
Beerem kɑ ǹ jine ngɑ di tɛ, ǹ deede beerem sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɔllɛkpɛ di ndɑ kpisɔ yom di.
Cɔfɔ ǹ sinti ko Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngei lɑɑbu.
Yesu bine huro hɑrihi kunɑ. Bɔrɔ di kɑ Yesu nɑ hɔllɑ gɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tu ngɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei fuu n kpɑɑsi yom dɔ. N mɑ deede ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ Kpe tɛ n sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sisibi n sɛ.
Bɔrɔ di kpei fuu kɑ sinti ko deede Dekɑpoli lɑɑbu hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ ngɑ sɛ. Mɑmɑci nɑ bɔrɔ kulu dii.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu ye kɑ buulɑ dem hɑrihiɑ kunɑ, bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ. Ngɑ mo goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yɑiru, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
À ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi kɑ cii: A koo hundiyo bɑ bu. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ kɑɑ kɑ n kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ̀ mɑ du bɑɑni kɑ hunɑ.
Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ di mo dɛcɛ Yesu bɑndɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnkɑm.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ kuri go dooru ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ.
À tɑɑbi sɑfɑrikpɛ boobo dɔ. À nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wi. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ doori di go tɔntɔnu.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru ɑ̀ kɑɑ jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɑndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ Yesu kpɛ hɑmɑ.
À go cii: De ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hinne hɑmɑ ɑ kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
Moo miilɑ fɔ, kuri dooruyom di cɛ kɑ kɔgu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ kɑ ngɑ du ngɑ guruguzɑ bɑɑni.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ kunɑ kɑ dɑbɑri hunu ngɑ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ zogu kɑ jɑmɑ di gunɑ. À cii: Mee yɑ nɑ ɑ kpɛ hɑmɑ?
À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N go di jɑmɑ go kɑ n koli. N mɑ hã hɑli mee yɑ nɑ n hɑmɑ?
Yesu nɑ moo cɛɛrɛ kɑ hundi kɑ di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Weibɔrɔ di mo kɑɑ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom kɑ ɑ̀ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ngɑ dɔ. À sɔmbu Yesu jine kɑ cimi kulu cii ɑ̀ sɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo hundiyo, nɑɑne kɑ n gundɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ n no bɑɑni. Kpei ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne. N mo du bɑɑni n guruguzɑ gɑɑ.
Kɑ Yesu go sendi, cɔfɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di hundi bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N koo hundiyɑ bu. Ifɔ sɛ n go Coobɑɑbɑ tɑɑbɑndi kpɛɛnɛ?
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ sendɑ kɑ ǹ cii, ɑ̀ cii Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di sɛ: Si hɑmburu. N mɑ nɑɑne dee.
Yesu mɑnɑ tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ dum kɑlɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ, Yɑkɔfu cɛɛnɛ.
Ǹ tɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di hundi kɑ di yuguyugu ndɑ bɛrɛɛ kɑ beerem go hɛ.
Kɑ Yesu huro ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go yuguyugu wɔ tɛ? Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɛ? Hundiyo di mɑnɑ bu fɑ. À go jiibi no.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ Yesu hɑɑru. Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À nɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ boi. Ǹ huro nungu kɑ koo di go kɑni.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ hundiyɑ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tɑlitɑ kumi. À feeriji yɑ ci, hundiyo ɑ cii n sɛ, tunu.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ hundiyɑ tunu kɑ dirɑ. Hundiyo di gundɑ jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii ǹ mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ mɑ hundiyo di no ŋmɑɑri ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Yesu hunu nungu di kɑ kɑɑ ngɑ lɑɑbu. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.

Kɑ hulonzom hɑnu tɔ, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ cooɑndi Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ. Ǹ mɑmɑci kɑ cii: Mɑni no hɛ yom wɔ go hunu bɔrɔ sɛ? Hɑikusutɛrɛ fɔ dimi no ɑ̀ du? Mɑni no dɑbɑri gbei yom wɔ go hunu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom go tɛ?
Bɔrɔ kpɛ sece di no. Mɑriɑmɑ koo no, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yose ndɑ Yudɑ ndɑ Simɔ bɛɛrɛ no. À weimɑ yom mo goono i gɑme nee. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? À gɑɑ no, Yesu tɛ ǹ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Andebi sindɑ bɛɛrɛ ngɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dimi yom kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ.
Yesu mɑnɑ hini kɑ dɑbɑri gbei fɔ kulu tɛ nungu di kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ zɛnjɛkom fɔ yom bɔm kɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
À mɑmɑci ndɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne di. Yesu go coobɑɑbɑize yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei ihinkɑ hinkɑ. À go kpɑɑrɑ yom yɑɑli ko cooɑndi.
À nɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ sinti kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei ihinkɑ hinkɑ. À nɑ ǹ no hini hɔllɛ yom bɔm.
À nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci guziri kɑlɑ goobu hinne. Ǹ mɑ si bɑ fɔɔlɔ zɑɑ, bɑ ŋmɑɑri, bɑ nooru ǹ zɑlifɔntɔ yom kunɑ.
Ǹ mɑ tɑɑmu dɑm ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ si kpɛ jinde hinkɑ dɑm.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Nungu kulu kɑ wom huro fuu kunɑ, wom mɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑ wom tunuyom.

Beerem kulu mo kɑ ǹ si wom yotɛrɛ tɑ kɑ ǹ si hɑngɑ dɑm wom sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ ko gɑnɑ nungu di, wom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ, wom cee si wom kɑmbɛ si. Ngɑ di mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ Sodom ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ ciiti hɑnu kɑ bisɑ kpɑɑrɑ di.
Kɑ ǹ kpei, ǹ nɑ bɑɑru di fɛɛ kɑ cii beerem mɑ tuubi.
Ǹ nɑ hɔllɛ boobo gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ jii tusu zɛnjɛkom boobo gɑɑ kɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
Kpe Hirodu mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu kulu. Hirodu bine cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ tunu bukɔei gɑme. À sɛ no dɑbɑri gbei yom go tɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Eli no. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo cii: Andebi fɔ no zɑngɑ dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ.
Ammɑ kɑ Hirodu mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di ɑ̀ cii: Yohɑnnɑ di kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑɑ, ngɑ no Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
À cii yɑ zɑmɑ dom di Hirodu bumbum yɑ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dii kɑ hɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu no ngɑ cɛɛnɛ Filipu wɛndɛ Hirodɑ sɑbu sɛ, domi Hirodu nɑ ɑ̀ hiji.
Yohɑnnɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli n mɑ n cɛɛnɛ wɛndɛ zɑɑ.
À sɛ no, Hirodɑ bine go tɔ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ. À go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ wi ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini.
Hirodu go hɑmburu Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei Yohɑnnɑ bɑrɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu, bɔrɔ hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dii ndɑ lɑɑkɑli. Sɑɑ kulu kɑ Hirodu mɑɑ hɛ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ cii ɑ̀ cini hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
À zɑɑri kɑɑ. Hirodu nɑ ngɑ hɛiyom zɑɑri kpɑtɑ tɛ ngɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ ndɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusu yom ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ beeri yom sɛ.
Cɔfɔ Hirodɑ bumbum koo hundiyo huro bɑtu kɑ gɑɑni. À kɑɑni Hirodu sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ngɑ ndei go ŋmɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Hirodu cii hundiyo di sɛ: N mɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɛ kulu kɑ n go bɑɑ. A gɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ.
À ze hundiyɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kulu kɑ n nɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ gɑ n no ndɑ, hɑli ndɑ ɑ kpetɛrɛ jɛrɛ fɔ.
Cɔfɔ hundiyɑ hunu. À kpei kɑ ngɑ nyɑ hã: Ifɔ no yɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ dɑ? À nyɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cii Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ koo hundiyɑ huro ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ kpei Hirodu dɔ. À cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm no ɑ go bɑɑ. N mɑ ɑ no mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ pɛrɛnti kunɑ.
Kpeɑ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ammɑ ze kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ŋmɑɑri dɔ, ǹ sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kpeɑ nɑ ngɑ dogɑrei ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei kɑɑndɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm. Dogɑri di bine kpei kɑsuɑ kunɑ.
À nɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm kɑɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑ pɛrɛnti fɔ kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ no koo hundiyɑ sɛ. Ngɑ mo nɑ ɑ̀ no ngɑ nyɑ sɛ.
Kɑ Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ kɑɑ bukɔɑ zɑɑ kɑ kpei dɑm sɑɑrɛ kunɑ.
Diyɑ yom mo meigu Yesu dɔ. Ǹ deede ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ngei tɛ ndɑ cooɑndiyom kulu kɑ ngei tɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ kɑmbu nungu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ hulonzom bɑndɑ fɔ. Beerem go kpei, ǹ go ye kɑlɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ du dɑɑmɑ bɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
À gɑɑ no ǹ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ kpei kɑmbu nungu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ boobo di ǹ go kpei. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei mo. Beerem zuuru cee gɑɑ wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ǹ jinɑ nunguɑ dɔ kɑ meigu Yesu dɔ.
Kɑ Yesu hunu hɑrihiɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ. Sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ himɑ no zɑngɑ feeji yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ kurukɔ. Yesu sinti kɑ ǹ cooɑndi hɛ boobo bɔm.
Kɑ weenu bɑ kɑm, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Nungu wɔ gɑnji kunɑ no. Lɔkɑcɑ mo mooru.
Ǹ tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei nee cɛsɑntɛ tungɑ yom kunɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ kɑ ngei ŋmɑɑri dei. Ǹ sindɑ ŋmɑɑri fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom bumbum, wɑ ǹ no ŋmɑɑri ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ngei mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I mɑ kpei ŋmɑɑri dei hɑndu ɑhɑku bɑnɑndi ŋmɔne kɑ ǹ no ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ no?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Buuru mɛrɛjɛ no wom sɛ? Wɑ kpei gunɑ. Kɑ ǹ bei, ǹ cii: Igu ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ.
Yesu nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ ǹ kulu gɔrɛndi sɛtɛ sɛtɛ subu gɑni fɔ kunɑ.
Ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ sɛsɛrɛ sɛtɛ sɛtɛ bɔrɔ zɑngu zɑngu bɔrɔ weigu weigu.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ buuru gu di ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ zɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji ko no ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ciifi hinkɑ mo fɑrisi ǹ kulu sɛ.
Ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu.
Ǹ nɑ buuru zenje ndɑ ciifi cindɑ meigu cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ mefɔ.
Nge yom kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu sɑrɑ no.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom tilɑsi ǹ mɑ huro hɑrihi. Ǹ mɑ jinɑ kɑ kpei ngɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɑm, ɑ̀ kpei tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, hɑrihiɑ goono buulɑ bindi bindi. Yesu mo goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ ngɑ fɔ.
Yesu di ǹ go tɑɑbi ndɑ hɑrihiɑ funuyom zɑmɑ ǹ goono hɛo bɑndɑ. Ciini guuru hinzɑ no Yesu go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm kɑ kpei ǹ dɔ. À tɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ mɑ bisɑ ǹ cɔrɔ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ngei wɔ kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm, ǹ tɑmmɑ zɑngɑ gɑndɑ bukɔ fɔ no. Ǹ tunu ndɑ kuwɑ.
Ǹ kulu di ɑ̀, ǹ lɑɑkɑli tunu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ kɑni. Hɛɛ no. Wɑ si hɑmburu.
Yesu huro ǹ dɔ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ hɛo di kɑni. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
Ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm kɑ simbɑ ndɑ buuru gu di zɑmɑ ǹ binei yɑ sendi.
Kɑ ǹ tɔ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gɛnɛsɑrɑtɑ lɑɑbu, ǹ cɛ nodi buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
Ǹ hunu hɑrihiɑ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ beerem nɑ Yesu bei.
Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei lɑɑbu di nungu kulu. Ǹ sinti kɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ doorikom yom dɑɑri yom kunɑ nungu kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ǹ ci ɑ̀ goono.

Nungu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ no, wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ no wɑlɑ tungɑ kunɑ no beerem go doorikom yom jisi hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm doorikom yom mɑ bɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hɑngɑ hɑmɑ. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ du bɑɑni.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, ǹ meigu Yesu dɔ.
Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize fɔ yom go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbɛ ziibɔ, wɑtom ǹ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ nyunu, ǹ cii tɑɑli no.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom kulu si cini ŋmɑɑ de ǹ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ nyunu sã sã ǹ cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ bɔm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu hebu mo kulu ǹ si ŋmɑɑ de ǹ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ nyunu. Alɑɑdɑ boobo ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ zɑɑ, zɑngɑ gulɑize nyunuyom ndɑ combu nyunuyom ndɑ kusu nyunuyom ndɑ tɑbulu nyunuyom.
Bine, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no n coobɑɑbɑize yom si cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ gɑnɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nyunu?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Esɑyi nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ wom bɔm cɑu cɑu, wom munɑfici yom, zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Jɑmɑ wɔne mee gɑɑ no ǹ go bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ ǹ bine yom si ɑ gɑɑ.
Ǹ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi no kɔnu, Cɛbe yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ mo iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom no."
Zɑ kɑ wom nɑ Ikpɛ meire nɑm, wom go kɑ iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ gɑnɑ, wɑtom combu nyunuyom ndɑ gulɑize nyunuyom. Alɑɑdɑ boobo mo kɑ ǹ himɑ yɑ di wom gɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Dɑhiri wom go hungu Ikpɛ meire yom zɑmɑ wom mɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ gɑnɑ sɛ.
Moisi cii: "N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ". À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ woo, n mɑ ɑ̀ wi".
Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom go cii: De bɔrɔ cii ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ sɛ, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ n gɑɑ ndɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci kɔbum, wɑtom ɑkpɛ go cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ kɔ.
Wom mɑnɑ nɑm ɑkpɛ mɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ sɛ.
Wom go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi tɛ kɔnu ndɑ wom ɑlɑɑdɑ kɑ wom jisi. Wom go hɛ boobo tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ di.
Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ, wom kulu. Wɑ fɑhɑm mo.
Hɛ fɔ kulu si tɛrɛ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ huro bɔrɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi. Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu bɔrɔ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu jɑmɑ di kunɑ kɑ huro fuu kunɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ simbɑ ndɑ yɑɑse di.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mo zɑngɑ yɑ no wom si fɑhɑm? Wom si bei bɑ, kɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tɛrɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ huro bɔrɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi?
À si huro bɔrɔ bine kunɑ kɑlɑ gunde kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ hunu. À gɑɑ no, ŋmɑɑri kulu tɛ hɑlɑli.
Yesu cii: Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu bɔrɔ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ go bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
Zɑ bɔrɔ bine kunɑ no lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ yom go hunu ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ meiguyom zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom.
Zeetɛrɛ mo go hunu zɑ bɔrɔ bine kunɑ ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ ndɑ moo futu ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ ndɑ sɑmutɛrɛ.
Hɛ lɑlɔ yom wɔ dimi kulu go hunu zɑ bine kunɑ ko bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
Kɑ Yesu tunu nungu di ɑ̀ kpei Tiru ndɑ Sidom lɑɑbu yom. Kɑ ɑ̀ hurɑ fuu fɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bei, ɑmmɑ Yesu si hini kɑ tugu.
Ammɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ koo hundiyo gundɑ hɔllɛ mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru. À kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
Weibɔrɔ di bɑrɑ no dimi cindi, Sirifenesi lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no. A go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hɔllɛ di gɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngɑ koo hundiyɑ bɑndɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Nɑm koo yom mɑ kungu jinɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hegu ǹ mɑ koo yom ŋmɑɑri zɑɑ kɑ cetu hɑnsiize yom sɛ.
Weibɔrɔ di mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no Kpe, ɑmmɑ hɑnsiize yom go koo yom ŋmɑɑri buruburu yom kɑ ǹ go kɑm tɑbulu ciire ŋmɑɑ.
À gɑɑ no Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sendi wɔ sɑbu sɛ, kpei. Hɔllɑ hunu n koo hundiyɑ bɑndɑ.
Weibɔrɔ di bine kpei fuu. À gɑru ngɑ koo hundiyɑ gɑ kɑni dɑɑri bɔm ndɑ bɑɑni. Hɔllɛ di mo hunu koo di bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu Tiru ndɑ Sidom lɑɑbu yom kunɑ, ɑ̀ kpei Gɑlile buulɑ dɔ. À gɑnɑ Dekɑpoli lɑɑbu.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ lutu bɛbɛ fɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑmbu kɑ hunu ndɑɑ̀ jɑmɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbeize yom dɑm ɑ̀ hɑngɑ yom kunɑ. À tufɑ ngɑ kɑmbeize gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛɛnɛ hɑmɑ.
À nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ binejisi. À cii: Efɑtɑ. À feeriji yɑ cii: feeri.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hɑngɑ yom feeri. À dɛɛnɛ kɔrɔfɑ mo feeri, ɑ̀ go sendi ihinno.
Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Ammɑ zɑngɑ Yesu hungu ndɑ ǹ sɛ, yɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ.
Mɑmɑci bine nɑ beerem dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii: À gɑ hɛ kulu tɛ ihinno. À go nɑm lutu yom go mɑɑ. À go nɑm bɛbɛ yom go sendi.
Hɑnu nge yom di kunɑ kɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ kpɛɛnɛ, ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Sisibi go kɑ ɑ dii jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ jiribi hinzɑ neyɑ kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ ɑ dɔ. Ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
De bine ɑ nɑ ǹ tɑm ndɑ hɛrɛɛ ǹ mɑ kpei ngei kpɑɑrɑ yom, ǹ kɑɑ mɔngɔ fɔndɔ bɔm. Hɑli nungu mooru no ɑfɔ yom hunu.
Yesu coobɑɑbɑize yom bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɑni bɔrɔ hini kɑ jɑmɑ wɔ kungɑndi ndɑ ŋmɑɑri nee gɑnji wɔ kunɑ?
Yesu mo nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Buuru mɛrɛjɛ no wom sɛ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Buuru iye.
Yesu bine nɑ jɑmɑ dɑm ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ gɑndɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ buuru iye di zɑɑ, ɑ̀ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji kɑ no ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ǹ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
Ǹ gundɑ ciifi cɛnɑ fɔ yom mo. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ mɑ ngei mo fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
Jɑmɑ di ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu. Ǹ nɑ zenje yom kɑ ǹ cindi meigu kɑ cilɑ beeri iye tɔnɑndi.
Beerem kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ dubu tɑɑci. À bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu huro hɑrihi, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Ǹ kpei Dɑlimɑtu lɑɑbu. Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go ɑlɑmu fɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ (Gunɑ Mɑtiyu 16:1-4)
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom hunu kɑ sinti kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yesu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ bɛɛnɛ ɑlɑmu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sui sɛ.
Yesu bine nɑ binejisi kunɑ kunɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no zɑmɑni beerem wɔ go kɑ ɑlɑmu fɔ hã? Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, Ikpɛ si zɑmɑni wɔ beerem no ɑlɑmu.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ nɑm ɑ̀ ye kɑ huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom bine dinigɑ kɑ buuru zɑɑ. Buuru gudɑ fɔ hinne no ǹ sɛ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ.
Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Hirodu buuru kɑsɑmi.
Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di ciine cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: À go cii yɑ zɑmɑ i sindɑ buuru sɛ no.
Zɑ kɑ Yesu mo bei ǹ gɑɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no wom cii cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ wom sindɑ buuru sɛ nɑ? Wom si bei no? Wom si fɑhɑm no? Binesɛndɛ wɔ goono wom gɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ?
Moo yom go wom sɛ, wom si di no? Hɑngɑ yom go wom sɛ, wom si mɑɑ no? Wom si hɔngɔ no bɑ?
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ buuru gu di zɑɑ kɑ zenji zenji bɔrɔ dubu gu di sɛ cilɑ cɛnɑ mɛrɛjɛ no wom tɔnɑndi ndɑ cindɑ? Ǹ cii ɑ sɛ: Iwei cindi hinkɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ buuru iye di mo zɑɑ kɑ zenji zenji bɔrɔ dubu tɑɑci di sɛ, cilɑ beeri mɛrɛjɛ no wom tɔnɑndi ndɑ cindɑ? Ǹ cii: Iye.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Mɛtɛ no wom si fɑhɑm no?
Yesu kɑɑ Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ dɑnɑm fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ dɑnɑm di hɑmɑ.
Yesu nɑ dɑnɑm di kɑmbɛ dii kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ tufɑ ɑ̀ moo yom gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ hã de ɑ̀ go di hɛ fɔ.
Dɑnɑm di gunɑ bɛɛnɛ. À cii: A go di beerem ɑmmɑ ɑ go di ei no zɑngɑ tuurinyɑ yom kɑ ǹ go dirɑ.
Yesu bine ye kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ moo yom gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ. À ye kɑ tɛ moo. À go di hɛ kulu sã sã.
Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei fuu. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ si huro kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ. N mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
Yesu mo kpei Kɑsɑriɑ Filipu lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ yom, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Fɔndɑ bɔm bine ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hã kɑ cii: Mee no beerem go cii hɛɛ dɑ?
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom gɑ cii Eli. Afɔ yom mɑ gɑ cii dɑm ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ.
Yesu mo nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Wom bine, mee no wom go cii hɛɛ dɑ? Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni nɑ Mɛsiyɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si ngɑ bɑɑru cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.

À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ ǹ cooɑndi kɑ cii: Tilɑsi hɛɛ Adɑmize ɑ mɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm. Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ mɑ hungu hɛɛ kɑ ɑ wi. Ammɑ yɑ ye kɑ tunu jiribi hinzɑntɛ.
Meecine ngɑ di, Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. Piɛɛ ye ndɑ Yesu kɑmbu kɑ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm.
Ammɑ Yesu bɛrɛ kɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gunɑ. À nɑ Piɛɛ kɔnkɔm kɑ cii: Ye ɑ bɑndɑ Setɑm zɑmɑ n lɑsɑbu yom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom, kɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom ŋmɔne yom.
Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hungu ngɑ bɔm sɛ. À mɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ mo kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ.
Hɑnfɑni fɔ nɑ bɔrɔ sɛ bɑ de ɑ du hɑndunyɑ kulu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi?
Hɛ fɔ no, bɔrɔ kɑɑ no kɑ ngɑ hundi fɑnsɑ ndɑ?

Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ hɑwi ndɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ sendi yom zɑmɑni beerem hɑnyɑ fute kɑ ǹ ci zɑngɑ zinɑteeri yom gɑme, hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑkpɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ yom, hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑkpɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cɛ nee, ǹ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ di Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri.
Jiribi idu bɑndɑ Yesu nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. À kpeindei kɑmbu ngei hinne tɑndi kuku fɔ bɔm. À tɑkɑri bɛrɛ ǹ jine.
À jiine yom mo bɛrɛ kɑ kɑɑri ikpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi kɑ bɔrɔ si hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hini kɑ jiinei kpɑrɑndi zɑngɑ yɑ di.
Cɔfɔ Eli ndɑ Moisi hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ ko sendi ndɑ Yesu.
À gɑɑ no, Piɛɛ sendi Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ ɑ̀ boori i mɑ gɔrɔ nee. I mɑ bukɑ hinzɑ tɛ, ɑfɔ n sɛ, ɑfɔ Moisi sɛ, ɑfɔ mo Eli sɛ.
Piɛɛ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ngɑ mɑ cii zɑmɑ ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Buru fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ buru di kunɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di zogu zogu ngei cɔrɔ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑlɑ Yesu hinne ngei bɑndɑ.
Kɑ ǹ go zumbu tondi kukuɑ bɔm Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si hɛ nge yom di cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ngɑ, Adɑmize kɑɑ tunu bukɔei gɑme.
Ǹ nɑ sendi ngɑ di jɛ kɑ cɛrɛ hã hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci tunu bukɔei gɑme.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go cii kɑlɑ de Eli mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ?
Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii. Cimi no Eli mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ kɑ ye kɑ hɛ kulu gɔrɛndi. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii mɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize bɔm ɑ mɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm. Ǹ kɑɑ hungu hɛɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ mo Eli kɑɑ kɔ. Ǹ bine tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ bɑɑ, ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii ɑ̀ bɔm.
Kɑ Yesu kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize cindei dɔ, ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom nɑ ǹ dɑm bindi. Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom mo go kɑkɔ ndei.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di ɑ, mɑmɑci nɑ n dii. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei kɑ ɑ fɔɔ.
Yesu nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ bɔm nɑ wom go kɑkɔ ndei?
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ ɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ koo n dɔ. À gundɑ hɔllɛ bɛbɛ.
Nungu kɑ ɑ̀ tunu ɑ̀ sɛ kulu, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ zinji kɑ ɑ̀ fufu hɑli ɑ̀ mee mo kufu kɑru. À mo hinje kɑɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɔgu gbɑm. Ngɑ nɑ ɑ cii n coobɑɑbɑize yom wɔ sɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: zɑmɑni wɔ beerem, wom zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom, kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ bo goono ndɑ wom? Kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ no, ɑ bɑ wom jɛrɛ? Wɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ koo di.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Zɑ hɔllɑ di Yesu, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo di zeeri kɑ ɑ̀ fufu. Kɑɑ di kɑm gɑndɑ ko gungure. À mee go kufu kɑru.
Yesu nɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ hã kɑ cii: Zɑ sɑɑ fɔ nɑ wɔne nɑ ɑ̀ di? Bɑɑbɑ di cii: Zɑ ɑ̀ goono icɛnɑ.
Sɑɑ kulu mɑ nini kunɑ ndɑ hɑri yom kunɑ no ɑ̀ cini kɑ ɑ̀ zeeri ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ammɑ de n hini kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ, sisibi mɑ n dii i sɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n hini kɑ nɑɑne fɑ, hɛ kulu hini kɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne sɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ wuuru kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ gɑ nɑɑne. N mɑ ɑ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ nɑɑne bunɔ.
Kɑ Yesu di jɑmɑ di kulu go zuuru kɑ kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ deeni hɔllɛ di gɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɔllɛ bɛbɛ, ɑ go kɑ n mei n mɑ hunu koo wɔ bɑndɑ. N mɑ si kɑɑ ɑ̀ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ.
Kɑ hɔllɑ kuwɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo di zinji kɑ ɑ̀ fufu kɑ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Koo di tɛ zɑngɑ bukɔ kɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii ɑ̀ bu nɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. À tunu kɑ cɛ.
Yesu hurɑ fuu kunɑ. Lɑbu kunɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no i yom wɔ, i mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ dɑ?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɔne dimi si hunu kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑduwɑ ndɑ meehɔ.
Kɑ ǹ hunu nungu di ǹ gɑnɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ bisɑ. Yesu si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bei.
À nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cooɑndi kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Ǹ bɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize dɑm beerem kɑmbɛ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi. Wiyomɑ bɑndɑ, jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi ngɑ di. Ǹ hɑmburu mo ndɑ ɑ̀ hãyom.
Yesu bine kɑɑ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu fɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hã kɑ cii: Kɑkɔ fɔ nɑ wom go tɛ fɔndɑ bɔm?
Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii zɑmɑ ǹ kɑkɔ ndɑ cɛrɛ nɑ fɔndɑ bɔm bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ibeeri.
Yesu bine gɔrɔ. À nɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci jinɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci ǹ kulu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ. À mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ǹ kulu sɛ.
À nɑ kɑɑ cɛnɑ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngei bindi kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ jɛndɛ kɑ cii coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ:
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go koo cɛnɑ zɑngɑ wɔne tɑ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ nɑ ɑkpɛ tɑ bɑ, ɑmmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm no ɑ̀ tɑ.
Yohɑnnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ n mɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i gɑnɑ. I bine, i hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i gɑnɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ si hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dɑbɑri gbei tɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ sendi yɑmu.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom, i sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ goono.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go wom no gulɑize fɔ hɑri yeenɔ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ zɑmɑ wom ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom sɛ, cimi nɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑkpɛ wɔ ɑ̀ tukunsi si dɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɛrɑndi, ǹ mɑ fufuyom tɑndi hɔ ɑkpɛ jinde gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cetu buulɑ kunɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ bisɑ.

De bine n kɑmbɛ fɔ yɑ ci n dɛrɑndikɔ, n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu. N mɑ hurɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ leebɑntɛ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ kɑmbɛ hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ buyom kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Nungu wɔ ɑ̀ hɑnjeri yom si bu, ɑ̀ nini mo si wi pɑi.

De bine n cee yɑ ci n dɛrɑndikɔ n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu. N mɑ huro hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ ndɑ cee fɔ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ cee hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ buyom kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Nungu wɔ ɑ̀ hɑnjeri yom si bu, ɑ̀ nini mo si wi pɑi.
De bine n mɑɑ fɔ yɑ ci n dɛrɑndikɔ n mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ. N mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ moo fɔ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ mɑɑ hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
Nungu wɔ ɑ̀ hɑnjeri yom si bu, ɑ̀ nini mo si wi pɑi.
Ǹ kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu hinsɑ ndɑ nini zɑngɑ ǹ go gɑrɑndi hɛ hinsɑ ndɑ ciiri.
Ciiri yɑ hɛ hinno no. Ammɑ de ciiri tɑru hɛ fɔ nɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ ndɑ?
Wom mɑ gundɑ ciiri wom kunɑ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ mɑ ndɑ bɑɑni cɛrɛ gɑme.
Zɑ nungu di Yesu tunu kɑ kɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu kɑlɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ. Bɔrɔ boobo ye kɑ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ. À nɑ ǹ cooɑndi kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cini cooɑndi.
À gɑɑ nɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Kɑ ɑ̀ sui sɛ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee?
Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Fɔndɔ fɔ nɑ Moisi nɑ wom no?
