Ǹ cii: Moisi tu bɔrɔ mɑ hije wiyom tirɑ nɑ kɑ du kɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Moisi nɑ fɔndɔ ngɑ di hɑntum wom sɛ no wom binesɛndɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Ammɑ zɑ tɑkɑyom sintine Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ tɛ nɑ "hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ.
À sɛ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ nɑm kɑ dɔbu ngɑ wɛndɛ gɑɑ.
Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di, ǹ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔ." Zɑngɑ yɑ ǹ si tɛ ihinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku.
Ngɑ di sɛ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono fuu kunɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom go kɑ ɑ̀ hã kpɛɛnɛ kɑ simbɑ sendi ngɑ di.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji, ɑkpɛ gɑ wɛndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fee zinɑ.
De bine wɛndɛ mɑ yɑ gɑ ngɑ kunye fee kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji, ɑ̀ go zinɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ koo cɛnɑ yom ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɑmɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ kɑɑndɑkɔ yom yɑɑyɑ.
Kɑ Yesu di yɑ di, ɑ̀ bine tɔ. À cii coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ: Wɑ nɑm koo cɛnɑ yom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Wɑ si ǹ gɑnji. Beerem zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ.
Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tɑ zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ, ɑkpɛ si huro ɑ̀ kunɑ pɑi.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ zɑɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ. À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu kɑ huro fɔndɔ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ zuuru kɑ kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. À nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ hinnɑ, ifɔ nɑ yɑ tɛ kɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni tubu?
Cɔfɔ Yesu tu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ihinno? Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno kɑlɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
N go meire yom bei. "N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu zɑmbɑ. N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n nyɑ ndɑ n bɑɑbɑ sɛ."
À tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, meire yom wɔ kulu no ɑ gɑnɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsuize.

Yesu bine nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ fɔ nɑ n gɑziɑ. Kpei, n mɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ n gundɑ neerɑ kɑ nooruɑ fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. N kɑɑ du hɑizici jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. N mɑ kɑɑ kɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ di moojine diibi ndɑ sendɑ. À dirɑ ndɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ hɑibɑrikɑ no ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
Yesu nɑ ngɑ hundɑntɛ gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ. À cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: À gɑɑbu fɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom mɑ hurɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu sendi. Yesu ye kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: A koo yom, ɑ̀ gɑɑbu fɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm no hɑibɑrikɑ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
À fɑɑlɑ yoo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ sɑnɑ fune kunɑ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mɑ hurɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑmɑci kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ ngɑ di. Ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Dee mee yɑ hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ dɑ?
Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Iburɑdɑm yom dɔ ngɑ di si hini kɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ wɔ dɔ hɛ kulu hini kɑ tɛ.
Piɛɛ sinti kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ i nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ n gɑnɑ.

Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fuu nɑm wɑlɑ cɛɛnɛ yom wɑlɑ bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ weimɑ yom wɑlɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ nyɑ wɑlɑ wɛndɛ wɑlɑ kɑɑ yom wɑlɑ fɑri yom ɑ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si du ei kɑ bisɑ zɑngu.

Mɑɑsɑ gɑɑ ɑkpɛ du fuu yom ǹ mɑ bisɑ zɑngu ndɑ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ weimɑ yom ndɑ nyɑ yom ndɑ koo yom ndɑ fɑri yom. À du ei mo ndɑ guruguze yom. Zɑmɑni mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Ammɑ sintine bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom. Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom.

Ǹ goono fɔndɔ bɔm ko kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Yesu nɑ jinɑ tɑ kɑ kpei. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo mɑmɑci. Ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ hɑmburu. Hɑli jinɑ ɑ̀ cɛ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ ye kɑmbu. À sinti kɑ cii ǹ sɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɔ ngɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, Yerusɑlɛm no i go ziji yɑ. Nodi no ǹ kɑɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize dɑm gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ bine gɑ ɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑ ɑ wi. Ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ.
Ǹ kɑɑ dondɑ hɛɛ kɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi ɑmmɑ jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ mo, Zɑbɑdi koo yom, ǹ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bɑɑ nɑ n mɑ tɛ i sɛ hɛ kɑ i gɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ wom gɑ bɑɑ yɑ tɛ wom sɛ?
Ǹ bine cii ɑ sɛ: N mɑ tu i sɛ i mɑ gɔrɔ, ɑfɔ n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑfɔ mɑ n kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ n deizɑ kunɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom si bei hɛ kɑ wom gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Tɑɑbi kɑ ɑ bɑ hɑm, wom hini kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm bɑ? Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom hini kɑ du ɑ̀ bɑ?
N cii Yesu sɛ: I hini. Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no wom gɑ ɑ tɑɑbi hɑm. Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom kɑɑ du ɑ̀.
Ammɑ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ gɔrɛ di ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ, ǹ ŋmɔne nɑ.
Kɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei di mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ bine tɔ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bei kɑ dimi cindei hinikpɛ yom gɑ kɑ ngei dɑbɑri cɛbɛ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ dimi cindei bɔm. Ǹ gɑɑbikoni yom mo go kɑ ngei hini cɛbɛ beerem bɔm.
À mɑ si ci yɑ di wom gɑme ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci ibeeri wom kunɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom sɛ gbeiize.
Wom kunɑ mɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci jinɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom kulu tɑm.
Hɛɛ, Adɑmize yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ kɑɑ no yɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ hundi nɑ beerem sɛ. A kɑɑ nɑ yɑ ci fɑnsɑ hɛ jɑmɑ gurubi.
Ǹ tɔ Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ hunu Yeriko ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Dɑnɑm fɔ mo kɑ ǹ ci ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑtime Time kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ fɔndɑ jɛrɛbɛ ko bɑrɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ǹ ci Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu nɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ kuwɑ. À cii: Yesu ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ dɛnjɛ. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ tɔntɔnu. À cii: Ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
Yesu cɛ. À nɑ mei nɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ. Ǹ nɑ dɑnɑm di cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Himmɑ dɑm kɑ tunu. À gɑ kɑ n cɛɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ kɑɑ kɑ cetu hɑli jinɑ. À hɑme kɑ tunu kɑ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ifɔ no n go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ n sɛ? À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A Jinɑ, yɑ tɛ moo.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, n nɑɑne nɑ n nɑ bɑɑni.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑɑ. À nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ fɔndɑ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Betɑfɑji ndɑ Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ yom jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ǹ tɔ tɑndi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. À nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom jine. À mee gɑɑ wom di fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɔɑntɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑru ɑ̀ bɔm bɑ ce fɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ feeri kɑ kɑɑndɑ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wom hã: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ feeri, wom mɑ cii Kpe yɑ gundɑ ɑ̀ murɑdu. À gɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑkpɛ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ bine kpei. Ǹ nɑ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ gɑru tɛrɛ. À goono hɔɑntɛ hundi fɔ mee gɑɑ fɔndɔize fɔ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ cɛ nodi, ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom go fɑrikɑ binci di feeri?
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di cii ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ no fɔndɔ. Beerem di nɑ ǹ nɑm mo.
Ǹ kpeindɑ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ngei jiine yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Cɔfɔ Yesu kɑɑru ɑ̀ bɔm.
Bɔrɔ boobo mo nɑ ngei jiine yom dɑɑru fɔndɔ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑ tuuri kɔsu yom pɑti kɑ dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yesu jine ko kpei ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kɑ kɑɑ, ǹ kulu go kuwɑ kɑ cii: "Ikpɛ, i gɑ kɑ n sifɑ. Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ i bɑɑbɑ Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ. Ikpɛ, i gɑ kɑ n sifɑ, Ni, kɑ n goono bɛɛnɛ hɑli sɑmɑu."
Yesu huro Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ hurɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ moo cɛɛrɛ kɑ hɛ kulu gunɑ. Zɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ ɑ̀ hunu kɑ kpei Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ.
Mo bo sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ, Yesu mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ jee nyɑ fɔ hunne hɑli jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kɔsu. À mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ gunɑ hɑnibɑ ngɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ ize. À tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. À mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu gɑru ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɔsu, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci jee hɛiyom wɑtɛ.
À bine cii jee nyɑ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si n ize ŋmɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ pɑi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom di mɑɑ yɑ di.

Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, Yesu hurɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À sinti kɑ neerɑkɔ yom ndɑ deikɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di gɑɑrɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À nɑ nooru bɑrimekɔ yom tɑbulu yom hɑngɑsɑndi ndɑ gutu neerɑkɔei citɑ yom.
À mɑnɑ tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ hɛ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ hurɑ ndɑɑ̀ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ.
À nɑ ǹ cooɑndi kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "A gɔrɛ dɔ yɑ dimi kulu ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ nɑ". À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ? Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ "lɔkɔ zee yom ŋmɔne".
Kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mɑɑ yɑ di, ǹ ceeci zɑngɑ ngei mɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ǹ hɑmburu Yesu zɑmɑ jɑmɑ di kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, ɑ̀ hunu wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ.
Susubɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di gɑ bisɑ ǹ di jee nyɑ kɔgu kɑlɑ kɑɑji yom gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ hɔngɔ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ tɛ. À cii Yesu sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, gunɑ jee nyɑ di kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑli, ɑ̀ kɔgu.
Yesu tu coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ gundɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ ci wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii tɑndi kuku wɔ sɛ, gɑnɑ kɑ kɑm buulɑ wɔ kunɑ, de ɑkpɛ si siikɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ngɑ go cii yɑ tɛ, ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ.
À sɛ nɑ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑduwɑ kunɑ, wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑ wom du ɑ̀. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ wom sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ cɛ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ mɑ, de hɛ fɔ goono wom ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑme, wom mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom.
Ammɑ de wom si yɑɑfɑ, yɑ no wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ si wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom.
Ǹ ye kɑ kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ yɑɑli Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom, ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hini fɔ nɑ n gɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ? Mee yɑ nɑ n nɑ hini wɔ n mɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ?
Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mɑ ɑ wom hã hɛ fɔ, wom mɑ tu ɑ sɛ. Hɛɛ mo yɑ cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ gɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ.
Mirɑndiyomɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ, Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu dee wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ? Wɑ tu ɑ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi cɛrɛ gɑme kɑ cii: De i cii Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii, yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ sɛ i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑ cimi?
Ammɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu i mɑ cii yɑ di no? To. Ǹ go hɑmburu jɑmɑ di nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu tɑbɑi kɑ Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ.
Ǹ tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: I si bei. Yesu mɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ hɛɛ mɑ ɑ si cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ gɑ hɛ yom di tɛ ndɑ.

Yesu sinti kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom. À cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ lɛzɛ tuuri yom tilɑm. À nɑ ǹ kɑkɑ. À nɑ guusu fɔ fɑnsi lɛzɛ hɑri kɑnkɑmyom sɛ. À nɑ tɑndɑ fɔ mɑ tɛ. À nɑ lɛzɛ lɑmbuɑ dɑm hɑifɑri fɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑ nɑɑru. À kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni.
Sɑɑ kɑ tuuriizei kɔsuyom wɑtɛ tɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm hɑifɑri yom di dɔ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ zɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɔsu.
Hɑifɑri yom di nɑ bɑnyɑ dii kɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yeti kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
À ye kɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ mo kɑru bɔm gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ woo.
Lɑmbukpɛɑ ye kɑ ɑfɔ dɔntɔm kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ wɔ wi. Yɑ di nɑ ǹ tɛ bɑnyɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom kɑru. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom wi.
Lɑmbukpɛɑ gundɑ koo gudɑ fɔ, ɑ̀ binegɑnji. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ǹ dɔ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ kɑ cii: Ǹ gɑ ɑ koo wɔ bɛɛrɑndi.
Ammɑ hɑifɑri yom di cii ngei gɑme: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci tubukɔɑ. Wɑ kɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Tubuɑ mɑ ci i ŋmɔne.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii, kɑ cetu lɑmbuɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ lɑmbukpɛɑ kɑɑ tɛ dɑ? À kɑɑ hɑifɑri yom di wi kɑ lɑmbuɑ nɑ bɔrɔ ŋmɑni yom sɛ.
Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɑntumɑntɛ cii: Tondi kɑ fuu cinikɔ yom hungu, ngɑ yɑ tɛ mimbɑri cire tondi sintine.
Kpe dɔ no wɔne hunu. À tɛ mɑmɑci mo i moo yom sɛ. À nɑ ci wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
Ǹ bine ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑmmɑ ǹ hɑmburu jɑmɑ, zɑmɑ ǹ bei kɑ ngei gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ yɑɑse cii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm kɑ dirɑ.
Ǹ nɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɔntɔm Yesu dɔ ndɑ Hirodu bɑndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ sui ɑ̀ mee sendi yom kunɑ.

Kɑ ǹ kɑɑ cɔfɔ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bei kɑ ni yɑ ci cimikpɛ. N sindɑ bɑɑbɑɑ. N si kɑ iburɑdɑm yom tɑkɑri gunɑ. Ikpɛ fɔndɑ bɔm no n go cooɑndi ndɑ cimi. À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ bɑ, wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli? I mɑ bɑnɑ dee wɑlɑ i mɑ si bɑnɑ?
Zɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ munɑficitɛrɛ bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ sui? Wɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize fɔ yɑ di.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Mee bɔm nɑ ǹ tɛ nooru wɔ gɑɑ ndɑ jeeri wɔ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑisɑ ŋmɔne nɑ.
À gɑɑ nɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ Kɑisɑ hɛ yom nɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ, Ikpɛ hɛ yom mo Ikpɛ sɛ. Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ.
Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cii bukɔei tunɑndiyom si, kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii:
Coobɑɑbɑ, Moisi hɑntum i sɛ kɑ de bɔrɔ bɛɛrɛ bu kɑ wɛndɛ fɔ nɑm, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ koo nɑm, cɛɛnɑ mɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ kɑ du hɛiyom ndɑ, ngɑ bɛɛrɑ sɛ.
To. Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ iye goono. Sintine nɑ wɛndɛ fɔ zɑɑ. À bu. À mɑnɑ hɛi.
Ihinkɑntɛ nɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ. Ngɑ mɑ bu. À mɑnɑ hɛi. Ihinzɑntɛ mo yɑ di.
Bɔrɔ iye di kulu nɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi. Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ weibɔrɔ di mɑ bu.
Bukɔei tunɑndiyomɑ hine, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tunu ǹ kunɑ mee wɛndɑ nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ bɔrɔ iyɑ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ wɛndɛ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom gɑ dɛrɛ fɑ zɑmɑ wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri.
Sɑɑ kɑ bukɔei kɑɑ tunu ǹ si hiji, ǹ si hijɑndi. Ammɑ beerem bɑ goono zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.

Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom, tirɑ kɑ Moisi hɑntum kunɑ Ikpɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ kubu fɔ kunɑ kɑ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ". À nɑ ci wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ci bukɔ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ɑmmɑ bɑhunɑ yom ŋmɔne no. Ngɑ di sɛ wom goono dɛrɛyom beeri kunɑ.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ mɑ mɑɑ ǹ gɑ kɑkɔ. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu tu ǹ sɛ ihinno, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Meire yom kulu kunɑ wɔ fɔ yɑ ci meire sintine?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: "E Isirɑilɑ, Kpe i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ yɑ Kpe fɔlɔnku nɑ.
N mɑ bɑɑ Kpe n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ n bine kulu ndɑ n hundi kulu ndɑ n lɑsɑbu kulu, ndɑ n gɑɑbi kulu." Meire sintinɑ noyɑ.
Ihinkɑntɛ mɑ neyɑ: "N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm". Meire fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ wɔne yom.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À boori Coobɑɑbɑ. N nɑ cimi cii zɑmɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ goono. Afɔ ŋmɑni si kɑlɑ ngɑ.
Bɔrɔ mɑ bɑɑ Kpe ndɑ ngɑ bine kulu ndɑ ngɑ fɑhɑm kulu ndɑ ngɑ hundi kulu ndɑ ngɑ gɑɑbi kulu. Bɔrɔ mɑ bɑɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine mo zɑngɑ ngɑ bɔm. Wɔne bisɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ kukurɑntɛ kulu ndɑ sɑrɑɑ dimi dimi kulu.
Kɑ Yesu di Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔɑ tu ndɑ lɑɑkɑli, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑnɑ mooru Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ tu kɑ Yesu hã hɛ fɔ kpɛɛnɛ.
Yesu goono cooɑndiyom gɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Mɛtɛ nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go cii Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Dɑfidi ize no?
Dɑfidi bumbum sendi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ cii: Kpe cii ɑ Kpe sɛ, N mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee yom dɛcɛyom dɔ.
Dɑfidi bumbum go kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ no Kpe, yɑ di gɑɑ mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ci ɑ̀ ize? Jɑmɑ di kulu bine ye ndɑ hɑngɑ dɑmyom ɑ̀ sɛ.
Cɛbɛ di kunɑ no ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑ ǹ go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ kɑ yɑɑli ndɑ kpɛ kuku. Ǹ gɑ bɑɑ mo ǹ mɑ cini kɑ ngei fɔɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ.
Ǹ go bɑɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ Yuifu mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ jingɑru ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
Ǹ go weibɔrɔ sokonei hundi yom hɑibɑrikɑ yom ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ kuku tɛ ko himɑ zɑngɑ gɑnɑkɔ hinno yom. Ǹ gɑ ǹ ciiti ifutu futu kɑ jɑɑsɑ ǹ kulu.
Yesu gɔrɔ nooru jisiyom dɔ jine ko gunɑ zɑngɑ jɑmɑ gɑ nooru dɑm. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ boobo nɑ nooru boobo dɑm.
Weibɔrɔ sokoni tɑlikɑ fɔ mo kɑɑ. À nɑ tɑngɑ hinkɑ dɑm.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, weibɔrɔ sokoni tɑlikɑ wɔ nɑ nooru dɑm kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nooru dɑm nee.
Ngei wɔ ǹ nooru dɛcɛ bɔm no ǹ dɑm ɑmmɑ wei wɔ ɑ̀ dɑm ɑmmɑ wei wɔ ɑ̀ hinɑ no ɑ̀ dɑm. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ ndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, gunɑ kɑ di tondi yom wɔ dimi fɑ ndɑ cinɑri yom wɔ.
Yesu bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N gɑ di cinɑri bɑmbɑtɑ yom wɔ? Bɑ tondi fɔ si cindi tondi bɔm kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ see.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ gɔrɔ Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ bɔm Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ jine, Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Andɛrɛ, ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑmbu kɑ ɑ̀ hã.
Ǹ cii: Cii i sɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ yom wɔ kɑɑ tɛ? Alɑmu fɔ yɑ kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ yom wɔ bɑ tɔ?
Cɔfɔ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi.
Bɔrɔ boobo yɑ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Ǹ bine kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɛrɑndi.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ wɑngu yom bɑɑru ndɑ wɑngu yom kɔsɔngu, wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. Tilɑsi nɑ, nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ, ɑmmɑ beeniyom mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
Dimi kɑɑ tunu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ dimi. Kpetɛrɛ kɑɑ tunu kpetɛrɛ gɑɑ. Gɑndɑ zinji yom kɑɑ tɛ nungu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. Hɛrɛɛ ndɑ butugu kɑɑ tɛ. Hɛ nge yom di bɔnei sintiyom nɑ.

Ammɑ wom wɔ, wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ no ǹ kɑɑ wom bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom gɑɑbikoni yom jine ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
Sintine jinɑ kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ dimi yom kulu sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom kɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ, wom mɑ si dirigo ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ cii. Ammɑ wom mɑ sendi hɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom nɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ. À mɑnɑ ci wom yɑ gɑ sendi bɑ, ɑmmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑɑ cɛrɛ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi, bɑɑbɑ mo ngɑ koo. Koo yom mo kɑɑ tunu kɑ ngei bɑhɛi yom dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ǹ wi.
Ǹ kulu bine kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hini suuru kɑlɑ mee, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ kɑɑ tɑɑbi di kunɑ.

Andebi Dɑniɛlo sendi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ kɑ Ikpɛ fɛntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑlɑkɑ tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go coo, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑhɑm fɑ. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ gɑ cɛ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ si himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono. Sɑɑ kɑ wom go di ɑ̀ go cɛ nungu di kunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei tɑndi kuku yom bɔm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu yɔlɔ bɔm, ɑ̀ mɑ si zumbu kɑ huro ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ hɛ fɔ zɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɑri mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ye bɑndɑ kɑ ngɑ kpɛ zɑɑ.
Ammɑ kɑito weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ kunu ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑnɑndi hɑnu nge yom di.
Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom zuure mɑ si tɛ hɑrigu wɑtɛ.
Hɑnu nge yom di guruguze hɑnu no, guruguze kɑ ɑ̀ dimi mɑnɑ tɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sintiyom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑ hɑli kɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ. À dimi si tɛ mɑ pɑi.
De Kpe mɑnɑ hɑnu nge yom di dunguriɑndi, ǹ si bɑhunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ kɑɑ tɑɑbi yom di kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ suubɑntɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ hɑnu yom di dunguriɑndi.
Sɑɑ di no, bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ cii wom sɛ: Gunɑ, Mɛsiyɑ gɑ nee, wɑlɑ gunɑ, ɑ̀ go yɔngɔ, wom mɑ si ɑ̀ nɑ cimi.
Mɛsiyɑ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ tunu. Ǹ gɑ ɑlɑmu yom cɛbɛ ndɑ mɑmɑci yom hɑli de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ bɑ suubɑntɛ yom dɛrɑndi.
Ammɑ wom wɑ, wom mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm. Gunɑ, ɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kulu cii wom sɛ.
Ammɑ hɑnu nge yom di kunɑ tɑɑbi futu wɔ bɑndɑ, "weenu kɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ kube. Hɑndu si ngɑ kɑɑri no.
Hɑndɑriyɑize yom kɑɑ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri yom kɑɑ zinji."
À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ, Adɑmize go kɑɑ buru yom bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ deizɑ.
Sɑɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑmbɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ suubɑntɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci kulu meigu nungu kɑ goono kulu zɑ gɑndɑ mee kɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ mee.
Ammɑ wom mɑ dendeni yɑɑse kɑ jee nyɑ gɑ wom nɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ wom di ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ cɛnɑ yom gɑ kɔsu teji fiyo, wom go bei kɛdiɑ gɑ mɑɑni.
Yɑ nɑ, wom mɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ di hɛ nge yom di go tɛ wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gɑ mɑɑni mee gɑɑ noyɑ.
Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ zɑmɑni wɔne si beeni pɑi kɑlɑ de hɛ nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ.
Bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ kɑɑ beeni, ɑmmɑ ɑ sendi yom si beeni pɑi.
Ammɑ hɑnu ngɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si ɑ̀ bei, bɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ, bɑ Izɑ bumbum kɑlɑ Bɑɑbɑ ngɑ fɔ.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli. Wom mo bɑtu. Wom mo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ zɑmɑ wom si bei sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑcɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ.
À himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑru kɑ ngɑ hundi nɑm. À nɑ ngɑ hini nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom sɛ. À nɑ ɑfɔ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ gbei. À nɑ bɑtukɔɑ mo dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ bɑtu.
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ bɑtu zɑmɑ wom si bei sɑɑ kɑ hundikpɛ di kɑɑ kɑɑ, wiciri nɑ wɑlɑ ciini bindi nɑ wɑlɑ gɔrɔngɔ hɛni nɑ wɑlɑ susubɑ nɑ.
Hɑli bɑ ɑ kɑɑ mefɔ mefɔ ɑ mɑ si wom gɑru jiibi gɑɑ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ wɔ, bɔrɔ kulu sɛ no ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, wɑ bɑtu.
À cindi jiribi hinkɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru nɑ ndɑ Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru mɑ tɔ. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ceeci zɑngɑ ngei mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu dii ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ kɑ wi.
Ammɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ jingɑruɑ hine zɑmɑ yuguyugu mɑ si tɛ jɑmɑ kunɑ.

Yesu goono Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ Simɔ jire fɔ fuu kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑlibɑti. À mefɔ ndɑ wɑidi cɑɑdɑntɛ dimi fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ sɛ nɑdi. Weibɔrɔ di nɑ kɔlibɑ bɔgu kɑ wɑidi munu Yesu bɔm.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono fuu di kunɑ, ǹ bine tɔ. Ǹ cii cɛrɛ gɑme: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɑidi wɔ sɑrɑyom mɑɑsɑ?
À himɑ no dom ǹ mɑ wɑidi wɔ neerɑ jiiri fɔ bɑnɑndi sɑrɑ kɑ nooru di fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. Ǹ nɑ sendi ngɑ di bɔgu weibɔrɔ di bɔm.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbɑndi? Gbei hinno no ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
tɑlikɑ yom bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu. Sɑɑ kɑ wom bɑɑ kulu wom hini kɑ ihinno tɛ ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wei wɔ hinɑ, ngɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. A fijiyom wɑidi no ɑ̀ jinɑndi ɑ gɑɑ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ nungu kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ fɛɛ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee ǹ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ mo tɛ deede kɑ hɔngɔɑ̀.
À gɑɑ no Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑ̀ kpei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ Yesu dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
Kɑ ngei mɑ mɑɑ yɑ di, ǹ bine yee. Ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli zɑɑ kɑ ngei gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ. Yudɑ gɑ ceeci zɑngɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu sintinɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru di feeji wiyom tɔ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni nɑ n go bɑɑ i mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru sɔlu n mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
À nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei wɑngɑrɑ. Hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hoobu hɑri jɛrɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom kube. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Nungu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ɑ̀ hurɑ wom mɑ cii hundikpɛɑ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ cii, mɑni fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ zumbu kɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom?
À kɑɑ wom cɛbɛ jidɑmbisɑ beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ kɑ jisi. À kunɑ nɑ wom mɑ jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu i sɛ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kpei. Ǹ huro wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, Yesu kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di ngɑ bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di bine sinti kɑ sɑrɑ. Ǹ kulu gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hã ɑfɔ fɔ, bɔrɔ wɔne gɑ cii: Hɛɛ nɑ? Bɔrɔ wɔne go cii: Hɛɛ no?
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ wɔ kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm combu ɑ bɑndɑ.
Cimi nɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kpei ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize dɑm kɑmbɛ. À boori dɑm ǹ mɑ si ɑkpɛ hɛi pɑi.
Kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ, cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ. À cii: Wɑ tɑ, wɑ ŋmɑɑ. Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑhɑm.
À nɑ gulɑize fɔ mo zɑɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no ǹ sɛ. Ǹ kulu hɑm.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛyom ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ munu bɔrɔ boobo gurubi.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si lɛzɛ hɑri hɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ betu fɔ tɛ ǹ hunu kɑ kpei Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ bɔm.
À gɑɑ nɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kulu kɑɑ du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ ɑ gɑɑ ciini wɔ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A kɑɑ kurukɔ kɑru kɑ wi. Feeji yom kɑɑ kɑru kɑ see.
Ammɑ ɑ tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ, ɑ wom jinɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɑ de ǹ kulu du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si du.
Yesu mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cimi nɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, hunkunɑ bɑ ciini wɔ hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ jinde hinkɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ ye kɑ cii ndɑ gɑɑbi: Bɑ de yɑ bu n bɑndɑ nɑ, ɑ dee si n ze pɑi. Cindei mɑ kulu ci yɑ di.
Ǹ kɑɑ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ ci ɑ̀ sɛ Gɛtɑsemɑni. Yesu bine cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ gɔrɔ nee hɑli yɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
À nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ kɑnkɑm. À lɑɑkɑli tunu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Binesɛrɛ nɑ ɑ bine dii kɑlɑ ɑ tɔ bu gɑɑ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ nee kɑ bɑtu.
À kpei jinɑ cɛnɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ jɛndɛbiri kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À cii, de hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ nɑ, lɔkɑci wɔ mɑ mooru ngɑ.
À cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ, hɛ kulu yɑ hini kɑ tɛ n dɔ. N mɑ tɑɑbi wɔ moorɑndi ɑ gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ si cii hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ, kɑlɑ hɛ kɑ n bine gɑ bɑɑ.
Yesu bine kɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ go jiibi. À cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Simɔ, n go jiibi no? N mɑnɑ hini kɑ bɑtu guuru fɔ?
Wom mo bɑtu ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ, zɑmɑ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ. Bine gɑ bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm yɑ hinɑbunu nɑ.
À ye kɑ kpei. À nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ sendi fɔlɔnku yom di.
À bɛrɛ kɑ ye coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ. À ye kɑ ǹ gɑru jiibi gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom tim. Ǹ mɑnɑ bei zɑngɑ ngei tu ɑ̀ sɛ.
À kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinzɑntɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑnkulu wom jiibi kɑ hulɑnzom bɑ? À wɑsɑ. Lɔkɑci tɔ. Gunɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm dulumkoni yom kɑmbɛ.
Wɑ tunu, i mɑ kpei. Gunɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ tɔ kpɑɑrɑ.

Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go sendi, cɔfɔ Yudɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑɑ. Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom yɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm.
Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ nɑ jɑmɑ di no ɑlɑmu fɔ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum, ngɑ noyɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yudɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, Coobɑɑbɑ. À hiyɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum.
À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ bine nɑ tɑkubɑ hɑɑbu. À nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ beri kɑ hɑngɑ fɔ kɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom zɑngɑ zee.
Hɑnu kulu ɑ gɑ gɔrɔ wom gɑme ko cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ dii. Ammɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom mɑ tɔ sɛ no.
Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di kulu zuuru kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm.
Hɑiwɑsu fɔ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ ndɑ gurijinde. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ kɔmɑ kɑ zuuru bumbum kɑ ngɑ gurijindɑ nɑm.
Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ dɔ. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ kulu go meigu ɑ̀ dɔ.
Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu hɑmine zɑ nungu mooru kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑtɑ dɔ. À gɔrɔ hundi kunɑ gbeiteeri fɔ yom dɔ ko cɑɑni nini fɔ dɔ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kulu go sɛdɑ fɔ ceeci Yesu bɔm ngei mɑ du ɑ̀ kɑ wi. Ǹ bine mɑnɑ du ɑ̀.
Bɔrɔ boobo tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ Yesu bɔm ɑmmɑ ǹ sɛdɑ yom mɑnɑ sɑbɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom tunu kɑ tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Ǹ cii: I mɑɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ gɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ǹ cini ndɑ kɑmbɛ zeeri. Ngɑ gɑ iteji cini mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ kɑmbɛ jiribi hinzɑ gɑme.
Bɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ sɛdɑ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ tunu kɑ cɛ ǹ kulu jine. À nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: N si tu ndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu bɑ? Hɛ fɔ sɛdɑ beerem wɔ gɑ tɛ n bɔm?
Ammɑ Yesu go dɛnjɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii. Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Bɑrikɑkpɛ Izɑ bɑ?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci. Wom bine kɑɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ mo gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ gɑ kɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom bɔm.
À gɑɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ pɑti pɑti Yesu sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ. À cii: Sɛdɑ fɔ no i go bɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ?
Wom mɑɑ sendi yɑmɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi. Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ himɑ wɔm sɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑm ko yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ moojine dɑɑbu ko kɑ ɑ̀ lunkutɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Andebitɛrɛ tɛ. Dogɑri yom mɑ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm kɑ ɑ̀ dɛmbɛ dɛmbɛ.
Sɑɑ di Piɛɛ wɔ goono hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ, cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ gbeiize hundiyo yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑɑ.
À di Piɛɛ go cɑɑni. À nɑ Piɛɛ gunɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni bine, n goono Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu ze kɑ cii: A si ɑ̀ bei. A si fɑhɑm mo ndɑ hɛ kɑ n gɑ cii. Piɛɛ hunu hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei kɑtɑ dɔ. À gɑɑ no, gɔrɔngɔ cɑ jinde fɔ.
Gbeiize hundiyo fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. À sinti kɑ cii beerem kɑ ǹ goono nungu di sɛ: Bɔrɔ kpɛ beerem di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ.
Piɛɛ yɑɑrɑ kɑ Yesu ze. Hɑli cɛnɑ beerem di mo kɑ ǹ goono hundi kunɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Siikɑ si, ni mo n goono beerem di kunɑ zɑmɑ ni yɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ nɑ. Bɑ n dɛɛnɛ sendi gɑɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ n bei.
À gɑɑ nɑ, Piɛɛ sinti kɑ bɔm lɑɑliyom tɛ kɑ ze. À cii: A si bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ wom gɑ cii wɔ bei.
Cɔfɔ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinkɑntɛ. Bine Piɛɛ hɔngɔ sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ jinde hinkɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ. Kɑ Piɛɛ hɔngɔ ngɑ di ɑ̀ go hɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.

Kɑ mɑ bo mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jine yom meigu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kulu kɑ sɑwɑrɑ. Kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu hɔ, ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ Yesu kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Pilɑtu kɑmbɛ.
Pilɑtu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ni, n ci Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n cii.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ndɑ hɛ boobo, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii.
Pilɑtu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: N si tu bɑ? Gunɑ, hɛ boobo kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ n tɔnyɑ ndɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bihi kɑlɑ Pilɑtu mɑmɑci.
Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru kulu gɑɑ bine, Pilɑtu cini kɑsuize fɔ tɑm ǹ sɛ wɔ kɑ jɑmɑ bɑɑ ǹ mɑ tɑm.
Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑrɑbɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu kunɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ lɑɑbu fɔndɔ yom hunguɛ tɛ. Lɑɑbu fɔndɔ hunguɛ kunɑ nɑ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom wi.
Jɑmɑ di tunu ndɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ sinti ko kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ngei sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ dɔnɑ kɑ tɛ.
Pilɑtu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Yuifu yom Kpeɑ no wom bɑɑ yɑ tɑm wom sɛ?
Pilɑtu cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ cɛnsɛ yɑ nɑm gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ jɑmɑ di bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm ngei sɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
Pilɑtu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ no wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ wom go cɛɛ Yuifu yom Kpe?
Jɑmɑ di kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: À kɑnji. À kɑnji.
Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Ilɑlɔ fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ? Ammɑ ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii: À kɑnji. À kɑnji.
Kɑ Pilɑtu mɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ jɑmɑ wɔ bine kɑɑnɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm jɑmɑ di sɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu bulɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Wɑnguize yom kpeindɑ Yesu ciiti kɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑɑbikoni hundi kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ wɑnguize yom kuru fɔ kulu meigu ɑ̀ bɔm.
Ǹ no kpɛ siini kuku fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑriji cɛ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ kɑ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ sinti ko kɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ kɑ cii: Fɔɔ, Yuifu yom Kpe.
Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sɔtɛ bɔm gɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑri. Ǹ go yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ sɔmbu kɑ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ gɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ kpɛ siini di kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bumbum jiine yom dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ tɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Fɔndɔ bɔm ǹ kube ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Simɔ, Sileni bɔrɔ nɑ. Alɛsɑndi ndɑ Lufu bɑɑbɑ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu zɑ gɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ.
Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gologɑtɑ. À feeriji yɑ ci Bɔm Kurumbu nungu.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dufɛ ndɑ mire sɑfɑri dimi fɔ meiguɑntɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑm.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom fɑrisi. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ kɑ di hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu du.
Susubɑ guuru ɛgɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Ǹ nɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ hɑntum ɑ̀ bɔm dɔ kɑ cii: YUIFU YOM KPE.
Ǹ nɑ zee beeri hinkɑ fɔ mɑ kɑnji ndɑ Yesu. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mɑ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɑntumɑntɛ tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom sɛtɛ kunɑ".
Bisɑkɔ yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ woo kɑ cɔɔrɔ. Ǹ cii: E ni, n cii n hini kɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri kɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini jiribi hinzɑ gɑme.
N mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ kɑ zumbu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm.
Yɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom mo, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru ngei gɑme kɑ cii: À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom fɑɑbɑ fɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm fɑɑbɑ.
Wɑ nɑm Mɛsiyɑ, Isirɑilɑ Kpe ɑ̀ mɑ zumbu mɑɑsɑnkulu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm i mɑ di, i mɑ du kɑ cimi no ɑ̀ sɛ Zee beeri hinkɑ kɑ ǹ kɑnji ndɑ Yesu, ngei mo go kɑ ɑ̀ woo.
Sɑɑ kɑ weenu tɔ bɔm bindi, cɔfɔ kube tɛ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑlɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ.
Wiciri guuru hinzɑ di Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: "Eli, Eli lɑmɑ sɑbɑtɑni". À feeriji yɑ ci, "A ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ifɔ sɛ n zuuru ɑ gɑɑ"?
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ̀ go Eli cɛɛ.
ŋmɔne ɑfɔ bine zuuru ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ sɑku miti hɑri mɔrɔ kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ sɑɑri gɑɑ kɑ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ sumsum. À cii: Wɑ nɑm. I mɑ di hɑli Eli go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi no.
Ammɑ Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri fɔ kɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
À gɑɑ no Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑbude kɔɔtu ihinkɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ gɑndɑ.
Wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ goono Yesu jine. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu kuwɑ zɑngɑ yɑ kɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm, ɑ̀ cii: Siikɑ si Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ Ize no.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ yom mo goono hɑli jinɑ kɑ gunɑ. Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ goono ǹ kunɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yɑkɔfu cɛnɑ ndɑ Yose nyɑ ndɑ Sɑlome.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu goono Gɑlile lɑɑbu, weibɔrɔ yom di nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ ɑfɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ ziji Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Yesu bɑndɑ.
Wiciri tɔ kɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hulonzom hɑnu sɔluyom hine.
À sɛ no Yosɛfu Alimɑte kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ beeri fɔ no Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kunɑ. Ngɑ mo ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑtu. À hurɑ Pilɑtu dɔ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ Yesu bukɔɑ.
Mɑmɑci nɑ Pilɑtu dii hɑli Yesu bu kɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hã hɑli ɑ̀ jɛ kɑ bu.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ cimi jinehunɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ bukɔɑ no Yosɛfu sɛ.
Yosɛfu nɑ cɛsɛnjɛ dei. À nɑ Yesu kɑɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ gɑɑ kɑ cɛsɛnjɛ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tondi sɑɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ zozobu kunɑ. À nɑ tondi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mo gungure kɑ sɑɑrɛ di mee dɑɑbu.
Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Yose nyɑ, ǹ di nungu kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu dɑm.
Hulonzom hɑnuɑ bisɑ. Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Yɑkɔfu nyɑ ndɑ Sɑlome, ǹ nɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnekpɛ yom dei ngei mɑ kpei kɑkɑsu Yesu bukɔɑ gɑɑ.
Susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, ǹ kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɔ sɑɑ kɑ weenu hunu.
Ǹ go cii cɛrɛ gɑme, mee yɑ tondɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi i sɛ sɑɑrɛ di mee gɑɑ?
Tondi di beeri nɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ammɑ kɑ ǹ gunɑ ǹ di ǹ nɑ tɑndɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi.
Kɑ ǹ hurɑ sɑɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ di hɑiwɑsu fɔ ndɑ kpɛ kpɑrɛ kuku, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si mɑmɑci. Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu kɑ ǹ kɑnji, ngɑ no wom go ceeci. À tunu. À si nee. Wɑ di nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
Ammɑ wɑ kpei cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Piɛɛ sɛ Yesu go wom jinɑ ko kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ nungu di zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ.
Weibɔrɔ yom di hunu ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ǹ zuuru zɑ sɑɑrɑ dɔ. Gɑsiyom ndɑ mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ hɑmburu nɑ. [
Yesu tunu nɑ susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintinɑ hine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi. Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ sɛ no ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ hunutɛrɛ, weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɔllɛ iye gɑɑrɛ.
Mɑriɑmɑ ngɑ di kpei bɑɑru cii beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ dɑm goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ǹ bine gɑ sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ hɛ.
Ngei mɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ, Mɑriɑmɑ di ɑ̀ mɑ, mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑ̀ sendɑ gɑɑ.
À bɑndɑ nɑ Yesu hunutɛrɛ tɑkɑri ŋmɑni kunɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ fɔ sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ dirɑ fɔndɔ bɔm kɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu fɔ.
Bɔrɔ wɔne yom mo kpei deede cindei sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cimɑndi ngei mɑ sendɑ gɑɑ.
Hɑli cɛnɑ Yesu hunutɛrɛ iwei cindi fɔ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ ŋmɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm ndɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ndɑ ǹ gɔgɔsɛndɛ zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑkpɛ yom sendi gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ dimi kulu sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi mo, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Alɑmu yom neyɑ kɑ ǹ bo goono beerem kɑ ǹ nɑɑne bɑndɑ. A mɑɑ gɑɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ teji yom.
Ǹ kɑɑ gondi yom dii. Bɑ de ǹ kɑɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ wi hɑm, ɑ̀ si ǹ wi. Ǹ kɑɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ doorikom yom bɔm ǹ mɑ du bɑɑni.
Kɑ Kpe sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ beeni cɔfɔ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ sombu kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ. À gɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu kulu. Kpe goono ǹ bɑndɑ ko gbei tɛ ndei ko Sendɑ tɑbɑtɑndi ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ. Ami.]
E Teofilu, bɔrɔ boobo nɑ kokɑri tɛ kɑ bɛ yom kɑ ǹ tɛ i gɑme hɑntum, bɛ yom kɑ i go tɑbɑi.
Ǹ deede bɛ yom kɑ ngei di ndɑ moo zɑ sintine kom. Ǹ ci Ikpɛ sendi gbeiteeri yom mo kɑ bɑɑru di no i sɛ.
À sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ mo yɑ hɑntum n sɛ bɛ nge yom di bɔm zɑ ǹ sintiyom kɑlɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ gunɑ gunɑ cɑu cɑu.
Ni, ɑ jinɑ Teofilu, ɑ go hɑntum n sɛ zɑmɑ bɛ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ n cooɑndi ndɑ, n mɑ ǹ tɑbɑtɑndiyom bei.
Yude gɑndɑkpɛ Hirodu wɑtɛ, gɑrɑndikɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Zɑkɑri. Ngɑ ndɑ Abiɑ bɑrɑ no sɑrɑyom. À wɛndɛ mɑɑ no Elisɑbɛti. Ngɑ yɑ ci Aɑrɔ bɑndɑ fɔ.
Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kulu cɛɑntɛ susu yom no Ikpɛ jine. Ǹ go Kpe meire yom ndɑ ɑ̀ sendikpɑrɛ yom kulu gɑnɑ, tɑɑli si ǹ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ sindɑ koo zɑmɑ Elisɑbɛti sindɑ hɛiyom. Ǹ kulu mo yɑ zeeni.
Hɑnu fɔ Zɑkɑri go gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ tɛ Ikpɛ jine zɑmɑ ɑ̀ fuu gɑɑ no ɑ̀ tɔ.
Ndɑ zɑngɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ Zɑkɑri mɑ huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ wɑidi tɔnu kɑ sɑrɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ jɑmɑ kulu goono tɛrɛ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wɑidi tɔnuyom lɔkɑci di.
Cɔfɔ Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ Zɑkɑri sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ bɑndɑ tɑndɑ sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ wɑidi sɑrɑɑ.
Kɑ Zɑkɑri di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli tunu. Hɑmburu nɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑkɑri, n mɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑ. N wɛndɛ Elisɑbɛti kɑɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. N gɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ.
N kɑɑ fɑihã kɑ tɛ binekɑɑne. Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ fɑihã ɑ̀ hɛiyom sɑbu sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɛ bɔrɔ beeri Ikpɛ jine. À si dufɛ̃ hɑm, ɑ̀ si bɑji hɑm. À kɑɑ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bɑ zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gunde.
À gɑ Isirɑilɑ ize boobo bɛrɛ kɑ yeti Kpe dɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.

À kɑɑ dirɑ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ Eli biyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bɑɑbɑ yom bine yom bɛrɛ ǹ koo yom dɔ hɛrɛ. À gɑ Ikpɛ hunguɛkpɛ yom mo bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ cɛɑntɛ susuyom hɑikusutɛrɛ gɑnɑ. À kɑɑ jɑmɑ sɔlɑntɛ meigu Kpe sɛ mo.
Zɑkɑri cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sɛ: Ifɔ gɑɑ no, ɑ gɑ ngɑ di bei zɑmɑ ɑ zeeni. A wɛndɛ mɑ jiiri bɑ.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di tu Zɑkɑri sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ no Jibirilu. A go cɛ Ikpɛ jine. Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ kɑɑ sendi n sɛ kɑ bɑɑru hinno wɔ cii n sɛ.
Gunɑ, n kɑɑ tɛ bɛbɛ. N si du kɑ sendi kɑlɑ hɑnu nge yom di mɑ tɔ zɑmɑ n mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑ sendei gɑɑ. A sendi yom kɑɑ tɔ ngei lɔkɑci kunɑ.
Jɑmɑ di nɑ Zɑkɑri bɑtu. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ si hini kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ. Jɑmɑ di bei kɑ diyom fɔ no Zɑkɑri di Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Ndɑ kɑmbɛ no ɑ̀ sendi ǹ sɛ, ɑ̀ tɛ bɛbɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑɑ Zɑkɑri gbei hɑnu yom beeni, ɑ̀ kpei ngɑ fuu.
Jiribi nge yom di bɑndɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ Elisɑbɛti kunu. À hɑndu gu ɑ̀ go gum.
À go cii: Gomini no Kpe tɛ ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ moo dɔ gunɑ kɑ hɑwi wɔ kɑɑ ɑ gɑɑ beerem gɑme.
Hɑndu iduɑntɛ Ikpɛ nɑ dɔntɔneize Jibirilu dɔntɔm kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu, Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di kpei hundiyo fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑru bei dɔ. À sɔgɔ mo Dɑfidi dimi fɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yosɛfu. Hundiyɑ mo mɑɑ no Mɑriɑmɑ.
Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di huro nungu kɑ hundiyɑ goono, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ kɑ n fɔɔ, ni kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ n nɑ gomini. Kpe goono n bɑndɑ. Weibɔrɔ yom kunɑ n gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm.
Kɑ Mɑriɑmɑ mɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli tunu ɑ̀ sendɑ sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm hã hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɔɔyom wɔne dimi.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑriɑmɑ, si hɑmburu zɑmɑ gomini no n du Ikpɛ dɔ.
Gunɑ, n kɑɑ kunu. N kɑɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. N gɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑ Yesu.
À kɑɑ tɛ bɔrɔ beeri. Ǹ bine gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ ize. Kpe Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ cɛɛ Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ.
À kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom Yɑkɔfu dimei bɔm, beeniyom si. À kpetɛrɛ sindɑ mee.
Bine, Mɑriɑmɑ cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sɛ: A si hɑru bei, mɛtɛ ngɑ di tɛ kɑ tɛ?

Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ kɑɑ zumbu n bɔm. Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ dɑbɑri mɑ gɑ n dɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bicire. À sɛ no, ize hɑlɑɑlɑ di kɑ n kɑɑ hɛi, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ no Ikpɛ Ize.
Gunɑ, n nyɑize Elisɑbɛti ngɑ mo du koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kunu ɑ̀ zeene kunɑ. Elisɑbɛti kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ hɛiyom, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hɑndu iduɑntɛ kunɑ.
Ikpɛ cɛ, bɛ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ.
Mɑriɑmɑ mo cii: Gunɑ, hɛɛ yɑ Kpe kɔngɔ no. À mɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ zɑngɑ n mee wɔ nɑ ɑ̀ cii. Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di gɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
À gɑɑ nɑ Mɑriɑmɑ tunu kɑ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi tondi kuku yom dɔ Yude lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ.
Mɑriɑmɑ huro Zɑkɑri fuu kɑ Elisɑbɛti fɔɔ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Elisɑbɛti mɑɑ Mɑriɑmɑ fɔɔ di, cɔfɔ koo di kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ gunde kunɑ yɔgɔi. Elisɑbɛti mɑ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Elisɑbɛti kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm n gɑɑ weibɔrɔ yom kunɑ. Izeɑ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n gundɑ kunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Hɛɛ yɑ ci mee kɑ ɑ Kpe nyɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ?
Gunɑ, zɑ n ŋmɔne fɔɔyom di kɑm ɑ hɑngɑ, cɔfɔ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ gunde kunɑ yɔgɔi no ndɑ binekɑɑne.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne zɑmɑ hɛ yom kɑ Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ, ǹ kɑɑ tɔ.
Cɔfɔ Mɑriɑmɑ mɑ cii: A bine yɑ go Kpe bɛɛrɑndi.
A bine go fɑihɑ̀ mɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ, ɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ.
À nɑ ngɑ kɔngɔɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ gunɑ hɑli zɑmɑni yom kulu kɑɑ cii ɑ sɛ binekɑɑnekpɛ.
Dɑbɑri kulu Kpɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ beeri yom tɛ ɑ sɛ. À mɑɑ yɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ mo no.
À suujɑ mɑ bo dɑɑru zɑmɑni kɑ kpei zɑmɑni beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ bɔm.
À nɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ lɑsɑbu fɑɑri ŋmɔne yom ngei bine yom kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see.
À nɑ hinikpɛ yom zeeri zɑ ǹ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ yom bɔm. À nɑ tɑlikɑ yom bɛɛrɑndi.
À nɑ hɛrɛɛkomei kungɑndi ndɑ bɛ hinno yom. A nɑ hɑibɑrikɑntei mo tɑm kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
À nɑ Isirɑilɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ tɑm gɑɑ. À hɔngɔɑ̀ ndɑ ngɑ suuji, zɑngɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii i cɛɛ yom sɛ
ndɑ Abulɛmɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mo sɛ, beeniyom si.
Mɑriɑmɑ gɔrɔ Elisɑbɛti dɔ zɑngɑ hɑndu hinzɑ sɑrɑ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
À tɛ mo, Elisɑbɛti hɛiyom lɔkɑci tɔ. À nɑ kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi.
À gɔrɔkɑsine yom ndɑ ɑ̀ fuuize yom mɑɑ zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ngɑ suuji beeri cɛbɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kulu fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ Elisɑbɛti.
À kɑɑ tɔ jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɑ hine ǹ kɑɑ kɑ izecire di dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ tɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Zɑkɑri, ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ cii, Awo. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ.
Ngei mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N dimi yom kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sindɑ mɑɑ wɔ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ sɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hã ɑ̀ mɑ cii zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ koo di no mɑɑ.
Zɑkɑri cii ǹ mɑ ngɑ nɑ hɑntumyom dɔ. À nɑ wɔne hɑntum ɑ̀ gɑɑ: Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ mɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu mɑmɑci.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Zɑkɑri meeɑ fiti. À dɛɛnɑ kɔrɔfɑ feeri hɑli ɑ̀ go sendi ko kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ.
Ǹ gɔrɔkɑsine yom kulu hɑmburu. Nungu kulu Yude lɑɑbu tɑndi kukuei cɛsuɑntɛ, beerem nɑ bɛ nge yom di fɑɑji tɛ.
Beerem kulu mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di. Ǹ nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ngei bine yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ no koo wɔ kɑɑ ci? Kpe kɑmbɛ bine goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
À bɑɑbɑ Zɑkɑri mo tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cii:
I mɑ Kpe, Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sifɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm ngɑ jɑmɑ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ fɑnsɑ.
À nɑ fɑɑbɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ fɔ mo tunɑndi i sɛ ɑ̀ tɑm Dɑfidi dimi kunɑ.
Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ sendi ngɑ ɑndebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom mee gɑɑ zɑ dom zɑmɑni yom kunɑ.
À cii ɑ̀ mɑ i kɑɑ i ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑmbɛ ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ binei gɑ hungu i yom.
A mɑ suuji tɛ mɑ I cɛɛ yom sɛ. A mo hɔngɔ ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli hɑlɑɑlɑ,
ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ zeyom I cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ.
À mɑ i kɑɑ mɑ i ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑmbɛ, hɑli i mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, hɑmburu si.
I mɑ dirɑ ɑ̀ jine hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kunɑ jiribi yom kulu kɑ i go hunɑ.
Oò, ni mo ɑ koo, ǹ gɑ n cɛɛ Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu ɑ ŋmɔne ɑndebi. Kpe jine nɑ n kɑɑ dirɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ yom sɔlu.
N gɑ ɑ̀ jɑmɑ nɑ fɑɑbɑ beiyom ǹ dulum yom yɑɑfɑyom gɑɑ.
Fɑɑbɑ wɔ hunu Ikpɛ bine suuji dɔ. Suuji kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑɑri fɔ zɑngɑ mɑ boyom kɑɑri kɑɑ i dɔ zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
Ngɑ mɑ yɑ kɑɑ kɑɑri beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ kube kunɑ ndɑ bu bicire kunɑ. À gɑ i cee yom dɑm bɑɑni fɔndɔ kunɑ.
Koo di beeri ko du gɑɑbi biyɑ kunɑ. À gɔrɔ gɑnji yom kunɑ kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ Isirɑilɑ izei sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ hɑnu nge yom di meire fɔ hunu Kɑisɑ Agusitu dɔ ǹ mɑ kɑbukɑbu tɛ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ lɑɑbu yom kulu mee ndɑ mee.
Kɑbukɑbu sintinɑ tɛ no sɑɑ kɑ Kirim go ci Siriɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni.
Bɔrɔ kulu kpei ngɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ngɑ mɑɑ no.
Yosɛfu mo tunu zɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. À kpei Yude lɑɑbu Dɑfidi kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɛtɛlɛm. Yosɛfu yɑ Dɑfidi bɑndɑ no, Dɑfidi dimi mo no.
À kpei kɑ ngɑ mɑɑ no, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundiyo Mɑriɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kunu.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono nodi, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ hɛiyom lɔkɑci tɔ.
Mɑriɑmɑ no ngɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine hɛi. À nɑ ɑ̀ didiji ndɑ fɑtɑlɑ fɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnɑndi gɑribɑ fɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ tɛrɛ si yo yom fuuɑ kunɑ.
Lɑɑbu di kunɑ memunu kurukɔ yom goono gɑnji kunɑ ko kɑni. Ǹ go kɑ ngei memunu yom bɑtu ciini.
Cɔfɔ Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ ǹ sɛ. Kpe deizɑ hɑɑgɑ kɑ ǹ hundi. Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si hɑmburu zɑmá wɑ gunɑ, bɑɑru hinno no ɑ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ. Bɑɑru wɔ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ.
Hunkunɑ no Dɑfidi kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ nɑ fɑɑbɑkɔ bei wom sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Kpe Mɛsiyɑ.
Wɔne yɑ ci ɑlɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom gɑ ɑ̀ bei. Wom kɑɑ di izecire kɑ ǹ nɑ fɑtɑlɑ fɔ didiji ɑ̀ gɑɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnɑndi gɑribɑ fɔ kunɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize bɑkɑrɑ fɔ kɑɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ di gɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ. Ǹ cii:
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne. Bɑɑni mo goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm beerem gɑme kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ mɑɑ kɑɑni ǹ dɔ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom gɑnɑ kurukɔei dɔ kɑ ye bɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ kurukɔei mo cii cɛrɛ sɛ: I mɑ kpei Bɛtɛlɛm kɑ di bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, bɛ wɔ kɑ Kpe nɑ i no ɑ̀ bɑɑru.
Ǹ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ǹ nɑ Mɑriɑmɑ ndɑ Yosɛfu gɑru nodi ndɑ izecire di, ɑ̀ go kɑni gɑribɑ fɔ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ deede sendi kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ǹ sɛ kɑ simbɑ koo di.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ mɑɑ deede di mɑmɑci ndɑ bɛ kɑ memunu kurukɔei go cii ǹ sɛ.
Mɑriɑmɑ mo go kɑ ngɑ di kulu jɛ kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ngɑ bine kunɑ.
Memunu kurukɔ yom di ye. Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ko kɑ ɑ̀ sifɑ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ di zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize nɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ.
Jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɛ tɔ kɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ di dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ dɑm Yesu, mɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ kunu zɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Mɑriɑmɑ hinnɑndiyom jiribi yom kube ndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ goono ndɑ, Yosɛfu ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ nɑ koo di zɑɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ koo di Yerusɑlɛm zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ Kpe sɛ.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɛ kɑ ǹ hɑntum Kpe fɔndɑ kunɑ goono ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine kulu, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi nɑ Kpe sɛ".
Ǹ kpei mo kɑ gɑrɑndi kɑ ǹ hɑntum Kpe fɔndɑ kunɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ "kɔlɛnjɛ hinkɑ wɑlɑ gutu hinkɑ".
Gunɑ mo, bɔrɔ fɔ goono Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Simeyɔ. Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu fɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. À go kɑ Isirɑilɑ Yɑmɑrɑndikɔ bɑtu. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑ ngɑ wɔ si bu kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ di Kpe ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ jinɑ.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bine nɑ bɔrɔ di boi kɑ kpeindɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Yesu hɑikusu yom mɑ kpeindɑ Yesu zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑngɑ fɔndɑ ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ.
À gɑɑ no Simeyɔ nɑ koo di tɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. À cii:
Mɑɑsɑnkulu Kpe, n mɑ tu n bɑnyɑ mɑ kpei ndɑ bɑɑni zɑngɑ n Sendɑ cii.
A di n fɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ moo,
fɑɑbɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu hɑndunyɑ kulu jine.
Kɑɑri yɑ kɑɑ hɛ kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ dimi yom sɛ. Deizɑ mo no n jɑmɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Isirɑilɑ.
Mɑmɑci nɑ Yosɛfu ndɑ Yesu nyɑ dii ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ bɔm.
Simeyɔ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ nyɑ Mɑriɑmɑ sɛ: Gunɑ, ǹ nɑ koo wɔ no Isirɑilɑ ize boobo kɑmyom ndɑ ǹ tunuyom sɛ. À kɑɑ tɛ ɑlɑmu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ hunguɑ̀.
Oò, ni bumbum mo, tɑkubɑ gɑ n hundɑ gooru zɑmɑ bine boobo lɑsɑbu yom mɑ hunutɛrɛ.
Andebi weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Annɑ, Fɑnuɛli koo hundiyo no. Asɑre dimi no. Weibɔrɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni. À hundiyotɛrɛ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ndɑ ngɑ kunye jiiri iye.
À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ sokoni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ zeene tɔ jiiri wɑhɑku cindi tɑɑci. À mɑnɑ gɑnɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ndɑ meehɔ ndɑ ɑduwɑ.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Kpe sɑɑbu kɑ Yesu sendi tɛ beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ go bɑtu Ikpɛ mɑ Yerusɑlɛm fɑnsɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Kpe fɔndɑ cii tɔnɑndi, ǹ ye Gɑlile lɑɑbu hɑli ǹ kpɑɑrɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu.
Kɑɑ di gɑ beeri ko du gɑɑbi biyɑ kunɑ. À gɑ tɔ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Ikpɛ gomini mɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Jiiri kulu mo ɑ̀ hɑikusu yom cini kpei Yerusɑlɛm Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru kulu gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu tɔ jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑikusu yom kpei Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ zɑngɑ jingɑru di ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ jingɑru jiribi yom tɔnɑndi, ǹ go ye ngei kpɑɑrɑ ɑmmɑ Yesu wɔ gɔrɔ Yerusɑlɛm. Yosɛfu ndɑ Yesu nyɑ mɑnɑ bei.
Ǹ go tɑmmɑ ɑ̀ goono nɑɑrukɔ boobo di kunɑ. Ǹ tɛ jiribi fɔ fɔndɔ, cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ngei nyɑize yom dɔ ndɑ ǹ kpɑɑsi yom dɔ.
Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀, ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm kɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ ceeci.
À kɑɑ tɔ jiribi hinzɑ bɑndɑ, ǹ di ɑ̀ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À gɑ gɔrɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom bindi kunɑ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ ko kɑ ǹ hã sendi.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ, mɑmɑci go kɑ ǹ kulu dii ndɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm di ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go tu kɑ yeti beerem di sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑikusu yom di ɑ̀, mɑmɑci nɑ nge yom mo dii. Cɔfɔ nyɑ di ci: Koo wɔ, ifɔ sɛ ǹ tɛ i sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ dɑ? Gunɑ, hɛɛ ndɑ n bɑɑbɑ i lɑɑkɑli kulu tunu. I go dirɑ kɑ n ceeci.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ ceeci? Wom mɑnɑ bei kɑ kɑlɑ de yɑ ɑ sɑɑlu wi ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom gɑɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii ǹ sɛ.
Yesu zuli ǹ bɑndɑ kɑ kpei Nɑzɑrɛtu. À gɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ǹ sɛ. À nyɑ go hɛ yom wɔ kulu kɑ ǹ tɛ jɛ ngɑ bine kunɑ.
Yesu go beeri hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ beerem jine.

Kɑisɑ Tiberi kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑyom jiiri wei cindi guɑntɛ, sɑɑ di no Pɔnse Pilɑtu mo go ci Yude gɑndɑkpɛ. Hirodu go ci Gɑlile lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni. À cɛɛnɛ Filipu mo go ci Iture lɑɑbu ndɑ Tɑkoni lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni. Lisɑniɑ mo go ci Abilɛm lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni.
Hɑnɑnu ndɑ Kɑifɑ mo go ci gɑrɑndikɔ beeri yom. Sɑɑ di no Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑɑ Zɑkɑri koo Yohɑnnɑ sɛ gɑnji kunɑ.
Yohɑnnɑ kpei lɑɑbu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yudum isɑ ko bɑɑru fɛɛ. À go cii beerem mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ kɑ du mirɑndiyom.
Zɑngɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ. À jinde cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɔ sɔlu tɛ. Wɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔize yom cɛɑndi.
Ǹ kɑɑ gooru lutu. Tondi kuku kulu ndɑ gure beeri kulu, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Nungu kɑ ɑ̀ siiri, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi susu. Fɔndei kɑ ǹ gundɑ gure ndɑ lɔmɑ, ǹ gɑ ǹ bɑndɑ sɑsɑbɑndi.
Iburɑdɑm kulu kɑɑ di Ikpɛ fɑɑbɑ.
À cii jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngei mirɑndi sɛ: Gɑzɑmɑ dimi yom, mee yɑ nɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru wom mɑ zuuru binetɔnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ sɛ?
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ wom tɛgbei yom cɛbɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ tuubiyom. Wom mɑ si sinti ko cii wom bine kunɑ: I gundɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ. A gɑ cii wom sɛ Ikpɛ hini kɑ tondi yom wɔ bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ ize yom Abulɛmɑ sɛ.
Ǹ bine nɑ deesi dɑm tuurinyɑ yom kɑɑji gɑɑ kɔ. Ngɑ di sɛ tuurinyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si ize hinno hɛi, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumbu ko cetu nini kunɑ.
Jɑmɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: De yɑ di no, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ dɑ?
À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kpɛ jinde hinkɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ nɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ŋmɑɑri mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ yɑ di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ sɛ.
Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngei mirɑndi. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ dɑ?
Yohɑnnɑ mo tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ si bɑ tɑ kɑ bisɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ mɑ tɑ.
Wɑnguize yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: I yom mo bine, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ dɑ? Yohɑnnɑ tu ngei mo sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ si kɔm ko tɑ. Wom mɑ si bɔrɔ tɔnyɑ. Wom bine mɑ yee ndɑ wom bɑnɑndi.
Ammɑ jɑmɑ di goono bɑtuyom gɑɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑ go lɑsɑbu ngei binei kunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ hɑli ngɑ no Mɛsiyɑ di.

Cɔfɔ Yohɑnnɑ tu ǹ kulu sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go wom mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛɛ gɑɑbi. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ngɑ wɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ nini mɑ.
À funsu gɑɑsu goono ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À gɑ ngɑ fɑruyom dɔ hinnɑndi sã sã kɑ ngɑ mɔsɔngu dɑm boo. Ammɑ duuɑ wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu ndɑ nini kɑ ɑ̀ si wi.
Ndɑ himmɑ noyom boobo kpɛɛnɛ no Yohɑnnɑ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ jɑmɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ Yohɑnnɑ deeni Hirodu kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɑ Filipu wɛndɛ Hirodɑ zɑɑ. Yohɑnnɑ deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gbei lɑlɔ yom kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ sɛ.
Hirodu nɑ wɔne tɔntɔnu ilɑlɔ kulu bɔm sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dii kɑ dɑm kɑsu kunɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ go beerem kulu mirɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu mo mirɑndi. Kɑ Yesu go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ cɔfɔ bɛɛnɛ feeri.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo zumbu ɑ̀ bɔm zɑngɑ gutu. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. N gɑɑ no ɑ du ɑ binekɑɑne.
Yesu bumbum gundɑ jiiri wɑrɑnzɑ sɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti ko cooɑndi. Beerem go tɑmmɑ Yosɛfu koo no, Yosɛfu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Heli ize,
Mɑtɑtu ize, Lefi ize, Mɑliki ize, Yɑnnɑ ize, Yosɛfu ize,
Mɑtɑtiɑ ize, Amosu ize, Nɑhumɑ ize, Esiliɑ ize, Nɑgɑi ize,
Mɑɑtu ize, Mɑtɑtiɑ ize, Semɑi ize, Yosɛfu ize, Yudɑ ize,
Yoɑnɑ ize, Lezɑ ize, Zorobɑbe ize, Sɑlɑtilu ize, Neli ize,
Mɑliki ize, Adi ize, Kosɑm ize, Elimodɑm ize, Erɑ ize,
Yose ize, Eliezu ize, Yorim ize, Mɑtɑtu ize, Lefi ize,
Simeyɔ ize, Yudɑ ize, Yosɛfu ize, Yonɑm ize, Eliɑkim ize,
Meleɑ ize, Mennɑ ize, Mɑtɑtu ize, Nɑtɑm ize, Dɑfidi ize,
Yɑsɑi ize, Obe ize, Boɑzu ize, Sulumi ize, Nɑɑsɑm ize,
Aminɑdɑbu ize, Arɑm ize, Esirɑm ize, Fɑresi ize, Yudɑ ize,
Yɑkɔfu ize, Isɑɑkɑ ize, Abulɛmɑ ize, Tɑrɑ ize, Nɑkoru ize,
Seruku ize, Tɑgɑu ize, Fɑleku ize, Eberu ize, Sɑlɑ ize,
Kɑinɑm ize, Afɑkɑdu ize, Sem ize, Nowe ize, Lɑmeku ize,
Mɑtusɑlɑ ize, Henoku ize, Yɑredu ize, Mɑleyɑ ize, Kɑinɑm ize,
Enosu ize, Setu ize, Adɑmu ize, Ikpɛ ize.
Yesu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Yudum isɑ dɔ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ boi ko kpeindɑɑ̀ gɑnji kunɑ.
Nungu di nɑ Ibilisi go kɑ ɑ̀ sui jiribi weitɑɑci. À mɑnɑ bɛ fɔ kulu ŋmɑɑ jiribi nge yom di kulu. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kube jiribi weitɑɑci ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɛrɛɛ.
Cɔfɔ Ibilisi cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ni Ikpɛ Ize no, cii tondi wɔ mɑ bɛrɛ buuru.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "Bɔrɔ si hunɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri hinne, ɑmmɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ kulu".
Ibilisi kpeindɑ Yesu tɑndi kuku fɔ bɔm. Moo miilɑ fɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpetɛrɛ yom kulu.
Ibilisi cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ n no hini wɔ kulu ndɑ kpetɛrɛ yom wɔ deizɑ zɑmɑ hɛɛ no ǹ no ndɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ bɑɑ sɛ.
Bine de n nɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi ɑ̀ kulu ye n ŋmɔne.
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ ye ɑ bɑndɑ, Setɑm. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "N mɑ Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Kpe bɛɛrɑndi. N mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ngɑ hinne sɛ."
Ibilisi bine kpeindɑ Yesu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ yɔlɔ bɔm. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ni Ikpɛ Ize no, n mɑ zimbi gɑndɑ zɑ nee.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom no fɔndɔ ǹ mɑ n hɑlɑsi.
Ǹ gɑ n tɛmbɛ ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ n cee mɑ si sɑm tondi gɑɑ."
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii, "N mɑ si Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Kpe, sui".
Sɑɑ kɑ Ibilisi nɑ suiyom kulu beeni, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ fee ndɑ Yesu bɑndɑ fɔ.
Yesu ye kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɑbɑri kunɑ. À bɑɑru mo hunu lɑɑbu di mee ndɑ mee kulu.
Yesu go cooɑndi ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Ǹ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Yesu kɑɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ biiri. Ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ, ɑ̀ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine. À tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ coo.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ tirɑ kɑ Esɑyi hɑntum sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri, ɑ̀ di nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii:

"Kpe Biyɑ goono ɑ bɔm. À sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ tɑlikɑ yom wɑɑzu ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno. À nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bine yom go sɑrɑ no bɑɑni. À nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm mo yɑ kɑɑ feeriyom bɑɑru no tɑm yom sɛ. À mɑ dɑnɑm yom no moo. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ kɑnkɑm, yɑ ǹ feeri kɑ tɑm.
Yɑ Kpe jiiri gomini bɑɑru fɛɛ."
À gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tirɑ di dɑɑbu. À nɑ ɑ̀ yeti Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu di gbeiteeri fɔ sɛ kɑ gɔrɔ. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ nɑ moo sinji Yesu gɑɑ.
Yesu sinti kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi wɔ kɑ wom mɑɑ, hunkunɑ no ɑ̀ tɔ.
Ǹ kulu go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ. Ǹ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ sendi kɑɑnɔ yom kɑ ǹ go hunu ɑ̀ mee. Ǹ go cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ Yosɛfu koo no. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Siikɑ si, wom gɑ ɑ yɑɑse zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ kɑ cii: Sɑfɑrikpɛ wɔ n mɑ n bɔm sɑfɑru. Hɛ yom kulu kɑ i mɑɑ ǹ cii n go tɛ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ, n mɑ ǹ tɛ nee wɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci n lɑɑbu.
Bine Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ǹ si ɑndebi kulu tɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑbu kunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, sokoni boobo goono Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu Eli wɑtɛ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ bɛɛnɛ dɑɑbu hɑli jiiri hinzɑ ndɑ hɑndu idu. Hɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ mɑ lɑɑbu di kulu kunɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Eli dɔntɔm sokonei bɑ ɑfɔ dɔ kɑlɑ Sidom lɑɑbu sokoni fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Sɑletɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Elise wɑtɛ mɑ nɑ jire boobo goono Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɑ ɑfɔ hinnɑndi kɑlɑ Nɑɑmɑnu, Siriɑ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛ nge yom di, cɔfɔ ǹ tɔ ndɑ bine fute.
Ǹ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu hɑli tondi kuku fɔ hɑngɑ gɑɑ, tɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ nɑ ngei kpɑɑrɑ tɛ zɑmɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ jindo gɑndɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ bindi kunɑ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ.
Yesu kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. À go beerem cooɑndi hulonzom hɑnu yom hine.
Bɔrɔ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu cɛbɛ di zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sendi gundɑ hini.
Ǹ mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ. À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri.
À cii: Wɑ i nɑm. Ifɔ yɑ goono ni ndɑ i yom gɑme Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu? N kɑɑ n mɑ i hɑlɑci no? A go kɑ n bei. Ni yɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
Yesu deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Dɛnjɛ. N mɑ hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ bɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ kɑ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ.
Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ go sendi cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Sendi fɔ dimi no wɔne? A go mei ndɑ hini ndɑ dɑbɑri hɔllɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ go hunu mo.
Yesu bɑɑru gɑ kpei lɑɑbu di hundɑntɛ kulu.
Yesu tunu kɑ hunu Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei huro Simɔ fuu. Simɔ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse futu fɔ. Ǹ nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ.
Yesu gungum ɑ̀ bɔm. À deeni gɑɑwɑse gɑɑ, cɔfɔ gɑɑwɑse di bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ weibɔrɔ di tunu kɑ ǹ yɑrɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ weenu gɑ kɑm beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gundɑ doorikom yom kɑ ǹ gɑ tɑɑbi ndɑ dɑɑri ŋmɑni ŋmɑni, ǹ kɑɑndei Yesu dɔ. À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ kulu bɔm ɑfɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ bɑɑni.
Hɔllɛ yom mo go hunu bɔrɔ boobo bɑndɑ ndɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ cii: Ni yɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ Ize. Yesu mɑ deeni ǹ gɑɑ. À si tu ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ sendi zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ bei kɑ ngɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ.
Kɑ mo go bo Yesu hunu kɑ kpei gɑnji kunɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo go huro ɑ̀ ceeciyom gɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ jɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si gɑnɑ ngei dɔ.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Kɑlɑ de, yɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ bɔm wɑngɑrɑ cindei mɑ sɛ. À sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
À bine gɑ wɑɑzu mo Gɑlile lɑɑbu Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu goono ko cɛ Gɛnɛsɑrɑtɑ buulɑ mee gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo di go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnkɑm zɑmɑ ngei mɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu di hɑrihi hinkɑ goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ. Sɔrɔkɔ yom bine yɑ hunu ǹ kunɑ ko kɑ ngei tɑɑru yom nyunu.
Yesu huro hɑrihi hinkɑ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Simɔ sɛ. À nɑ Simɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu jobu gɑɑ cɛnɑ. À go gɔrɔ hɑrihi di kunɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di cooɑndi.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu cɛ ndɑ sendɑ cɔfɔ ɑ cii Simɔ sɛ: Tɔ jinɑ bɑrɑ bindi kɑ n tɑɑru hiri kɑ du ciifi.
Ammɑ Simɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A Jinɑ, i nɑ gbei tɛ ciini kulu. I mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu dii. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu n sendɑ bɔm ɑ gɑ ɑ tɑɑru biri.
Kɑ Simɔ nɑ tɑɑru di hiri, ǹ nɑ ciifi boobo fɔ dimi kuu. Cɔfɔ tɑɑru di gɑ pɑti.
Ǹ nɑ kɑmbɛ tɛ ngei kpɑɑsi yom sɛ wɔ kɑ yom goono hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngei gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑ kɑ hɑrihi hinkɑ di tɔnɑndi ndɑ ciifi kɑlɑ ǹ gɑ jisi.
Kɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ di ngɑ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sɔmbu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, mooru hɛɛ zɑmɑ hɛɛ yɑ dulumkoni no.
Mɑmɑci nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ dɔ dii ciifɑ diire kɑ ǹ go tɛ di sɑbu sɛ.
Yɑ no bɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ, Zɑbɑdi koo yom kɑ ǹ ci Simɔ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ. Yesu bine cii Simɔ sɛ: Si hɑmburu. Zɑ mɑɑsɑ n kɑɑ tɛ bɔrɔ ceecikɔ.
Kɑ hɑrihi yom di tɔ jobu gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu goono wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ, cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ jiretɛrɛ boosu ɑ̀ gɑɑ, di Yesu. À kɑɑ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ. À ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, de n bɑɑ n hini kɑ ɑ hinnɑndi.
Yesu mo nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ. À cii: A go bɑɑ. N mɑ hinne. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ jiretɛrɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑ cii: N mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ kpei kɑ n bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ sɛ. N mɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii di tɛ n hinneyom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu bɑɑru kɑ simbɑ Yesu go hunu kɑ tɔntɔnu. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ meigu kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ du bɑɑni mɑ ngei dɑɑri yom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ kpei gɑnji kunɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.

À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu go cooɑndi hɑnu fɔ, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go gɔrɔ nungu di. Ǹ hunu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom kunɑ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Kpe dɑbɑri hunutɛrɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ bɑɑni.
Bine bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑndɑ mɔngɔlɔ fɔ dɑɑri cɛnɑ bɔm. Ǹ go wetere ngei mɑ huro fuu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Yesu jine.
Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du nungu kɑ hɛrɛ bɑndɑ ngei mɑ huro ndɑ, bɔrɔ bɑyom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑru fuu di bɛɛnɛ kɑ mɔngɔlɔ di zumɑndi dɑɑri cɛnɑ bɔm fuu fune fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ Yesu jine.
Kɑ Yesu di ǹ nɑɑne, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.

Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom sinti kɑ lɑsɑbu ngei bine yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ cii: Mee nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi? Mee yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom de ɑ̀ nɑ ci Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ?
Bine zɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei, ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom gɑ lɑsɑbu wom bine yom kunɑ?
Wɔ fɔ yɑ fɑɑlɑ kɑ bisɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ cii ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom wɑlɑ tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ dirɑ?
Ammɑ wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gundɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ cii mɔngɔlɔ wɔ sɛ: A go cii n sɛ, tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ. N mɑ kpei fuu.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ cɛ ǹ kulu jine. À nɑ dɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ̀ kɑni zɑɑ kɑ kpei fuu. Kpeiyom gɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii hɑli ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ko cii: I di mɑmɑci hɛ yom hunkunɑ.
Nge yom di bɑndɑ Yesu hunu fuu di kunɑ. À di ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lefi kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ bɑɑlici ɑlikɑsi tɑyom dɔ. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɛ kulu nɑm. À tunu kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
Lefi nɑ yɑrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ngɑ fuu kunɑ. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ ŋmɑni yom mo go gɔrɔ ko ŋmɑɑ ndei.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go gunugunu Yesu coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom go ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑɑni si bɑɑ lokotoro kɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɑɑni.
Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi ɑmmɑ dulumkoni yom.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cini meehɔ zɑɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Yɑ mo no Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ɑmmɑ ǹ ŋmɔne yom go ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm. Ifɔ sɛ no?
Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Wom hini kɑ nɑm hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi yom mɑ meehɔ zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑruhiji goono ndei bɑ?
Ammɑ hɑnu yom kɑɑ kɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑruhiji di zɑɑ ǹ dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑ meehɔ zɑɑ hɑnu nge yom di.
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne tɛ ǹ sɛ mo kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ si zɑrɑ teji dumbɑri dɑm jiine zeenɔ gɑɑ zɑmɑ zɑrɑ tejɑ kɑɑ pɑti. Izeenɔ mɑ si sɑbɑ ndɑ iteji.
Yɑ no bɔrɔ si dufɛ̃ teji dɑm hɑmburu zeenɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ dufɛ̃ gɑ ǹ bɔgu no. Dufɛ̃ di kɑɑ bɑmbɑri. Hɑmburu yom mo sɑrɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ gɑ dufɛ̃ teji dɑm hɑmburu teji kunɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑ kɑimɑ.
Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm kɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ dufɛ̃ teji zɑmɑ ɑkpɛ go cii izeenɔ di yɑ kɑɑni kɑ bisɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ hulonzom hɑnu hinkɑntɛ hine hɑndu kunɑ Yesu go fɑri yom tooru kɑ bisɑ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑ go cɛtɛ yom pɑti kɑ wɔɔrɔ ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ tɛ hulonzom hɑnu bine?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom coo bɑ, bɛ kɑ Dɑfidi tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɛrɛɛ ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom?
À huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ kɑ buuru jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑrɑɑ zɑɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo no. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom hinne sɛ.
À cii ǹ sɛ mo: Hɛɛ Adɑmize, hɛɛ yɑ ci hulonzom hɑnu Kpe mo.
À kɑɑ tɔ ɑ̀ hurɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu fɔ hine kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cooɑndi. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ bu.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom gunɑ kɑ di hɑli ɑ̀ go bɑɑni no hulonzom hɑnu hine. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ zɑmɑ ngei mɑ du hɛ kɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ndɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu di sɛ: Tunu kɑ cɛ nee wɔ ǹ kulu jine. À tunu kɑ cɛ.
Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: À wom hã hɑli ɑ̀ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ihinno tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine bɑ wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ? À mɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci?
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ. À cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: N kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ tɛ bɑɑni zɑngɑ kɑmbɛwo di.
Ammɑ ǹ kulu bine tɔ. Ǹ go sɑwɑrɑ ngei gɑme hɛ kɑ ngei mɑ tɛ Yesu sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ hɑnu nge yom di Yesu kpei tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ciini kulu ɑ̀ hiyɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
Kɑ mo bo ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ. À nɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ suubɑ ǹ kunɑ kɑ ǹ no mɑɑ diyɑ.
Ngei neyɑ, Simɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Piɛɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Andɛrɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Bɑtelemɑ,
ndɑ Mɑtiyu ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu. Alifɛ koo ndɑ Simɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Zelote,
ndɑ Yudɑ, Yɑkɔfu cɛɛnɛ ndɑ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑmɑɑnɑ ŋmɑɑkɔ.

Kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu ndei ɑ̀ cɛ gbɑrɑ fɔ bɔm, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize boobo goono. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ fɔ goono kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Tiru ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ yom ko ǹ goono tɛkɔ mee gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ ko hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ du bɑɑni mo ǹ doori yom gɑɑ.
Beerem kɑ hɔllɛ yom go kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi kɑɑ kɑ du bɑɑni.
Jɑmɑ di kulu gɑ wetere ngei mɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ zɑmɑ dɑbɑri fɔ go hunu ɑ̀ gɑɑ ko kɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ bɔm tunɑndi kɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gunɑ. À cii: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, wom tɑlikɑ yom zɑmɑ wom sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ goono.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, wom kɑ wom go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ mɑɑsɑ, zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ kungu. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, wom kɑ wom go hɛ̃ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ hɑɑru.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no wom, sɑɑ kɑ beerem hungu wom, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ fee ndɑ wom kɑ wom woo, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom mɑɑ furu zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ lɑlɔ, hɛɛ Adɑmize sɑbu sɛ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di wom mɑ fɑihɑ̀. Wom mɑ munyɑ mo zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ du tukunsi beeri bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Yɑ no ǹ cɛɛ yom mo tɛ ɑndebi yom sɛ.
Ammɑ kɑito wom hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom zɑmɑ wom du wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɔ.
Kɑito wom kɑ wom kungu zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ. Kɑito wom kɑ wom go bɑɑru mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ goono bɛrɛɛ ndɑ hɛ̃ni kunɑ.
Kɑito wom, sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu go kɑ ihinno cii wom gɑɑ zɑmɑ zɑngɑ yɑ no, ǹ cɛɛ yom tɛ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom kɑ wom go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ, wom mɑ bɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom. Wom mɑ ihinno tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ bine gɑ hungu wom.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go wom lɑɑli, wom mɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ go wom woo sɛ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ n sɑm jɛrɛbɛ fɔ gɑɑ, n mɑ jɛrɛbɛ hinkɑntɛ mo gɑɑru ɑ̀ sɛ. De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ n kpɛ gɑndɑ tɑ, n mɑ si hungu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ n kpɛ bɛɛnɛ tɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ zɑɑ mo, n mɑ si ɑ̀ hã ndɑ.
Zɑngɑ wom go bɑɑ beerem mɑ tɛ wom sɛ, wom mo, wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ yɑ di.
De beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ wom, ngei nɑ wom gɑ bɑɑ, sɑɑbuyom fɔ no wom kɑɑ du? Bɑ dulumkoni yom mo go bɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei.
De wom go kɑ ihinno tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ihinno tɛ wom sɛ, sɑɑbuyom fɔ no wom kɑɑ du? Yɑ no bɑ dulumkoni yom mɑ gɑ tɛ.
De wom gɑ beerem gɑrɔ kɑ wom gɑ bei ǹ kɑɑ bɑnɑ, sɑɑbuyom fɔ nɑ wom kɑɑ du? Bɑ dulumkoni yom mɑ gɑ dulumkoni yom gɑrɔ zɑmɑ ngei mɑ du ɑ̀ sɛ.

Ammɑ wom mɑ bɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom. Wɑ ihinno tɛ. Wɑ gɑrɔ kɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu bɑtu. Wom tukunsi kɑɑ beeri. Wom kɑɑ tɛ Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ize yom. Ikpɛ gɑ gutulu yom ndɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom cɛbɛ ngɑ gomini.
Ngɑ di sɛ wɑ ci suujɑntɛ yom zɑngɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ mɑ ci suujɑntɛ.
Wɑ si ciiti. Ǹ si kɑɑ wom ciiti mɑ. Wɑ si ciiti kɑ zeeri. Ǹ si kɑɑ wom ciiti kɑ zeeri mɑ. Wɑ yɑɑfɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom yɑɑfɑ mɑ.
Wɑ nɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom nɑ mɑ. Neesiji hinno kɑ ǹ kɑnkɑm kɑ sisiji hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ kɑ munu, yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ wom nɑ wom jɛndɛ kunɑ ndɑ bɑyom.
À nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Dɑnɑm hini kɑ dɑnɑm cendi bɑ? Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kulu kɑɑ kɑm guusu kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Coobɑɑbɑize si bisɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ. Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ himɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ.
Ifɔ sɛ n gɑ di subuize kɑ ɑ̀ goono n nyɑize mɑɑ kunɑ, ɑmmɑ n si di bundu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bumbum mɑɑ kunɑ?

Mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ hini kɑ cii n nyɑize sɛ, cɛ yɑ subuize wɔ kɑɑ n sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n mɑɑ kunɑ zɑ kɑ n si di bundu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bumbum moo kunɑ? Munɑfici, bundu wɔ kɑɑ n moo kunɑ jinɑ. À gɑɑ no, n di ihinno kɑ subuize di kɑ ɑ̀ goono n nyɑize moo kunɑ kɑɑ.
Tuurinyɑ hinno si hini kɑ ize lɑlɔ hɛi. Yɑ no tuurinyɑ lɑlɔ si hini kɑ ize hinno hɛi.
Ǹ go tuurinyɑ kulu bei ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ize gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ si jeeize yom kɔsu kɑriji nyɑ gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ si lɛzɛ̃ize kɔsu mo dɛnfɛnɛ kɑriji gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ hinno, ɑ̀ bine jisiri hinno kunɑ no ɑ̀ gɑ ihinno kɑɑ tɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ lɑlɔ mo, ɑ̀ bine jisiri lɑlɔ kunɑ no ɑ̀ gɑ ilɑlɔ kɑɑ tɛrɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ko tɔ bine kunɑ, ngɑ no mee go sendi.
Ifɔ sɛ no wom go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ Kpe, Kpe ɑmmɑ wom si tɛ bɛ kɑ ɑ go cii?
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ ɑ sendi yom ko kɑ ǹ dɑm ngɑ tɛgbei kunɑ, ɑ gɑ wom cɛbɛ bɛ kɑ ɑkpɛ go himɑ.

À himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ fuu cini. À fɑnsi hɑli ɑ̀ guusu. À nɑ fuu di kpɛsɛ furu tondi bɔm. Gooru yom tɔ hɑli hɑri dendi kɑ kɑɑ ifutu futu. À nɑ fuuɑ kɑru. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ zeeri zɑmɑ tondi bɔm no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cini.

Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ɑ sendi yom, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ǹ dɑm ngɑ tɛgbei kunɑ, ɑkpɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ fuu cini gɑndɑ kpɑrɛ bɔm. À mɑnɑ fɑnsi kɑ kpɛsɛ tɛ. Hɑri dendi kɑ kɑɑ ifutu futu kɑ fuu di kɑru. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ kɑm. À kɑm kɑ tutubu.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ meecine yom kulu tɛ kɑ beeni jɑmɑ di sɛ kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ huro Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ.
Wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ bɑnyɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ sindɑ bɑɑni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ bɑ bu.
Kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune di mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru, ɑ̀ nɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu fɔ yom dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ bɑnyɑ di no bɑɑni.
Ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑkɑkɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di tɔ n mɑ ngɑ di tu ɑ̀ sɛ.
À go bɑɑ i dimi. À nɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu cini i sɛ mo.

Yesu bine kpei ǹ bɑndɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ mooru ndɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune di kpɑɑrɑ kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehunɑ nɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom mo dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ. À cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ si n bɔm tɑɑbɑndi zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ tɔ n mɑ huro ɑ fuu kunɑ.
À sɛ no ɑ mɑnɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ tɔ yɑ kɑɑ n dɔ. Ammɑ n mɑ sendi fɔlɔnku cii, ɑ bɑnyɑ di mo kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
Hɛɛ mo, wɑnguize fɔ hini cire no ɑ goono. Wɑnguize yom mo goono ɑ cire. De ɑ cii ɑfɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei, ɑ̀ kpei. De ɑ cii ɑfɔ mo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. De ɑ cii ɑ bɑnyɑ mo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ tɛ.
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ mɑmɑci ndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ jɑmɑ di kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ cii: A go cii wom sɛ, bɑ Isirɑilɑ kunɑ yɑ nɑ du nɑɑne beeri yɑ wɔ.
Beerem kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune dɔntɔm ye fuu kɑ gɑru bɑnyɑ di du bɑɑni jirijiri.
À kɑɑ tɔ ɑ̀ mo bo Yesu go kpei kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nɑi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne iboobo ndɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ kpei ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go tɔ wɑngɑrɑ birini mee dɔ, cɔfɔ beerem gɑ bukɔ fɔ mo zɑɑ ko hunu ndɑ. Bɔrɔ di ngɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi. Sokoni mo no nyɑ di. Wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ boobo goono nyɑ di bɑndɑ.
Kɑ Kpe di weibɔrɔ di, cɔfɔ sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ sɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Si hɛ̃.
Yesu mɑɑni kɑ dɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ nɑ bukɔɑ dɑm hɑmɑ. À zɑɑkɔei cɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Hɑiwɑsu, ɑ go cii n sɛ n mɑ tunu.
Cɔfɔ bukɔ di tunu kɑ gɔrɔ. À sinti ko sendi. Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑ̀ nyɑ sɛ.
Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ko cii: Andebi beeri fɔ tunu i gɑme. Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ kunfɑ.
Hɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ̀ bɑɑru kpei nungu kulu Yude lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ lɑɑbu mo kulu kunɑ.
Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kpeindɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ hɛ yom di kulu bɑɑru.
Yohɑnnɑ bine nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ cɛɛ. A nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Ni, n ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ di wɑlɑ bɔrɔ teji nɑ i mɑ bɑtu?
Kɑ ǹ tɔ Yesu dɔ ǹ cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ i dɔntɔm n dɔ. À cii i mɑ n hã de ni, n ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ di wɑlɑ dee bɔrɔ teji no i mɑ bɑtu?
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ Yesu nɑ bɔrɔ boobo no bɑɑni ǹ zɛnjɛ yom ndɑ ǹ doori yom gɑɑ. À nɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ. À no dɑnɑm boobo mo no moo.

À gɑɑ no Yesu tu Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei cii Yohɑnnɑ sɛ bɛ yom wɔ kɑ wom di ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ wom mɑɑ. Dɑnɑm yom go tɛ moo. Leebɑntɛ yom go dirɑ. Jire yom go du hinnɑndiyom. Lutu yom go mɑɑ. Ǹ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi. Ǹ gɑ Bɑɑru Hinno mo wɑɑzu tɛ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ yɑ nɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ beerem kɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔntɔm go dirɑ, Yesu sinti kɑ sendi Yohɑnnɑ bɔm jɑmɑ di sɛ. À cii: Ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ gɑnji kunɑ? Sɑɑri kɑ hɛo go zinji no bɑ?
Ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ? Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go jiine bɑɑnɔ dɑm no? Gunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ go jiine hinno yom dɑm di kɑ ǹ go hunɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑne kunɑ, gɑndɑkpɛ yom nungu yom dɔ no ǹ goono.
Ammɑ ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ? Andebi fɔ? Oò, ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑ̀ bisɑ ɑndebi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii: "Gunɑ, ɑ go bɔrɔ fɔ sɑmbɑ n jine wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ n fɔndɔ sɔlu n jine".
A go cii wom sɛ, iburɑdɑm yom kunɑ weibɔrɔ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑndebi kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci icɛnɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ ŋmɔne.
Beerem kulu ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ tɛ Ikpɛ cɛyom susu sɛ zɑ kɑ ǹ du Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndiyom.
Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom hungu miilɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑm Yohɑnnɑ mɑ ngei mirɑndi.
Kpe bine cii: Ifɔ no ɑ mɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom himɑndi ndɑ? Hɛ fɔ dimi no zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom himɑ?
Ǹ himɑ no koo yom kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ hebu bɑtumɑ kɑ cɛrɛ cɛɛ. Ǹ cii: I nɑ gɑɑsiɑ kɑru wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ gɑɑni. I nɑ bɛrɛɛ dɔɔni yom tɛ wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ hɛ̃.
Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ buuru ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ dufɛ̃ hɑm kɑlɑ wom go cii ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize kɑɑ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ go hɑm kɑlɑ wom go cii, gunɑ ŋmɑɑri bɑɑkɔ no, dufɛ̃ hɑmkɔ no. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom kpɑɑsi no.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ cɛɑntɛ susu hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ tɛgbei yom kulu gɑɑ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ. Yesu huro Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di fuu kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
Weibɔrɔ dulumkoni fɔ mo goono wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yesu goono Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di fuu kunɑ ko gɔrɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑlibɑti. Kɔlibɛ di tɔ ndɑ wɑidi.
À cɛ bɑndɑ Yesu cee yom dɔ hɛrɛ. À go hɛ̃. À sinti kɑ Yesu cee yom nyunu ndɑ ngɑ mundi. À go kɑ ǹ hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini. À go kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom sumsum kɑ wɑidi di munu ǹ gɑɑ.

Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu cɛɛ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ, ɑ̀ di ngɑ di. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: De bɔrɔ wɔ ɑndebi no, dom ɑ̀ bei weibɔrɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ hɑmɑ mee no ndɑ wɔ kɑ dimi no. Weibɔrɔ di yɑ dulumkoni no.
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Simɔ, ɑ gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ cii n sɛ. Simɔ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, sendi.
Yesu cii: Gɑrɔnyɑ fɔ gundɑ gɑrɔkoni hinkɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ gɑrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ jiiri fɔ ndɑ jɛrɛ bɑnɑndi. Bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ mo ŋmɔne bisɑ hɑndu ndɑ bɑnɑndi.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ bɑnɑ, gɑrɔnyɑ di nɑ gɑrɔ yom yɑɑfɑ ǹ kulu sɛ. Bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kunɑ mee yɑ bɑɑ gɑrɔnyɑ di kɑ bisɑ ɑfɔ?
Simɔ tu kɑ cii: A tɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑrɔ beeri di yɑɑfɑ no. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N lɑsɑbu sɑbɑ.

Cɔfɔ Yesu bɛrɛ weibɔrɔ di dɔ bɛrɛ kɑ cii Simɔ sɛ: N go di weibɔrɔ wɔ? A huro n fuu kunɑ, n mɑnɑ ɑ no hɑri kɑ ɑ cee yom nyunu. Ammɑ wei wɔ nɑ ɑ cee yom nyunu ndɑ ngɑ mundi. À nɑ ɑ cee yom hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini.
N mɑnɑ ɑ sumsum ɑmmɑ wei wɔ zɑ ɑ huro ɑ̀ mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ ɑ cee yom sumsumyom.
N mɑnɑ jii toli ɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ wei wɔ nɑ wɑidi munu ɑ cee yom gɑɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go cii n sɛ: Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum boobo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine beeri. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ cɛnɑ, ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine cɛnɑ no.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii weibɔrɔ di sɛ: A nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ Yesu sinti kɑ sendi ngei bine yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Mee nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom?
Yesu cii weibɔrɔ di sɛ: N nɑɑne nɑ n fɑɑbɑ. Kpei ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ Yesu gɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kulu yɑɑli ko bɑɑru fɛɛ. À gɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm. Coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ du bɑɑni ǹ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑ ndɑ ǹ doori yom gɑɑ mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Weibɔrɔ yom di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yɑ ci Mɑriɑmɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ, weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ iye hunu.
Yoɑni kɑ ɑ̀ ci Suzɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go ci Hirodu ŋmɔne yerimɑ mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Suzɑnɑ ndɑ ɑfɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ go tɑmtɛrɛ Yesu sɛ ndɑ ngei hɑibɑrikɑ yom mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ hunu zɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu ko meigu Yesu dɔ. À nɑ yɑɑse wɔ tɛ kɑ cii:
Dimiize seekɔ fɔ hunu kɑ ngɑ dimiizei see. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go see, dimiize fɔ yom kɑm fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Bisɑkɔ yom go tɑɑmu. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom mo nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
Dimiize fɔ yom mo kɑm tondi dɑɑru bɔm. Kɑ ǹ zei ǹ kɔgu zɑmɑ ǹ si du yeeni.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm kɑriji nyɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ kulu tunu mefɔ ɑmmɑ kɑriji yom nɑ ǹ dii.
Afɔ yom mo kɑm lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ. Ǹ tunu kɑ hɛi ize zɑngu. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di nɑ ɑ̀ hã bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci yɑɑse di feeriji.
Yesu cii: Wom sɛ no, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ duje beiyom no. Ammɑ bɔrɔ cindei wɔ yɑɑse kunɑ no ǹ sendi ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ, "Gunɑyom gɑɑ ǹ mɑ si di, Mɑɑyom gɑɑ mo ǹ mɑ si fɑhɑm".
Yɑɑse di feeriji neyɑ. Dimiize yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
Wɔ kɑ yom goono fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. À bɑndɑ Ibilisi go kɑɑ kɑ Sendɑ kɑɑ ǹ bine yom kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ si nɑɑne kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Wɔ kɑ yom goono tondi dɑɑrɑ bɔm mo, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Sendɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ no ndɑ fɑihã. Ǹ bine sindɑ kɑɑji. Bɑndɑ fɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom no. Suiyom lɔkɑci gɑɑ cɔfɔ ǹ go ye bɑndɑ.
Wɔ kɑ yom goono kɑriji yom kunɑ mo, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Ammɑ hundi wɔ kɑrihã ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom ndɑ hɑndunyɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑyom nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ si bɑrikɑ hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ.
Ammɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑ Sendɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ jɛ ngei bine yom kunɑ ihinno cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ. Ǹ go bɑrikɑ hɛi mɑ suuru kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ gɑɑsu gum ɑ̀ bɔm wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm dɑɑri cire. Ammɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ no ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ jisi hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ go huro mɑ di ɑ̀ kɑɑri.
Hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ mo ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ jisi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ zɑngɑ wom go mɑɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo, bɑ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Yesu nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ bɔrɔ bɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii Yesu sɛ: N nyɑ ndɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom go cɛ tɛrɛ. Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ di ni.
Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nyɑ ndɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom, ngei yɑ ci beerem wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Ikpɛ Sendɑ sɛ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngei tɛgbei kunɑ mo.
Hɑnu nge yom di gɑme, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ Yesu huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: I mɑ kpei buulɑ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ. Ǹ kpei.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go funu ko kpei, Yesu wɔ go jiibi. Cɔfɔ hɛo futu fɔ tunu buulɑ bɔm. Hɑrihi di go tɔ ndɑ hɑri kɑlɑ ǹ huro kɑtɑru kunɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Ǹ cii: I Jinɑ, i Jinɑ, i go hɑlɑci. Yesu tunu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ deeni hɛo di ndɑ buulɑ boosu yom di kɑ ɑ̀ go teeni gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑni, nungu tɛ sɑkɑi.
Yesu bine cii coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ: Mɑni wom nɑɑne? Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ go mɑmɑci kɑ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Mee dimi no bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑ hɛo ndɑ buulɑ mei? Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ mo.
Ǹ tɔ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gɑdɑrɑncei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tenji ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu zumbu gɑndɑ, wɑngɑrɑ di hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ yom zɑ jɛyom nɑ ɑ̀ kube. À si jiine dɑm. À si fuu kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ kɑlɑ sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu ɑ̀ kuwɑ kɑ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ jine. À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ goono hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme, Yesu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu Ize? A gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ si ɑ bɔnɑndi.
Yesu nɑ hɔllɛ di dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ hunu bɔrɔ di bɑndɑ. Zɑ jɛyom no hɔllɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dii. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ di bɔ ndɑ nyɔri yom ndɑ seseri yom ko lɑɑkɑli ndɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɔyom di pɑti, hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ fum gɑnji kunɑ.
Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii, mɛtɛ n mɑɑ? À cii, Jɑmɑ. À cii yɑ zɑmɑ hɔllɛ boobo yɑ goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
Hɔllɛ yom di bine go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑkɑkɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si ngei dɑm ngei mɑ kpei guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ.
Kpisɔ gɑɑ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ bine go kurum tondi kuku fɔ bɔm. Hɔllɛ yom di go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ngei sɛ ngei mɑ huro kpisɔ yom di kunɑ. Yesu tu ǹ sɛ.
Hɔllɛ yom di bine hunu bɔrɔ di bɑndɑ kɑ huro kpisɔ yom di kunɑ. Kpisɔ gɑɑ di go pito ko gungure zɑ tondi bɔm kɑ kɑm buulɑ kunɑ. Hɑri nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
Ǹ kurukɔ yom di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei bɑɑru deede wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom kunɑ.
Beerem hunu kɑ di bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ǹ kpei Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ yom di hunu gɑru Yesu cee dɔ. À go gɔrɔ ngɑ lɑɑkɑli gɑɑ. Jiine mo go ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ǹ deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ hɔllɛkpɛ di no bɑɑni.
Cɔfɔ Gɑdɑrɑncei lɑɑbu bɔrɔ kulu nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngei lɑɑbu zɑmɑ hɑmburu yɑ go kɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Yesu huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ kɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye.
Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ yom di hunu nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tu ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
À cii: Kpei fuu. Ǹ mɑ deede hɛ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ. À kpei fuu kɑ fɛɛ wɑngɑrɑ di kulu kunɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ ngɑ sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu ye kɑ kɑɑ jɑmɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ kube zɑmɑ ǹ kulu go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu no.
Cɔfɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yɑiru, Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ nɑ. À sɔmbu Yesu jine ko kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Koo hundiyo fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. Ngɑ yɑ bɑ bu. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go kpei kpɑɑrɑ di, jɑmɑ di go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnkɑm.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ kuri go dooru ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. À nɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu wi lokotoro yom dɔ. Ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
À mɑɑni bɑndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ Yesu kpɛ hɑngɑ hɑmɑ. Moo miilɑ fɔ cɔfɔ kuri dooruyom di cɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Mee yɑ nɑ ɑ hɑmɑ? Kɑ bɔrɔ kulu ze, Piɛɛ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono Yesu bɑndɑ cii: I Jinɑ, jɑmɑ yɑ nɑ n koli ko kɑ n kɑnkɑm. N du kɑ hã wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n hɑmɑ?
Ammɑ Yesu cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ bine nɑ ɑ hɑmɑ zɑmɑ ɑ bei kɑ dɑbɑri hunu ɑ gɑɑ.
Kɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ di ngɑ si du kɑ tugu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ndɑ gɑsiyom. À sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine kɑ cii jɑmɑ kulu jine sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ngɑ nɑ Yesu hɑmɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ du bɑɑni moo miilɑ fɔ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo hundiyo, n lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. N nɑɑne nɑ n no bɑɑni. Kpei ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
Kɑ Yesu goono sendi gɑɑ, Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N koo hundiyɑ bu. N mɑ si Coobɑɑbɑ tɑɑbɑndi.
Ammɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑ yɑ di ɑ̀ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Si hɑmburu. N mɑ nɑɑne dee. À kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
Yesu huro fuuɑ kunɑ. À mɑnɑ tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ huro kɑlɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ.
Ǹ kulu go hɛ̃ ko bɛrɛɛ. Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si hɛ̃ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bu. À go jiibi no.
Cɔfɔ ǹ go Yesu hɑɑru zɑmɑ ǹ bei kɑ ɑ̀ bu no.
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À nɑ koo di kɑmbɛ dii kɑ cii: Hundiyo, tunu.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hundi ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À tunu mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. Yesu cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ no ŋmɑɑri ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Hundiyɑ bɑhɛi yom go mɑmɑci ɑmmɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
