Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ ǹ mɑ meigu. À nɑ ǹ no dɑbɑri ndɑ hini hɔllɛ yom kulu bɔm ndɑ bɑɑni noyom doori yom bɔm.
À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm kɑ doorikom yom mo no bɑɑni.
À cii ǹ sɛ mo: Wom mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci guziri, bɑ goobu yom, bɑ fɔɔlɔ, bɑ ŋmɑɑri, bɑ nooru. Wom bɑ ɑfɔ mo mɑ si gundɑ kpɛ jinde hinkɑ.
Fuu kulu kɑ wom huro, wom mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑlɑ wom tunuyom.
Beerem kulu mo kɑ ǹ si wom yotɛrɛ tɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ ko gɑnɑ nungu di wom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ, wom cee si wom kɑmbɛ si zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
Ǹ kpei ko dirɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ ko Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ. Ǹ nɑ zɛnjɛkom yom no bɑɑni nungu kulu.
Hirodu mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ mɑɑ bɛ kulu kɑ Yesu go tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii, Yohɑnnɑ no Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo go cii Eli yɑ hunutɛrɛ. Afɔ yom mo cii, zɑ dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yɑ tunu.
Hirodu cii: Hɛɛ bine yɑ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm kɑɑ ɑmmɑ mee no bɔrɔ wɔne kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ ǹ go hɛ yom wɔ cii ɑ̀ gɑɑ? Hirodu go ceeci ngɑ mɑ di ɑ̀.
Kɑ diyɑ yom ye kɑ kɑɑ, ǹ deede Yesu sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ngei tɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ boi kɑ ye ndei kɑmbu gɑnji kunɑ, kpɑɑrɑ fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Betɑsɑidɑ.
Kɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ di bei, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À bine nɑ ǹ tɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sendi tɛ ǹ sɛ. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ bɑɑni ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.

Weenu sinti ko kɑm. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Jɑmɑ wɔ tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ yom kunɑ ndɑ ǹ hundɑntɛ tungɑ yom kunɑ. Nungu yom di ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ kɑ du ŋmɑɑri zɑmɑ nee wɔ gɑnji kunɑ no i goono.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum, wɑ ǹ nɑ ŋmɑɑri ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo cii: I buuru mɑnɑ bisɑ igu. I ciifi mɑnɑ bisɑ ihinkɑ. Kɑlɑ de i mɑ kpei ŋmɑɑri dei jɑmɑ wɔ kulu sɛ.
Ammɑ jɑmɑ tɔ zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu. Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ ǹ gɔrɛndi sɛtɛ sɛtɛ, bɔrɔ weigu weigu.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom di tɛ yɑ di, ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu gɔrɛndi.
Yesu nɑ buuru gu di zɑɑ ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ di. A nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji. À nɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ ǹ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
Ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑ kungu. Zenje yom kɑ ǹ cindi ǹ nɑ ǹ meigu cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑmbu. À coobɑɑbɑize yom goono ɑ̀ dɔ. À nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Mee no jɑmɑ wɔ go cii hɛɛ dɑ?
Coobɑɑbɑize yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii Eli. Afɔ yom mo go cii dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yɑ tunu bu kunɑ.
Yesu cii ngei mo sɛ: Wom bine, mee no wom cii hɛɛ? Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tu kɑ cii. Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne.
Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
À cii mo: Tilɑsi hɛɛ, Adɑmize yɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm. Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ mɑ hungu hɛɛ kɑ ɑ wi. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ tunɑndi.
À cii ǹ kulu sɛ mo: De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ hungu ngɑ bɔm sɛ. À mɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ hɑnu kulu kɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ.
Hɑnfɑni fɔ nɑ bɔrɔ sɛ bɑ de ɑ̀ du hɑndunyɑ kulu ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm dɛrɑndi wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑlɑci?
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑ hɑwi ndɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ sendi yom, hɛɛ mo Adɑmize, hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑkpɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ yom hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ɑkpɛ sɛ.
Ammɑ cimi nɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cɛ nee kɑ ǹ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ di Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, zɑngɑ jiribi ɑhɑku sɑrɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. À kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ̀ moodumɑ tɑkɑri bɛrɛ. À jiine yom mo bɛrɛ kɑ kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ hinkɑ gɑ. Moisi ndɑ Eli nɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ fɑɑji ndɑ Yesu.
Nge yom yɑ hunutɛrɛ deizɑ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ sendi Yesu bu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom mo, dusungu go kɑ ǹ gɑmɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ moo hɛi ǹ di Yesu deizɑ. Ǹ di bɔrɔ hinkɑ mo kɑ ǹ gɑ cɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
A kɑɑ tɔ kɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di gɑnɑ Yesu dɔ, Piɛɛ cii Yesu sɛ: A Jinɑ, ɑ̀ boori i mɑ gɔrɔ nee. I mɑ bukɑ hinzɑ tɛ, ɑfɔ n sɛ, ɑfɔ Moisi sɛ, ɑfɔ mɑ Eli sɛ. Ammɑ Piɛɛ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ ngɑ go cii.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ngɑ di tɛ nɑ, buru fɔ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑɑbu. Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑ ǹ gɑ huro burɑ kunɑ.
Jinde fɔ bine hunu zɑ buru di kunɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ jinde di cɛ, Yesu ngɑ fɔ nɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di hini ngei mee. Ǹ mɑnɑ deede bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ hɛ kɑ ǹ di hɑnu nge yom di.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ mɑ bɑ ǹ gɑ zumbu tondi kuku di bɔm, bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kube.
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kunɑ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ɑ kɑɑ hɑiwɑsu wɔ gunɑ, zɑmɑ ngɑ hinne no ɑ sɛ.
Gunɑ, hɔllɛ yɑ cini kɑ ɑ̀ dii, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑti. Hɔllɑ yɑ cini kɑ ɑ̀ zinji kɑ ɑ̀ fufu hɑli ɑ̀ mee mɑ kufu kɑru. À cini kɑ ɑ̀ guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ dɑcɑti nɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
À bine nɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini.
Yesu tu kɑ cii: E zɑmɑni wɔ beerem, wom zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom, wom siirekpɛ yom, kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ bɑ goono ndɑ wom? Kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ no ɑ mɑ wom jɛrɛ? N mɑ kɑɑndɑ n koo di nee wɔ.
Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni ndɑ koo di, cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fufu ifutu futu. Ammɑ Yesu deeni hɔllɛ di gɑɑ. À nɑ koo di no bɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ sɛ.
Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri bɛɛrɛkpɛ. Ǹ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu go tɛ. Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ:
Wom wɔ, wom mɑ sendi yom wɔ dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori zɑmɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm beerem kɑmbɛ.
Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi di. À gɑ tugɑntɛ ǹ sɛ hɑli ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ hɑmburu mɑ ndɑ ǹ mɑ Yesu hã sendi di.
Kɑkɔ wɔne mo tunu coobɑɑbɑize yom di gɑme, ǹ mɑ bei ǹ kunɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu.
Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Yesu go kɑ ǹ bine yom lɑsɑbu bei, ɑ̀ nɑ kɑɑ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi ngɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.

À bine cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ koo cɛnɑ zɑngɑ wɔne tɑ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ tɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm tɑ. Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑ ndɑ wom kulu, ɑkpɛ yɑ ci ibeeri.
Cɔfɔ Yohɑnnɑ mɑ tu kɑ cii: A Jinɑ, i di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ n mɑɑ. I bine hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i gɑnɑ.
Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wɑ si hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom, i sɛ no ɑ̀ goono.
À kɑɑ tɔ lɔkɑci bɑ tɔ kɑ ǹ mɑ Yesu sombu bɛɛnɛ. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di Yesu nɑ ngɑ bumbum guuri zɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
À jinɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɑmbɑ. Kɑ ǹ go kpei ǹ huro Sɑmɑriɑncɛ yom kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ kɑ zumbuyom dɔ hinsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ kpɑɑrɑ di beerem mɑnɑ Yesu tɑ zɑmɑ ǹ bei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ guuri zɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei.
Kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di yɑ di, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ cii: Kpe, n bɑɑ i mɑ cii nini mɑ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ bɑ, zɑngɑ Eli tɛ?
Ammɑ Yesu bɛrɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm. A cii: Wom si bei biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dimi no wom bɑrɑ.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm yom hundi yom hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ kɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ. À gɑɑ no ǹ kpei kpɑɑrɑ ŋmɑni fɔ kunɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ ǹ go kpei fɔndɔ bɔm, bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ gɑ n gɑnɑ nungu kɑ n go kpei kulu.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑɑbi yom gundɑ guusu yom. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom mo gundɑ gɔrɛ dɔ. Ammɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ sindɑ nungu kɑ ɑ mɑ ɑ bɔm dɛcɛ.
Yesu cii ɑfɔ mɑ sɛ: A gɑnɑ. Ammɑ ngɑ mɑ cii: Kpe, tu ɑ sɛ jinɑ yɑ kpei kɑ ɑ bɑɑbɑ fiji.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Nɑm bukɔ yom mɑ ngei bukɔ yom fiji. Ammɑ ni wɔ, n mɑ kpei kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru fɛɛ.
Afɔ mɑ cii: A gɑ n gɑnɑ Kpe, ɑmmɑ n mɑ tu ɑ sɛ jinɑ yɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ fuu kunɑ too.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ hɑukumbu gɑɑ kɑ zogu kɑ bɑndɑ gunɑ, ɑkpɛ si tɔ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛ.
Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Kpe nɑ bɔrɔ weiye suubɑ kpɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ngɑ jine. À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ihinkɑ hinkɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu kunɑ ndɑ nungu yom kulu kɑ ngɑ bumbum bɑ kɑɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Fɑri wiyom bɑ gumo ɑmmɑ gbeiteeri yom si bɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Hemɑrukpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ gbeiteeri yom sɑmbɑ ngɑ hemɑru kunɑ.
Wɑ kpei. Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ wom dɔntɔm nɑ zɑngɑ feejiize yom sɑgɑli yom bindi bindi.
Wom mɑ si bɑ zɑlifɔntɔ zɑɑ, bɑ fɔɔlɔ, bɑ tɑɑmu yom. Fɔndɔ bɔm mo wom mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu fɔɔ.
Ammɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom hurɑ wom mɑ cii: Bɑɑni mɑ gɔrɔ hundi wɔ kunɑ.
De bɑɑniize fɔ goono nungu di wom bɑɑni di kɑɑ zumbu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ mɑ, wom bɑɑni mɑ ye wom gɑɑ.
Wɑ gɔrɔ hundi fɔlɔnku kunɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm hɛ kulu kɑ hundi di bɔrɔ yom nɑ wom no. Gbeiteeri himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du ngɑ bɑnɑndi. Wom mɑ si hundi hundi tɛ.
Kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom hurɑ mɑ, de beerem go wom tɑ, wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ bɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ.
Wom mɑ doorikom yom kɑ ǹ goono no bɑɑni. Wom mɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni wom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom huro, de beerem si wom tɑ, wom mɑ kpei ɑ̀ sɔɔrɔ yom bɔm.
Wom mɑ cii: Bɑ wom kpɑɑrɑ kuso kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu i cee yom gɑɑ, i go kɑ ɑ̀ kɔkɔbɛ wom gɑɑ, zɑngɑ i cee si, i kɑmbɛ si. Ammɑ wom mɑ wɔne bei mɑ, Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni wom gɑɑ.
A gɑ cii wom sɛ, hɑnu ngɑ di Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ciiti tɛ dɑɑmɑ kɑ bisɑ kpɑɑrɑ ngɑ di ŋmɔne.
Kɑito ni, Kɔlɑzim kpɑɑrɑ. Kɑito ni, Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Dɑbɑri gbei yom kɑ ǹ tɛ wom kunɑ, de ǹ nɑ ǹ tɛ Tiru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ, dɑm ɑ̀ si jɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ soojiine dɑm kɑ gɔrɔ boosu kunɑ.
Ammɑ ciiti hɑnu bine Tiru ndɑ Sidom ciiti tɛ dɑɑmɑ kɑ bisɑ wom.
Ni mɑ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑli bɛɛnɛ, ǹ gɑ n cɛnɑndi hɑli ciyomɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm wom sɛ, ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu wom, ɑ̀ go hungu hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu hɛɛ, ɑ̀ go hungu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Bɔrɔ weiye di ye kɑ kɑɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne kɑ cii: Kpe, bɑ hɔllɛ yom bumbum nɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ i sɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A di Setɑm go kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu.
Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ wom no hini wom mɑ gondi yom ndɑ dem yom tɑɑmu. Wom mɑ hini Ibɛrɛ, ɑ̀ dɑbɑri kulu bɔm. Hɛ fɔ kulu si wom mɛrɛ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu wom mɑ si fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ kɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom sɛ, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ fɑihã zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ wom mɑɑ yom hɑntum bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.

Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ Yesu fɑihã Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. À cii: E Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑ n sɑɑbu, ni kɑ n ci bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ Kpe. N nɑ hɛ yom wɔ tugu hɑikusu yom ndɑ fɑhɑmkpɛ yom sɛ. N nɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ kɑɑ cɛnɑ yom sɛ. Oò Bɑɑbɑ, ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑni n sɛ.
A Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ bɛ kulu dɑm ɑ kɑmbɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si bei mee yɑ ci Ize kɑlɑ de Bɑɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si bei mee yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ kɑlɑ de Ize ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ.
Yesu bɛrɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom dɔ hɛrɛ kɑmbu kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ moo yom go di bɛ kɑ wom gɑ di.
A go cii wom sɛ ɑndebi boobo ndɑ hɑndunyɑ kpe bɑɑbɑ gɑ bɑɑ ngei mɑ di bɛ yom kɑ wom go di wɔ, ǹ bine mɑnɑ di ei. Ǹ go bɑɑ mɑ ngei mɑ mɑɑ hɛ yom ko wom go mɑɑ wɔ, ǹ bine mɑnɑ mɑɑ rei.
Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ fɔ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ sui. A cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, ifɔ nɑ yɑ tɛ kɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni tubu dɑ?
Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ no ǹ hɑntum Moisi fɔndɑ tirɑ kunɑ? Ifɔ nɑ n gɑ coo?
A tu kɑ cii: "N mɑ bɑɑ n Kpe, n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ n bine kulu ndɑ n hundi kulu ndɑ n gɑɑbi kulu ndɑ n lɑsɑbu kulu. N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine mo zɑngɑ n bɔm."
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N tuyom boori. N mɑ tɛ yɑ di, n kɑɑ hunɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛɑndi susu, ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Mee yɑ ci ɑ gɔrɔkɑsine?
Yesu tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ zumbu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm kɑ kpei Yeriko. À kɑm zee futu yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɔnu kɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ mɛrɛ. Ǹ bisɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. À si bukɔ, ɑ̀ si bɑhunɑ.
Yɑɑliyom gɑɑ bine, gɑrɑndikɔ fɔ mo nɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑ kɑ zuli. Kɑ ɑ̀ di bɔrɔ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cɛsu kɑ bisɑ.
Lefi bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ tɔ nodi. Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ngɑ mo cɛsu kɑ bisɑ.
Ammɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ fɔ nɑ fɔndɔ di gɑnɑ kɑ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
À mɑɑni kɑ jii ndɑ dufɛ̃ dɑm nungu yom kɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ didiji. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ngɑ memunu bɔm kɑ kpeindɑ yɑ yom zumbuyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo.
Mo bo, ɑ̀ nɑ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize hinkɑ kɑɑ kɑ no fuukpɛ di sɛ. À cii: N mɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo. Hɛ kulu kɑ n gɑ wi, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ n sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ hinzɑ wɔ kunɑ, mee no n go tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm zee yom di kɑmbɛ gɔrɔkɑsine?
Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ di tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ suuji tɛ. Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ sɛ: Kpei, ni mo n mɑ tɛ yɑ di.
Ǹ goono fɔndɔ bɔm ko kpei. À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu huro kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Mɑɑtɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kubeni ngɑ fuu kunɑ.
Mɑɑtɑ gundɑ cɛɛnɛ fɔ mɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑriɑmɑ.A gɑ gɔrɔ gɑndɑ Yesu jine kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sendɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ Mɑɑtɑ wɔ fuu kunɑ gbei ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ. Mɑɑtɑ bine kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Kpe, n bɑ si bɑ ndɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ wɔ nɑ ɑ nɑm ɑ fɔlɔnku yɑ yɑrɛ tɛ? N mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
Yesu bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɑɑtɑ, Mɑɑtɑ n gɑ kɑ n lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi kɑ kɑ n bɔm bitɑndi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑbɑ.
Ammɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci tilɑsi. Mɑriɑmɑ bine nɑ ihinno suubɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu goono nungu fɔ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ beeni, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ i cɛbɛ ɑduwɑ tɛyom zɑngɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛbɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ, wom mɑ cii: I Bɑɑbɑ, ni kɑ n goono bɛɛnɛ, n mɑɑ mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. N kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ. N binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ bɛɛnɛ.
N mɑ i no i ŋmɑɑri mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bo.
N mɑ i yɑɑfɑ ndɑ i dulum yom zɑmɑ i yom mo bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ i sɛ, i gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ. N mɑ si kpeindɑ i yom suiyom dɔ ɑmmɑ n mɑ i kɔm Ilɑlɔ kɑmbɛ.
À cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Wom kunɑ, mee yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kpɑɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ ciini bindi. À kɑɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, n mɑ ɑ gɑrɔ buuru hinzɑ.
A kpɑɑsi fɔ yɑ hunu zɑ nɑɑru kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, ŋmɑɑri fɔ mɑ kulu si ɑ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu kunɑ di, ɑ̀ gɑ tu ngɑ kpɑɑsi di sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ si ɑ tɑɑbɑndi. A nɑ ɑ fuu dɑɑbu kɔ. Hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ koo yom go kɑni. A si hini kɑ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ no n sɛ.
Yesu cii: A go cii wom sɛ ɑ̀ si tunu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ kpɑɑsi. Kɑnkɑmi di sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ no bɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ.
Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ̀ go cii wom sɛ: Wo ŋmɑɑrɛ, ǹ kɑɑ wom nɑ. Wo ceeci, wom kɑɑ du. Wɑ kobi, ǹ kɑɑ feeri wom sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑrɛ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ceeci mo, ɑ kɑɑ du. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kobi mo, ǹ kɑɑ feeri ɑ̀ se.
Wom kunɑ, bɑɑbɑ fɔ yɑ gɑ ngɑ koo no tondi de ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ buuru? Wɑlɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ciifi ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no gondi?
De koo di nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ gunguri ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no dem?
Bine, wom kɑ wom ci bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom, wom ŋmɑɑni kɑ hɛ hinno no wom koo yom sɛ. Yɑ mo no wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ no ndɑ.
Yesu go hɔllɛ bɛbɛ fɔ gɑɑrɛ. À kɑɑ tɔ, sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ di gɑ hunu, bɛbɛ di go sendi. Jɑmɑ di mɑmɑci ndɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom cii Bezɑbulɑ hɔllɛ yom kpe nɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ.
Afɔ yom mo, kɑ ɑ̀ bubure sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã bɛɛnɛ ɑlɑmu.
Ammɑ ngɑ wɔ, zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Kpetɛrɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑ fee ihinkɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci. Fuu mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm, fuu di kɑm no.
De bine Setɑm mɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm, mɛtɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cɛ? Wom go cii ndɑ Bezɑbulɑ dɑbɑri no ɑ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, de Bezɑbulɑ dɑbɑri nɑ ɑ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ, wom ŋmɔne ize yom wɔ hɛ fɔ no ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ ndɑ? À sɛ no, ǹ kɑɑ tɛ wom ciitikɔ yom.
Ammɑ de Ikpɛ kɑmbeize dɑbɑri gɑɑ no ɑ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ, siikɑ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tɔ wom dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ bɑliji nɑ wɑngu sɔlu kɑ kɑ ngɑ hundi bɑtu, ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ yom gundɑ kpɛsɛrɛ.
Ammɑ kɑ bɑliji fɔ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbi ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ zeeri kɑ ɑ̀ wɑngu jiinei kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, wɑngu jiinei kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑ tɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ kuu kɑ ɑ̀ kulu fɑrisi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si meigu ndɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑkpɛ yɑ seekɔ nɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ hunu bɔrɔ fɔ bɑndɑ, nungu kɔgɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ go dirɑ ko hulonzom dɔ ceeci, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si du ɑ̀. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ go cii: A fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ hunu no, ɑ kɑɑ ye.
Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ di ye fuu di kunɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɑru ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ booriɑndi.
À bine kpei hɔllɛ iye kpɛɛnɛ zɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ngei wɔ hɑnyɑ fute bisɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne. Ǹ kɑɑ huro kɑ gɔrɔ nodi. Bɔrɔ ngɑ di kɔkɔrɑ jɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sintine goonoyom.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu gɑ sendi nge yom di tɛ, weibɔrɔ fɔ jɑmɑ di bindi bindi nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gunde nɑ n jɛrɛ ndɑ fɑfɑ kɑ n nɑni.
Yesu bine cii: Awo. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm Ikpɛ sendi sɛ ko kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ go meigu ko Yesu kɑnkɑm, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ cii: Zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom, ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑlɑmu hã. Ikpɛ bine si zɑmɑni wɔ no ɑlɑmu ŋmɑni fɔ kɑlɑ ɑndebi Yonɑsi ɑlɑmu.
Zɑngɑ Yɑnɑsi ci Ninife bɔrɔ yom sɛ ɑlɑmu, yɑ nɑ hɛɛ mo Adɑmize, ɑ tɛ zɑmɑni wɔ sɛ ɑlɑmu.

Weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ weibɔrɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑɑ tunu ciiti hɑnu hine ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Zɑ hɑndunyɑ mee yom no ɑ̀ kɑɑ mɑɑ Sɑlomɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Gunɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Sɑlomɔ.
Ninife bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ tunu ciiti hɑnu hine ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri zɑmɑ ǹ tuubi Yɑnɑsi bɑɑru fɛɛyom gɑɑ. Gunɑ, Bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Yɑnɑsi.
Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ tugu, wɑlɑ kɑ gɑɑsu gum ɑ̀ bɔm. Ammɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ no ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ jisi hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ go huro, ǹ mɑ du kɑ di ɑ̀ kɑɑri.
Moo goono no zɑngɑ fitilɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ de n moo go boori, n gɑɑhɑm mɑ kulu tɔ ndɑ kɑɑri noyɑ. Ammɑ de n mɑɑ ci ilɑlɔ, n gɑɑhɑm mɑ tɔ ndɑ kube noyɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ kube.
Bine, de n gɑɑhɑm sukutum kulu tɔ ndɑ kɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ kube bɑ nungu fɔ, ɑ̀ kulu hɑɑgɑ zɑngɑ sɑɑ kɑ fitilɑ gɑ kɑ n nɑ ngɑ kɑɑri gɑɑ.
Kɑ Yesu gɑ sendi Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑɑri ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Yesu hurɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ.
Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di Yesu mɑnɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom nyunu jinɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ bɔm kɑ du kɑ ŋmɑɑ, mɑmɑci nɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Ammɑ Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wom wɔ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, gulɑize bɑndɑ ndɑ combu bɑndɑ nɑ, wom gɑ nyunu. Ammɑ kunɑ kunɑ wom tɔ ndɑ zeetɛrɛ guuri ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute.
Sɑmu yom, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑndɑ tɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kunɑ mɑ tɛ nɑ?
Ammɑ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ. Ngɑ di gɑɑ, hɛ yom kulu hinne wom sɛ.

Ammɑ kɑito wom, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom zɑmɑ wom gɑ tuuri kɑmisikpɛ zɑkɑ kɑɑ ndɑ gɑnji tuuri ndɑ feekɔsu kulu. Wom bine gɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ciiti ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine gɑɑ. Nge yom yɑ himɑ wom mɑ tɛ dɑm, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ si zɑkɑ di mɑ nɑm.
Kɑito wom, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, zɑmɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ nɑ wom gɑ bɑɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Wom go bɑɑ jɑmɑ mɑ wom fɔɔ bɑtumɑ kunɑ.
Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, zɑmɑ wom goono no zɑngɑ sɑɑrɛ mɛnɑntɛ yom. Beerem go dirɑ ǹ bɔm, ǹ si bei.
Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ fɔ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, hɛ yom wɔ ciiyom gɑɑ n go kɑ i woo no.
Yesu bine cii: Kɑito wom mo Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom. Wom go beerem jɛɛjɛ jɛrɔ beeri ɑmmɑ wom wɔ, bɑ wom kɑmbeize fɔ si lɑmbɑ jɛrɔ yom gɑɑ.
Kɑito wom, zɑmɑ wom go ɑndebi yom sɑɑrɛ yom cini, nge yom kɑ wom cɛɛ yom wi.
Sɛdɑ no wom go tɛ yɑ. Wom go tu mo wom cɛɛ yom gbei gɑɑ zɑmɑ ngei wɔ nɑ ɑndebi yom wi. Wom mo, wom go kɑ ǹ sɑɑrɛ yom cini.
À sɛ no Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ mo cii: A kɑɑ ɑndebi yom ndɑ diyɑ yom dɔntɔm ǹ dɔ. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ yom wi, ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ yom mo guruguzɑndi.
Andebi yom kulu kɑ ǹ kuri munu, zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom, ɑ̀ bɑnɑndi mɑ kɑm zɑmɑni wɔne ize yom bɔm.
Kuri wɔ hunu zɑ Abɛli kɑlɑ Zɑkɑri kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ ndɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑme. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑmɑni wɔne ize yom, ǹ kuri bɑnɑndi kɑɑ kɑm wom bɔm.
Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom zɑmɑ wom nɑ beire lɑntɑnɑize zɑɑ. Wom bumbum mɑnɑ huro. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ bɑ hurɑ, wom nɑ ǹ gɑnji.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go hɛ nge yom di cii ǹ sɛ no, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, ǹ bine sinti kɑ tɔ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ mee hã hɛ boobo bɔm.
Ǹ go tɛ zɑngɑ kuse ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ gɑ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ mee hɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
Sɑɑ di no jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ meigu kɑlɑ ǹ go cɛrɛ tɑɑmu. Yesu sinti kɑ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ jinɑ: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom buuru kɑsɑmi kɑ ɑ̀ ci munɑficitɛrɛ.
Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ feeri.
À sɛ no, bɛ kulu kɑ wom cii kube kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ ngɑ di kɑɑri kunɑ. Hɛ kɑ wom ciine hɑngɑ kunɑ mo fuu kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ fuu yom yɔlɔ yom bɔm.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑ kpɑɑsi yom, wɑ si hɑmburu gɑɑhɑm wikɔ yom. Gɑɑhɑm wiyom di bɑndɑ ǹ si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ kpɛɛnɛ.

Ammɑ ɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru, wɔ kɑ wom mɑ hɑmburu. Wom mɑ hɑmburu wɔ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom cetu nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go bɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi. Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ hɑmburu ngɑ.
Ǹ cini bulɑngɑ ciro gu neerɑ dɑlɑ hinkɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ? Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ Ikpɛ dinigɑ.
Wom wɔ, bɑ wom bɔm hɑmini, ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu kɑbu. Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ si hɑmburu. Wom bisɑ bulɑngɑ ciro bɑɑbɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne nɑ iburɑdɑm yom jine, hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑ cii ɑkpɛ yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom jine.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ ze iburɑdɑm yom jine, ɑ gɑ ɑkpɛ ze Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom jine.
Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi kɑ hungu hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi yɑmu kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cɛnɑndi, ǹ si ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ pɑi.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ wom Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom jine ndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom jine ndɑ hinikpɛ yom jine, wom mɑ si dirigo ndɑ zɑngɑ wom kɑɑ tu kɑ yeti wɑlɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ cii.
Lɔkɑci di bumbum kunɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑɑ wom cɛbɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ cii.
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, cii ɑ bɛɛrɛ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tubu fɑrisi ndɑ hɛɛ.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: E bɔrɔ kpɛ, mee yɑ nɑ ɑ jisi yɑ tɛ wom ciitikɔ kɑ wom fɑrisime yom tɛ wom sɛ?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ mo: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli. Wɑ fee ndɑ bɑɑyom futu zɑmɑ bɔrɔ hundi si kɔrɔgɔ ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ bɑyom gɑɑ.
À nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mo tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ fɔ fɑri yom kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ liibɑ boobo.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sendi ngɑ bine kunɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ tɛ? A sindɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ mɑ ɑ fɑri bɑrikɑ kulu wɔ meigu.
À bine cii: To. Wɔne no ɑ tɛ. A gɑ ɑ boo yom bɔgu no kɑ ibeeri beeri yom cini. Ǹ kunɑ no ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑri bɑrikɑ kulu ndɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ meigu.
Sɑɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ cii ɑ bɔm sɛ, ɑ hundi hɑibɑrikɑ boobo goono ɑ sɛ jisɑntɛ jiiri boobo ŋmɔne. Yɑ hulonzom. Yɑ ŋmɑɑ. Yɑ hɑm. Yɑ fɑihã.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sɑmu, ciini wɔ ǹ gɑ n hundi zɑɑ. Hɛ yom di kɑ n sɔlu, mee sɛ no ǹ kɑɑ goono?
Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ noyɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑibɑrikɑ meigu ngɑ bɔm sɛ, Ikpɛ jine no ɑkpɛ si ci hɑibɑrikɑntɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: A sɛ no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wɑ si kɑrihã wom hundi yom sɛ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ wom gɑɑhɑm yom sɛ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom dɑm.
Hundi bisɑ ŋmɑɑri. Gɑɑhɑm mo bisɑ jiine kɑ dɑm.
Wom mɑ gɑɑrugɑɑru yom gunɑ. Ǹ si dumɑ. Ǹ si wi. Ǹ bine sindɑ jisiri, ǹ sindɑ boo. Ikpɛ bine go kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɑndi. Hɑli yɑ mɑ wom, wom kɑ wom bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ciro.
Wom kunɑ mee no ɑ̀ kɑrihã kunɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ kɑmbɛ kɑru fɔ tɔntɔnu ngɑ kuyom gɑɑ?
Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ wom si hini bɑ hɛ fɔ pitici, ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑrihã ndɑ cindɑ?
Wom mɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ boosi yom go beeri. Ǹ si gbei tɛ. Ǹ si silli tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɑ Sɑlomɔ ɑ̀ deizɑ kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ go subu tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ yɑ di, subu kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑnji kunɑ hunkunɑ kɑ subɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu. Hɑli yɑ mɑ wom nɑɑne cɛnɑkpɛ yom ɑ̀ si kɑɑ jiine dɑm wom gɑɑ no?
Wom wɔ, wom mɑ si ceeci hɛ kɑ wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ wom mɑ hɑm. Wom mɑ si kɑrihã ndɑ.
Hɛ nge yom di kulu no hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu gɑ ceeci. Wom Bɑɑbɑ bine bei wom gundɑ hɛ nge yom di murɑdu.
Ammɑ wom mɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ ceeci. Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu tɔntɔnu wom sɛ.
Kuru cɛnɑ, n mɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni wom Bɑɑbɑ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom nɑ kpetɛrɛ.
Wɑ hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ neerɑ kɑ sɑrɑɑ. Wom mɑ zɑlifɔntɔ yom tɛ wom bɔm sɛ kɑ ǹ si zeeni, hɑizici no bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si zobu. Bɛɛnɛ kunɑ no ǹ goono, nungu kɑ zee si mɑɑni. Nɑnɑbɑnu mo si ɑ̀ sɑrɑ.
Nungu kɑ wom hɑizici goono, nungu di no wom bine mo goono.
Wom kunɑcendi yom mɑ goono wom cɛntɛ yom gɑɑ. Wom fitilɑ yom mo dii.
Wom bumbum mo, wom mɑ himɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei kpe bɑtu ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ zɑ hije dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ kobi, ǹ mɑ feeri ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom yɑ ci tɑm yom kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kpeɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ gɑ bɑtu. Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ kunɑcendi hɔ kɑ tɑm yom gɔrɛndi ŋmɑɑri dɔ. À kɑɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ǹ sɛ.
Ciini bindi bɑtuyom hinkɑntɛ wɑlɑ bɑtuyom hinzɑntɛ gɑɑ, de ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑru yɑ di, tɑm nge yom di yɑ ci binekɑɑnekpɛ yom.
Ammɑ wom mɑ wɔne bei, de hundikpɛ bei lɔkɑci kɑ zee kɑɑ, dɑm ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu. À si nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ fuu funu.
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mo, wɑ sɔlu. Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom si tɑmmɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gɑ kɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, i sɛ no n go yɑɑse wɔ tɛ dee wɑlɑ ǹ kulu sɛ?
Kpe cii: Tɑ. Mee yɑ ci bɑndɑbɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ? Ngɑ no ɑ̀ kpe nɑ ɑ̀ jisi kɑ ngɑ tɑm yom kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑri lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ no tɑm ngɑ di kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kpeɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑru ɑ̀ mo tɛ yɑ di.
Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ.
Ammɑ de tɑm wɔ go cii ngɑ bine kunɑ ɑ̀ kpe wɔ si kɑɑ tɑmbɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ bɑnyɑ yom di ndɑ kɔngɔ yom di kɑru. À gɑ ŋmɑɑ ko hɑm kɑ bugu.
Tɑm ngɑ di, ɑ̀ kpeɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ no hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑtu, lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ si bei. À kpeɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dumbu ihinkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dɑm zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ize yom bɑndɑ.
Tɑm wɔ go kɑ ngɑ kpeɑ binebɑɑ bei ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɔlu. À mɑnɑ tɛ mo zɑngɑ kpeɑ binebɑɑ goono ndɑ. À gɑɑ no, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ ce boobo.

Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei mo, kɑ ɑ̀ go bɛ yom tɛ kɑ ǹ tɔ goobu, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ ce si bɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no iboobo, ǹ gɑ iboobo dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ǹ nɑ iboobo tɑlifi ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ǹ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ tɔntɔnu.
A kɑɑ no yɑ nini furu hɑndunyɑ bɔm. A bɑɑ yɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ nini di funsu.
A gundɑ mirɑndiyom fɔ kɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ mirɑndi ndɑ. A goono kɑnkɑmi kunɑ mo hɑli ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
Wom mɑ si tɑmmɑ ɑ kɑɑ bɑɑni dɑm hɑndunyɑ bɔm no. A go cii wom sɛ, ɑ kɑɑ no kɑ feefee dɑm.
Zɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ gu kɑ ǹ goono fuu fɔ, ǹ kɑɑ fee. Ihinzɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ihinkɑ. Ihinkɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ihinzɑ.

Bɑɑbɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ. Koo hɑibɔrɔ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɑɑbɑ. Nyɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ koo hundiyo. Koo hundiyo kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ nyɑ. Kunye nyɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑnzure. Koo wɛndɛ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ.
Yesu cii jɑmɑ di mɑ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ wom go di buru tunu weenukɑne, ndɑ wɑɑsi wom cini cii hɑri go kɑɑ. À kɑɑ mo.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ hɛo go funsu wom cini cii, kɔndi kɑɑ tɛ. À tɛ mo.
Munɑfici yom, wom go gɑndɑ ndɑ bɛɛnɛ tɑkɑri yom bei kɑ kɑɑ cɛrɛ. Ifɔ sɛ no wom si hini kɑ lɔkɑci wɔ mo bei kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ cɛrɛ?
Ifɔ sɛ mo no wom bumbum, wom si ciiti ndɑ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ?

Sɑɑ kɑ n gɑ kpei ciitikɔ dɔ n zojikɑri bɑndɑ, fɔndɑ bɔm no n mɑ guruje kɑ n bɔm kɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À mɑ si tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ kpeindɑ ni ciitikɔ jine, ciitikɔɑ mɑ mɑ n dɑm dogɑri kɑmbɛ, dogɑri di mɑ n dɑm kɑsu.
A go cii n sɛ kɑ n si hunu nodi pɑi kɑlɑ de n nɑ ɑ̀ kulu bɑnɑ, bɑ tɑngɑ si cindi.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono nodi kɑ deede Yesu sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ yom sɛ. Ǹ cii Pilɑtu dɑm ǹ mɑ ǹ wi kɑ ǹ kuri meigu ndɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi yom kuri.
Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom tɑmmɑ Gɑlile bɔrɔ nge yom di ci dulumkoni yom kɑ bisɑ Gɑlile bɔrɔ kulu zɑmɑ ǹ tɑɑbi zɑngɑ yɑ di?
A go cii wom sɛ, ɑwo. Ammɑ de wom mɑnɑ tuubi, wom kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ yɑ di.
Wɑlɑ wom tɑmmɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi ɑhɑku wɔ kɑ ǹ bɔm Silowe jidɑmbisɑ kɑm kɑ ǹ wi, ngei yɑ ci dulumkoni yom kɑ bisɑ Yerusɑlɛm bɔrɔ kulu?
A go cii wom sɛ, ɑwo ɑmmɑ de wom mɑnɑ tuubi wom kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ yɑ.
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔ mo tɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ jee nyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑm ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu kunɑ. À bine kɑɑ kɑ ize ceeci ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu hɑrifɑrɑ sɛ: Gunɑ, jiiri hinzɑ noyɑ kɑ ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ ize ceeci jee nyɑ wɔ gɑɑ. A si du. N mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu. Ifɔ sɛ ɑ̀ goono gɑndɑ wɔ gɑɑ kɔnu bɔm?
Lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu hɑrifɑrɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ̀ nɑm jinɑ jiiri wɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑnsi kɑ hundi kɑ tɑɑci dɑm.
Hɑnibɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɛi. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛi n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu.
Hulonzom hɑnu fɔ hine nɑ Yesu gɑ cooɑndi Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ. À gɑ weibɔrɔ di zɛnjɑndi ɑ̀ tɔ jiiri wei cindi ɑhɑku. À gɑɑhɑm goono kunkunɑntɛ. À si hini kɑ tunu ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
Kɑ Yesu di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, ǹ nɑ n kɑɑ zɛnjɛ wɔ kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ sɛllɛ. À gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.

Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu hɑikusu di bine tɔ ndɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ wei di nɑ bɑɑni hulonzom hɑnu hine. À cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Jiribi idu goono ɑ̀ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ gbei tɛ. À sɛ nɑ hɑnu nge yom di wom mɑ kɑɑ kɑ du bɑɑni, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hulɑnzom hɑnu hine.
Kpe mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Munɑfici yom, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ si cini kɑ ngɑ hɑu wɑlɑ ngɑ fɑrikɑ feeri tɑlɑlɑ dɔ kɑ kpeindɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑngɑndi hulɑnzom hɑnu hine bɑ?
Bɔrɔ wɔ bine kɑ ɑ̀ ci Abulɛmɑ koo weibɔrɔ kɑ Setɑm nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ɑ̀ jiiri wei cindi ɑhɑku noyɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɔyom wɔ kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Kɑ Yesu nɑ sendi ngɑ di cii, hɑwi nɑ ɑ̀ zojikɑri yom kulu dii. Jɑmɑ kulu fɑihã ndɑ hɛ deizɑkpɛ yom kɑ Yesu gɑ tɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Ifɔ no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ? Hɛ fɔ nɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ himɑndi ndɑ?
À himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ mogure kɑ bɔrɔ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ dumɑ ngɑ lɑmbu kunɑ. À beeri kɑ tɛ tuuri nyɑ bɑmbɑtɑ. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom bɔm.
Yesu cii kpɛɛnɛ: Hɛ fɔ no ɑ gɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi ndɑ?
À himɑ no zɑngɑ buuru kɑsɑmi kɑ weibɔrɔ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm buuru hɑmini zɑkɑ mee hinzɑ kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ kulu tunu.
Yesu nɑ ngɑ diro tɛ kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Fɔndɔ di bɔm ɑ̀ nɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom tɑɑru kɑ cooɑndi.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ du fɑɑbɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ bɑ nɑ?
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ guruje kɑ huro ndɑ mee kɑnkɑmɑntɛ. A gɑ cii wom sɛ, iboobo kɑɑ ceeci ngei mɑ huro, ɑmmɑ ǹ si hini.

Sɑɑ kɑ hundikpɛ tunu kɑ ngɑ gɑmbu dɑɑbu, wom mɑ wom goono tɛrɛ. Sɑɑ di nɑ wom sinti kɑ gɑmbuɑ kɑru kɑ cii: Kpe, Kpe feeri i sɛ. Ngɑ mɑ kɑɑ tu wom sɛ kɑ cii: A si wom bei. A si bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ yom nɑ wom.
À gɑɑ nɑ, wom bɑ cii: I ŋmɑɑ, i hɑm n jine. N cooɑndi mɑ i sɔɔrɔ yom bɔm.
Cɔfɔ hundikpɛɑ kɑɑ cii: A gɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ si bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ yom nɑ wom. Wɑ gɑnɑ ɑ sɛ, wom kulu hɛ lɑlɔ gbeiteeri yom.
Wom kɑɑ hɛ̃. Wom kɑɑ hinje kɑɑmɑ mɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ di Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ ɑndebi yom kulu goono Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑmmɑ tɛrɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ wom furu.
Beerem kɑɑ hunu weenuhune ndɑ weenukɑne ndɑ weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛwo bɛrɛ ndɑ weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Gunɑ, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom. Sintine bɔrɔ yom mo goono kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom.
Hɑnu ngɑ di mo Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɔm cendi kɑ hunu nee zɑmɑ Hirodu go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ n wi.
Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei cii cɛmbɛrɛkpɛ di sɛ, gunɑ hunkunɑ ndɑ subɑ ɑ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. A go bɑɑni no. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ yɑ ɑ bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi.
Ammɑ kɑlɑ de hunkunɑ ndɑ subɑ ndɑ subɑsi mo yɑ dirɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si himɑ ɑndebi mɑ bu kɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ.

E Yerusɑlɛm, Yerusɑlɛm, n gɑ ɑndebi yom wi. N gɑ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm n dɔ cetu ndɑ tondi. Ce mɛrɛjɛ no ɑ bɑɑ yɑ n ŋmɔne ize yom meigu zɑngɑ gɔrɔngɔ nyɑ cini kɑ ngɑ ize yom meigu ngɑ fɑtɑ yom cire. Ammɑ wom mɑnɑ tu.
Gunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ wom fuu nɑm kɔnu. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom si di hɛɛ pɑi kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ wom mɑ cii: Bɑrikɑkpɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
A kɑɑ tɔ hulonzom hɑnu fɔ bine Yesu huro Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom hɑikusu yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fuu kunɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ gunɑ.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ goono ɑ̀ jine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ yeeni funsi.
Yesu bine sendi Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom sɛ ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom sɛ. A cii: A hɑlɑli ǹ mɑ bɑɑni no hulonzom hɑnu bine dee?
Ammɑ ǹ dɛnjɛ. Yesu nɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm kɑ doorikom dii kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni. Bine, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kunɑ, mee no de ɑ̀ fɑrikɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ hɑu kɑm guusu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine ɑ̀ si ɑ̀ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ?
Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tu sendi ngɑ di bɔm.
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse tɛ jɑmɑ di sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ di zɑngɑ ǹ go suubɑ kɑ gɔrɔ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ bɔm ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ gɑ n cɛɛ hije buci dɔ n mɑ si gɔrɔ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ bɔm. Hɑnibɑ beerem kɑ ǹ cɛɛ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ n ŋmɔne.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ, ni ndɑ ɑkpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ no citɑ. Hɑwi gɑ n dii ndɑ n mɑ kpei gɔrɔ bɑndɑ.

Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ n cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri, n mɑ kpei gɔrɔ bɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n cɛɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cii n sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ kɑ tɔntɔnu. Ngɑ di bɛɛrɛ tɛ n sɛ beerem kulu jine kɑ ni ndei goono ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.

Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɑ mo, Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ n go wiciri ŋmɑɑri tɛ, n mɑ si n kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ wɑlɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ n bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ n hɑikusu yom wɑlɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom hɑli ngei mɑ bɑ n cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ bɑnɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ n go beerem cɛɛ ndɑ jingɑru ŋmɑɑri, n mɑ tɑlikɑ yom cɛɛ ndɑ leebɑntɛ yom ndɑ sumbɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom.
N kɑɑ tɛ binekɑɑnekpɛ zɑmɑ ǹ si hini kɑ bɑnɑ n sɛ. À gɑɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti n sɛ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom bukɔei tunɑndiyom wɑtɛ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono ŋmɑɑri di dɔ n ŋmɔne ɑfɔ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Binekɑɑnekpɛ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wiciri ŋmɑɑri beeri fɔ tɛ kɑ bɔrɔ boobo cɛɛ ndɑ.
Wiciri ŋmɑɑrɑ lɔkɑci tɔ. À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei cii beerem kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu sɔlu kɔ.
Ammɑ ɑfɔ fɔ kulu kɑɑndɑ ngei kɔbɛ. Sintine bɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Fɑri fɔ no ɑ dei. Tilɑsi kɑlɑ yɑ kpei di ɑ̀. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ, n mɑ gɑfɑrɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
Afɔ mɑ cii: Hɑuyeji yom no ɑ dei ihinkɑ hinkɑ gu. A go kpei kɑ ǹ yɑɑse gunɑ. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ gɑfɑrɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
Afɔ mo cii: Wɛndɛ fɔ no ɑ hiji. Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ si hini kɑ kɑɑ.

Bɑnyɑ di bɛrɛ kɑ ye. À nɑ kɔbɛ sendi yom deede ngɑ kpeɑ sɛ. Cɔfɔ hundikpɛ di bine tɔ. A cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ sɛ: Kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi kpɑɑrɑ sɔɔrɔ yom bɔm ndɑ fɔndɔize yom bɔm. N mɑ kɑɑndɑ tɑlikɑ yom nee ndɑ leebɑntɛ yom ndɑ sumbɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom.
Bɑnyɑ di cii: Kpe, zɑngɑ n cii wɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Tɛrɛ bine yɑ kɑɑ cindi.
Kpeɑ mɑ cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ sɛ: Hunu kɑ kpei dɛbɛ yom bɔm ndɑ kɑkɑ yom cɔrɔ yom gɑɑ, n mɑ beerem tilɑsi ǹ mɑ huro zɑmɑ ɑ hundi mɑ du kɑ tɔ.
A cii wom sɛ beerem di kulu kɑ ɑ cɛɛ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si tɑbɑɑ ɑ wiciri ŋmɑɑrɑ gɑɑ.
Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go meigu kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ. À bɛrɛ ǹ dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ:

Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, de ɑ̀ si hungu ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ ndɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ ndɑ ngɑ koo yom ndɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ weimɑ yom ndɑ bɑ ngɑ bumbum hundɑ mo, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize.
Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize.
Mee nɑ wom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ jidɑmbisɑ cini, ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ jinɑ kɑ nooru kɑ ngɑ wi lɑsɑbu. À mɑ di hɑli ngɑ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ kɑ jidɑmbisɑ di beeni ndɑ.
Hɑnibɑ bɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ jidɑmbisɑ kpɛsɛ furu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm wi. Beerem kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ mɑ si dondɑɑ̀.
Ǹ kɑɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ sinti jidɑmbisɑ ciniyom, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ beeni.
Wɑlɑ kpe fɔ yɑ bɑ kpei wɑngu kpe fɔ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ jinɑ. À mɑ gunɑ de ngɑ hini kɑ kpei ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei, cɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɔrɔ dubu wɑrɑnkɑ?
De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ mo, zɑ cɛ goono nungu mooru ɑ̀ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɑmbɑ kɑ ǹ mɑ bɑɑni ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bɛ kulu nɑm, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize.
Ciiri boori ɑmmɑ de ciiri tɑru, hɛ fɔ nɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ ndɑ?
À si boori gɑndɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ si tɛ tɑɑci. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ furu tɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom kulu ndɑ dulumkoni yom mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go gunugunu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di go dulumkoni yom tɑ. À go ŋmɑɑ ndei mo.
Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii:
Mɛtɛ no wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ feeji zɑngu kɑɑ tɛ, de ɑfɔ dɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ? À gɑ weigɑ cindi ɛgɑ nɑm gɑnji kunɑ kɑ kpei feeji kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ di ceeci kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ di ɑ̀. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ngɑ jɛsɛ bɔm. À bine gɑ kɑɑni mɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ ye fuu ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ ndɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine yom. À go cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ fɑihã ndɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ di ɑ feeji di kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ.
A go cii wom sɛ, yɑ mo no fɑihã goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ dulumkoni fɔlɔnku sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tuubi. À bisɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu weigɑ cindi ɛgɑ gɑndɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ tuubi murɑdu.
Zɑngɑ sendi, weibɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu tɑngɑ wei. Kɑ ɑfɔ dɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ go fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ ngɑ fuu hɑɑbu. À go kɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ di ɑ̀. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ ndɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine yom kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ di ɑ tɑngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ.
A go cii wom sɛ, yɑ no fɑihã goono Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom jine dulumkoni fɔlɔnku sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tuubi.
Yesu bine cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ.
Icɛnɑ cii ngei bɑɑbɑ sɛ: Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ ɑ no ɑ bɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ wɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne. Cɔfɔ bɑɑbɑ di nɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ.
À tɛ jiribi yom, icɛnɑ nɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne kulu meigu. À hunu kɑ kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni hɑli nungu mooru. Nungu di no ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ tubu di kɑru kɑ see bɛnɛbɛnɛ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kulu wi kɑ beeni, cɔfɔ bɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ kɑɑ lɑɑbu di kunɑ. Bɑnji sinti kɑ kɑɑ hɑiwɑsu di gɑɑ.
À kpei kɔrɔgɔ lɑɑbu di ize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ di nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ cini kpei kpisɔ yom kurum ngɑ fɑri tɛrɛ yom kunɑ.
À go miilɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ gunde tɔnɑndi ndɑ kɔɔtɑ kɑ kpisɔ yom di go ŋmɑɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ ɑ̀ no hɛ fɔ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii: A bɑɑbɑ gundɑ gbeiize yom fɑ kɑ ǹ gundɑ ŋmɑɑri ndɑ bɑyom. Hɛɛ mo ɑ go nee ko bu ndɑ hɛrɛɛ.
A kɑɑ tunu no kɑ kpei ɑ bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A bɑɑbɑ, ɑ nɑ dulum tɛ bɛɛnɛ sɛ. A nɑ dulum tɛ n sɛ mo.
Yɑ nɑ tɔ n mɑ ɑ cɛɛ n koo hɑibɔrɔ kpɛɛnɛ. N mɑ ɑ dii zɑngɑ n gbeiize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ.
À tunu bine kɑ kpei ngɑ bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Zɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑli nungu mooru, ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ di ɑ̀. Sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À zuuru kɑ kpei huro ɑ̀ jɛndɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sumsum kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Ammɑ koo di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ nɑ dulum tɛ bɛɛnɛ sɛ. A nɑ dulum tɛ n sɛ. Yɑ nɑ tɔ n mɑ ɑ cɛɛ n koo kpɛɛnɛ.
Bɑɑbɑ di cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑndɑ kpɛ kuku kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ kpɛ kulu kɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ kɑmbɛ kɔlibɛ fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ tɑɑmu ɑ̀ cee yom gɑɑ.
Wɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑuize hɑngɑndi nɑsɔ di mo kɑ wi, i mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ fɑihã.
A koo wɔ go. À bu. À bine ye hundi gɑɑ. À dɛrɛ no, ǹ ye kɑ di ɑ̀. Cɔfɔ ǹ sinti kɑ fɑihã.
À koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine goono fɑri. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ye fuu ko mɑɑni hundi cɔfɔ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ dɔɔni ndɑ gɑɑni.
À nɑ gbeiize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hã hɛ kɑ no.
À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N cɛɛnɛ yɑ kɑɑ. N bɑɑbɑ nɑ hɑuize hɑngɑndi wi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀ ndɑ bɑɑni.
Koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine di bine tɔ. À si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ huro. À bɑɑbɑ hunu tɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ huro.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu ngɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, jiiri bɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ tɑmtɛrɛ n sɛ. Bɑ ce fɔ yɑ nɑ n meire yom dɑɑrum ɑmmɑ n mɑnɑ ɑ nɑ hɑnciniize bɑ ce fɔ yɑ fɑihɑ̀, hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ kpɑɑsi yom.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci n kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ wi weikuru yom dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ hɑuize hɑngɑndi wi ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ bɑɑbɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo, n goono ɑ bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne, n ŋmɔne no.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i bine mɑ kɑɑni kɑ fɑihɑ̀. N cɛɛnɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ bu nɑ. À bine ye hundi gɑɑ. À dɛrɛ, i ye kɑ di ɑ̀.
Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo sɛ: Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ fɔ yɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ fɔ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ di beri ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii ngɑ yɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ wi.
Kpeɑ mo nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɔne kɑ ɑ gɑ mɑɑ ǹ gɑ cii n gɑɑ wɔ? N mɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ n bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ murɑdu tirɑ yom, zɑmɑ n si bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Bɑndɑbɔrɔ di cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: Mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ zɑmɑ ɑ kpeɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ? A si hini kɑ fɑrimi mo. Hɑɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ bɑrɑ.
To. A bei hɛ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ kɑɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ tɑ beerem hundi kunɑ.
À nɑ ngɑ kpeɑ gɑrɔkoni yom cɛɛ ɑfɔ fɔ. À cii sintine bɔrɔ di sɛ: Mɛrɛjɛ no ɑ kpe go kɑ n gɑrihã?
Bɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Jii neesiji zɑngu fɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tirɑ zɑɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi. N mɑ hɑntum weigu.
À cii ɑfɔ mo sɛ: Ni bine, mɛrɛjɛ no n gɑɑ? À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɔsɔngu hɑmini neesiji zɑngu fɔ. À cii ngɑ mo sɛ: N mɑ n tirɑ zɑɑ kɑ hɑntum wɑhɑku.
Kpeɑ bine nɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ cimi zɑmkɔ sifɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli. Ǹ wɑtɛ kunɑ zɑmɑni wɔ ize yom lɑɑkɑli bisɑ kɑɑriize yom lɑɑkɑli.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ tɛ kpɑɑsi, zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ gɑziɑ ǹ mɑ wom tɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ pitici kunɑ, nɑɑnekpɛ mo no hɛ fɔ bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ pitici kunɑ, ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ hɛ fɔ bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de wom mɑnɑ tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ yom hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ kunɑ, mee yɑ gɑ ihinno tɑlifi wom gɑɑ?
De wom mɑnɑ tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ yom hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɔne kunɑ, mee yɑ kɑɑ wom no bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wom ŋmɔne?
Gbeiize si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kpe hinkɑ sɛ. À kɑɑ hungu ɑfɔ kɑ bɑɑ ɑfɔ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ kɑɑni ɑfɔ sɛ kɑ dondɑ ɑfɔ. Wom si hini kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ sɛ mefɔ.
Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, ǹ nɑ Yesu hɑɑru zɑmɑ ǹ bɑrɑ nooru bɑɑkɔ yom.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom wɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom no kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm cɛɑndi susu iburɑdɑm yom jine ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gɑ wom bine yom bei. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ, fɛntɛ hɛ no Ikpɛ jine.
Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom lɔkɑci goono kɑlɑ Yohɑnnɑ wɑtɛ. Zɑ wɑtɛ di nɑ, ǹ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gɑ gɑɑbi tɛ kɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ sɛ ǹ mɑ beeni, ndɑ biiriize tombi fɔlɔnku mɑ dɛrɛ Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji, ɑkpɛ go zinɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fee hiji, ɑkpɛ go zinɑ.
Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ cini kpɛ siini kuku dɑm ndɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ cɑɑdɑntɛ kɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑ hɑnu kulu.
Bɑrɑkɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑzɑɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ bii. Ǹ cini kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di hundi mee ɑ̀ mɑ kɑni.
À go hini ngɑ mɑ kungu ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɑ ŋmɑɑri buruburu yom kɑ ǹ go kɑm zɑ tɑbulu bɔm. Bɑ hɑnsi yom mɑ gɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bii yom lɔɔgu.
À kɑɑ tɔ bine, bɑrɑkɔ di bu. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm Abulɛmɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di mo bu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji.
À goono ciyomɑ bɔnɛ kunɑ. À nɑ bɔm tunɑndi kɑ di hɑli jinɑ Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Lɑzɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Abulɛmɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ, n mɑ dii ɑ sisibi kɑ Lɑzɑɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ kɑmbeize tusu hɑri kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛɛnɛ wɔ yeenɑndi. À gɑ di bɔnɛ nini wɔ kunɑ.
Ammɑ Abulɛmɑ cii: À kɑɑ, n mɑ hɔngɔ kɑ n du n hɑibɑrikɑ n hɑndunyɑ wɑtɛ. Lɑzɑɑ mo du doorei. Mɑɑsɑ ngɑ wɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ suurɑndi nee. Ni mɑ, ǹ go kɑ n bɔnɑndi.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ guusu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ sinji wom ndɑ i yom gɑme. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ hunu nee kɑ kpei wom dɔ wɑlɑ wom dɔ kɑ kɑɑ i dɔ, ǹ si hini kɑ bisɑ.
Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di bine cii: A gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ nɑ bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ, n mɑ Lɑzɑɑ dɔntɔm ɑ bɑɑbɑ fuu.
A gundɑ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ gu. A mɑ sɛdɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑli ngei mo mɑ si kɑɑ guruguze nungu wɔ kunɑ.
Abulɛmɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ǹ gundɑ Moisi ndɑ ɑndebi yom, ǹ mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
Ammɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di cii: Awo, bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ. De bukɔ yom kunɑ ɑfɔ kpei ǹ dɔ ǹ kɑɑ tuubi.
Abulɛmɑ mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ǹ si hɑngɑ dɑm Moisi ndɑ ɑndebi yom sɛ, ǹ si hini kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ mo bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ tunu bukɔei gɑme.
Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Sɑɑ kulu sɑbɑbu yom goono kɑ ǹ hini kɑ beerem dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ dɛrɑndiyom hunu.
Ǹ mɑ fufuyom tondi hɔ ɑ̀ jinde gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛku kunɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ icɛnɑ yom wɔ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɛrɑndi.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm. De n nyɑize nɑ tɑɑli tɛ n sɛ n mɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm. De bine ɑ̀ tuubi n mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ.
De ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ n sɛ ce fɔ fɔ hɑli ce iye zɑɑri fɔ kunɑ, ngɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ n dɔ ce iye zɑɑri kunɑ kɑ cii, ɑ tuubi, n mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ.
Diyɑ yom mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ nɑɑne tɔntɔnu i sɛ.
Ammɑ Kpe cii: De wom gundɑ nɑɑne zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ moogure wom hini kɑ cii dirimi nyɑ wɔ sɛ: N mɑ n bɔm dɔgu kɑ n bɔm tilɑm buulɑ wɔ kunɑ. À wom sendi gɑnɑ.
Ammɑ mee nɑ ɑkpɛ wom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mo gundɑ bɑnyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go fɑri wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ memunu yom kurum. Sɑɑ kɑ bɑnyɑ hunu zɑ gɑnji kunɑ ɑ̀ si cii bɑnyɑ di sɛ: Kɑɑ ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wɔne cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ɑ ŋmɔne wiciri ŋmɑɑri sɔlu ɑ sɛ. N mɑ n kunɑcendi hɔ kɑ ɑ no ɑ ŋmɑɑri hɑli yɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm. À bɑndɑ ni mɑ n mɑ ŋmɑɑ, n mɑ hɑm. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
À kɑɑ bɑnyɑ di sɑɑbu bɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm? Awo.
Yɑ nɑ, wom mo sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ hɛ kulu tɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ wom dɑm, wom mɑ cii: Iyom wɔ, bɑnyɑ kɔnu yom no. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi i gɑɑ i mɑ tɛ, i nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu go kpei Yerusɑlɛm ɑ̀ gɑnɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ bisɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go huro kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ jire wei nɑ ɑ̀ kube.
Ǹ cɛ hɑli jinɑ kɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Yesu, i ŋmɔne Jinɑ, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
Zɑ Yesu di ei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei, wom bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ yom sɛ. À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei ǹ nɑ ǹ hinnɑndi.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ di ngɑ du bɑɑni, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ kɑ ye. À go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ jinde beeri.
À jɛndɛbiri Yesu cee dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu. Sɑmɑriɑncɛ no.
Yesu tu kɑ cii: Iwei di du hinnɑndiyom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Ɛgɑ bine, mɑni ǹ goono?
Yo wɔ bɑ si, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu bɑ?
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu kɑ kpei. N nɑɑne nɑ n no bɑɑni.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo nɑ Yesu hã lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ no mɑ kɑɑ. Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ si kɑɑ ndɑ moo gɑɑ diyom.
Ǹ si cii mɑ: Gunɑ nee wɑlɑ gunɑ yɔngɔ. Cimi nɑ, Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ goono wom gɑme kunɑ.
Yesu cii coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Jiribi yom gɑ kɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ bɛɛjɛ wom mɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize hɑnu yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑmmɑ wom si di ɑ̀.
Ǹ kɑɑ cii wom sɛ, gunɑ ɑ̀ go nee, wɑlɑ gunɑ ɑ̀ go yɑ hɛrɛ. Wom mɑ si ǹ gɑnɑ mɑ.
Zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu cini tɛ kure fɔ kɑ kɑɑri kɑlɑ yɑ hɛrɛ kure, yɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ bɑrɑ ɑ hɑnu hine.
Ammɑ tilɑsi ɑ mɑ guruguze kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Zɑmɑni wɔ beerem mɑ hungu hɛɛ mo.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Nowe wɑtɛ, yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ hɑnu yom hine.
Beerem go ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ go hɑm. Ǹ go wɛndɛ hiji. Ǹ go hijɑndi kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ Nowe huro hɑrihi kunɑ. Cɔfɔ tumfɑnɑ hɑri kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu mɑlɑkɑ.
Yɑ no zɑngɑ Lotu wɑtɛ mɑ, beerem gɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ go hɑm. Ǹ go dei. Ǹ go neerɑ. Ǹ go tilɑm tɛ. Ǹ go cini.
Ammɑ hɑnu kɑ Lotu hunu Sodum kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ, nini ndɑ ɑlibɑro kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
Yɑ mo yɑ kɑɑ tɛ hɛɛ Adɑmize, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ hunutɛrɛ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu yɔlɔ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ngɑ jiine yom fuu kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si zumbu kɑ ǹ zɑɑ. Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɑri, ɑ̀ mɑ si ye bɑndɑ kɑ ngɑ jiine yom zɑɑ.
Wom mo hɔngɔ Lotu wɛndɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ceeci kɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi mo ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑsi.
A go cii wom sɛ, ciini kunɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ bo goono dɑɑri fɔ bɔm. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
Weibɔrɔ hinkɑ bo sɑbɑ kɑ fufu. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
Bɔrɔ hinkɑ bo goono fɑri fɔ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni no dɑ, Kpe? Cɔfɔ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Nungu kɑ jifɑ goono, nungu di no yobereku yom cini meigu.
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mo tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ bɔrɔ mɑ cini kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ sɑɑ kulu, ɑ̀ mɑ si fɑrigɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑngɑrɑ fɔ gundɑ ciitikɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. À mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dɑm mɑ.
Weibɔrɔ sokoni fɔ mɑ goono wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. À cini kpei bɔrɔ di dɔ kɑ cii: N mɑ fɑɑsɑ ɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ zojikɑri wɔ.
À hungu bɑndɑ fɔ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: A si hɑmburu Ikpɛ. A si beerem dɑm mɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu zɑmɑ wei wɔ gɑ kɑ ɑ kɑnkɑm ɑ kɑɑ fɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ kɑɑyom cɛyom si wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ɑ fɑrigɑndi.
Kpe cii: Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm hɛ kɑ ciitikɔ zɑm kɑ cɛɑntɛ susu wɔ gɑ cii.
Ikpɛ kɑɑ fɑɑsɑ ngɑ suubɑntɛ yom sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go hɛ̃ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri. À go suuru tɛ mo ǹ sɛ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
A gɑ cii wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ fɑɑsɑ ǹ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑyom wɑtɛ ɑ kɑɑ nɑɑnekpɛ yom gɑru hɑndunyɑ bɑ?
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ tɑmmɑ hɑli ngei yɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom no. Ǹ si bɔrɔ cindɑ dɑm hɛ fɔ.
À cii: Bɔrɔ hinkɑ kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Afɔ yɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ no. Afɔ mo ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ no.

Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di cɛ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm. À cii: E Ikpɛ, ɑ gɑ kɑ n sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ hɛɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ ci zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm cindei kɑ ǹ ci kɔmkɑtɑkpɛ yom wɑlɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu yom ndɑ zinɑteeri yom. Yɑ nɑ ci mɑ zɑngɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ wɔ.
A go meehɔ zɑɑ ce hinkɑ hɑnuize fɔ kunɑ. A gɑ zɑkɑ kɑɑ mɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ gundɑ kunɑ.
Alikɑsi tɑkɔ di mo cɛ hɑli jinɑ. À mɑnɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ bɔm tunɑndi bɑ kɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kɑru ndɑ binesɛrɛ kɑ cii: E Ikpɛ, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ dulumkoni.
A gɑ cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ wɔne zumbu ngɑ fuu kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ bisɑ wɔ di. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mo, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ kɑɑ cɛnɑ yom ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɑmɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di ei ǹ nɑ kɑɑndɑkɔ yom yɑyɑ.
Yesu nɑ ǹ cɛɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ nɑm kɑɑ cɛnɑ yom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ. Wɑ si ǹ gɑnji. Beerem zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tɑ zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ, ɑkpɛ si huro ɑ̀ kunɑ pɑi.
Cɔfɔ Yuifu jinɑ fɔ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ hinno, ifɔ yɑ tɛ kɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni tubu?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ n go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ihinno? Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno kɑlɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
N go meire yom bei kɑ ǹ cii: ^N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ. N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ."
Bɔrɔ di cii: Meire yom wɔ kulu no ɑ gɑnɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsuize.
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ fɔ nɑ n gɑziɑ. N mɑ hɛ kulu kɑ n gundɑ neerɑ kɑ nooru di fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. N kɑɑ du hɑizici jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. N mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ mo.
Ammɑ kɑ Yuifu yom jinɑ di mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ hɑibɑrikɑ no ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
Kɑ Yesu di ngɑ di, ɑ̀ bine go sɑrɑ. À cii: À gɑɑbu fɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
À fɑɑlɑ yoo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ huro kɑ bisɑ sɑnɑ fune kunɑ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Yesu sɛ cii: Dee mee yɑ hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ dɑ?
Yesu tu kɑ cii: Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ tɛ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ, Ikpɛ cɛ dɔ ǹ hini kɑ tɛ.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii: Gunɑ, i nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ n gɑnɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ fuu nɑm wɑlɑ ngɑ bɑhɛi yom wɑlɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ yom wɑlɑ ngɑ bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ wɑlɑ ngɑ koo yom Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ
kɑ ɑ̀ si du ǹ cine kɑ tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ. Zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ mo ɑ̀ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, I go kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Hɛ kulu mo kɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum hɛɛ Adɑmize bɔm, ǹ gɑ ǹ kulu tɔnɑndi.
Ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ dondɑ hɛɛ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ woo. Ǹ kɑɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
Ǹ gɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi. Ammɑ jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ nge yom di. Sendi di tugu ǹ sɛ, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii ǹ sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑni Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ, dɑnɑm fɔ go gɔrɔ fɔndɑ jɛrɛbɛ ko bɑrɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ jɑmɑ go bisɑ, ɑ̀ hã hɛ kɑ no.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu yɑ go bisɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Yesu, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono jine deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ dɛnjɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ tɔntɔnu kɑ cii: Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
Yesu cɛ kɑ mei no ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ ngɑ sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ, Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ n go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ n sɛ? À cii: Kpe, yɑ tɛ moo.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N moo mɑ tɛ. N nɑɑne nɑ n nɑ bɑɑni.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ di tɛ moo. À nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ kɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Kɑ jɑmɑ di kulu di ngɑ di, ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ.
Yesu huro Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ kɑ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ.
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Zɑke, ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom hɑikusu nɑ. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ nɑ.
À gɑ ceeci ngɑ mɑ di wɔ kɑ yɑ ci Yesu di. Ammɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ di ɑ̀ ndɑ bɔrɔ bɑyom zɑmɑ gɑzere nɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ kpei jine. À kɑɑru dirimi nyɑ fɔ bɔm ngɑ mɑ du kɑ di ɑ̀ zɑmɑ nungu di nɑ Yesu bɑ bisɑ.
Kɑ Yesu tɔ tuurinyɑ di dɔ ɑ̀ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ di Zɑke. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑke, zumbu ndɑ wɑɑsi zɑmɑ hunkunɑ yɑ gɔrɔ n fuu kunɑ.
Zɑke zumbu ndɑ wɑɑsi. À nɑ Yesu kube ndɑ binekɑɑne.
Kɑ beerem di ngɑ di, ǹ kulu gɑ gunugunu kɑ cii: À hurɑ dulumkoni dɔ kɑ zumbu ɑ̀ dɔ.
Ammɑ Zɑke cɛ nodi kɑ cii Kpe sɛ: Gunɑ Kpe, ɑ go kɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ jɛrɛ nɑ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. De bine ɑ dɛrɛ bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ ɑmɑɑnɑ dɔ, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ cine tɑɑci no ɑ̀ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hunkunɑ fɑɑbɑ tɔ fuu wɔ kunɑ, zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Abulɛmɑ no.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ no yɑ ceeci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, Yesu nɑ yɑɑse fɔ tɔntɔnu ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm. Beerem mɑ gɑ tɑmmɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ di bɑ hunutɛrɛ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ no.
Ngɑ di sɛ no Yesu cii: Bɔrɔ beeri fɔ kpei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ mooru kɑ du kpetɛrɛ kɑ kɑɑ.
À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom ŋmɔne iwei cɛɛ kɑ wurɑ nooru no ǹ sɛ hɑndu tɑɑci bɑnɑndi sɑrɑ. À cii: Wom mɑ tenku hɑli ɑ kɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑbu beerem hunguɑ̀. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɑmbɑ ǹ mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I si bɑɑ bɔrɔ wɔne mɑ i mei.
À kɑɑ tɔ, ɑ̀ du kpetɛrɛ kɑ ye fuu. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei bɑnyɑ yom di cɛɛ ngɑ sɛ. Nooru kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ di hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu du tenku gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ sintine kɑɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, n nooru iwei hɛi ɑ̀ bɔm.
Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À boori bɑnyɑ hinno, zɑmɑ n tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ kunɑ, n mɑ wɑngɑrɑ wei mei.
Bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ kɑɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, n nooru nɑ igu hɛi ɑ̀ bɔm.
Kpe cii bɔrɔ ngɑ di sɛ: Ni mɑ, n mɑ wɑngɑrɑ gu mei.
Afɔ mɑ kɑɑ. À cii: Kpe, gunɑ n nooru neyɑ kɑ ɑ du kɑ tugu fɑtɑlɑ kunɑ.
A nɑ ngɑ di tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ hɑmburu ni. Ni yɑ bɔrɔ gɑɑbɔ no. Hɛ kɑ n mɑnɑ dɑm nɑ n cini zɑɑ. Hɛ kɑ n mɑnɑ dumɑ no, n cini wi.
Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ n ciiti ndɑ n mee sendi, bɑnyɑ lɑlɔ. N bei kɑ hɛɛ wɔ bɔrɔ gɑɑbɔ nɑ. A gɑ zɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ mɑnɑ dɑm. A gɑ wi hɛ kɑ ɑ mɑnɑ dumɑ.
Dee ifɔ sɛ n mɑnɑ ɑ nooruɑ dɑm nungu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛi zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ yɑ dɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ndɑ ɑ̀ liibɑ?
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ dɔ: Wom mɑ nooru wɔ zɑɑ kɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ du liibɑ wei sɛ.
Beerem di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ammɑ kpe, ɑ̀ gundɑ liibɑ wei kɔ.
A go cii wom sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑndɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo, bo hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ wom mɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom nee kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ bɑɑ yɑ ngei mei. Wom mɑ ǹ wi ɑ jine.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hurɑ ǹ jine kɑ ziji ko kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
A kɑɑ tɔ Yesu mɑɑni Betɑfɑji kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ, tondi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. A nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm.

À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i jine. Sɑɑ kɑ wom go huro ɑ̀ kunɑ wom kɑɑ di fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑru ɑ̀ bɔm bɑ ce fɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ feeri kɑ kɑɑndɑ nee.
De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wom hã ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ feeri, wom mɑ cii: Kpe yɑ gundɑ ɑ̀ murɑdu.
Coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm kpei. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ.
Kɑ ǹ go fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu di feeri, fɑrikɑkpɛ yom cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ feeri?
Ǹ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe yɑ gundɑ ɑ̀ murɑdu.
Ǹ kpeindɑ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu di Yesu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngei jiine yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ Yesu mo dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɔndɔ bɔm, beerem go kɑ ngei jiine yom dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑni Olibe zugu tondi kuku zuli kunɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom bɑyom kulu gɑ fɑihã. Ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ simbɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei kulu kɑ ǹ di.
Ǹ go cii: "Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ, Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ. Bɑɑni mɑ tɛ bɛɛnɛ. Deizɑ mo mɑ tɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ hɑli sɑmɑu."
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ goono jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, n mɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom kɔnkɔm.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A gɑ cii wom sɛ, de beerem wɔ dɛnjɛ tondi yom kɑɑ kuwɑ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑni hɑli ɑ̀ di wɑngɑrɑ, ɑ̀ hɛ̃ wɑngɑrɑ di gɑɑ.
À cii: Ni mo, n sibei bɑ hunkunɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑni zɑmɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ tugu n moo yom sɛ.
Hɑnu yom go kɑɑ n gɑɑ kɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑɑ birini kuku cini kɑ n hundi. Ǹ gɑ n koli kɑ hundi kɑ n kɑmkɑm cɔrɔ yom kulu gɑɑ.
Ǹ gɑ n zeeri gɑndɑ mɑ, ni ndɑ n kɑɑ yom n bumbum kunɑ. Ǹ si tɑndi fɔ nɑm tondi bɔm zɑmɑ lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ n dɔ, n mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Kɑ Yesu huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ nodi neerɑkɔ yom ndɑ deikɔ yom gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "A gɔrɛ dɔ yɑ ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ no". Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ "lɔkɔ zee yom ŋmɔne".
Hɑnu kulu Yesu gɑ cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom go ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ǹ mɑnɑ du kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ zɑmɑ jɑmɑ di kulu gɑ sɑɑle dɑm Yesu sendi gɑɑ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɔ hɑnu nge yom di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ Yesu gɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À gɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ. Cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cii i sɛ hini fɔ nɑ n gɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ? Mee yɑ nɑ n no hini wɔ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mɑ, ɑ wom hã hɛ fɔ. Wom mɑ cii ɑ sɛ.
Mirɑndiyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ, Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu dee wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ?
Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi cɛrɛ gɑme kɑ cii: De i cii Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii, yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ sɛ no i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne?
Ammɑ de i cii iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu, jɑmɑ wɔ kulu gɑ i cetu ndɑ tondi yom zɑmɑ jɑmɑ tɑbɑi kɑ Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no.
Cɔfɔ ǹ tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii ngei si bei nungu kɑ mirɑndiyom di hunu.
Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mo, ɑ si cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ.
Yesu bine sinti kɑ yɑɑse wɔ tɛ jɑmɑ di sɛ. A cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ lɛzɛ̃ tuuri yom tilɑm. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɑifɑri fɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑ nɑɑru lɑɑbu ŋmɑni kɑ jɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ tuuriize kɔsuyom wɑtɛ tɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm hɑifɑri yom di dɔ ǹ mɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ize no ɑ̀ sɛ. Ammɑ hɑifɑri yom di nɑ ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ ɑ̀ yeti kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
Lɑmbukpɛ di nɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm kpɛɛnɛ. Hɑifɑri yom di nɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑru. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ woo. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yeti kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
À nɑ bɑnyɑ hinzɑntɛ dɔntɔm ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ mɑ mɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ.
Lɑmbukpɛɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ? A bei. A gɑ ɑ kɑɑ binegɑnji dɔntɔm. Hɑnibɑ de ǹ di ngɑ wɔ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
Ammɑ kɑ hɑifɑri yom di ɑ̀, ǹ sendi cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci tubukɔ. Wɑ kɑɑ, i mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Tubu di mɑ ci i ŋmɔne.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cetu lɑmbuɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi. Yɑ di gɑɑ mɛtɛ lɑmbukpɛɑ di kɑɑ tɛ hɑifɑri yom di sɛ?
À kɑɑ gbeiteeri yom wi kɑ lɑmbuɑ nɑ bɔrɔ ŋmɑni yom sɛ. Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑ di cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Ikpɛ mɑ si tɑ.
Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Dee ifɔ yɑ ci wɔne kɑ ǹ hɑntum feeriji? "Tondi kɑ cinikɔ yom hungu, ɑ̀ tɛ cinɑri mimbɑri cire tɑndi sintine."
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm tɑndi di bɔm, ɑkpɛ tutubu no. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm tondɑ kɑm, tɑndɑ gɑ ɑ̀ fufu.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii. Ǹ bine hɑmburu jɑmɑ di zɑmɑ ǹ bei ngei bɔm no Yesu nɑ yɑɑse cii.

Ǹ go Yesu lɑɑkɑli gunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ceekpɛrɛtɑɑsi yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom. Ǹ go kɔbɛ fɔ ceeci ɑ̀ gɑɑ sendi fɔ dɔ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm gɑɑbikoni kɑmbɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bei kɑ n go sendi bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ. N go cooɑndi cɑu cɑu. N si bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ n gɑ cooɑndi Ikpɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ cimi.
À hɑlɑli i sɛ i mɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ bɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli?
Zɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ cɛmbɛrɛ bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom gɑ kɑ ɑ bubure?
Wɑ ɑ cɛbɛ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize fɔ. Mee bɔm ndɑ mee jeeri nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wɔ? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑisɑ ŋmɔne nɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ Kɑisɑ hɛ yom nɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ, Ikpɛ hɛ yom mɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
Ǹ si hini kɑ Yesu dii ndɑ ɑ̀ sendi yom jɑmɑ di jine. Ǹ gɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ zɑngɑ Yesu tu kɑ yeti, ǹ dɛnjɛ.
Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ cii bukɔei tunɑndiyom si, ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hã.
Ǹ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, Moisi hɑntum i sɛ kɑ cii de bɛɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wɛndɛ bu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kɑɑ nɑm, ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ mɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ kɑ du hɛiyom ngɑ bɛɛrɛ di sɛ.
Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ iye goono. Sintine nɑ wɛndɛ fɔ zɑɑ. À bu. À mɑnɑ hɛi.
Ihinkɑntɛ nɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ. Ngɑ mɑ bu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛi.
Ihinzɑntɛ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ yɑ di kɑlɑ iyɑntɑ. Ǹ bu, ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi.
Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ weibɔrɔ di mɑ bu.
Ngɑ di sɛ tunɑndiyomɑ hine, ǹ kunɑ mee wɛndɛ nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ bɔrɔ iye kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ wɛndɛ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑmɑni wɔ beerem gɑ hiji, ǹ go hijɑndi.
Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ǹ tɔ ǹ mɑ du bɑ zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kunɑ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom kunɑ, ǹ si hiji, ǹ si hijɑndi.
Ǹ si hini kɑ bu kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom. Ikpɛ ize yom mo no zɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ tunɑndiyom ize yom.
Ammɑ bukɔ yom kɑɑ tunu. Moisi bumbum nɑ ngɑ di cɛbɛ kubu dɔ, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ɑ̀ gɑ Kpe cɛɛ kɑ cii: "Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ^.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bukɔ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ bɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci bɑhunɑ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ wɔ dɔ ǹ kulu gɑ hunɑ.
Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom mɑ tu kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, n sendi ihinno.
À bɑndɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ tu kɑ ɑ̀ hã hɛ fɔ kulu kpɛɛnɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Dɑfidi ize no?
Dɑfidi bumbum cii Sɑmu yom tirɑ kunɑ: "Kpe cii ɑ Kpe sɛ, n mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ,
hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee yom dɛcɛ yom dɔ".
Dɑfidi bumbum gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ci ɑ̀ ize?
Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di kulu go hɑngɑ dɑm, ɑ̀ sendi ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ.

À cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑ kɑ yɑɑli ndɑ kpɛ kuku. Ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ǹ mɑ cini kɑ ngei fɔɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ bɑɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ yom mɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ jingɑru ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
Ngei yɑ gɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom fuu yom kuu. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ kuku tɛ kɑ himɑ zɑngɑ gɑnɑkɔ hinno yom. Ǹ kɑɑ du ciiti ifutu futu.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ bɔm tunɑndi ɑ̀ di hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom gɑ kɑ ngei sɑrɑɑ yom dɑm nooru jisiyom dɔ.
À di weibɔrɔ sokoni tɑlikɑ fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑngɑ hinkɑ dɑm.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ sokoni tɑlikɑ wɔ nɑ nooru dɑm kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ kulu.
Ngei wɔ ǹ nooru dɛcɛ bɔm no ǹ dɑm kɑ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑmmɑ wei wɔ no ngɑ hinɑ dɑm. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ noyɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ ndɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ sendi tɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ tɑndi hinno yom ndɑ sɑrɑɑ yom.
Yesu cii: Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bɛ yom kɑ wom gɑ gunɑ, hɑnu yom gɑ kɑɑ kɑ bɑ tɑndi fɔ si cindi tɑndi bɔm kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ see.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, sɑɑ fɔ nɑ hɛ nge yom di kɑɑ tɛ dɑ? Alɑmu fɔ yɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di bɑ kɑɑ?
Yesu bine cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ǹ mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ boobo yɑ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Lɔkɑci bine tɔ. Wom mɑ si ǹ gɑnɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ ǹ mɑ wɑngu yom bɑɑru ndɑ lɑɑbu yom wɑngu kɔsɔngu, wom mɑ si hɑmburu. Tilɑsi nɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ, ɑmmɑ beeniyom mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ mɑ: Dimi kɑɑ tunu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ dimi. Kpetɛrɛ kɑɑ tunu kpetɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Gɑndɑ zinjiyom bɑmbɑtɑ yom kɑɑ tɛ nungu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. Hɛrɛɛ ndɑ bɑlɑu yom ndɑ hɑmbure bɛ yom kɑɑ goono. Alɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ yom kɑɑ tɛ kɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
Ammɑ hɑli yom di kulu tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ wom dii kɑ wom Ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kɑmbɛ kɑ wom dɑm kɑsu. Ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ndɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni yom jine ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ sɛdɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ wɑ zɑɑ wom bine yom kunɑ, wom mɑ si jinɑ kɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ zɑngɑ wom kɑɑ tu kɑ cii.
Hɛɛ bumbum, ɑ wom no mee kɑ sendi ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Bine, wom zojikɑri yom kulu si hini kɑ tu wom sɛ wɑlɑ kɑ hungu wom sɛ.
Ammɑ wom bɑhɛi yom ndɑ wom cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ wom bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ wom hɑikusu yom ndɑ wom kpɑɑsi yom, ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ mɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ yom wi.
Ǹ kulu kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Ammɑ wom bɔm hɑmini bɑ ɑfɔ si hɑlɑci.
Wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori. À gɑɑ no wom kɑɑ du wom hundi yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ di wɑnguize yom nɑ Yerusɑlɛm koli kɑ hundi wom mɑ bei kɑ Yerusɑlɛm hɑlɑciyom mɑɑni noyɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei tondi kuku yom kunɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono wɑngɑrɑ bindi kunɑ mɑ mɑ zuuru kɑ hunu. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono gɑnji yom kunɑ mo, ǹ mɑ si huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
Fɑɑsɑ hɑnu yom hine noyɑ hɑli hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum mɑ tɔ.
Ammɑ kɑito weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ kunu, ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑnɑndi hɑnu nge yom di. Kɑnkɑmi bɑmbɑtɑ yɑ kɑɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ndɑ binetɔnɛ jɑmɑ wɔ gɑɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑ kɑm tɑkubɑ mee kɑɑnu cire. Ǹ gɑ ǹ dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ kpeindei hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ. Dimi cindei kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm tɑɑmu kɑlɑ dimi cindei lɔkɑci mɑ kube.
Alɑmu yom mo kɑɑ tɛ weenu ndɑ hɑndu ndɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom kunɑ. Hɑndunyɑ kunɑ mo, dimi yom kulu lɑɑkɑli kɑɑ tunu kɑ biti kɑlɑ kɑlɑ tɛku kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ boosu yom sɑbu sɛ.
Beerem gɑ ngei hundi kɑɑ ndɑ hɑmburu, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ǹ go kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm sɑbu sɛ. Bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri yom kɑɑ zinji.
Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ buru bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ deizɑ bɑmbɑtɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di sinti kɑ tɛ, wɑ wom bɔm yom tunɑndi kɑ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ. Wom fɑnsɑyom go mɑɑni.
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ jee nyɑ gunɑ ndɑ tuurinyɑ yom kulu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ sinti kɑ fiyo, wom bumbum di ko bei kɑ kediɑ mɑɑni kɔ.
Yɑ nɑ bɑ wom mɑ, sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ di bɛ nge yom di gɑ tɛ, wom mɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni.
Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, zɑmɑni wɔ si beeni pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ kulu mɑ tɔ.
Bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ kɑɑ beeni, ɑmmɑ ɑ sendi yom si beeni pɑi.
Wom bumbum, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm hɑli wom bine yom si tim ndɑ butuguyom ndɑ buguyom ndɑ hundi kɑrihã yom. Hɑnu ngɑ di mɑ si kɑɑ wom sɛ jirise kunɑ.
À kɑɑ kɑɑ no zɑngɑ kuse hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ kulu bɔm.
À sɛ no, wom mo bɑtu. Wom mo ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ du dɑbɑri kɑ kɔmɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑ ǹ bɑ tɛ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ du kɑ cɛ mo hɛɛ Adɑmize jine.
Zɑɑri kulu Yesu cini cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ciini ɑ̀ cini hunu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ tondi kuku bɔm kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu.
Susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine bɔrɔ kulu cini kpei ɑ̀ dɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru bine kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru gɑ mɑɑni.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom gɑ ceeci zɑngɑ ngei mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu wi. Ammɑ jɑmɑ di nɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu.
Setɑm huro Yudɑ bine kunɑ, Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ mɑɑ dɛcɛ Isikɑriɔtu. À goono coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ kunɑ.
Yudɑ kpei sendi gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ yom sɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ bine gɑ yee. Ǹ cii ngei gɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nooru.
Yudɑ tu. Zɑ sɑɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ceeci ngɑ mɑ Yesu dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ, jɑmɑ di mɑ si bei.
Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu tɔ, hɑnuɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ gɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru feeji wi.
Yesu bine nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔntɔm kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei, wom mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri sɔlu tɛ i mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni nɑ n gɑ bɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu?
À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, sɑɑ kɑ wom go huro wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ, hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑɑbu hɑri jɛrɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom kube. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑlɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ huro.
Wom mɑ cii hundikpɛ di sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ cii n sɛ, mɑni fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ zumbu kɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom?
À kɑɑ wom cɛbɛ jidɑmbisɑ fuu beeri fɔ, kɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ. À kunɑ no wom mɑ jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
Ǹ kpei nodi. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru zɑngɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
Sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci tɔ, Yesu gɔrɔ ndɑ diyɑ wei cindi hinkɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: A gundɑ guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri wɔ ŋmɑɑ wom bɑndɑ zɑ yɑ nɑ guruguze.
A go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ gulɑize fɔ zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ cii: Wɑ wɔne zɑɑ kɑ fɑrisi wom gɑme.
A go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si lɛzɛ̃ hɑri hɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ ɑ̀ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ. À cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑbɑm kɑ ɑ go no wom sɑbu sɛ. Wom mɑ wɔne tɛ kɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ.
Yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gulɑize fɔ mɑ zɑɑ wiciri ŋmɑɑri di bɑndɑ kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ kuri ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne teji tɛyom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ munu wom sɑbu sɛ.
Ammɑ gunɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kpei ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sinti kɑ cɛrɛ hã: Mee no bɔrɔ kpɛ i kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ wɔne tɛ?
Kɑkɔ fɔ mo tunu ǹ gɑme ngei mɑ bei ngei kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ibeeri.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Dimi cindei kpe yom go kɑ ngei hini cɛbɛ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ ngei beerem bɔm. Ngei kɑ ǹ go hini cɛbɛ beerem bɔm, ǹ go kɑ ǹ cɛɛ ihinno tɛkɔ yom.
À mɑ si ci zɑngɑ yɑ wom gɑme. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ibeeri kɑ bisɑ wom kulu ɑ̀ mɑ ci icɛnɑ kulu kulu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci jinɑ ɑkpɛ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ.
Mee yɑ ci ibeeri nee, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ dee wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ? À nɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ no bɑ? Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ goono wom gɑme kɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ.
Ammɑ wom, wom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ bo goono ndɑ hɛɛ ɑ bubure yom kunɑ.
A sɛ no, hɛɛ mo ɑ go kpetɛrɛ jisi wom sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ jisi ɑ sɛ.
À gɑɑ no wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ hɛɛ ɑ tɑbulu dɔ ɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ mɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ yom bɔm kɑ Isirɑilɑ dimi wei cindi hinkɑ ciiti.
Kpe cii: Simɔ, Simɔ gunɑ, Setɑm ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ du wom kɑ zinji zɑngɑ mɔsɔngu.
Ammɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ n sɛ zɑmɑ n nɑɑne mɑ si gɑziɑ. Ni mo, sɑɑ kɑ n kɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye n mɑ n nyɑize yom nɑ gɑɑbi.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ sɔlu kɑ n gɑnɑ kɑ kpei hɑli kɑsu wɑlɑ bu.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Piɛɛ, ɑ cii n sɛ, hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ hunkunɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ kɑ cii n si ɑ bei.
À cii ǹ sɛ mo: Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom dɔntɔm zɑlifɔntɔ si, fɔlɔ si, tɑɑmu si, hɛ fɔ nɑ wom gɑziɑ bɑ? Ǹ cii: Bɑ bɛ fɔ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Ammɑ mɑɑsɑnkulu bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ zɑlifɔntɔ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ fɔlɔ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑkubɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ jiine neerɑ kɑ tɑkubɑ dei.
A gɑ cii wom sɛ: Sendi wɔne kɑ ǹ hɑntum kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi ɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, "Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ yom kunɑ". Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm, ǹ gundɑ ǹ tɔnɑndiyom.
Cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Kpe, gunɑ nee tɑkubɑ hinkɑ. A cii ǹ sɛ: A wɑsɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ kpei Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ dɔ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ dɔnɑ kɑ cini tɛ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ nungu di ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ.
À felem ndei zɑngɑ tɑndi cetuyom moore sɑrɑ. À sɔmbu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ cii:
Bɑɑbɑ, de n bɑɑ, n mɑ tɑɑbi wɔ moorɑndi ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ɑ binebɑɑ ɑmmɑ n ŋmɔnɛ mɑ tɛ. [
Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ no gɑɑbi.
Kɑ binesɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ Yesu dii, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ niyɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sunje ye zɑngɑ kuri kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ toli gɑndɑ.]
Aduwɑ tɛyom bɑndɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom dɔ. À nɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ go jiibi binesɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go jiibi? Wɑ tunu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi, cɔfɔ jɑmɑ fɔ kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yudɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑ̀ goono jɑmɑ di jine. À mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sumsum.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yudɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize nɑ n go dɑm kɑmbɛ yɑ ndɑ sumsumyom?
Sɑɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yesu hundɑntɛ di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ, ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, i mɑ beri ndɑ tɑkubɑ nɑ?
Cɔfɔ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bɑnyɑ beri kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɑngɑ kɑɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ nɑm. Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ bɔrɔ di hɑngɑ hɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom zɑngɑ zee?
Hɑnu kulu mɑ ɑ go gɔrɔ wom dɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, wom mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ gɑɑ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom ŋmɔne lɔkɑci tɔ. Kube dɑbɑri ŋmɔne lɔkɑci mo tɔ.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu dii kɑ ɑ̀ boi. Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ fuu kunɑ. Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu hɑmine zɑ nungu mooru.
Ǹ nɑ nini fɔ funsu hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ nungu kɑ beerem meigu kɑ gɔrɔ. Piɛɛ gɔrɔ ǹ gɑme kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ gbeiize hundiyɑ fɔ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ nini dɔ. Hundiyo di nɑ mɑɑ sinji Piɛɛ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ. A cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑ goono Yesu bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu ze kɑ cii: Wei wɔ, ɑ si ɑ̀ bei.
À tɔntɔnu cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ fɔ mo di ɑ̀ kɑ cii: Ni mo n goono beerem di kunɑ. Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii: E hɑru wɔ, ɑ si ǹ kunɑ.
À tɔ zɑngɑ guuru fɔ sɑrɑ, ɑfɔ mo tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ cii: Cimi no bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ nɑ.
Piɛɛ ye kɑ cii: E hɑru wɔ, ɑ si bei hɛ kɑ n gɑ cii wɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ.
Cɔfɔ Kpe bɛrɛ kɑ Piɛɛ gunɑ. Bine, Piɛɛ hɔngɔ Kpe sendɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ sɛ: Hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
Piɛɛ hunu tɛrɛ kɑ hɛ̃ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu dii, ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑru.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ moo hɔ ko kɑ ɑ̀ sɑm. Ǹ cii: N mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Mee yɑ nɑ n kɑru?
Ǹ nɑ sendi ŋmɑni yom mo cii ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ woobi yom.
Kɑ mo bo mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom meigu. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu ngei ciiti dumbukɔ yom dɔ.
Ǹ cii: De ni Mɛsiyɑ nɑ, n mɑ cii i sɛ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: De ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ, wom si cimɑndi bɑ cɛnɑ.
De bine ɑ go wom hã wom si tu ɑ sɛ. Wom si ɑ nɑm mɑ yɑ kpei.
Ammɑ zɑ mɑɑsɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu cii: Ni wɔ bine, Ikpɛ Ize nɑ? Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum go cii, hɛɛ yɑ ci ngɑ.
Ǹ cii: Sɛdɑ fɔ nɑ i gɑ bɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ? I yom bumbum, i mɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ mee kunɑ.
Jɑmɑ kulu tunu kɑ kpeindɑ Yesu Pilɑtu dɔ.
Ǹ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ kɑ cii: I nɑ bɔrɔ gɑru ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i dimi bɛrɛ kɑ hungu ǹ mɑ Kɑisɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ. À gɑ cii mɑ ngɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ, Kpe fɔ.
Pilɑtu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ni, n ci Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n cii.
Cɔfɔ Pilɑtu cii gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɛ ndɑ jɑmɑ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ cɛ tɑkɑkɑ kɑ cii: À gɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi Yude lɑɑbu kulu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sinti kɑlɑ nee kɑ kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ.
Kɑ Pilɑtu mɑɑ ǹ nɑ Gɑlile sendi tɛ, ɑ̀ hã hɑli Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ nɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ǹ cii Hirodu dɑbɑri dɔ bɔrɔ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Hirodu dɔ. Jiribi nge yom di no Hirodu mo goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Kɑ Hirodu mɑ di Yesu, ɑ̀ bine gɑ yee kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ zɑ jɛyom no ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ di ɑ̀. À mɑɑ bɑɑru boobo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yesu. À go bɛɛjɛ mo ngɑ mɑ di ɑlɑmu fɔ mɑ tɛ Yesu dɔ.
À hiyɑ kɑ Yesu hã ndɑ sendi boobo, ɑmmɑ Yesu mɑnɑ bɛ fɔ kulu cii kɑ yeti ɑ̀ sɛ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mo ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ go cɛ nodi kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ilɑlɔ lɑlɔ.
Hirodu mo ndɑ ɑ̀ wɑnguize yom nɑ Yesu cɛnɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ nɑ jiine cɑɑdɑntɛ fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. À bɑndɑ Hirodu nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Pilɑtu dɔ kpɛɛnɛ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di no Pilɑtu ndɑ Hirodu nɑ kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ bɑ kɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ jinɑ kɑ goono ǹ gɑme.
Pilɑtu bine nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom meigu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ jɑmɑ di.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ ɑ dɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go jɑmɑ bɛrɛ. Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hã wom jine. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ mɑnɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ndɑ.
Yɑ no Hirodu mo, zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ wom sɑmbɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Gunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di bɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. [
À tilɑsi Pilɑtu gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑm ǹ sɛ jingɑru wɔ gɑɑ.]
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kulu sɑbɑ kɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ cii: N mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ wi. N mɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm i sɛ.
Bɑrɑbɑ wɔ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ lɑɑbu fɔndɔ hunguɛ tɛ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom wi mo hunguɛ di kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ zɑ kɑ Pilɑtu go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Yesu tɑm Pilɑtu ye kɑ sendi jɑmɑ di sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Ammɑ ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: À kɑnji. À kɑnji.
Ce hinzɑntɛ kpɛɛnɛ Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ? Hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ? Yɑ nɑ di ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
Ammɑ ǹ cɛ tɑkɑkɑ kɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Jɑmɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom kuwɑ kɑ hini Pilɑtu.
Pilɑtu cii hɛ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ yɑ tɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu lɑɑbu fɔndɔ hunguɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom di sɑbu sɛ, jɑmɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. Pilɑtu nɑ bɔrɔ ngɑ di tɑm. À nɑ Yesu mo dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ zɑngɑ ǹ bine gɑ bɑɑ.
Kɑ ǹ go kpeindɑ Yesu ǹ kube ndɑ Simɔ Sileni bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu gɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ Yesu bɑndɑ.
Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom. Ǹ go bɛrɛɛ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ.
Yesu bɛrɛ kɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Yerusɑlɛm hundiyo yom, wɑ si hɛ̃ ɑ gɑɑ. Ammɑ wɑ hɛ̃ wom bɔm gɑɑ ndɑ wom koo yom gɑɑ.
Gunɑ, hɑnu yom go kɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑ ǹ kɑɑ cii: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom nɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ hɛi ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi ndɑ fɑfɑ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑnɑndi.
"Ǹ kɑɑ sinti kɑ cii tondi kuku yom sɛ, wɑ kɑm i bɔm. Ǹ kɑɑ cii gure beeri yom sɛ, wɑ i dɑɑbu."
De ǹ go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ tuuri gɑni yom sɛ, ifɔ yɑ kɑɑ tɔ tuuri kɔgɔ yom?
Ǹ nɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ hinkɑ fɔ mo boi ǹ mɑ ǹ wi Yesu bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɔm Kurumbu, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Yɑ nɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ hinkɑ mo. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ kɑnji Yesu kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mɑ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
Yesu cii: Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ ǹ yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ ǹ si bei hɛ kɑ ngei gɑ tɛ. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ̀ jiine yom bɔm kɑ ǹ fɑrisi.
Jɑmɑ di gɑ cɛ ko gunɑ. Hinikpɛ yom mɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru kɑ cii: À nɑ ɑfɔ yom fɑɑbɑ. À mɑ ngɑ bɔm fɑɑbɑ de ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne Suubɑni.
Wɑnguize yom mɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ mɑɑni kɑ hɑri mɔrɔ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ǹ cii: De ni Yuifu yom Kpe no, n mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ ni bumbum.
Yesu bɔm dɔ mɑ hɑntum fɔ goono kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ Gɑrɛku cinɛ ndɑ Lome cinɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ kɑ cii. BƆRƆ KPƐ YA CI YUIFU YOM KPE.
Hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ yom kɑ ǹ kɑnji, ɑfɔ nɑ Yesu woo kɑ cii: De n ci Mɛsiyɑ n mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ, ni bumbum ndɑ i yom mo.
Ammɑ ihinkɑntɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm kɑ cii: N si hɑmburu Ikpɛ bɑ, ni kɑ n goono ciiti fɔlɔnku cire?
I yom wɔ ciiti kɑ i go du wɔ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ i tɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu tɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ sɑɑ kɑ n huro n kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cimi nɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, hunkunɑ n bo goono ɑ bɑndɑ Nungu Hinno bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
À tɔ zɑngɑ zɑɑri weenu bɔm bindi, cɔfɔ kube tɛ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑlɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ.
Weenu kube. Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑbude kɔɔtu bindi kunɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ hundi dɑm n kɑmbɛ. Kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
Kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ cii: Hɑlɑbɑdɑ, bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ bɔrɔ cɛsusu nɑ.
Jɑmɑ di kulu gɑ meigu ko gunɑ. Kɑ ǹ di hɛ yom kɑ ǹ tɛ, ǹ gɑ bɛrɛɛ. Ǹ ye wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kɑ ngei jɛndɛ kɑru binesɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu bei ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu dum zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ǹ cɛ hɑli jinɑ. Ǹ gɑ gunɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ.
Gunɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yosɛfu. Ngɑ mɑ yɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom hɑikusu fɔ. Bɔrɔ hinno no. Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu mɑ nɑ.
Bɔrɔ ngɑ di mɑnɑ tu ndɑ ǹ sɑwɑri ndɑ ǹ tɛgbei. Alimɑte bɔrɔ nɑ, Yuifu yom wɑngɑrɑ fɔ. Ngɑ mɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ nɑ ɑ̀ go bɑtu.
Bɔrɔ ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑ Pilɑtu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ Yesu bukɔɑ.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɑndi sɑɑrɛ fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ zozobu. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dɑm sɑɑrɛ di kunɑ bɑ ce fɔ.
Hulonzom hɑnu sɔlu hine no, hulonzom hɑnu bɑ huro.
Weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dum zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu, ǹ nɑ Yosɛfu gɑnɑ kɑ di sɑɑrɛ di ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ bukɔɑ dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Kɑ weibɔrɔ yom di bɛrɛ kɑ ye, ǹ nɑ yɑzi yom ndɑ wɑidi yom sɔlu. Hulonzom hɑnu hine ǹ hulonzom zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii.
Ammɑ jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi susubɑ zɑ ndɑ bine weibɔrɔ yom di kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ yɑzi yom kɑ ǹ sɔlu.
Ǹ kɑɑ gɑru ǹ nɑ tondɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi sɑɑrɑ mee gɑɑ.
Kɑ ǹ huro sɑɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ Kpe Yesu bukɔ gɑru.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ weibɔrɔ yom di go biti ndɑ hɛ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ gɑ cɛ ǹ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Ǹ gundɑ jiine yom kɑ ǹ go hɑɑgɑ.
Kɑ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii ǹ nɑ bɔm gum gɑndɑ. Hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ di cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom gɑ bɑhunɑ ceeci bukɔ yom gɑme?
À si nee. À tunu. Wom mɑ hɔngɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Gɑlile lɑɑbu, zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sendi wom sɛ.
Wom mɑ hɔngɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ ngɑ Adɑmize, dɑm dulumkoni yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tunu kpɛɛnɛ.
Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ yom di hɔngɔ Yesu sendi yom.
Kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ sɑɑrɑ dɔ ǹ kpei hɛ nge yom di deede coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi fɔ di sɛ ndɑ gɑnɑkɔ kulu sɛ.
Weibɔrɔ yom di neyɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ yom di cii diyɑ yom sɛ: Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Joɑnɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Yɑkɔfu nyɑ, ndɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑ.
Ammɑ weibɔrɔ yom di sendi yom go himɑ ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ jendi. Ǹ si sendi yom tu cimi.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ tunu kɑ zuuru kɑ kpei sɑɑrɛ di dɔ. À lingo. À di cɛsɛnjɛ go jisi kɑmbu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ dirɑ ko mɑmɑci ngɑ bine kunɑ ndɑ hɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Gunɑ hɑnu ngɑ di, coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ fɔ mo go dirɑ fɔndɔ bɔm. Ǹ go kpei kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Emɑsu. Kpɑɑrɑ di ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm moore tɔ kilomɛti wei cindi fɔ.
Ǹ go sendi cɛrɛ sɛ ko fɑɑji hɛ yom di kulu kɑ ǹ tɛ bɔm.
À kɑɑ tɔ bine kɑ ǹ goono fɑɑji di gɑɑ ko sendi, cɔfɔ Yesu bumbum mɑɑni ko dirɑ ǹ bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ moo yom birikɑ kɑlɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei.
A cii ǹ sɛ: Sendi fɔ dimi no wom go tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ wom dirɑ wɔ kunɑ? Ifɔ sɛ wom moodumɑ yom gɑ binesɛrɛ cɛbɛ?
Cɔfɔ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Celopɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ goono Yerusɑlɛm, yɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ tɛ jiribi yom wɔ gɑme?
À cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑli hɛ fɔ dimi yom? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ tɛ kɑ simbɑ Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu, ɑndebi fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri gbei kunɑ ndɑ sendi kunɑ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ jɑmɑ kulu jine.
Ngɑ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ i hinikpɛ yom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ kɑ wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
I yom wɔ i tɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Isirɑilɑ kɑɑ kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ ngɑ di kulu, zɑ hɛ yom di tɛ hunkunɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ jiribi hinzɑntɛ.
Ammɑ i kunɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ yom mo nɑ i jirisi kɑ ǹ tunu zɑ ɑsubɑ beeri kɑ kpei sɑɑrɑ dɔ.
Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di bukɔɑ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom fɑitɑ ngei sɛ. Ǹ go cii mo ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono i kunɑ, ngei mɑ kpei sɑɑrɑ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru mo zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ yom di nɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ di wɔ, ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: E fɑhɑm zɑmkɔ yom, wom bine yom si wɑɑsu kɑ nɑɑne hɛ kulu kɑ ɑndebi yom cii.
À himɑ no Mɛsiyɑ mɑ guruguze wɔne yom gɑɑ kɑ huro ngɑ deizɑ kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Zɑ Moisi gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑ kpei ɑndebi yom kulu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ fɑsɑli ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kulu kunɑ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bumbum.
Kɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑni kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bisɑ ngɑ hinne.
Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi kɑ cii: N mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ i yom nee zɑmɑ wiciri kɑmbu mɑɑni. Weenu bɑ kɑm. À hurɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ.
À kɑɑ tɔ bine kɑ ɑ̀ goono tɑbulu gɑɑ ǹ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. A nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ moo yom feeri. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ dɛrɛ ǹ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: À nɑ ci i bine yom fɑihã bɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi i sɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom fɑsɑli sɛ?
