À gɑɑ no, ǹ tunu kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm. Ǹ nɑ iwei cindi fɔ di gɑru ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ meigu ǹ bɑndɑ.
Ǹ gɑ cii: Cimi no, Ikpɛ nɑ Kpe tunɑndi. À fɑitɑ Simɔ sɛ mɑ.
Bɔrɔ hinkɑ mo deede hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ zɑngɑ ngei nɑ ɑ̀ bei buuru di zenjiyom gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go hɛ nge yom di cii, Yesu bumbum go cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ.
Ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ tɑmmɑ gɑndɑ bukɔ nɑ ngei di.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom bine kɔsu? Ifɔ sɛ wom go lɑsɑbu yom wɔ tɛ wom bine yom kunɑ?
Wɑ gunɑ, ɑ kɑmbɛ yom ndɑ ɑ cee yom. Hɛɛ no. Wom mɑ ɑ hɑmɑ kɑ di, zɑmɑ gɑndɑ bukɔ sindɑ gɑɑhɑm ndɑ biri zɑngɑ ɑ gundɑ zɑngɑ wom go di.
Ngɑ di ciiyom gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ ndɑ ngɑ cee yom.
Ammɑ ǹ fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ ǹ mɑmɑci sɑbu sɛ ǹ si tu cimi no. À gɑɑ no Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom gundɑ hɛ fɔ nee kɑ ŋmɑɑ bɑ?
Ǹ nɑ ciifi dumbɑri bɑndɑntɛ fɔ no ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ yu fɛntu cɛnɑ fɔ.
À nɑ ǹ zɑɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ ǹ jine.

Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Sendi yom kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ neyɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom kunɑ ndɑ Sɑmu yom tirɑ kunɑ, kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ ǹ kulu tɔnɑndi.
À nɑ ǹ lɑɑkɑli feeri hɑli ǹ mɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii mɑ, yɑ no kɑlɑ de hɛɛ, Mɛsiyɑ yɑ guruguze. A mɑ tunu mo bukɔei gɑme jiribi hinzɑntɛ.
Ǹ mɑ wɑɑzu tɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu sɛ kɑ cii beerem mɑ tuubi dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
Wom bine yɑ ci hɛ yom wɔ sɛdɑ yom.
Gunɑ, hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ɑlikɑwɑli nɑ ɑ bɑ dɔntɔm wom gɑɑ. Ammɑ wom mɑ gɔrɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ hɑli Ikpɛ mɑ bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri dɑm wom gɑɑ.
À nɑ ǹ boi hɑli Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sombu bɛɛnɛ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ fee ndei kɑ ziji bɛɛnɛ.
Ngei mɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ.
Sɑɑ kulu ǹ goono Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom. Ami.
Sendi goono sintine kom. Sendɑ mo goono Ikpɛ bɑndɑ. Sendɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
À goono, ngɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ sintine kom.
Ngɑ yɑ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. Hɛ fɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑ mɑnɑ tɛ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ Sendi di.
À kunɑ no hundi goono. Hundi mo yɑ ci iburɑdɑm yom kɑɑri.
Kɑɑri go hɑɑgɑ kube kunɑ. Kube mo mɑnɑ hinɑɑ̀.
Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ mɑɑ no Yohɑnnɑ.
À kɑɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sɛdɑ kɑɑri bɔm zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ dɔ.
Ngɑ wɔ mɑnɑ ci kɑɑri wɔ bo, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑɑri bɔm.
Kɑɑri wɔne yɑ ci kɑɑri cimikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑ kɑɑri bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ.
À goono hɑndunyɑ. Ngɑ mo yɑ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei.
À kɑɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom dɔ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Ammɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no dɑbɑri ǹ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom.
Ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ hɛi kuri dɔ wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm bineibɑɑi dɔ wɑlɑ hɑibɔrɔ binebɑɑ dɔ. Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ.
Sendi di bine tɛ gɑɑhɑm. À gɔrɔ i gɑme. I di ɑ̀ deizɑ, deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ize fɔlɔnku ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. À tɔ ndɑ gomini ndɑ cimi.
Yohɑnnɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ. À nɑ ngɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ bɔm no ɑ go wɔne cii, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ jinɑ mo. À goono zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ hɛi.
I kulu du bɑ ɑ̀ tɔyom gɑɑ. I du gomini mo gomini bɔm.
Moisi gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɑ no, ɑmmɑ gomini ndɑ cimi hunu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ di Ikpɛ bɑ ce fɔ. Ize fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑɑbɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ.
Sɛdɑ bine neyɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ Yuifu yom nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Lefi bɔrɔ yom dɔntɔm zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hã. Ǹ cii: Ni, ni no mee?
À bine cii ndɑ ngɑ mee, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ze. À cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
Ǹ bine nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: To, ni no mee? Ni no Eli? À cii: Yɑ nɑ ci ngɑ. Ǹ cii: Ni no ɑndebi di? À tu kɑ cii. Awo.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ, cii i sɛ ni no mee? N mɑ cii zɑmɑ i mɑ kpei yɑɑrɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ i dɔntɔm sɛ. Ifɔ n go cii ni bumbum n bɔm?
À tu ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum kɑ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinde go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɔ cɛɑndi."
Beerem kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm mo Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom no.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ n go mirɑndi de n mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, n mɑnɑ ci Eli, n mɑnɑ ci ɑndebi di?
Yohɑnnɑ bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A go mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go cɛ wom bindi kunɑ kɑ wom si ɑ̀ bei.
Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ. À nɑ ɑ jinɑ. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ye gɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ.
Nge yom di tɛ Betɑbɑrɑ kpɑɑrɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ, nungu kɑ Yohɑnnɑ go mirɑndi hɑri kunɑ.
À mo bo, Yohɑnnɑ di Yesu go kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Gunɑ, Ikpɛ Feejiize kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑndunyɑ dulum kɑɑ.
À bɔm no ɑ̀ go wɔne cii: À bɑndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ jinɑ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ hɛi.
Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ Isirɑilɑ sɛ no, ɑ kɑɑ ko mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri.
Yohɑnnɑ bine tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: A di Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ gutu kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ bei. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. À cii ɑ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm n kɑɑ di Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go zumbu kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm, ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
A bine di ko tɛ sɛdɑ mo bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ Ize no.
Mo yɑɑrɑ kɑ bo, Yohɑnnɑ go cɛ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ go Yesu gunɑ ɑ̀ go bisɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Gunɑ, Ikpɛ Feejiizɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ di mɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ go sendi yɑ di. Ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
Yesu zogu kɑ di ei ǹ go dɛcɛ ngɑ bɑndɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ wom go ceeci? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, mɑni n goono ndɑ gɔrɛ? Coobɑɑbɑ feeriji yɑ ci cooɑndikɔ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ di. Ǹ kpei. Ǹ di nungu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ǹ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ zɑ wiciri guuru tɑɑci zɑkɑ.
Bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ go sendi kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ, ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ neyɑ, Andɛrɛ, Simɔ Piɛɛ cɛɛnɛ.
Ngɑ yɑ jinɑ kɑ di ngɑ bɛɛrɛ Simɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I di Mɛsiyɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci Kirisiti, Ikpɛ Suubɑni.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ Simɔ Yesu dɔ. Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ kɑ cii: Ni no Simɔ, Yonɑsi koo. Mɑɑsɑ ǹ gɑ n cɛɛ Sefɑ. À mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci Piɛɛ.
Mo bo Yesu bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di Filipu. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ.
Filipu bine Betɑsɑidɑ bɔrɔ no, Andɛrɛ ndɑ Piɛɛ kpɑɑrɑ no.
Filipu di Nɑtɑni kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I di wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Moisi hɑntum fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑndebi yom mo hɑntum. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ, Yosɛfu koo.
Nɑtɑni cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ fɔ hinno hini kɑ hunu Nɑzɑrɛtu dee? Filipu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑɑ di.
Yesu di Nɑtɑni go kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ cii: Gunɑ, Isirɑilɑ bɔrɔ noyɑ ndɑ cimi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gulinci.
Nɑtɑni cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni n nɑ ɑ bei? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑ Filipu mɑnɑ n cɛɛ, ɑ di ni sɑɑ kɑ n goono jee nyɑ di cire.
Nɑtɑni tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ,ni yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no. Ni yɑ Isirɑilɑ gɑndɑkpɛ no.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N go nɑɑne dee zɑmɑ ɑ cii ɑ di ni jee nyɑ di cire? N kɑɑ di hɛ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom.
Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɑnu fɔ wom kɑɑ di bɛɛnɛ feeri. Wom kɑɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom mo go kɑɑru ko zumbu ɑ bɔm, hɛɛ Adɑmize.
Jiribi hinzɑntɛ fɔ tɛ hije Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Yesu nyɑ goono hije di dɔ.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo cɛɛ hijɑ dɔ.
À bine kɑɑ tɔ dufɛ̃ gɑziɑ. Yesu nyɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ǹ sindɑ dufɛ.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Wei wɔ, ifɔ yɑ goono hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ngɑ di? A lɔkɑci mɑnɑ kɑɑ jinɑ.
À nyɑ di cii gbeiize yom sɛ: Wɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii wom sɛ.
Tondi gulɑ idu bine goono hɑri dɑmyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ jisi no Yuifu yom hinnɑndiyom ɑlɑɑdɑ sɛ. Afɔ kulu yɑ neesiji zɑngu zɑkɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ gulɑ yom wɔ tɔnɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ǹ nɑ ǹ tɔnɑndi kɑlɑ ǹ hɑngɑ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑnkulu wɑ kuu kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀.
Ŋmɑɑrikpɛ di nɑ hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ ye dufɛ tɑbɑɑ. À bine mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Ammɑ gbeiize yom di kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑri di kuu bei. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑruhiji di cɛɛ.
À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Dufɛ̃ hinno no bɔrɔ kulu cini jinɑ kɑ fɑrisi. Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu hɑm kɑ kungu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ wɔ kɑ si kɑɑni. Ammɑ ni wɔ, dufɛ hinno no ǹ jisi hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
Alɑmu yom ŋmɔne sintine noyɑ kɑ Yesu tɛ Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. À nɑ ngɑ deizɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ mo.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ. À nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kpei ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ gɔrɔ kpɑɑrɑ di kɑ jɛ.
Yuifu yom Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru bine mɑɑni. Yesu kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ no, ɑ̀ no beerem gɑru kɑ ǹ go hɑuyeji yom ndɑ feeji yom ndɑ gutu yom neerɑ. Nooru bɑrimekɔ yom mo go gɔrɔ nodi.
À nɑ bulɑɑlɑ tɛ ndɑ kɔrɔfɔ. À nɑ ǹ kulu gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ zɑ feeji yom hɑli hɑuyeji yom di. À nɑ nooru bɑrimekɔ yom mo nooru kulu see kɑ tɑbulu yom hɑngɑsɑndi.
À cii gutu neerɑkɔ yom sɛ: Wom mɑ hɛ yom wɔ kɑɑ nee. Wɑ si ɑ Bɑɑbɑ gɔrɛ dɔ tɛ dei kɑ neerɑ dɔ.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom hɔngɔ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N gɔrɛ dɔ niyɑ nɑ ɑ bine dii".
Ngɑ di sɛ Yuifu yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑ kɑ n go tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑlɑmu fɔ no n gɑ i cɛbɛ?
Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri, jiribi hinzɑ gɑme ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi.
À gɑɑ no Yuifu yom cii: Jiiri weitɑɑci cindi idu no ǹ tɛ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ cini, ni wɔ, n gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi jiribi hinzɑ gɑme no?
Ammɑ Yesu cɛ go sendi no ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ fuu.
À sɛ no, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunu bukɔ yom gɑme, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom hɔngɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii. Ǹ cimɑndi Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑɑ ndɑ sendɑ mo kɑ Yesu jinɑ kɑ cii.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru di dɔ, bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ di ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ.
Ammɑ Yesu wɔ mɑnɑ nɑɑne ǹ gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ kulu bine bei.
À si bɑɑ ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sɛdɑ ngɑ sɛ mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bumbum go bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɔrɔ kunɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Nikodim. Yuifu yom jinɑ fɔ no.
À bine kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ciini kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, i go bei ni wɔ, ni yɑ cooɑndikɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ. Bɔrɔ si hini kɑ ɑlɑmu yom wɔ tɛ kɑ n go tɛ kɑlɑ de Ikpɛ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ: De ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ hɛi iteji, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ di Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ.
Nikodim cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ hɛi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni kɔ? À hini kɑ huro kpɛɛnɛ ngɑ nyɑ gunde ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɛi?
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ, de ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ hɛi hɑri ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Hɛ kɑ ǹ hɛi gɑɑhɑm dɔ, gɑɑhɑm no. Hɛ kɑ ǹ hɛi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, biyɑ no.
N mɑ si mɑmɑci ndɑ kɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, tilɑsi kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ n hɛi iteji.
Hɛo go fɑɑru nungu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ. N go mɑɑ ɑ̀ yɔgɔi ɑmmɑ n si bei zɑ mɑni ɑ̀ go hunu wɑlɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei. Yɑ mo no bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ hɛi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
Nikodim tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ no wɔne hini kɑ tɛ?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ Isirɑilɑ cooɑndikɔ no, ɑmmɑ n si fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ bɑ?
Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ, hɛ kɑ i bei no i go cii. Hɛ kɑ i di mo ɑ̀ sɛdɑ no i go tɛ. Wom bine si kɑ i sɛdɑ tɑ.
Wom si nɑɑne de ɑ go hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom sendi tɛ wom sɛ. To. Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ nɑɑne de ɑ go bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne yom sendi tɛ wom sɛ?
Bɔrɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ, wɑtom hɛɛ Adɑmize kɑ ɑ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
Zɑngɑ Moisi nɑ gondi sombu bɛɛnɛ gɑnji kunɑ, yɑ no tilɑsi ǹ mɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize mo sombu.
Ngɑ di mɑ tɛ no zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Ikpɛ bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no ngɑ Ize fɔlɔnku. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ Izɑ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem ciiti kɑ zeeri bo. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ beerem mɑ du fɑɑbɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ǹ si ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize fɔlɔnkuɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Ciiti kɑ zeeri yɑ ci kɑ kɑɑri kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ɑmmɑ kube sɑbɑ beerem sɛ kɑ bisɑ kɑɑri zɑmɑ ǹ gbei yom ilɑlɔ yom no.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei lɑlɔ tɛ, ɑkpɛ go hungu kɑɑri. À bine si kɑɑ kɑɑri dɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom mɑ si hunutɛrɛ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cimi gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kɑɑri dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ gbei yom mɑ hunutɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɛ no Ikpɛ kunɑ.
Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu. À gɔrɔ nodi ko mirɑndi.
Yohɑnnɑ mo go mirɑndi Enɔ gooru kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Sɑlim kpɑɑrɑ, zɑmɑ nodi gundɑ hɑri boobo. Beerem go kɑɑ nungu di ɑ̀ mɑ ngei mirɑndi.
Ǹ mɑnɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɑm kɑsu jinɑ.
Kɑkɔ fɔ mo tunu Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Yuifu yom gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hinnɑndiyom ɑlɑɑdɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bɑndɑ hɑli Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ, ngɑ kɑ n tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ, gunɑ ɑ̀ go mirɑndi. Ǹ kulu bine go kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
Yohɑnnɑ tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
Wom bumbum, wom go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ cii yɑ nɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm Mɛsiyɑ jine.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ weihiji, ngɑ yɑ ci hɑruhiji. Ammɑ hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ dɔ ko hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ, ɑ̀ go fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑruhijɑ jinde sɑbu sɛ. À binekɑɑne noyɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ mo.
Kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔntɔnu, hɛɛ mo yɑ zobu.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ goono hɛ kulu bɔm. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu hɑndunyɑ, hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ no. À bo sendi no hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ goono hɛ kulu bɔm.
À go tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ di ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mo si kɑ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ tu.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ tu, ɑkpɛ wɔ nɑ ngɑ sɛdɑ dɑm noyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ yɑ ci cimikpɛ.
Ngɑ wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm, Ikpɛ sendi no ɑ̀ go cii zɑmɑ Ikpɛ si kɑ ɑ̀ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ neesiji.
Bɑɑbɑ go bɑɑ Ize. À nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ kunɑ mo.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Ize di gɑɑ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne Izɑ gɑɑ si du hundi pɑi, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ ǹ go cii Yesu go du coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑ mirɑndi kɑ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu bumbum si beerem mirɑndi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom no.
Sɑɑ kɑ Kpe mɑɑ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hunu Yude lɑɑbu kɑ ye Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Tilɑsi bine kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑnɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu.
À tɔ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Sikɑru. À mɑɑni gɑndɑ fɔ dɔ kɑ Yɑkɔfu nɑ ngɑ koo Yosɛfu no.
Dee fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne mo goono lɑɑbu di kunɑ. Kɑ Yesu fɑrigɑ ndɑ diro di, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ dee di hɑngɑ gɑɑ. Zɑɑri bindi zɑkɑ.
Sɑmɑriɑncɛ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ hɑri guru. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À no hɑri yɑ hɑm.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo kpei kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑri dei.
Sɑmɑriɑncɛ weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni Yuifu, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑri kɑ hɑm, hɛɛ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ weibɔrɔ? Yuifu yom ndɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ yom gɑme ǹ sindɑ sɑbɑ.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De n nɑ Ikpɛ noyom bei ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi n sɛ kɑ cii ɑ no hɑri yɑ hɑm, dom ni bumbum, n gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑri kɑ hɑm. À gɑ n no hɑri hundikoni.
Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n sindɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ n mɑ guru ndɑ. Dee di bine guusu. Mɑni no n gundɑ hɑri hundikoni wɔ?
N beeri kɑ bisɑ i cɛɛ Yɑkɔfu no kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no dee wɔ? Ngɑ bumbum bine hɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ koo yom ndɑ ɑ̀ memunu yom.
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri wɔne hɑm, ɑ̀ ye kɑ mɑɑ jo.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑri kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no hɑm, ɑ̀ si mɑɑ jo pɑi. Hɑri kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ ye fɔci ɑkpɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mo boosu kɑ tɔ kɑlɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni gɑɑ.
Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, ɑ no hɑri ngɑ di zɑmɑ yɑ si mɑɑ jo kpɛɛnɛ. Yɑ si kɑɑ hɑri guru nee mo kpɛɛnɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, n mɑ n kunye cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ nee.
Weibɔrɔ di tu kɑ cii: A sindɑ kunye. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N gundɑ cimi kɑ n cii n sindɑ kunye.
Kunye gu no n du. Bɔrɔ kɑ n gundɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci n kunye. Yɑ di gɑɑ, n nɑ cimi cii.
Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, ɑ di ni wɔ ɑndebi no.
I cɛɛ yom nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi tondi kuku wɔ bɔm. Wom Yuifu yom mo, wom go cii kɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ no bɔrɔ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, n mɑ ɑ nɑɑne. Lɔkɑci go kɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci tondi kuku wɔ bɔm, wɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm no wom kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Wom go hɛ kɑ wom si bei bɛɛrɑndi. I yom wɔ, i bei hɛ kɑ i go bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ zɑ Yuifu yom dɔ no fɑɑbɑ hunu.
Ammɑ lɔkɑci go kɑɑ. À bine kɑɑ kɔ, sɑɑ kɑ bɛɛrɑndikɔ cimi cimi kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɛɛrɑndi Biyɑ kunɑ ndɑ cimi kunɑ. Beerem wɔ dimi no Bɑɑbɑ go ceeci ǹ mɑ ci ngɑ bɛɛrɑndikɔ yom.
Ikpɛ yɑ Biyɑ no. Beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi, ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi Biyɑ kunɑ ndɑ cimi kunɑ.
Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A bei kɑ Mɛsiyɑ go kɑɑ, wɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ Suubɑni. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɛ kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ, kɑ ɑ go sendi n sɛ, hɛɛ yɑ ci ngɑ.
Sɑɑ di no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ndɑ weibɔrɔ di. Ammɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ cii, ifɔ n go ceeci wɑlɑ ifɔ sɛ n go sendi ɑ̀ sɛ?
Weibɔrɔ di no ngɑ guru gɑɑsu jisi kɑ kpei wɑngɑrɑ. À cii wɑngɑrɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom sɛ:
Wɑ kɑɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ jinɑ kɑ tɛ. À mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ dee?
Cɔfɔ beerem hunu wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ.
À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gundɑ ŋmɑɑri fɔ kɑ wom si ɑ̀ bei.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ŋmɑɑri no?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A ŋmɑɑri yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ tɛ, yɑ ɑ̀ gbei mo tɔnɑndi.
Wom yɑ cini cii hɑndu tɑɑci yɑ goono hɑli hemɑru. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ? A go cii wom sɛ, wɑ bɔm tunɑndi kɑ fɑri yom gunɑ. Ǹ kpɑrɛ kɔ kɑ tɔ wiyom.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go fɑri wi du tukunsi. À go liibɑ meigu hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ, hɑli bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dumɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wi, ǹ mɑ fɑihã mefɔ.
Yɑ no sendi wɔne cimi no kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑfɔ go dumɑ, ɑfɔ go wi.
À nɑ wom dɔntɔm wiyom hɛ kɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbi tɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbi tɛ. Wom huro ǹ tɑɑbi kunɑ.
Wɑngɑrɑ ngɑ di, Sɑmɑriɑncɛ boobo nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ weibɔrɔ di sendɑ sɑbu sɛ. Weibɔrɔ di tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ jinɑ kɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ngei dɔ. À gɔrɔ nungu di jiribi hinkɑ.
Bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne kɑ tɔntɔnu Yesu bumbum sendɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ cii weibɔrɔ di sɛ: À mɑnɑ ci hɛ kɑ n cii di sɛ no i go nɑɑne bo ɑmmɑ i bumbum mɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. I go bei bɔrɔ kpɛ hɑlɑbɑdɑ hɑndunyɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ no, Mɛsiyɑ no.
Jiribi hinkɑ di bɑndɑ, Yesu tunu zɑ nungu di kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Yesu bumbum cii kɑ ɑndebi sindɑ bɛɛrɛ ngɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Gɑlile bɔrɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ kube ihinno kɑ ǹ di hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ jingɑru fɔ jiribi yom gɑɑ. Ngei mo kpei jingɑruɑ dɔ.
Yesu ye Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu nungu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri bɛrɛ dufɛ. Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ gundɑ bɔrɔ beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ koo sindɑ bɑɑni.
Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ǹ cii Yesu hunu zɑ Yude lɑɑbu kɑ kɑɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu, ɑ̀ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngɑ koo no bɑɑni zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bɑ bu.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De wom mɑnɑ di ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom wom si nɑɑne pɑi.
Bɔrɔ beeri di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ kɑɑ hɑli ɑ koo wɔ bu.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, n koo go hunɑ. Bɔrɔ di bine nɑɑne sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ. À kpei.
Kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tɑm yom nɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑru wɔne ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N koo go hunɑ.
À nɑ ǹ hã lɔkɑci fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ dɑɑmɑ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bi zɑɑri guuru fɔ no gɑɑwɑsɑ bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Bɑɑbɑ di hɔngɔ kɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di no Yesu cii ngɑ sɛ: N koo go hunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑɑne, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu.
Alɑmu hinkɑntɛ noyɑ kɑ Yesu tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Yude lɑɑbu kɑ kɑɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ Yuifu yom jingɑru fɔ tɔ. Yesu kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ Feeji yom Hundi mee jɛrɛ gɑɑ gundɑ bɑngu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ebulu cinɛ kunɑ Betɑsedɑ. Nungu di gundɑ tɑfɑɑ gu.
Tɑfɑɑ yom di cire no doorikom boobo goono ko kɑni. Dɑnɑm yom ndɑ simbɑrukɔ yom ndɑ mɔngɔlɔ yom mo goono ǹ kunɑ. [Ǹ go hɑri tunɑndiyom bɑtu.
Ǹ go bɑtu no zɑmɑ lɔkɑci kɑ kɑɑ lɔkɑci Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ cini zumbu bɑnguɑ kunɑ kɑ hɑri di tunɑndi. Zɛnjɛkom kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ huro sɑɑ kɑ hɑri di tunu, ɑ̀ du bɑɑni zɑngɑ ɑ̀ doori bɑrɑ ndɑ kulu.]
Zɛnjɛkom fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni jiiri weitɑɑci ihinkɑ si.
Yesu di zɛnjɛkom di go kɑni. Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni zɑ jɛyom, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɑɑ n mɑ du bɑɑni bɑ?
Zɛnjɛkom di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ sindɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ dɑm bɑngu wɔ kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑri di tunu. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go kpei mo, cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑ ɑ jinɑ no.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu, n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ di du bɑɑni. À nɑ ngɑ dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ. Hulonzom hɑnu hine no.
À sɛ no Yuifu yom cii bɔrɔ di kɑ Yesu no bɑɑni sɛ: Hulonzom hɑnu hine no. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli n sɛ n mɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ.
À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no bɑɑni, ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ no: N dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ.
Bine ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Mee no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii n sɛ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ?
Ammɑ bɔrɔ di mɑnɑ bei mee yɑ nɑ ngɑ no bɑɑni zɑmɑ Yesu hunu jɑmɑ di kunɑ.
Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yesu di bɔrɔ di Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, n du bɑɑni. N mɑ si dulum tɛ kpɛɛnɛ hɑli hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ jɑɑsɑ wɔne, ɑ̀ mɑ si tɔ ni kpɛɛnɛ.
Bɔrɔ di kpei cii Yuifu yom sɛ kɑ Yesu yɑ nɑ ngɑ no bɑɑni.
A sɛ no Yuifu yom nɑ Yesu guruguzɑndi. Ǹ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine.
Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii, A bɑɑbɑ go gbei tɛ hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ go gbei tɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ no Yuifu yom ye kɑ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine sɑrɑ bo, ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii Ikpɛ yɑ ngɑ Bɑɑbɑ no ko kɑ ngɑ bɔm sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ Ikpɛ.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛɛ Ize, ɑ si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ ɑ bɔm gɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ di ɑ Bɑɑbɑ go tɛ. Hɛ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ go tɛ, hɛɛ Ize mo, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Bɑɑbɑ go bɑɑ hɛɛ, Izɑ. À go kɑ ɑ cɛbɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ngɑ bumbum go tɛ. À gɑ ɑ cɛbɛ gbei yom mo kɑ ǹ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom zɑmɑ wom mɑ mɑmɑci.
Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi kɑ ǹ hunɑndi, yɑ no hɛɛ Izɑ mo, ɑ go hundi no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ bine go bɑɑ sɛ.
Bɑɑbɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu ciiti ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ciiti kulu no ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ Izɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ hɛɛ, Izɑ sɛ zɑngɑ ǹ go bɛɛrɛ tɛ Bɑɑbɑ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ hɛɛ Izɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm sɛ.
Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sendi sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑɑne mo wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑkpɛ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À si kɑɑ ciiti dɔ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ bu gɑɑ kɑ tɔ hundi dɔ.
Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, lɔkɑci go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ bine kɑɑ kɔ sɑɑ kɑ bukɔ yom kɑɑ mɑɑ ɑ jinde, hɛɛ Ikpɛ Ize. Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɑ jinde, ǹ kɑɑ hunɑ.
Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ gundɑ hundi ngɑ bumbum kunɑ, yɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no hɛɛ Ize, ɑ mɑ gundɑ hundi ɑ bumbum kunɑ.
À nɑ ɑ no hini mo yɑ ciiti tɛ zɑmɑ hɛɛ yɑ Adɑmize no.
Wɑ si mɑmɑci ndɑ wɔne. Lɔkɑci go kɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ kɑɑ mɑɑ ɑ jinde.
Ǹ kɑɑ hunu. Wɔ kɑ yom nɑ ihinno tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ tunu hundi sɛ. Ammɑ wɔ kɑ yom nɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ ǹ kɑɑ tunu ciiti sɛ.
A si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ ɑ bɔm gɑɑ. A go ciiti nɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ bɔm. A ciiti mo cɛyom susu no, zɑmɑ ɑ si kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne binebɑɑ ceeci kɑlɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ binebɑɑ.
De hɛɛ, yɑ go tɛ ɑ bɔm sɛdɑ, ɑ sɛdɑ mɑnɑ ci cimi.
Bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ. A bei sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ ɑ sɛ mo, cimi no.
Wom nɑ beerem dɔntɔm Yohɑnnɑ dɔ. À bine tɛ sɛdɑ cimi sɛ.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm sɛdɑ no ɑ go du ɑmmɑ ɑ go wɔne yom cii no zɑmɑ wom mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Yohɑnnɑ wɔ fitilɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ go dii ko kɑɑri no. Wom mo, wom bɑɑ wom mɑ fɑihã ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑri bɑndɑ fɔ.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ gundɑ sɛdɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ ŋmɔne. Gbei yom kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ no yɑ tɔnɑndi. Gbei yom no di bumbum kɑ ɑ go tɛ ngei yɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ bumbum tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ. Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde bɑ ce fɔ. Wom mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ moodumɑ mo bɑ ce fɔ.
À sendi si gɔrɔ wom kunɑ zɑmɑ wom si nɑɑne wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm.
Wom go ceeci Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ wom go tɑmmɑ wom du ǹ dɔ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Ngei bine yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ.
Ammɑ wom si bɑɑ mo wom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ du hundi.
A si bɛɛrɛ ceeci iburɑdɑm dɔ.
Ammɑ ɑ go wom bei, wom sindɑ Ikpɛ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine wom kunɑ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ kɑɑ no ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom si kɑ ɑ tɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni kɑɑ ngɑ bɔm mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ nɑɑne wom kɑ wom go bɛɛrɛ ceeci cɛrɛ gɑɑ, wom si bɛɛrɛ ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku dɔ?
Wom mɑ si tɑmmɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom beri Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom beri yɑ ci Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom gundɑ nɑɑne.
De wom nɑ Moisi nɑɑne, dom wom gɑ ɑ nɑɑne zɑmɑ Moisi hɑntum ɑ bɔm.
Ammɑ de wom si cimɑndi Moisi hɑntumyom gɑɑ, mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ cimɑndi ɑ sendi yom gɑɑ?
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ Yesu kpei Gɑlile buulɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ, Tiberiɑ buulɑ.
Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɛnjɛkom yom bɔm.
Yesu kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm ko gɔrɔ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
Yuifu yom Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru mɑɑni.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ bɔm tunɑndi ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ. À cii Filipu sɛ: Mɑni no i du buuru kɑ dei beerem wɔ mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
À nɑ ngɑ di cii Filipu sɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ bubure zɑmɑ ngɑ bumbum go bei hɛ kɑ ngɑ bɑ tɛ.
Filipu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Buuru dubu hinkɑ wɔne si wɑsɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ cɛnɑ cɛnɑ.
Andɛrɛ, Simɔ Piɛɛ cɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ:
Hɑiwɑsu fɔ goono nee kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ buuru gu kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ hɑmini dimi ŋmɑni fɔ ndɑ ciifi cɛnɑ hinkɑ. Ammɑ ifɔ no ngɑ di bɑ tɛ bɔrɔ nyɑkɑkɑ wɔ sɛ?
Yesu mo cii: Wɑ beerem gɔrɛndi. Nunguɑ dɔ gundɑ subu gɑni boobo. Ǹ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu.
Yesu nɑ buuru yom di zɑɑ kɑ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ fɑrisi coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo fɑrisi beerem kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ sɛ. Yɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ ciifi yom di mo fɑrisi zɑngɑ sɑrɑ beerem go bɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kungu ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ dumbɑri yom kɑ ǹ cindi kunnɑ, zɑmɑ hɛ fɔ kulu mɑ si sɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑ kungu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ buuru gu kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ hɑmini ŋmɑni di dumbɑri cindi yom kunnɑ cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ mefɔ.
Kɑ beerem di ɑlɑmu kɑ Yesu tɛ, ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ hɑlɑbɑdɑ, ɑndebi di kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ.
Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei ǹ bɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngɑ dii kɑ tɛ gɑndɑkpɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ kpei tondi kukuɑ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ ngɑ fɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom zumbu buulɑ jobu gɑɑ.
Ǹ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ bɑ buulɑ dem kɑ kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ hɛrɛ. Ciini tɔ kɔ. Yesu bine mɑnɑ kɑɑ ǹ dɔ jinɑ.
Hɛo bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mo tunu, cɔfɔ buulɑ go boosu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑrihi funu kilomɛti gu wɑlɑ idu cɔfɔ ǹ di Yesu go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm. À go mɑɑni hɑrihiɑ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii.
Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ no. Wɑ si hɑmburu.
A gɑɑ no ǹ tu ngei mɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ hɑrihiɑ tɔ jobu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ǹ go kpei.
À mo bo jɑmɑ kɑ ǹ goono buulɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ, ǹ di kɑ hɑrihi fɔlɔnku yɑ goono nodi. Ǹ di mo Yesu mɑnɑ huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ɑmmɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di hinne yɑ kpei.
Ammɑ hɑrihi ŋmɑni fɔ yom mo hunu zɑ Tiberiɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Kpɑɑrɑ di mɑɑni nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ buuru di ŋmɑɑ Kpe sɑɑbuyom bɑndɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, kɑ jɑmɑ di zɑ Yesu hɑli ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom si nungu di, ngei mo huro hɑrihi yom kunɑ. Ǹ kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ ko Yesu ceeci.
Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ hɑli buulɑ bisɑntɛ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, sɑɑ fɔ ǹ kɑɑ nee?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ ceeci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ wom di ɑlɑmu yom sɛ. Ammɑ wom go kɑ ɑ ceeci zɑmɑ wom nɑ buuru ŋmɑɑ kɑ kungu.
Wɑ gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci sɛ ɑmmɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ bo goono kɑlɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ. Ŋmɑɑrɑ wɔ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ wom no zɑmɑ ɑ gɑɑ no Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ sɛdɑ dɑm.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ i mɑ tɛ kɑ gbei tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ, wom mɑ nɑɑne wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm.
À sɛ no ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑlɑmu fɔ no n gɑ i cɛbɛ hɑli i mɑ di ɑ̀, kɑ du kɑ nɑɑne n gɑɑ? Gbei fɔ n kɑɑ tɛ?
I cɛɛ yom nɑ mɑɑnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ ŋmɑɑ gɑnji kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "À nɑ ǹ no buuru kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ".
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ Moisi mɑnɑ wom no buuru kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ go wom no buuru cimikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
Ikpɛ buuru yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑndunyɑ no hundi.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ Kpe, i no buuru ngɑ di hɑnu kulu.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci buuru hundikoni. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ si mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ pɑi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ nɑɑne mo, ɑ̀ si mɑɑ jo pɑi.
Ammɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ wom di hɛɛ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu wom mɑnɑ nɑɑne.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ Bɑɑbɑ go kɑ ɑ no yɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ mo, ɑ si ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ.
A hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. A mɑnɑ hunu yɑ ɑ binebɑɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ kɑ tɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm binebɑɑ.
Wɔne yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm binebɑɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no, bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si dɛrɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ yɑ ǹ tunɑndi hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
A dɔntɔmkɔ binebɑɑ neyɑ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go di hɛɛ, Izɑ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
Yuifu yom go gunugunu ɑ̀ sendɑ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ yɑ ci buuru kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Yesu wɔ Yosɛfu koo no. I go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ bei. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Dee mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ cii ngɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii. Wɑ si gunugunu wom gɑme.
Bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, de Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cendi. A bine gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
Andebi yom nɑ wɔne hɑntum ngei tirɑ yom kunɑ kɑ cii: "Ǹ kulu kɑɑ du cɛbɛ yom Ikpɛ dɔ". À sɛ no bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɛ ko dendeni ɑ̀ dɔ, ɑkpɛ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ di Bɑɑbɑ no bo, kɑlɑ de wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, cɛ yɑ di Bɑɑbɑ.
Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ko ɑ nɑɑne, ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Hɛɛ yɑ ci buuru hundikoni.
Wom cɛɛ yom nɑ mɑɑnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ ŋmɑɑ gɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ bu.
Wɔne yɑ ci buuru hundikonɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ hɑli bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si bu.
Hɛɛ yɑ ci buuru hundikoni kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ buuru wɔne gɑɑ, ɑ̀ bo hunɑ no, beeniyom si. Buuru kɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ kɑɑ no, ɑ gɑɑhɑm no. A gɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm no zɑmɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑ hunɑ.
À gɑɑ no Yuifu yom nɑ kɑkɔ tɛ ngei gɑme kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ i no ngɑ gɑɑhɑm i mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, de wom si hɛɛ, Adɑmize gɑɑhɑm ŋmɑɑ, de bine wom si kɑ ɑ kuri hɑm, wom sindɑ hundi wom kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑmɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ kuri hɑm, ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. A gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mo hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
A gɑɑhɑm wɔ ŋmɑɑri no ndɑ cimi. A kuri mo hɑmyom hɑri no ndɑ cimi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm ŋmɑɑ, kɑ ɑ kuri hɑm, ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ.
Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ hundikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ go hunɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɑbu sɛ. Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑ, ɑkpɛ mo ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Buuru neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ mɑɑnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ kɑ wom cɛɛ yom ŋmɑɑ kɑ bu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ buuru wɔ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ, beeniyom si.
Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne iboobo cii: Sendi wɔ gɑɑbu. Mee yɑ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sendi wɔ sɛ?
Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom go gunugunu sendi ngɑ di bɔm, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Sendɑ nɑ wom dɛrɑndi no?
Dee, mɛtɛ no yɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ, nungu kɑ ɑ dom gɔrɔ?
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ hunɑndi. Gɑɑhɑm si hɛ fɔ kulu hinsɑ. Sendi yom kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɑrɑ no biyɑ ndɑ hundi.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono wom kunɑ kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. Yesu bei zɑ sintine beerem kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. À bei mo bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: À sɛ no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ no ndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne iboobo nɑ ngei bɔm cendi. Ǹ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
À sɛ no Yesu cii iwei cindi hinkɑ di sɛ: Wom mo bine, wom bɑɑ wom mɑ kpei bɑ?
Simɔ Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, mee dɔ no i mɑ kpei? N gundɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
I bine go nɑɑne. I go bei mo kɑ ni, n ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ Ize.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ nɑ wom suubɑ, wom bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ wɔ. Ammɑ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ Ibilisi ŋmɔne no.
Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu, Simɔ koo bɔm no ɑ̀ nɑ sendi ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ. Iwei cindi hinkɑ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ noyɑ.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ Yesu go Gɑlile lɑɑbu yɑɑli. À si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ dirɑ Yude lɑɑbu zɑmɑ Yuifu yom go ceeci ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Bine Yuifu yom jingɑru fɔ mɑɑni kɑ ɑ ci Bukɑ yom ŋmɔne.
A gɑɑ no ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu nee kɑ kpei Yude lɑɑbu zɑmɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom mo mɑ di gbei yom kɑ n go tɛ.
Bɔrɔ si hɛ fɔ tɛ tugɑntɛ de ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ ngɑ bei. Zɑ kɑ n go wɔne yom tɛ, n mɑ n bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ.
Bɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom mɑnɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ, ɑmmɑ wom lɔkɑci goono sɔlɑntɛ sɑɑ kulu.
Hɑndunyɑ si hini kɑ hungu wom. Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ go hungu hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom bɑrɑ ilɑlɔ yom.
Wom wɔ, wɑ kpei jingɑruɑ dɔ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si kpei mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ ɑ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii ǹ sɛ, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom kpei jingɑruɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ngɑ mo kpei. À mɑnɑ kpei tɛrɛkpɑrɛ ɑmmɑ tugu kunɑ.
Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci jingɑruɑ dɔ. Ǹ cii: Mɑni ɑ̀ goono?
Kɑkɔ bɑmbɑtɑ tunu jɑmɑ di gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yesu. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii bɔrɔ hinno no. Afɔ yom mo cii: Awo, ɑ̀ go jɑmɑ fɑfɑgu no.
Ammɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm tɛrɛkpɑrɛ Yuifu yom hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ.
Hɑli jingɑruɑ bindi bindi Yesu kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ko cooɑndi.
Yuifu yom mɑmɑci kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ŋmɑɑni tirɑ hɑntumyom, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A cɛbɛyom mɑnɑ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ɑmmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no.
De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ cɛbɛyom bei de Ikpɛ ŋmɔne no wɑlɑ de ɑ go sendi no ɑ bɔm gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑ̀ bɔm bɛɛrɛ no ɑ̀ go ceeci. Ammɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ dɔntɔmkɔ bɛɛrɛ ceeci, ngɑ wɔ Cimikpɛ no. Zɑm kɑ cɛsusu si ɑ̀ kunɑ mo.
Moisi nɑ wom no fɔndɑ ɑmmɑ wom bɑ ɑfɔ si fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Ifɔ sɛ wom go ceeci kɑ ɑ wi?
Jɑmɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N gundɑ hɔllɛ. Mee yɑ go ceeci ngɑ mɑ n wi?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ gbei fɔ tɛ, wom kulu mɑmɑci.
Moisi nɑ wom no bɑngudɑmyom. À mɑnɑ ci Moisi dɔ no ɑ̀ go hunu ɑmmɑ wom cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ no. À sɛ no wom go hɑibɔrɔ dɑmbɑngu hulonzom hɑnu hine.
Ǹ go hɑibɔrɔ dɑmbɑngu hulonzom hɑnu hine zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si Moisi fɔndɑ dɑɑrum. Ifɔ sɛ wom bine go tɔ ɑ sɛ ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ no bɑɑni sã sã hulonzom hɑnu hine?
Wɑ si ciiti ndɑ moo diyom, ɑmmɑ wɑ ciiti cɛɑntɛ susu tɛ.
Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ go ceeci ǹ mɑ wi di no bɑ?
Gunɑ, ɑ̀ go sendi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ si hɛ fɔ kulu cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Gɑɑbikoni yom go bei cimi no bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ bɔrɔ wɔne i go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. I go bei mo nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no. Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu si bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no.

À gɑɑ no, Yesu nɑ jinde zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À cii: Wom go kɑ ɑ bei. Wom bei mo nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no hɛɛ. A mɑnɑ kɑɑ ɑ bɔm miilɑ sɛ. Ammɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ngɑ wɔ Cimikpɛ no. Wom bine si ɑ̀ bei.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ dɔ no ɑ hunu. Ngɑ mo yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Ǹ bine nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ di. Ammɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
Jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Mɛsiyɑ wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑlɑmu yom kɑ bɔrɔ wɔne go tɛ, Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ tɛ kɑ bisɑ yɑ di dee?
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ jɑmɑ di go hɛ nge yom di gunugunu tɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Cɔfɔ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ dogɑri yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: A goono wom dɔ bɑndɑ fɔ jinɑ. À bɑndɑ yɑ kpei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm dɔ.
Wom gɑ ɑ ceeci. Wom si di hɛɛ. Nungu kɑ ɑ goono mo wom si hini kɑ kɑɑ nodi.
Sendi ngɑ di gɑɑ Yuifu yom cii ngei gɑme: Mɑni ɑ̀ bɑ kpei kɑ i si hini kɑ di ɑ̀? Wɑlɑ beerem wɔ dɔ no ɑ̀ bɑ kpei, nge yom kɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see dimi cindei lɑɑbu?
Ifɔ yɑ ci sendi wɔne feeriji kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Wom gɑ ɑ ceeci. Wom bine si di hɛɛ. Nungu kɑ ɑ bo goono mo wom si hini kɑ kɑɑ?
Jingɑru beeri ŋmɔne jiribi beenɑntɛ Yesu cɛ kɑ jinde zɑɑ. À cii: De bɔrɔ fɔ mɑɑ jo, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ hɑm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, hɑri hundikoni isɑ yom kɑɑ dendi ɑkpɛ kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, wɔ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑɑ du. Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no jinɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ Yesu bɛɛrɑndi jinɑ.
À gɑɑ no kɑ jɑmɑ di mɑɑ sendi ngɑ di cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ, hɑlɑbɑdɑ ɑndebi no.
Afɔ yom cii: Mɛsiyɑ no. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom mo cii: Awo, zɑ Gɑlile no Mɛsiyɑ go hunu dee?
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii Mɛsiyɑ go kɑɑ zɑ Dɑfidi bɑndɑ kunɑ. À mɑ hunu Bɛtɛlɛm kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ Dɑfidi gɔrɔ dom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Ngɑ di sɛ, feefee tɛ jɑmɑ di kunɑ Yesu sɑbu sɛ.
Ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom bɑɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑmmɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Dogɑri yom bine kpei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔ. Ngei mo cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom mɑnɑ kɑɑndɑ?
Dogɑri yom tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ sendi zɑngɑ bɔrɔ di bɑ ce fɔ.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Yɑ di gɑɑ wom mo, ɑ̀ nɑ wom fɑfɑgu no?
Hinikpɛ yom di ŋmɔne bɑ ɑfɔ wɑlɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom di ŋmɔne bɑ ɑfɔ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ jɑmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si fɔndɑ bei lɑɑliɑntɛ yom no.
Nikodim kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑrisi fɔndɔ beerem ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ciini, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ:
I fɔndɑ, ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ ciiti bɑ zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑkpɛ cii kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ?
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni mo, ni Gɑlile bɔrɔ no bɑ? Ni mo, n mɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom ceeci kɑ di kɑ ɑndebi mɑnɑ hunu Gɑlile lɑɑbu. [
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ kulu kpei ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Ammɑ Yesu kpei Olibe zugu tɑndi kuku dɔ.
Zɑ ɑsubɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Jɑmɑ kulu mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. À gɔrɔ kɑ ǹ cooɑndi.
Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɔ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑndɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii zinɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ.
Ǹ cii Yesu sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, ǹ nɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ dii no ɑ̀ go zinɑ.
Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no meire i mɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ dimi cetu ndɑ tondi. Ni mo bine, ifɔ no n go cii?
Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di cii no kɑ ɑ̀ sui, domi ngei mɑ du sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ. Ammɑ Yesu go gungum. À hɑntum gɑndɑ gɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbeize zɑngɑ ɑ̀ si mɑɑ ǹ hãyom di.
Kɑ ǹ hiyɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ hã, Yesu mo tunu kɑ cɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ dulum ɑ̀ mɑ jinɑ kɑ tondi zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gungum kpɛɛnɛ ko hɑntum gɑndɑ gɑɑ.
Ngei mo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Yesu sendɑ, cɔfɔ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ hunu ɑfɔ ɑfɔ zɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ yom gɑɑ kɑlɑ icɛnɑ yom. À cindi Yesu ngɑ fɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ goono bindi kunɑ.
Yesu tunu. À mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ weibɔrɔ di. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, mɑni n tɔnyɑkɔ yom? Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ n ciiti kɑ zeeri no?
À tu kɑ cii: Awo Kpe, bɑ ɑfɔ. Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ mo, ɑ si kɑ n ciiti kɑ zeeri mo. Kpei. N mɑ si dulum tɛ kpɛɛnɛ.]
Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci hɑndunyɑ kɑɑri. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ si dirɑ kube kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ du kɑɑri hundi ŋmɔne.
Bine Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɔm sɛdɑ no n go tɛ. N sɛdɑ mɑnɑ ci cimi.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑ de ɑ bɔm sɛdɑ no ɑ go tɛ, ɑ sɛdɑ yɑ cimi no zɑmɑ ɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ hunu ndɑ nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei. Ammɑ wom, wom mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ hunu wɑlɑ nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei.
Wom go ciiti no zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom go tɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu ciiti.
De bine, ɑ go ciiti mo, ɑ ciiti yɑ cimi no. A mɑnɑ ci ɑ fɔlɔnku ɑmmɑ hɛɛ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Ǹ bine hɑntum wom ŋmɔne fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ sɛdɑ yɑ cimi no.
A bumbum sɛdɑ no ɑ go tɛ, Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm go tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ bɔm.
À gɑɑ no ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni n bɑɑbɑ? Yesu tu kɑ cii: Wom si ɑ bei. Wom si ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bei mo. De wom nɑ ɑ bei dom, wom gɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo bei.
Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ nooru jisiyom dɔ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dii zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: A go kpei. Wom bine gɑ ɑ ceeci. Wom kɑɑ bu mo wom dulum kunɑ. Wom si hini kɑ kɑɑ nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei.
À gɑɑ no Yuifu yom cii: À gɑ ngɑ bɔm wi no, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii i si hini kɑ kɑɑ nungu kɑɑ ngɑ go kpei?
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom yɑ gɑndɑ wɔ ŋmɔne yom no. Hɛɛ wɔ bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne no. Wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne yom no. Hɛɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne.
À sɛ no, ɑ cii wom sɛ wom kɑɑ bu wom dulum yom kunɑ. De wom mɑnɑ cimɑndi kɑ Hɛɛ yɑ ci, wom kɑɑ bu no wom dulum yom kunɑ.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ, ni no mee? Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ zɑ sintine.
A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ ɑ cii wom bɔm kɑ wom ciiti mo. Ammɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, Cimikpɛ no. Hɛ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ mo, ngɑ no ɑ go cii hɑndunyɑ sɛ.
Ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm kɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɔm no ɑ̀ go sendi ngei sɛ.
Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize sombu bɛɛnɛ sɑɑ di wom kɑɑ bei kɑ Hɛɛ yɑ ci. A si hɛ kulu tɛ mo ndɑ ɑ bɔm ɑmmɑ ɑ go sendi no ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ.
Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm goono ɑ bɑndɑ. Bɑɑbɑ mɑnɑ ɑ nɑm ɑfɔ zɑmɑ hɛɛ wɔ, hɑnu kulu ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ nge yom di cii cɔfɔ bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Yesu cii Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ sɛ: De wom bo gɔrɔ ɑ sendi kunɑ, wom yɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom no cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ.
Wom kɑɑ cimi bei. Cimi no, ɑ kɑɑ wom fɑnsɑ.
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I yom yɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no. Bɑ ce fɔ, i mɑnɑ gɔrɔ kɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑm. Mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ cii n gɑ i fɑnsɑ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bo dulum tɛ, dulum tɑm no.
Ammɑ tɑm si bo gɔrɔ fuu kunɑ sɑɑ kulu ɑmmɑ koo bo gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ sɑɑ kulu.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de hɛɛ Ize, ɑ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ, siikɑ si wom ci bɔrɔcini yom.
A go bei wom yɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no. Ammɑ wom go ceeci kɑ ɑ wi zɑmɑ ɑ sendɑ si gɔrɔ wom kunɑ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ di ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ go sendi. Wom mo, hɛ kɑ wom di wom bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ngɑ no wom go tɛ.
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I bɑɑbɑ no Abulɛmɑ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: De wom yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ ize yom, dom wom gɑ Abulɛmɑ gbei yom tɛ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom go ceeci kɑ ɑ wi, hɛɛ kɑ ɑ nɑ cimi cii wom sɛ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔ. Abulɛmɑ mɑnɑ ngɑ di tɛ.
Wom wɔ, wom bɑɑbɑ gbei yom no wom go tɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I mɑnɑ ci zinɑ ize yom. Bɑɑbɑ fɔlɔnku no i sɛ, Ikpɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: De Ikpɛ yɑ ci wom bɑɑbɑ, dom wom bɑɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ hunu kɑ kɑɑ. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ bɔm ɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Ifɔ sɛ wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ ɑ sendi? Wom si fɑhɑm no zɑmɑ wom si hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sendi sɛ.

Ibilisi yɑ ci wom bɑɑbɑ. Wom bine go bɑɑ wom mɑ wom bɑɑbɑ bineibɑɑi yom tɛ. Ngɑ wɔ, bɔrɔ wikɔ no zɑ sintine. À mɑnɑ himmɑ tɛ cimi kunɑ zɑmɑ cimi si ngɑ wɔ kunɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑngɑri cii, ɑ̀ go sendi ngɑ bumbum bɔm zɑmɑ tɑngɑrikpɛ no. Tɑngɑri bɑɑbɑ mo no.
Hɛɛ mo, zɑmɑ ɑ go cimi cii sɛ, wom si ɑ nɑɑne.
Wom kunɑ, mee yɑ gɑ ɑ zeeri ndɑ dulum? De ɑ go cimi cii, ifɔ sɛ wom si ɑ nɑɑne?
Ikpɛ ŋmɔne cɛ go hɑngɑ dɑm Ikpɛ Sendi yom sɛ. Wom si hɑngɑ dɑm zɑmɑ wom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom.
Yuifu yom bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: À nɑ ci i gundɑ cimi bɑ, kɑ i go cii ni yɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ no, n gundɑ hɔllɛ mo?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A sindɑ hɔllɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɛɛrɑndi. Wom go kɑ ɑ woo.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si kɑ ɑ bɔm bɛɛrɛ ceeci. Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɛ ceeci. À go ciiti mo.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ sendɑ jɛ, ɑ̀ si bu pɑi.
Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑnkulu i go bei n gundɑ hɔllɛ. Abulɛmɑ bu. Andebi yom mo bu. Ammɑ ni wɔ, n go cii de bɔrɔ go kɑ n sendɑ jɛ, ɑkpɛ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi.
N bɛɛrɛ bisɑ i cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ bu? Andebi yom mo bu. Mee no n go kɑ n bɔm jisi?
Yesu tu kɑ cii: De ɑ go kɑ ɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi, ɑ bɛɛrɛ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ kulu. A Bɑɑbɑ yɑ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi, ngɑ kɑ wom go cii ngɑ yɑ ci wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.
Wom bine si ɑ̀ bei. Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. De bine, ɑ go cii ɑ si ɑ̀ bei, ɑ himɑ tɑngɑrikom noyɑ zɑngɑ wom. Ammɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. A go kɑ ɑ̀ Sendɑ jɛ mo.
Wom bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ bine kɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ngɑ mɑ di ɑ hɑnu. À bine di ɑ̀. A fɑihã mo.
Yuifu yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑnɑ tɔ jiiri weigu jinɑ. Ngɑ no, n di Abulɛmɑ?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Abulɛmɑ hɛi, hɛɛ wɔ Hɛɛ yɑ ci.
Sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ no, ǹ nɑ tondi yom zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu. Ammɑ Yesu tugu kɑ hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ bisɑ ǹ bindi. Yɑ no ɑ̀ dirɑ.
Bisɑyom gɑɑ Yesu di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi ndɑ dɑnɑmtɛrɛ.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, mee yɑ nɑ dulum tɛ, bɔrɔ kpɛ no dee wɑlɑ ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom no kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi dɑnɑm?
Yesu tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ, yɑ no ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom mo. Ammɑ wɔne tɛ dee no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gbei yom mɑ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Kɑlɑ de yɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm gbei yom tɛ zɑ weenu goono. Ciini go tɔ sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ gbei tɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ yɑ go ci hɑndunyɑ kɑɑri.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ gɑndɑ kɑ bɔtɔgɔ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ yɔlɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔtɔgɔ di dɛcɛ dɑnɑm di moo yom bɔm.
À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei nyunu Silowe bɑngu. Silowe feeriji yɑ ci Dɔntɔnukɔ. À kpei nyunu. À bɛrɛ kɑ ye. À go di sã sã.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gɔrɔkɑsine yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ dɔnɑ kɑ cini bei ngɑ yɑ dɑnɑm, ǹ cii: À nɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ kɑ bɑrɑ di noyɑ bɑ?
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Ngɑ no. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo cii: Awo. Himɑcɛrɛ dee no. Ngɑ bumbum cii: Hɛɛ no.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ n moo yom tɛ kɑ feeri?
À tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yesu, ngɑ yɑ nɑ bɔtɔgɔ tɛ kɑ dɛcɛ ɑ moo yom bɔm. À cii ɑ sɛ: Kpei Silowe bɑngu kɑ nyunu. A kpei nyunu. Cɔfɔ ɑ go di.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni bɔrɔ di goono? À tu kɑ cii: A si bei.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ dom gɔrɔ dɑnɑm Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔ.
Hulonzom hɑnu hine no Yesu nɑ bɔtɔgɔɑ tɛ kɑ bɔrɔ di moo yom feeri.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ n moo yom feeri? À cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔtɔgɔ no ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ɑ moo yom bɔm, ɑ nyunu. Cɔfɔ ɑ go di.

À sɑbu sɛ no Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ zɑmɑ ɑ si hulonzom hɑnu hine kɑbiɑ. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom mo cii: Mɛtɛ dulumkoni tɛ kɑ hini kɑ ɑlɑmu wɔne yom dimi tɛ? Cɔfɔ feefee tɛ ǹ gɑme.
Ǹ cii dɑnɑm di sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Ni mo, ifɔ n cii ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n moo yom feeri? À cii: Andebi nɑ.
Yuifu yom mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑ̀ sendɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dom gɔrɔ dɑnɑm ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go di. Kɑlɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom cɛɛ.
Ǹ nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wom koo di bɑ kɑ wom go cii wom nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi dɑnɑm? Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ go di mɑɑsɑ dɑ?
À bɑhɛi yom tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: I dee go bei kɑ i koo no. Dɑnɑm mo no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi.
Ammɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ko di mɑɑsɑ i si ngɑ di bei wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ moo yom feeri. Wɑ ngɑ bumbum hã. Sɑwɛrɛ no. À kɑɑ sendi ngɑ bɔm sɛ.
À bɑhɛi yom di sendi yɑ di zɑmɑ ǹ go hɑmburu Yuifu yom. Ǹ go hɑmburu zɑmɑ Yuifu yom nɑ mefɔ tɛ. Ǹ cii de bɔrɔ fɔ cii ndɑ ngɑ mee Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ gɑɑrɛ ngei mɑrgɑ fuu.
À sɛ no, ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom di cii: Sɑwɛrɛ no. Wɑ ngɑ bumbum hã.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom nɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ dom gɔrɔ dɑnɑm cɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. I go bei bɔrɔ di wɔ dulumkoni no.
À tu kɑ cii: De dulumkoni no, ɑ si bei. Hɛ fɔlɔnku no ɑ bei, dom di ɑ bɑrɑ no dɑnɑm ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go di.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Ifɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ n sɛ? Zɑngɑ mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ n moo yom feeri?
À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ kɔ. Wom mɑnɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. Ifɔ sɛ wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ mɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ? Wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom no?
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ woo kɑ cii: Ni yɑ ci ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize, ɑmmɑ i yom wɔ Moisi coobɑɑbɑize yom no.
I yom wɔ, i go bei kɑ Ikpɛ sendi Moisi sɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ i mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no.
Bɔrɔ di tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A mɑmɑci kɑ wom si bei nungu kɑ bɔrɔ no ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ moo yom feeri.
I go bei kɑ Ikpɛ si hɑngɑ dɑm dulumkoni yom sɛ. Ammɑ de bɔrɔ go hɑmburu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ sɛ no Ikpɛ go hɑngɑ dɑm.
Zɑ hɑndunyɑ tɑkɑyom i mɑnɑ mɑɑ ǹ mɑ cii bɑ ce fɔ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ hɛi dɑnɑm moo yom feeri.
De bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ.
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑ ǹ nɑ n hɛi n tɔ ndɑ dulum yom. Ngɑ no n go kɑ i cɛbɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ.
Yesu mɑɑ bɑɑru kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N go Ikpɛ Ize nɑɑne bɑ?
À tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mee no yɑ Kpe, yɑ du kɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N di ɑ̀ kɔ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi n sɛ, ngɑ no.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Kpe, ɑ go nɑɑne. À nɑ Yesu bɛɛrɑndi mo.
Yesu cii: Ciiti sɛ no ɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si di, ǹ mɑ di. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ go di, ǹ mɑ ye dɑnɑm yom.
Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom mo dɑnɑm yom no?
Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: De wom yɑ dɑnɑm yom no, kulu wom sindɑ dulum. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom go cii, i go di. À sɛ no wom dulum go gɔrɔ wom bɔm.
Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si huro feeji kɑli kunɑ ndɑ mee ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru no ndɑ nungu fɔ ŋmɑni, kulu zee no, bɔrɔ kɔmkɔ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go huro ndɑ mee feeji yom kurukɔ no.
Kɑli di mee bɑtukɔ cini feeri ɑ̀ sɛ. Feeji yom mo go mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde. À go kɑ ngɑ feeji yom cɛɛ ndɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ feeji yom kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ, ɑ̀ go dirɑ ǹ jine. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ jinde bei.
Ǹ si yo gɑnɑ pɑi. Ammɑ ǹ zuuru ɑ̀ sɛ no zɑmɑ ǹ si yo jinde bei.
Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne wi ǹ sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛɛ yɑ ci feeji yom kɑli mee.
Ǹ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ jinɑ, zee yom no, bɔrɔ kɔmkɔ yom, ɑmmɑ feeji yom mɑnɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci mee di. De bɔrɔ fɔ go huro ndɑ ɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du fɑɑbɑ. À kɑɑ huro. À kɑɑ hunu. À kɑɑ du kure dɔ mo.
Zee wɔ si kɑɑ kɑlɑ zeetɛrɛ. À kɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ wi kɑ hɛ kulu hɑlɑci. Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ kɑɑ no domi ǹ mɑ du hundi. Ǹ mɑ du ɑ̀ mo ndɑ bɑyom.
Hɛɛ yɑ ci kurukɔ hinno. Kurukɔ hinno go kɑ ngɑ hundi no ngɑ feeji yom sɑbu sɛ.

Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ bɑnɑndi sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kurukɔ. Feeji yom mo mɑnɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom. Kɑ ɑ̀ go di sɑgɑli go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ go feeji yom nɑm kɑ zuuru. Sɑgɑli di mo go huro feeji yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ hɑɑme. À go kɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see.
Gbei tɛkɔ wɔ go zuuru zɑmɑ bɑnɑndi gbei no ɑ̀ go tɛ. À bɑ si ndɑ feeji yom.
Hɛɛ wɔ, kurukɔ hinno no. A go kɑ ɑ feeji yom bei. Ngei mo go kɑ ɑ bei.
Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ go kɑ ɑ bei, hɛɛ mo ɑ go Bɑɑbɑ bei. A go kɑ ɑ hundi no mo ɑ feeji yom sɑbu sɛ.
A gundɑ feeji ŋmɑni yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci kɑli wɔ ŋmɔne yom. Kɑlɑ de yɑ kɑɑndei. Ǹ kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ jinde sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ tɛ kuru fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kurukɔ fɔlɔnku.
À sɛ no, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ go bɑɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ hundi no, yɑ ye kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ hɛɛ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ ɑ bɔm. A gundɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ no. A gundɑ hini mo kɑ ye kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. A Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ du meire wɔne.
À sendi yom sɑbu sɛ feefee ye kɑ tunu Yuifu yom gɑme.
Ǹ ŋmɔne iboobo cii: À gundɑ hɔllɛ. Hɔllɔkom no. Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ?
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo cii: Sendi yom wɔ mɑnɑ ci hɔllɛkpɛ sendi yom. Hɔllɛ si hini kɑ dɑnɑm yom moo yom feeri mo.
Hinnɑndiyom jingɑru go tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Hɑrigu wɑtɛ no.
Yesu bine go yɑɑli Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ Sɑlomɔ tɑfɑɑ cire.
Yuifu yom bine nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bindi kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Hɑli sɑɑ fɔ cine no n nɑm i mo goono siikɑ kunɑ? De ni yɑ Mɛsiyɑ no, n mɑ cii i sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ kɔ. Wom mɑnɑ nɑɑne. Gbei yom kɑ ɑ go tɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ngei yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ.
Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom si nɑɑne zɑmɑ wom si ɑ feeji yom kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ.
A feeji yom go mɑɑ ɑ jinde. A go kɑ ǹ bei. Ngei mo go kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
A go kɑ ǹ no hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Ǹ si hɑlɑci pɑi. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si ǹ kɔm ɑ kɑmbɛ.
A Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no ndei, ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ ǹ kɔm ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
Hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ, i kulu ɑfɔ no.
Yuifu yom ye kɑ tondi yom zɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A nɑ wom cɛbɛ gbei hinno boobo kɑ ǹ hunu ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Gbei yom wɔ kunɑ wɔ fɔ sɛ no wom go kɑ ɑ cetu?
Yuifu yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: À mɑnɑ ci gbei hinno sɑbu sɛ no, i go kɑ n cetu ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ n go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi. Ni kɑ n ci bɔrɔ, n go kɑ n bɔm tɛ Ikpɛ.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ nɑ wɔne hɑntum wom fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, "Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ cii wom sɛ wom bɑrɑ no ikpɛ yom". À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
À nɑ ǹ cɛɛ ikpɛ yom, nge yom kɑ ǹ dɔ Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑɑ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ si hini kɑ tunu.
Yɑ no hɛɛ wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi kɑ ɑ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, wom go cii ɑ go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ cii hɛɛ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Ize?
De ɑ si kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ gbei yom tɛ, wɑ si ɑ nɑɑne.
Ammɑ de ɑ go kɑ ǹ tɛ, bɑ kɑ wom si kɑ ɑ nɑɑne, wɑ cimɑndi gbei yom gɑɑ. Wom mɑ bei, wom mɑ nɑɑne mo, kɑ Bɑɑbɑ goono ɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Sendi ngɑ di sɛ no ǹ ceeci kpɛɛnɛ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ kɔmɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ.
À kpei hɑli Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ nungu kɑ Yohɑnnɑ jinɑ kɑ mirɑndiyom tɛ. À gɔrɔ nungu di.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Cimi no, Yohɑnnɑ mɑnɑ ɑlɑmu bɑ ɑfɔ tɛ. Ammɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ, kulu cimi no.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ goono nungu di nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑzɑɑ, Betɑni bɔrɔ no, Mɑriɑmɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ Mɑɑtɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Mɑriɑmɑ yɑ ci weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑidi munu Kpe bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini. À hɑime no Lɑzɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni.
À sɛ no ɑ̀ weimɑ yom nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei cii Yesu sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ n go bɑɑ di, ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni.
Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ cii: Zɛnjɛ ngɑ di mɑnɑ ci bu ŋmɔne ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ ŋmɔne no. Zɛnjɛ wɔ dɔ no, hɛɛ Ikpɛ Ize yɑ du bɛɛrɛ.
Yesu go bɑɑ Mɑɑtɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ Lɑzɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɑɑru Lɑzɑɑ sindɑ bɑɑni, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ jiribi hinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ nunguɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono.
À bɑndɑ no ɑ̀ cii coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: I mɑ ye Yude lɑɑbu.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ jɛ Yuifu yom nɑ n ceeci ngei mɑ n cetu ndɑ tondi yom. N tu kɑ ye nungu di kpɛɛnɛ?
Yesu tu kɑ cii: Zɑɑri kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci guuru wei cindi hinkɑ no? De bɔrɔ fɔ go dirɑ zɑɑri, ɑ̀ si kɑti zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go di hɑndunyɑ wɔ kɑɑri.
Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ go dirɑ ciini, ɑ̀ bo kɑti zɑmɑ kɑɑri si ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: I kpɑɑsi Lɑzɑɑ go jiibi ɑmmɑ ɑ go kpei kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, de ɑ̀ go jiibi no, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ buyom sendi no Yesu tɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo tɑmmɑ hɑhɑbiyɑ sendi no ɑ̀ tɛ.
À gɑɑ no Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ cii: Lɑzɑɑ bu.
Ammɑ wom sɑbu sɛ ɑ go fɑihã ndɑ kɑ ɑ si nungu di, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ no wom gɑ ɑ nɑɑne. Ammɑ i mɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
Tomɑ bine kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑwe, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ kpɑɑsi coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: I yom mo i mo kpei kɑ bu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Kɑ Yesu tɔ kpɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ gɑru Lɑzɑɑ bu. À tɛ jiribi tɑɑci sɑɑrɛ kunɑ.
Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ bine mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm no zɑngɑ kilomɛti hinzɑ sɑrɑ.
Yuifu yom boobo kɑɑ Mɑɑtɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ yɑmɑrɑndi ndɑ ǹ hɑime buyom.
À sɛ no, sɑɑ kɑ Mɑɑtɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru Yesu go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ammɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ goono fuu ko gɔrɔ.
Mɑɑtɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, de n goono nee, dom ɑ hɑime wɔ si bu.
Ammɑ bɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ bei hɛ kulu kɑ n go ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tu n sɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N hɑimɑ kɑɑ tunu kpɛɛnɛ.
Mɑɑtɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A bei kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tunu tunɑndiyomɑ hine, hɑnu beenɑntɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci tunuyom ndɑ hundi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, bɑ ɑkpɛ bu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si bu pɑi. N go cimɑndi ngɑ di gɑɑ dee?
Mɑɑtɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Oò Kpe, ɑ go nɑɑne kɑ ni, n ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Ize kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ.
Kɑ Mɑɑtɑ sendi yɑ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpei kɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ Mɑriɑmɑ cɛɛ tugu kunɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ kɑɑ nee. À bine go kɑ n cɛɛ.
Zɑ Mɑriɑmɑ mɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tunu ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
Yesu mɑnɑ huro kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ jinɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ Mɑɑtɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kube.
Yuifu yom bine kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ fuu kunɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ yɑmɑrɑndi, ǹ di ɑ̀ tunu ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ hunu. Ǹ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Sɑɑrɛ di dɔ no ɑ̀ go kpei hɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Mɑriɑmɑ tɔ Yesu dɔ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ jine. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, de n goono nee, dom ɑ hɑime wɔ si bu.
Yesu di Mɑriɑmɑ go hɛ. À di Yuifu yom mo kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ kɑɑ, ǹ go hɛ. Yesu binejisi. À bine go sɑrɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Mɑni wom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm? Ǹ tu kɑ cii: Kpe, kɑɑ di.
Yesu hɛ.
À gɑɑ no, Yuifu yom cii: Wɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ Lɑzɑɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom cii: Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑnɑm moo yom feeri, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ bɑ, kɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ mo mɑ si bu?
Yesu binejisi kpɛɛnɛ. À kpei sɑɑrɛ di dɔ. Tondi guusu fɔ no. Ǹ nɑ tondi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ mee gɑɑ.
Yesu cii: Wɑ tondɑ gɑnɑndi. Mɑɑtɑ, bukɔɑ weimɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ̀ fumbu kɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ jiribi tɑɑci no nee.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A cii n sɛ kɑ de n go nɑɑne n kɑɑ di Ikpɛ deizɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
Ǹ nɑ tondɑ gɑnɑndi nunguɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ bukɔɑ dɑm. Yesu nɑ bɔm sombu bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ go kɑ n sɑɑbu zɑmɑ n mɑɑ ɑ sɛ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go bei kɑ n go mɑɑ ɑ sɛ sɑɑ kulu. Ammɑ jɑmɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ go cɛ nee sɑbu sɛ no ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ sendi, domi ǹ mɑ nɑɑne kɑ ni, n nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ jinde zɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii: Lɑzɑɑ, hunu tɛrɛ.
Bukɔɑ bine hunu. À cee yom ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom goono didijɑntɛ ndɑ cɛsɛnjɛ. À moodumɑ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ ndɑ zɑrɑ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ̀ feeri. Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei.
Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Mɑriɑmɑ dɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne iboobo di hɛ kɑ Yesu tɛ. À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom kpei Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ.
À gɑɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mo ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ǹ nɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom meigu. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ i mɑ tɛ? Bɔrɔ kpɛ go ɑlɑmu boobo tɛ.
De i nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ɑ̀ go tɛ yɑ di, ǹ kulu gɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne. Lomɑncei bine kɑɑ kɑɑ, n gɑ i Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ i dimi zeeri.
Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Kɑifɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri jiiri wɔ, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom si hɛ fɔ kulu bei.
Wom si fɑhɑm kɑ bei i hɑnfɑni no bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ bu jɑmɑ sɛ dimi sunsɑm kulu mɑ si hɑlɑci.
À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ. Ammɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri jiiri wɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cii Yesu bɑ bu dimi sɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci dimi wɔ sɛ hinne ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ ize yom mo kɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see ǹ mɑ meigu kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ.
Zɑ hɑnu ngɑ di ǹ sɑwɑrɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
À sɛ no, Yesu si dirɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ Yuifu yom kunɑ. À hunu nungu di kɑ kpei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni ndɑ gɑnji fɔ. À huro wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Efɑhim, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
Yuifu yom Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru bine mɑɑni. Kpɑɑrɑ hundɑntɛ bɔrɔ boobo kpei Yerusɑlɛm kɑ ngei bɔm hinnɑndi zɑ jingɑruɑ mɑnɑ tɔ.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu ceeci. Ǹ go cɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ himɑ wom sɛ? À si kɑɑ jingɑru wɔ dɔ no?
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom nɑ fɔndɔ no. Ǹ cii de bɔrɔ fɔ bei nungu kɑ Yesu goono, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ cii ngei sɛ domi ǹ mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Jiribi idu hɑli Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑruɑ tɔ, Yesu kɑɑ Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ. Nungu di no Lɑzɑɑ goono, bɔrɔ kɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme.
Ǹ nɑ ŋmɑɑri tɛ Yesu sɛ. Mɑɑtɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑri fɑrisi. Lɑzɑɑ mo yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ Yesu ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ.
Mɑriɑmɑ nɑ wɑidi cɑɑdɑntɛ dimi fɔ kilo zemine kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ nɑdi zɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ munu Yesu cee yom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini. Fuu di tɔ ndɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ.
Ammɑ Yesu coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yudɑ, Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ, Simɔ koo goono ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ. Ngɑ yɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
À cii: Wɑidi wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nooru tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri fɔ bɑnɑndi, ifɔ sɛ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ kɑ nooruɑ no tɑlikɑ yom sɛ?
Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ di cii zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go sisibi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ sendi zɑngɑ yɑ zɑmɑ zee no. Nooru fɔɔlɔ goono ɑ̀ sɛ no. À nɑ nooru kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɔlɔ di kunɑ zɑɑ.
Yesu bine cii: Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. À nɑ wɑidi wɔ jisi no ɑ fijiyom hɑnu sɛ.
Tɑlikɑ yom bo goono wom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu, ɑmmɑ hɛɛ, ɑ si bo goono wom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu.
Yuifu bɑkɑrɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru Yesu goono Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ nodi. Ǹ mɑnɑ kɑɑ Yesu hinne sɑbu sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ di Lɑzɑɑ mo kɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme.
Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɑwɑrɑ ngei mɑ Lɑzɑɑ mo wi.
bɑɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ no Yuifu yom jɑmɑ boobo hunu ǹ bɑndɑ kɑ nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ.
À mo bo jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ kɑɑ jingɑruɑ dɔ. Ǹ mɑɑ bɑɑru Yesu go kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm.
Ǹ nɑ dɑbinɑ nyɑ kɑmbɛ yom zɑɑ kɑ hunu wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ, i go kɑ n sifɑ. Bɑrikɑkpɛ no Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Isirɑilɑ Kpe.
Yesu du fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ. À gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm, zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii:
"N mɑ si hɑmburu, Sionɑ koo hundiyo. Gunɑ, n Kpe go kɑɑ. À go gɔrɔ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ bɔm."
À coobɑɑbɑize yom bine mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ nge yom di. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu bɛɛrɑndi, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no ǹ hɔngɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ nge yom di hɑntum ɑ̀ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi ɑ̀ sɛ mo.
Jɑmɑ kɑ ǹ goono Yesu dɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Lɑzɑɑ cɛɛ sɑɑrɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme, ǹ go tɛ sɛdɑ.
À sɛ no jɑmɑ di kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube zɑmɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlɑmu wɔ tɛ.
À gɑɑ no Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Wom di kɑ wom si du hɛ fɔ kulu. Gunɑ, hɑndunyɑ kulu kpei ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi jingɑruɑ dɔ, ǹ kunɑ Gɑrɛku fɔ yom mo goono.
Ǹ kɑɑ Filipu dɔ Betɑsɑidɑ bɔrɔ no, Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, kɑ n ci jinɑ. I go bɑɑ i mɑ di Yesu.
Filipu mo kpei. À cii Andɛrɛ sɛ. Andɛrɛ ndɑ Filipu mo cii Yesu sɛ.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Lɔkɑci kɑɑ ǹ mɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize bɛɛrɑndi.
Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom de mɔsɔngu mogure fɔ mɑnɑ kɑm lɑɑbu kunɑ kɑ bu, ɑ̀ bo gɔrɔ no ngɑ fɔ. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ bu, ɑ̀ go kɑ ize boobo hɛi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ hundi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu ngɑ hundi hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ jɛ hɑli hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
De bɔrɔ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ. Nungu kɑ ɑ goono, ɑ gbeiize mo kɑɑ goono nungu di. De bɔrɔ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ, Bɑɑbɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Mɑɑsɑ ɑ hundi go tɑɑbi. Ifɔ yɑ cii? Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ ɑ kɑɑ lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ no? Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɛ no ɑ kɑɑ lɔkɑci wɔ.
Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ n mɑɑ bɛɛrɑndi. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. A gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi mo kpɛɛnɛ.
Jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu di mɑɑ yɑ di. Ǹ cii: Bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom no. Afɔ yom cii: Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ.
Yesu tu kɑ cii: Jinde wɔne mɑnɑ hunutɛrɛ ɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑmmɑ wom sɑbu sɛ no.
Mɑɑsɑ no hɑndunyɑ ciitiyom tɔ. Mɑɑsɑnkulu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ.
Hɛɛ mo, de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sombu bɛɛnɛ, ɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu cendi ɑ dɔ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, bu dimi kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ no ɑ̀ go cɛbɛ.
Jɑmɑ di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I mɑɑ bɑɑru fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bo hunɑ no beeniyom si. Mɛtɛ ni wɔ, n go cii, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ Adɑmize sombu bɛɛnɛ? Mee yɑ ci Adɑmize?
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Kɑɑri cindi lɔkɑci cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom bindi kunɑ. Wɑ dirɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom gundɑ kɑɑri domi kube mɑ si wom jirisi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dirɑ kube kunɑ, ɑ̀ si bei nungu kɑ ngɑ go kpei.
Wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑɑri gɑɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom gundɑ kɑɑri domi wom mɑ tɛ kɑɑriize yom. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ dirɑ kɑ kpei tugu ǹ sɛ.
Ammɑ bɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ɑlɑmu boobo tɛ ǹ jine, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
À tɛ no domi ǹ mɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi sendi tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Kpe, mee yɑ nɑ i bɑɑru cimɑndi? Mee sɛ mo no Kpe nɑ ngɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ?"
À sɛ nɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ nɑɑne zɑmɑ Esɑyi cii kpɛɛnɛ.
"À nɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom dɑnɑndi. À nɑ ǹ bine yom sendɑndi zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si di ndɑ ngei moo yom. Ǹ mɑ si fɑhɑm ngei bine yom dɔ hɑli ǹ mɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ, hɑli yɑ ǹ no bɑɑni."
Esɑyi nɑ wɔne yom cii zɑmɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu deizɑ kɑ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu sɑɑ di bɑ hɑikusu yom kunɑ ǹ bɑyom nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom sɑbu sɛ, ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cii ndɑ ngei mee zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si ngei kɑɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu.
Ǹ go bɑɑ bɛɛrɛ iburɑdɑm dɔ kɑ bisɑ Ikpɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛ.
Ammɑ Yesu nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ gɑɑ no ɑ go nɑɑne ɑmmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go di hɛɛ mo, ɑ̀ go di wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ kɑɑ no zɑngɑ kɑɑri hɑndunyɑ kunɑ domi bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si gɔrɔ kube.
De bɔrɔ fɔ go mɑɑ ɑ sendi yom, ngɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ǹ nɑɑne, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si ɑ̀ ciiti bo. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti ɑmmɑ kɑ hɑndunyɑ fɑɑbɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hungu hɛɛ, ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ sendi tu mo, ɑkpɛ gundɑ ɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti. Sendi kɑ ɑ cii, sendɑ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
Yɑ nɑ sendi ɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm. Ngɑ bumbum nɑ meire no ɑ sɛ, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ cii ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ sendi.
A go bei mo kɑ ɑ̀ meire yɑ hundi no kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À sɛ no, hɛ yom kɑ ɑ go cii, ɑ go cii no zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ cii ɑ sɛ.
Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑruɑ bɑ tɔ. Yesu go bei ngɑ Iɔkɑci tɔ ngɑ mɑ hunu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ kɑ kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ, ɑ̀ go bɑɑ rei kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
Ǹ goono ŋmɑɑri gɑɑ. Ibilisi nɑ hɑnyɑ lɑlɔ dɑm kɔ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ, Simɔ koo bine kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Yesu go bei Bɑɑbɑ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ngɑ kɑmbɛ. A go bei mo ngɑ hunu Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. À go ye mo Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
À tunu ŋmɑɑrɑ bɔm kɑ ngɑ kpɛ yom kɑɑ kɑ jisi kɑmbu. À nɑ zɑrɑ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ hɔ ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ.
À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri dooru gɑɑsu fɔ kunɑ kɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cee yom nyunu. À nɑ ǹ hɑɑbu ndɑ zɑrɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ.
À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ kɑɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ dɔ. Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni Kpe, ngɑ no n mo kɑ ɑ cee nyunu?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ ɑ go tɛ wɔ, n si ɑ̀ fɑhɑm mɑɑsɑ ɑmmɑ hɑli cɛnɑ n gɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm.
Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Pɑi no, n si ɑ cee yom nyunu. Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De ɑ mɑnɑ n nyume, hɛ kulu si hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme.
Simɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ cee yom hinne no n mɑ nyunu ɑmmɑ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom, ndɑ ɑ bɔm mo.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nyume kɔ, cee yom hinne no ɑ̀ mɑ nyunu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ hinne sã sã. Wom hinne ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom kulu.
À cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ cii wom kulu mɑnɑ hinne.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cee yom nyunu kɑ beeni ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ jiine yom dɑm. À ye kɑ gɔrɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ tɛ wom sɛ wɔ?
Wom go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ Coobɑɑbɑ. Wom go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ Kpe. Wom ciiyom boori zɑmɑ yɑ no hɛɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de ɑ nɑ wom cee yom nyunu, hɛɛ Kpe, hɛɛ Coobɑɑbɑ, wom mo wom mɑ cɛrɛ cee yom nyunu.
A nɑ wom no deedɑndi wom mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ tɛ wom sɛ.
Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, tɑm si bisɑ ngɑ kpe. Yɑ no bɔrɔ mo si bisɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ.
De wom go kɑ nge yom di bei, wom yɑ binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no de wom go kɑ ǹ tɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci wom kulu sendi no ɑ go tɛ. A go bei beerem kɑ ɑ suubɑ ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go buuru ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ ceekpɛrɛ tunɑndi ɑ gɑɑ".
Zɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ, domi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑ Hɛɛ yɑ ci.
Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ go dɔntɔm tɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ mo, ɑ̀ go wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm tɑ.
Kɑ Yesu sendi yɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ binejisi. À tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom go cɛrɛ gunɑ ndɑ siikɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ bei bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sendi ɑ̀ go tɛ.
Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ Yesu bine go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑ lɑmbɑ Yesu gɑɑ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu hã bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sendi ɑ go tɛ.
Ngɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go lɑmbɑ Yesu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Kpe, mee no?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ dumbɑri fɔ tusu kɑ no. À nɑ dumbɑri di tusu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ, Simɔ koo sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yudɑ nɑ dumbɑri di tɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no Setɑm huro ɑ̀ bine kunɑ. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ kɑ n go tɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ, bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cii Yudɑ sɛ.
Afɔ yom tɑmmɑ zɑ kɑ Yudɑ sɛ no nooru fɔɔlɔ goono, Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ no ɑ̀ mɑ dei hɛ kɑ ngei bɑɑ jingɑruɑ sɛ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ fɔ no tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
Kɑ Yudɑ nɑ dumbɑrɑ tɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hunu ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ciini mo tɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yudɑ hunu, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no Yesu cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ du bɛɛrɛ. Ikpɛ mo du bɛɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ.
Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ du bɛɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ, Ikpɛ mo gɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ bumbum kunɑ. À gɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi, ɑ̀ si jɛ.
Koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ goono ndɑ wom bɑndɑ fɔ. Wom gɑ ɑ ceeci. Zɑngɑ ɑ cii Yuifu yom sɛ, nungu kɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kpei, ǹ si hini kɑ kpei. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom mo, wom sɛ.
A go wom no meire teji, wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ. Zɑngɑ ɑ bɑɑ wom, wom mo, wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
Wɔne dɔ ǹ kulu kɑɑ bei kɑ wom yɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom no de wom gundɑ cɛrɛ bɑɑkɑsine.
Simɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, mɑni n go kpei? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei, n si hini kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ mɑɑsɑ, ɑmmɑ hɑli kɑ jɛ n gɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ifɔ sɛ ɑ si hini kɑ n gɑnɑ mɑɑsɑ? A gɑ ɑ hundi no n sɑbu sɛ.
Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N gɑ n hundɑ no ɑ sɑbu sɛ doo? Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ, hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
Wɑ si nɑm wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ. Wom go kɑ Ikpɛ nɑɑne. Wom mɑ ɑ nɑɑne mo.
Gɔrɛ dɔ boobo goono ɑ Bɑɑbɑ hundi kunɑ. De ɑ̀ si, dom ɑ cii wom sɛ. À go kpei gɔrɛ dɔ hinsɑ wom sɛ no.
De bine ɑ kpei gɔrɛ dɔ hinsɑ wom sɛ, ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ kɑ wom zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ. Nungu kɑ ɑ goono wom mo, wom mɑ goono.
Wom bei nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei. Wom go fɔndɔ bei mo.
Tomɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe i si bei nungu kɑ n go kpei. Mɛtɛ i tɛ kɑ fɔndɑ bei?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci fɔndɔ ndɑ cimi ndɑ hundi. Bɔrɔ kulu si du kɑ tɔ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑ dɔ.
De wom nɑ ɑ bei, dom wom nɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo bei. Zɑ mɑɑsɑ bine wom go kɑ ɑ̀ bei, wom di ɑ̀ mo.
Filipu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, i cɛbɛ Bɑɑbɑ. Ngɑ di wɑsɑ i sɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑ jɛyom no ɑ goono ndɑ wom Filipu, ngɑ no n mɑnɑ ɑ bei? Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ di hɛɛ, ɑ̀ di Bɑɑbɑ. Dee mɛtɛ ni wɔ, n tɛ kɑ cii yɑ wom cɛbɛ Bɑɑbɑ?
N mɑnɑ nɑɑne no kɑ ɑ goono Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ, Bɑɑbɑ mo goono ɑ kunɑ? Sendi yom kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si kɑ ǹ cii ɑ bɔm gɑɑ ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ go gbei tɛ.
Wɑ ɑ nɑɑne hɛɛ wɔ, Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ no ɑ goono. Bɑɑbɑ mo goono ɑ kunɑ. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wɑ ɑ nɑɑne bɑ gbei yom di sɑbu sɛ.
Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, gbei yom kɑ ɑ go tɛ, ngɑ mo ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ tɛ. Gbei yom kɑ ǹ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ tɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
Hɛ kulu kɑ wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, domi Bɑɑbɑ mɑ du bɛɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ Ize.
De wom nɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
De wom go bɑɑ hɛɛ, wom mɑ ɑ meire yom gɑnɑ.
Hɛɛ mo, ɑ kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom no Gɑɑkɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bo gɔrɔ wom kunɑ, beeniyom si.
Ngɑ yɑ ci cimi Biyɑ kɑ hɑndunyɑ si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ zɑmɑ hɑndunyɑ si di ɑ̀. À si ɑ̀ bei mo. Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom go kɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ndɑ wom. À kɑɑ goono wom kunɑ mo.
A si wom nɑm kɔyɔ yom. A ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
Lɔkɑci cɛnɑ cindi, hɑndunyɑ si di hɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ wom wɔ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ. Zɑ kɑ ɑ go hunɑ wom mo, wom kɑɑ hunɑ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di no, wom kɑɑ bei ɑ goono ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ bei wom goono ɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo ɑ goono wom kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑ meire yom ko kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ go bɑɑ hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ hɛɛ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo go bɑɑ rɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ go bɑɑ rɑ. A gɑ ɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Yudɑ ŋmɑni fɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ di, ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ n bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ sɛ?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ sendi gɑnɑ. A Bɑɑbɑ mo go bɑɑ rɑ. I kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. I gɑ i gɔrɛ dɔ tɛ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ si ɑ sendi yom gɑnɑ. Sendi wɔ kɑ wom go mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no.
A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go gɔrɔ ndɑ wom.
Ammɑ Gɑɑkɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ wɔ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ wom cɛbɛ hɛ kulu. À kɑɑ wom hɔngɑndi mo hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ.
A go lɑɑkɑli kɑne nɑm wom sɛ. A go wom no ɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si wom no bo zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ cini no. Wɑ si nɑm wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ. Wɑ si nɑm wom bine yom mɑ hɑmburu mo.
Wom mɑɑ kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ go kpei. A ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. De wom bɑɑ hɛɛ, dom wom fɑihã ndɑ kɑ ɑ cii ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ zɑmɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bisɑ hɛɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tɛ, domi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛ wom mɑ nɑɑne.
A si sendi iboobo ndɑ wom kpɛɛnɛ zɑmɑ hɑndunyɑ kpe go kɑɑ. À sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ dɔ.
Ammɑ hɑli hɑndunyɑ mɑ bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ, zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ no fɔndɔ, yɑ no ɑ go tɛ. Wɑ tunu, i mɑ dirɑ nee.
Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci lɛzɛ nyɑ kpɛsɛ cimi cimi. A Bɑɑbɑ mo yɑ ci ɑ̀ fɑrikɔ.
Kɑmbɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si ize hɛi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Kɑmbɛ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go ize hɛi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ hɛi kɑ tɔntɔnu.
Wom wɔ, wom hinne kɔ sendɑ kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Wɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo ɑ bo gɔrɔ wom kunɑ. Tuuri kɑmbɛ si hini kɑ ize hɛi ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ gɔrɔ tuuri kpɛsɛ gɑɑ. Yɑ no wom mo, wom si hini pɑi de wom mɑnɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci kpɛsɑ. Wom mo, wom yɑ ci kɑmbɛ yom. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ mo ɑ go gɔrɔ ɑkpɛ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ wɔ go hɛi ize boobo. De wom fee ndɑ hɛɛ, wom si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ si gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ zɑngɑ tuuri kɑmbɛ yom. Ǹ kɔgu no. Ǹ go kɑ ǹ meigu kɑ ǹ dɑm nini kɑ ǹ tɔnu.
De wom go gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ, ɑ sendi yom mo go gɔrɔ wom kunɑ, wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɛ kɑ wom go bɑɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ wom sɛ.
Ǹ go ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɛɛrɑndi wɔne gɑɑ, wom mɑ ize boobo hɛi. Wom kɑɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɑɑ hɛɛ, hɛɛ mo ɑ bɑɑ wom. Wom mo gɔrɔ ɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
De wom go kɑ ɑ meire yom gɑnɑ, wom bo gɔrɔ ɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ, zɑngɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ nɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ meire yom gɑnɑ. A go gɔrɔ mo ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no domi ɑ binekɑɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom kunɑ, wom binekɑɑne mo mɑ tɔ.
A meirɑ neyɑ, wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ zɑngɑ ɑ bɑɑ wom.
Bɑɑkɑsine fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ hundi no ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom sɑbu sɛ.
Wom bɑrɑ no ɑ kpɑɑsi yom de wom go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ go wom dɑm.
A si wom cɛɛ tɑm yom kpɛɛnɛ, zɑmɑ tɑm si bei hɛ kɑ ngɑ kpe go tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ nɑ wom cɛɛ kpɑɑsi yom zɑmɑ ɑ nɑm wom bei hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ mɑɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
Wom mɑnɑ ɑ suubɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ nɑ wom suubɑ kɑ wom gɔrɛndi domi wom mɑ kpei kɑ ize yom hɛi. Wom ize yom mo, ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ domi hɛ kulu kɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ wom no ndɑ.
A go wom dɑm nge yom di zɑmɑ wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
De hɑndunyɑ bine hungu wom, wom mɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ bine jinɑ kɑ hungu hɛɛ.
De wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom no, to, hɑndunyɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom. Wom mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom, ɑmmɑ ɑ nɑ wom suubɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. À sɑbu sɛ no hɑndunyɑ bine go hungu wom.
Wom mɑ hɔngɔ sendi wɔne kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, tɑm si bisɑ ngɑ kpe. De ǹ nɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi, ǹ kɑɑ wom guruguzɑndi mo. De ǹ nɑ ɑ sendɑ gɑnɑ, wom ŋmɔne mo, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ gɑ nge yom di kulu tɛ wom sɛ ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ si bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
De yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ mo, dom ǹ si gundɑ dulum. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ sindɑ kɔbɛ ngei dulum sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine go hungu hɛɛ, ɑ̀ bine go hungu ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo.
De yɑ nɑ gbei yom tɛ ǹ jine kɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni mɑnɑ tɛ, dom ǹ si gundɑ dulum. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ di hɛɛ. Ǹ bine go hungu hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo.
Ammɑ ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ Sendɑ kɑ ǹ hɑntum ǹ fɔndɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ bine hungu hɛɛ, sɑbɑbu si".
Sɑɑ kɑ Gɑɑkɔɑ kɑɑ, wɔ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ dɔntɔm wom sɛ zɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci cimi Biyɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
Wom mo, wom kɑɑ tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ yom zɑmɑ zɑ sintine wom goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no zɑmɑ wom mɑ si hɑitɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑ wom gɑɑrɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Go, lɔkɑci go kɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom wi, ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ gbei no ngɑ go tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ.
Ǹ gɑ nge yom di tɛ zɑmɑ zɑ Bɑɑbɑ, zɑ hɛɛ ǹ si i bei.
Ammɑ ɑ nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no domi sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci kɑɑ kɑɑ, wom mɑ hɔngɔ kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ. Yɑ nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ zɑ sintine zɑmɑ wom goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kpei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm dɔ. Wom kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si ɑ hã: Mɑni n go kpei?
Ammɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ, wom bine yom tɔ ndɑ binesɛrɛ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ go cimi cii wom sɛ, ɑ kpeiyom tɛ wom sɛ hɑnfɑni. De yɑ nɑ kpei, Gɑɑkɔɑ si kɑɑ wom dɔ. Ammɑ de ɑ kpei, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm wom dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ beerem zeeri ndɑ dulum ndɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ ciiti.
À gɑ ǹ zeeri ndɑ dulum zɑmɑ ǹ si nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ.
À gɑ ǹ zeeri ndɑ cɛyom susu zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Wom si di hɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
A gɑ ǹ zeeri ndɑ ciiti zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe ciiti.
A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ wom si hini kɑ ǹ jɛrɛ mɑɑsɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ngɑ wɔ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi Biyɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom boi cimi kulu kunɑ. À si sendi ndɑ ngɑ bɔm ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ cii. À kɑɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ mo deede wom sɛ.
À gɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ deede wom sɛ.
Hɛ kulu kɑ Bɑɑbɑ gundɑ, ɑ ŋmɔne no. À sɛ no, ɑ go cii Biyɑ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ deede wom sɛ.
À cindi cɛnɑ, wom si di hɛɛ. À cindi cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
A coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Ifɔ ɑ̀ go cii i sɛ wɔ: À cindi cɛnɑ wom si di hɛɛ, ɑ̀ cindi cɛnɑ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ?
À gɑɑ no coobɑɑbɑize yom go cii: Ifɔ no ɑ̀ go cii wɔ: À cindi cɛnɑ? I si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii.
Yesu bine bei ǹ go bɑɑ ngɑ hãyom. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom go cɛrɛ hã kɑ simbɑ ndɑ wɔne kɑ ɑ cii: À cindi cɛnɑ wom si di hɛɛ, ɑ̀ cindi cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ?
Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom kɑɑ hɛ. Wom kɑɑ bɛrɛɛ ɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑ fɑihã. Wom mo wom kɑɑ goono binesɛrɛ kunɑ ɑmmɑ wom binesɛrɛ kɑɑ ye fɑihã.
Sɑɑ kɑ weibɔrɔ go hɑizɛnyɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ gundɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci yɑ tɔ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo di hɛi, ɑ̀ si hɔngɔ ngɑ binesɛrɛ di kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ bine go kɑɑni koo kɑ ɑ̀ hɛi hɑndunyɑ kunɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Wom mo, mɑɑsɑ wom goono binesɛrɛ kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ ye kɑ di wom. Wom bine yom kɑɑ kɑɑni. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mo si wom binekɑɑne di kɑɑ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di wom si ɑ hã hɛ kulu kpɛɛnɛ. Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ wom kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ wom no ndɑ.
Hɑli mɑɑsɑ wom mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Wom kɑɑ du zɑmɑ wom binekɑɑne di mɑ tɔ.
A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ yɑɑse kunɑ. Lɔkɑci go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ si sendi wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ yɑɑse kunɑ ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ sendi no ɑ kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Hɑnu ngɑ di, wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. A si cii wom sɛ ɑ kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom sɛ.
Bɑɑbɑ bumbum go bɑɑ wom zɑmɑ wom bɑɑ hɛɛ. Wom bine nɑɑne kɑ Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ hunu.
Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ hunu kɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go hunu hɑndunyɑ kɑ ye Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, mɑɑsɑnkulu n go sendi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. N si yɑɑse bɑ ɑfɔ dɑm.
Mɑɑsɑ i go bei kɑ n go hɛ kulu bei. N si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ n hã. À sɛ no, i go cimɑndi kɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no n hunu.
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu no wom nɑɑne?
Gunɑ, lɔkɑci go kɑɑ. À bine kɑɑ kɔ. Wom kɑɑ kɑru kɑ see. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ zɑɑ. Wom gɑ ɑ nɑm ɑ fɔlɔnku. Ammɑ ɑ si ɑ fɔlɔnku zɑmɑ Bɑɑbɑ goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no domi wom mɑ du lɑɑkɑli kɑne ɑ kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ du tɑɑbɑndiyom hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ wɑ tɛ himmɑ. A gɑɑŋmɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔm tunɑndi bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: E Bɑɑbɑ, lɔkɑci tɔ. N mɑ hɛɛ, n ŋmɔne Ize, bɛɛrɑndi domi hɛɛ n ŋmɔne Ize, ɑ mɑ n bɛɛrɑndi.
Zɑngɑ n nɑ ɑ no hini iburɑdɑm kulu bɔm, domi beerem kulu kɑ n nɑ ɑ no yɑ n no hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bine neyɑ, ǹ mɑ n bei, ni Ikpɛ Cimikpɛ fɔlɔnku. Ǹ mɑ hɛɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bei mo, hɛɛ wɔ kɑ n dɔntɔm.
A nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Gbei kɑ n no ɑ sɛ yɑ tɛ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
Mɑɑsɑ ni Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ bɛɛrɑndi n bɑndɑ ndɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ n dɔ zɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ tɛ.
A nɑ n mɑɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ beerem sɛ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ǹ tɛ n ŋmɔne yom. N bine nɑ ɑ no ndei. Ǹ nɑ n sendɑ gɑnɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ ǹ bei hɛ kulu kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, n dɔ no ɑ hunu.
A nɑ ǹ no sendi yom kɑ n nɑ ɑ no. Ǹ bine nɑ ǹ tɑ. Ǹ bei ndɑ cimi n dɔ no ɑ hunu. Ǹ cimɑndi mo kɑ ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ sɛ. A si ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ beerem sɛ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no zɑmɑ n ŋmɔne yom no.
A ŋmɔne mo kulu n ŋmɔne no. N ŋmɔne mo kulu, ɑ ŋmɔne no. A du bɛɛrɛ ǹ kunɑ.
A si hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ ngei wɔ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kɑɑ n dɔ. E Bɑɑbɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, n mɑ ǹ jɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, domi ǹ mɑ ci ɑfɔ zɑngɑ i yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono ndei hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ nɑ ǹ jɛ no n mɑɑ gɑɑ. A nɑ beerem kɑ n nɑ ɑ no jɛ. Ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ dɛrɛ, kɑlɑ hɑlɑci izɑ, domi Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ mɑ tɔ.
Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kɑɑ n dɔ. A go kɑ nge yom di cii hɑndunyɑ kunɑ domi ǹ mɑ du ɑ binekɑɑne tɔnɑntɛ ǹ kunɑ.
A nɑ ǹ no n Sendɑ. Hɑndunyɑ bine go hunguei zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom, zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne.
A si ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ, ɑmmɑ n mɑ ǹ moorɑndi Ilɑlɔ.
Ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne.
N mɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi cimi gɑɑ. N Sendɑ yɑ ci cimi.
Zɑngɑ n nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, yɑ no hɛɛ mo ɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
A go kɑ ɑ bɔm hɑlɑɑlɑndi ǹ sɑbu sɛ, domi ngei mo, n mɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi cimi gɑɑ.
A si ŋmɑɑrɛ nge yom hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ beerem mo sɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ nɑɑne hɛɛ ǹ sendi yom gɑɑ.
Ǹ kulu mɑ ci ɑfɔ zɑngɑ ni Bɑɑbɑ, n goono ɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ mo ɑ goono n kunɑ. Ngei mo mɑ ci ɑfɔ i kunɑ, domi hɑndunyɑ mɑ du kɑ nɑɑne kɑ ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
Deizɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, ɑ nɑ ǹ no ndɑ, domi ǹ mɑ ci ɑfɔ zɑngɑ i yom i ci ɑfɔ.
A goono n kunɑ, ni mo goono ɑ kunɑ domi ǹ mɑ tɔ kɑ ci ɑfɔ. À gɑɑ no hɑndunyɑ mo mɑ bei ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm. N bɑɑ rei zɑngɑ n bɑɑ hɛɛ.
E Bɑɑbɑ, beerem kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, ɑ go bɑɑ nungu kɑ ɑ goono ǹ mɑ goono ndɑ hɛɛ. Ǹ mɑ di mo ɑ deizɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no zɑmɑ n bɑɑ hɛɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ tɛ.
E Bɑɑbɑ Cɛsusukpɛ, hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ n bei. Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ nɑ n bei. Nge yom mo bei kɑ ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
nɑm ǹ nɑ n mɑɑ bei. A gɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bei kpɛɛnɛ domi bɑɑkɑsinɑ kɑ n go bɑɑ hɛɛ ndɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ǹ kunɑ, hɛɛ mo ɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ǹ kunɑ.
Kɑ Yesu nɑ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ kpei ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hɑli Kedom gooru bisɑntɛ. Yesu ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom huro lɑmbu fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu di.
Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ nɑ nunguɑ bei zɑmɑ Yesu cini meigu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom lɑmbu di kunɑ.
Yudɑ bine kɑɑndɑ wɑnguize yom ndɑ dogɑri yom kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔntɔm. A nɑ ǹ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ ndɑ fitilɑ yom ndɑ yugulɑ yom ndɑ wɑngu jiine yom.
Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei hɛ yom kɑ ǹ bɑ tɔ ngɑ, ɑ̀ mɑɑni kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Mee no wom go ceeci?
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii. Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci. Yudɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ goono ǹ dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ, Hɛɛ yɑ ci, cɔfɔ n ye ndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ kɑm gɑndɑ.
Yesu yɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ hã kpɛɛnɛ: Mee no wom go ceeci? Ǹ cii: Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu.
Yesu tu kɑ cii: A cii wom sɛ Hɛɛ yɑ ci. De hɛɛ no wom go ceeci, wom mɑ nɑm bɔrɔ wɔne yom mɑ ngei kpeiyom tɛ.
À tɛ no zɑmɑ sendi wɔne mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Beerem kɑ n nɑ ɑ no ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ dɛrɛ ɑ sɛ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ gundɑ tɑkubɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ hoobu kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri tɑm fɔ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɑngɑ dumbu. Tɑm di mɑɑ no Mɑlɛku.
Yesu cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Tɑkubɑ di yeti ɑ̀ nyɑ kunɑ. Tɑɑbi kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ no, ɑ si gulɑize di hɑm no?
Wɑnguize yom kuru ndɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusu fɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom ŋmɔne dogɑri yom, ǹ nɑ Yesu dii kɑ hɔ.
Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu Hɑnɑnu dɔ sintine zɑmɑ Kɑifɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri jiiri wɔ, Hɑnɑnu hɑnzure no.
Kɑifɑ bine yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yuifu yom cɛbɛ kɑ hɑnfɑni no bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ bu jɑmɑ sɛ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize fɔ mo. Coobɑɑbɑize ngɑ di wɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri nɑ ɑ̀ bei. À huro gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑtɑ kunɑ ndɑ Yesu.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ wɔ go cɛ tɛrɛ hundi mee gɑɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize wɔne kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei hunu kɑ sendi hundi mee bɑtukɔɑ sɛ. À nɑ Piɛɛ hurɑndi.
Hundiyo fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi mee bɑtukɔɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Ni bine, ni yɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ? Piɛɛ cii: Yɑ nɑ ci.
Tɑm yom ndɑ dogɑri yom di nɑ nini funsu ko cɛ nungu di zɑmɑ yeeni go tɛ. Ǹ gɑ cɑɑni. Piɛɛ goono ǹ dɔ mɑ kɑ kɑ cɑɑni.
Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ Yesu hã ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ yom bɔm.

Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ sendi no tɛrɛkpɑrɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ. Sɑɑ kulu ɑ cini cooɑndi Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, nungu kɑ Yuifu yom kulu cini meigu. Bine yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ cii tugu kunɑ.
Ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hã? N mɑ hã ǹ hɛ kɑ ɑ cii ǹ sɛ bɔm, nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ. Gunɑ, ngei wɔ gɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ cii.
Kɑ Yesu sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, cɔfɔ dogɑri yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ nungu di, ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ sɑm. À cii: Yɑ no n go tu gɑrɑndikɔ beeri sɛ?
