Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De sendi lɑlɔ nɑ ɑ tɛ, n mɑ tɛ ilɑlɔ sɛdɑ. Ammɑ de sendi hinno no ɑ tɛ, ifɔ sɛ no n go kɑ ɑ kɑru?
À gɑɑ no, Hɑnɑnu nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ kɑ sɑmbɑ Kɑifɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dɔ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ gɑ cɛ nodi ko cɑɑni. À sɛ nɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni bine, ni yɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no? À ze kɑ cii: Yɑ nɑ ci.
Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ tɑm yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ Piɛɛ nɑ ɑ̀ nyɑize hɑngɑ dumbu, ɑ̀ cii: A di ni ndɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ lɑmbu kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Piɛɛ yɑɑrɑ kɑ Yesu ze. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ.

Susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine, Yuifu yom nɑ Yesu boi zɑ Kɑifɑ dɔ kɑ kpeindɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni ciiti kɑtɑ kunɑ. Ngei bumbum mɑnɑ huro kɑtɑ kunɑ domi ǹ mɑ si ziibi sɑbu sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ.
Pilɑtu hunu kɑ kpei ǹ dɔ. À cii: Tɔnyɑ fɔ nɑ wom gɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kpɛ bɔm?
Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ ci hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ dom i si ɑ̀ dɑm n kɑmbɛ.
À gɑɑ no, Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum mɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti wom fɔndɑ kunɑ. Yuifu yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I sindɑ fɔndɔ i mɑ bɔrɔ wi.
Ǹ cii yɑ domi sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii, ɑ mɑ tɔ. Sendɑ gɑ cɛbɛ buyom dimi kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ.
Pilɑtu ye kɑ huro ciiti kɑtɑ kunɑ. À nɑ Yesu cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n ci Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N bɔm gɑɑ no n go wɔne cii dee wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii n sɛ?
Pilɑtu tu kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mo, Yuifu no? N dimi ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ n dɑm ɑ kɑmbɛ. Ifɔ n tɛ?
Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A kpetɛrɛ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne. De ɑ kpetɛrɑ yɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne no, dom ɑ tɑm yom tɑngɑm domi ǹ mɑ si ɑ dɑm Yuifu yom kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ kpetɛrɑ mɑnɑ ci nee ŋmɔne.

Pilɑtu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ ni gɑndɑkpɛ no? Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n ci hɛɛ yɑ Kpe no. Hɛɛ wɔ, wɔne sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ hɛi. Wɔne sɛ mo no ɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ zɑmɑ yɑ tɛ sɛdɑ cimi sɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi ŋmɔne, ɑ̀ bo hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ jinde sɛ.
Pilɑtu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ yɑ ci cimi? Kɑ Pilɑtu nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ hunu kpɛɛnɛ kɑ kpei Yuifu yom dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ wom gundɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru hine yɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑm wom sɛ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom mɑ suubɑ. Wom bɑɑ yɑ Yuifu yom Kpe di tɑm wom sɛ?
Ǹ kulu kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Awo. À nɑ ci bɔrɔ ngɑ di, ɑmmɑ Bɑrɑbɑ. Bɑrɑbɑ wɔ bine zee beeri no.
À gɑɑ nɑ Pilɑtu cii ǹ mɑ Yesu dii kɑ bulɑɑlɑ.
Wɑnguize yom nɑ kɑriji cɛ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ kɑ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ kpɛ siini kuku fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Fɔɔ, Yuifu yom Kpe. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sɑm sɑm.
Pilɑtu ye kɑ hunu kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ di wom sɛ tɛrɛ domi wom mɑ bei kɑ yɑ nɑ di ɑ̀ gɑɑ tɑɑli kulu.
Yesu bine hunu tɛrɛ ndɑ kɑriji bɔmtɔbɛ di ndɑ kpɛ siini kuku di. Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, bɔrɔ di go.
Sɑɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ dogɑri yom di ɑ̀, ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: À kɑnji, ɑ̀ kɑnji. Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum mɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji zɑmɑ hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Yuifu yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I gundɑ fɔndɔ. I fɔndɑ kunɑ bine, ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bu no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ Ikpɛ Ize.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pilɑtu mɑɑ sendi ngɑ di, ɑ̀ hɑmburu kɑ tɔntɔnu.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ huro ciiti kɑtɑ kunɑ kɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Ni mɑni bɔrɔ no? Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu kɑ yeti ɑ̀ sɛ.
Pilɑtu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N si sendi ɑ sɛ no? N si bei ɑ gundɑ hini kɑ n kɑnji bɑ, ɑ gundɑ hini kɑ n tɑm?
Yesu tu kɑ cii: N si du hini fɔ kulu ɑ bɔm de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑ bɛɛnɛ no ǹ nɑ n no ndɑ. À sɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɑm n kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ gundɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ n ŋmɔne.
Zɑ sɑɑ di Pilɑtu ceeci ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. Ammɑ Yuifu yom go kuwɑ kɑ cii: De n nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ tɑm n mɑnɑ ci Kɑisɑ kpɑɑsi. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ kpe, Kɑisɑ no ɑ̀ go hungu.
Kɑ Pilɑtu mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ Yesu tɛrɛ. À gɔrɔ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm, nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Dɛbɛ Tondi, Ebulu cinɛ kunɑ mo Gɑbɑtɑ.
Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru sɔluyom hɑnu hine no zɑngɑ zɑɑri mɑɑnɑntɛ zɑkɑ. À cii Yuifu yom sɛ: Gunɑ, wom Kpe go.
Ammɑ ǹ kuwɑ: À kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. À kɑnji, ɑ̀ kɑnji. Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ mɑ wom Kpe Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom di tu kɑ cii: I sindɑ kpe fɔ kɑlɑ Kɑisɑ.
À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ nɑ Yesu boi kɑ kpeindɑ.
Yesu hunu kɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ jɛrɛ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɔm Kurumbu, Ebulu cinɛ no ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ no Gologɑtɑ.
Nungu di no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji, ngɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ fɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ ɑ̀ cɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ. Yesu mo goono bindi kunɑ.
Pilɑtu nɑ hɑntum fɔ tɛ kɑ dɑm bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Ngɑ no ǹ hɑntum neyɑ: YESU NAZARA, YUIFU YOM KPE.
Yuifu jɑmɑ nɑ hɑntum di coo zɑmɑ nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu kɑnji di wɑngɑrɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ nɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ ndɑ Gɑrɛku cinɛ ndɑ Lomɑncɛ cinɛ.
Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom di cii Pilɑtu sɛ: Si hɑntum Yuifu yom Kpe, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ hɑntum: À cii ngɑ yɑ Yuifu yom Kpe no.
Pilɑtu tu kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ ɑ hɑntum, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wɑnguize yom nɑ Yesu kɑnji ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom zɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ gusɑm tɑɑci. Wɑnguize fɔ kulu du gusɑm fɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ kuku kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑ di zɑɑ, zɑɑrɑ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ gɑndɑ.
Ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: I mɑ si ɑ̀ pɑti ɑmmɑ i mɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ̀ bɔm bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ du ɑ̀. Ǹ tɛ yɑ di domi Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ ɑ jiine yom fɑrisi ngei gɑme. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ kpɛ bɔm."
Yesu bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nyɑ gɑ cɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ cɛɛnɛ Mɑriɑmɑ, Celopɑ wɛndɛ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ.
Kɑ Yesu di ngɑ nyɑ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize kɑ ɑ̀ bine bɑɑ, ǹ go cɛ nodi, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ nyɑ sɛ: Wei wɔ, gunɑ n koo.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii coobɑɑbɑize di sɛ: Gunɑ n nyɑ. Zɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di, coobɑɑbɑize di nɑ Yesu nyɑ zɑɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ zɑ kɑ Yesu bei hɛ kulu tɛ kɔ domi ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ tɔnɑndi, ɑ̀ cii: A go mɑɑ jo.
Gulɑ fɔ bine goono nodi kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ hɑri mɔrɔ. Ǹ nɑ sɑku fɔ miti ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ tuuri kɑmbɛ fɔ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hisope. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ mee dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ hɑri mɔrɔ di tɑ, ɑ̀ cii: À beeni. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔm gum kɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
Hulɑnzom hɑnu sɔluyom hine no. Yuifu yom nɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ bukɔ yom di cee yom ceeri. Ǹ mɑ bukɔ yom kɑɑ mo domi ǹ mɑ si gɔrɔ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Hulonzom hɑnu di hɑnu beeri no ǹ sɛ.
À gɑɑ nɑ, wɑnguize yom kɑɑ kɑ sintine bɔrɔ di cee yom ceeri ndɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ ndɑɑ̀ kɑnji.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Yesu dɔ ǹ di ɑ̀ bu kɔ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cee yom ceeri.
Ammɑ wɑnguize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ ɑ̀ cɔrɔ gɑɑru ndɑ kɑmbɑi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kuri ndɑ hɑri hunu.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ tɛ sɛdɑ. À sɛdɑ bine cimi no. Ngɑ wɔ bei ngɑ gɑ cimi cii zɑmɑ wom mo, wom mɑ nɑɑne sɛ.
Nge yom di tɛ no domi ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ si ɑ̀ biri yom, bɑ ɑfɔ ceeri".
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Ǹ kɑɑ di wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑɑru".

Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yosɛfu Alimɑte bɔrɔ, Yesu coobɑɑbɑize nɑ tugɑntɛ Yuifu yom hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ Yesu gɑɑhɑm kɑɑ bundɑ gɑɑ. Pilɑtu tu ɑ̀ sɛ. À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ kpei Yesu gɑɑhɑmɑ kɑɑ.
Nikodim mo, bɔrɔ kɑ zɑ sintine ɑ̀ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ciini, ngɑ mɑ kɑɑ. À kɑɑndɑ mire, wɑidi dimi fɔ ndɑ ɑlowe, wɑidi dimi fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ time tɔ zɑngɑ kilomɛti weitɑɑci cindi gu sɑrɑ.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑɑhɑmɑ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ kunɑ ndɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ yom zɑmɑ Yuifu yom fijiyom ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ no.
Lɑmbu fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Lɑmbu di kunɑ tɑndi guusu sɑɑrɛ teji fɔ goono kɑ bɑ ce fɔ ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Ǹ nɑ Yesu dɑm sɑɑrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑni nungu di zɑmɑ Yuifu yom sɔluyom hɑnu bɑ tɔ.
Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɔ zɑ mo mɑnɑ bo. À di ǹ nɑ tondi gɑnɑndi sɑɑrɑ mee gɑɑ.
À zuuru kɑ kɑɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ Yesu bine bɑɑ dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Ǹ nɑ Kpe kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ kunɑ. I si bei nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
À gɑɑ nɑ Piɛɛ hunu ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wɔ di. Ǹ kpei sɑɑrɑ dɔ.
Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kulu gɑ zuuru. Coobɑɑbɑize wɔ di zuuru kɑ bisɑ Piɛɛ. À jinɑ kɑ tɔ sɑɑrɑ dɔ.
À gungum. À di cɛsɛnjɛ gɑndɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ huro.
Simɔ Piɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go dɛcɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ huro sɑɑrɛ di kunɑ. À di cɛsɛnjɑ gɑndɑ.
Fɑtɑlɑ kɑ ǹ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si cɛsɛnjɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbu kɑ jisi kɑmbu.
Coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ sɑɑrɑ dɔ sintine, ngɑ mɑ hurɑ. À di. À nɑɑne.
Sɑɑ ngɑ di ǹ si Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ wɔ bei jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ himɑ Yesu mɑ tunu bukɔ yom gɑme.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom ye ngei kpɑɑrɑ.
Ammɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ gɑ cɛ tɛrɛ sɑɑrɛ di jɛrɛ gɑɑ kɑ hɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɛ̃ni gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gungum kɑ sɑɑrɑ kunɑ gunɑ.
À di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinkɑ fɔ ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ. Ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ, ɑfɔ bɔm dɔ, ɑfɔ cee dɔ, nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑɑhɑm kɑnɑndi.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, ifɔ sɛ n go hɛ̃? À cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ Kpe zɑɑ. A bine si bei nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ ye ndɑ bɑndɑ. À di Yesu gɑ cɛ nungu di ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei hɑli Yesu nɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, ifɔ sɛ n gɑ hɛ? Mee nɑ n go ceeci? Mɑriɑmɑ tɑmmɑ hɑli lɑmbukpɛ di nɑ, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, de ni, n nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ, cii ɑ sɛ nungu kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm yɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑriɑmɑ. Ngɑ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ: Lɑbuni. À feeriji yɑ ci coobɑɑbɑ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Si ɑ hɑmɑ zɑmɑ ɑ mɑnɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ jinɑ. Ammɑ n mɑ kpei ɑ nyɑizei dɔ. N mɑ cii ǹ sɛ ɑ gɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ, wom Bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔ.
Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ kpei deede coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ kɑ ngɑ di Kpe. À bine cii ǹ sɛ hɛ yom kɑ Yesu cii ngɑ sɛ.

Jiribi iye hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, wiciri kɑmbu tɔ. Nungu kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑ meigu ɑ̀ gɑmbu yom goono dɑɑbɑntɛ Yuifu yom hɑmbure sɛ. Cɔfɔ Yesu kɑɑ cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛbɛ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ cɔrɔ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom fɑihã kɑ ǹ di Kpe.
Yesu ye kɑ cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, hɛɛ mɑ ɑ gɑ wom dɔntɔm.
Sendi ngɑ di bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ funsu ǹ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ tɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom, ǹ gɑ ǹ yɑɑfɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom, ǹ si ǹ yɑɑfɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ Tomɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ di kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑwe, ɑ̀ si ǹ dɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu kɑɑ.

À gɑɑ no coobɑɑbɑize cindei cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I di Kpe. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: De yɑ nɑ di kɑngɑrɑ yom di bidɑlɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ, de yɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbeize dɑm kɑngɑrɑ yom di bidɑlɑ gɑɑ, de yɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm ɑ̀ cɔrɔ gɑɑ, ɑ si ɑ̀ nɑɑne pɑi.
Jiribi ɑhɑku bɑndɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom ye kɑ meigu fuu di kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Tomɑ goono ǹ kunɑ. Gɑmbu yom go dɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ Yesu kɑɑ kɑ cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ. À cii: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Tomɑ sɛ: N kɑmbeize mɑɑnɑndi nee kɑ gunɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom. N kɑmbɛ mɑ mɑɑnɑndi kɑ dɑm ɑ cɔrɔ gɑɑ. N mɑ si zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ɑmmɑ n mɑ nɑɑne.
Tomɑ tu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A Kpe, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑ kɑ n di hɛɛ, n nɑɑne. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne.
Yesu nɑ ɑlɑmu boobo fɔ yom tɛ kpɛɛnɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom jine kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑntum tirɑ wɔ kunɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ wɔne yom hɑntum nɑ domi wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑ Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Ize. À nɑɑneyom gɑɑ mo, wom mɑ du hundi ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yesu nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ kpɛɛnɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ Tiberiɑ buulɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ neyɑ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ Tomɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑwe, ndɑ Nɑtɑni, Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ Zɑbɑdi koo yom ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ, ǹ goono cɛrɛ bɑndɑ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ cii ǹ sɛ: A go kpei ciifi ceeci. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom mo, i go kɑ n gɑnɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ hunu kɑ huro hɑrihi. Ciini ngɑ di ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu.
Mo bo, Yesu go cɛ jobu gɑɑ. Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ bei hɑli Yesu no.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Koo yom wɔ, wom gundɑ ŋmɑɑri bɑ? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Awo.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ biriji see hɑrihiɑ sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ, wom kɑɑ du. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ see. Mɑɑsɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ cendi ndɑ ciifi bɑyom.
Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ Yesu bine bɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Kpe no bo. Zɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ mɑɑ kɑ Kpe no, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ dɑm, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ no. À zimbi buulɑ kunɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize cindei mo kɑɑ hɑrihi cɛnɑ fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ mooru ndɑ tɛrɛ kɑlɑ zɑngɑ kɑmbɛ kɑru zɑngu hinkɑ sɑrɑ. Ǹ goono ko birijɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ ciifi cendi.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ zumbu gɑndɑ, ǹ di denji nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ciifi ndɑ buuru dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑndɑ ciifi kɑ wom du kunɑ ɑfɔ yom.
Simɔ Piɛɛ huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ kɑ birijɑ cendi. À kɑɑndɑɑ̀ jobu gɑɑ. À tɔ ndɑ ciifi bɑmbɑtɑ bɑmbɑtɑ, gudɑ zɑngu ndɑ weigu cindi hinzɑ. Bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ yɑ di, birijɑ mɑnɑ pɑti.
Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ sɔntɑkɑɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ tu kɑ ɑ̀ hã: Ni no mee? Ǹ bei kɑ Kpe nɑ.
Yesu mɑɑni kɑ buuru di zɑɑ kɑ no ǹ sɛ. Yɑ no ciifi mo.
À tɛ ce hinzɑntɛ noyɑ kɔ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ bukɔ yom gɑme tunuyom bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ kɑ beeni, Yesu cii Simɔ Piɛɛ sɛ: Simɔ Yonɑsi koo, n go bɑɑ hɛɛ kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom bɑ? À tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Oò Kpe. N bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ni. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ɑ feejiize yom kurum.
Yesu ye kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinkɑntɛ: Simɔ Yonɑsi koo, n go bɑɑ hɛɛ? À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Oò Kpe, n bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ni. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ci ɑ feeji yom kurukɔ.

À ye kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinzɑntɛ: Simɔ Yonɑsi koo, n go bɑɑ hɛɛ? Piɛɛ bine go sɑrɑ ndɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ ce hinzɑntɛ n go bɑɑ hɛɛ? Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii; Kpe, n go hɛ kulu bei. N go bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ni. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ɑ feeji yom kurum.

Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii n sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ n goono hɑiwɑsu n cini kunɑcendi hɔ n bɔm sɛ. N cini kpei nungu kulu kɑ n gɑ bɑɑ, ɑmmɑ sɑɑ kɑ n kɑɑ zeeni, n gɑ n kɑmbɛ yom sɛllɛ no. Bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni gɑ n hɔ kɑ kpeindɑ ni nungu kɑ n si bɑɑ.
À nɑ ngɑ di cii no kɑ cɛbɛ bu dimi kɑ Piɛɛ gɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ zogu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ Yesu bine bɑɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ lɑmbɑ Yesu gɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ. À cii: Kpe mee yɑ go kɑ n dɑm kɑmbɛ?
Kɑ Piɛɛ di coobɑɑbɑize di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, bɔrɔ bine ifɔ yɑ kɑɑ tɔ rɑ?
Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ɑ go bɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑ yɑ kɑɑ, mɑni ɑ̀ di ni? Ni dee, n mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Sendi ngɑ di yɑ kɑru kɑ see nyɑizei gɑme, wɑtom coobɑɑbɑize ngɑ di si bu pɑi. Yesu mɑnɑ cii coobɑɑbɑize di si bu bɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: De ɑ gɑ bɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑ yɑ kɑɑ, mɑni ɑ̀ di ni?
Coobɑɑbɑize ngɑ di yɑ tɛ nge yom di sɛdɑ. À bine nɑ ǹ hɑntum. I bei ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yɑ cimi nɑ.
Hɛ dimi boobo goono kpɛɛnɛ kɑ Yesu tɛ. De ǹ nɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑfɔ ɑfɔ, dɑm ɑ tɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ bumbum si hini kɑ tirɑ yom kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum jɛ. Ami.
E Teofilu, ɑ jinɑ kɑ tirɑ hɑntum n sɛ. Tirɑ sintine kunɑ ɑ hɑntum hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cooɑndi bɔm.
A hɑntum hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ko cooɑndi kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ. Hɑli ɑ̀ ziji kɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɔ yom no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ diyɑ yom kɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ sɛ.
À guruguze bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛbɛ bɑhunɑ diyɑ yom di sɛ kɑ ǹ no sɛdɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ boobo. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ jiribi weitɑɑci ko sendi Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru bɔm.
Hɑnu di kɑ ǹ nɑ cɛrɛ meigu bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ nɑ mei ǹ mɑ si hunu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ Bɑɑbɑ ɑlikɑwɑli bɑtu, ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ wom mɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
Cimi no Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ammɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ jiribi yom wɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ si jɛ.
Kɑ diyɑ yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu ǹ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Kpe, lɔkɑci ngɑ di no, n ye kɑ kpetɛrɛ dɑm Isirɑilɑ kɑmbɛ bɑ?
Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: À nɑ ci wom yɑ zɑmɑni yom wɑlɑ ɑliwɑti yom bei kɑ Bɑɑbɑ jisi ngɑ bumbum hini gɑɑ.
Ammɑ wom kɑɑ du dɑbɑri sɑɑ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu wom bɔm. Wom yɑ kɑɑ ci ɑ sɛdɑ yom Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu kulu kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sendi nge yom di tɛ, jɑmɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ, cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ gɑndɑ bɔm. Buru fɔ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi ǹ mɑɑ yom sɛ.
Ǹ go moo sinji bɛɛnɑ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ziji kɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi gɑ cɛ ǹ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Ǹ cii: Gɑlile lɑɑbu hɑibɔrɔ yom, ifɔ sɛ wom go cɛ nee ko bɛɛnɛ gunɑ? Yesu wɔ kɑ ǹ zɑɑ wom jine kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ, zɑngɑ wom di ɑ̀ go ziji kɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ, zɑngɑ yɑ di no ɑ̀ ye kɑ kɑɑ.
À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ ye Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ zɑ tɑndi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. Tondi kukuɑ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, hulonzom hɑnu fɔndɑ kuyom sɑrɑ.

Kɑ ǹ hurɑ wɑngɑrɑ ǹ kɑɑru kɑ hurɑ fuu fɔ jidɑmbisɑ kunɑ, nungu kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom go bɑtu. Piɛɛ gɔrɔ nodi ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Andɛrɛ ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Bɑɑtɛlɛmi ndɑ Mɑtiyu ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Hɑlife koo, ndɑ Simɔ Zelote ndɑ Yudɑ, Yɑkɔfu koo.
Beerem wɔ kulu tɛ mefɔ ko himmɑ dɑm ɑduwɑ gɑɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom. Ǹ goono weibɔrɔ yom bɑndɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ, Yesu nyɑ ndɑ Yesu cɛɛnɛ yom.
Hɑnu nge yom di kunɑ no, Piɛɛ tunu coobɑɑbɑize yom bindi kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ meigu tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ zɑngu ndɑ wɑrɑnkɑ sɑrɑ.
Piɛɛ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ tilɑsi Ikpɛ Sendi wɔ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ jinɑ kɑ cii Dɑfidi mee gɑɑ mɑ tɔ. À sendi Yudɑ bɔm, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ huro Yesu diikɔ yom jine.
Ǹ nɑ Yudɑ kɑbu i kunɑ. À bine du ngɑ bɑ gbei wɔne kunɑ.
Yudɑ bine nɑ bɑtumɑ dei ndɑ dulum bɑnɑndi. À kɑm, ɑ̀ bɔm nɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ. À gunde kulubɑ bɔgu. À gunde kunɑ jiine yom kulu kɑru kɑ see.
Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kulu du ngɑ di bɑɑru hɑli ǹ go bɑtumɑ wɔ cɛɛ ngei cinɛ kunɑ, Akɑlidɑmɑ, wɑtom kuri fɑri.
Ǹ hɑntum Somu yom tirɑ kunɑ kɑ cii: "À gɔrɛ dɔ mɑ tɛ gbɑrɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ." Somu yom tirɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gbei zɑɑ."
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ ci sɛdɑ. Sɛdɑ wɔ mɑ ci bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono beerem bɑndɑ ndɑ i yom sɑɑ kɑ Kpe Yesu go huro kɑ hunu i bindi kunɑ.
Beerem nge yom di goono i bɑndɑ zɑ mirɑndiyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ gɑɑ, kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu zɑɑ bɛɛnɛ. Akpɛ yom kunɑ, bɔrɔ ngɑ di mɑ ci sɛdɑ ndɑ i yom bukɔei tunɑndiyom gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ dɑm ǹ jine, Yosɛfu kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑɑsɑbɑ, kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑ dɛcɛ Yusitu, ngɑ ndɑ Mɑtiɑ.
Ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ cii: Ni Kpe, n go kɑ ǹ kulu bine bei. N mɑ i cɛbɛ bɔrɔ hinkɑ wɔ kunɑ wɔ kɑ n suubɑ.
N mɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ domi ɑkpɛ mɑ du ngɑ bɑ gbei wɔ kunɑ ndɑ diyɑtɛrɛ kɑ Yudɑ bɑ si ndɑɑ̀ kɑ kɑm hɑli ɑ̀ kpei ngɑ bɔm nungu dɔ.
Ǹ bine nɑ tɛtɛ kɑru. Cɔfɔ suubɑyom di kɑm Mɑtiɑ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔntɔnu diyɑ wei cindi fɔ di gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pɑntɛkotu jingɑru tɔ, ǹ kulu meigu ndɑ bine fɔ nungu fɔlɔnku dɔ.
Mefɔ mefɔ, kungu fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ hɛo futu kungu. À nɑ fuuɑ kulu tɔ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ goono kɑ gɔrɔ.
Dɛɛnɛ yom mo zɑngɑ nini bɛllɛ fɑitɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ feefee ndɑ cɛrɛ kɑ zumbu ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu bɔm.
Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Ǹ sinti ko sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni zɑngɑ Biyɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ no ǹ mɑ sendi.
Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ngei yɑ hunu hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ cire.
Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ kunguɑ, bɔrɔ boobo meigu. Ǹ kulu sindɑ ngei bɔm zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu go mɑɑ ǹ go sendi ngɑ cinɛ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di go kɑ ǹ jirisi. Mɑmɑci mɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ go cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Gunɑ, beerem wɔ kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ sendi Gɑlile bɔrɔ yom no. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Dee, mɛtɛ i kulu tɛ ko mɑɑ ǹ go sendi ndɑ i cinɛ yom kɑ ǹ kunɑ ǹ nɑ i hɛi?
Pɑtɑncei ndɑ Medɑncei ndɑ Elɑmitɑncei ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Mesopotɑmi lɑɑbu ndɑ gɔrɛ, ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Kɑpodoce lɑɑbu ndɑ Pontu lɑɑbu ndɑ Azi lɑɑbu i go mɑɑ ǹ gɑ sendi ndɑ i cinɛ.
Beerem mɑ kɑ ǹ hunu Filiji lɑɑbu ndɑ Pɑmfili lɑɑbu ndɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ Libi kure kɑ ɑ̀ goono Sileni jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ndɑ Lomɑncɛ yo yom kɑ ǹ ci Yuifu yom ndɑ yo yom kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɔ gɑnɑ,
ndɑ Kɛlɛtɑncei ndɑ Alɑbi yom mo, i go mɑɑ ǹ sendi ndɑ i cinɛ mo. I kulu go mɑɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ gbei bɑmbɑtɑ yom sendi i cinɛ yom kunɑ.
À go kɑ ǹ kulu jirisi. Ǹ mɑnɑ bei lɑsɑbu kɑ ngei tɛ. Ǹ gɑ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɔne?
Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom nɑ dondɑcɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cii: Bɑji nɑ ǹ hɑm kɑ bugu.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tunu ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi fɔ di kɑ jinde zɑɑ. A cii ǹ sɛ: Yuifu yom hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ wom kulu kɑ wom goono Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ gɔrɛ, wom mɑ wɔne bei. Wom mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm mo ɑ sendi yom sɛ.
Bɑji mɑnɑ beerem di wi zɑngɑ wom gɑ tɑmmɑ zɑ kɑ susubɑ guuru ɛgɑ no.
Ammɑ wɔne yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑndebi Zoelɑ sendi. Zoelɑ dɔ Ikpɛ cii:

"À kɑɑ tɔ, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑnu yom gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ Biyɑ zumɑndi iburɑdɑm kulu bɔm. Wom koo hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ wom koo hundiyo yom kɑɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Wom hɑiwɑsu yom kɑɑ di diyom. Wom hɑizeenu yom mo kɑɑ hɑndiri yom tɛ.
Hɑnu nge yom di mo no, ɑ gɑ ɑ Biyɑ dɑɑru ɑ bɑnyɑ yom bɔm ndɑ ɑ kɔngɔ yom bɔm. Ǹ kɑɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ mo.
Yɑ kɑɑ mɑmɑci yom cɛbɛ hɑli bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom hɑli gɑndɑ bɔm kɑ ǹ ci kuri ndɑ nini ndɑ dullu.
Weenu kɑɑ ye kube. Hɑndu mo kɑɑ ye kuri. À kɑɑ tɛ hɑli Kpe hɑnu bɑmbɑtɑ deizɑkpɛɑ kɑɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go Kpe mɑɑ cɛɛ ɑ̀ du fɑɑbɑ."

Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sendi wɔne yom sɛ. Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu, ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ Ikpɛ tɑbɑtɑndi wom jine. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi dɑbɑri gbei yom gɑɑ ndɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑ̀ dɔ wom bindi kunɑ. Wom bumbum, wom go kɑ ngɑ di bei.
Yesu wɔ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm wom kɑmbɛ no Ikpɛ miilɑ bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ beiyom kɑ ɑ̀ jisi bɔm. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ wi ndɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom kɑmbɛ yom.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bu guruguze kɑmbɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ bu mɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ jɛ.
Dɑfidi sendi ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ cii: "A go di Kpe ɑ jine wɑti kulu. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ si zinji.
À sɛ no, ɑ goono binekɑɑne kunɑ. A dɛɛnɛ mo huro fɑihã kunɑ. Hɑli yɑ mo ɑ gɑɑhɑm mo kɑɑ gɔrɔ bɛɛjɛ kunɑ.
A bɛɛjɛ yɑ ci n si ɑ hundɑ nɑm ciyomɑ. N si tu n Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo mɑ fumbu.
N nɑm ɑ mɑ hundi fɔndɔ yom bei. N gɑ ɑ tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne n goonoyom gɑɑ."
Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ tu ɑ sɛ yɑ cii wom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ dom cɛɛ Dɑfidi. À bu, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji mo. À sɑɑrɛ goono i bindi kunɑ hɑli kɑ kɑɑ hunkunɑ.
Dɑfidi bine ci ɑndebi. À bei mo kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ngɑ sɛ ndɑ zeyom. À cii Dɑfidi bɑndɑ yom kunɑ Ikpɛ gɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm.
Kɑ Dɑfidi di wɔne ɑndebitɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ sendi Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndiyom bɔm. À cii: "Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ciyomɑ. À gɑɑhɑm mo mɑnɑ di fumbi dɔ."
Yesu wɔ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. I kulu yɑ ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ hɛ kɑ wom go di ko mɑɑ zumɑndi.
Dɑfidi bumbum mɑnɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ bo ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Kpe cii ɑ Kpe sɛ, n mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ
hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee dɛcɛyom dɔ."
Wɑ nɑm Isirɑilɑ fuu kulu mɑ bei siikɑ si, kɑ Yesu kɑ wom kɑnji, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Kpe ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, sendɑ nɑ ǹ bine yom gooru. Ǹ cii Piɛɛ ndɑ diyɑ cindei sɛ: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ?
Piɛɛ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ tuubi. Ǹ mɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mirɑndi Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ wom dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ. Wom kɑɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ noyom.
Alikɑwɑli di wom ŋmɔne no ndɑ wom koo yom ŋmɔne. Yɑ no beerem kɑ ǹ go mooru, ǹ kulu mo Kpe i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ.
Ndɑ sendi fɔ yom kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ. À cii: Wom mɑ du fɑɑbɑ kɑ fee ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ beerem siirɑntɛ yom.
Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ tɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne, ǹ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi. Hɑnu ngɑ di Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ dubu hinzɑ sɑrɑ tɔntɔnu ǹ sɛ.
Ǹ gɑ moo yeti diyɑ yom cɛbɛyom gɑɑ ndɑ nyɑize bine fɔ meiguyom ndɑ buuru zenjeyom ndɑ ɑduwɑ tɛyom.
Hɑmburu nɑ bɔrɔ kulu dii. Ikpɛ nɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom tɛ diyɑ yom dɔ.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑɑne goono cɛrɛ bɑndɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ meigu kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ.
Ǹ nɑ ngei hɑibɑrikɑ yom ndɑ ngei jiine yom neerɑ kɑ noorɑ fɑrisi ngei gɑme bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ bɑnji bɔm.
Hɑnu kulu mo ǹ goono cɛrɛ bɑndɑ kɑ moo yeti ndɑ bine fɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ǹ go buuru zenji ngei fuu yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ meigu kɑ ngei ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne ndɑ bine fɔ.
Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ. Ǹ du gɑɑkuri bɔrɔ kulu dɔ. Hɑnu kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu mo Kpe go kɑ ǹ tɔntɔnu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ beerem kɑ ǹ du fɑɑbɑ.
Hɑnu fɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ go kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑduwɑ tɛyom zɑkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑɑri guuru hinzɑ.

Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom si tɛ zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gunde. Hɑnu kulu beerem cini kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ jisi hundi mee kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ihinno. Hundi mee gɑɑ no mɔngɔlɔ di cini bɑrɑ wɔ kɑ yom go huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ sɛ.
Kɑ mɔngɔlɑ di Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɑ huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, ɑ̀ bɑrɑ ǹ sɛ.
Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ mɑɑ sinji ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii: I gunɑ.
Cɔfɔ mɔngɔlɑ nɑ ǹ gunɑ ko tɑmmɑ hɑli ngɑ du hɛ fɔ ǹ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A sindɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu. A sindɑ wurɑ. Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ gundɑ, ngɑ no ɑ go kɑ n no. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu mɑɑ gɑɑ, tunu kɑ dirɑ.
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ cee yom ndɑ ɑ̀ ceemo yom kulu du gɑɑbi.
À sɑru kɑ tunu. À go dirɑ. À huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɑndɑ. À go dirɑ kɑ sɑru ko kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
Bɔrɔ kulu di ɑ̀ go dirɑ kɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
Ǹ bei kɑ ngɑ yɑ cini gɔrɔ ko bɑrɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ mee gɑɑ, mee kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ihinno. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ gɑ fɑihã ndɑ hɛ kɑ tɛ mɔngɔlɑ sɛ.
Kɑ mɔngɔlɔ di gɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑmbɛ dii, bɔrɔ kulu zuuru kɑ kpei ǹ dɔ tɑfɑɑ fɔ cire, tɑfɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sɑlomɔ tɑfɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ mɑmɑci kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.

Kɑ Piɛɛ di yɑ di, ɑ̀ cii jɑmɑ sɛ: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, ifɔ sɛ no wom go mɑmɑci ndɑ ngɑ di? Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ i gunɑ dee zɑngɑ i bumbum dɑbɑri gɑɑ nɑ wɑlɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ nɑ, bɔrɔ wɔ go hini kɑ dirɑ?

Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ǹ kulu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ gbeiize Yesu bɛɛrɑndi. Ngɑ no wom dɑm kɑmbɛ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ ze mo Pilɑtu jine sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ guuri zɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
Wom nɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ ndɑ Cɛsusukpɛ ze. Ammɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ tu wom sɛ ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ tɑm.
Wom nɑ Hundikpɛ wi ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. I yom yɑ ci wɔne sɛdɑ.
Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ nɑɑne nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ wom go di ko bei no gɑɑbi. Nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Yesu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ wɔ no bɑɑni sã sã wom kulu jine.
Mɑɑsɑ gɑɑ nyɑizei, ɑ bei kɑ wom ndɑ wom hinikpɛ yom nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ cii ngɑ ɑndebi yom kulu mee gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑ guruguze. Yɑ di no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ wom dulum yom tusu. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ bɑɑni lɔkɑci yom mɑ zumbu zɑ Kpe dɔ.
À mɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔntɔm mo, ngɑ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru no wom sɛ.
Yesu wɔ tilɑsi no ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ bɛɛnɛ hɑli hɛ yom kulu yeyom lɔkɑci mɑ tɔ. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di Ikpɛ sendi zɑ dom zɑmɑni ngɑ ɑndebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom mee gɑɑ.
Cimi nɑ Moisi cii i cɛɛ yom sɛ: "Kpe wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑndebi fɔ tunɑndi zɑngɑ hɛɛ wom sɛ wom nyɑizei kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɛ mo bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑngɑ dɑm ɑndebi di sɛ, ɑ̀ hɑlɑci kpɑrɑkɑtɑkɑ jɑmɑ bindi kunɑ."
Andebi yom kulu mo zɑ Sɑmuɛli gɑɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ kulu kɑ ǹ sendi, ǹ nɑ jiribi nge yom di bɑɑru deede.
Wom mo, wom yɑ ci ɑndebi yom ize yom ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne yom kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ i cɛɛ yom. À cii Abulɛmɑ sɛ: "Hɑndunyɑ fuu kulu kɑɑ du bɑrikɑ n bɑndɑ fɔ dɔ."
Kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gbeiize Yesu tunɑndi, wom dɔ no ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm wom kulu gɑɑ kɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɛrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ gbei lɑlɔ yom nɑm.
Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ go sendi jɑmɑ sɛ, gɑrɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ǹ dɔ.
Ǹ kulu lɑɑkɑli tunu ndɑ hɛ kɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ gɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi ndɑ, kɑ wɑɑzu bukɔei tunɑndiyom bɔm Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Ǹ nɑ ǹ dii kɑ dɑm kɑsu kɑlɑ subɑ zɑmɑ wiciri kɑmbu bɑ tɔ.
Ammɑ ǹ bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ sendɑ, ǹ nɑɑne. Cɔfɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu, zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu sɑrɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ mo bo, Yuifu jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ beeri fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Hɑnɑnu goono ǹ gɑme. Kɑifɑ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Alɛsɑndi ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dimi yom goono ǹ gɑme mo.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm ngei bindi. Ǹ go kɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Dɑbɑri fɔ dimi gɑɑ wɑlɑ mɑɑ fɔ dimi gɑɑ no wom go kɑ ngɑ di tɛ?
Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom ci mɑrgɑ jinɑ yom ndɑ Isirɑilɑ hɑikusu yom.
Hunkunɑ wom go kɑ i hã tɛyom hinno kɑ i tɛ mɔngɔlɔ di sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ du bɑɑni.
Wom kulu ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ kulu mɑ bei, kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kɑ wom kɑnji, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À mɑɑ gɑɑ no mɔngɔlɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cɛ wom jine du bɑɑni sã sã.
Yesu wɔ yɑ tɛ "tondi kɑ wom cinikɔ yom hungu kɑ furu. Ngɑ yɑ ci mimbɑri cire tɑndi sintine."
Kɑlɑ ɑ̀ dɔ hinne nɑ bɔrɔ gɑ du fɑɑbɑ. Mɑɑ fɔ kulu si kpɛɛnɛ bɛɛnɛ cire kɑ Ikpɛ no iburɑdɑm sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ tilɑsi i mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Ǹ di Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii zɑmɑ ǹ bei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom, ǹ ci tɑlikɑ yom mɑ. Ǹ bei mo kɑ ǹ goono Yesu bɑndɑ dom.
Zɑ kɑ ǹ di mɔngɔlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du bɑɑni go cɛ ngei jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ cii.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ no mei ǹ mɑ hunu ciiti dumbukɔ mɑrgɑ dɔ, cɔfɔ ǹ sɑwɑrɑ ngei gɑme.
Ǹ cii: Mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ beerem wɔ sɛ? Cimi no, ɑlɑmu beeri fɔ tɛ ǹ dɔ. À kpɑrɛ mo Yerusɑlɛm bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. Cimi no i si hini kɑ ɑ̀ ze mɑ.
Ammɑ ɑlɑmu bɑɑru wɔ mɑ si see kɑ tɔntɔnu jɑmɑ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. À sɛ no i mɑ hungu ǹ sɛ ndɑ moocire, ǹ mɑ si sendi bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ Yesu mɑɑ bɔm.
À gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ kɑ hungu ǹ sɛ pɑti pɑti ǹ mɑ si sendi wɑlɑ kɑ cooɑndi Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ gunɑ wom bine dɔ kɑ cii hɑli ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ i mɑ wom sendi gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ bisɑ i mɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
I si hini kɑ zɑm kɑ sendi hɛ kɑ i di ndɑ hɛ kɑ i mɑɑ bɔm.
Ammɑ ǹ hungu Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ ndɑ moocire kpɛɛnɛ. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm. Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi jɑmɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm bɑɑni ɑlɑmu wɔ tɛ, ɑ̀ zeene tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri weitɑɑci.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm, Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kpei gɑnɑkɔ yom dɔ kɑ deede hɛ kulu kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom cii ǹ sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ǹ sɛ, cɔfɔ ǹ kulu sɑbɑ kɑ jinde zɑɑ mefɔ Ikpɛ sɛ. Ǹ cii: Kpe, n ci Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ tɑkɑ kɑ tɛku tɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ kunɑ.
N sendi n gbeiize Dɑfidi mee gɑɑ kɑ cii: "Ifɔ sɛ dimi cindei go hɔllɔ? Ifɔ sɛ hɑndunyɑ jɑmɑ go lɑsɑbu kɔnu kɔnu yom tɛ?
Hɑndunyɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom tunu mefɔ. Hinikpɛ yom mo go diibi kuru tɛ. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Kpe ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ."
Yɑ no Hirodu ndɑ Pilɑtu Pɔnse mo nɑ diibi tɛ ndɑ dimi cindei ndɑ Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu jɑmɑ. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ n Gbeiize hɑlɑɑlɑ Yesu kɑ n dɑm Mɛsiyɑ.
Ǹ mɑ du kɑ tɛ hɛ kulu kɑ n kɑmbɛ ndɑ n miilɑ jinɑ kɑ jisi.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Kpe, gunɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ cii ndɑ moocire. N mɑ n tɑm yom no gɑɑbi ǹ mɑ n sendi bɑɑru no ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
N mɑ n kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ bɑɑni noyom mɑ tɛ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom n Gbeiize hɑlɑɑlɑ Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ beeni, nungu kɑ ǹ meigu di zinji. Ǹ kulu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi cii mo ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ nɑɑne, ǹ kulu tɛ bine fɔ ndɑ hundi fɔ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si cii hɑibɑrikɑ yom di ngɑ ŋmɔne yom no. Ammɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono ǹ sɛ, ǹ kulu ŋmɔne yom no ǹ cɛrɛ gɑme.
Diyɑ yom kɑɑndɑ sɛdɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri bɑmbɑtɑ Kpe Yesu tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme bɔm. Cɔfɔ gomini bɑmbɑtɑ zumbu ǹ kulu bɔm.
Ǹ kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ zɑm hɛ fɔ zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ fɑri yom wɑlɑ fuu yom nɑ ǹ neerɑ kɑ kpeindɑ nooru jɑmɑ dɔ.
Ǹ nɑ nooru di jisi diyɑ yom jine ko fɑrisi bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnji goono ndɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ no Yose. Diyɑ yom nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Bɑɑnɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ feeriji yɑ ci Yɑmɑrɑndiyom Ize. Ngɑ yɑ ci Lefi bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi.
À nɑ ngɑ fɑri kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ neerɑ. À kpeindɑ nooru di kɑ jisi diyɑ yom jine.
Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Anɑni. Ngɑ ndɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ Sɑfiɑ nɑ gɑndɑ fɔ neerɑ.
À nɑ noorɑ jɛrɛ fɔ jɛ kɑ kpeindɑ cindɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi diyɑ yom jine. À wɛndɛ bei.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Anɑni, ifɔ sɛ no Setɑm nɑ n bine tɔnɑndi yɑ wɔ dimi? N nɑ tɑngɑri tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɛ fɑ kɑ n nɑ n gɑndɑ neerɑ kɑ ɑ̀ noorɑ jɛrɛ fɔ jɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Zɑ n mɑnɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci n ŋmɔne no? Mɑɑsɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ, noorɑ n ŋmɔne no. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ miilɑ wɔ dimi dɑm n bine kunɑ? À mɑnɑ ci beerem sɛ no n nɑ tɑngɑri tɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
Kɑ Anɑni mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ kɑm kɑ bu. Hɑmburu bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ mɑɑkɔ yom kulu dii.
Cɔfɔ hɑiwɑsu yom tunu kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpei fiji.
Zɑngɑ guuru hinzɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no ɑ̀ wɛndɑ kɑɑ hurɑ. À mɑnɑ bei hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Piɛɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ cii ɑ sɛ, nooru wɔne sɑrɑ no wom nɑ gɑndɑ neerɑ? À tu kɑ cii: Mm, nooru yɑ di sɑrɑ nɑ.
Piɛɛ bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ mɑɑ cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ sui? Gunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ n kunye fiji, ngei no fuu mee yɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ kɑ n zɑɑ.
Mefɔ mefɔ, Sɑfiɑ mo kɑm Piɛɛ jine kɑ bu. Hɑiwɑsu yom huro kɑ gɑru ɑ̀ bu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpei fiji ɑ̀ kunye jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Hɑmburu bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ kulu dii ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ bɑɑru ngɑ di.
Alɑmu boobo ndɑ mɑmɑci boobo go tɛ jɑmɑ bindi kunɑ diyɑ yom kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ kulu goono mefɔ tɑfɑɑ fɔ cire, tɑfɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sɑlomɔ tɑfɑɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ cindei kunɑ, bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ tu ngɑ mɑ meigu ndei. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu jɑmɑ go kɑ ǹ bɛɛrɑndi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne Kpe gɑɑ, hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ, ǹ go tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom.
Ǹ kpeindɑ zɛnjɛkom yom kɑ ǹ jisi dɑɑri ndɑ tɛnjɛrɛ yom bɔm dɛbɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ domi sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ kɑɑ kɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ biyɑ mɑ du kɑ zumbu ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom bɔm.
Bɔrɔ boobo hunu kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm hundɑntɛ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ zɛnjɛkom yom ndɑ beerem kɑ hɔllɛ yom go kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi. Ǹ kulu mɑ du bɑɑni.
À gɑɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ beeri di tunu ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, wɑtom Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom. Ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ.
Ǹ nɑ diyɑ yom dii kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu.
Ammɑ Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ mo kɑɑ ciini kɑ kɑsu di mee yom feeri kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei cɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ sendi yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono kɑ simbɑ hundi wɔ bɔm bɑɑru no jɑmɑ sɛ.

Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine ǹ huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ cooɑndi. Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ mɑ kɑɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom cɛɛ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ hɑikusu yom kulu. Ǹ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kɑsu di kunɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑ diyɑ yom di.
Dogɑri yom kpei, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ gɑru kɑsuɑ kunɑ. Ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye kɑ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑru.
Ǹ cii: Cimi nɑ i nɑ kɑsuɑ gɑru dɑɑbɑntɛ mɑm mɑm mɑm. Bɑtukɔ yom mɑ gɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mee yom gɑɑ. Kɑ i nɑ ǹ feeri i mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑsu kunɑ.
Kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mɑɑ bɑɑru di, ǹ mɑnɑ bei lɑsɑbu kɑ ngei mɑ tɛ diyɑ yom di bɔm ndɑ nungu kɑ sendɑ kpei cɛ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, beerem di kɑ wom dɑm kɑsu, ǹ gɑ cɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi.
Cɔfɔ bɑtukɔɑ ndɑ dogɑri yom kpei kɑɑndei mɔsɔ mɔsɔ zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu hɑnibɑ jɑmɑ gɑ ǹ cetu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑndei, ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm mɑrgɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine. Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii:
I nɑ wom no mei pɑti pɑti wom mɑ si cooɑndi mɑɑ wɔ bɔm. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ? Gunɑ, wom nɑ Yerusɑlɛm tɔnɑndi ndɑ wom cɛbɛ yom. Wom go bɑɑ mo wom mɑ bɔrɔ di kuri dɛcɛ i bɔm.
Piɛɛ ndɑ diyɑ cindei tu kɑ cii: Tilɑsi i mɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ, i mɑ iburɑdɑm sendi gɑnɑ.
I cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi, wɔ kɑ wom kɑnji kɑ wi tuuri gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu wɔ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci Hinikpɛ ndɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom mɑ tuubi kɑ du yɑɑfɑyom ngei dulum yom gɑɑ.
I go ci hɛ nge yom di sɛdɑ yom. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ Ikpɛ no wɔ kɑ yom go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ sɛ, ngɑ mo yɑ ci sɛdɑ.
Kɑ jɑmɑ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di ǹ binei futu. Ǹ sɑwɑrɑ mo ngei mɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ wi.

Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ goono Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom bindi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Gɑmɑli. Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ jɑmɑ kulu dɔ. À tunu kɑ cɛ ǹ jine kɑ mei no ǹ mɑ diyɑ yom kɑɑ tɛrɛ bɑndɑ fɔ.
À cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom bɑ tɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ beerem wɔ.

Zɑ hɑnu nge yom di mɑnɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Tɛudɑ tunu. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm jisi hɛ fɔ. À bɑndɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ zɑngu tɑɑci meigu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi. Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ gbei tɛ kɔnu mo.
Tɛudɑ bɑndɑ, Gɑlile bɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yudɑ tunu kɑbukɑbu lɔkɑci wɑtɛ. À nɑ bɔrɔ boobo cendi ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ngɑ mo hɑlɑci. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ mo ǹ kulu seesee.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ beerem wɔ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑm ǹ mɑ kpei. De gɑnɑyom wɔ wɑlɑ gbei wɔ go hunu iburɑdɑm yom dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ beeni.
Ammɑ de zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ go hunu, wom si hini kɑ ɑ̀ beenɑndi. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli wom mɑ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ.
Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ tu. Ǹ nɑ diyɑ yom cɛɛ kɑ ǹ sɔtɛ. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ diyɑ yom no mei ǹ mɑ si sendi Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
Diyɑ yom bine nɑ ngei bɔm cendi kɑ gɑnɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom mɑrgɑ jine. Ǹ go fɑihã ndɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ǹ tɔ cɛnɑndiyom Yesu mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Hɑnu kulu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ndɑ fuu yom kulu kunɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ cooɑndiyom nɑm ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛyom kɑ cii Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.

Jiribi nge yom di no coobɑɑbɑize yom go bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu. Ammɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ go Gɑrɛku cinɛ sendi go gunu wɔ kɑ yom go Ebulu cinɛ sendi gɑɑ. Ǹ go gunu no zɑmɑ Ebulu cinɛ sendikɔ yom nɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ǹ sokoni yom gɑɑ fɑrisime fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ cini tɛ hɑnu kulu.
Iwei cindi hinkɑ di nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kulu cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: À mɑnɑ himɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sendɑ nɑm kɑ kpei ŋmɑɑri fɑrisi.
À sɛ no nyɑizei, wom mɑ gunɑ wom kunɑ bɔrɔ iye kɑ ǹ gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno kɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Wom mɑ ǹ suubɑ domi i mɑ du kɑ ǹ dɑm ŋmɑɑrɑ fɑrisiyom.
Ammɑ i mo sɑɑle dɑm ɑduwɑ tɛyom ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ ŋmɔne gbei gɑɑ.

Sendi ngɑ di kɑɑni jɑmɑ kulu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ Tifɑnu suubɑ. Tifɑnu wɔ tɔ ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Yɑ no ǹ nɑ Filipu ndɑ Poloko ndɑ Nikɑno ndɑ Timo ndɑ Pɑmenɑ ndɑ Nikolɑ, Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ kɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɔ gɑnɑ suubɑ.
Ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi diyɑ yom jine. Kɑ diyɑ yom nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ ngei kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm gbei di sɛ.
Ikpɛ Sendɑ mɑ go kɑru kɑ see nungu kulu ndɑ bɑyom. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu bututu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ boobo mo nɑ nɑɑne fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
Tifɑnu wɔ tɔ ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ dɑbɑri. À nɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑlɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ yom tɛ beerem gɑme.

Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom tunu kɑ ǹ cii ǹ sɛ Bɔrɔcini Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ kunɑ, Sileni bɔrɔ yom no ndɑ Alɛsɑndiɑ bɔrɔ yom. Cilici lɑɑbu Yuifu yom mo ndɑ Azi ŋmɔne yom goono ǹ gɑme. Ǹ kulu tunu kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Tifɑnu.
Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ zeeri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ no.
À gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom bɑnɑ ǹ mɑ sendi wɔne cii: I mɑɑ Tifɑnu wɔ nɑ Moisi ndɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ǹ cɛnɑndi.
Ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ di ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom zukum hɑli ǹ kɑm Tifɑnu bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ mɑrgɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom dɔ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ yom kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di si cɛ ndɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ wɔ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ sendi yɑmu kɑ ǹ cɛnɑndi.
I mɑɑ ɑ̀ cii Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu di kɑɑ Nungu wɔ zeeri. Alɑɑdɑ yom mo kɑ Moisi nɑ i no ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ bɑrime.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ mɑrgɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom dɔ, ǹ kulu go moo sinji Tifɑnu gɑɑ. Tifɑnu moodumɑ himɑ ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize moodumɑ.
Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ cii: Yɑ no hɛ yom bɑrɑ?
Tifɑnu tu kɑ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ ɑ sɛ. Ikpɛ deizɑkpɛ hunutɛrɛ i cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mesopotɑmi lɑɑbu hɑli ɑ̀ kpei gɔrɔ Hɑrɑm lɑɑbu.
Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "Hunu n lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ n dimi kunɑ. N mɑ kpei lɑɑbu fɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ n cɛbɛ kunɑ."
Abulɛmɑ bine hunu Kɑlɛdɑncei lɑɑbu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ Hɑrɑm lɑɑbu. Nungu di no ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ bu. À bɑndɑ Ikpɛ kpeindɑ Abulɛmɑ lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom gɑ gɔrɔ hɑli mɑɑsɑ.

Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ tubu, bɑ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ sɑrɑ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii ngɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no lɑɑbu ɑ̀ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ yom ŋmɔne mo. Sɑɑ ngɑ di Abulɛmɑ sindɑ koo jinɑ.
Yɑ no Ikpɛ sendi kɑ cii: À bɑndɑ yom kɑɑ yotɛrɛ tɛ lɑɑbu ŋmɑni fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ ǹ tɛ tɑm yom kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi jiiri zɑngu tɑɑci.
"Dimi kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɛ tɑm yom, hɛɛ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ, Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom kɑɑ hunu kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ nungu wɔ kunɑ."

Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ no ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑngudɑmyom ci sɛdɑ. Yɑ no kɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ Isɑɑkɑ hɛi ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑmbɑngu jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɛ hine. Isɑɑkɑ mo nɑ Yɑkɔfu hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑmbɑngu. Yɑkɔfu mɑ nɑ cɛɛ wei cindi hinkɑ hɛi kɑ ǹ dɑmbɑngu.
Cɛɛ yom di cɛnsɛ ndɑ Yosɛfu. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ Eziputu lɑɑbu. Ammɑ Ikpɛ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbi kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑɑkuri ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ Fɑrɑɔ jine kɑ ɑ̀ ci Eziputu gɑndɑkpɛ. Fɑrɑɔ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ fuu kulu gɑɑbikoni.
Ammɑ hɛrɛɛ fɔ tɛ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ Kɑnɑnɑ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑ tɛ kɑnkɑmi bɑmbɑtɑ. I cɛɛ yom mɑnɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Yɑkɔfu mɑɑ mɔsɔngu goono Eziputu lɑɑbu, ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɛ yom dɔntɔm sintine.
Ce hinkɑntɛ Yosɛfu nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ sɛ. Fɑrɑɔ mo du kɑ Yosɛfu fuuize yom bei.
Yosɛfu bine nɑ nyɑizei dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ Yɑkɔfu cɛɛ ndɑ ngɑ fuuize yom kulu. Ǹ tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ weiye cindi gu.
Yɑkɔfu mo kpei Eziputu lɑɑbu, nodi ɑ̀ bu. Yɑ no i cɛɛ yom mo.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ǹ bukɔ yom Sɑcimɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ fiji, nungu fɔ kɑ Abulɛmɑ dei ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu Hɑmoru koo yom dɔ Sɑcimɑ kunɑ.
Alikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ Abulɛmɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndiyom lɔkɑci mɑɑni. Sɑɑ ngɑ di jɑmɑ mo go tɔntɔnu Eziputu lɑɑbu kɑ hɛi kɑ cɛrɛ hɛi.
Kɑlɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ si Yosɛfu bei.
Gɑndɑkpɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ i dimi yom zɑmbɑ kɑ i cɛɛ yom guruguzɑndi. À nɑ ǹ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ ngei koo yom furu kɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ bu.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no, ǹ nɑ Moisi hɛi. Koo di boori Ikpɛ jine kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɑndi hɑndu hinzɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ fuu kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ furu, Fɑrɑɔ koo hundiyo nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ biiri zɑngɑ ngɑ bumbum koo.
Ǹ nɑ Moisi dendenɑndi Eziputu lɑɑbu beire kulu. À gundɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ sendi yom dɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ tɛyom dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Moisi gundɑ jiiri weitɑɑci ɑ̀ miilɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei kɑ ngɑ nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ ci Isirɑilɑ ize yom kunfɑ.
A di Isirɑilɑ ize fɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ lɑlɑce. À huro kɑ fɑɑsɑ ngɑ nyɑizɑ kɑ ǹ go lɑlɑce sɛ. À nɑ Eziputɑncɛ di kɑru kɑ wi.
À tɑmmɑ ngɑ nyɑize yom fɑhɑm kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ fɑɑbɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ no ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm.
Hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ, ɑ̀ gɑru Isirɑilɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom gɑ zogu. À wetere ngɑ mɑ ǹ sɑsɑbɑndi. À cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom bɑrɑ no nyɑize yom. Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ?
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ ngɑ kpɑɑsi di sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ Moisi fum. À cii: Mee yɑ nɑ n dɑm hinikpɛ ndɑ ciitikɔ i sɛ?
N gɑ bɑɑ n mɑ ɑ wi zɑngɑ n nɑ Eziputu bɔrɔ di wi bii nɑ?
Moisi bine zuuru sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ. À kpei yotɛrɛ ko gɔrɔ Midiɑ lɑɑbu, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ hɛi.
Sɑɑ kɑ jiiri weitɑɑci bisɑ, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ hunu ɑ̀ sɛ Sinɑi tɑndi kuku dɔ gɑnji kunɑ. À hunu ɑ̀ sɛ kubu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii bɛllɛ kunɑ.
Kɑ Moisi di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ mɑmɑci ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di. À go mɑɑni kɑ gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Kpe jinde kɑ ɑ̀ go cii:
"Hɛɛ yɑ ci n cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ." Cɔfɔ Moisi gɑ gɑsi. À mɑnɑ tu kɑ gunɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "N mɑ n tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ n cee yom gɑɑ zɑmɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm n gɑ cɛ wɔ gɑndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
Cimi no ɑ di kɑnkɑmi kɑ ɑ jɑmɑ du Eziputu lɑɑbu. A mɑɑ ǹ dureyom mɑ. A kɑɑ zumbu yɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ sɛ. Mɑɑsɑ n mɑ kpei. A gɑ n dɔntɔm Eziputu lɑɑbu."
Ammɑ jɑmɑ hungu Moisi sɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mee yɑ nɑ n dɑm hinikpɛ ndɑ ciitikɔ? Ngɑ nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm zɑngɑ kpe ndɑ fɑɑbɑkɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kɑmbɛ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kubɑ kunɑ.
Moisi yɑ nɑ ǹ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu. À nɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom tɛ Eziputu lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ Tɛku Ciire kunɑ ndɑ gɑnji kunɑ hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci.
Ngɑ yɑ ci Moisi di kɑ ɑ̀ cii Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ: "Kpe, wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kɑɑ ɑndebi fɔ tunɑndi zɑngɑ hɛɛ wom sɛ wom nyɑizei kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ."

Ngɑ yɑ ci Moisi di kɑ ɑ̀ goono Isirɑilɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ gɑnji kunɑ i cɛɛ yom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize sendi ɑ̀ sɛ zɑ tondi kuku bɔm kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sinɑi. Ikpɛ meecine hundikoni yom no ɑ̀ du kɑ no i sɛ.
Ammɑ i cɛɛ yom si bɑɑ ngei mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Moisi sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ go hunguɑ̀. Ǹ go kɑ ngei bine yeti Eziputu lɑɑbu hɛrɛ.
Ǹ cii Aɑrɔ sɛ: "N mɑ tooru yom tɛ i sɛ kɑ ǹ mo dirɑ i jine. N mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Moisi wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu, i mɑnɑ bei hɛ kɑ du ɑ̀."
Jiribi nge yom di no ǹ nɑ tooru fɔ tɛ zɑngɑ hɑuize kɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ fɑihã ndɑ ngei kɑmbɛ gbei.

Ammɑ Ikpɛ bɛrɛ kɑ ǹ nɑm ǹ mɑ bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom bɛɛrɑndi zɑngɑ ɑndebi yom nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ngei tirɑ kunɑ. Ǹ cii: "E Isirɑilɑ dimi, wom mɑnɑ gɑrɑndi yom tɛ ɑ sɛ bɑ ndɑ memunu yom ndɑ sɑɑrɑ yom hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci gɑnji kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?

Wom nɑ tooru fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Molokɑ kuuru bukɑ zɑɑ ndɑ tooru fɔ zɑngɑ hɑndɑriyɑize kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑmifɑ. Wom nɑ ǹ himɑndiyom tɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ sɔmbu ǹ sɛ. Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ kɑɑ wom zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑ wom hɑli Bɑbiloni lɑɑbu sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ."
Gɑnji di kunɑ no i cɛɛ yom gundɑ kuuru bukɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ mei no Moisi sɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ bukɑ di tɛ deedɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ di bɔm.
I cɛɛ yom mo kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ du ɑ̀. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bukɑ di Yɑsuɑ bɑndɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dimi cindei lɑɑbu ŋmɑɑ, nge yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ i cɛɛ yom jine. Bukɑ di goono mo kɑlɑ Dɑfidi wɑtɛ.
Dɑfidi du gomini Ikpɛ jine. À nɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ gɔrɛ dɔ cini Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɛ.
Ammɑ Sɑlomɔ yɑ nɑ fuu cini ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ fuu kɑ iburɑdɑm cini ndɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ. Zɑngɑ ɑndebi cii:
"Bɛɛnɛ yɑ ci ɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ. Gɑndɑ mo ci ɑ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ. Kpe cii, fuu fɔ dimi no wom kɑɑ cini ɑ sɛ? Mɑni yɑ ci nungu kɑ yɑ hulonzom?
A kɑmbɛ yɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ kulu tɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?"
Wom gɔgɔsɛndɔ yom, wom bine yom ndɑ wom hɑngɑ yom mɑnɑ du bɑngudɑmyom. Wom go gɑɑbɑ sɑɑ kulu ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Hɛ kɑ wom cɛɛ yom tɛ, ngɑ no wom mo, wom go tɛ.
Wom cɛɛ yom nɑ ɑndebi yom guruguzɑndi. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Andebi yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ Cɛsusukpɛ kɑɑyom bɑɑru, wom nɑ ǹ wi. Wom ci ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛkpɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ wikɔ yom.
Wom nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ tɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom kɑmbɛ gɑɑ ɑmmɑ wom mɑnɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, ǹ bine futu sendi di sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ go hinje kɑɑmɑ bine fute sɑbu sɛ kɑ kuriyo Tifɑnu gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Tifɑnu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ moo sinji bɛɛnɛ gɑɑ. À di Ikpɛ deizɑ. À di Yesu mo go cɛ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ go di bɛɛnɛ go feerɑntɛ. Adɑmize gɑ cɛ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Jɑmɑ tunu kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ ngei hɑngɑ yom dɑɑbu. Ǹ didibi ɑ̀ gɑɑ mefɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kukusu.
Ǹ nɑ Tifɑnu wɑfɑ kɑ cendi kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cetu cetu ndɑ tɑndi kɑ wi. Sɛdɑ yom nɑ ngei jiine yom jisi sɑwɛrɛ fɔ jine kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Sɑuli.
Kɑ ǹ go Tifɑnu cetu kɑ wi, ɑ̀ go Yesu mɑɑ cɛɛ kɑ cii: E Kpe Yesu, ɑ hundi wɔ tɑ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sɔmbu kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À cii: Kpe, n mɑ si dulum wɔ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm. Sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑni.

Tifɑnu wiyomɑ sɑbɑ Sɑuli sɛ. Hɑnu ngɑ di ǹ nɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ kulu kɑru kɑ see Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu mee ndɑ mee kunɑ. Diyɑ yom di hinne yɑ cindi.
Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom nɑ Tifɑnu fiji kɑ bɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ Sɑuli nɑ hɑsɑrɔ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ. À huro fuu fuu kɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom dii kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu.
Ngɑ di sɛ no beerem kɑru kɑ see. Ǹ go dirɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sendɑ wɑɑzu tɛ.
Filipu mo zumbu Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ.
Jɑmɑ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm Filipu sendi yom gɑɑ ndɑ bine fɔ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ko di ɑlɑmu boobo kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Ǹ di hɔllɛ yom hunu beerem bɑndɑ ndɑ kɑɑtiyom. Mɔngɔlɔ boobo ndɑ leebɑntɛ boobo mo du bɑɑni.
À gɑɑ no binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ bine goono wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Simɔ. À cini mondɑbɑru tɛ ko Sɑmɑri jɑmɑ jirisi. Simɔ nɑ ngɑ bɔm jisi zɑngɑ bɔrɔ beeri fɔ.
Bɔrɔ kulu zɑ icɛnɑ hɑli ibeeri go sɑɑle dɑm ɑ̀ sendi gɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri nɑ ibɑmbɑtɑ.
Ǹ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm ɑ̀ sendɑ gɑɑ zɑmɑ zɑ jɛyom no ǹ go mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ mondɑbɑru tɛyom.
Ammɑ ǹ nɑɑne Bɑɑru Hinno gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ Filipu go wɑɑzu Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu mirɑndi, hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom.
Simɔ bumbum nɑɑne. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ Filipu bɑndɑ ndɑ bine fɔ. À gɑ di ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ. À mɑmɑci.
Diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru Sɑmɑri bɔrɔ yom nɑ Ikpɛ sendɑ tɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔntɔm ǹ gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Sɑmɑri bɔrɔ yom dɔ ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ nɑ zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑnɑ zumbu ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ bɔm jinɑ. Mirɑndiyom hinne no ǹ du Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ di no Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm, cɔfɔ ǹ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Simɔ di Ikpɛ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no diyɑ yom kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛyom gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ nooru boobo sɛllɛ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ.
À cii: Wom mɑ ɑ no hini wɔ domi bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Piɛɛ bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni ndɑ n nooru kulu mɑ hɑlɑci, domi n tɑmmɑ n hini kɑ Ikpɛ noyom dei no ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ boobo.
N sindɑ bɑ, n sindɑ hɛ kulu ɑsiiri wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ n bine mɑnɑ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine.
Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ n hɑnyɑ fute sɛ. N mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n bine lɑsɑbu yom de ɑ̀ go bɑɑ.
A gɑ di n gundɑ hɑnyɑ fute hɔɔtɔ zɑngɑ tee. N goono mo zɑm kɑ cɛsusu kuse kunɑ.
Simɔ tu kɑ cii: Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ sɛ Kpe dɔ hɛ kɑ wom cii wɔ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si tɔ hɛɛ.
Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go ye Yerusɑlɛm, ǹ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom sɛ.
Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ sendi Filipu sɛ. À cii: N mɑ tunu kɑ kpei weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ fɔndɑ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm kɑ kɑɑ Gɑzɑ lɑɑbu. Gɑnji fɔndɔ nɑ.

Filipu tunu kɑ kpei. Gunɑ, ɑ̀ di bɔrɔ fɔ fɔndɑ bɔm. Etopi lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no, mɑntɑm fɔ nɑ. Gɑɑbikoni mɑ nɑ Kɑndɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Etopi weibɔrɔ gɑndɑkpɛ cire. Ngɑ yɑ go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Etopi gɑndɑkpɛ ŋmɔne hɑibɑrikɑ kulu. À kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ye ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ngɑ tɔrɔkɔ kunɑ ko tirɑ kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum coo.
Cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sendi Filipu sɛ kɑ cii: Kpei, mɑɑni tɔrɔkɔ di gɑɑ.
Filipu zuuru kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Etopi bɔrɔ di go tirɑ kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum coo. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N gɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ n gɑ coo bɑ?
Bɔrɔ di tu kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ kɑ fɑhɑm de bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ ɑ cɛbɛ? À bine nɑ Filipu cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hurɑ ko gɔrɔ ngɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ tirɑ di kunɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ go coo neyɑ: "Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ wiyom dɔ zɑngɑ feeji. Zɑngɑ feejiize kɑ ɑ̀ go dɛnjɛ ɑ̀ cobukɔ jine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ mee feeri.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du ciiti, cimi ŋmɔne. Mee yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ yom bɑɑru deede zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hundi kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ?"
Bɔrɔ mɑntɑm di cii Filipu sɛ: A gɑ n hã, mee bɔm nɑ ɑndebi go sendi yɑ wɔ dimi? À go sendi ngɑ bɔm nɑ dee, wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni bɔm no?
À gɑɑ nɑ Filipu nɑ mee feeri kɑ sinti ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ sendi ngɑ di. À nɑ Yesu bɑɑru wɑɑzu tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei fɔndɔ bɔm, cɔfɔ ǹ fɑku hɑri fɔ gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ mɑntɑm di cii: Gunɑ, hɑri go. Ifɔ yɑ gɑnji ǹ mɑ ɑ mirɑndi? [
Filipu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n go nɑɑne ndɑ n bine kulu, ɑ̀ tɛ. Bɔrɔ mɑntɑm di tu kɑ cii: A go nɑɑne kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Ize."
Filipu nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ tɔrɔkɔ di cɛɑndi. Ngɑ ndɑɑ̀ zumbu hɑri di kunɑ. Filipu nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu hɑri di kunɑ, Ikpɛ Biyɑ nɑ Filipu zɑɑ. Mɑntɑm di mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ diro tɛ ndɑ fɑihã.
Cɔfɔ Filipu go Azotu wɑngɑrɑ. Zɑ wɑngɑrɑ di ɑ̀ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ kpɑɑrɑ kulu sɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
Ammɑ Sɑuli mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ sendi futu yom kɑ cii ǹ mɑ Kpe coobɑɑbɑize yom wi. À kpei gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dɔ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ no tirɑ yom Dɑmɑku Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom sɛ. À ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm de ɑ̀ du Yesu fɔndɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom, hɑibɔrɔ yom wɑlɑ weibɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɔ kɑ kpeindei Yerusɑlɛm.
À tɛ mo ɑ̀ goono fɔndɔ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ. Mefɔ mefɔ kɑɑri hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ tɛ mɑɑle ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ.
Sɑuli kɑm gɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ jinde fɔ go sendi ngɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Sɑuli, Sɑuli ifɔ sɛ no n go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi?
À tu kɑ cii: Ni no mee, Kpe? Kpe mo cii: Hɛɛ no Yesu di kɑ n go guruguzɑndi. À gɑɑbu n sɛ n mɑ gooru yom hɛ zi.
Sɑuli gɑ gɑsi ndɑ mɑmɑci. À cii: Kpe, ifɔ no n go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ? Kpe mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu kɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ. Nodi no ǹ cii n sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ n mɑ tɛ.
Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dum, mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii mee gɑɑ. Ǹ go mɑɑ jindɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu.
Ǹ nɑ Sɑuli tunɑndi hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ cɛ. À moo yom feeri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑlɑ Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ.
À tɛ jiribi hinzɑ ɑ̀ si di, ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɑm.
Coobɑɑbɑize fɔ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Anɑni. Kpe sendi ɑ̀ sɛ diyom kunɑ kɑ cii: Anɑni. Anɑni tu kɑ cii: Kpe, hɛɛ neyɑ.
Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu kɑ kpei fɔndɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Cɛɑntɛ dɔ. N mɑ Tɑlisu bɔrɔ di ceeci kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sɑuli. À goono Yudɑ fuu kunɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
Diyom kunɑ Sɑuli di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Anɑni go huro kɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ngɑ bɔm ngɑ mɑ du kɑ di.
Anɑni tu kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ mɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɔ hɛ lɑlɔ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ di tɛ n hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm sɛ.
Bɑ nee mo bine ɑ̀ gundɑ hini gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ kɑ beerem kulu hɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ n mɑɑ cɛɛ.
Ammɑ Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, domi bɔrɔ di gbei jiine suubɑntɛ no kɑ ɑ suubɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpeindɑ ɑ mɑɑ dimi cindei jine ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ndɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom jine.
A gɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ tɑɑbi bɑɑbɑ kɑ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.

Anɑni hunu kɑ kpei. À hurɑ fuu di kunɑ kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Sɑuli bɔm. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A nyɑize Sɑuli, Kpe Yesu di kɑ ɑ̀ fɑitɑ n sɛ fɔndɑ bɔm kɑ n gɑnɑ kɑ kɑɑ, yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm n mɑ du kɑ di. N mɑ tɔ mo ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ kpɑitɑ hunu Sɑuli moo yom kunɑ kɑ kɑm gɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ du kɑ di kpɛɛnɛ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi mo.
À ŋmɑɑ mo, ɑ̀ gɑɑbi ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ jiribi fɔ yom coobɑɑbɑize yom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ. À go cii Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no.

Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendi yom mɑmɑci. Ǹ gɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ gɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ di beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu mɑɑ cɛɛ hɑlɑci. À kɑɑ nee mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɔ kɑ kpeindei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ Sɑuli go gɑɑbi dɑm kɑ tɔntɔnu. À go tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ Yesu wɔ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ. À gɑ sendi kɑlɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ sindɑ ngei bɔm.
Kɑ jiribi boobo bisɑ, Yuifu yom nɑ meetosi tɛ ngei gɑme ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ammɑ ǹ meetosɑ bɑɑru tɔ Sɑuli dɔ. Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ǹ gɑ wɑngɑrɑ di hundi mee yom bɑtu ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi sɛ.
Ammɑ hɑnu fɔ ciini coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ Sɑuli zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi yɛmbɛ bɑndɑ cilɑ beeri fɔ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Sɑuli tɔ Yerusɑlɛm ɑ̀ ceeci ngɑ mɑ huro coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kulu go hɑmburɑ̀. Ǹ si nɑɑne hɑli ngɑ mɑ coobɑɑbɑize nɑ.

Ammɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ boi ko kpeindɑɑ̀ diyɑ yom dɔ. Bɑɑnɑbɑ deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Sɑuli di Kpe fɔndɑ bɔm. À deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Kpe sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Sɑuli wɑɑzu Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ Dɑmɑku bɔrɔ yom sɛ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
Sɑuli gɔrɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom bɑndɑ ko kpei ko ye Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. À go sendi Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
À sendi kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ cini Gɑrɛku cinɛ sendi. Ammɑ ngei wɔ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Sɑɑ kɑ nyɑizei mo bei yɑ di, ǹ nɑ Sɑuli dum kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm Tɑlisu kpɑɑrɑ.
Cɔfɔ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu, ǹ kulu du lɑɑkɑli kɑne. Ǹ go nɑɑne cini ko dirɑ Kpe hɑmbure kunɑ. Ǹ go tɔntɔnu mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom gɑɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Piɛɛ go kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom yɑɑli. À kpei hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mo dɔ kɑ ǹ goono Lidɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Kpɑɑrɑ di kunɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑru kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Ene. Jiiri ɑhɑku ɑ̀ go kɑni ngɑ dɑɑri bɔm domi ɑ̀ cee ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu.
Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ene, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ go kɑ n no bɑɑni. Tunu kɑ n kɑni dɔ hinsɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ cɛ.
Lidɑ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Sɑrɔ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ yom kulu di ɑ̀. Ǹ bɛrɛ mo kɑ Kpe gɑnɑ.
Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ nɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑbitɑ. À mɑɑ di feeriji yɑ ci Dokɑsɑ. À cini gbei hinno ndɑ sɑrɑɑ bɑɑbɑ tɛ.
Sɑɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni kɑ bu. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nyume kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jisi jidɑmbisɑ fɔ kunɑ.
Zɑ kɑ Lidɑ kpɑɑrɑ mɑɑni Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom du Piɛɛ bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ goono Lidɑ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ ngei dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Piɛɛ tunu kɑ beerem di gɑnɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ, ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ jidɑmbisɑ kunɑ. Sokoni yom kulu go hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi. Ǹ go Piɛɛ cɛbɛ kpɛ yom ndɑ jiine yom kɑ Dokɑsɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ bɑndɑ.
Piɛɛ bine nɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɔmbu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ bukɔɑ dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ cii: Tɑbitɑ, tunu. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ moo yom feeri. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Piɛɛ, ɑ̀ tunu kɑ gɔrɔ.
Piɛɛ nɑ kɑmbɛ no ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ tunɑndi. À nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ sokoni yom cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ bɑhunɑ.
Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom kulu mɑɑ bɑɑru di. Bɔrɔ boobo mo nɑɑne Kpe gɑɑ.
Piɛɛ nɑ jiribi boobo tɛ Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ kuuru wikɔ fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Simɔ.
Bɔrɔ goono Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Koniliyu. Ngɑ yɑ ci wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ wɑnguize yom sɛtɛ fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Itɑli ŋmɔne.
Bɔrɔ di bine Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ hinno no kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmburu Ikpɛ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu. À go sɑrɑɑ bɑɑbɑ tɛ jɑmɑ gɑɑ. À gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ mɑ Ikpɛ gɑɑ hɑnu kulu.
À goono zɑɑri guuru hinzɑ zɑkɑ, cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ ɑ̀ sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. À hurɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Koniliyu.
Koniliyu gunɑ. Hɑmburu nɑ ɑ̀ dii mɑ. À cii: A jinɑ, ifɔ no? Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom ndɑ n sɑrɑɑ yom tɔ bɛɛnɛ hɑli Ikpɛ hɔngɔ ǹ gɑɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ bine n mɑ beerem dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Simɔ cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Piɛɛ.
À goono Simɔ kuuru wikɔ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fuu goono tɛku mee gɑɑ. À kɑɑ cii n sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ n mɑ tɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sendi ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ dirɑ, Koniliyu nɑ ngɑ gbeiize hinkɑ cɛɛ ndɑ wɑnguize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Sojɑ mo Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ nɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ kulu deede ǹ sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
À mɑ bɑ, ǹ goono fɔndɔ bɔm kɑ mɑɑni kpɑɑrɑ gɑɑ. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di zɑngɑ zɑɑri bindi cine, Piɛɛ tunu kɑ kɑɑru fuuɑ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
À mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ beerem gɑ ŋmɑɑri tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, Ikpɛ nɑ Piɛɛ lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ.
À di bɛɛnɛ go feerɑntɛ. À di hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ go zumbu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci dii ko kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi gɑndɑ.
Cee tɑɑcikpɛ dimi kulu ndɑ gɑnjihɑm yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ fɑtɑkpɛ yom goono ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Jinde fɔ mo sendi Piɛɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Piɛɛ, tunu kɑ wi kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii: À mɑnɑ ci yɑ no, Kpe. Yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ziibi bɑ ce fɔ.
Jindɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ce hinkɑntɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hinnɑndi n mɑ si cii ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli.
Ngɑ di tɛ hɑli ce hinzɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ di kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ tɑɑfɛ cendi kɑ ye ndɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ.
Piɛɛ go biti ko lɑsɑbu ngɑ bine kunɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ngɑ diyom kɑ ɑ̀ di feeriji. Ammɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di, beerem kɑ Koniliyu dɔntɔm kɑɑ. Ǹ jinɑ kɑ Simɔ hundi hã. Ǹ go cɛ hundɑ mee gɑɑ.
Ǹ nɑ beerem cɛɛ kɑ ǹ hã hɑli Simɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ goono fuu.
Bine zɑ Piɛɛ go lɑsɑbu ndɑ diyomɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, bɔrɔ hinzɑ go kɑ n hã.
N mɑ zumbu gɑndɑ kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ. N mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu siikɑ domi hɛɛ yɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm.
Piɛɛ mɑ zumbu gɑndɑ kɑ kpei beerem kɑ Koniliyu dɔntɔm dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, hɛɛ neyɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ wom gɑ hã di. Ifɔ yɑ ci wom kɑɑyom wɔ sɑbɑbu?

Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Koniliyu, wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ, bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu nɑ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. À gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno mɑ Yuifu dimi kulu dɔ. Ikpɛ yɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ngɑ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔ gɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ mɑ n cɛɛ n mɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru n dɔ.
Piɛɛ nɑ ǹ hurɑndi kɑ ǹ nɑ zumbuyom dɔ. À mɑ bɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ kɑ kpei. Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ nyɑize fɔ yom mɑ nɑ ǹ dum.
À mɑ yɑrɑ kɑ bɑ, ǹ hurɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Koniliyu mɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ bɑtu. À nɑ ngɑ fuuize yom ndɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom meigu.
Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ tɔ kɑ hurɑ, Koniliyu nɑ ɑ̀ kube. À jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tunu kɑ cɛ n cee gɑɑ domi hɛɛ mɑ bɔrɔ nɑ zɑngɑ ni.
Kɑ Piɛɛ go sendi ndɑ Koniliyu, ǹ huro hundi kunɑ. Piɛɛ di beerem meigu bututu.
A cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum bei ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli Yuifu mɑ kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ dimi ŋmɑni wɑlɑ kɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ yɑ si cii bɔrɔ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi ziibɑntɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ mo no ɑ kɑɑ. Yɑ nɑ hungu sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ cɛɛ. A gɑ wom hã mo, sɑbɑbu fɔ sɛ nɑ wom nɑ ɑ cɛɛ?
Koniliyu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Jiribi tɑɑci kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ zɑngɑ mɑɑsɑncine wiciri guuru hinzɑ zɑkɑ, ɑ nɑ meehɔ zɑɑ kɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ fuu kunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ cɛ ɑ jine ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi.
À cii: Koniliyu, Ikpɛ mɑɑ n ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ. À hɔngɔ n sɑrɑɑ tɛyom mɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ n mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Simɔ cɛɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ. À goono Simɔ kuuru wikɔ kpɑɑrɑ tɛku mee gɑɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ n dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ sendi n sɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ n cɛɛ. Ni mɑ, ɑ̀ boori kɑ n kɑɑ wɔ. Mɑɑsɑ bine i bɔrɔ kulu neyɑ Ikpɛ jine zɑmɑ i mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ. I mɑ mɑɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Kpe nɑ n nɑ mei.
Piɛɛ bine nɑ ngɑ mee feeri kɑ cii: Cimi nɑ, ɑ di Ikpɛ wɔ si bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ.
Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ kɑ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ɑkpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Wom gɑ Sendɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ. Ǹ gɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ di wɑɑzu tɛ kɑ cii lɑɑkɑli kɑne hunu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ǹ kulu Kpe.
Wom bumbum bei hɛ kɑ tɛ Yude lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu fɛɛyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ mirɑndiyom bɔm bɑndɑ.
Wom bei mɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri zumɑndi Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔm. À yɑɑli mɑ kɑ gbei hinno tɛ. À no beerem kulu mo kɑ Ibilisi gundɑ dɑbɑri ǹ bɔm no bɑɑni, domi Ikpɛ goono Yesu bɑndɑ.
I yom yɑ ci sɛdɑ yom ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ Yuifu yom lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ Yesu kɑnji bundu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi jiribi hinzɑntɛ hine. À tu mo ɑ̀ mɑ hunutɛrɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci jɑmɑ kulu sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ bo ɑmmɑ sɛdɑ yom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ suubɑ. I yom mɑ kɑ i ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ tunuyom bukɔei gɑme bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ i sɛ.
Yesu nɑ i no mei i mɑ bɑɑru di fɛɛ jɑmɑ sɛ. I mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ mo kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Bɔrɔ kɑ Ikpɛ jisi ɑ̀ mɑ ci hundikoni yom ndɑ bukɔ yom ciitikɔ.
Andebi yom kulu go tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑɑ dɔ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ du dulum yɑɑfɑyom.
Kɑ Piɛɛ goono sendɑ gɑɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ sendɑ bɔm.
Beerem kɑ ǹ du bɑngudɑmyom, wɑtom Yuifu yom, wɔ kɑ yom go nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ goono Piɛɛ bɑndɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci domi ǹ di Ikpɛ nɑ dimi cindei no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zɑngɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi ǹ bɔm mɑ.
Ǹ go ngɑ di bei zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑ ǹ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni ko kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
À gɑɑ nɑ Piɛɛ tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ hini kɑ gɑnji ǹ mɑ beerem wɔ mirɑndi bɑ zɑ kɑ ǹ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zɑngɑ i yom?
Piɛɛ bine nɑ ǹ nɑ mei kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ǹ mirɑndi Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ Piɛɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ngei dɔ jiribi yom.
Diyɑ yom ndɑ nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑɑ bɑɑru dimi cindei mɑ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ kpei Yerusɑlɛm nge yom kɑ ǹ go dɑmbɑngu fɔndɔ gɑnɑ, ǹ nɑ kɑkɔ tɛ ndɑ Piɛɛ.
Ǹ cii: N huro kɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci dɑmbɑnguize yom.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ sendi feeri ǹ sɛ zɑ ɑ̀ sintiyom.
À cii: Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ no ɑ goono ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ di diyom fɔ. A di hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci dii. À go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ko kɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
Bine, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ, ɑ nɑ lɑɑkɑli dɑm mo. Cɔfɔ ɑ di gɑndɑ cee tɑɑcikpɛ yom ndɑ gɑnjihɑm yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ fɑtɑkpɛ yom.
Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ gɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Piɛɛ, tunu. N mɑ wi kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ cii: À nɑ ci yɑ no Kpe, zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli wɑlɑ hɛ ziibɔ mɑnɑ huro ɑ mee bɑ ce fɔ.
Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ tu ɑ sɛ. À hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ce hinkɑntɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hinnɑndi, n mɑ si cii ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli.
Jinde ngɑ di tɛ hɑli ce hinzɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ tɑɑfɛ di cendi kɑ ye ndɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm zɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑɑ cɛ hundi mee gɑɑ, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ goono.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑ cii ɑ sɛ yɑ ǹ gɑnɑ kɑ kpei. A mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu siikɑ mɑ. Nyɑize idu di kpei ɑ bɑndɑ. I huro mo Koniliyu fuu kunɑ.
À deede i sɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ go cɛ ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ cii: N mɑ beerem dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ mɑ Simɔ cɛɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ.
Ngɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ sendi yom cii kɑ ǹ gɑɑ n du fɑɑbɑ, ni ndɑ n fuu kulu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ sinti kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ, cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu ǹ bɔm zɑngɑ ɑ̀ zumbu i bɔm sintine gɑɑ.
A bine hɔngɔ Kpe Sendɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii: Cimi no Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ammɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no ǹ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi.
Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ noyom nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑɑne Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ zɑngɑ i yom, mee yɑ ci hɛɛ hɑli yɑ hungu Ikpɛ sɛ?
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di ǹ dɛnjɛ. Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ cii: Cimi nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ dimi cindei mo no tuubiyom ǹ mɑ du hundi.
Guruguze kɑ ɑ̀ tunu Tifɑnu sɑbu sɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom seesee. Afɔ yom kpei hɑli Finiciɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi ndɑ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ gɑ wɑɑzu Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɔm Yuifu yom hinne sɛ.
Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ ci Kuburu ndɑ Sileni bɔrɔ yom. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ ǹ sendi Gɑrɛku yom sɛ kɑ Kpe Yesu bɑɑru fɛɛ ǹ sɛ.
Kpe kɑmbɛ dɑbɑri mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ. À sɛ no bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne kɑ bɛrɛ Kpe dɔ.
Bɑɑru ngɑ di kpei hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ngei mo nɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei hɑli Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ tɔ Antiɔku, ɑ̀ di gomini kɑ Ikpɛ no gɑnɑkɔ yom sɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ fɑihã. À nɑ ǹ kulu no himmɑ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ yom Kpe sɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
Bɑɑnɑbɑ wɔ bɔrɔ hinno no. À tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ nɑɑne. Bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ mɑ tɔntɔnu Kpe gɑɑ.
Bɑɑnɑbɑ bine hunu kɑ kpei Tɑlisu wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Sɑuli ceeci.

Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, Bɑɑnɑbɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ Antiɔku. À kɑɑ tɔ ǹ go meigu cɛrɛ bɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ kɑlɑ jiiri fɔ sukutum. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ boobo cooɑndi. Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ nɑ ǹ sinti kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ mɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ yom.
Jiribi nge yom di kunɑ ɑndebi yom mo hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kɑɑ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ.
Ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Agɑbo tunu kɑ cɛ. À nɑ bɑɑru nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑ hɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ kɑɑ tɛ lɑɑbu yom kulu kunɑ. Hɛrɛɛ di bine jinɑ kɑ tɛ Kolodu Kɑisɑ zɑmɑni kunɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo ɑfɔ kulu tu ngɑ hinɑ bɔm ǹ mɑ gɑɑkɑsine sɑmbɑ nyɑize yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ Yude lɑɑbu.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ. Ǹ nɑ gɑɑkɑsine di sɑmbɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom sɛ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli kɑmbɛ gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ ngɑ di nɑ Hirodu kɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑndɑkpɛ sinti ko Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom guruguzɑndi.
À nɑ Yɑkɔfu, Yohɑnnɑ bɛɛrɛ wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yɑkɔfu wiyom kɑɑni Yuifu yom sɛ cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ mo dii. Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hine no, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ dii ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm wɑnguize yom sɛtɛ tɑɑci kɑmbɛ kunɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu. Hirodu miilɑ ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ Piɛɛ jɑmɑ jine ciitiyom sɛ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru bɑndɑ.
Ǹ bine nɑ Piɛɛ jɛ kɑsu di kunɑ. Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ ndɑ himmɑ.
Hɑnu kɑ Hirodu bɑ kpeindɑ Piɛɛ tɛrɛ ciitiyom sɛ, ciini di kunɑ Piɛɛ go kɑni wɑnguize hinkɑ gɑme. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ seseri hinkɑ. Bɑtukɔ yom mo go cɛ kɑsu fuuɑ mee gɑɑ.

Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ mɑ kɑɑ cɛ Piɛɛ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Kɑɑri bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mɑ tɛ kɑ fuuɑ hɑɑgɑndi. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ Piɛɛ kɑru cɔrɔ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. À cii: Tunu kɑ cɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi. Cɔfɔ seseri yom di kulu feeri kɑ hunu ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N kunɑcendi hɔ kɑ n tɑɑmu yom dɑm. Piɛɛ tɛ yɑ di. À ye kɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: N kpɛ dɑm kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
Piɛɛ hunu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À mɑnɑ bei kɑ cimi no hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di go tɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ hɑli ngɑ gɑ hɑndiri no.

Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ bisɑ bɑtukɔ sintine ndɑ ihinkɑntɛ gɑɑ ǹ tɔ guuru gɑmbu fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wɑngɑrɑ hɛrɛ gunɑ. Gɑmbuɑ feeri ngɑ bɔm sɛ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ Piɛɛ dum hɑli jinɑ fɔndɔ fɔ bɔm. Cɔfɔ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ tɑm.
Piɛɛ lɑɑkɑli ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À cii: Mɑɑsɑ ɑ bei cimi nɑ Kpe yɑ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize sɑmbɑ. À nɑ ɑ kɑɑ Hirodu kɑmbɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yuifu yom go bɑtu ngei mɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
Kɑ Piɛɛ go fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tɔ Mɑriɑmɑ fuu. Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑɑku, ɑ̀ nyɑ no. Nungu di no bɔrɔ boobo meigu ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ nɑ hundi mee kɑru, gbeiize hundiyo fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Lɔdɑ kɑɑ kɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ bei Piɛɛ jinde no, binekɑɑne sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ meeɑ feeri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ kpei beerem no bɑɑru. À cii: Piɛɛ go cɛ hundi mee.
Ammɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N hɔllɔ no. Ammɑ hundiyɑ wɔ cii: Cimi no Piɛɛ no. Ǹ cii: Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize no.
Ammɑ Piɛɛ mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ hundi mee di kɑruyom. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hundi meeɑ feeri ǹ di ɑ̀. Cɔfɔ mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii.
Piɛɛ mo nɑ kɑmbɛ sombu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ dɛnjɛ. À du kɑ deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ dimi Kpe nɑ ngɑ kɑɑ kɑsuɑ kunɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ nyɑize kulu no bɑɑru. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ hunu kɑ kpei nungu fɔ.
À mo bo, kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tunu wɑnguize yom gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Piɛɛ zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ Piɛɛ dɔ.
Hirodu nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀. Bine ɑ̀ nɑ bɑtukɔ yom di hã. À nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ bɑtukɔ yom wi. Hirodu mo tunu Yude lɑɑbu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ.

Hirodu bine tɔ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Tiru kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ ndɑ Sidom kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ. Ammɑ ngei wɔ nɑ mefɔ tɛ kɑ kɑɑ Hirodu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ Bɑlɑtusu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Hirodu yerimɑ. Ǹ go ceeci bɑɑni mɑ tɛ ngei ndɑ Hirodu gɑme zɑmɑ Hirodu lɑɑbu no ǹ lɑɑbu go du ŋmɑɑri.
Hɑnu kɑ ǹ jisi, Hirodu nɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ kpɛ dɑm. À gɑ gɔrɔ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm kɑ sendi jɑmɑ sɛ.
Beerem hiyɑ kɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ cii: À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ yɑ go sendi, ikpɛ fɔ yɑ gɑ sendi.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑru zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Nɑni yom nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ bu.
Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑru kɑ see kɑ tɔntɔnu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli nɑ ngei gbei tɔnɑndi, ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑɑku ngei bɑndɑ.
Andebi yom ndɑ cɛbɛkɔ yom goono Antiɔku Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. Ngei neyɑ, Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Simeyɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Biku ndɑ Lusiɑ, Sileni bɔrɔ ndɑ Mɑnɑhim kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ biiri mefɔ ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ Hirodu ndɑ Sɑuli.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ Kpe sɛ ko meehɔ, cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli kɑɑ ɑ sɛ ŋmɑni, gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ.
Ǹ bine nɑ ngei meehɔ tɛ kɑ beeni kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngei kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli bɔm kɑ ǹ fee ŋmɑni Ikpɛ gbei sɛ. À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
Beerem wɔ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔntɔm, ǹ kpei Selusiɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Zɑ Selusiɑ ǹ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔm.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Sɑlɑmi wɑngɑrɑ, ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ fɛɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Yohɑnnɑ mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ ko kɑ ǹ gɑɑ.
Ǹ nɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ tɑɑru kɑ bisɑ kɑlɑ Pɑfusɑ kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ mondɑbɑrukpɛ fɔ gɑru. Ngɑ wɔ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri no kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yuifu. À mɑɑ no Bɑsuwɑ.
À goono gɑɑbikoni fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sejisu Pɔlu, bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ fɑhɑm. À nɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu cɛɛ ngɑ mɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendi.
Elimɑ mɑɑ di feeriji yɑ ci mondɑbɑrukpɛ. À gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndei. À gɑ ceeci ngɑ mɑ gɑɑbikoni di bɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ nɑɑne fɔndɔ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Sɑuli kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Pɔlu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ moo sinji ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
À cii: Ni wɔ, n tɔ ndɑ gulinci ndɑ zɑmbɑ dimi kulu. Ni yɑ Ibilisi ize no. Ǹ ci cɛyom susu kulu ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ. N si cɛ bɑ, ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɔ cɛɑntei siirɑndiyom?
Mɑɑsɑ bine, gunɑ Kpe kɑmbɛ nɑ n dii. N kɑɑ dɑnɑ. N si di weenu hɑli lɔkɑci fɔ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ budɑ ndɑ kube zumbu Elimɑ bɔm. À bibiri bibiri kɑ bɔrɔ ceeci ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dii.
Kɑ gɑɑbikonɑ di hɛ kɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑɑne. À gɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ Kpe cɛbɛ.
Pɔlu bine ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hurɑ hɑrihi Pɑfusɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ kɑɑ Pɛligɑ kpɑɑrɑ, Pɑmfili lɑɑbu. Yohɑnnɑ hunu ǹ bɑndɑ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm.
Ammɑ Pɔlu yom bisɑ Pɛligɑ kɑ kɑɑ Antiɔku Pisidiɑ lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ hurɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine kɑ gɔrɔ.
Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom cooyom bɑndɑ, Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu jinɑ yom nɑ bɔrɔ dɔntɔm ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, de wom gundɑ sendi fɔ kɑ jɑmɑ wɔ no himmɑ, wɑ ɑ̀ cii.
Pɔlu bine tunu kɑ cɛ. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sombu. À cii: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ wom dimi cindei, wom kɑ wom go hɑmburu Ikpɛ, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm.
Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ wɔ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ i cɛɛ yom suubɑ. À nɑ jɑmɑ wɔ mo bɛɛrɑndi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kpei yotɛrɛ kɑ gɔrɔ Eziputu lɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ kɑmbɛ dɑbɑri.
À suuru ndei mo gɑnji kunɑ jiiri weitɑɑci.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dimi iye hɑlɑci Kɑnɑnɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ lɑɑbu di no ngɑ jɑmɑ sɛ ǹ mɑ tubu.
Nge yom di tɛ zɑngɑ jiiri zɑngu tɑɑci ndɑ weigu. À bɑndɑ Ikpɛ nɑ jɑmɑ di nɑ ciitikɔ yom kɑlɑ ɑndebi Sɑmuɛli wɑtɛ.
Ngɑ di bɑndɑ no, ǹ nɑ gɑndɑkpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Ikpɛ mo nɑ ǹ no Sɑuli kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kisu koo, Benzɑmim dimiize fɔ. Sɑmuɛli nɑ lɑɑbu kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ jiiri wei tɑɑci.
Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Dɑfidi tunɑndi ǹ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ci gɑndɑkpɛ. Dɑfidi bɔm nɑ Ikpɛ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: A di Dɑfidi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yɑsɑi koo, bɔrɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ bine. À gɑ ɑ binebɑɑ kulu tɛ mɑ.
Dɑfidi bɑndɑ yom kunɑ no ɑlikɑwɑli bɔm Ikpɛ nɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ tunɑndi Isirɑilɑ sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu.
Zɑ Yesu mɑnɑ kɑɑ, Yohɑnnɑ jinɑ kɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ kulu sɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ du mirɑndiyom.
Kɑ Yohɑnnɑ go kɑ ngɑ bɑtɑ beeni, ɑ̀ cii beerem sɛ: Mee nɑ wom nɑ ɑ tɑmmɑ? Yɑ nɑ ci Bɔrɔ kɑ wom tɑmmɑ. Ammɑ gunɑ ɑ bɑndɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu kɑɑ.
Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, Abulɛmɑ dimiize yom ndɑ wom dimi cindei, wom go hɑmburu Ikpɛ, wom sɛ no ǹ nɑ fɑɑbɑ sendi wɔ sɑmbɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ gɔrɛ ndɑ ǹ gɑɑbikoni yom mɑnɑ Yesu bei. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑndebi yom sendi yom kɑ ǹ go coo hulonzom hɑnu kulu bei. Ammɑ ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɔnɑndi kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu Yesu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ǹ nɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ Yesu wi.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum Yesu bɔm tɔnɑndi, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm sɑɑrɛ fɔ kunɑ mo.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme.
Jiribi boobo mo nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ beerem sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Mɑɑsɑ beerem nge yom di yɑ ci Yesu sɛdɑ yom jɑmɑ dɔ.
I yom mo, i yom yɑ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ wom sɛ. Bɑɑru wɔ yɑ ci ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ i cɛɛ yom sɛ.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli wɔ tɔnɑndi i sɛ, i yom kɑ i ci ǹ ize yom sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi. Ǹ nɑ wɔne hɑntum Sɑmu hinkɑntɛ kunɑ kɑ cii: "Ni yɑ ɑ ize nɑ. Zɑ hunkunɑ hɛɛ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ n sɛ."
À cii yɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À si ye fumbi dɔ kpɛɛnɛ. Yɑ mo no Ikpɛ Sendi cii: "A kɑɑ wom no Dɑfidi ɑlikɑwɑli hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ yom. "
À sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ Sendi cii kpɛɛnɛ: "N si nɑm n ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ mɑ fumbu".
Sɑɑ kɑ Dɑfidi nɑ gbei tɛ ngɑ zɑmɑni kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ miilɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kɑni. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji ɑ̀ cɛɛ yom dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ fumbu.
Ammɑ Yesu wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mɑnɑ fumbu.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom mɑ bei kɑ Yesu wɔ dɔ ǹ go bɔrɔ dulum yɑɑfɑyom bɑɑru fɛɛ wom sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ, Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑkpɛ cɛɑndi susu hɛ kulu gɑɑ. À go wom cɛɑndi susu hɛ kulu gɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ mɑnɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum ngei tirɑ yom kunɑ ǹ mɑ si kɑm wom bɔm. Ǹ cii:
"Gunɑ, wom fɛntɛkpɛ yom. Wɑ mɑmɑci kɑ hɑlɑci. A go gbei fɔ tɛ wom jiribi yom kunɑ, gbei kɑ wom si ɑ̀ cimɑndi pɑti pɑti, bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ deede wom sɛ."
Yuifu yom hunu ngei mɑrgɑ fuu. À gɑɑ no dimi cindei nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ye kɑ sendi yom di cii ngei sɛ kpɛɛnɛ hulonzom hɑnu teji.
Kɑ jɑmɑ di kɑru kɑ see, Yuifu boobo ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom bɛrɛ kɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɔ gɑnɑ ko tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ, ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ gɑnɑ. Ngei mɑ sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mo himmɑ dɑm Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ.
Hulonzom hɑnu teji hine wɑngɑrɑ di bɔrɔ bɑyom kulu meigu kɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendi.
Ammɑ kɑ Yuifu yom di bɔrɔ boobo meigu, ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ ko kɑkɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sendi yɑmu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ Pɔlu cii.

Ammɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. Ǹ cii: Tilɑsi no i mɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii wom sɛ jinɑ. Ammɑ zɑ kɑ wom go hunguɑ̀, wom bumbum lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom mɑnɑ tɔ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni gɑɑ. Gunɑ, i gɑ bɛrɛ dimi cindei dɔ hɛrɛ.
Yɑ no Kpe nɑ i no mei kɑ cii: "A nɑ n tɛ nɑ n mɑ ci kɑɑri dimi cindei sɛ zɑmɑ n mɑ kpeindɑ fɑɑbɑ bɑɑru kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee".
Sɑɑ kɑ dimi cindei mɑɑ yɑ di, ǹ fɑihã kɑ Kpe Sendɑ bɛɛrɑndi. Beerem kulu mɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ jisi hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ, ǹ kulu nɑɑne.
Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑ kɑru kɑ see lɑɑbu di kulu kunɑ.
Ammɑ Yuifu yom nɑ wɑngɑrɑ di weibɔrɔ hinno yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ beeri yom zukum hɑli ǹ tunu Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ ngei lɑɑbu kunɑ.
Ammɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ tɛ, ngei cee si ngei kɑmbɛ si. À bɑndɑ ǹ kpei Ikoniɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo tɔ ndɑ binekɑɑne ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ Ikoniɑ wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ. Ǹ sendi kɑlɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ Gɑrɛku boobo nɑɑne.
Ammɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne nɑ dimi cindei zukum kɑ ǹ bine yom bibɑndi nyɑize yom gɑɑ.
Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ goono Ikoniɑ kɑ jɛ ko sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Kpe kunɑ. Kpe gɑ sɛdɑ tɛ ngɑ gomini Sendɑ bɔm kɑ nɑm ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom mɑ tɛ ǹ kɑmbɛ yom dɔ.
Ammɑ wɑngɑrɑ di jɑmɑ fee ihinkɑ. Afɔ yom goono Yuifu yom bɑndɑ, ɑfɔ yom mo goono diyɑ yom bɑndɑ.
Dimi cindei ndɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ ǹ gɑɑbikoni yom tunu Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ gɑɑ ngei mɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi kɑ ǹ cetu cetu ndɑ tɑndi yom.
Kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ du bɑɑru, ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei Lisitɑ ndɑ Dɑlibɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kunɑ Likoniɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ ǹ hundɑntɛ yom.
Nungu yom di mo ǹ go wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm.
Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom si tɛ. À goono leebɑntɛ zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gunde. À mɑnɑ dirɑ bɑ ce fɔ.
À go hɑngɑ dɑm ko mɑɑ Pɔlu go sendi. Pɔlu mo nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ. Pɔlu di bɔrɔ di gundɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no gɑɑhɑm bɑɑni.
À gɑɑ nɑ Pɔlu cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Tunu kɑ cɛ n cee gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ mɔngɔlɑ tunu finyɑ kɑ dirɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di hɛ kɑ Pɔlu tɛ, ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ ndɑ Likoniɑ cinɛ kɑ cii: E, ikpɛ yom zumbu i dɔ kɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ yom.
Ǹ nɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ cɛɛ Zɑfɑ. Pɔlu mɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Hɛmɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci hɑikusu sendi kunɑ.
Zɑfɑ dɔ gɑrɑndikɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tooru fuu goono wɑngɑrɑ di birini mee jine kɑɑndɑ hɑuyeji yom ndɑ tuuri boosi yom wɑngɑrɑ birini mee yom gɑɑ. À gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ndei jɑmɑ di bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ kɑ ǹ ci diyɑ yom mɑɑ yɑ di, cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ngei kpɛ yom kɔɔtu Ikpɛ cɛnɑndiyom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ huro jɑmɑ di kunɑ. Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii:

E iburɑdɑm yom, ifɔ sɛ no wom go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ? I yom mo iburɑdɑm yom no ndɑ hɑɑli zɑngɑ wom. Bɑɑru Hinno no i go wɑɑzu wom sɛ hɑli wom mɑ fee ndɑ hɛ kɔnu yom wɔ kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ dɔ hɛrɛ. Ikpɛ wɔ nɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ ndɑ tɛku ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ kunɑ tɑkɑ.
Zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑm hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kulu nɑ ngei bɔm fɔndɔ yom gɑnɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑm sɛdɑ si. À nɑ ihinno tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i no bɛɛnɛ hɑri ndɑ ɑliwɑti bɑrikɑntɛ yom zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À nɑ i no ŋmɑɑri hɑli i kungu kɑ i bine yom tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne.
Bɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii ǹ sɛ, kɑlɑ dɑcɑti ǹ du kɑ hungu jɑmɑ di sɛ ǹ mɑ gɑrɑndi di tɛ ngei sɛ.
Yuifu yom bine hunu zɑ Antiɔku ndɑ Ikoniɑ kɑ kɑɑ Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ di bɛrɛ hɑli ǹ nɑ Pɔlu cetu ndɑ tondi yom. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kukusu kɑ cendi wɑngɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ tɑmmɑ hɑli ɑ̀ bu nɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi, ɑ̀ tunu. À huro wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. À mo bo Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ kpei Dɑlibɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ Dɑlibɑ wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ du gɑnɑkɔ boobo. À bɑndɑ ǹ ye Lisitɑ ndɑ Ikoniɑ ndɑ Antiɔku.
Ǹ nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom bine yom no gɑɑbi kɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ ǹ mɑ moo yeti nɑɑne fɔndɔ gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ bei mo kɑ tilɑsi no i mɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm hɑli i kɑɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ beerem suubɑ ǹ mɑ ci mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kulu kunɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ meehɔ. Ǹ nɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom tɑlifi Kpe kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne gɑɑ.
Ǹ bisɑ Pisidiɑ lɑɑbu kɑ kpei Pɑmfili lɑɑbu.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ Pɛligɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom wɑɑzu ndɑ Sendɑ mo, ǹ zuli kɑ kpei Atɑliɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Kpɑɑrɑ di no ǹ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ, nungu kɑ n nɑ ǹ tɑlifi Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ, gbei kɑ ǹ tɔnɑndi di sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Antiɔku ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cɛɛ kɑ meigu. Ǹ deede hɛ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ ngei ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɔ feeri dimi cindei mo mɑ nɑɑne sɛ.
Ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ jɛ Antiɔku coobɑɑbɑize yom bɑndɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo hunu zɑ Yude lɑɑbu. Ǹ gɑ nyɑizei cooɑndi kɑ cii: De ǹ mɑnɑ wom dɑmbɑngu Moisi ɑlɑɑdɑ bɔm, kulu wom si hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.

Sendi ngɑ di sɛ no, kɑkɔ ndɑ kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tunu Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ beerem di gɑme. À sɛ no ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom dɔntɔm Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ sendɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑ ǹ kɑmbɑzɑ, ǹ nɑ Finiciɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu tɑɑru kɑ bisɑ. Ǹ gɑ dimi cindei bɛrɛyom bɑɑru deede. Bɑɑru di kɑɑndɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ nyɑizei kulu sɛ.
Kɑ ǹ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ ndɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ ǹ tɑ. Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ deede ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ ngei.
Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ nɑɑne tunu kɑ cii tilɑsi no ǹ mɑ dimi cindei dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ mɑ ǹ dɑm mo ǹ mɑ Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
Diyɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu kɑ sendɑ gunɑ.

Kɑ kɑkɔ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tunu, Piɛɛ tunu kɑ cɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom bumbum bei zɑ dom no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ suubɑ wom kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ suubɑ domi dimi cindei mɑ mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sendi ɑ mee kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ nɑɑne.
Ikpɛ mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bine yom bei, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ sɛdɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no.
À bine mɑnɑ fɑyɑnkɑ yom fɔ mo kulu dɑm ngei ndɑ i yom gɑme. À nɑ ǹ bine yom hinnɑndi nɑɑne gɑɑ mo.
Ngɑ di sɛ, mɑɑsɑ ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ Ikpɛ bubure ko zuu dɑm coobɑɑbɑize yom jinde gɑɑ? Zɑ i cɛɛ yom hɑli i yom, i mɑnɑ hini kɑ zuu wɔ zɑɑ.
I go nɑɑne kɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini dɔ i du fɑɑbɑ, zɑngɑ yɑ no ngei mo.
Jɑmɑ di kulu dɛnjɛ ko hɑngɑ dɑm Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu sɛ. Ǹ go ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom deede kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ngei dɔ dimi cindei kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɛnjɛ, Yɑkɔfu mo tunu kɑ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ ɑ sɛ.
Simɔ Piɛɛ nɑ bɑɑru deede zɑngɑ Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ dimi cindei kunfɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ fɔ yom suubɑ ǹ kunɑ ngɑ bumbum mɑɑ sɛ.
Ngɑ di sɑbɑ mo ndɑ ɑndebei sendi yom ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii:
"Ngɑ di bɑndɑ, ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ. Dɑfidi kuuru bukɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini. A kɑɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sɑɑrɑ yɑrɑ kɑ cini. A gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ cɛɑndi.
A gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ cindei mɑ Kpe ceeci, bɑ ndɑ dimi cindei kulu kɑ ǹ cɛɛ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ. Yɑ no Kpe cii, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ yom wɔ kulu tɛ.
Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ cii noyɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ gbei kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ zɑ zɑmɑni sintiyom."
À sɛ no, ɑ diyom gɑɑ i mɑ si beerem kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ dimi cindei kunɑ tɑɑbɑndi.
Ammɑ i mɑ hɑntum ǹ sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ǹ bɔm fee ndɑ tooru ŋmɔne ziibi ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ kɔtɛ kɑ wi ndɑ kuri.
Zɑ dom zɑmɑni yom kunɑ, Moisi gundɑ fɛɛkɔ yom wɑngɑrɑ fɔ fɔ kulu kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ Moisi fɔndɑ coo Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ hulɑnzom hɑnu kulu.
