À bine sɑbɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu sɛ ǹ mɑ beerem suubɑ ngei kunɑ kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ bɑndɑ. Ngei neyɑ, Yudɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑɑsɑbɑ ndɑ Silɑ, wɔ kɑ yom gundɑ bɛɛrɛ nyɑizei kunɑ.
Ǹ nɑ tirɑ wɔ hɑntum kɑ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ kɑ cii. I yom diyɑ yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ nyɑizei go wom dimi cindei nyɑize yom fɔɔ, wom kɑ wom goono Antiɔku ndɑ Siriɑ ndɑ Siliciɑ.
I mɑɑ bɑɑru bɔrɔ fɔ yom hunu i dɔ kɑ wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi ndɑ sendi yom. Ǹ go wom bine yom biriji kɑ cii kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu. Wom mo Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Wom mo bei i mɑnɑ ǹ no fɔndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ i kulu meigu mefɔ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i sɛ i mɑ beerem suubɑ i kunɑ kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm wom dɔ i binebɑɑkɔ yom wɔ bɑndɑ, Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu.
Ngei yɑ nɑ ngei hundi yom neerɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
À sɛ no, i nɑ Yudɑ ndɑ Silɑ dɔntɔm ngei mo mɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku yom di bɑɑru cii wom sɛ.
À sɑbɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i yom mo i sɛ, i mɑ si time fɔ ŋmɑni kulu dɛcɛ wom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci tilɑsi.

Wom mɑ wom bɔm fee hɛ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɛ tooru gɑɑ. Wɑ fee ndɑ kuri ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ kɔtɛ kɑ wi. Wɑ fee ndɑ zinɑ. De wom go wom bɔm jɛ hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ, kulu wom boori. Too. Wom mo gɔrɔ ndɑ bɑɑni.
Bine kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm, ǹ kpei Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ meigu kɑ tirɑ di no ǹ sɛ.
Ngei mo kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ coo, ǹ fɑihã ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ ǹ sɛ.
Yudɑ ndɑ Silɑ ngei yɑ ɑndebi yom no. Ǹ nɑ nyɑizei no himmɑ kɑ ǹ bine no gɑɑbi meecine boobo gɑɑ.
Ǹ nɑ jiribi yom tɛ nodi. À bɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ no, nyɑizei nɑ ǹ tɑm ǹ mɑ ye diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm dɔ. [
Ammɑ nungu di gɔrɛ kɑɑni Silɑ sɛ.]
Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ mo gɔrɔ Antiɔku. Ǹ go cooɑndi kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu Kpe Sendɑ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ jiribi fɔ yom bisɑ, Pɔlu cii Bɑɑnɑbɑ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑ i mɑ ye wɑngɑrɑ yom di kulu kunɑ nungu yom kɑ i jinɑ kɑ wɑɑzu Kpe Sendɑ bɔm. I mɑ nyɑize yom kunfɑ kɑ di zɑngɑ ǹ goono.
Bɑɑnɑbɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑɑku ngei bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ Pɔlu di ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ ǹ mɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ ngei nɑm Pɑmfili kpɑɑrɑ. À mɑnɑ kpei gbei tɛ ǹ bɑndɑ.
Kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ ǹ gɑme hɑli ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ fee ndɑ cɛrɛ. Bɑɑnɑbɑ kpeindɑ Mɑɑku ngɑ bɑndɑ kɑ kpei Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi.
Pɔlu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Silɑ suubɑ kpei sɑɑ kɑ nyɑizei nɑ ǹ tɑlifi Kpe gomini gɑɑ.
Pɔlu nɑ Siriɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Cilici lɑɑbu tooru kɑ bisɑ ko Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom no gɑɑbi.
Pɔlu tɔ Dɑlibɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Timote. Yuifu weibɔrɔ nɑɑnekɔ fɔ koo no ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ mo Gɑrɛku no.
Nyɑize kɑ ǹ goono Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Ikoniɑ wɑngɑrɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ sɛdɑ hinnɑ.
Pɔlu bine gɑ bɑɑ Timote mɑ ngɑ gɑnɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑmbɑngu Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu yom di sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu bei kɑ Timote bɑɑbɑ yɑ Gɑrɛku nɑ.
Kɑ ǹ gɑ bisɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ ǹ nɑ nyɑize yom dɑm ǹ mɑ meire yom jɛ, wɔ kɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm jisi.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom bine sinji kɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu mo hɑnu kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu.
Pɔlu yom nɑ Filiji lɑɑbu ndɑ Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu tɑɑru kɑ bisɑ, zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hungu ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ Sendɑ cii Azi lɑɑbu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Misiɑ lɑɑbu, ǹ ceeci ǹ mɑ kpei Bitiniɑ lɑɑbu ɑmmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑnɑ tu ǹ sɛ.
Kɑ ǹ bisɑ Misiɑ lɑɑbu ǹ kɑɑ Toɑsɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Ciini kunɑ Pɔlu di diyom fɔ. Mɑsedoni hɑibɔrɔ fɔ gɑ cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ. À cii. Kɑɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu kɑ I gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu di diyomɑ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ i nɑ Mɑsedoni kpeiyom fɔndɔ ceeci. I gɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɛ no i mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ ǹ sɛ.
À sɛ nɑ kɑ i tunu Tɑɑsɑ kpɑɑrɑ i huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei susu kɑlɑ Sɑmetɑlɑci hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔm. À mo bo mo i kpei Niɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ.
Zɑ nungu di no i kpei Filipi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ. Wɑngɑrɑ di goono Lome lɑɑbu meire kunɑ. I nɑ jiribi yom tɛ wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ.
Hulonzom hɑnu hine i hunu wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. I kpei isɑ fɔ mee gɑɑ, nungu kɑ beerem cini kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. I gɔrɔ nungu di kɑ sendi weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ meigu sɛ.

Weibɔrɔ fɔ goono ǹ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Lidiɑ, tɑɑfɛ siini cɑɑdɑntɛ neerɑkɔ no. Tiyɑtire kpɑɑrɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À go mɑɑ i sendɑ. Kpe mo nɑ ɑ̀ bine feeri kɑlɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm hɛ yom kɑ Pɔlu go cii gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu ɑ̀ nɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: De wom nɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu Kpe nɑɑnekɔ, wɑ kɑɑ zumbu ɑ hundi. Lidiɑ nɑ i tilɑsi.
À kɑɑ tɔ bine, i go kpei ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ hundiyo fɔ nɑ i kube kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ gondi beeri hɔllɛ zɑngɑ isiyɑbi. Gunɑyomɑ kunɑ no ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ liibɑ bɑɑbɑ ngɑ kpe yom sɛ.
À sinti kɑ i gɑnɑ, Pɔlu ndɑ i yom. À nɑ ngɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Beerem wɔ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ tɑm yom no. Ǹ go fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ fɑɑbɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ i sɛ.

Hɔllɛ di nɑ ngɑ di cii zɑngɑ jiribi yom. Ammɑ Pɔlu bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À bɛrɛ kɑ cii hɔllɛ di sɛ: Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ n mei, n mɑ hunu hundiyo wɔ bɑndɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci di bumbum hɔllɛ di hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ hundiyɑ kpe yom di ngei liibɑ sɑbɑbu beeni, ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ dii. Ǹ nɑ ǹ cendi kɑ kpeindei hebu bɑtumɑ kunɑ hinikpɛ yom jine.
Ǹ kpeindei yerimɑ yom dɔ kɑ cii: Beerem wɔ Yuifu yom no. Ǹ bine go kɑ i wɑngɑrɑ butugu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Ǹ go ɑlɑɑdɑ yom fɛɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli i sɛ i mɑ ǹ tɑ wɑlɑ i mɑ ǹ gɑnɑ zɑ kɑ i yom yɑ Lomɑncɛ yom no.
Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di tunu ǹ gɑɑ mefɔ. Yerimɑ yom di nɑ ǹ jiine yom wɑfɑ kɑ kɑɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ ce boobo, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu. Ǹ nɑ bɑtukɔ dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ bɑtu hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
Ngɑ mo zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du meire wɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsuɑ kunɑ hɑli jinɑ hɛrɛ. À nɑ ǹ cee yom dɑm dibi.
Ciini bindi Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ko kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ ndɑ betu yom. Kɑsuize cindei mo nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
Mefɔ mefɔ gɑndɑ zinji yom bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ kɑlɑ kɑsu fuuɑ kpɛsɛ zinji. Kɑsu mee yom kulu feeri. Kɑsuize yom mɑ kulu seseri yom feeri feeri.
Kɑsu bɑtukɔɑ mɑɑ hɛi kɑ di mee yom kulu goono feerɑntɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ tɑkubɑ hobu. À bɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm wi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ kɑsuize yom zuuru no.
Ammɑ Pɔlu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Si bɔnɛ tɛ n bɔm sɛ zɑmɑ i kulu goono nee.
Sɑɑ di gɑɑ bɑtukɔɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ fitilɑ. À huro ndɑ wɑɑsi. À ye gɑndɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ jine. À go gɑsi ndɑ hɑmburu.
À nɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: A jinɑ yom, ifɔ no yɑ tɛ kɑ dɑ fɑɑbɑ?
Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ nɑɑne Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ, n kɑɑ du fɑɑbɑ, ni ndɑ n fuu kulu.
Ǹ nɑ Kpe Sendɑ bɑɑru cii ɑ̀ sɛ, yɑ no beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ.
Sɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ zɑɑ ciini kunɑ kɑ ǹ bi yom nyunu. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu.
Bɑtukɔɑ kpeindei ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ ǹ no ŋmɑɑri. À fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu, zɑmɑ ǹ go nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
Kɑ mo bo, yerimɑ yom nɑ dogɑri yom dɔntɔm kɑ cii: N mɑ beerem di tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei.
Kɑsu bɑtukɔɑ nɑ sendi yom yɑɑrɑ Pɔlu sɛ. À cii: Yerimɑ yom nɑ beerem dɔntɔm kɑ cii ǹ mɑ wom tɑm, wɑ kpei. Mɑɑsɑ wɑ hunu kɑ kpei ndɑ bɑɑni.
Ammɑ Pɔlu mo cii dogɑri yom sɛ: Tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no ǹ nɑ i bulɑɑlɑ, i yom Lomɑncɛ yom. Ǹ nɑ i dɑm kɑsu mo, ciiti si. Mɑɑsɑ no, ǹ gɑ i tɑm tugu kunɑ bɑ? Awo. À si ci yɑ. Ngei bumbum mɑ kɑɑ kɑ i tɑm.
Dogɑri yom di nɑ sendi yom wɔ yɑɑrɑ yerimɑ yom di sɛ. Ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Lomɑncɛ yom no.
À gɑɑ no ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ suurɑndi. Kɑ ǹ tɑm ǹ nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ hunu wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ hunu kɑsuɑ kunɑ kɑ huro Lidiɑ hundi kunɑ. Kɑ ǹ di nyɑize yom, ǹ nɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ. À bɑndɑ ǹ dirɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ bisɑ Amfipoli wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Apoloni wɑngɑrɑ ǹ kɑɑ Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Nungu di Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu fɔ goono.
Pɔlu bine huro mɑrgɑ fuu di kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cini tɛ. Hulonzom hɑnu hinzɑ no ɑ̀ go kɑkɔ tɛ ndei Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom bɔm.
À go kɑ ǹ fɑhɑmɑndi kɑ cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ tilɑsi Mɛsiyɑ mɑ tɑɑbi. À mɑ bu mo kɑ ye kɑ tunu. À cii: Yesu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru ɑ go fɛɛ wom sɛ, Mɛsiyɑ no.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑɑne kɑ lɑmbɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ gɑɑ. Yɑ no Gɑrɛku tutumɑ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ weibɔrɔ hinno boobo.

Ammɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Sendɑ cimɑndi, ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yɑmɔ yom gɑme zɑɑ kɑ wɑngɑrɑ di butugu. Ǹ kpei Yɑso kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ ceeci ngei mɑ kpeindei jɑmɑ di dɔ.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ei, ǹ nɑ Yɑso ndɑ nyɑize fɔ yom cendi kɑ kpeindei wɑngɑrɑ yerimɑ yom jine. Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑndunyɑ bɛrɛ ǹ kɑɑ nee wɔ mo.
Yɑso bine yɑ nɑ ǹ kube ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ kulu go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Kɑisɑ meire yom. Ǹ go cii kpe ŋmɑni fɔ goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yesu.
Kɑ jɑmɑ di ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ yerimɑ yom mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, ǹ lɑɑkɑli tunu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ tɔlimɛ yom tɑ Yɑso ndɑ bɔrɔ cindei gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ nyɑize yom nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ dɔntɔm Beriɑ kpɑɑrɑ ciini kunɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Beriɑ, ǹ hurɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ.
Yuifu nge yom di bine hɑɑli bisɑ Tesɑlonikɑ ŋmɔne yom zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ Sendɑ zɑɑ ndɑ bine fɔ. Hɑnu kulu mɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom gunɑ ndɑ himmɑ. Ǹ ceeci kɑ di hɑli yɑ no hɛ yom di goono.
À sɛ no ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne. Gɑrɛku weibɔrɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ nɑɑne mo.
Ammɑ Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ Yuifu yom mɑɑ bɑɑru Pɔlu go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ fɛɛ Beriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. À gɑɑ no ǹ kpei jɑmɑ zukum.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei mo nɑ Pɔlu dum hɑli tɛku mee. Ammɑ Silɑ ndɑ Timote gɔrɔ nungu di.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go Pɔlu dum, ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ hɑli Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ. Kɑ Pɔlu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii Silɑ ndɑ Timote mɑ kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi, ǹ dirɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu goono Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ di ko kɑ ǹ bɑtu, ɑ̀ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ di wɑngɑrɑ tɔ ndɑ tooru yom.
Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ ɑ̀ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À cini kpei hebu bɑtumɑ hɑnu kulu kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ beerem kɑ ɑ̀ go kube ndei.

Wɑlitɛrɛ fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo, Epikɑri yom ndɑ Sitoriɑ yom go sendi ndɑ Pɔlu. Afɔ yom cii: Ifɔ no meecinekpɛ wɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ cii? Afɔ yom mo cii: À himɑ i sɛ ikpɛ ŋmɑni yotɛrɛ ŋmɔne yom bɔm no ɑ̀ go sendi. Ǹ cii yɑ di zɑmɑ Pɔlu go Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme bɑɑru fɛɛ ǹ sɛ.
Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu dii kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ Aleopɑgu mɑrgɑ dɔ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Cɛbɛ teji wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm n go cooɑndi, i bɑɑ i mɑ bei.
N go kɑɑndɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni yom i hɑngɑ sɛ. À sɛ no i go bɑɑ i mɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ nge yom di feeriji.
Atinɑ bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ yo yom kɑ ǹ goono wɑngɑrɑ di sindɑ gbei fɔ kulu kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ cii wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm bɑɑru teji yom sɛ.
Pɔlu cɛ Aleopɑgu mɑrgɑ bindi kɑ cii: Atinɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ go di hɛ kulu kunɑ wom yɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom no.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go bisɑ, ɑ di hɛ yom kɑ wom go sɔmbu ǹ sɛ. A di bɑndɑ tɑndɑ fɔ zɑti kɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ kɑ ǹ si bei sɛ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ wom go sɔmbu zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɑɑru no ɑ go wom no.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ Kpe. À si gɔrɔ fuu kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
À mɑnɑ ci ndɑ kɑmbɛ no bɔrɔ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑngɑ de ɑ̀ go bɑɑ hɛ fɔ. Ngɑ bumbum yɑ go hɛ kulu no hundi ndɑ hulonzom yom ndɑ hɛ kulu.
Kuri fɔlɔnku gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ dimi kulu tɛ ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ hɑndunyɑ kulu bɔm. À nɑ ɑliwɑti yom dumbu kɑ jisi ǹ sɛ mo ndɑ ǹ gɔrɛ dɔ yom kɔrɔme.
Ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ ceeci hɑnibɑ ǹ du kɑ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ mooru i ŋmɔne fɔ fɔ kulu.
À kunɑ no i go hunɑ, i go yɔgɔi. I bɑrɑ mo zɑngɑ wom dɔɔnukɔ yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom cii: I yom yɑ ɑ̀ dimi yom no.
Ngɑ di sɛ zɑ kɑ i yom yɑ Ikpɛ dimi yom no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ i mɑ tɑmmɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ iburɑdɑm zozobu ndɑ wurɑ wɑlɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɑlɑ tondi ngɑ lɑsɑbu kunɑ.
Cimi no Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i dom zɑm kɑ bei mure ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ iburɑdɑm kulu nungu kulu no mei ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ.
Ikpɛ nɑ hɑnu fɔ jisi kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ciiti hɑndunyɑ kulu sɛ ndɑ cɛyom susu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi bɔrɔ kulu sɛ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Bɔrɔ di tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme sendi, ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom hɑɑru. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom cii: I kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ sendi wɔ bɔm.
Pɔlu bine hunu ǹ kunɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑɑne kɑ lɑmbɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ kunɑ Dionisu, Aleopɑgu bɔrɔ fɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Dɑmɑriɑ ndɑ ɑfɔ yom kpɛɛnɛ.
Nge yom bɑndɑ Pɔlu tunu Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kɑ kɑɑ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ.

À nɑ Yuifu fɔ gɑru kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Akilɑ, Pontu lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no. À mɑnɑ jɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Itɑli lɑɑbu, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Pirisilɑ. À hunu Itɑli lɑɑbu zɑmɑ gɑndɑkpɛ Kolodu nɑ fɔndɔ nɑ kɑ cii Yuifu yom kulu mɑ hunu Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ. Pɔlu mo kɑɑ ǹ dɔ.
Pɔlu gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ kɑ gbei tɛ ndei zɑmɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ gbei fɔlɔnku no. Kuuru bukɑ tɛyom yɑ ci ǹ gbei.
Hulonzom hɑnu kulu Pɔlu go kɑkɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ ko ceeci ngɑ mɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ Gɑrɛku yom bɛrɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Silɑ ndɑ Timote hunu zɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ Pɔlu fum ɑ̀ mɑ moo yeti sɛdɑ tɛyom gɑɑ. À cii Yuifu yom sɛ kɑ Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
Ammɑ Yuifu yom hunguɑ̀ kɑ sendi yɑmɔ cii. Pɔlu nɑ ngɑ jiine yom kɔkɔbɛ ǹ hunguyom sɑbu sɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom dulum bɑnɑndi go wom bɔm. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ hinne. Zɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kpei dimi cindei dɔ.
À tunu nodi kɑ kpei huro bɔrɔ fɔ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yusitu. Bɔrɔ di go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À fuu go lɑmbɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu gɑɑ.
Kilipu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu jinɑ nɑɑne Kpe gɑɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu. Kɔlɛnte bɔrɔ boobo mo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑɑzuyom, ǹ nɑɑne. Ǹ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi mo.
Kpe bine sendi Pɔlu sɛ ciini hɑndiri kunɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ si hɑmburu, n mɑ sendi. N mɑ si dɛnjɛ.
A goono n bɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑm n bɔm kɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ n sɛ, zɑmɑ ɑ gundɑ bɔrɔ boobo wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ.
Pɔlu mo gɔrɔ nungu di jiiri fɔ ndɑ hɑndu idu ko kɑ ǹ cooɑndi Ikpɛ sendɑ bɔm.
Sɑɑ kɑ Gɑliyo ci Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni, Yuifu yom tunu mefɔ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ ciitiyom dɔ.
Ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ go bɔrɔ boobo bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ Pɔlu bɑ kɑ ngɑ mee feeri kɑ sendi, cɔfɔ Gɑliyo cii: E Yuifu yom, de ɑ̀ ci gbei lɑlɔ fɔ no wɑlɑ hɛ futu fɔ no, ɑ suuru ndɑ wom.
Ammɑ de kɑkɔ sendi bɔm wɑlɑ mɑɑ yom bɔm wɑlɑ wom fɔndɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ tɛ wom sendi. A si bɑɑ yɑ ci hɛ nge yom di ciitikɔ.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ ciitiyom dɔ jine.
À gɑɑ no Gɑrɛku yom kulu nɑ Sotɛnisu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu jinɑ dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑru ciitiyom dɔ jine. Ammɑ Gɑliyo mɑnɑ hɛ nge yom di dɑm sɑɑlu.

Pɔlu gɔrɔ kɑ jɛ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nyɑize yom too, ɑ̀ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Siriɑ lɑɑbu. Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Pɔlu jinɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm cobu Sɑnkɑriɑ kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli zɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ Efese wɑngɑrɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ nɑm. À huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ ngei kɑ jɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tu.
À nɑ ǹ too kɑ cii: Kɑlɑ de yɑ jingɑru kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. A ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ de Ikpɛ bɑɑ. À gɑɑ no Pɔlu huro hɑrihi kunɑ Efese wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kpei.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ ɑ̀ ziji kɑ kpei Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔɔ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ zumbu kɑ kpei Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ.
À nɑ jiribi yom tɛ Antiɔku mo. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ gɑnɑ Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu ndɑ Filiji lɑɑbu ko coobɑɑbɑize yom kulu no gɑɑbi.
Yuifu fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Apolo kɑɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ. Alɛsɑndiɑ bɔrɔ no. Bɔrɔ wɔ sendi kɑɑnɔkpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ beire kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kunɑ.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cooɑndi Kpe fɔndɔ bɔm. À gundɑ niyɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ. À go sendi mo kɑ beerem cooɑndi cɑu cɑu hɛ yom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Kpe. Ammɑ mirɑndiyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ hinne no ɑ̀ go bei.
À sinti kɑ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ feeri ɑ̀ sɛ sã sã.

Kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ bisɑ kɑ kpei Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu, nyɑizei mo nɑ ɑ̀ no himmɑ. Ǹ nɑ tirɑ hɑntum coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ngɑ mo, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ nungu di ɑ̀ nɑ wɔ kɑ yom go nɑɑne gomini dɔ gɑɑkɑsine kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
À nɑ Yuifu yom zeeri ndɑ gɑɑbi. À cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kunɑ kɑ Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Apolo goono Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ, Pɔlu cɛsu lɑɑbu di sɛ bɛɛnɛ hɛrɛ kɑ kɑɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ. À di coobɑɑbɑize fɔ yom nungu di.
À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑɑne bɑ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom wɔ, i mɑnɑ bei hɑli Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ goono.
Pɔlu cii ǹ sɛ: Dee mirɑndiyom fɔ dimi no ǹ tɛ wom sɛ? Ǹ cii: Mirɑndiyomɑ dimi kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ.
Pɔlu mo cii: Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndi no tuubiyom bɔm. À cii beerem sɛ mo ǹ mɑ nɑɑne wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ, wɑtom Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Kɑ Pɔlu nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu ǹ bɔm. À gɑɑ no, ǹ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ.
Hɑibɔrɔ yom di kulu tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ sɑrɑ.
Hɑndu hinzɑ cine Pɔlu go huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. À kɑkɔ ndei kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ hɛ yom ko wetere kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ.

Ammɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom binesɛndi, ǹ hungu kɑ nɑɑne. Ǹ nɑ sendi futu yom cii Yesu fɔndɔ gɑɑ jɑmɑ jine. Pɔlu bine hunu jɑmɑ dɔ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo fee ndei. Hɑnu kulu ɑ̀ cini kpei Tirɑno cooyom fuu kɑ kɑkɔ.
Ngɑ di tɛ zɑngɑ jiiri hinkɑ kɑlɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono Azi lɑɑbu mɑɑ Kpe Yesu sendɑ, zɑ Yuifu yom hɑli Gɑrɛku yom.
Ikpɛ nɑ dɑbɑri gbei ŋmɑni yom tɛ Pɔlu kɑmbɛ yom dɔ.
À tɔ mɑ wɑi yom ndɑ fɑtɑlɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm hɑmɑ ndɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑ Pɔlu dɔ kɑ kpeindei doorikom yom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Doori ŋmɑni ŋmɑni gɑnɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Hɔllɛ yom mo hunu beerem bɑndɑ.
Yuifu fɔ yom mo goono kɑ ǹ go yɑɑli yɑɑli kɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ nɑ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ cɛɛ hɔllɛkpɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Wɑ hunu beerem bɑndɑ Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru Pɔlu go fɛɛ.
Sewɑ, Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ fɔ gundɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ iye kɑ ǹ go hɛ nge yom di tɛ.
Ammɑ hɔllɛ di tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A go Yesu bei. A go Pɔlu bei mo. Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom no mee yom?
Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ di kɑ hɔllɛ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ kɑm ǹ gɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi. À nɑ ǹ zeeri. Ǹ hunu fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ zuuru bumbum. Ǹ mɛrɛ mo.
Yuifu yom ndɑ Gɑrɛku yom kɑ ǹ goono Efese wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ gundɑ bɑɑru ngɑ di beiyom. Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Kpe Yesu mo mɑɑ du bɛɛrɛ.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne mo kɑɑ kɑ ngei dulum yom cii. Ǹ go hɛ yom kɑ ngei cini tɛ deede.
Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ cini mondɑbɑru tɛ kɑɑndɑ ngei tirɑ yom kɑ ǹ tɔnu bɔrɔ kulu jine. Ǹ nɑ tirɑ yom di nooru yom lɑsɑbu. À tɔ ɑnzɛrɛfu nooru zɑngɑ fɔɔtɔ zɑngu hinkɑ ndɑ weigu.
Yɑ no Kpe Sendɑ kɑru kɑ see. À tɔntɔnu kɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ.

Sɑɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Pɔlu miilɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Mɑsedoni ndɑ Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu yom tooru kɑ bisɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm, tilɑsi kɑlɑ yɑ bisɑ kɑ kpei di Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ mo.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kunɑ, Pɔlu nɑ ihinkɑ fɔ dɔntɔm Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu, Timote ndɑ Alɑsitu. Ngɑ bumbum gɔrɔ bɑndɑ fɔ Azi lɑɑbu.
Sɑɑ ngɑ di no kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tunu kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yesu fɔndɑ.
Ngɑ di tɛ no ɑnzɛrɛfu zem fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Dimitiyo sɑbu sɛ. Tooru weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Atemi, ɑ̀ fuu no ɑ̀ cini tɛ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu. À go kɑɑndɑ liibɑ bɑmbɑtɑ zem gbeiteeri yom sɛ.
Dimitiyo nɑ ǹ meigu ndɑ gbeiteeri yom kɑ ǹ go gbeiɑ dimi tɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom fɑhɑm gbei wɔ gɑɑ no duure go huro i sɛ.
Wom go di, wom go mɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu nɑ bɔrɔ boobo cendi kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ. À go cii wɔne yom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ mɑnɑ ci ikpɛ yom. À mɑnɑ ci Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ hinne no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑmmɑ Azi lɑɑbu bɑyom kulu kunɑ no.

A sɛ no, ngɑ di kɑɑndɑ i sɛ kɑtɑru zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ i gbeiɑ kɑɑ kɑm hɑwi kunɑ. Ammɑ kɑ bisɑ yɑ, tooru weibɔrɔ Atemi fuuɑ tɛ kɔnu. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ mo zeeri, ngɑ kɑ Azi lɑɑbu kulu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ sukutum kulu go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ bine futu. Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ibeeri yɑ ci Atemi Efɛse ŋmɔne.
Wɑngɑrɑ di kulu butugu. Beerem tunu mefɔ ndɑ zuure kɑ kpei mɑrgɑ bɑtumɑ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ Mɑsedoni beerem, Gɑyu ndɑ Alisitɑku dii, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci Pɔlu bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom diro di kunɑ.
Pɔlu bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ huro jɑmɑ di kunɑ, ɑmmɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hungu ɑ̀ sɛ.
Azi lɑɑbu jinɑ fɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ ci Pɔlu kpɑɑsi yom nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si kpei mɑrgɑ bɑtumɑ di dɔ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom bine kuwɑ yɑ wɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo kuwɑ kɑ cii yɑ wɔ, zɑmɑ jɑmɑ di butugu. Bɔrɔ bɑyom mɑnɑ bei hɛ kɑ sɛ ngei meigu.
Ǹ nɑ Alɛsɑndi cendi kɑ kɑɑ jɑmɑ kunɑ. Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ̀ fum kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm jɑmɑ jine. Alɛsɑndi bine nɑ kɑmbɛ sombu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ jinde deede beerem sɛ.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ bei Yuifu no, ǹ kulu sɑbɑ kɑ kuwɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ zɑngɑ guuru hinkɑ cine. À cii: Ibeeri yɑ ci Atemi fɑ, Efɛse ŋmɔne.
Wɑngɑrɑ di ŋmɔne hɑntumkɔ nɑ jɑmɑ di lɑɑkɑli kɑnɑndi. À cii ǹ sɛ: Efɛse hɑibɔrɔ yom, mee yɑ mɑnɑ bei kɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ yɑ ci Atemi beeri fuu bɑtukɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ himɑi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ?
Zɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di sindɑ kɑkɔ, ɑ̀ himɑ wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ kɑni. Wom mɑ si hɛ fɔ tɛ ndɑ sɑsɑ.
Wom kɑɑndɑ beerem wɔ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci tooru fuu zee yom. Ǹ mɑnɑ ci mo wom tooru weibɔrɔ di cɛnɑndikɔ yom.
À sɛ no de Dimitiyo ndɑ ɑ̀ gbeiteeri yom gundɑ ɑsiiri fɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ, ciiti fuu go feerɑntɛ. Ciitikɔ mo goono. Wɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ cɛrɛ beri nodi.
Ammɑ de wom gundɑ hãyom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni, ciiti mɑrgɑ dɔ no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ sɑsɑbɑndi.
I goono kɑtɑru kunɑ de ǹ nɑ i beri butugu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hunkunɑ sɑbu sɛ. Sɑbɑbu fɔ kulu si kɑ i mɑ tɛ kɔbɛ mɑrgɑ bɑmbɑtɑ wɔ sɛ.
Sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ mɑrgɑ di tɑm.
Sɑɑ kɑ kɔsɔnguɑ beeni, Pɔlu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ too. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu.
Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ lɑɑbu yom yɑɑli kɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom no himmɑ ndɑ sendi boobo, ɑ̀ kɑɑ Gɑrɛku lɑɑbu.
À gɔrɔ nungu di hɑndu hinzɑ. À bɑ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Siriɑ lɑɑbu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yuifu yom nɑ meetosi tɛ ngɑ bɔm. À miilɑ ngɑ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu fɔndɑ gɑnɑ kɑ ye.
Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ Pɔlu dum kɑlɑ Azi lɑɑbu neyɑ, Sopɑtɑru kɑ ɑ̀ ci Beriɑ bɔrɔ ndɑ Alisitɑku ndɑ Sɑkundi Tesɑlonikɑ bɔrɔ yom, ndɑ Gɑyu Dɑlibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ, ndɑ Timote ndɑ Azi bɔrɔ yom Ticiku ndɑ Tofimu.
Beerem nge yom di huro i jine kɑ i bɑtu Toɑsɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
Ammɑ i yom mo, Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu yom bɑndɑ, i tunu Filipi wɑngɑrɑ hɑrihi kunɑ. Jiribi gu no i tɔ Toɑsɑ wɑngɑrɑ. I tɛ jiribi iye wɑngɑrɑ di.
Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, coobɑɑbɑize yom meigu kɑ buuru zenji zenji. Pɔlu nɑ meecine fɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ mo bo Pɔlu bɑ dirɑ. À nɑ sendɑ kukɑndi kɑlɑ ciini bindi.
Fitilɑ boobo goono jidɑmbisɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ go meigu.

Hɑiwɑsu fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Etiku go gɔrɔ jidɑmbisɑ fineti fɔ bɔm. Jiibi timɔ nɑ ɑ̀ dii. Kɑ Pɔlu mo nɑ himmɑ dɑm meecine gɑɑ, cɔfɔ jiibi nɑ hɑiwɑsu di zɑɑ. À kɑm zɑ jidɑmbisɑ di ŋmɔne fuu hinzɑntɛ. Beerem nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ bukɔ.
Pɔlu zumbu gɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ. À cii beerem sɛ: Wɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi.
Pɔlu ye kɑ kɑɑru kpɛɛnɛ kɑ buuru kɑ ǹ zenji zenji ŋmɑɑ. À sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ jɛ kɑlɑ mo bo. À bɑndɑ no, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
Beerem kɑɑndɑ hɑiwɑsu di ndɑ hundi. Ǹ du yɑmɑrɑndiyom hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
I jinɑ kɑ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei hɑli Aso kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ i bɑ Pɔlu zɑɑ. Yɑ no i sɑwɑrɑ zɑmɑ Pɔlu cii ngɑ mɑ kpei cee gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i kube Aso kpɑɑrɑ, i nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpei Mitilem wɑngɑrɑ.
Zɑ Mitilem, mo bo i tɔ Cio hɔndɛ tɑɑsi jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Mo yɑɑrɑ kɑ bo i tɔ Sɑmosu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi. I gɔrɔ bɑndɑ fɔ Togilum kpɑɑrɑ. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ i tɔ Miletu wɑngɑrɑ.
Pɔlu nɑ guuri zɑɑ mo ngɑ mɑ cɛsu kɑ bisɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ si ngɑ sɑɑlu wi Azi lɑɑbu. À gɑ sɑsɑ nɑ de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ ngɑ mɑ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Pɑntɛkotu jingɑru hine.
Zɑ Miletu wɑngɑrɑ Pɔlu nɑ bɔrɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ Efɛse Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom cɛɛ.
Kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bei zɑngɑ dimi ɑ nɑ gɔrɛ tɛ sɑɑ kulu wom gɑme zɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ nɑ cee dɑm Azi lɑɑbu.
Wom bei mo zɑngɑ ɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Kpe sɛ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ kulu. A tɑmtɛrɛ mo ndɑ mundi ndɑ tɑɑbi kɑ ɑ du Yuifu yom meetosi yom sɑbu sɛ.
Wom bei kɑ yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɑrikɑ gumɑndi wom sɛ. A nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ kɑ cooɑndi hɛ kulu bɔm hebu bɑtumɑ kunɑ ndɑ wom fuu yom kunɑ.
A tɛ sɛdɑ ndɑ himmɑ Yuifu yom sɛ ndɑ Gɑrɛku yom sɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ mɑ nɑɑne mo i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ bine, gunɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hini hɛɛ. Yerusɑlɛm no ɑ go kpei yɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ hɛɛ nodi.
Ammɑ ɑ go bei Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ cii seseri yom ndɑ tɑɑbi yom go kɑ ɑ bɑtu wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
Ammɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ hundi dɑm hɛ fɔ kulu zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ kɑlɑ yɑ ɑ bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne. Yɑ tɔnɑndi mo gbei kɑ ɑ du Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ gomini Bɑɑru Hinno sɛdɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ gɑnɑ wom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru fɛɛ. Mɑɑsɑ gunɑ, ɑ bei kɑ wom si di ɑ moodumɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
À sɛ no ɑ go sɛdɑ wom sɛ hunkunɑ kɑ cii ɑ hinne. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu bu bɑnɑndi si ɑ bɔm.
A cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ wom no Ikpɛ cɛbɛ kulu bɑɑru. Yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tugu ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm ndɑ kuru kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ wom jisi cendikɔ yom. Wom mɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ kurum, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dei ndɑ ngɑ bumbum kuri.
A go wɔne bei kɑ ɑ diro bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bu iburɑdɑm zɑngɑ sɑgɑli futu yom kɑɑ huro wom kunɑ. Ǹ si kuru bɑkɑɑ.
Wom bumbum kunɑ mo, iburɑdɑm yom kɑɑ tunu kɑ hɛ yom siirɑndi zɑmɑ ngei mɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cendi ngei bɑndɑ.
À sɛ no wom mo bɑtu. Wom mo hɔngɔ kɑ jiiri hinzɑ ɑ mɑnɑ cɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ndɑ himmɑ noyom ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. A nɑ ngɑ di tɛ ndɑ mundi.
Nyɑizei, mɑɑsɑ ɑ go wom tɑlifi Ikpɛ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gominɑ Sendi gɑɑ. Sendi wɔ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom nɑɑne cini. À gundɑ dɑbɑri mo kɑ wom no tubu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu bɑndɑ.
Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu ɑnzɛrɛfu dɑm ɑ bine wɑlɑ ɑ̀ wurɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom.
Wom bumbum bei kɑ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom wɔ no, ɑ nɑ gbei tɛ kɑ du hɛ kɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom go bɑɑ.
A nɑ wom cɛbɛ kɑ gbei yɑ wɔ dimi gɑɑ i mɑ hinɑbunu yom gɑɑ. I mo hɔngɔ Kpe Yesu sendɑ kɑ ngɑ bumbum cii: Noyom bɑrikɑ bisɑ tɑyom.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sendi nge yom di beeni, ɑ̀ sɔmbu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ǹ kulu bɑndɑ.
Ǹ kulu hɛ ndɑ hɛni kɔnnɔ. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ku ngei jɛndɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum.
Ǹ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ sendɑ kɑ Pɔlu cii ǹ si di ngɑ moodumɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dum kɑlɑ hɑrihi huroyom dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci tɔ i mɑ huro hɑrihi, i fee ndɑ cɛrɛ. I huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei susu Kosi hɔndɛ tɑɑsi. À mo bo i tɔ Lodu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi. Zɑ Lodu mo i kɑɑ Pɑtɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
Zɑ Pɑtɑlɑ mo i du hɑrihi fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go degɑndi kɑ kpei Finiciɑ lɑɑbu. I huro ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑ kpei.
Kɑ i nɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi hunne i nɑ ɑ̀ cɛsu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm kɑmbɛwo hɛrɛ kɑ Siriɑ lɑɑbu fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. I zumbu Tiru kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ nungu di no hɑrihiɑ go kɑ ngɑ jɛrɔ yom zumɑndi.
Kɑ i nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑru kpɑɑrɑ di, i gɔrɔ ndei jiribi iye. Ǹ cii Pɔlu sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ i nɑ jiribi iye tɔnɑndi, i tunu kɑ dirɑ. Ǹ kulu ndɑ ǹ wɛndɛ yom ndɑ ǹ koo yom nɑ i dum kɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɑndɑ. I sɔmbu tɛkuɑ mee gɑɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
À bɑndɑ kɑ i nɑ cɛrɛ too i huro hɑrihi kunɑ. Ngei mo ye fuu.
Sɑɑ kɑ i dirɑ kɑ hunu Tiru, i kɑɑ Putolomi kpɑɑrɑ. I nɑ kpɑɑrɑ di nyɑize yom fɔɔ. I gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ jiribi fɔ.
À mo bo i yom ndɑ Pɔlu tunu kɑ kɑɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ. I huro kɑ zumbu Filipu hundi. Filipu yɑ ci wɑɑzukɔ, nyɑize iye di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no.
À gundɑ koo hundiyo tɑɑci kɑ ǹ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Ǹ si hɑru bei.
I nɑ jiribi yom tɛ ko gɔrɔ nungu di. Andebi fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Agɑbo kɑɑ i dɔ.

Sɑɑ kɑ Agɑbo kɑɑ i dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Pɔlu kunɑcendi zɑɑ kɑ ngɑ cee yom ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom hɔ. À cii: Yɑ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no kunɑcendi wɔ, zɑngɑ yɑ no Yuifu yom gɑ ɑ̀ hɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ i mɑɑ yɑ di i yom ndɑ hundi di kulu bɔrɔ yom nɑ Pɔlu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
À gɑɑ no Pɔlu tu kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɛ kɑ ɑ bine sɑrɑndi? Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ sɔlu ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ mɑ ɑ hɔ hinne sɛ bo, ɑmmɑ kɑ yɑ bu Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Zɑ kɑ i mɑnɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ, i dɛnjɛ kɑ cii: Kɑlɑ Kpe binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ.
Jiribi nge yom di bɑndɑ, i sɔlu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ coobɑɑbɑize fɔ yom mo nɑ i gɑnɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ coobɑɑbɑize zeenɔ fɔ ngei bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Mɑnɑsɔ i mɑ zumbu ɑ̀ dɔ. Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔrɔ no.
Kɑ i tɔ Yerusɑlɛm, nyɑize yom nɑ i kube ndɑ fɑihã.
À mo bo Pɔlu huro ndɑ i yom Yɑkɔfu hundi. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom mo kulu kɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu nɑ ǹ fɔɔ, ɑ̀ deede ǹ sɛ ɑfɔ fɔ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ dimi cindei dɔ ngɑ gbei gɑɑ.
Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑ di ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ cii Pɔlu sɛ: Nyɑize, n di zɑngɑ Yuifu yom kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu dubu yom nɑɑne. Ǹ kulu mo gundɑ himmɑ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ.

Ǹ bine mɑɑ kɑ n go Yuifu yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono dimi cindei lɑɑbu cooɑndi kɑ cii ǹ mɑ fee ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ. Ǹ mɑɑ bɑɑru mo kɑ n cooɑndi ǹ mɑ si ngei koo yom dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ mɑ si Yuifu yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom gɑnɑ mo.
To. Mɑɑsɑ mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ? Kɑlɑ de Yerusɑlɛm gɑnɑkɔ yom kulu mɑ meigu, zɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ n kɑɑ nee.
À sɛ no, n mɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ i go cii n sɛ. Bɔrɔ tɑɑci goono i sɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli zɑɑ ngei bɔm.

N mɑ huro ǹ kunɑ kɑ n bɔm hinnɑndi ndei. N mɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom bɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ ngei bɔm yom cobu. À gɑɑ no bɔrɔ kulu kɑɑ du kɑ bei kɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ cii n gɑɑ tɑngɑri no. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ di kɑ ni mo, n go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.

Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ nɑɑne i hɑntum kɑ cii ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ si wɔne tɛ. Ammɑ i nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm jɛ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tooru gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm jɛ mo ndɑ kuri ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ kɔtɛ kɑ wi ndɑ zinɑ.
À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ mo bo Pɔlu nɑ ngɑ bɔm hinnɑndi ndɑ bɔrɔ tɑɑcɑ. À bine huro ndei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ bɑɑru no sɑɑ kɑ hinneyom hɑnu yom kube ǹ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ jiribi iye di bɑ kube, cɔfɔ Azi Yuifu yom di Pɔlu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ kulu zukum ǹ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Pɔlu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ dii.

Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ i gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ di neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ beerem cooɑndi nungu kulu. À gɑ cii ǹ mɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ Nungu wɔ mɑ. Ngɑ mɑ yɑ kɑɑndɑ Gɑrɛku yom Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ wɔ ziibɑndi.
Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di cii nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ di Tolifim Efese bɔrɔ fɔ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ Pɔlu bɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ tɑmmɑ hɑli Pɔlu kpeindɑ Tolifim Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ nɑ.
Wɑngɑrɑ di bɔrɔ kulu dirigo. Beerem gɑ zuuru kɑ kɑɑ kɑ meigu. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑ kɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ hundi mee yom dɑɑbu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi, bɑɑru tɔ wɑnguize yom ŋmɔne hɑikusu fɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kulu butugu.

Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ wɑnguize hɑikusɑ nɑ wɑnguize yom ndɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune yom zɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei jɑmɑ dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ wɔ di wɑnguize yom hɑikusu ndɑ wɑnguize yom kulu, ǹ cɛ ndɑ Pɔlu kɑruyomɑ.
Cɔfɔ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mɑɑni kɑ Pɔlu dii. À nɑ wɑnguize yom nɑ mei ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ nyɔri hinkɑ. À nɑ Pɔlu hã ngɑ yɑ mee nɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɛ.

Ammɑ jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kuwɑ kɑ hɛ fɔ cii. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni. Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ si bei ndɑ cimi hɛ kɑ Pɔlu cii kɔsɔngu sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ǹ nɑ mei ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu wɑnguize yom fuu kunɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ Pɔlu fuuɑ mee cee dɛcɛyom dɔ jine, cɔfɔ wɑnguize yom nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ jɑmɑ di bine bugubugu sɑbu sɛ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ Pɔlu gɑnɑ. Ǹ gɑ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ bɑ Pɔlu dɑm wɑnguize yom fuuɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ cii wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ sɛ: N tu ɑ sɛ yɑ hɛ fɔ cii n sɛ bɑ? Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ tu kɑ cii: N ŋmɑɑni Gɑrɛku cinɛ bɑ?
Ni yɑ ci Eziputu bɔrɔ di kɑ jiribi yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ tunɑndi kɑlɑ n butugu. Ni yɑ ci bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ dubu tɑɑci gɑnji kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Ammɑ Pɔlu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ Yuifu no, Tɑlisu wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ. Hɛɛ yɑ Cilici lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ no, wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ zɑm bɛɛrɛ. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ tu ɑ sɛ yɑ sendi jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ.
Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ. Pɔlu cɛ fuuɑ mee cee dɛcɛyom dɔ bɔm kɑ kɑmbɛ sombu jɑmɑ di sɛ. Kɑ beerem dɛnjɛ sɑkɑi, ɑ̀ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ.
À cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ yɑ ɑ jinde deede mɑɑsɑnkulu wom dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendi ngei sɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ cɔfɔ ǹ hinsɑ kɑ dɛnjɛ kpɛɛnɛ.

Pɔlu cii: Hɛɛ yɑ Yuifu no, Tɑlisu wɑngɑrɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi, Cilici lɑɑbu. Ammɑ wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ biiri. Gɑmɑli yɑ nɑ ɑ cooɑndi cɑu cɑu ndɑ zɑngɑ i cɛɛ yom fɔndɑ goono ndɑ. Hɛɛ mo bine, ɑ gundɑ himmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ zɑngɑ wom kulu gundɑ hunkunɑ.
Hɛɛ mo, ɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ ǹ tɔ bu gɑɑ. A nɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom hɔ kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu.

Yɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bumbum go ci ɑ sɛdɑ ndɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kulu meiguɑntɛ. À du tirɑ yom ǹ dɔ Dɑmɑku nyɑize yom sɛ. A kpei Dɑmɑku kɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɔ. A kɑɑndei Yerusɑlɛm ǹ mɑ ǹ ciiti.
À kɑɑ tɔ ɑ goono fɔndɑ bɔm ko mɑɑni Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ zɑɑri zɑkɑ. Mefɔ mefɔ kɑɑri bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À hɑɑgɑ kɑ ɑ hundi.
A kɑm fɔndɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ go cii ɑ sɛ: Sɑuli, Sɑuli, ifɔ sɛ n go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi?
A tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni no mee Kpe? À cii ɑ sɛ: Hɛɛ no Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu kɑ n go guruguzɑndi.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ di kɑɑri di, hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii. Ammɑ ǹ si mɑɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ɑ sɛ di jinde.
A cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ no yɑ tɛ Kpe? Kpe cii ɑ sɛ: Tunu kɑ cɛ. N mɑ kpei Dɑmɑku. Wɑngɑrɑ di ǹ kɑɑ cii n sɛ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ jisi n mɑ tɛ.
Zɑ kɑ ɑ si hini kɑ di hɛ fɔ kulu kɑɑri di ŋmɔne deizɑ sɑbu sɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ bɑndɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ cendi kɑlɑ ɑ tɔ Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ sɛ Anɑni. Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ fɔ no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ. À sɛdɑ boori ndɑ Yuifu yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono nungu di ndɑ gɔrɛ.
À kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ cɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ: Nyɑize Sɑuli, n mɑ moo feeri. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ nɑ moo feeri. A di ɑ̀.
À cii: I cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ n dɑm n mɑ ngɑ binebɑɑ bei. À nɑ n dɑm n mɑ di Cɛsusukpɛ. N mɑ mɑɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ hunu ɑ̀ mee mo.
N kɑɑ ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ iburɑdɑm yom kulu dɔ, hɛ yom kulu kɑ n di ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ n mɑɑ bɔm.
Mɑɑsɑ ifɔ n go bɑtu? Tunu kɑ Kpe mɑɑ cɛɛ. Ǹ mɑ n mirɑndi. Ǹ mɑ n nyume n dulum yom gɑɑ.
À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm ɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. A di diyom fɔ.
A di Kpe. À go cii ɑ sɛ: Wɑɑsu, n mɑ hunu Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ wɑɑsi zɑmɑ beerem si n sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ tɑ.
A cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ngei bumbum bei kɑ ɑ cini huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne n gɑɑ dii. A cini kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu kɑ ǹ kɑru.
Sɑɑ kɑ n sɛdɑ Tifɑnu kuri bɑmbɑri, hɛɛ bumbum ɑ go cɛ ɑ̀ jine no. A tu mo ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. A go beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi jiine yom jɛ ǹ sɛ.
Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, zɑmɑ ɑ gɑ n dɔntɔm nungu mooru dimi cindei dɔ.
Jɑmɑ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Pɔlu sɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sendi ngɑ di cii. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ dimi kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. À mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ.
Ǹ go kuwɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ngei jiine yom kɔɔtu ko lɑɑbu kuu kɑ see bɛɛnɛ binetɔnɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Wɑnguize yom hɑikusu di nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu wɑnguize yom fuu. À cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hã ndɑ bulɑɑlɑ kɑ du kɑ bei sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ go kuwɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ yɑ wɔ dimi.
Ammɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ kuuru kɔrɔfɔ yom Pɔlu cii wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ gɑɑ: À hɑlɑli n mɑ Lomɑncɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri bulɑɑlɑ bɑ?
Sɑɑ kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ deede wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ sɛ. À cii: N mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ n bɑ tɛ wɔ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ di Lomɑncɛ no.
À gɑɑ nɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mɑɑni Pɔlu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni yɑ Lomɑncɛ no? Pɔlu cii: Oò.
Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mo cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ nɑ Lomɑncɛtɛrɛ dei no ndɑ nooru bɑmbɑtɑ. Pɔlu mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ hɛi.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ hãyom di tɛ, sunsunu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Hɑmburu nɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ dii zɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ Lomɑncɛ no ndɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ.

À mo bo, kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ bei cɑu cɑu hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri ŋyɔri yom gɑɑ. À nɑ fɔndɔ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ kulu mɑ meigu. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu zumɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ jine.
Pɔlu nɑ moo sinji Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom gɑɑ kɑ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, bine kunɑ sendi hinno kunɑ no ɑ go dirɑ Ikpɛ jine kɑlɑ kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu wɔ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Anɑni nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Pɔlu jɛrɛ gɑɑ no mei ǹ mɑ Pɔlu kɑru mee gɑɑ.
Pɔlu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ikpɛ gɑ n kɑru, ni yɛmbɛ kɑ ǹ kpɑrɑndi. N go gɔrɔ ko ciiti ɑ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ goono ndɑ. Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ ndɑ fɔndɑ n nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ ɑ kɑru?
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Pɔlu jɛrɛ gɑɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ikpɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ no n go woo fɑ.
Pɔlu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Nyɑizei, yɑ nɑ bei no hɑli gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N mɑ si hɛ lɑlɔ cii n jɑmɑ hinikpɛ sɛ."

Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Pɔlu bei ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom no, cindei mo Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ sendi ndɑ jinde beeri Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine. À cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, hɛɛ yɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ no, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ koo mo. Bukɔei tunɑndiyom bɛɛjɛ sɛ no ǹ go kɑ ɑ ciiti.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii cɔfɔ kɔsɔngu tunu Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom di ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom gɑme. Jɑmɑ di fee ihinkɑ.
Kɔsɔnguɑ tunu zɑmɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go cii tunɑndiyom si, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize si, biyɑ si. Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom wɔ go cii ǹ kulu goono.

Kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tunu. Moisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci Fɑrisi bɔrɔ yom tunu kɑ kɑkɔ. Ǹ cii: I yom wɔ, i mɑnɑ di hɛ fɔ lɑlɔ kulu bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ. Ammɑ de biyɑ fɔ wɑlɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ, i mɑ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ.
Kɑ butugu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tunu, wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ go hɑmburu hɑnibɑ ǹ mɑ Pɔlu pɑti. À sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom dɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ǹ bindi kunɑ. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu wɑnguize yom fuu dɔ.
À mo bo ciini cɔfɔ Kpe kɑɑ Pɔlu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Pɔlu, n mɑ himmɑ dɑm zɑmɑ zɑngɑ n kɑɑndɑ sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ Yerusɑlɛm, zɑngɑ yɑ n mɑ kpeindɑ ɑ sɛdɑ mo Lome wɑngɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ mo bo Yuifu fɔ yom nɑ meetosi tɛ kɑ cɛrɛ tilɑsi. Ǹ ze ngei bɔm gɑɑ kɑ ngei si ŋmɑɑ, ngei si hɑm kɑlɑ de ngei nɑ Pɔlu wi.
Ǹ bisɑ bɔrɔ weitɑɑci kɑ ǹ nɑ meetosi ngɑ di tɛ.
Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom dɔ. Ǹ cii: I nɑ i bɔm tilɑsi ndɑ zeyom kɑ i si hɛ fɔ kulu tɑbɑɑ kɑlɑ de i nɑ Pɔlu wi.

Mɑɑsɑ bine wom, ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom, wom mɑ sendi wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ sɛ subɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Pɔlu zumɑndi wom sɛ. Wom mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ bɑɑru fɔ no wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ du ɑ̀ dɔ cɑu cɑu. Hɑli ɑ̀ mɑɑni i sɔlu i mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
Ammɑ Pɔlu weimɑ ize mɑɑ meetosi di. À kpei huro wɑnguize yom fuu kɑ ɑ̀ deede Pɔlu sɛ.
Pɔlu nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cɛɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpeindɑ hɑiwɑsu wɔ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ dɔ. À gundɑ hɛ fɔ ɑ̀ deede ɑ̀ sɛ.
À kpeindɑ hɑiwɑsu di wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ dɔ kɑ cii: Kɑsuize Pɔlu yɑ nɑ ɑ cɛɛ kɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ yɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑiwɑsu wɔ n dɔ. À gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii n sɛ.
Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mo nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ye ndɑɑ̀ kɑmbu kɑ ɑ̀ hã: Ifɔ no n gundɑ n mɑ cii ɑ sɛ?
Hɑiwɑsu di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yuifu yom yɑ nɑ mefɔ tɛ ngei mɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ Pɔlu zumɑndi Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine subɑ. Ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ bɑɑru fɔ no ǹ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ du ɑ̀ dɔ cɑu cɑu.

Ammɑ ni wɔ, n mɑ si tu ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ bisɑ bɔrɔ weitɑɑci kɑ ǹ gɑ gum ko Pɔlu bɑtu. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm tilɑsi ndɑ zeyom kɑ ngei mɑ si ŋmɑɑ, ngei mɑ si hɑm kɑlɑ de ngei nɑ Pɔlu wi. Mɑɑsɑ ǹ sɔlu beeni. Alikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ hunu n dɔ hinne no ǹ go bɑtu.
Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ bine nɑ hɑiwɑsu di tɑm. À nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ mei kɑ cii: Hɛ yom kɑ n deede ɑ sɛ, n mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ cɛɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ sɔlu ndɑ wɑnguize zɑngu hinkɑ. Ǹ mɑ kpei Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ bɑrikɑri weiye ndɑ yɑɑjikpɛ zɑngu hinkɑ zɑ wiciri guuru ɛgɑ.
Ǹ mɑ bɑri yom sɔlu Pɔlu mɑ kɑɑru ɑfɔ bɔm. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu gɑndɑkpɛ Felisi dɔ bɑɑni.
Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ nɑ tirɑ wɔne hɑntum kɑ cii:
Hɛɛ Kolodu Liziɑ, hɛɛ yɑ go gɑɑbikoni Felisi hinno kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ ǹ kulu fɔɔ.
Yuifu yom yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ dii. Ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi, cɔfɔ ɑ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ ndɑ wɑnguize yom. A nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ gɑɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ Lomɑncɛ no.
Kɑ ɑ bɑɑ yɑ mɑɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ, ɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ ǹ ŋmɔne ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine.
A bine di kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ fɔndɑ. À mɑnɑ hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi, wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɔ.

A bine du bɑɑru Yuifu yom nɑ meetosi fɔ tɛ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. À sɛ no ɑ wɑɑsu wɑɑsu kɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ n dɔ. A nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑkɔ yom mo no mei ǹ mɑ cii n jine hɛ kɑ sɛ ngei go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ. Too. N mɑ gɔrɔ bɑɑni.
Wɑnguize yom bine nɑ Pɔlu zɑɑ mei kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ no bɔm. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ ciini kunɑ Antipɑti kpɑɑrɑ.
À mo bo ǹ nɑm bɑrikɑri yom kpei Pɔlu bɑndɑ. Wɑnguize yom mo ye ngei fuuɑ dɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑri yom tɔ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ ǹ nɑ tirɑ di no gɑɑbikoni di sɛ. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu mo cɛbɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Kɑ gɑɑbikonɑ nɑ tirɑ di coo ɑ̀ nɑ Pɔlu hã lɑɑbu kɑ bɔrɔ no. Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Siliciɑ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ:
A kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sã n sɛ sɑɑ kɑ n tɔnyɑkɔ yom kɑɑ.
À tɛ jiribi gu cɔfɔ Anɑni kɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑɑ. Yuifu mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ sendi ŋmɑɑnikɔ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɛtule goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Tɛtule kɑɑndɑ tɔnyɑ gɑɑbikoni di jine kɑ simbɑ Pɔlu.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ Pɔlu cɛɛ, Tɛtule sinti ko Pɔlu tɔnyɑ. À cii: E Felisi, n dɔ no i du lɑɑkɑli kɑne bɑmbɑtɑ. N diyom gɑɑ mo n kɑɑndɑ hɑnfɑni i lɑɑbu wɔ kunɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
I go kɑ ǹ tɑ mo ndɑ sɑɑbuyom sɑɑ kulu nungu kulu kunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ n moorɑndi. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kunɑ n mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ i mɑ sendi cɛnɑ cii.
I di bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ sendi sɑrɑkɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ go lɑɑbuɑ fɔndɔ yom hunguɛ dɑm Yuifu yom kunɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ di godo di ŋmɔne bɔm.
À wetere zɑti ngɑ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ziibɑndi, cɔfɔ i nɑ ɑ̀ dii. I bɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ simbɑ ndɑ i fɔndɑ.
Ammɑ Liziɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑnguize yom hɑikusu kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ i kɑmbɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ bisɑ ndɑɑ̀.
À bine nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑkɔ yom no mei ǹ mɑ kɑɑ n dɔ. N hini kɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ bei mɑm mɑm hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ sɛ i go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di nɑ mefɔ tɛ. Ǹ cii: Yɑ no sendɑ dirɑ ndɑ.
Gɑɑbikonɑ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sombu Pɔlu sɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ sendi. Pɔlu tu kɑ cii: A bei kɑ ni, n ci dimi wɔ ciitikɔ zɑ jiiri yom. A go kɑ ɑ jinde deede no ndɑ himmɑ.
Ni, n bumbum hini kɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bisɑ jiribi wei cindi hinkɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Ǹ mɑnɑ di hɛɛ yɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ wɑlɑ kɑ jɑmɑ zukum. A mɑnɑ ngɑ di tɛ bɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ wɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
Ǹ si hini kɑ tɑbɑtɑndi hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ mɑɑsɑ wɔ.

Ammɑ ɑ gɑ wɔne cii n sɛ. A gɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ zɑngɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ǹ cɛɛ godo goono ndɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑntumɑntɛ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom kunɑ, ɑ gɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
A gundɑ bɛɛjɛ Ikpɛ kunɑ. Bɛɛjɛ wɔ nɑ ngei bumbum gɑ bɑtu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ kɑɑ bukɔ yom tunɑndi, cɛɑntɛ susu yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci cɛɑntɛ susu yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ ɑ gɑ kokɑri sɑɑ kulu yɑ du bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑli Ikpɛ jine ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ.
Jiiri bɑɑbɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ nɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑ sɑrɑɑ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndi yom tɛ ɑ dimi sɛ.
À kunɑ no Azi Yuifu fɔ yom nɑ ɑ gɑru hinnɑntɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ jɑmɑ si, kɔsɔngu si.
À himɑ Azi Yuifu yom mo mɑ kɑɑ nee n dɔ kɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ de ǹ gundɑ hɛ fɔ ndɑ hɛɛ.
Bɔrɔ wɔne yom mɑ cii de ǹ di gbei lɑlɔ fɔ ɑ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go cɛ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine.
Ǹ mɑɑ ɑ jinde kɑ ɑ zɑɑ kɑ sendi fɔ wɔ cii zɑ kɑ ɑ go cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ. A cii: Bukɔei tunɑndiyom sɑbu sɛ no ǹ go kɑ ɑ ciiti hunkunɑ wom jine.
Felisi go bei cɑu cɑu hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ nɑ sendɑ jɛ kɑ cii: Sɑɑ kɑ Liziɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑsiirɑ guni.
Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ mo Pɔlu bɑtu. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cini kɑ ɑ̀ no dɑɑmɑ cɛnɑ. À mɑ si ɑ̀ beerem gɑnji ǹ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ mo wɑlɑ kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Jiribi yom bisɑ, Felisi kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ Yuifu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Dusilɑ. À cii ǹ mɑ Pɔlu cɛɛ. Ngɑ mo nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Pɔlu sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ nɑɑneyom.

Pɔlu nɑ himmɑ dɑm ndɑ sendi cɛyom susu bɔm ndɑ bɔm hiniyom bɔm ndɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ Felisi hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À tu kɑ cii: Mɑɑsɑ n mɑ kpei jinɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ du lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ cii ǹ mɑ n cɛɛ.
Felisi gundɑ kunguzuru mo kɑ Pɔlu go ngɑ no nooru ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. À sɛ no ɑ̀ cini Pɔlu cɛɛ ngɑ mɑ fɑɑji ndɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ tɛ jiiri hinkɑ. Cɔfɔ Pɔrisu Fesitu nɑ Felisi bɑrime. Kɑ Felisi go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni Yuifu yom sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ Pɔlu nɑm kɑsu kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Fesitu tɔ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ lɑɑbu, jiribi hinzɑ bɑndɑ ɑ tunu Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bine ndɑ Yuifu yom jinɑ yom kɑɑndɑ tɔnyɑ Pɔlu bɔm.
Ǹ nɑ Fesitu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tu ǹ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Pɔlu sɑmbɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ammɑ ǹ go meetosi fɔ tɛ ngei mɑ Pɔlu wi fɔndɔ bɔm.
Fesitu bine cii ǹ sɛ kɑ Kɑsɑriɑ no ǹ mɑ Pɔlu jɛ kɑ bɑtu zɑti. Ngɑ bumbum, ngɑ dirɑ Kɑsɑriɑ subɑsi.
À cii: Ngɑ di sɛ wom kunɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ yom mɑ kpei ɑ bɑndɑ. De tɑɑli fɔ goono bɔrɔ di gɑɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
À mɑnɑ gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ kɑ bisɑ jiribi wei. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpei Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Mo bo sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ngɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ Pɔlu.
Kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ Pɔlu Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ beri ndɑ tɔnyɑ lɑlɔ boobo kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ ǹ tɑbɑtɑndi.
Pɔlu mo nɑ ngɑ jinde deede. À cii: Yɑ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ hɛ fɔ kulu gɑɑ, wɑlɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ gɑɑ wɑlɑ Kɑisɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Fesitu mo go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni Yuifu yom sɛ. A nɑ Pɔlu hã kɑ cii: N tu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm bɑ, ǹ mɑ n ciiti wɑngɑrɑ di ɑ jine hɛ nge yom di bɔm?
Ammɑ Pɔlu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑisɑ ciitiyom dɔ jine no ɑ go cɛ, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ ciiti ɑ sɛ. Yɑ nɑ tɑɑli fɔ kulu tɛ Yuifu yom sɛ. N bumbum, n go wɔne bei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.

De bine ɑ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ no wɑlɑ ɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ wi yɑ nɑ hungu buyom. Ammɑ de hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ go kɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cimi bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ. A kpeindɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Kɑisɑ dɔ.
Fesitu bine sɑwɑrɑ ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ tu Pɔlu sɛ kɑ cii: N ŋmɑɑrɛ Kɑisɑ bɔm. N kɑɑ kpei Kɑisɑ jine.
À tɛ jiribi yom cɔfɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Ajiripɑ ndɑ Belenise kɑɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Fesitu fɔɔ.
Ǹ nɑ jiribi yom tɛ ɑ̀ dɔ. Fesitu no Pɔlu sendɑ deede kpe di sɛ kɑ cii: Felisi nɑ kɑsuize fɔ nɑm nee wɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ wɔ goono Yerusɑlɛm, gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Yuifu mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ ɑ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ciiti.
Ammɑ ɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: À mɑnɑ ci Lomɑncɛ ɑlɑɑdɑ ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ciiti kɑ zeeri zɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ tɔnyɑ di mɑnɑ di ngɑ tɔnyɑkɔ yom moo ndɑ moo. Zɑngɑ yɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ ngɑ jinde deede tɔnyɑ gɑɑ.
À sɛ no sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ nee ɑ̀ mɑnɑ jɛ. À mo bo cɔfɔ ɑ gɔrɔ ɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm kɑ cii ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ di.
Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ di tɔnyɑkɔ yom go cɛ nungu di, ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ tɑmmɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ gundɑ kɑkɔ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ gɑnɑyom ndɑ Yesu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ Pɔlu cii siikɑ si, ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
A biti zɑngɑ ɑ tɛ kɑ du hɛ nge yom di bɑɑru. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hã de ɑ̀ tu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ciiti hɛ nge yom di bɔm.
Ammɑ Pɔlu ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ngɑ nɑm kɑsuɑ kunɑ hɑli Kpe Agusitu mɑ sendi dumbu ngɑ bɔm. To. A nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu hɑli ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Kɑisɑ dɔ.
Ajiripɑ cii Fesitu sɛ: Hɛɛ bumbum ɑ bɑɑ yɑ hɑngɑ dɑm bɔrɔ di sɛ. Fesitu tu kɑ cii: Subɑ n hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.

À mo bo Ajiripɑ ndɑ Belenise kɑɑ ndɑ kpetɛrɛ tɑkɑmɑ yom ndɑ lijimɑ. Ǹ huro fuu fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ cini gɔrɔ kɑ sɑwɑrɑ ndɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusu yom ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ di jinɑ yom. Fesitu nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ Pɔlu.
Fesitu cii: Kpe Ajiripɑ ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ nee, wom go di bɔrɔ kpɛ. À bɔm no Yuifu tutumɑ zɑ Yerusɑlɛm kɑlɑ nee go cii ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ mɑnɑ di hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ngɑ bumbum mo bine cii ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ ngɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Kpe Agusitu dɔ. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Agusitu dɔ.
Ammɑ ɑ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ siikɑ kɑ yɑ hɑntum Kɑisɑ sɛ kɑ simbɑ bɔrɔ di. À sɛ nɑ ɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ wom jine hɑli yɑ mo ni Kpe Ajiripɑ, sɑɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ hã yɑ du hɛ kɑ ɑ hɑntum.
À mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ bɔrɔ mɑ kɑsuize sɑmbɑ de ɑ mɑnɑ hɑntum kɑ cii hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
Ajiripɑ cii Pɔlu sɛ: Ǹ tu n sɛ n mɑ sendi n bɔm sɛ. Cɔfɔ Pɔlu nɑ kɑmbɛ sombu kɑ ngɑ jinde deede.
À cii: Kpe Ajiripɑ, ɑ kɑɑni ɑ sɛ yɑ ɑ jinde deede n jine hunkunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ ndei.
Hɑli yɑ mo kɑ n gundɑ beire kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Yuifu yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom ndɑ ǹ hãyom bɔm. À sɛ no, ɑ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ ndɑ suuru.
Yuifu yom kulu go bei zɑngɑ ɑ goonoyom bɑrɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsu. Ǹ go bei zɑngɑ ɑ goono zɑ sintine ɑ dimi kunɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑ jɛyom. Ǹ hini kɑ cii mo de ǹ tu kɑ sɛdɑ, kɑ ɑ ci Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ ko gɔrɔ ndɑ zɑngɑ i gɑnɑyom cɑu cɑu goono ndɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ bine ɑ go cɛ nee ǹ mɑ ɑ ciiti ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ i cɛɛ yom sɛ bɛɛjɛ bɔm.
Alikɑwɑli di sɛ i dimi wei cindi hinkɑ go bɛɛjɛ sinji ngei kɑɑ tɔ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri mo no ǹ go tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ. E Kpe Ajiripɑ, bɛɛjɛ wɔ sɛ no Yuifu yom go kɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ.
Ifɔ sɛ no wom kunɑ beerem si dɑhirɑndi kɑ Ikpɛ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi dɑ?
Ngɑ di sɛ no ɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ bine kunɑ yɑ hɛ boobo tɛ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu mɑɑ ndɑ himmɑ.
A nɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ. A nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ boobo dɑm kɑsu sɑɑ kɑ ɑ du hini gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ǹ wi mo ɑ nɑ ɑ mee dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Ce boobo mo ɑ nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom bɔnɑndi mo Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kulu kunɑ. A nɑ ǹ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ Yesu mɑɑ cɛnɑndi. A bine futu mo ǹ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ ŋmɑni yom kunɑ.
Sɑɑ di no ɑ go kpei Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ du gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ.
E Kpe Ajiripɑ, zɑɑri bɔm bindi ɑ di kɑɑri fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À kɑɑri bisɑ weenu ŋmɔne. À nɑ ɑ hundi ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ bɑndɑ fɔndɑ bɔm.
I kulu kɑm gɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ go sendi ɑ sɛ cinɛ kunɑ. À cii: Sɑuli, Sɑuli, ifɔ sɛ no n go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi? À gɑɑbu n sɛ n mɑ gooruyom hɛ zi.
A cii: Ni no mee, Kpe? Kpe mo cii: Hɛɛ no Yesu di kɑ n go guruguzɑndi.
Ammɑ n mɑ tunu kɑ cɛ n cee gɑɑ. À sɛ nɑ ɑ fɑitɑ n sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ n tɛ gbeiteeri ndɑ sɛdɑ mɑ. N mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ yom kɑ n di gɑɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ gɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ n sɛ.
A gɑ n kɑɑ n dimi kɑmbɛ ndɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ dɔ ɑ gɑ kɑ n dɔntɔm mɑɑsɑ.

N mɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom feeri hɑli ǹ mɑ du kɑ bɛrɛ kɑ hunu kube kunɑ kɑ hurɑ kɑɑri kunɑ. Ǹ mɑ du kɑ hunu mo Setɑm dɑbɑri kunɑ kɑ ye Ikpɛ dɔ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du yɑɑfɑyom ngei dulum yom gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ du tubu mo nɑɑnekɔ yom bɑndɑ, nge yom kɑ Ikpɛ go kɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi.
À sɛ no Kpe Ajiripɑ, yɑ nɑ hungu kɑ diyom kɑ Ikpɛ cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ gɑnɑ.

Ammɑ ɑ cii Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ sintine ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Yɑ no ɑ cii Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ beerem sɛ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kulu beerem sɛ ndɑ dimi cindei sɛ mo. A cii mo ǹ mɑ gbei tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ tuubiyom.
Ngɑ di sɛ no Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ dii Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ko ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ wi.
Bine kɑ ɑ du gɑɑkɑsine zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ go cɛ nee hɑli hunkunɑ ko tɛ sɛdɑ icɛnɑ yom sɛ ndɑ ibeeri yom sɛ. A si hɛ fɔ kulu cii mo kɑlɑ wɔ kɑ ɑndebi yom ndɑ Moisi cii kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ.
Ngɑ yɑ ci kɑ kɑlɑ de Mɛsiyɑ mɑ guruguze. Ǹ mɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme ɑ̀ mɑ bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ ci kɑɑri fɛɛ Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ ndɑ dimi cindei sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi zɑngɑ yɑ di kɑ ngɑ jinde deede, cɔfɔ Fesitu cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Pɔlu, n sindɑ bɔm. N beire boobo go kɑ n bɔm see.
Pɔlu mo cii: À mɑnɑ ci ɑ bɔm yɑ see, Fesitu bɛɛrɛkpɛ. Ammɑ cimi sendi yom no ɑ go cii ndɑ lɑɑkɑli hinnɑ.
Kpe Ajiripɑ, ni kɑ n jine ɑ go sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ, n go hɛ nge yom di bei. A tɑbɑi n mɑnɑ zɑm kɑ ǹ bei zɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ wɔ tɛ tugu kunɑ.
E Kpe Ajiripɑ n go cimi no ɑndebi yom sɛ bɑ? A bei kɑ n go cimi no ǹ sɛ.
Cɔfɔ Ajiripɑ cii Pɔlu sɛ: N gɑ ɑ bɛrɛ hɑli cɛnɑ yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ fɑ.
Pɔlu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A go ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ hɑli bɑndɑ fɔ no wɑlɑ hɑli kɑ jɛ no, n mɑ ci zɑngɑ ɑ goono ɑmmɑ seseri yom bɑ si. À mɑnɑ ci n hinne, ɑmmɑ beerem kulu mo kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ hunkunɑ.
Kɑ ɑ̀ sendi kɑ beeni, cɔfɔ Kpe Ajiripɑ tunu kɑ cɛ ndɑ Fesitu ndɑ Belenise ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɔrɔ ndei.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu ǹ cii ngei cɛrɛ sɛ: Bɔrɔ di mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɔ.
Ajiripɑ mo cii Fesitu sɛ: N hini kɑ bɔrɔ di tɑm de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ ngɑ Kɑisɑ dɔ.
Ǹ sɑwɑrɑ kɑ cii i mɑ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ kpei Itɑli lɑɑbu. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ kɑsuize fɔ yom dɑm wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yuli. Ngɑ yɑ ci Agusitu wɑnguize yom ŋmɔne kuru fɔ jinehune.
Kɑ i hurɑ Adɑrɑmiti hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kpei Azi lɑɑbu cɛsu, i sinti ko dirɑ. Alisitɑku Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu, ɑ̀ goono ndɑ i yom.
À mo bo i tɔ Sidom kpɑɑrɑ. Yuli nɑ Pɔlu dii ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. À cini tu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom dɔ kɑ du sɑjoyom.
Kɑ i hunu nodi i nɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi cɛsu kɑ bisɑ zɑmɑ hɛo yɑ go kɑ i kube.
Sɑɑ kɑ i nɑ tɛkuɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni Siliciɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Pɑmfili lɑɑbu tooru kɑ bisɑ, i kɑɑ Milɑ kpɑɑrɑ Lisiɑ lɑɑbu.
Wɑnguize yom jinehune di nɑ Alɛsɑndiɑ hɑrihi fɔ gɑru nodi kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei Itɑli lɑɑbu. I huro ɑ̀ kunɑ.
I tɛ jiribi yom tɛku bɔm ko kpei mɔsɔ mɔsɔ. Kɑlɑ dɑcɑti i du kɑ tɔ Kinide kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ hɛo nɑ i gɑnji i mɑ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi. I bisɑ Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Sɑlimone lɑɑbu.
Kɑlɑ dɑcɑti no i nɑ ɑ̀ cɛsu kɑ bisɑ. I kɑɑ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gumɑme dɔ Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni kpɑɑrɑ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑse.
Lɔkɑci boobo bisɑ kɑ bɑ hɑrihi funuyom gundɑ kɑtɑru. Meehɔ wɑtɛ bisɑ kɔ. À gɑɑ no Pɔlu nɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑɑru.
À cii: Hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ go di kɑ hɑrihi wɔ funuyom gundɑ kɑtɑru. À kɑɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑsɑrɔ boobo, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci jɛrɔ yom sɛ ndɑ hɑrihiɑ hinne sɛ bo ɑmmɑ i hundi yom sɛ mo.
Ammɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune wɔ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm funukɔɑ ndɑ hɑrihiɑ ŋmɔne hɑikusɑ sɛ kɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ Pɔlu go cii sɛ.

Kɑ gumɑme di si boori konguzɑgɑ wɑtɛ, jɑmɑ di bɑyom sɑwɑrɑ kɑ cii ngei mɑ bisɑ nungu di. De ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ ǹ mɑ tɔ Finiciɑ Kɛlɛtu gumɑme kɑ yeeni tɛ nungu di. Kɛlɛtu gumɑme go gunɑ weenukɑne kɑ kpei kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ cɛnɑ ndɑ weenukɑne kɑ kpei kɑmbɛwo hɛrɛ cɛnɑ.
Weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ hɛo bɑɑnɔ fɔ go fɑɑru mɔsɔ mɔsɔ. À gɑɑ no, ǹ tɑmmɑ hɛ kɑ ngei miilɑ di ngei hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no. Ǹ nɑ kɔɔrɔ tunɑndi kɑ Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ jobu cɛsu kɑ bisɑ.
Hɑli cɛnɑ cɔfɔ hɛo futu fɔ mɑ tunu kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Elukilidom.
Hɛo di nɑ hɑrihi di zɑɑ kɑlɑ hɑrihiɑ bɔm si hini kɑ kpei jinɑ. I nɑm hɛo di kɑɑndɑ i yom.
I gɑnɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsi cɛnɑ fɔ mɑ sɛ gɑndɑ hɛrɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Kolodɑ. I tɑɑbi kɑ du hɑrihi cɛnɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne.

I nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɑrihi beerɑ bɔm. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑndi ndɑ kɔrɔfɔ yom kɑ ɑ̀ wuliwɑli. Ǹ go hɑmburu hɑnibɑ ngei mɑ kpei kɑm Siliti tɑɑsi kunɑ. À sɛ no ǹ nɑ hɑrihiɑ tɑɑfɛ yom zumɑndi kɑ nɑm hɛo di mɑ kpeindɑ ngei.
Ammɑ hɛo nɑ i teeni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À mo bo ǹ nɑ hɑri hi jɛrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑ kɑ turu.
Jiribi hinzɑntɛ i nɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm kɑ hɑrihi di jiine fɔ yom kɑɑ kɑ furu.
I tɛ jiribi boobo kɑ i mɑnɑ di weenu ndɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom. Hɛo di gundɑ gɑɑbi kɑ i kɑru kɑlɑ i nɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑɑ fɑɑbɑ gɑɑ.
Zɑ jɛyom ǹ mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Pɔlu cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ kɑ cii. To. Hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ himɑ dom wom mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ. De yɑ no, dom wom si hunu Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ kunɑ kɑ huro hɑlɑciyom ndɑ hɑsɑrɔ wɔ kunɑ.
Mɑɑsɑnkulu ɑ go wom no himmɑ. Wom mɑ himmɑ dɑm zɑmɑ wom hundi bɑ ɑfɔ si hɑlɑci kɑlɑ hɑrihiɑ ngɑ hinne.
Hɛɛ yɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. A go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ mo. Ciini wɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
A cii: Pɔlu, n mɑ si hɑmburu. Dɑhiri no n mɑ cɛ Kɑisɑ jine. Gunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ n no beerem wɔ kulu kɑ ni ndei goono hɑrihi wɔ kunɑ.
À sɛ no hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ himmɑ dɑm zɑmɑ ɑ go nɑɑne Ikpɛ. A bine go bei mo kɑ hɛ ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize nɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ dɑhiri no ǹ mɑ i cetu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi fɔ bɔm.
Ciini wei cindi tɑɑcɑntɛ hɛo go kɑ i feeni Adiɑtiku tɛkuɑ bɔm. Ciini bindi hɑrihi di gbeiteeri yom tɑmmɑ hɑli i mɑɑni gɑndɑ fɔ dɔ no.
Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ neesiji dɑm. À tɛ jɛndɛ wɑrɑnkɑ. Ǹ bisɑ kɑ tɔ jinɑ cɛnɑ. Ǹ nɑ neesiji dɑm kpɛɛnɛ. À ye jɛndɛ wei cindi gu.
Ǹ go hɑmburu hɑnibɑ hɑrihiɑ mɑ kpei gofu tondi gɑɑ. À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ bɑndɑ di ŋmɔne kɔɔrɔ tɑɑci tɑm hɑri kunɑ ko lɑɑkɑli dɛcɛ mo boyom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ hɑrihiɑ gbeiteeri yom ceeci ngei mɑ zuuru. Ǹ nɑ hɑrihi cɛnɑ zumɑndi tɛkuɑ bɔm. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ hɑrihiɑ bɔm dɔ hɛrɛ kɔɔrɔ yom zumɑndi tɛkuɑ kunɑ hɑli jinɑ.
Cɔfɔ Pɔlu cii wɑnguize yom jinehune ndɑ wɑnguize yom sɛ: De beerem wɔ si gɔrɔ hɑrihi wɔ kunɑ wom si hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Cɔfɔ wɑnguize yom nɑ hɑrihi cɛnɑ kɔrɔfɔ yom dumbu kɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
Kɑ mo bɑ bo Pɔlu nɑ ǹ kulu suurɑndi ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. À cii: Hunkunɑ wom jiribi wei cindi tɑɑcɑntɛ noyɑ kɑ wom mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ, wom goono bɑtuyom gɑɑ. Wom mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu zɑɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go wom suurɑndi. Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ wom hundi yom sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ wom bɑ ɑfɔ bɔm hɑmini fɔ si hɑlɑci.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ. À nɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ǹ kulu jine. À nɑ buuru zenji kɑ sinti kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Ǹ kulu du kɑ himmɑ dɑm. Nge yom mo ŋmɑɑ.
I bɔrɔ zɑngu hinkɑ ndɑ weiye cindi idu bine no hɑrihi di kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu, ǹ nɑ mɔsɔngu kɑɑ kɑ furu tɛkuɑ kunɑ ǹ mɑ hɑrihiɑ time zobu.
Mo bo ǹ mɑnɑ lɑɑbu di bei ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ tɛku jinde fɔ hunne kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ tɑɑsi. À sɑbɑ ǹ sɛ de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ ngei mɑ hɑrihiɑ cɛɑndi nungu di.
Ǹ nɑ kɔɔrɔ yom feeri kɑ tɑm tɛkuɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ guuru fɔ yom mo dumbu kɑ filɑfili yom tɑm. Ǹ nɑ tɑɑfɛ fɔ mo hɔ hɑrihiɑ jine hɛo mɑ ɑ̀ fum gumɑme di dɔ hɛrɛ.
Ammɑ ǹ fɑku gɑndɑ fɔ gɑɑ tɛku jindɑ dɔ nungu kɑ tɛku hinkɑ meigu, cɔfɔ hɑrihiɑ gofu, jine di cɛ. Tɛku boosu yom futu mo nɑ bɑndɑ ceeri ceeri.
Wɑnguize yom lɑsɑbu ngei mɑ kɑsuize yom wi zɑmɑ ǹ hɑmburu hɑnibɑ ɑfɔ yom mɑ zi kɑ zuuru.
Ammɑ wɑnguize yom jinehunɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Pɔlu fɑɑbɑ. À hungu wɑnguize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ ngei miilɑ tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no mei beerem kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑni ziyom, ǹ mɑ sɑru kɑ huro tɛkuɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei jobu gɑɑ.
Cindei mo kpei kpɑtɑko yom bɔm. Afɔ yom mo kpei hɑrihiɑ zɛnjɛ fɔ yom bɔm. Yɑ no ǹ kulu tɛ kɑ tɔ tɛrɛ bɑɑni.
Sɑɑ kɑ i du kɑ hunu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ no i du kɑ bei kɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsi di mɑɑ no Mɑliti.
Mɑliti bɔrɔ yom nɑ i kube ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ hinno. À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kɑ beerem cini tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ nini funsu i sɛ hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑm ndɑ yeeni sɑbu sɛ.
Pɔlu nɑ tuuri kɑmbɛ kɔgɔ fɔ yom kuu kɑ dɛcɛ ninɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ gɑzɑmɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ nini dunguɛ hunu kɑ kɔtɔ Pɔlu kɑmbɛ gɑɑ.
Mɑliti bɔrɔ yom di gondi go kɔtɔ Pɔlu kɑmbɛ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ cii ngei cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ sɛ: À sindɑ siikɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ bɔrɔ wikɔ no zɑmɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ tɛkuɑ kunɑ, ciiti mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ.
Pɔlu nɑ gondɑ kɔkɔbɛ nini kunɑ. À mɑnɑ mɑɑ doori fɔ kulu.
Beerem bɑtu ɑ̀ mɑ funsu wɑlɑ mefɔ mefɔ Pɔlu mɑ kɑm bukɔ. Ammɑ kɑ ǹ bɑtu kɑ jɛ ǹ di hɛ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ du ɑ̀. Ǹ nɑ lɑsɑbu bɛrɛ kɑ cii Pɔlu yɑ ikpɛ fɔ no.
Gɑndɑ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni nungu di. Gɑndɑ di hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ beeri fɔ ŋmɔne no. Bɔrɔ di mɑɑ no Pubiliyu. Ngɑ yɑ nɑ i kubeni kɑ i zumɑndi ngɑ dɔ kɑlɑ jiribi hinzɑ. A nɑ i yotɛrɛ tɑ hinno.
Pubiliyu bɑɑbɑ bine go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse ndɑ nyɔnyɔ. Pɔlu kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
Sɑɑ kɑ ngɑ di tɛ, cɔfɔ zɛnjɛkom cindei mo kɑ ǹ goono hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ bɔm kɑɑ. Ǹ du bɑɑni mo.
Nge yom mo nɑ bɛɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ i sɛ. Bine, sɑɑ kɑ i tunu kɑ bɑ dirɑ hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑndɑ i sɛ hɛ yom kɑ i gundɑ ǹ bɑnji.
Hɑndu hinzɑ bɑndɑ i huro kɑ dirɑ Alɛsɑndiɑ hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ yeeni tɛ nungu di. Hɑrihi di gundɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Tɑwei sɛdɑ.
I tɔ Silɑkuze kpɑɑrɑ. I gɔrɔ kpɑɑrɑ di jiribi hinzɑ.
Zɑ Silɑkuze i hundi kɑ kɑɑ Lezium kpɑɑrɑ. Jiribi fɔ bisɑ, cɔfɔ weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ hɛo di tunu. Jiribi hinkɑntɛ i kɑɑ Puteoli kpɑɑrɑ.
I nɑ nyɑize yom gɑru kpɑɑrɑ di. Ǹ nɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ gɔrɔ ngei dɔ jiribi iye. À gɑɑ nɑ, i kpei Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Lome nyɑize yom mɑɑ i bɑɑru, ǹ nɑ i kube. Ǹ hunu kɑ kɑɑ hɑli kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑ ǹ cii ǹ sɛ Apiyu Hebu ndɑ Yo Fuu Hinzɑ. Kɑ Pɔlu di ei ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. À du himmɑ mo.
Sɑɑ kɑ i tɔ Lome wɑngɑrɑ wɑnguize yom jinehunɑ nɑ kɑsuize yom dɑm bɑtukɔ wɑnguize yom ŋɔne hɑikusu kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu Pɔlu wɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ngɑ fɔ ndɑ wɑnguize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu.

À tɛ jiribi hinzɑ, Pɔlu nɑ Yuifu yom jinɑ yom cɛɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ meigu ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ i dimi gɑɑ wɑlɑ i cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ǹ nɑ ɑ dɑm kɑsu Yerusɑlɛm kɑ ɑ dɑm Lomɑncɛ yom kɑmbɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ hã kɑ beeni, ǹ bɑɑ ngei mɑ ɑ tɑm zɑmɑ tɑɑli fɔ kulu si ɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ wi.
Ammɑ Yuifu yom hungu. À tilɑsi ɑ gɑɑ yɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Kɑisɑ dɔ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ yɑ ɑ dimi beri.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ nɑ wom cɛɛ noyɑ. Yɑ du kɑ di wom kɑ sendi wom sɛ zɑmɑ Isirɑilɑ bɛɛjɛ sɑbu sɛ no ǹ nɑ nyɔri wɔ dɑm ɑ gɑɑ.
Ngei mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I mɑnɑ du tirɑ yom zɑ Yuifu yom dɔ kɑ simbɑ ni. Nyɑize yom mo kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ deede wɑlɑ kɑ hɛ lɑlɔ cii n bɔm.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i sɛ i mɑ mɑɑ n dɔ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci n lɑsɑbu. Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ godo wɔ i go bei kɑ nungu kulu no ǹ go hunguɑ̀.

Ǹ no hɑnu fɔ jisi Pɔlu sɛ. Bɔrɔ boobo bine kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu. À nɑ bɑɑru cii ǹ sɛ kɑ tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛdɑ. Zɑ susubɑ kɑlɑ wiciri ɑ̀ go ceeci ngɑ mɑ ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ simbɑ Yesu. À go kɑ ǹ cɛbɛ Yesu bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ goono Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum yom kunɑ.
Hɛ yom kɑ Pɔlu cii nɑ ɑfɔ yom bɛrɛ. Cindei mo mɑnɑ nɑɑne.
Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ, ǹ hunu Pɔlu dɔ. Kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei Pɔlu nɑ sendi fɔ wɔ cii: Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sendi ihinno kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑndebi Esɑyi dɔ i cɛɛ yom sɛ.
Esɑyi cii: "Kpei dimi wɔ dɔ kɑ cii: Mɑɑyom gɑɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ, ɑmmɑ wom si fɑhɑm bɑ cɛnɑ. Gunɑyom gɑɑ wom kɑɑ di, ɑmmɑ wom si fɑyɑnkɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.

Dimi wɔ bine yɑ sendi. Hɑngɑ sɛndɔ yom no. Ǹ nɑ ngei moo yom dɑɑbu. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ ǹ kɑɑ di ndɑ ngei mɑɑ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ mɑ ndɑ ngei hɑngɑ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ fɑhɑm mo ngei bine yom dɔ kɑ ye kɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ hɑli yɑ ǹ nɑ bɑɑni."
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ fɑɑbɑ wɔ dimi cindei sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ. Ǹ bine kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm bɑɑru wɔ sɛ. [
Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu nɑ nge yom di cii, Yuifu yom di hunu. Ǹ go kɑkɔ ndɑ cɛrɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.]
Pɔlu gɔrɔ jiiri hinkɑ sukutum fuu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑyɑ kunɑ. À nɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kube.
À go kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru fɛɛ. À cooɑndi mo ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɛ yom bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɑnji.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ cɛɛ yɑ tɛ diyɑ. À nɑ ɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi mo ngɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɛ.
Ikpɛ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ zɑ dom ngɑ Sendi hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ngɑ ɑndebi yom dɔ.
Bɑɑru di sendi Ikpɛ Ize bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Dɑfidi hɑɑmɑ gɑɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu dɑhirɑndi ndɑ dɑbɑri kɑ Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme gɑɑ.
À dɔ no i du gomini ndɑ diyɑtɛrɛ hɑli hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ beerem mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ nɑɑne dɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Wom goono ǹ kunɑ, wom kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ cɛɛ.

A go wom kulu fɔɔ, wom kulu kɑ wom goono Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ. Wom kɑ wom ci Ikpɛ binebɑɑkɔ yom, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ mo wom mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo goono wom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Sintine jinɑ, ɑ go kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ wom kulu sɛ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ wom nɑɑne bɑɑru kpei nungu kulu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
A go tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑ bine kunɑ ɑ̀ Ize Bɑɑru Hinnɑ gbei kunɑ. Ikpɛ yɑ ci ɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ si cɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom wom sɛ ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
A go kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ mo sɑɑ kulu Ikpɛ binebɑɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ fɔndɔ feeri ɑ sɛ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ zɑngɑ no kulu.
A gundɑ guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ di wom. A go bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom fɔ wom sɛ, wom mɑ du kɑ sinji kɑ boori.
A go bɑɑ i mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ wom gɑme ndɑ nɑɑne fɔlɔnku kɑ go kɑ i meigu, hɛɛ ndɑ wom.
Nyɑizei, ɑ si bɑɑ wom mɑ zɑm kɑ ɑ miilɑ bei. Sɑɑ kulu ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ zɑmɑ yɑ du bɑrikɑ fɔ yom mɑ kɑ kɔsu wom kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ du dimi cindei kunɑ. Ammɑ hɑli mɑɑsɑ yɑ nɑ du fɔndɔ.
Hɛɛ wɔ gɑrɔkoni no zɑ Gɑrɛku yom dɔ hɑli ɑnne yom dɔ hɑli hɑikusu yom dɔ hɑli fɑhɑm zɑmkɔ yom dɔ.
Zɑngɑ yɑ guuri kɑ ɑ gundɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ ci yɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu wom sɛ mo, wom kɑ wom goono Lome wɑngɑrɑ.
A sindɑ hɑwi ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne sɛ, sintine Yuifu yom, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ dimi cindei.
Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kunɑ no cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ. A sinti nɑɑne gɑɑ kɑ kpei hɑli beenɑntɛ nɑɑne kunɑ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu go hunɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ zɑ bɛɛnɛ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu sɛ. Beerem nge yom di yɑ go cimi nɑɑni ndɑ ngei zɑm kɑ cɛsusu.
Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ hini kɑ bei Ikpɛ bɔm, ɑ̀ kpɑrɛ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ǹ sɛ.
Zɑ hɑndunyɑ tɑkɑyom Ikpɛ hɛ yom kɑ bɔrɔ si hini kɑ di zɑngɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni, ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ikpetɛrɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no ǹ goono. Beerem go di ei tɑkɑhɛ yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ sindɑ kɔbɛ.
Kɑ ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bei ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi zɑngɑ Ikpɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu, ɑmmɑ ǹ tɛ kɔnu noyɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ. Ǹ binei mo kɑ ǹ sindɑ lɑsɑbu, ǹ tɔ ndɑ kube.
Ǹ go cii ngei yɑ hɑikusu yom no, sɑmu yom bine no.
Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu kɑ fumbu deizɑ bɑrime ndɑ himɑi wɔne yom, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ fumbu ndɑ ciro yom ndɑ ceetɑɑcikpɛ yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom.
À sɛ no Ikpɛ mo nɑ ǹ dɑm ziibi kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ bineibɑɑi goono ndɑ, hɑli ǹ gɑɑhɑm bɛɛrɛ mɑ kɑm ǹ bumbum gɑme.
Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ cimi bɑrime ndɑ tɑngɑri. Ǹ nɑ tɑkɑhɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑkɑkɔ guribi, Tɑkɑkɔ kɑ sɑɑbuyom mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne, beeniyom si. Ami.
À sɛ no, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dɑm bɑɑyom futu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑwi kunɑ. Bɑ weibɔrɔ yom fee ndɑ ngei ɑlɑɑdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ gɑme. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɑrime ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ.

Yɑ no hɑibɔrɔ yom mo fee ndɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono weibɔrɔ ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑme. Hɑibɔrɔ go bine dɛcɛ hɑibɔrɔ gɑɑ hɑli bɑɑyom futu go kɑ ǹ tɔnu. Hɑibɔrɔ go hɑwi tɛ ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ kɑ du ngei dɛrɛyom bɑnɑndi ngei gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
Zɑngɑ bine ǹ hungu kɑ Ikpɛ beiyom jɛ ngei lɑɑkɑli yom kunɑ, Ikpɛ mo nɑ ǹ dɑm lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ kunɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ.
Ǹ tɔ ndɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu dimi kulu ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ. Ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom ndɑ zoji ndɑ zɑmbɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ ndɑ ciine ciine.
Kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom no. Ǹ bine go hungu Ikpɛ mo. Dondɑ cɛrɛkpɛ yom no. Tɔtɔkpɛ yom no, fɑɑrekpɛ yom ndɑ hɑnyɑ lɑlɔkpɛ yom no. Ǹ si ngei bɑhɛi yom mo gɑnɑ.
Lɑɑkɑli zɑmkɔ yom no. Ǹ si ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom. Ǹ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine. Ǹ si cɛrɛ yɑɑfɑ. Ǹ sindɑ suuji.
Ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ciiti bei kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ, ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ bu. Bɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei ngei bumbum go hɛ nge yom di tɛ. Ǹ bine go yee mo ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ.
À sɛ nɑ, e iburɑdɑm kɑ n go ciiti tɛ zɑngɑ n bɑrɑ ndɑ kulu n sindɑ kɔbɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ n ciiti bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ n go kɑ n bɔm ciiti kɑ zeeri noyɑ zɑmɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku yom no ni mo, n go tɛ.
I bine bei Ikpɛ ciiti wɔ cimi bɔm no ɑ̀ goono beerem kɑ ǹ go hɛ nge yom dimi tɛ gɑɑ.
E iburɑdɑm ni, n go beerem ciiti ndɑ hɛ kɑ n go tɛ. Ni bumbum mo, n tɑmmɑ n kɔmɑ Ikpɛ ciiti kɑmbɛ nɑ dee?
N go kɑ Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ gumo fɛntɛ nɑ bɑ? N go kɑ ɑ̀ suuru ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑtuyom kuku fɛntɛ no bɑ? N mɑnɑ bei no hɑli Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ wɔ ɑ̀ go kɑ n fum tuubiyom dɔ hɛrɛ no?
To. N gɔgɔsɛndi hɑli n hungu kɑ tuubi. N go binetɔnɛ meigu n bɔm sɛ noyɑ Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ hɑnu hine, hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ cimi kɑɑtɛrɛ.
"Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑkpɛ gbei yom goono ndɑ."
Beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei hinno yom tɛ ndɑ himmɑ ko deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si bu ceeci, ǹ sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni no.
Ammɑ lijimɑntei mɑ kɑ ǹ si cimi gɑnɑ kɑlɑ zɑm kɑ cɛyom susu, ǹ bɔm no Ikpɛ kɑɑ binetɔnɛ ndɑ binefute cɛbɛ.
Tɑɑbi bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi goono bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ bɔm, sintine Yuifu yom bɔm, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ dimi cindei bɔm.
Ammɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne goono bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei hinno tɛ sɛ, sintine Yuifu yom, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ dimi cindei.
Ikpɛ dɔ bɑɑbɑɑ si.
Beerem kulu mɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ, kɑ ǹ sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑlɑci, Moisi fɔndɑ si. Beerem mɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ Moisi fɔndɑ cire, Moisi fɔndɑ nɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti ndɑ.
Ikpɛ jine ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Moisi fɔndɑ sɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go Moisi fɔndɑ dɑm ngei tɛyom kunɑ, ngei nɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ cɛɑndi susu.
Dimi cindei sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ. Bɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ, ǹ go fɔndɑ hɛ yom gɑnɑ zɑngɑ ngei hɑɑli. Ǹ ci ngei bɔm sɛ fɔndɔ.
Ǹ gɑ cɛbɛ kɑ fɔndɑ gbei goono hɑntumɑntɛ ngei bine yom kunɑ. Ǹ bine kunɑ sendi mo go tɛ sɛdɑ. Ǹ lɑsɑbu yom mo go kɑ ǹ beri wɑlɑ kɑ hurɑ ǹ sɛ.
À kɑɑ tɛ hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ iburɑdɑm yom gunde yom kunɑ ɑsiiri yom ciiti Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ ɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ bɔm.
Gunɑ Yuifu mɑɑ no n gɑɑ. N gɑ gɔrɔ Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm. N gɑ fɑɑre ndɑ kɑ n gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bei.
N go kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bei. N go hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ jirimɑ neesi kɑ kɑɑ cɛrɛ zɑmɑ n du cooɑndiyom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ.
N go tɑbɑi n ci dɑnɑm yom cendikɔ kɑ tɛ kɑɑri beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono kube kunɑ.
N gɑ tɑmmɑ n go ci sɑmu yom cɛbɛkɔ, moobii yom coobɑɑbɑ zɑ kɑ n gundɑ beire ndɑ cimi fɔndɔ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ni kɑ n gɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cooɑndi, n go kɑ n bɔm cooɑndi fɑ? Ni kɑ n go bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ cii bɔrɔ mɑ si zee, n gɑ zee fɑ?
Ni kɑ n go cii bɔrɔ mɑ si zinɑ, n gɑ zinɑ fɑ? Ni kɑ n gɑ tooru fɛntɛ, n go huro kɑ tooru ŋmɑɑri zee fɑ?
Ni kɑ n go fɑɑre ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ, n si kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi fɑ kɑ n gɑ bɑ si ndɑ fɔndɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ nɑ bɑ?
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Dimi cindei gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ mɑɑ cɛnɑndi wom sɑbu sɛ".
Bɑngudɑmyom gundɑ hɑnfɑni de n gɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ de n gɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrum, n bɑngudɑmyom di ye zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu.
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm bɑngudɑmyom, de ɑ̀ go Moisi fɔndɑ sendikpɑrɛ yom gɑnɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ zɑngɑ bɑngudɑmyom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Bɔrɔ kɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu ɑmmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Moisi fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi ngɑ hɑɑli gɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ n ciiti. N gɑ fɔndɑ tirɑ biiriize kulu gɑnɑ. N gundɑ bɑngudɑmyom ɑmmɑ n go bɑ si ndɑ fɔndɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ Yuifutɛrɛ cɛbɛ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yuifu. Bɑngudɑmyom bine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bɑngudɑmyom hinne kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑɑbɑsi kunɑ.
Ammɑ Yuifu yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Yuifutɛrɛ bine kunɑ. Bɑngudɑmyom mo yɑ ci bine ŋmɔne biyɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci fɔndɑ tirɑ biiriize kunɑ. Yuifu sifɑyom si hunu iburɑdɑm yom dɔ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
Dee ifɔ yɑ ci Yuifu yom hɑnfɑni wɑlɑ ifɔ yɑ ci bɑngudɑmyom hɑnfɑni?
Zɑngɑ nɑ kulu, hɑnfɑnɑ beeri. Sintine ǹ gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Sendɑ tɑlifi.
Ifɔ no? de bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑnɑ nɑɑne, ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne gɑ Ikpɛ nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu no?
Awo, ɑ̀ si tɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ ci cimikpɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ci tɑngɑrikom. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Kɑlɑ n mɑ ci cimikpɛ n sendi yom kunɑ, n mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ mɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ n ciiti."
Ammɑ de i zɑm kɑ cɛsusu gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛyom susu feeri, ifɔ nɑ i mɑ cii? Ikpɛ mɑnɑ cɛsusu no sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ tɑm? À go sendi no ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm go cii.
Awo. À si tɛ. De yɑ no, mɛtɛ no Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti?
De ɑ tɑngɑri kunɑ Ikpɛ cimi bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ, ifɔ sɛ hɛɛ mo Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑ ciiti zɑngɑ dulumkoni?
Zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go wɔne hɑwɑ i gɑɑ kɑ cii i go cii: I mɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ hɑli ihinno mɑ du kɑ kɑɑ. Beerem nge yom di wɔ, ǹ ciitiyom kɑ zeeri sɑbɑ.
Mɛtɛ no? I gundɑ bɛɛrɛ fɔ kɑ bisei no? Bɑ cɛnɑ. I tɑbɑi Yuifu yom ndɑ dimi cindei kulu goono dulum cire.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu si, bɑ ɑfɔ.
Fɑhɑmkpɛ si, bɑ ɑfɔ. Bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ ceeci.
Ǹ kulu kɑmbɑ, ǹ kulu meigu kɑ tɛ kɔnu. Bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ihinno tɛ, bɑ ɑfɔ.
Ǹ jinde kɑrɑ yom bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ sɑɑrɛ feerɑntɛ. Ǹ dɛɛnɛ yom mo no ǹ go gbei ndɑ, kɑ bɔrɔ zɑmbɑ. Gɑzɑmɑ nɑɑji nɑ ǹ mee yom kunɑ.
Ǹ mee yom tɔ mo no ndɑ lɑɑliyom ndɑ hɔɔti.
Ǹ cee yom wɑɑsu mɑ kɑ kpei bɔrɔ wi.
Hɑlɑciyom ndɑ kɑito goono ǹ fɔndɔ yom kunɑ.
Ǹ si lɑɑkɑli kɑne fɔndɔ bei.
Ikpɛ hɑmbure si ǹ mɑɑ yom jine."

I bine bei hɛ kulu kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ go cii, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ cii no beerem kɑ ǹ goono fɔndɑ cire sɛ. À go kɑ ɑ̀ cii no beerem kɑ ǹ goono fɔndɑ cire sɛ zɑmɑ iburɑdɑm mee kulu mɑ dɑɑbu, hɑndunyɑ mo kulu mɑ ye Ikpɛ ciiti cire.
À sɛ no fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ, bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi susu ngɑ jine. Fɔndɑ dɔ no dulum beiyom hunu.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑɑtɛrɛ, cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ. À mɑnɑ hunu Moisi fɔndɑ dɔ. Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebei tirɑ yom tɛ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ.
Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ goono Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. À goono beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne. Fɑyɑnkɑyom si.
Bɔrɔ kulu nɑ dulum tɛ. Ǹ bine gɑziɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi susu noyom bɔm ngɑ gominɑ gɑɑ fɑnsɑyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Ngɑ nɑ Ikpɛ cɛbɛ zɑngɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ sɑsɑbɑndiyom sɛ ɑ̀ kuri dɔ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑɑtɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ suuru kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑm dulum yom kɔsu.
Zɑngɑ yɑ no mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu cɛbɛ kɑ ngɑ yɑ Cɛsusu no. À go bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ mo cɛɑndi susu.
Dee mɑni sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ bɔrɔ mɑ fɑɑre? Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Ndɑ fɔndɔ fɔ? Ndɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom tɛgbei yom? Awo, ndɑ nɑɑne fɔndɔ.
À sɛ no i go lɑsɑbu Ikpɛ gɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu no nɑɑne gɑɑ, Moisi fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom si.
Ikpɛ wɔ Yuifu yom hinne ŋmɔne no? À mɑnɑ ci dimi cindei mo ŋmɔne no? Oò, dimi cindei mo ŋmɔne Ikpɛ no.
Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ gɑ bɑnguize yom cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ. À go zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize yom mo cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, i gɑ fɔndɑ tɛ kɔnu nɑɑne dɔ no? Awo. Kɑlɑ i go fɔndɑ gɔrɛndi dee.
Ifɔ no i mɑ cii i cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ du kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm?
De Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɑndi susu fɔndɑ tɛgbei gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ fɑɑre ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ jine.
Ifɔ no Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii? À cii: "Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ".
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ, ǹ si bɑnɑndi lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ gomini, ɑmmɑ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑkpɛ mɑ du.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ go bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ cɛɑndi susu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si gbei tɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ go cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ.
Yɑ no Dɑfidi go bɔrɔ fɔ bɑrikɑ deede, bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ Ikpɛ go cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ, fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom si. À cii:
"Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ǹ ilɑlɔ tɛyom, beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dulum yom dɑɑbu mo.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ no, bɔrɔ kɑ Kpe si dulum lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ."
Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bɑnguize yom hinne sɛ no dee wɑlɑ ndɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize yom mo sɛ? I go cii Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛɑndiyom susu.
Mɛtɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ? À bɑngu huroyom bɑndɑ nɑ dee wɑlɑ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hurɑ bɑngu nɑ? Zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hurɑ bɑngu no. À goono ngɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ.

À du bɑngudɑmyom ɑlɑmu zɑngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu sɛdɑ dɑmyom noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du nɑɑne gɑɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑɑne kɑ ǹ goono zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ci ǹ sɛ bɑɑbɑ. Ikpɛ mɑ du kɑ cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ngei mɑ sɛ.

À mɑ ci bɑɑbɑ bɑnguize yom sɛ mo. À mɑnɑ ci bɑnguize hinne sɛ bɑɑbɑ bɑ, ɑmmɑ ndɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ go dirɑ kɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne lɑwɑli gɑnɑ. Nɑɑne wɔ nɑ Abulɛmɑ gundɑ zɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɑndunyɑ tubukɔ. À mɑnɑ ɑlikɑwɑli di tɛ Moisi fɔndɑ dɔ ɑmmɑ cɛɑndiyom susu dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ.
De Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom tɛ tubukɔ yom, nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu noyɑ. Alikɑwɑlɑ mo si hɛ fɔ kulu jɑrɑ.
Moisi fɔndɑ wɔ binetɔnɛ no ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ. Nungu kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ si, fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom mo si nodi.

À sɛ no, ɑlikɑwɑli goono nɑɑne gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono gomini dɔ hɑli ɑlikɑwɑli mɑ tɑbɑi ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kulu sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ hinne sɛ, ɑmmɑ ndɑ beerem mo sɛ kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne zɑngɑ Abulɛmɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci i kulu sɛ bɑɑbɑ.

Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A nɑ n gɔrɛndi dimi boobo sɛ bɑɑbɑ". Abulɛmɑ ci i sɛ bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne. Ikpɛ wɔ yɑ go bukɔ yom no hundi. À go hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si, cɛɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ goono.
Abulɛmɑ gɑ bɛɛjɛ kɑ nɑɑne, bɑ kɑ bɛɛjɛ hɛ si. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ tɛ dimi boobo sɛ bɑɑbɑ, hɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ bɔm: "Zɑngɑ n bɑndɑ yom kɑɑ bɑrɑ noyɑ".
Abulɛmɑ mɑnɑ zɑm gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ. À mɑnɑ gunɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bu kɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri zɑngu. À mɑnɑ gunɑ mo kɑ Sɑhɑrɑ gunde bu, ɑ̀ si hɛi.
A mɑnɑ siikɑ kɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du gɑɑbi nɑɑne dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
À bei dɑhiri ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ, Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
À sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛɑndiyom susu.
À mɑnɑ ci ngɑ hinne sɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ cii Ikpɛ nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ i yom mo, i sɑbu sɛ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu i sɛ, i yom kɑ i gɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Ngɑ yɑ nɑ i Kpe Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ i tɑɑli yom sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ i cɛɑndi susu.
Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ, bɑɑni tɛ i yom ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
À dɔ nɑ i yom mo i du fɔndɔ kɑ huro gomini kunɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Gominɑ kunɑ no i go sinji kɑ boori. I go fɑihã mo kɑ bɛɛjɛ sinji Ikpɛ deizɑ gɑɑ.
Bɑ ngɑ di bɑ si, i go fɑihã mo bɑ kɑnkɑmi yom kunɑ ko bei kɑ kɑnkɑmi wɔ kokɑri no ɑ̀ cini hɛi.
Kokɑri mo go kɑɑndɑ dɑɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ bubure kunɑ. Dɑɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ mo go kɑɑndɑ bɛɛjɛ.
Bɛɛjɛ bine si bɔrɔ dɑm hɑwi pɑi, zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i no, ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine dooru i bine yom kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ i goono gɑɑbi si, lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ no Mɛsiyɑ bu beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
Kɑlɑ dɑcɑti bɔrɔ du kɑ bu bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu sɛ, ɑmmɑ hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ yɑru kɑ bu bɔrɔ hinno sɛ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛbɛ i sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ i goono ko ci dulumkoni yom, Mɛsiyɑ bu i sɛ.
Hɑli yɑ mɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɑndi susu Mɛsiyɑ kuri gɑɑ. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ gɑ i fɑɑbɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ kɑmbɛ Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Zɑ sɑɑ kɑ i gɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom ɑ̀ nɑ i yom ndɑ ngɑ sɑsɑbɑndi ɑ̀ Ize bu gɑɑ. Hɑli yɑ mɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i sɑsɑbɑndi, ɑ̀ gɑ i fɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ Ize hundi.
Bɑ nge yom di bɑ si mɑ, i gɑ fɑihã kpɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ kunɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ nɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i sɑsɑbɑndi.
Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ dulum huro hɑndunyɑ. Dulum mo sɑbu sɛ bu huro. À sɛ no zɑngɑ yɑ bu dirɑ bɔrɔ kulu bɔm zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu nɑ dulum tɛ.
Kɑlɑ Moisi fɔndɑ wɑtɛ dulum goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ si kɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ dulum sɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ si.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu bu dɑbɑri zɑ Adɑmu bɔm kɑlɑ Moisi bɔm. Bu dɑbɑri beerem bɔm kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ zɑngɑ Adɑmu ŋmɔne dimi. Adɑmu yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ yɑ kɑɑ himɑi.
Ammɑ gomini noyom cɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ dɛrɛyom wɔ. Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɛrɛyom gɑɑ jɑmɑ bu. Hɑli yɑ mo Ikpɛ gomini ndɑ gomini noyom kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, ngɑ di bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu jɑmɑ sɛ.
Ikpɛ noyom wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dulum tɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku tɑɑli kɑɑndɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Ammɑ Ikpɛ gomini noyom kɑɑ dɛrɛyom boobo bɑndɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu.
Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɛrɛyom gɑɑ bu go dɑbɑri bɔrɔ kulu bɔm. Yɑ mo beerem kɑ ǹ go du gomini ndɑ bɑyom ndɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu, ǹ kɑɑ dɑbɑri hundi kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ zɑngɑ dɛrɛyom fɔlɔnku gɑɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ. Yɑ no cɛyom susu tɛyom fɔlɔnku gɑɑ, cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ go hundi no ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo tɛ dulumkoni. Yɑ mo no bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku ŋmɔne gɑnɑyom kunɑ, Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo tɛ cɛɑntɛ susu.
Moisi fɔndɑ kɑɑ no zɑmɑ dɛrɛyom mɑ bɑ. Ammɑ nungu kɑ dulum bɑ, gomini bɑ kɑ bisɑ.
Dulum dɑbɑri bu kunɑ. Yɑ no gomini mo mɑ dɑbɑri cɛɑndiyom susu kunɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ i mɑ cii? I bo dulum tɛ zɑmɑ gomini mɑ bɑ sɛ?
Awo. À si tɛ. I yom kɑ i bu dulum sɛ, mɛtɛ i kɑɑ tɛ ko hunɑ kpɛɛnɛ dulum kunɑ?
Wom bei kɑ i kulu kɑ i du mirɑndiyom Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, ɑ̀ bu kunɑ no i du mirɑndiyom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Yɑ di gɑɑ ǹ nɑ i fiji ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mirɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ bu kunɑ. Zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme Bɑɑbɑ dɑbɑri deizɑkpɛ gɑɑ, yɑ no i yom i mo dirɑ hundi teji kunɑ.
Zɑ kɑ i tɛ ɑfɔ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ ɑ̀ bu himɑndi kunɑ, yɑ no i kɑɑ tɛ ɑfɔ ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom himɑndi kunɑ.
I gɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i bine kunɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ kɑnji Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dulum dɑbɑri hɑlɑci. Yɑ di gɑɑ i mɑ si tɑmtɛrɛ dulum sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bu, ɑ̀ kɔmɑ dulum kɑmbɛ noyɑ.
Bine, zɑ kɑ i bu Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ, i gɑ nɑɑne i kɑɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mɑ.
I gɑ bei Mɛsiyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, ɑ̀ si bu kpɛɛnɛ. Bu sindɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ.
Bu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, dulum sɛ no ɑ̀ bu ce fɔ pɑp. Ammɑ hunɑyom kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ, Ikpɛ sɛ no ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
Zɑngɑ yɑ wom mo, wɑ wom bɔm lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ bukɔ yom dulum sɛ. Wɑ wom bɔm lɑsɑbu wom yɑ hundikoni yom no Ikpɛ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si nɑm dulum mɑ dɑbɑri wom gɑɑhɑm yom kɑ ǹ bu bɔm hɑli wom mɑ ǹ bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ.
Wɑ si wom dɔbu yom no dulum sɛ zɑngɑ ilɑlɔ tɛyom hɛ. Ammɑ wɑ wom bɔm no Ikpɛ sɛ zɑngɑ bukɔ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ hunɑndi. Wom dɔbu yom mo, wɑ ǹ no Ikpɛ sɛ cɛyom susu tɛyom hɛ.
Dulum si ye kɑ dɑbɑri wom bɔm, zɑmɑ wom si fɔndɑ cire ɑmmɑ wom goono gomini cire.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, i mɑ dulum tɛ me, zɑmɑ i si fɔndɑ cire kɑlɑ gomini cire? Awo. À si tɛ.

Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ wom no wom bɔm no zɑngɑ tɑm yom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ, wom tɛ bɔrɔ di kpɛ tɑm yom noyɑ. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? De dulum sɛ no wom go wom bɔm no, bu dɔ no ɑ̀ kpeindɑ wom. De bine Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom sɛ nɑ wom go wom bɔm no, cɛɑndiyom susu dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ wom.
Ammɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom go ci dulum tɑm yom, wom nɑ cɛbɛ dimi fɔ gɑnɑ ndɑ bine fɔ, cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑm.
Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ dulum gɑɑ, wom tɛ cɛɑndiyom susu tɑm yom noyɑ.

Wom hɑɑli yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi, ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ go sendi zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom go cii. Wom nɑ wom dɔbu yom no zɑngɑ tɑm yom ziibi sɛ ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ sɛ kɑ kpei hɛ lɑlɔ boobo tɛyom kunɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ wom mɑ dɔbu yom no zɑngɑ tɑm yom cɛɑndiyom susu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom go ci dulum tɑm yom, cɛɑndiyom susu sindɑ dɑbɑri wom bɔm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ yom wɔ kɑ hɑwi go wom dii ndei mɑɑsɑ, dom di bɑrikɑ fɔ no wom du ǹ gɑɑ? Hɛ nge yom di beenɑntɛ yɑ ci bu.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ dulum gɑɑ. Wom tɛ ɑ̀ tɑm yom. Wom gundɑ wom bɑrikɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Dulum bɑnɑndi yɑ ci bu, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gomini noyom yɑ ci hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Nyɑizei, Moisi fɔndɑ bo dɑbɑri bɔrɔ bɔm no kɑlɑ ɑ̀ hundi mee. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Beerem kɑ ǹ go Moisi fɔndɑ bei, ǹ sɛ no ɑ go sendi.
Yɑ no Moisi fɔndɑ go weihiji hɔ ɑ̀ kunye gɑɑ de kunye di go hunɑ. Ammɑ de kunyɑ bu, wɛndɑ kɔmɑ fɔndɑ gɑɑ, fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ kunyɑ.
Ammɑ kunyɑ bɑhune kunɑ, de ɑ̀ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ ŋmɑni fɔ hiji, zinɑteeri no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ. Ammɑ de kunyɑ bu, ɑ̀ hunu fɔndɔ ngɑ di kunɑ noyɑ. À mɑnɑ ci zinɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ teji hiji.
A sɛ no ɑ nyɑizei, wom bu Moisi fɔndɑ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔ zɑmɑ wom mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɔne yom. Wom ci bɔrɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme ŋmɔne yom zɑmɑ i mɑ bɑrikɑ hɛi Ikpɛ sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ i goono dulum hɑɑli kunɑ dulum ŋmɔne bɑɑyom futei kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ nɑ ǹ fum, ǹ nɑ gbei tɛ i dɔbu yom kunɑ hɑli i mɑ nɑfɑ bu sɛ.

Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ, bu nɑ i feeri Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ zɑ kɑ fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i dii, i bu ɑ̀ dɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ i feeri i mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ fɔndɔ teji Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci fɔndɑ tirɑ biiriize yom kunɑ zɑngɑ dom di.
