Yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ i mɑ cii? Moisi fɔndɑ dulum no bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ. Ammɑ yɑ nɑ dulum bei de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ. Yɑ no ɑ mɑnɑ bɑɑyom futu bei de Moisi fɔndɑ mɑnɑ cii: "N mɑ si bɑɑyom futu tɛ".
Ammɑ kɑ dulum du dɑɑmɑ meire dɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɑɑyom futu dimi kulu hɛi ɑ̀ kunɑ. De Moisi fɔndɑ si, dulum mo si.
Hɛɛ wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono ɑ sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ, ɑ gɑ hunɑ. Ammɑ kɑ meire kɑɑ, dulum tɛ hundi. Cɔfɔ ɑ bu.
Meire mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi ŋmɔne, ɑ gɑru ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ bu ŋmɔne.
Kɑ dulum du dɑɑmɑ meire dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ zɑmbɑ ndɑ meire kɑ ɑ wi ndɑ meire.
À sɛ no, Moisi fɔndɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. Meire mo ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. À ci cɛsusu. À ci ihinno.

Yɑ di gɑɑ hɛ hinno di yɑ ye ɑ sɛ bu? Awo. À si tɛ. Ammɑ dulum dee, zɑmɑ dulum mɑ hunu tɛrɛ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci dulum ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ bu hɛ hinno gɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ hɑli meire dɔ dulum mɑ tɛ dulum hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
I go bei Ikpɛ dɔ no Moisi fɔndɑ hunu. Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ bineibɑɑi gɑnɑkɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ neerɑ yɑ tɛ tɑm dulum sɛ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ go tɛ, ɑ si kɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm. À si tɛ mo hɛ kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ bine go hungu, ngɑ nɑ ɑ gɑ tɛ.
De bine ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ si bɑɑ, ɑ go Moisi fɔndɑ tu noyɑ kɑ bei ihinno no.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ yɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑmmɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ nɑ.
À gɑ bei ihinno si ɑ kunɑ, wɑtom ɑ dulum hɑɑli kunɑ. À bine go bɑɑ ihinno tɛyom ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ ɑ̀ tɛyom dɑbɑri.
Ihinno kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑ si kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ilɑlɔ kɑ ɑ si bɑɑ, ngɑ no ɑ gɑ tɛ.
De ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ si bɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ yɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑmmɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ no.
Fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ du ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ noyɑ. À gɑ bɑɑ ihinno tɛyom ɑmmɑ ilɑlɔ goono ɑ kunɑ.
A go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ ɑ bine kunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ go di fɔndɔ ŋmɑni fɔ ɑ dɔbei kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑngɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ fɑhɑm go gɑnɑ. À gɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm mo tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ dulum fɔndɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ dɔbei kunɑ.
Kɑito, hɛɛ. Mee yɑ gɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ bu wɔ kɑmbɛ?
A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ kɑɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. À sɛ no fɑhɑm kunɑ ɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ dulum hɑɑli dɔ ɑ tɑmtɛrɛ dulum fɔndɑ sɛ.
À sɛ no, mɑɑsɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri si beerem sɛ no kɑ ǹ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go dirɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ dulum hɑɑli.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ fɑnsɑ dulum fɔndɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bu.

Hɛ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi dulum hɑɑli dɔ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. A nɑ ngɑ bumbum Ize dɔntɔm iburɑdɑm hɑɑli kunɑ zɑngɑ dulumkoni. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ ci gɑrɑndi hɛ dulum sɛ kɑ dulum hɑɑli ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ nɑ domi hɛ kɑ fɔndɑ go tilɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ i kunɑ, i yom kɑ i go dirɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ dulum hɑɑli.
Beerem kɑ ngei wɔ go dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ, dulum hɑɑli hɛ yom bɔm no ǹ lɑsɑbu goono. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ngei wɔ gɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑnɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɛ yom bɔm no ǹ lɑsɑbu goono.
Dulum hɑɑli wɔ lɑsɑbu yɑ ci bu. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑ lɑsɑbu yɑ ci hundi ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
Dulum hɑɑli lɑsɑbu wɔ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ sɛ. À si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ.
À sɛ no, beerem kɑ ǹ go dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom si dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ. Wom go Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑnɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ sindɑ Mɛsiyɑ Biyɑ, ɑkpɛ wɔ mɑnɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne.
Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ goono wom kunɑ, wom gɑɑhɑmei bu dulum sɑbu sɛ. Wom biyɑ mo go hunɑ no cɛɑndiyom susu sɑbu sɛ.

Ikpɛ Biyɑ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom gɑɑhɑmei kɑ ǹ goono bu bɔm hunɑndi mo. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, i mɑnɑ ci dulum hɑɑli gɑrɔkoni yom hɑli i mɑ hunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ dulum hɑɑli goono ndɑ.
De wom go hunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ dulum hɑɑli goono ndɑ, wom goono bu bɔm. Ammɑ de Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ wom go gɑɑhɑm tɛgbei yom wi, wom kɑɑ hunɑ.
Beerem kulu kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ go dɑm fɔndɔ, ngei wɔ Ikpɛ ize yom no.
À mɑnɑ ci tɑmtɛrɛ biyɑ no wom tɑ hɑli wom mɑ goono hɑmburu kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ikpɛ Biyɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ dɑmyom no wom tɑ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ i go kuwɑ, Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bumbum ndɑ i biyɑ gɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ i yom wɔ Ikpɛ ize yom no.
Zɑ kɑ i ci Ikpɛ ize yom, i ci tubukɔ yom mo. I ci Ikpɛ tubukɔ yom, tubukɔ yom mefɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ. Hɑli kulu i go tɑɑbi mefɔ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ, i yom mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ i nɑ deizɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
A diyom gɑɑ mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci tɑɑbi yom mɑnɑ tɔ sɑsɑbɑndiyom ndɑ deizɑ kɑ yɑ kɑɑ. Deizɑ wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ i kunɑ.
Tɑkɑhɛ kulu gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ize yom kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑtu ndɑ himmɑ.
Tɑkɑhɛ kulu ye gɑndɑ kɔnu cire. À mɑnɑ ye gɑndɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ.
Tɑkɑhɛ kulu go bɛɛjɛ kɑ ngɑ bumbum mo Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ fɑnsɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ fumbi gɑɑ. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no domi ngɑ mɑ huro Ikpɛ ize yom bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ deizɑ kunɑ.
I go bei tɑkɑhɛ kulu go dure ko tɑɑbi ndɑ hɛizɛnyɛ hɑli hɔ.
À mɑnɑ ci tɑkɑhɛ hinne. I yom mo, kɑ i gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɛijinɑ, i go dure i bumbum kunɑ. I go kootɛrɛ dɑmyom bɑtu wɑtom Ikpɛ gɑ i gɑɑhɑmei fɑnsɑ.
Bɛɛjɛ kunɑ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ. Bɛɛjɛ bine kɑ bɔrɔ go di ndɑ moo ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bɛɛjɛ. Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go di ndɑ moo, ifɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛjɛ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ?
Ammɑ hɛ kɑ i si di ndɑ moo, de i go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛjɛ tɛ i bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu no ndɑ suuru.
Yɑ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo go kɑ i gɑɑ i mɔngɔnɛ kunɑ. I si bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑduwɑ kunɑ. Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bumbum gɑ hurɑ i sɛ ndɑ binejisiyom kɑ mee si hini kɑ ɑ̀ cii.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bine yom kunɑ yɑɑse gunɑ, ɑ̀ go Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑsɑbu mɑ bei. À gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go huro hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ goono ndɑ.
Ammɑ i go bei Ikpɛ go hɛ kulu meigu kɑ tɛ bɑrikɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Nge yom no Ikpɛ cɛɛ mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ miilɑ goono ndɑ.
Beerem kɑ Ikpɛ bei kɑ jisi ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɔdɔrɔ ǹ mɑ ci ngɑ Ize himɑi. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no domi Izɑ mɑ ci sintine, nyɑize boobo kunɑ.
Beerem kɑ ɑ̀ kɔdɔrɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ mo. Beerem kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi susu mɑ. Beerem kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi susu, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no deizɑ.
Dee ifɔ i mɑ cii kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ? Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛ i sɛ, mee yɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom?
Cimi no, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ bumbum Ize bɑkɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ i kulu sɑbu sɛ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ̀ si i gomini hɛ kulu ɑ̀ bumbum Izɑ bɑndɑ?
Mee yɑ gɑ Ikpɛ suubɑntɛ yom beri? Ikpɛ yɑ gɑ cɛɑndi susu.
Mee yɑ gɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri? Mɛsiyɑ bu. Hɑli yɑ mɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mɑ. Ngɑ mo yɑ goono Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ hurɑ i sɛ.
Ifɔ yɑ gɑ i fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ i sɛ? Tɑɑbi no, wɑlɑ kɑnkɑmi wɑlɑ guruguze, wɑlɑ hɛrɛɛ wɑlɑ bɑnji wɑlɑ kɑtɑru wɑlɑ tɑkubɑ?
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N sɑbu sɛ ǹ go kɑ i dɑm bu kɑmbɛ mo kɑ ɑ̀ bo kulu. Ǹ go kɑ i himɑndi zɑngɑ fɑwɑ tɑndɑ feeji yom."
Ammɑ hɛ yom wɔ kulu kunɑ i gɑɑŋmɑɑ kɑ bisɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑyom, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ i yom dɔ.
A tɑbɑi hɛ kulu si hini kɑ i fee ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine. Zɑ bu, zɑ hundi, zɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom, zɑ meire yom, zɑ dɑbɑri yom, zɑ mɑɑsɑ hɛ yom, zɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ,
zɑ gure, zɑ lɔmɑ, zɑ tɑkɑhɛ ŋmɑni fɔ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si hini kɑ i fee ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ goono i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Cimi no ɑ go cii Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ɑ si tɑngɑri bɑ. A bine kunɑ sendi yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
A gundɑ binesɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ doori kɑ ɑ̀ bo goono ɑ bine kunɑ.
Hɛɛ bumbum ɑ bɑɑ yɑ tɛ lɑɑli kɑ fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ ɑ nyɑize yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci ɑ dimi yom gɑɑhɑm dɔ.
Ngei yɑ ci Isirɑilɑ ize yom. Ǹ ŋmɔne no kootɛrɛ dɑmyom kɑ ǹ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom. Deizɑ ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli hɔyom mo Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ no. À nɑ ǹ no Moisi fɔndɑ, ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom gbei ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom mɑ.
Ǹ ŋmɔne mɑ nɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom. Ǹ gɑɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunu gɑɑhɑm dɔ, Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɛ kulu bɔm. I go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi, beeniyom si. Ami.
À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɛ kɔnu no. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ hunu Isirɑilɑ gɑɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne yom.
Yɑ nɑ bɑ ǹ ci Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom, ǹ kulu mɑnɑ ci ɑ̀ ize yom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii: "Isɑɑkɑ kunɑ nɑ, n kɑɑ du bɑndɑ".
Wɑtom ize yom kɑ ǹ hɛi gɑɑhɑm dɔ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom. Ammɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ize yom no, Ikpɛ go lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ bɑndɑ yom.
Wɔne yɑ ci ɑlikɑwɑli sendi: "A kɑɑ kɑɑ yesi mɑɑsɑncine, Sɑhɑrɑ kɑɑ du kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ".
Bɑ ngɑ di bɑ si mo, Lɑbekɑ tɛ gunde bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ, i bɑɑbɑ Isɑɑkɑ.

Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu zɑ Lɑbekɑ mɑnɑ kɑɑ yom di hɛi, Ikpɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ. À sendi zɑ koo yom di mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ, ihinno wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ. À sendi hɑli Ikpɛ miilɑ mɑ sinji sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go suubɑ. À suubɑyom mɑnɑ ci tɛgbei yom bɔm, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go beerem cɛɛ bɔm.
Ikpɛ cii Lɑbekɑ sɛ: "Ize jine kɑɑ tɑmtɛrɛ icɛnɑ sɛ".
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A bɑɑ Yɑkɔfu, ɑmmɑ ɑ hungu Esɑu".
Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ i mɑ cii? Cɛyom susu zɑm Ikpɛ kunɑ no? Awo. À si tɛ.
À cii Moisi sɛ: "A suuji tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ go suuji miilɑ. A sisibi tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ gundɑ sisibi."
Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ si hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go bɑɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kokɑri gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go suuji tɛ.
Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii Fɑrɑɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Eziputu lɑɑbukpɛ sɛ: "A mɑ ɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ n kunɑ. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑli ɑ mɑɑ mɑ kpei hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ."
Yɑ di gɑɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ suuji tɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ sɛ. À go gɔgɔsɛndɛ mo dɑm bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ sɛ.
À sɛ no, n kɑɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ɑ beri hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Mee yɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ?
Ammɑ e iburɑdɑm, ni no mee kɑ n go kɑkɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ? Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ tɛ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ tɛkɔ hã: "Ifɔ sɛ no n nɑ ɑ tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ"?
Kusu tɛkɔ gundɑ dɑbɑri kusu lɑɑbu bɔm nɑ kɑ kusu bɛɛrɛkpɛ tɛ ndɑ kusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ kusu lɑɑbu fɔlɔnku gɑɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Bine, ifɔ i mɑ cii, de Ikpɛ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ cɛbɛ hɑli beerem mɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri bei, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ suuru bɑmbɑtɑ cɛbɛ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ bine tɔ, ngei yom kɑ ǹ sɔlu hɑlɑciyom sɛ?
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ hɑizici deizɑkpɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ beerem kunɑ kɑ ǹ du suuji. À nɑ ǹ sɔlu deizɑ sɛ kɔ.
Yɑ no, ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yuifu yom dɔ hinne ɑmmɑ dimi cindei dɔ mo.
Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii tirɑ kɑ ɑndebi Ose hɑntum kunɑ: "Jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ, ɑ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ ɑ jɑmɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ binebɑɑkɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ."
À kɑɑ tɔ nungu kɑ ǹ cii ǹ sɛ, "wom mɑnɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ, nodi nɑ ǹ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ ize yom."
Esɑyi mo kuwɑ Isirɑilɑ bɔm kɑ cii: "Bɑ kɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom kɑɑ bɑ zɑngɑ tɛku tɑɑsi, jɛrɛ fɔ cɛnɑ hinne yɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Kpe gɑ ngɑ sendɑ tɔnɑndi nɑ ndɑ wɑɑsi hɑndunyɑ bɔm."
Zɑngɑ Esɑyi jinɑ kɑ cii: "De Ikpɛ jɑmɑkpɛ mɑnɑ bɑndɑ nɑm i sɛ dɑm, i ye zɑngɑ Sodum wɑngɑrɑ, i kulu mɑ himɑ zɑngɑ Gomorɑ wɑngɑrɑ".
Dee ifɔ i mɑ cii? To. Dimi cindei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛɑndiyom susu ceeci ǹ du cɛɑndiyom susu. Cɛɑndiyom susu di hunu nɑɑne dɔ.
Ammɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu fɔndɑ ceeci, ǹ mɑnɑ tɔ cɛɑndiyom susu fɔndɑ gɑɑ.
Ifɔ sɛ? Isirɑilɑ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ ceeci no nɑɑne gɑɑ kɑlɑ fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑti kɑtiyom tondi gɑɑ.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Gunɑ, ɑ go kɑtiyom tondi ndɑ yɑnceyom tondi beeri jisi Sionɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɔɔ pɑi."
Nyɑizei, hɛ kɑ ɑ bine gɑ bɑɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci ǹ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
A go sɛdɑ ǹ sɛ kɑ ǹ gundɑ himmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci beire bɔm.
Ǹ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu bei ɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ ceeci kɑ ngei bɔm cɛɑndiyom susu sinji. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu sɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Moisi fɔndɑ mee cɛɑndiyom susu ŋmɔne bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne sɛ.
Moisi bine hɑntum kɑ simbɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu fɔndɑ dɔ kɑ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ ǹ kunɑ".
Ammɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu nɑɑne gɑɑ, ɑ̀ go wɔne cii: "N mo si cii n bine kunɑ, mee yɑ kɑɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ kunɑ? Wɑtom zɑngɑ ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ zumɑndi noyɑ.
Wɑlɑ n mɑ si cii: Mee yɑ kɑɑ zumbu guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ? Wɑtom zɑngɑ ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme noyɑ."
Ammɑ ifɔ ɑ̀ go cii? "Sendɑ tɔ n gɑɑ. À goono n mee kunɑ ndɑ n bine kunɑ, wɑtom nɑɑne sendɑ kɑ i go kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ."
Sendɑ yɑ ci, de n yɔɔdɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii ndɑ n mee Yesu yɑ ci Kpe kɑ nɑɑne n bine kunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, Ikpɛ gɑ n fɑɑbɑ.
Bine dɔ no bɔrɔ go nɑɑne kɑ du cɛɑndiyom susu. Mee mo no bɔrɔ go sɛdɑ ndɑ, kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii: "Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɔɔ".
Fɑyɑnkɑ si Yuifu yom ndɑ dimi cindei gɑme. Kpe fɔlɔnku yɑ ci ǹ kulu Kpe, hɑizicikpɛ no beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
Sendɑ cii: "Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛɛ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ".
Ngɑ di sɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ? Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru, mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ? Mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ mɑɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ?

Mɛtɛ ǹ bɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ mo de ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ dɔntɔm? Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Beerem go wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ bɔm. Ǹ go cii bɑɑni tɛ i yom ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme. Ǹ go kɑɑndɑ Bɑɑru fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ ŋmɔne. Beerem di cee yom goono fɑɑrɑntɛ no fɑ."
Ammɑ ǹ kulu mɑnɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ gɑnɑ. Zɑngɑ Esɑyi cii: "Kpe, mee yɑ nɑɑne i bɑɑru gɑɑ"?
Yɑ di gɑɑ, nɑɑne hunu mɑɑyom gɑɑ. Hɛ kɑ i go mɑɑ mo hunu Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ cii yɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci ǹ mɑɑ bɑ? Oò, ǹ mɑɑ. "Ǹ jinde yom kpei hɑli hɑndunyɑ mee. Ǹ sendei mo kpei kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee."
Ammɑ ɑ cii yɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci Isirɑilɑ bei bɑ? Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ sendi sintine, ɑ̀ cii: "A wom zukum hɑli wom mɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ dimi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ. A wom binei tunɑndi ndɑ dimi kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm fɑhɑm."
Esɑyi yɑru kɑ wɔne cii: "Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ ceeci, ǹ du hɛɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ, ɑ hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ."
Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Zɑɑri kuyom kulu ɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ jɑmɑ gɑɑ, jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hungu kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, jɑmɑ kɑ ǹ ci gɔgɔsɛndɔ yom".
Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ cii yɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ furu no? Awo. À si tɛ. Hɛɛ mo Isirɑilɑ ize nɑ, Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ, Benzɑmim dimiize.
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ furu, jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ jisi. Wom bei hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ go cii Eli bɑɑru kunɑ. À go wuuru wɔne tɛ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ Ikpɛ dɔ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ? A cii:
"Kpe, ǹ nɑ n ɑndebi yom wi. Ǹ nɑ n gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ yom zeeri. Hɛɛ hinne yɑ cindi. Ǹ bine go kɑ ɑ hundi ceeci."
Ammɑ ifɔ Ikpɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ yeti? À cii: "A nɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu iye jisi ɑ bɔm sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɔmbu tɑɑru jine, tooru kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑɑlɑ".
Yɑ nɑ, mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ, jɛrɛ fɔ cɛnɑ goono ndɑ zɑngɑ gomini suubɑyom goono ndɑ.
Bine, de gominɑ gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Yɑ di gɑɑ gomini mɑnɑ ci gomini kpɛɛnɛ. De bine tɛgbei yom gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci gomini gɑɑ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, tɛgbei mɑnɑ ci tɛgbei kpɛɛnɛ.
Ifɔ bine yɑ tɛ? Hɛ kɑ Isirɑilɑ go ceeci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du ɑ̀ ɑmmɑ suubɑntɛ yom wɔ du ɑ̀. Ikpɛ nɑ cindɑ mo no gɔgɔsɛndɛ.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ birikɑyom biyɑ. À nɑ ǹ nɑ moo yom kɑ ǹ si di, ndɑ hɑngɑ yom kɑ ǹ si mɑɑ hɑli kɑ kɑɑ hɔ."
Dɑfidi mɑ cii: "Kɑlɑ ǹ tɑbulu mɑ ci ǹ sɛ kuse, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ tɑɑru. À mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑtiyom hɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ bɑnɑndi.
Ǹ moo yom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kube hɑli ǹ si du kɑ di. Ǹ bɑndɑ dɑɑri yom mo mɑ goono kunkunɑntɛ wɑti kulu."
Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ cii yɑ, ǹ kɑti no ngei mɑ kɑm bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ. Ammɑ ǹ kɑtiyom gɑɑ no fɑɑbɑ tɔ dimi cindei dɔ kɑ ǹ zukum hɑli ǹ mɑ cɛnsɛ.
De bine, ǹ kɑtiyom tɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ bɑrikɑ, ǹ zobuyom mo tɛ dimi cindei sɛ bɑrikɑ. Yɑ mo ǹ kɑɑ tɔ ndɑ bɑyom.
Dimi cindei, wom sɛ no ɑ go sendi zɑ kɑ hɛɛ yɑ ci dimi cindei diyɑ. A go kɑ ɑ gbei bɛɛrɑndi.
A go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi hɑnibɑ ɑ hini kɑ ɑ dimi yom cɛnsɛ tunɑndi kɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom fɑɑbɑ.
De ǹ furuyom tɛ hɑndunyɑ sɑsɑbɑndiyom, mɛtɛ yɑ kɑɑ ci ǹ zɑɑyom kpɛɛnɛ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bukɔ yom gɑme hundi?
Zɑ kɑ hɛijinɑ tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ, yɑ no jɑmɑ mo. Zɑ kɑ tuuri kɑɑji tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ, yɑ no ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom mo bɑrɑ.
Ammɑ de ǹ nɑ olibe nyɑ kɑmbɛ fɔ yom dumbu, ni mo gɑnji olibe nyɑ, de Ikpɛ nɑ n dɔbu nyɑ hinno gɑɑ, n du bɑ kɑɑji gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tuuri ŋmɑɑrɑndi.
À sɛ nɑ, n mɑ si fɑɑre zɑngɑ n bisɑ kɑmbei kɑ ǹ dumbu no. De n fɑɑre, n mɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ni, n gɑ kɑɑjɑ jɛrɛ. Kɑɑjɑ yɑ gɑ kɑ n jɛrɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ no, n kɑɑ cii Ikpɛ nɑ kɑmbɛ yom dumbu nɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ dɔbu.
Ngɑ di cimi no. Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dumbu nɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ. Ni mɑ, n go sinji nɑɑne gɑɑ, n mɑ si fɑɑre ɑmmɑ n mɑ hɑmburu.
De Ikpɛ mɑnɑ olibe nyɑ hinno kɑmbɛ yom bɑkɑɑ, ni mo ɑ̀ si n bɑkɑɑ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑnyɑ fute. Hɑnyɑ fute nɑ kɑ simbɑ beerem kɑ ǹ kɑm, Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ mo no kɑ simbɑ ni, de n gɑ himmɑ tɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kunɑ.
Ngei mo bine, de ǹ si kɔkɔrɔ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne kunɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ dɔbu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ye kɑ ǹ dɔbu.
Ni, kɑmbɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n dumbu gɑnji olibe nyɑ gɑɑ kɑ n dɔbu olibe nyɑ hinno gɑɑ, hɑli yɑ mo, cerem kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ dɔbu no ǹ bumbum nyɑ gɑɑ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ si bɑɑ wom mɑ zɑm kɑ duje wɔ bei, wɑtom Isirɑilɑ jɛrɛ fɔ ɑ̀ bo goono gɔgɔsɛndɛ kunɑ, kɑlɑ dimi cindei kɑ Ikpɛ suubɑ mee ndɑ mee mɑ huro. Wom mɑ si wom bɔm gunɑ zɑngɑ hɑikusu yom.
Yɑ wɔ no, Ikpɛ gɑ Isirɑilɑ kulu fɑɑbɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Fɑɑbɑkɔ kɑɑ hunu zɑ Sionɑ. Zɑm kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ wɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ moorɑndi Yɑkɔfu.
Alikɑwɑli noyɑ kɑ ɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ ǹ dulum yom kɑɑ."
Kɑ simbɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ, ngei wɔ ibɛrɛ yom no wom sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ suubɑyom, Ikpɛ binebɑɑkɔ yom no ǹ cɛɛ yom sɑbu sɛ.
Ikpɛ gomini noyom ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛɛ yom, ǹ sindɑ no kɑ tɑ.
Wom mo, dom di wom mɑnɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. Mɑɑsɑ bine, bɛɛrem wɔ zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ gɑɑ wom du suuji.
Yɑ no, mɑɑsɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ domi suuji kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ wom sɛ gɑɑ ngei mo mɑ du suuji.
Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu dɑm kɑ dɑɑbu zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ kunɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ suuji tɛ ǹ kulu sɛ.
E, Ikpɛ hɑizici ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ beire, ǹ sindɑ mee fɑ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sijirɑ bei. Bɔrɔ si fɑhɑm mo ndɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ yom.
Mee yɑ nɑ Kpe lɑsɑbu bei "wɑlɑ mee yɑ ci ɑ̀ cɛbɛkɔ?
Wɑlɑ mee yɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ nɑ kɑ yeti?"
À dɔ nɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ sɛ no, hɛ kulu goono. Deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ suujɑ gɑndɑ, wɑ wom gɑɑhɑmei no zɑngɑ gɑrɑndi hundikoni, hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci wom gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
Wom mɑ si ci ɑfɔ mo ndɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni ɑmmɑ wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ mɑ wom bɛrɛ kɑ wom fɑhɑm tejɑndi. À gɑɑ no, wom mɑ du kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ binebɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno ndɑ ikɑɑnɔ ndɑ tɔɑntɛ.

Gomini kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ no kunɑ, ɑ go cii wom kunɑ ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ, bɔrɔ mɑ si gundɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ lɑsɑbu kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɑɑnɑndi ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑɑne neesiji goono ndɑ kɑ fɑrisi bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
Zɑngɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku kunɑ i gundɑ dɔbu boobo, dɔbu yom kulu mo gbei mɑnɑ ci ɑfɔ.
Yɑ no i yom, i goono iboobo ɑmmɑ i tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. I kulu go tɛ cɛrɛ dɔbu yom.
I kulu gundɑ noyom ŋmɑni ŋmɑni i mɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ, noyom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i gomini. De ɑndebitɛrɛ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i no, i mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ cine nɑɑne goono ndɑ.
De tɑmtɛrɛ gbei no, i mɑ moo no tɑmtɛrɛ gbei sɛ. De cooɑndiyom no, i mo cooɑndi.
De himmɑ noyom nɑ, i mo himmɑ no. De noyom no i mɑ nɑ ndɑ bine fɔ. De ɑ̀ nɑ i nɑ i mɑ tɛ jinɑ, i mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ himmɑ. De suuji dɑmyom no, i mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ fɑihã.
Bɑɑkɑsine mɑ si gundɑ munɑficitɛrɛ. Wɑ ilɑlɔ fɛntɛ. Wɑ hɔ ihinno gɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
Wɑ bɑɑni cɛrɛ sɛ zɑngɑ nyɑize yom gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛrɛ sɛ. Bɛɛrɛ tɛyom dɔ hɛrɛ wɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ.
Wɑ himmɑ dɑm, wɑ si yofune. Wɑ tɛ bɔrɔ dungɔ yom bine dɔ kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Kpe sɛ.
Wɑ fɑihã bɛɛjɛ kunɑ. Wɑ tɛ suurɑntɛ yom tɑɑbi kunɑ. Wo himmɑ dɑm ɑduwɑ gɑɑ.
Wom mo hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gɑɑkɑsine ǹ bɑɑyom kunɑ. Wo yotɛrɛ tɑ mɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go wom guruguzɑndi, wɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Wɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm, wɑ si lɑɑli.
Wɑ fɑihã ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go fɑihã. Wɑ hɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɛ.
Wɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku cɛrɛ gɑme. Wɑ si bine dɛcɛ hɛ beeri yom bɔm, ɑmmɑ wɑ lɑɑkɑli yeti icɛnɑ yom gɑɑ. Wɑ si wom bɔm gunɑ hɑikusu.
Wɑ si ilɑlɔ bɑnɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ. Wɑ miilɑ hinno tɛ bɔrɔ kulu jine.
De ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, zɑngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu wom dɔ, wɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ bɑɑni wom ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu gɑme.
A bine bɑɑkɔei, wɑ si fɑɑsɑ wom bɔm sɛ. Wɑ nɑm binetɔnɛ di mɑ ngɑ gbei tɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A ŋmɔne no fɑɑsɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ bɑnɑ". Kpe cii yɑ di.
Ngɑ di sɛ, "de n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ no ŋmɑɑri. De ɑ̀ mɑɑ jo, n mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri domi ngɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, n gɑ denji gusɑm ɑ̀ bɔm kunɑ noyɑ.
N mɑ si nɑm ilɑlɔ mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ n bɔm, ɑmmɑ n mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ndɑ ihinno tɛyom ilɑlɔ bɔm.
Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ zɑmɑ dɑbɑri si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Gɑɑbikoni yom kɑ ǹ goono, Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ ǹ jisi.
À sɛ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu hini, ɑ̀ go hungu Ikpɛ jisiri. Beerem kɑ ǹ go hungu mo, ǹ kɑɑ ciiti cendi ngei bɔm.
Gbei hinno tɛkɔ si hɑmburu gɑɑbikoni yom, ɑmmɑ gbei lɑlɔ tɛkɔ, ɑ̀ hɑmburei. N bɑɑ n mɑ si hɑmburu gɑɑbikoni bɑ? N mɑ ihinno tɛ, n kɑɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ sɑɑbuyom.

Gɑɑbikoni wɔ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri nɑ n hɑnfɑni sɛ. Ammɑ de n go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ, n mɑ hɑmburu. À mɑnɑ ci kɔnu kɔnu no ɑ̀ go ciiti tɑkubɑ zɑɑ. Ikpɛ gbeiteeri no, fɑɑsɑkɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bine bɑnɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ gɑɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ̀ tilɑsi bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci binetɔnɑ hinne sɛ bo, ɑmmɑ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi mo sɑbu sɛ.
À sɛ nɑ, wom go jɑngɑli yom bɑnɑ mo domi gɑɑbikoni yom wɔ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri yom no kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mo gbei ngɑ di tɛ.

Wɑ bɑnɑ ǹ kulu sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ǹ ŋmɔne. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no jɑngɑli, wɑ jɑngɑli bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Wɔ kɑ boode yɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne, wo ɑ̀ boode bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑmbure, wɑ hɑmburɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Wom mɑ si tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gɑrɔjindi, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cɛrɛ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ, ǹ nɑ fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi.

Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii neyɑ: "N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ. N mɑ si bɑɑ kɑ futu." Meire ŋmɑni mo kulu kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ goono, ɑ̀ goono sendi wɔne kunɑ: "N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm".
Bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ bɔrɔ si ilɑlɔ tɛ gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, bɑɑkɑsine wɔ yɑ go Moisi fɔndɑ kulu tɔnɑndi.
Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑ kɑ wom nɑ lɔkɑci bei. Lɔkɑci tɔ kɑ i mɑ tunu jiibi, zɑmɑ mɑɑsɑ i fɑɑbɑ mɑɑni i yom gumo kɑ bisɑ sɑɑ kɑ i nɑɑne.
Ciini beeri. Mo mɑɑni boyom. Yɑ di gɑɑ, i mɑ kube gbei furu kɑ kɑɑri wɑngu jiine yom zɑɑ.
I mɑ dirɑ ndɑ cimi zɑngɑ zɑɑri, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ hɑnɑsuɑ ndɑ bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ bɑɑyom futu ndɑ zoji ndɑ cɛnsɛ.
Ammɑ wɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ fɑkɑ. Wɑ si sɑɑle dɑm bineibɑɑi gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑyom futu yom tɛ.
Bɔrɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ tɑ kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ go nɑɑne ngɑ hini kɑ hɛ kulu ŋmɑɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ, ɑ̀ go kɔsu yom ŋmɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ fɛntɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ciiti, domi Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Ni nɑ mee, ni kɑ n gɑ gbeiize ŋmɑni ciiti? À cɛyom wɑlɑ ɑ̀ kɑmyom ɑ̀ Kpe sendi nɑ. À kɑɑ cɛ bo zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ cɛɑndi.
Bɔrɔ fɔ mo, hɑnu fɔ beeri ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ bisɑ hɑnu fɔ. Afɔ mɑ hɑnu yom kulu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑfɔ nɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne tɑbɑtɑndi ngɑ bine kunɑ.

Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑnu fɑyɑnkɑ, Kpe sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑnu fɑyɑnkɑ, Kpe sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ si fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ, Kpe sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ mo, Kpe sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
I kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ ngɑ bɔm sɛ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bu ngɑ bɔm sɛ.
De i go hunɑ, Kpe sɛ no i go hunɑ. De bine i bu no, Kpe sɛ no i bu. Ngɑ di sɛ, de i gɑ hunɑ no, de i go bu no, i yom yɑ Kpe ŋmɔne yom no.
À sɛ no, Mɛsiyɑ bu kɑ ye kɑ hunɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ ci Kpe bukɔ yom bɔm ndɑ hundikoni yom bɔm.
Ammɑ ni, ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ n nyɑize ciiti? Wɑlɑ ni, ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ n nyɑize fɛntɛ? I kulu kɑɑ cɛ Mɛsiyɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ jine.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A go hunɑ, Kpe cii yɑ di. Cɛnjɛ kulu kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ jine. Dɛɛnɛ kulu mo gɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi."
Yɑ di no, i kulu ɑfɔ fɔ, i gɑ i jinde deede Ikpɛ sɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, i mɑ si cɛrɛ ciiti kpɛɛnɛ, ɑmmɑ wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wɔne. Wɑ si tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm wom nyɑize mɑ dɛrɛ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɑɑli tɛ.
A bei, ɑ tɑbɑi mo Kpe Yesu kunɑ hɛ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑlɑli. Kɑlɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ fɔ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli, ɑ̀ si ci hɑlɑli bɔrɔ di sɛ.
De n nyɑize bine sɑrɑ ndɑ n ŋmɑɑri, n si dirɑ noyɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɑɑkɑsine goono ndɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ zeeri ndɑ n ŋmɑɑri, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ bu.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, wom mɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ ihinno kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom gɑɑ sendi yɑmu.
Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ wɔ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɑm ɑmmɑ cɛɑndiyom susu ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ fɑihã Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑkpɛ yɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ kɑ sɑbɑ mo iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, i mɑ gɑnɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kpei lɑɑkɑli kɑne dɔ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ nɑm i mɑ cɛrɛ nɑɑne cini.
I mɑ si Ikpɛ gbei zeeri ŋmɑɑri sɑbu sɛ. Dɑhiri hɛ kulu hɑlɑli. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ si boori bɔrɔ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ci kɑtiyom hɛ.
À boori n mɑ si hɑm ŋmɑɑ, n mɑ si dufɛ hɑm, n mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm n nyɑize mɑ kɑti wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dɛrɛ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑm gɑɑbi.
N gundɑ nɑɑne bɑ? Ni, hɛ kɑ n gɑ tɑbɑi n mɑ ɑ̀ jisi n bɔm sɛ Ikpɛ jine. Binekɑɑnekpɛ no wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bɔm ciiti hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑbɑtɑndi kunɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ siikɑ, ɑ̀ goono ciiti kɑ zeeri kunɑ domi ɑ̀ si tɛ ndɑ nɑɑne. Hɛ kulu bine kɑ bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ nɑɑne, dulum no.
I yom kɑ i gundɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ, i mɑ mɔngɔntɛ yom mɔngɔnɛ jɛrɛ. I mɑ si tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni i hinne sɛ.
I kulu ɑfɔ fɔ mɑ ceeci kɑ kɑɑni i gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ ihinno dɔ nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ceeci kɑ kɑɑni ngɑ bɔm sɛ, kɑlɑ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ n woo, ǹ woobi yom kɑm ɑ bɔm".
Hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum zɑ dɑm jinɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ hɑntum nɑ i cɛbɛ sɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ du bɛɛjɛ suuru gɑɑ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom gɑɑ kɑ i du Ikpɛ Sendɑ kunɑ.
Ikpɛ Suurukpɛ, Yɑmɑrɑndikɔ mo no, ɑ̀ mo wom no lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑme Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gɑɑ.
Ndɑ bine fɔ ndɑ mee fɔ wom mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ cɛrɛ tɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑ nɑ i tɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ.
A go wɔne cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ tɛ Yuifu yom gbeiize Ikpɛ cimi sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ cɛɛ yom sɛ tɑbɑtɑndi.
Dimi cindei mɑ mɑ du kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ɑ̀ suuji sɑbu sɛ. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "À sɛ no, ɑ gɑ n bɛɛrɑndi dimi cindei gɑme kɑ n mɑɑ deizɑkpɛ sifɑ."
À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Wom mɑ dimi cindei, wɑ fɑihã ndɑ ɑ̀ jɑmɑ."
A ye kɑ cii: "Wɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ, wom kulu dimi cindei. Wɑ ɑ̀ sifɑ, wom jɑmɑ kulu."
Esɑyi mo cii: "Yɑsɑi kɑɑji bɔgu kɑ hunu tɛrɛ. À kɑɑ tunu kɑ dimi cindei mei. Dimi cindei gɑ ngei bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm."
Ikpɛ Bɛɛjɛkpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ wom tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne kulu ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑni nɑɑne kunɑ, wom mɑ du kɑ bɑ bɛɛjɛ kunɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɑbɑri.
A nyɑizei, ɑ tɑbɑtɑndi wom gɑɑ, wom mɑ wom tɔ ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. Wom tɔ ndɑ beire kulu. Wom hini mo kɑ cɛrɛ nɑ himmɑ.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ, kɑ wom hɔngɑndi gomini wɔne sɑbu sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gomini wɔ nɑ ɑ sɛ.
À nɑ gominɑ no ɑ sɛ yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gbeiteeri dimi cindei sɛ. A go kɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ domi dimi cindei mɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ, sɑrɑɑ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ yɑ fɑihã Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ hɛ yom.
A si tu kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ hɛɛ ɑ sendi dɔ ndɑ ɑ gbei dɔ hɑli dimi cindei mɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ dɔ mɑ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom Ikpɛ Biyɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ kulu kɑlɑ kɑ kpei Ileyɑ lɑɑbu, ɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ.
A nɑ niyɑ hɔ yɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu nungu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu tɛ jinɑ, domi yɑ si cini fuu kpɛsɛ ŋmɑni bɔm.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ bɑɑru cii, ǹ kɑɑ di. Beerem mɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ bɑ ce fɔ, ǹ kɑɑ fɑhɑm."
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ gɑnji wom dɔ kɑɑyom noyɑ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ lɑɑbu wɔne yom kunɑ sɑbɑbu fɔ si kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ jɛ. Zɑ jiiri boobo no ɑ gundɑ wom dɔ kɑɑyom niyɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kpei Esipɑni lɑɑbu, ɑ gɑnɑ wom dɔ kɑ fɑihã ndɑ wom. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ bɑɑ wom mɑ ɑ kɑmbɑzɑ ndɑ nodi kpeiyom.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kpei Yerusɑlɛm kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ.
Mɑsidoni ndɑ Akɑyɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom gɑ bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ngei mɑ gɑɑkɑsine tɛ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kunɑ.
Ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ. Ǹ ci mo Yuifu yom gɑrɔkoni yom. De dimi cindei du ngei bɑ Yuifu yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ bɑrikɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ tilɑsi dimi cindei mo gɑɑ ǹ mɑ Yuifu yom gɑɑkɑsine ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ murɑdu ngɑ di beeni kɑ gomini wɔ no ǹ sɛ, ɑ kɑɑ gɑnɑ wom dɔ kɑ kpei Esipɑni lɑɑbu.
A bine bei sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ɑ kɑɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ bɑrikɑ tɔnɑntɛ.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑndɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bɑɑkɑsine gɑndɑ, wom mɑ tɑngɑm ɑ bɑndɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ ɑ sɛ kɑ wom go tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ kɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ize yom kɑmbɛ. Gɑɑkɑsine mɑ kɑ ɑ kpeindɑ Yerusɑlɛm hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ mɑ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ.
Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ mo yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ndɑ fɑihã ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ yɑ hulɑnzom mefɔ ndɑ wom.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne, ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
A go kɑ i weimɑ Fibi sifɑ wom dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Sɑnkɑriɑ kpɑɑrɑ gbeiteeri.
Wom mɑ ɑ̀ kube Kpe kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑsiiri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wom murɑdu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ gɑɑ. Hɛɛ mo ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
Wom mɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ fɔɔ, ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gbei kunɑ,
Ǹ nɑ ngei jinde yom no ɑ hundi sɑbu sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ hinne yɑ go kɑ ǹ sɑɑbu ɑmmɑ ndɑ dimi cindei Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu mo.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ cini meigu ǹ hundi kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Epenetu fɔɔ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ sintine Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu.
Wɑ Mɑriɑmɑ fɔɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei tɛ gumo gumo i sɛ.
Wom mɑ Andɑlonikɑ ndɑ Yuniɑ fɔɔ, ɑ dimi yom, kɑ ǹ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom kɑsu kunɑ. Diyɑ yom kunɑ mo ǹ mɑɑ yɑ hunu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ jinɑ mo Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Wom mɑ Ampiɑtu fɔɔ, ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Kpe kunɑ.
Wom mɑ Yulubɑ fɔɔ, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ Mɛsiyɑ gbei kunɑ ndɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Sitɑci.
Apɛlɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ tɑbɑtɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ. Wɑ Alitɑbule fuu mɑriyɑ yom fɔɔ.
Wom mɑ ɑ dimi Hirodiu fɔɔ. Wom mɑ Nɑsisu fuu mɑriyei kɑ ǹ goono Kpe kunɑ fɔɔ.
Wom mɑ Tifɑnu ndɑ Tifɑso fɔɔ, kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ Kpe sɛ. Wɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Pɛlisu fɔɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei tɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe sɛ.
Lufu, Kpe kunɑ suubɑntɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ, ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ nyɑ mo.
Wom mɑ Asincitu fɔɔ ndɑ Felego ndɑ Hɛmɑsi ndɑ Pɑtobɑ ndɑ Hɛmɛ ndɑ nyɑizei kɑ ǹ goono ǹ dɔ.
Wom mɑ Filegu ndɑ Yuli fɔɔ ndɑ Neliyu ndɑ ɑ̀ weimɑ ndɑ Olɛmpu ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntei kulu kɑ ǹ goono ǹ dɔ.
Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu go wom fɔɔ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑndɑ feefee ndɑ dɛrɛyom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ cooɑndiyom kɑ wom du. Wom mɑ moorei mo.
Ngei wɔ, ǹ si tɑmtɛrɛ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ sɛ kɑlɑ ngei bumbum gunde sɛ. Mee kɑɑne ndɑ sendi bɑɑnɔ bɑɑnɔ no ǹ go gɑnɑkɔ bɑɑnɔ yom zɑmbɑ ndɑ.
Beerem kulu sã mɑɑ wom gɑnɑyom bɑɑru. Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ go fɑihã wom sɑbu sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ihinno, hinnɑntɛ yom mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne no ɑ̀ kɑɑ Setɑm tɛrɛsɛ wom cee yom cire, ɑ̀ si jɛ. I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
Timote, ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ gbei kunɑ, ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ ndɑ ɑ dimi yom Lusiɑ ndɑ Yɑso ndɑ Sosipɑto.
Hɛɛ mo, Tɛtisu kɑ ɑ ci tirɑ wɔ hɑntumkɔ, ɑ go wom fɔɔ Kpe kunɑ.
A fuukpɛ Gɑyu, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cini tɛ, ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ. Alɑsitu kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑngɑrɑ nooru jisikɔ ndɑ i nyɑize Kɑlitu, ǹ go wom fɔɔ. [
I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.]

Deizɑ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. Ngɑ yɑ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom sinji ɑ̀ mɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ ɑ fɛɛ bɔm ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu bɔm. Ngɑ di tɛ nɑ Ikpɛ duje kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɔm, duje kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ zɑ zɑmɑni yom sintiyom.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ duje di hunu tɛrɛ ɑndebei hɑntum yom dɔ hɑli hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu mɑ ɑ̀ bei ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom meire goono ndɑ, hɑli ǹ mɑ nɑɑne gɑnɑ.
Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑikusu, deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ cɛɛ ngɑ binebɑɑ bɔm yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu diyɑ. I nyɑize Sotɛnisu goono ndɑ hɛɛ.

I go kɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ fɔɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ kɑ wom cɛɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom. I go wom fɔɔ ndɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ cɛɛ nungu kulu, ngɑ yɑ ci ngei Kpe ndɑ i ŋmɔne.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo goono wom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
A go kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu Ikpɛ gomini sɑbu sɛ, gomini kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom no Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
A go kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no bɑrikɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ sendi kulu dɔ ndɑ beire kulu dɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɛdɑ tɑbɑtɑndi mo wom kunɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi hɑli wom mɑ si zɑm noyom bɑ ɑfɔ zɑ kɑ wom go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑtu.
Ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom tɑbɑtɑndi kɑlɑ mee wom mɑ goono tɑɑli si i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu hine.
Ikpɛ yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ wom mɑ meigu ndɑ bine fɔ ndɑ ngɑ Ize, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom no himmɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom sendi mɑ ci ɑfɔ. Feefee mɑ si goono wom gɑme. Wom mɑ ci ɑfɔ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku kunɑ ndɑ diyom fɔlɔnku.
A nyɑizei, Kolowe fuu bɔrɔ yom nɑ ɑ no wom bɑɑru. Ǹ cii feefee goono wom gɑme.
Ammɑ ɑ go wɔne cii, wom kulu ɑfɔ fɔ hɛ kɑ wom go cii neyɑ: Hɛɛ wɔ Pɔlu bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Hɛɛ wɔ Apolo bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Hɛɛ wɔ Sefɑ bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Hɛɛ wɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ no ɑ goono.
Ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ feefee bɑ? Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu kɑnji wom sɛ bɑ? Wɑlɑ ndɑ Pɔlu mɑɑ no ǹ nɑ wom mirɑndi?
A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ wom bɑ ɑfɔ mirɑndi, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kilipu ndɑ Gɑyu.
A mɑnɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si cii ɑ nɑ mirɑndiyom tɛ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ.
A nɑ Tifɑnu fuu beerem mo mirɑndi. Beerem nge yom di bɑ si, ɑ si bei de ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mirɑndi kpɛɛnɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ kɑɑ mirɑndi ɑmmɑ yɑ kɑɑ wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm. A mɑnɑ wɑɑzu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ buyom bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ kɔnu.
Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ sendi wɔ sɑmutɛrɛ sendi nɑ ngei wɔ dɔ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci. Ammɑ i yom kɑ i go du fɑɑbɑ, i dɔ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri no.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hɑndunyɑ hɑikusu yom, ɑ gɑ ǹ hɑikusutɛrɛ zeeri. Hɑndunyɑ fɑhɑmkpɛ yom mo, ɑ gɑ ǹ gɑnɑndi."
Mɑni hɑikusu? Mɑni cooɑndikɔ? Mɑni zɑmɑni wɔ kɑkɔkpɛ? Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ tɛ sɑmutɛrɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kunɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bei ɑ̀ ŋmɔne hɑikusutɛrɛ dɔ. À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ mɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom fɑɑbɑ sɑmutɛrɛ wɑɑzu gɑɑ.
Yuifu yom wɔ ɑlɑmu yom no ǹ go ŋmɑɑrɛ. Gɑrɛku yom mo go hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ ceeci.
Ammɑ i yom, Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ǹ kɑnji ɑ̀ bɑɑru no i go fɛɛ. I bɑɑru fɛɛyom wɔ yɑ tɛ Yuifu yom sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ. À tɛ dimi cindei mo sɛ sɑmutɛrɛ.
Beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ, zɑ Yuifu yom hɑli Gɑrɛku yom, ngei wɔ dɔ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri no. Ngɑ yɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ mo no.
Ikpɛ sɑmutɛrɛ bisɑ iburɑdɑm yom hɑikusutɛrɛ. Ikpɛ hinɑbunutɛrɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ iburɑdɑm yom gɑɑbi.

A nyɑizei, wɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ zɑngɑ wom goono sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ. Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo mɑnɑ ci hɑikusu zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom go lɑsɑbu. Wom kunɑ iboobo mɑnɑ ci dɑbɑrikpɛ. Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo mɑnɑ ci bɛɛrɛkpɛ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ sɑmutɛrɛ hɛ yom suubɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusu yom hɑwɑndi. À nɑ hɑndunyɑ hinɑbunu yom mo suubɑ kɑ gɑɑbikoni yom hɑwɑndi.
Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ kɔnu yom ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ hɑndunyɑ dondei suubɑ. Oò, ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci suubɑ kɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ ci tɛ kɔnu.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ si fɑɑre ngɑ jine.
Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑm Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tɛ i sɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ dɔ. Wɑtom ngɑ yɑ ci i cɛyom susu. Ngɑ yɑ ci i hɑlɑɑlɑndiyom. Ngɑ yɑ ci i fɑnsɑyom.
À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ fɑɑre, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Kpe kunɑ".
Hɛɛ bumbum nyɑizei, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ sɛdɑ wɑɑzu wom sɛ, yɑ nɑ kɑɑ ndɑ sendi ŋmɑni yom wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ.
Yɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom gɑme de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, ngɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
Hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ nɑ ɑ gɔrɔ wom dɔ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom beeri.
A mee sendi ndɑ ɑ wɑɑzu mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi kɑ bɔrɔ bɛrɛ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ cɛbɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑ no ɑ sendi kɑ wɑɑzu.
A nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ zɑmɑ wom nɑɑne mɑ si gɔrɔ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ bɔm ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri bɔm.
Beerem kɑ ǹ kube ǹ gɑme no i go hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi tɛ. I si tɛ zɑmɑni wɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ bɔm wɑlɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kpe yom ŋmɔne bɔm kɑ ǹ bɑ bisɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dom goono tugɑntɛ, ɑ̀ duje sendi no i go tɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ wɔ jisi i deizɑ sɛ zɑ zɑmɑni yom mɑnɑ tɛ.
Hɑikusutɛrɛ ngɑ di zɑmɑni wɔ kpe yom bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei, zɑmɑ de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei dom, ǹ si Kpe Deizɑkpɛ kɑnji.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hɛ yom kɑ mɑɑ mɑnɑ di, ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ hɑngɑ yom mɑnɑ mɑɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hurɑ bɔrɔ bine kunɑ mo. Hɛ nge yom di no Ikpɛ sɔlu beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ rɑ sɛ."
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go hɛ kulu yɑɑse gunɑ, bɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ duje yom.
Mee yɑ bei hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ lɑsɑbu de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ bumbum biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ? Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ si Ikpɛ lɑsɑbu yom bei de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ bumbum Biyɑ.
Ammɑ i yom, i mɑnɑ du hɑndunyɑ biyɑ. I du Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ zɑmɑ i mɑ bei hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i no ngɑ gomini kunɑ.

Nge yom di sendi mo no i go tɛ. I si sendi ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ iburɑdɑm yom nɑ i cɛbɛ. Ammɑ i go sendi ndɑ sendi yom kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ i cɛbɛ. I go Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɛ yom feeri ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sendi yom.
Hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ bine si Ikpɛ Biyɑ hɛ yom tɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ wɔ dɔ sɑmutɛrɛ hɛ yom no. À si hini kɑ ǹ bei mo zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ ǹ fɑyɑnkɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ, ɑ̀ go hɛ kulu fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ si ɑ̀ yɑɑse gunɑ.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Mee yɑ nɑ Kpe lɑsɑbu bei kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Kpe cɛbɛ? Ammɑ i yom, i gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ lɑsɑbu."
Hɛɛ wɔ nyɑizei, yɑ nɑ hini kɑ sendi wom sɛ zɑngɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ ɑ sendi wom sɛ zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑndunyɑ hɑɑli gɑnɑ, zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ nɑɑnekɔ cɛnɑ yom sɛ.
A nɑ wom no woo kɑ hɑm, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ, zɑmɑ wom si hini ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ. Bɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ wom si hinɑ̀.

Wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom no kpɛɛnɛ. Cɛnsɛ ndɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ feefee goono wom gɑme. Yɑ di gɑɑ wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom no. Wom go dirɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom hɑɑli goono ndɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go cii: Hɛɛ wɔ Pɔlu bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Afɔ mo cii: Hɛɛ wɔ Apolo bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci wom tɛ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom bɑ?
Hɛɛ Pɔlu yɑ ci mee? Apolo yɑ ci mee? Gbeiteeri yom no kɑ ǹ dɔ wom nɑɑne kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gbei kɑ Kpe nɑ i ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kulu no.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ tilɑm no. Apolo hɑngɑndi. Ammɑ Ikpɛ mo nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ beeri.
Zɑngɑ yɑ, tilɑmkɔ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Yɑ no hɑngɑndikɔ mɑ, kɑlɑ Ikpɛ cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ beeri.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tilɑm ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑndi, ǹ kulu ɑfɔ no. Ammɑ ɑfɔ kulu kɑɑ du ngɑ tukunsi ngɑ gbei bɔm.
I yom yɑ Ikpɛ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom no. Wom mo Ikpɛ fɑri ndɑ Ikpɛ cinɑri nɑ.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gomini goono ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no, zɑngɑ cinikɔ hɑikusu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ lɑɑkɑli, ɑ nɑ fuu kpɛsɛ furu. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo go cini ɑ̀ bɔm. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ gɑ cini ɑ̀ bɔm.
Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ fuu kpɛsɛ ŋmɑni fɔ furu kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ furu kɔ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu gɑ cini fuu kpɛsɛ wɔ bɔm. À go cini ndɑ wurɑ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu ndɑ tondi dukusɑntɛ wɑlɑ ndɑ bundu ndɑ subu kɔgɔ ndɑ sumbɛ.
Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu gbei kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɑnu di yɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bei, zɑmɑ nini kunɑ no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gbei, nini yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ neesi gbei kɑ ɑ̀ dimi nɑ.
De gbei kɑ bɔrɔ kɑɑ cini ɑ̀ bɔm cindi, ɑkpɛ wɔ kɑɑ du tukunsi.
De bɔrɔ fɔ gbei tɔnu mo, ɑkpɛ tukunsi kɑɑ dɛrɛ. Ammɑ ngɑ bumbum Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ nini kunɑ pimpɑm.
Wom yɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ no. Ikpɛ Biyɑ mo goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ?
De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ sɑrɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑkpɛ zeeri zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ yɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ no. Wom bine yɑ ci ɑ̀ gɔrɛ dɔ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ bɔm fɑfɑgu. De wom kunɑ ɑfɔ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɑmmɑ zɑmɑni wɔ hɑikusu, ɑ̀ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ci sɑmu ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ ci hɑikusu.
Hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ wɔ sɑmutɛrɛ no Ikpɛ jine. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ go hɑikusu yom dii ǹ ŋmɔne cɛmbɛrɛ kunɑ".
Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Kpe gɑ hɑikusu yom lɑsɑbu yom bei. À bei lɑsɑbu kɔnu yom no."
À sɛ no, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom zɑmɑ wom ŋmɔne no hɛ kulu.
Zɑ Pɔlu, zɑ Apolo, zɑ Sefɑ, zɑ hɑndunyɑ, zɑ hundi, zɑ bu, zɑ mɑɑsɑ hɛ yom, zɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ, ǹ kulu wom ŋmɔne yom no.
Wom mo Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom no. Mɛsiyɑ mɑ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne nɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ lɑsɑbu i gɑɑ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ, i yom yɑ Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri yom nɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ duje bɑndɑbɔrɔ yom.
Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono dee yɑ ci Ikpɛ duje bɑndɑbɔrɔ mɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, wom mɑ ɑ dɑmzɑkɑ wɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ciitikɔ mɑ ɑ dɑmzɑkɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ sɛ hɛ fɔ. Hɛɛ bumbum mɑ, ɑ dee si ɑ bɔm dɑmzɑkɑ.
A sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ bine kunɑ sendi bɔm. Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ cɛɑndi susu ngɑ di sɛ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ neesi, ngɑ yɑ ci Kpe.

Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu ciiti zɑ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ. Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm hɑli Kpe mɑ kɑɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ kube kunɑ, Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑɑri kunɑ. Bine kunɑ miilɑ yom mo ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ. À gɑɑ no, bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu kɑɑ du ngɑ sɑɑbuyom Ikpɛ dɔ.
Nyɑizei, wom sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ kɑɑndɑ wɔne yom kulu kɑ cii hɛɛ ndɑ Apolo bɔm zɑmɑ wom mɑ dendeni i dɔ. A gɑ bɑɑ wom lɑsɑbu yom mɑ si bisɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ hɑntum. Wom mɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ mɑ tɛ kɑ bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ.
Mee yɑ gɑ ni ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɑyɑnkɑ? Ifɔ kulu nɑ n gundɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci noyom nɑ? Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n no, ifɔ sɛ n go fɑɑre zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ noyom no?
Wom tɔ kɔ. Wom tɛ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom kɔ. Wom nɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ kɔ, i bɑ si ɑ̀ kunɑ. A go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ wom mɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ zɑmɑ i yom mo i mɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ wom bɑndɑ.
À himɑ ɑ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ i yom kɑ i ci diyɑ yom dɑm kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ. I ci zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ bu ciiti dumbu ǹ bɔm. Ikpɛ nɑ i tɛ gunɑyom hɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ ndɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom sɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
I yom wɔ, i ci sɑmu yom Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ ɑmmɑ wom wɔ, wom yɑ hɑikusu yom no Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Hinɑbunu yom no i yom ɑmmɑ wom mo gɑɑbikoni yom. Wom du bɛɛrɛ. I mɑnɑ du bɛɛrɛ.
Hɑli mɑɑsɑ i go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, i gɑ mɑɑ jo. I go zɑm jiinei kɑ dɑm. Ǹ go kɑ i tɑɑbɑndi. I go dirɑ kɑ hundi.
I gɑ sunjɛ kɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ i kɑmbɛ yom. Ǹ go kɑ i woo, i go bɑrikɑ dɑm. Ǹ go kɑ i guruguzɑndi, i go bine nɑɑni.
Ǹ go kɑ i ciine. I go tu ndɑ sendi hinno. I ci zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ beegunu yom. I goono ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ bɔtɔ yom hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
Yɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ hɑntum yɑ wom hɑwɑndi sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ go wom kɑɑbɑɑru zɑngɑ ɑ koo binebɑɑkɔ yom.
Bo de wom gundɑ cooɑndikɔ dubu wei Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom dee sindɑ bɑɑbɑ boobo. Hɛɛ yɑ nɑ wom hɛi Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ tɛ ɑ dendenikɔ yom.
À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ Timote dɔntɔm wom dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ koo binebɑɑkɔ, nɑɑnekpɛ mo Kpe kunɑ. À mɑ wom hɔngɑndi ɑ tɛrɑ yom Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ gɑ beerem cooɑndi nungu kulu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom bine go bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ go tɑmmɑ hɑli ɑ si kɑɑ wom dɔ.
Hɑli cɛnɑ bine ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ de Kpe bɑɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ kɑɑ bei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ mee sendi yom hinne bo ɑmmɑ ǹ dɑbɑri.
Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ si mee sendi gɑɑ kɑlɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ.
Ifɔ wom go bɑɑ? Yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ndɑ kɔnkɔmyom dee wɑlɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ bine bɑɑnɔ?
I gɑ mɑɑ nungu kulu ǹ go cii zinɑ goono wom kunɑ. Zinɑtɛrɛ dimi mo kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑ dimi cindei kunɑ. À tɔ hɑli wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɛndɛ zɑɑ.
Ammɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ no wom go tɛ. À himɑ nɑ dom, wom bine mɑ sɑrɑ kɑ bɔrɔ di kɑɑ wom kunɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei wɔ tɛ.
Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ dɔ, bɑ kɑ ɑ si nodi, ɑ bine goono nodi. A nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei ngɑ di tɛ ciiti kɔ zɑngɑ dee hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ goono nodi.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom meigu i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ biyɑ goono ndɑ wom ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɑbɑri mɑ.
Wom mɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi dɑm Setɑm kɑmbɛ. À mɑ ngɑ dulum hɑɑli hɑlɑci zɑmɑ ɑ̀ biyɑ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ Kpe Yesu hɑnu hine.
Wom fɑɑre mɑnɑ boori. Kɑsɑmi cɛnɑ yɑ buuru gɑɑtɑ kulu tunɑndi. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ?
À sɛ no, wom mɑ kɑsɑmi zeenɔ ngɑ di kɑɑ, wom mɑ du kɑ tɛ buuru gɑɑtɑ teji zɑngɑ wom sindɑ kɑsɑmi. Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Bɔmdɑɑrum feeji, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑrɑndi tɛ i sɛ.
ɑ nɑ i mɑ jingɑrɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ kɑsɑmi zeenɔ wɑlɑ ndɑ kɑsɑmi kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute. Ammɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ buuru kɑsɑmi si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno ndɑ cimi ŋmɔne.
A jinɑ kɑ hɑntum wom sɛ tirɑ fɔ kunɑ wom mɑ si kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ zinɑteeri yom.
À mɑnɑ ci ko fee pɑti pɑti ndɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ zinɑteeri yom wɑlɑ ndɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu yom wɑlɑ ndɑ kɔmkɔ yom wɑlɑ ndɑ tooru gɑnɑkɔ yom. De yɑ nɑ kɑlɑ de wom mɑ hunu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑ, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ de nyɑize ci zinɑteeri wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu wɑlɑ tooru gɑnɑkɔ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ wookɔ wɑlɑ bɑjiwi wɑlɑ kɔmkɔ, wom mɑ si kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ. Wom mɑ si bɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑkpɛ.
Hɑndunyɑ beerem ciitiyom ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ sendi. Wom mɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom ciiti. À nɑ ci yɑ di nɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti. Wom yɑ dee, wɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ wɔ kɑɑ wom kunɑ.
Wom kunɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ hɛ fɔ ngɑ nyɑize fɔ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tu kɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑndunyɑ ciitikɔ yom dɔ bɑ? Ammɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom dɔ.
Hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ciiti. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? De bine wom yɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti, wom mɑnɑ tɔ wom mɑ ciiti cɛnɑ yom wɔ tɛ no?
I yom yɑ kɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom ciiti. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Hɑli yɑ mɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom, i yom yɑ gɑ ǹ ciiti.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom gundɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ciiti ɑsiiri yom. Wom go beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ jine zɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ ciiti tɛ bɑ?
A go wɔne cii no kɑ wom hɑwɑndi. Wom kunɑ hɑikusu bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑni kɑ sendi wi ngɑ nyɑize yom gɑme?
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ nyɑize fɔ gɑ kɑɑndɑ nyɑize fɔ ciiti dɔ. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mo no zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom jine fɑ.
Cimi no, ngɑ di zɑngɑ nɑ kulu ɑ̀ tɛ wom tɑɑli kɔ zɑ kɑ wom gɑ kpeindɑ cɛrɛ ciiti dɔ. Ifɔ sɛ no wom si bine nɑɑni ndɑ cimi zɑmyom dom? Ifɔ sɛ wom si bine nɑɑni ndɑ muruse dɑm?
Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom si cimi tɛ. Wom go muruse tɛ, ɑ̀ kulu mo nyɑize yom sɛ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛsusu si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Wɑ si wom bɔm dɛrɑndi. Zɑ hɑwiize yom, zɑ tɑɑru gɑnɑkɔ yom, zɑ zinɑteeri yom, zɑ hɑruciwei yom, zɑ bɑbɑrɑkpɛ yom,
zɑ zee yom, zɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu yom, zɑ bɑjiwi yom, zɑ bɔrɔ wookɔ yom, zɑ kɔmkɔ yom, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu.
Yɑ bine no, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom gɔrɔ dom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom nyume. À nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi. À nɑ wom cɛɑndi susu Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ ndɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ Biyɑ dɔ.
Hɛ kulu hɑlɑli ɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ kulu sindɑ hɑnfɑni. Hɛ kulu hɑlɑli ɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ si tu hɛ fɔ kulu mɑ dɑbɑri ɑ bɔm.
Ŋmɑɑri yɑ gunde ŋmɔne no. Gunde mo ŋmɑɑri ŋmɔne nɑ. Ammɑ ɑfɔ fɔ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ kulu hɑlɑci. Gɑɑhɑm wɔ mɑnɑ ci zinɑ ŋmɔne, Kpe ŋmɔne no. Kpe mo gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne.
Ikpɛ nɑ Kpe tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. I yom mo ɑ̀ gɑ i tunɑndi ngɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ.
Wom gɑɑhɑmei yɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔbu yom no. Wom go kɑ ngɑ di bei bɑ? Yɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔbu yom zɑɑ kɑ tɛ weikuru dɔbu yom bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ meigu ndɑ weikuru, ngɑ ndɑ weikurɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku noyɑ. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii: "Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku".
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ meigu ndɑ Kpe, ngɑ ndɑ Kpe tɛ biyɑ fɔlɔnku noyɑ.
Wɑ zuuru zinɑ sɛ. Dulum ŋmɑni fɔ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ tɛ ɑ̀ si kɑlɑ gɑɑhɑm sɛ tɛrɛ. Ammɑ zinɑteeri wɔ ɑ̀ bumbum gɑɑhɑm sɛ no ɑ̀ go dulum tɛ.
Wom gɑɑhɑmei yɑ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɔrɛ dɔ. Biyɑ wɔ yɑ goono wom kunɑ. Wom du ɑ̀ Ikpɛ dɔ. Wom sindɑ wom bɔm bo. Mɛtɛ no wom mɑnɑ ngɑ di bei?
Ikpɛ nɑ wom dei ndɑ fɑnsɑyom bɑmbɑtɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi wom gɑɑhɑmei kunɑ ndɑ wom binei kunɑ kɑ ǹ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sɑbu sɛ wom hɑntum ɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ boori no bɔrɔ mɑ si lɑmbɑ weibɔrɔ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ zinɑ sɑbu sɛ hɑibɔrɔ kulu mɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm wɛndɛ. Weibɔrɔ mo kulu mɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kunye.
Kunye mɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ̀ sɛ. Wɛndɛ mɑ tɛ yɑ di ngɑ kunye sɛ mo.
Wɛndɛ sindɑ hini ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bɔm. À kunye yɑ gundɑ hini ɑ̀ bɔm. Yɑ nɑ kunye mɑ sindɑ hini ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bɔm. À wɛndɛ yɑ gundɑ hini ɑ̀ bɔm.
Wom mɑ si hungu cɛrɛ sɛ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom mɑɑ ndɑ cɛrɛ lɔkɑci fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ meehɔ zɑɑ. Wom mɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ye cɛrɛ gɑɑ hɑli Setɑm mɑ si wom sui, wom bɔm mɔngɔyom sɑbu sɛ.
Ikpɛ yɑ tu ɑ sɛ yɑ wɔne cii, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ meire no.
A go bɑɑ no bɔrɔ kulu mɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hɛɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu gundɑ ngɑ noyom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no, bɔrɔ fɔ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ mo zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ.
Hɑibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom mo, ǹ sɛ no ɑ go cii ɑ̀ boori ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ hɛɛ.
Ammɑ de ǹ si hini ngei bɔm, ǹ mɑ hiji. Bɔrɔ mɑ hiji, ɑ̀ bisɑ bɔrɔ guuri mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu.
Beerem mo kɑ ǹ hiji, ɑ go kɑ ǹ no mei. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ bo, Kpe no. Wɛndɛ mɑ si ngɑ kunye fee.
De bine ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ fee ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ mɑ si hiji wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sɑbɑ dɑm ngɑ ndɑ ngɑ kunye gɑme. Kunye mo mɑ si ngɑ wɛndɛ fee.
Ammɑ ɑ go sendi bɔrɔ cindei sɛ. Hɛɛ yɑ go sendi, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kpe bo. Zɑngɑ sendi, nyɑize fɔ gundɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne. De wɛndɑ tu ngɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ kunyɑ, kunyɑ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
De wɛndɛ mo gundɑ kunye kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne, ɑmmɑ kunyɑ tu ngɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wɛndɑ, wɛndɑ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
Wɛndɛ yɑ kunye kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne hɑlɑɑlɑndi. Kunye mɑ yɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne hɑlɑɑlɑndi. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wom koo yom bo tɛ ziibɑntɛ yom, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom no.
Ammɑ de bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fee, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm fee. Zɑngɑ yɑ, nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ wɔ wɑlɑ nyɑize weibɔrɔ wɔ ɑ̀ si hɔɑntɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɛ no i mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
Ni wɛndɛ, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ bei hɑli n gɑ n kunye fɑɑbɑ? Ni mo kunye, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ bei, hɑli n gɑ n wɛndɛ fɑɑbɑ?
Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ dirɑ hinne zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ɑ̀ no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ cɛɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu cɛɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ɑ go Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu nɑ fɔndɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ dɑmbɑnguize fɔ cɛɛ bɑ? À mɑ si ci zɑngɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize. Ikpɛ nɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize fɔ cɛɛ bɑ? À mɑ si ci dɑmbɑnguize.
Bɑngudɑmyom mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu mo mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ meire yom gɑnɑyom yɑ ci hɛ kulu.
Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ goono, goonoyom kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ goono sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
Ni yɑ tɑm nɑ bɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n cɛɛ? N mɑ si nɑm n lɑɑkɑli mɑ tunu. Ammɑ de n hini kɑ ye bɔrɔcini n mɑ tu, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
Tɑm kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe kunɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ bɔrɔcini noyɑ. À tɛ Kpe ŋmɔne. Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔcini kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe kunɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ tɑm noyɑ.
Ǹ nɑ wom dei ndɑ fɑnsɑyom bɑmbɑtɑ. Wɑ si ci iburɑdɑm yom sɛ tɑm yom.
Nyɑizei, bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mo gɔrɔ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ goonoyom kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ goono sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom mɑnɑ hiji yɑ nɑ du mei Kpe dɔ. Ammɑ ɑ diyom kunɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ du suuji Kpe dɔ kɑ tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ, ɑ gɑ sendi.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ neyɑ. Lɔkɑci gɑɑbɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono mɑɑsɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ boori bɔrɔ mɑ gɔrɔ yɑ di.
N gundɑ wɛndɛ bɑ? N mɑ si ceeci n mɑ ɑ̀ fee. N sindɑ wɛndɛ bɑ? N mɑ si wɛndɛ ceeci.
Ammɑ bɑ de n hiji n mɑnɑ dulum tɛ. Hundiyo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji, de ɑ̀ hiji ɑ̀ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hiji, ǹ kɑɑ tɑɑbi hɑm hɑndunyɑ gɔrɛ kunɑ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ wom bɑkɑɑ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ wɔne cii mo. Lɔkɑci mɑnɑ ku. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wɛndɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go hɛ ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ si hɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ go fɑihã, ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ si fɑihã. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ dei, ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ sindɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gbei ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom, ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Hɑndunyɑ wɔ tɑkɑri gɑ bisɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom mo goono kɑrihã si. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji, ngɑ wɔ sɑɑlu goono Kpe hɛ yom dɔ zɑngɑ dimi ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni Kpe sɛ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hiji mo, hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm no ɑ̀ sɑɑlu goono zɑngɑ dimi ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni ngɑ wɛndɛ sɛ.

Fɑyɑnkɑ goono wɛndɛ ndɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji gɑme. Weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji, ngɑ wɔ bine dɛcɛ Kpe hɛ yom dɔ, ngɑ mɑ tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ zɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔ hɑli bine dɔ. Weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hiji mo hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm no ɑ̀ go bine dɛcɛ zɑngɑ dimi ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni ngɑ kunye sɛ.
A nɑ ngɑ di cii nɑ wom hɑnfɑni sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kɑ hirime tɛ wom sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ gɑ cii hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hegu wom sɛ, gbei kɑ wom gɑ tɛ Kpe sɛ, hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni mɑ si wom lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ.
Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ lɑsɑbu hɛ kɑ ngɑ gɑ tɛ ngɑ koo hundiyo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hegu zɑmɑ hundiyɑ hije lɔkɑci bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, bine kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ hijɑndi. À mɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ngɑ bɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci dulum tɛyom.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sinji ngɑ bine kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ tilɑsi kulu, ɑ̀ gundɑ hini ngɑ miilɑ bɔm. De ɑ̀ suubɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ngɑ koo hundiyo si hiji, ɑkpɛ gɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori.
Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hijɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ hinno tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hijɑndi mo ɑ̀ bisɑ.
Wɛndɛ goono no hɔɑntɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kunye gɑ hunɑ. Ammɑ de kunyɑ bu, ɑ̀ hunu hije kɔrɔfɔ kunɑ noyɑ. À hini kɑ hiji bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ, ɑmmɑ Kpe kunɑ hinne fɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ diyom kunɑ, ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑrikɑ de ɑ̀ gɔrɔ yɑ di. A tɑmmɑ hɛɛ mɑ bine, ɑ gundɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ tooru yom gɑɑ, i go bei i kulu gundɑ beire. Beire go kɑɑndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ ɑmmɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛ gɑ nɑɑne cini.
De bɔrɔ fɔ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ gɑ hɛ fɔ bei no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu bei jinɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bei.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ Ikpɛ, ɑkpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru yom gɑɑ hɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ nɑ? To. I go bei kɑ tooru mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ kulu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ikpɛ ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ kulu si kɑlɑ ɑfɔlɔnku.
Bɑ kɑ ɑfɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ cɛɛ ikpɛ yom hɑli bɛɛnɛ nɑ wɑlɑ gɑndɑ nɑ ikpɛ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ kpe boobo yɑ goono.

Ammɑ i yom wɔ i dɔ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ goono. Ngɑ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ, hɛ kulu Tɑkɑkɔ. I yom mo, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom no. Kpe fɔlɔnku mo yɑ goono, ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ hɛ kulu goono. I yom mo, i go hunɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Ammɑ beire ngɑ di si ǹ kulu sɛ. Afɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ lɑsɑbu tooru bɔm hɑli mɑɑsɑ ǹ gɑ hɑm yom ŋmɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru gɑɑ. Ǹ bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi mo ǹ nɑ ǹ ziibɑndi.
À mɑnɑ ci ŋmɑɑri yɑ nɑm i mɑ mɑɑni Ikpɛ dɔ. De i nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɔntɔnu i gɑɑ. De i mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɛ fɔ kulu zobu i gɑɑ.
Ammɑ wɑ lɑɑkɑli wom bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ wɔ mɑ si tɛ zɑngɑ dɛrɛyom hɛ hinɑbunu yom sɛ.
Zɑngɑ sendi, ni kɑ n gundɑ beire ngɑ di, n gɑ gɔrɔ tooru fuu ko ŋmɑɑ. Akpɛ bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ ci hinɑbunu, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru gɑɑ ŋmɑɑ bɑ?
Nyɑize hinɑbunu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ bu, n beire go nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ bu.
Wom go dulum tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ nyɑize yom sɛ. Wom go kɑ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi mɛrɛ. Wom go dulum tɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ noyɑ.
A sɛ no, de ŋmɑɑri yɑ ci ɑ nyɑize sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ, ɑ si hɑm ŋmɑɑ pɑi zɑmɑ yɑ si tɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ ɑ nyɑize sɛ.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ wɔ diyɑ nɑ. Hɛɛ wɔ bɔrɔcini nɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ? A di i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ. Wom mo, wom yɑ ci ɑ gbei Kpe kunɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
Bɑ de cindei dɔ yɑ nɑ ci diyɑ, ɑ dee ci diyɑ wom dɔ zɑmɑ wom yɑ ci ɑ diyɑtɛrɛ sɛdɑ Kpe kunɑ.
Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ jinde kɑ ɑ deede beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ hã.
À nɑ ci i gundɑ hini kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm bɑ?
À nɑ ci i gundɑ hini kɑ kpeindɑ i wɛndɛ gɑnɑkɔ i bɑndɑ zɑngɑ diyɑ cindei gɑ tɛ ndɑ Kpe nyɑize yom ndɑ Sefɑ?
Hɛɛ ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ hinne gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi bɑ, i mɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ?
Mee yɑ huro wɑnguizetɛrɛ ko kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɑnɑ? Mee yɑ lɛzɛ lɑmbu dɑm ɑ̀ si ɑ̀ liibɑ ŋmɑɑ? Wɑlɑ mee yɑ memunu gɑɑ kurum, ɑ̀ si woo hɑm?
A gɑ hɛ yom wɔ cii no zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm dee wɑlɑ Moisi fɔndɑ mo go kɑ ɑ̀ fɔlɔnku di cii bɑ?
Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ cii: "N mɑ si tɑkumkumɛ dɑm hɑu mee gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɔsɔngu kɑru". Ikpɛ go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɑu yom hinne bɑ?

Dɑhiri i sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ go sendi. À nɑ ci yɑ nɑ bɑ? Oò, i sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ fɑri, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑri ndɑ bɛɛjɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go heeni wi mo, ɑ̀ mɑ wi ndɑ bɛɛjɛ. À kɑɑ du ngɑ bɑ gbei gɑɑ ndɑ bɛɛjɛ.
De i nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bɑrikɑ dumɑ wom sɛ, hɛ fɔ beeri no bɑ hɑli wom mɑ i jɛrɛ?
De bɔrɔ fɔ yom gundɑ hini wom bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ ci i gundɑ hini wom bɔm kɑ bisei? Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu i mɑnɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ hini wɔ ɑmmɑ i nɑ hɛ kulu jɛrɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ si kpɛsɛrɛ fɔ kulu dɑm Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɛ.

Wom mɑnɑ bei kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei hɑlɑɑlɑ tɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ǹ gɑ du ngei ŋmɑɑri Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑ? Beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ mo, ǹ go du ngei bɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Yɑ mo no, Kpe nɑ fɔndɔ no beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ, ǹ mɑ hunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzɑ.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ hɛ nge yom di bɑ ɑfɔ dɛcɛ beerem bɔm. Bine, yɑ nɑ wɔne yom hɑntum zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ǹ tɛ ɑ sɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ yɑ bu, ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ di bɔrɔ mɑ ɑ fɑihã tɛ kɔnu.
De ɑ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ kɑ yɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ, zɑmɑ tilɑsi no Ikpɛ dɛcɛ ɑ sɛ. Kɑito mo no, de yɑ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ.
De ɑ binebɑɑ kunɑ no ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ dom, ɑ gundɑ tukunsi. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ gɑɑ no, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gbeiɑ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ.
Ifɔ yɑ ci ɑ tukunsi? Ngɑ yɑ ci yɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ beerem sɛ, yɑ si bɑnɑndi hã zɑmɑ yɑ si gbei tɛ ndɑ hini kɑ ɑ gundɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ.
Bɑ kɑ hɛɛ yɑ bɔrɔcini no ǹ kulu dɔ, ɑ nɑ ɑ bɔm tɛ ǹ kulu bɑnyɑ zɑmɑ yɑ du bɔrɔ jɑmɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu.
Yuifu yom mo dɔ ɑ ye zɑngɑ Yuifu zɑmɑ yɑ du Yuifu yom. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire mo dɔ ɑ tɛ no zɑngɑ ɑ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire zɑmɑ yɑ du ngei mo kɑ ǹ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire.
Beerem mo kɑ ǹ si Moisi fɔndɑ cire dɔ, ɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ si Moisi fɔndɑ cire zɑmɑ yɑ du ngei mo kɑ ǹ si fɔndɑ cire. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ sindɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ nɑ bɑ ɑmmɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɑ cire no ɑ goono.
A nɑ ɑ bɔm tɛ hinɑbunu, hinɑbunu yom sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ du hinɑbunu yom mo. A nɑ ɑ bɔm tɛ hɛ yom wɔ kulu, ǹ kulu sɛ zɑmɑ zɑngɑ nɑ kulu, yɑ du ɑfɔ yom kɑ fɑɑbɑ.
A go kɑ nge yom di tɛ no Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ du bɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go jilɑm jilɑm tɛ, ǹ kulu go zuuru no ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku yɑ du tukunsi kɑ ǹ jisi zuure di ŋmɔne. Wom gɑ kɑ ngɑ di bei bɑ? Tɑ. Wɑ zuuru zɑngɑ kɑ wom mɑ du zuure tukunsi.
Gurujekɑri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go guruje, kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hini dɛcɛ ngɑ bɔm. À gɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kpe fulɑ, kpe fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si jɛ. Ammɑ i yom i mɑ hini dɛcɛ kɑ du Kpe fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si fumbu.
Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gɑ zuuru mɑɑ sinjɑntɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ gɑɑrɛ gɑɑ. A gɑ dɛmbɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kɑ hɛo kɑru.
Ammɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm nɑ ɑ gɑ tɑɑbɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm zɑngɑ tɑm hɑli bɑ de ɑ nɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ beerem sɛ, Ikpɛ mɑ si ɑ bumbum furu.
A nyɑizei, ɑ si bɑɑ wom mɑ zɑm kɑ bei kɑ i cɛɛ yom kulu dirɑ no buru cire hɑli ǹ kulu nɑ tɛku dem.
Ǹ kulu mɑ du mirɑndiyom Moisi kunɑ buru ndɑ tɛku dɔ.
Ǹ kulu mo yɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔlɔnku ŋmɑɑ, ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ.
Ǹ kulu mo yɑ nɑ hɑri dimi fɔ hɑm, hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ. Tondi beeri kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ goono ǹ bɑndɑ. Hɑri wɔ gɑɑ no ǹ kulu go hɑm. Tondi beerɑ mo yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ bine mɑnɑ yee ndɑ ǹ bɑ yom. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ bukɔ yom seesee gɑnji kunɑ.
Hɛ yom wɔ kulu bine tɛ i sɛ deedɑndi kɑ i mɑ si du kɑ gundɑ guuri lɑlɔ yom zɑngɑ ngei.
Wɑ si tɛ tooru gɑnɑkɔ yom zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom, zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Jɑmɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm. Ǹ tunu mo kɑ hooru."
I mɑ si zinɑ mo zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom zinɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ dubu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi hinzɑ bu zɑɑri fɔ.
I mɑ si Mɛsiyɑ bubure zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ bubure. Gondi yom no ǹ hɑlɑci.
Wɑ si gunugunu zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom gunugunu. Hɑlɑcikpɛ nɑ ǹ hɑlɑci.
Hɛ wɔ kulu tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ tɛ i sɛ deedɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ hɑntum mo kɑ i kɑɑbɑɑru, i yom kɑ zɑmɑni yom beeniyom tɔ i gɑɑ.
Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɑmmɑ cɛɑntɛ no ngɑ goono, ɑ̀ mo lɑɑkɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑm.

Suiyom fɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑ wom gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm suiyom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no. À si tu wom mɑ du suiyom kɑ wom si hini kɑ jɛrɛ. Ammɑ kɑ suiyom kɑɑ wom gɑɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ fɔndɔ tɛ wom sɛ wom mɑ du kɑ hinɑ̀.
À sɛ no ɑ bine bɑɑkɔei, wɑ zuuru tooru gɑnɑyom sɛ.
Fɑhɑmkpɛ yom sɛ no ɑ go sendi. Wom bumbum, wɑ lɑsɑbu wom binei dɔ hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ cii.
Gulɑize fɔ hɑri bɑrikɑkpɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ngɑ yɑ ci meiguyom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ kuri. Buuru kɑ i go zenji zenji yɑ ci meiguyom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Buuru fɔlɔnku yɑ goono bɑ kɑ i bɔrɔ jɑmɑ nɑ. I ci gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku zɑmɑ buuru fɔlɔnku gɑɑ nɑ, i kulu meigu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Wom mɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ gunɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom ŋmɑɑ, ǹ gɑ meigu noyɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ nɑ ɑ gɑ cii yɑ? Tooru bumbum go ci hɛ fɔ? Hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tooru gɑɑ, ɑ̀ go ci hɛ fɔ? Awo.
Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ dimi cindei go gɑrɑndi ǹ go kɑ ǹ tɛ no hɔllɛ yom gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ gɑɑ. A bine si bɑɑ wom mɑ meigu ndɑ hɔllɛ yom.
Wom si hini kɑ Kpe gulɑize hɑri hɑm kɑ hɔllɛ yom mo gulɑize hɑri hɑm. Wom si hini kɑ Kpe ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ yom ŋmɑɑri mo ŋmɑɑ.
I mɑ Kpe dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ cɛnsɛ no? I gundɑ gɑɑbi ndɑ Kpe nɑ?
Hɛ kulu ci ɑ sɛ hɑlɑli ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu sindɑ hɑnfɑni. Hɛ kulu ci ɑ sɛ hɑlɑli, ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu si nɑɑne cini.
Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ bɔm cine tɛ kɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ cine.
Hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ go neerɑ fɑwɑ tɑndɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ. Wɑ si wom bɔm hã hɛ fɔ kulu, wom bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Kpe ŋmɔne no hɑndunyɑ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɔm".
De zɑm kɑ nɑɑne bɔrɔ yom kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ wom cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri ngɑ no wom yɔɔdɑ kɑ kpei. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ. Wɑ si hãyom fɔ kulu tɛ, wom bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ.

Ammɑ zɑngɑ sendi, bɔrɔ fɔ cii wom sɛ, hɛ wɔ tɑɑru gɑɑ nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑrɑndi. Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru sɑbu sɛ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ domi "Kpe ŋmɔne no hɑndunyɑ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɔm".
Bine kunɑ sendi wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci n ŋmɔne di bɑ ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɔne. Ifɔ sɛ nɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ neesi bɔrɔ fɔ bine kunɑ sendi bɔm?
Ammɑ de ɑ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom ifɔ sɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ yɑnce hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ sɑɑbu me?
Ngɑ di sɛ, de wom go ŋmɑɑ nɑ, de wom gɑ hɑm no, de hɛ fɔ no wom go tɛ, wɑ ɑ̀ kulu tɛ Kpe deizɑ sɛ.
Wɑ si tɛ dɛrɛyom sɑbɑbu Yuifu yom sɛ wɑlɑ dimi cindei sɛ wɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ sɛ.
Zɑngɑ hɛɛ mɑ, hɛ kulu kunɑ ɑ gɑ wetere yɑ kɑɑni ǹ kulu sɛ. A si kɑ ɑ bɔm nɑfɑ ceeci kɑlɑ jɑmɑ nɑfɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
Wɑ tɛ ɑ dendenikɔ yom zɑngɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ go ci Mɛsiyɑ dendenikɔ.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, ɑ go wom sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ wom go hɔngɔ hɛɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ. Wom go lɑɑkɑli mo ndɑ ɑ cɛbɛ yom cɑu cɑu kɑ ɑ nɑ wom cooɑndi.
Ammɑ ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ wɔne yom bei. Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci hɑibɔrɔ kulu bɔm. Hɑibɔrɔ mo yɑ ci weibɔrɔ bɔm. Ikpɛ mo yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ bɔm.
Hɑibɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ fulɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ Kpe sɛ.
Weibɔrɔ mo kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ bɔm si dɑɑbɑntɛ, ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ kpe sɛ. Ngɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cobu korokoro, ǹ kulu ɑfɔ nɑ.
De weibɔrɔ mɑnɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini dumbu. De bine hɑwi no weibɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini dumbu wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cobu korokoro ɑ̀ mo ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu.
Cimi nɑ, hɑibɔrɔ mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu zɑ kɑ hɑibɔrɔ yɑ ci Ikpɛ himɑndi ndɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ. Ammɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ, hɑibɔrɔ deizɑ nɑ.
Ǹ mɑnɑ hɑibɔrɔ kɑɑ weibɔrɔ gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑɑ.
Bine mo, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ hɑibɔrɔ tɑkɑ weibɔrɔ sɑbu sɛ. Weibɔrɔ no Ikpɛ tɑkɑ hɑibɔrɔ sɑbu sɛ.
À sɛ no, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ himɑ weibɔrɔ mɑ gundɑ hini sɛdɑ ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu Kpe kunɑ weibɔrɔ si bɑrɑ hɑibɔrɔ bɑ si. Hɑibɔrɔ mɑ si bɑrɑ weibɔrɔ bɑ si.
Zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑɑ, yɑ nɑ weibɔrɔ go hɑibɔrɔ hɛi. Ammɑ ǹ kulu Ikpɛ dɔ no ǹ go hunu.
Wom mo, wɑ gunɑ wom bine yom dɔ, ɑ̀ himɑ weibɔrɔ mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu?
Iburɑdɑm hɑɑli gɑ wom cɛbɛ kɑ de hɑibɔrɔ bɔm hɑmini ku, hɑwi hɛ nɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ nɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ de weibɔrɔ bɔm hɑmini ku deizɑ nɑ ngɑ wɔ sɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no bɔm hɑmini nɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɔm dɑɑbuyom hɛ.
Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ tunu ndɑ kɑkɔ wɔne bɔm zɑ i yom hɑli Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ yom, i sindɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ ŋmɑni fɔ.
Ammɑ kɑ ɑ go wom dɑm wɔne ɑ si wom sɑɑbu. Ngɑ yɑ ci kɑ wom cini cɛrɛ meigu, ɑ̀ no ci ndɑ hɑnfɑni fɔ kulu kɑlɑ wom bɔm zeeriyom.
Sintine jinɑ, ɑ mɑɑ ǹ go cii feefee goono wom gɑme sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fuu ɑmmɑ yɑ nɑ tu sã sã.
Kɑlɑ de godo yom mɑ tɛ wom kunɑ. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom wom kunɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ hunutɛrɛ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu nungu fɔlɔnku, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kpe ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑyom sɛ nɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ ŋmɑɑ kulu bɔrɔ kulu bɑ ŋmɑɑri kuriyo no. Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ kungu. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo hɑm kɑ bugu.

À nɑ ci wom gundɑ fuu yom bɑ nungu kɑ wom mɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm? Wɑlɑ wom go dondɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ nɑ? Beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ, ngei no wom go hɑwɑndi bɑ? Ifɔ ɑ bɑ cii wom sɛ? Yɑ wom sɑɑbu no? Wɔne wɔ kunɑ, ɑ si wom sɑɑbu.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ du Kpe dɔ, ngɑ no ɑ nɑ wom cooɑndi ndɑ yɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ciini kɑ ǹ nɑ Kpe Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ.
À sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ pɑti pɑti wom sɑbu sɛ. Wom mɑ wɔne tɛ kɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ.
Yɑ no, ɑ̀ no gulɑize fɔ hɑri mo zɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɑ bɑndɑ. À cii: Gulɑize fɔ hɑri wɔ yɑ ci ɑ kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛyom ŋmɔne. Sɑɑ kulu kɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm wom mɑ wɔne tɛ kɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ.
Sɑɑ kulu kɑ wom go buuru wɔ ŋmɑɑ kɑ gulɑize fɔ hɑri wɔ hɑm, wom go Kpe buyom wɑɑzu tɛ noyɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ.
À sɛ no, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go buuru wɔ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ go gulɑize fɔ hɑri wɔ hɑm zɑm kɑ tɔ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ tɛ tɑɑliteeri Kpe gɑɑhɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ kuri dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ bɔm neesi kɑ du kɑ buuru ŋmɑɑ kɑ gulɑize hɑri di mɑ hɑm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go buurɑ ŋmɑɑ ko hɑri di hɑm zɑm kɑ tɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ si Kpe gɑɑhɑm fɑyɑnkɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ ɑkpɛ gɑ ciiti dɛcɛ ngɑ bɔm ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɑm wɔ kunɑ.
À sɛ no, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom tɛ hinɑbunu yom. Afɔ yom tɛ doorikom yom. Iboobo mo jiibi.
Ammɑ de i nɑ i bɔm neesi, Ikpɛ si i ciiti.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ i ciiti, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i dɑm fɔndɔ noyɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si i meigu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑ nyɑizei, sɑɑ kɑ wom go cɛrɛ meigu ko ŋmɑɑ, wom mɑ cɛrɛ bɑtu.
De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ zɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ si cɛrɛ meigu ǹ mɑ wom ciiti. Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ cindi mo, ɑ gɑ ǹ sɑsɑbɑndi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
Mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom neyɑ. A si bɑɑ wom mɑ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
Wom go bei sɑɑ kɑ wom gɔrɔ kɑ ci dimi cindei, ǹ nɑ wom dɛrɑndi ndɑ tɑɑru lutu yom gɑnɑyom.
À sɛ no, ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei bɔrɔ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ gɑ sendi ndɑ ɑ̀ bine, ɑ̀ si cii Ikpɛ mɑ lɑɑli Yesu. Bɔrɔ mee si hini kɑ cii mɑ Yesu yɑ ci Kpe de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ sendi ndɑ ɑ̀ bine.
Ikpɛ noyom ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono iboobo. Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnku nɑ.
Ikpɛ gbei ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono ɑmmɑ Kpe fɔlɔnku no.
Tɛyom ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ kulu tɛ beerem kulu kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ nɑ noyom no ǹ mɑ ngɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu hɑnfɑni sɛ.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ du hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo du beire sendi Biyɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ mo du nɑɑne Biyɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ. Afɔ mo du bɑɑni noyom dɑbɑri Biyɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ du gbei dɑbɑri tɛyom. Afɔ mo du ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛyom. Afɔ mo du biyɑ yom fɑyɑnkɑyom. Afɔ mo du cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. Afɔ mo du cinɛ yɑɑrɑyom.
Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnkuɑ yɑ go hɛ yom wɔ kulu tɛ. À go kɑ ǹ fɑrisi zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ, bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne.
Zɑngɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku gundɑ dɔbu boobo, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kulu zɑngɑ ǹ bɑ kulu, gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku dee nɑ. Yɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo.
I yom mo, ǹ nɑ i mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnku kɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku. Zɑ Yuifu yom, zɑ dimi cindei, zɑ tɑm yom zɑ bɔrɔcini yom, ǹ nɑ i kulu hɑngɑndi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnku gɑɑ.
Gɑɑhɑm mɑnɑ ci dɔbu fɔlɔnku ɑmmɑ dɔbu bɑɑbɑ.
De cee cii: Zɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ ci kɑmbɛ, ɑ mɑnɑ ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne. Ngɑ di yɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ si ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne dee?
De hɑngɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, zɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ ci mɑɑ, ɑ mɑnɑ ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne. Ngɑ di yɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ si ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne dee?
De gɑɑhɑm mee ndɑ mee kulu ci moo, mɑni hɑngɑ kɑ mɑɑ? De ɑ̀ kulu ci hɑngɑ, mɑni nune kɑ mɑni?
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ dɔbu fɔ fɔ kulu dɑm gɑɑhɑm kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ.
De bine ǹ kulu tɛ dɔbu fɔlɔnku, dom mɑni gɑɑhɑm?
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ cimi no dɔbuei bɑ, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku no.
Moo si hini kɑ cii kɑmbɛ sɛ: A sindɑ n murɑdu. Yɑ no bɔm si hini kɑ cii cee yom sɛ: A sindɑ wom murɑdu.
Yɑ nɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔbu fɔ yom kɑ ǹ hinɑbune kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ǹ gundɑ nɑfɑ.
Yɑ no i gɑɑhɑmei bumbum dɔbu fɔ yom kɑ i lɑsɑbu ǹ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ, i go kɑ ǹ kɑimɑ kɑ bisɑ cindei. I dɔbu yom mo kɑ ǹ dɔbutɛrɛ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ moo gɑɑ, i gɑ kɑ ǹ booriɑndi.
I dɔbu yom mo kɑ ǹ dɔbutɛrɛ sɑbɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ngei wɔ si bɑɑ booriɑndiyom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gɑɑhɑm tɛ nɑ kɑ bɛɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ no dɔbu yom sɛ kɑ ǹ zɑm bɛɛrɛ.
Feefee mɑ si tɛ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑmmɑ dɔbuei mɑ cɛrɛ kɑimɑ, bɑɑbɑɑ si.
De dɔbu fɔ gɑ tɑɑbi, dɔbuei kulu gɑ meigu kɑ tɑɑbi ndɑ. De dɔbu fɔ du binekɑɑne, dɔbuei kulu go meigu kɑ fɑihã ndɑ.
Wom yɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm no. Wom yɑ ɑ̀ dɔbu yom no, bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.

Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɑm Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. Sintine ɑ̀ nɑ diyɑ yom dɑm. Ihinkɑntɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑndebi yom dɑm. Ihinzɑntɛ ɑ̀ nɑ cɛbɛkɔ yom dɑm. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑbɑri gbei tɛkɔ yom dɑm, cɔfɔ bɑɑni nokɔ yom. À nɑ gɑɑkɑsineteeri yom ndɑ jinɑ yom dɑm ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni sendikɔ yom.
Ǹ kulu diyɑ yom no bɑ? Ǹ kulu ɑndebi yom no bɑ? Ǹ kulu cɛbɛkɔ yom no bɑ? Ǹ kulu dɑbɑri gbei tɛkɔ yom no bɑ?
Ǹ kulu gundɑ bɑɑni noyom bɑ? Ǹ kulu go cinɛ ŋmɑni yom sendi bɑ? Ǹ kulu go cinɛ yɑɑrɑ bɑ?
Wom mɑ guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ noyom kɑ ǹ boori ndɑ ǹ kulu. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go wom cɛbɛ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ ǹ kulu.
Bɑ de ɑ go sendi iburɑdɑm cinɛ yom kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom cinɛ yom kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɛɛ yɑ ci zɑngɑ kɑnkɑm kɔgɔ kɑ ǹ go gumgure. Hɛɛ yɑ ci zɑngɑ guuru yom kɑ ǹ gɑ sɑm cɛrɛ gɑɑ.

Bɑ de ɑ gundɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ noyom hɑli yɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ duje kulu ndɑ beire kulu ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, yɑ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Bɑ de ɑ gundɑ nɑɑne kulu mɑ hɑli ɑ hini kɑ tondi kuku yom gɑnɑndi ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, yɑ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ.
Bɑ de ɑ nɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom kulu fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ, de ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm nɑ ǹ mɑ tɔnu, ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, ǹ kulu kɔnu nɑ ɑ sɛ.
Bɑɑkɑsine gundɑ suuru kuku. À tɔ mo ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. Bɑɑkɑsine si cɛnsɛ. Bɑɑkɑsine si fɑɑre. À si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ mɑ.
Bɑɑkɑsine si tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si hegu. Bɑɑkɑsine si ngɑ bɔm nɑfɑ ceeci. Bɑɑkɑsine sindɑ binewɑɑse. À si ilɑlɔ lɑsɑbu.
Bɑɑkɑsine si fɑihã ndɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ fɑihã ndɑ cimi.
Bɑɑkɑsine gɑ bɑndɑdɑɑbe tɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ. À go nɑɑne hɛ kulu. Bɑɑkɑsine gɑ bɛɛjɛ hɛ kulu sɛ. À go bine nɑɑni ndɑ hɛ kulu.
Bɑɑkɑsine si gɑziɑ pɑi. Ammɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ gundɑ ngɑ mee. Cinɛ yom kɑɑ beeni. Beire mo gundɑ ngɑ mee.
Jɛrɛ fɔ no, i go bei. Jɛrɛ mo no i go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci jɛrɛ di kulu kɑɑ tɔ ngɑ mee.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono icɛnɑ, ɑ cini sendi no zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ. A cini lɑsɑbu no zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ. A meecine goono no zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ tɔ ɑ bɔm bɔrɔ ɑ beeni ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci koo cɛnɑ ŋmɔne yom.
Mɑɑsɑ i gɑ hɛ fɔ gunɑ zɑngɑ diji kunɑ. I go di ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ go himɑ tɑkɑri bibi fɔ ɑmmɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di i kɑɑ di ɑ̀ moo ndɑ moo. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go jɛrɛ bei, ɑmmɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di ɑ kɑɑ bei zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ bei.
Mɑɑsɑ bine hɛ hinzɑ wɔ goono, nɑɑne ndɑ bɛɛjɛ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine. Ammɑ ǹ kulu kunɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine.
Wɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɑmine. Wɑ guuri Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom ndɑ himmɑ, hɑli yɑ mo ɑndebitɛrɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ɑ̀ si sendi iburɑdɑm yom sɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go duje yom cii Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, iburɑdɑm yom sɛ no ɑ̀ go sendi kɑ ǹ nɑɑne cini. À go kɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ kɑ ǹ yɑmɑrɑndi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, ɑ̀ bɔm nɑɑne no ɑ̀ go cini. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑɑne nɑ ɑ̀ go cini.

A go bɑɑ ihinno wom kulu, wom mo sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni yom. Ammɑ yɑ mɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni yom de ɑkpɛ si cinɛ yɑɑrɑ hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑɑne mɑ cini.

Nyɑizei, mɑɑsɑ de ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ko sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni yom, hɑnfɑni fɔ nɑ ɑ tɛ wom sɛ? A si hɑnfɑni tɛ wom sɛ de ɑ si sendi hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ bɔm. A si hɑnfɑni tɛ wom sɛ kɑlɑ de ɑ go sendi ndɑ beire wɑlɑ ɑ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ wɑlɑ ɑ gɑ cooɑndi.
Bɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ hundi gundɑ jinde, zɑngɑ gɑsiɑ ndɑ mɔlɔ. De ɑ̀ si hɛ kɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ jinde bei, mɛtɛ bɔrɔ tɛ kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑru gɑsiɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ mɔlɔ gɑɑ?
De wɑngu hɛrɛɛ jinde diibi, mee yɑ wɑngu sɔlu?
Yɑ no wom mo. De wom go sendi ndɑ cinɛ kɑ beerem si fɑhɑm, mɛtɛ bɔrɔ tɛ kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom go cii? Kɔnu sɛ no wom go sendi.
Bɑ kɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni boobo goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm feeriji.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de ɑ si fɑhɑm ndɑ cinɛ ɑ himɑ zɑngɑ ɑnne, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi sɛ. Ngɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi, ɑnne no ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ sɛ.
Yɑ no wom mo. Zɑ kɑ wom go guuri Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom ndɑ himmɑ, wɑ ceeci ndɑ bɑyom wɔ kɑ yom go Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑɑne cini.
À sɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, ɑ̀ mɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ du kɑ cinɛ yɑɑrɑ.
De ɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, ɑ biyɑ yɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ fɑhɑm sindɑ bɑrikɑ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ? Biyɑ kunɑ no ɑ gɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ gɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ ɑ fɑhɑm mo. A kɑɑ betu tɛ Biyɑ kunɑ. A kɑɑ betu tɛ mo ndɑ fɑhɑm.
Zɑngɑ sendi sɑɑ kɑ n go sɑɑbu biyɑ kunɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑni. À si fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ n go cii. Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ tu ɑmi sɑɑ kɑ n go sɑɑbu?
Ni, cimi no n go sɑɑbu ihinno ɑmmɑ hɑngɑ dɑmkɔ nɑɑne si cini.
A gɑ kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu kɑ ɑ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kɑ bisɑ wom kulu.
Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ ɑ bɑɑ yɑ sendi gu cii ndɑ ɑ fɑhɑm kɑ cindei fɑhɑmɑndi. Ngɑ di bisɑ yɑ sendi dubu wei cii cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kunɑ.
Nyɑizei, wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ, wɑ si tɛ koo cɛnɑ yom. Ammɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ dɔ hɛrɛ, wɑ tɛ koo cɛnɑ yom. Wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ wɑ tɛ hinje wɑrɑnzɑkpɛ yom.
"Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ Ikpɛ cii: A kɑɑ sendi jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom A kɑɑ sendi ǹ sɛ yo yom mee gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ǹ si bɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ."
Yɑ di gɑɑ, cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yɑ ɑlɑmu nɑ. À nɑ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ ɑmmɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ. Andebitɛrɛ mo ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ ɑmmɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ.

Zɑngɑ sendi, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu meigu dɔ fɔ. Bɔrɔ kulu gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo huro nodi kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom wɑlɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. À nɑ ci beerem nge yom di cii wom sɛ hɔllɔkom yom?
Ammɑ zɑngɑ sendi mo wom kulu go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne huro nodi. À mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom. Andebitɛrɛ sendi kulu gɑ ɑ̀ zeeri. Andebitɛrɛ sendi gɑ ɑ̀ neesi mo.
À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ bine kunɑ gundu yom kɑɑtɛrɛ. Bine ɑ̀ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ jɛndɛbiri kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À kɑɑ cii: Hɑlɑbɑdɑ, Ikpɛ goono wom bɑndɑ.

A nyɑizei, mɛtɛ noyɑ dɑ? Sɑɑ kɑ wom meigu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gundɑ Somu yom betu fɔ. À gundɑ cooɑndiyom. À gundɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni. À gundɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑɑru. À gundɑ cinɛ yɑɑrɑyom. Ǹ kulu mɑ tɛ cɛrɛ nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ tɔ ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ. À mɑ si bisɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ mɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑ sendi kɑ furu cɛrɛ sɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo cinɛ yɑɑrɑ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cinɛ yom yɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ dɛnjɛ. À mɑ si sendi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. À mɑ sendi Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ biyɑ kunɑ.
Andebi hinkɑ wɑlɑ ihinzɑ mo mɑ sendi. Cindei mɑ sendi yom fɑyɑnkɑ.
De bine, Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ fɔ kɑɑtɛrɛ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ nungu di, sintine bɔrɔ mɑ dɛnjɛ.
Wom kulu yɑ hini kɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ɑfɔ fɔ. Wom mɑ tɛ yɑ di hɑli ǹ kulu mɑ dendeni, ǹ kulu mɑ du himmɑ.
Andebi yom mɑ gundɑ hini ngei biyɑ yom bɔm.
Ikpɛ wɔ, kɔsɔngu mɑnɑ hunu ɑ̀ dɔ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ dɔ nɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne hunu. Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cini tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntei mɑrgɑ yom kulu kunɑ,
wɑ nɑm wom weibɔrɔ yom mɑ dɛnjɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tu ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ sendi. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ mo go kɑ ɑ̀ cii.
De ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ fɔ, ǹ mɑ ngei kunye yom hã fuu. Hɑwi nɑ weibɔrɔ mɑ sendi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ.
Wom dɔ no Ikpɛ Sendɑ hunu dee, wɑlɑ wom hinne dɔ no ɑ̀ tɔ?
Bɔrɔ fɔ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ ɑndebi nɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom. Akpɛ mɑ bei hɛ wɔ kulu kɑ ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ, Ikpɛ meire yom no.
Ammɑ de bɔrɔ bɑ si ndɑ, ǹ mɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ɑkpɛ gɑɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, wɑ guuri ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛyom ndɑ himmɑ. Wɑ si hungu beerem mɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni.
Ammɑ hɛ kulu mɑ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom hɔngɑndi Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ no wom go cɛ.
Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ dɔ no wom du fɑɑbɑ de wom nɑ Sendɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wom nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu.
A no wom sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu kɑ hɛɛ mɑ, ɑ du. Ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ bu i dulum yom sɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom bɔm.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ngɑ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom bɔm.
À hunutɛrɛ mo Sefɑ sɛ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ sɛ.
À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ nyɑize zɑngu gu kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ mefɔ. Ǹ bɑ yom mo go hunɑ hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Afɔ yom mo jiibi kɔ.
À bɑndɑ Yɑkɔfu di ɑ̀. Diyɑ yom mɑ kulu di ɑ̀.
Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ, hɛɛ mo, ɑ̀ fɑitɑ ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ kɑ ɑ goono zɑngɑ gundehunu.
Diyɑ yom kulu kunɑ mɑ, hɛɛ yɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne icɛnɑ. Yɑ nɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ cɛɛ diyɑ zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ guruguzɑndi.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ ɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ ci. À gomini mɑnɑ tɛ kɔnu ɑ dɔ hɛrɛ. A nɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ diyɑ yom kulu sã. À mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ bo ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gomini yɑ goono ɑ bɑndɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de hɛɛ no, de ngei no, yɑ no i go bɑɑru fɛɛ. Yɑ mo no wom nɑɑne.
I go bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ cii Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ifɔ sɛ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom go cii tunɑndiyom si bukɔei gɑme?
Ammɑ de tunɑndiyom si bukɔei gɑme, Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tunu noyɑ me.
Ce bine, Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tunu, i wɑɑzuyom tɛ kɔnu noyɑ. Wom nɑɑne mo tɛ kɔnu.
À bisɑ yɑ. I tɛ sɛdɑ Ikpɛ bɔm. I cii Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi. Ammɑ de bukɔei si tunu Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi. Yɑ di gɑɑ i yom yɑ ci tɑngɑri sɛdɑ yom Ikpɛ dɔ.
De bukɔei si tunu, Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tunu.
De bine Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi, wom nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu noyɑ. Hɑli hɔ̃ mo wom goono wom dulum yom kunɑ.
Beerem mo kɑ ǹ bu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ǹ hɑlɑci.
De hundi wɔ kunɑ no i go Mɛsiyɑ bɛɛjɛ tɛ, i tɛ sisibiize yom kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ kulu.
Ammɑ cimi no Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ ci hɛijinɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bu kunɑ.
Bu hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ. Yɑ no tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ.
Zɑngɑ ǹ kulu gɑ bu Adɑmu dɔ, yɑ nɑ ǹ gɑ ǹ kulu hunɑndi mɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu gundɑ ngɑ sɛsɛrɛyom dɔ. Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci hɛijinɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no beerem kɑ ǹ ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom kɑɑ tunu.
Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ meire ndɑ hini kulu ndɑ dɑbɑri kulu wi. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ no Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. À bɑndɑ, beenɑntɛ noyɑ.
Kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ mɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ ibɛrɛ yom kulu dɑm ngɑ cee yom cire.
Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ ibɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ wi, ngɑ yɑ ci bu.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee yom cire". Kɑ ɑ̀ cii Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm Mɛsiyɑ cire, siikɑ si cɛ hinne bɑ yɑ si, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cire.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cire, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no Izɑ mo kɑɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. À nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm Izɑ cire zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ci ǹ kulu bɔm.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm mirɑndi bukɔ yom guribi. De bukɔ yom si tunu mɛtɛ beerem wɔ kɑɑ tɛ? De Ikpɛ si bukɔei tunɑndi ifɔ sɛ beerem wɔ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm mirɑndi bukɔ yom guribi?
Ifɔ sɛ i yom mo lɔkɑci kulu i go kɑ i bɔm dɑm kɑtɑru kunɑ?
A go di bu dullu mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kulu. A go wɔne dɑhirɑndi ɑ fɑihã bɔm kɑ ɑ gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ kɑ simbɑ wom.
A tɑngɑm ndɑ gɑnjihɑm yom Efese wɑngɑrɑ. De ɑ tɑngɑm ndɑ zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem miilɑ goono ndɑ, hɑnfɑni fɔ no ɑ du ɑ̀ kunɑ de bukɔei si tunu? Kɑlɑ de "i mɑ ŋmɑɑ, i mɑ hɑm zɑmɑ subɑ i bu no."
Wɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom dɛrɑndi. Kpɑɑsi lɑlɔ yom cini dɑɑ hinno sɑrɑ.
Wɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑli zɑngɑ ɑ̀ hegu. Wɑ si dulum tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono zɑm kɑ Ikpɛ bei kunɑ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ no kɑ wom hɑwɑndi.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go cii, mɛtɛ no ǹ go bukɔei tunɑndi? Gɑɑhɑm fɔ dimi nɑ ǹ go kɑɑ ndɑ?
Sɑmu wɔ, hɛ kɑ n go dumɑ ɑ̀ si ye hundi gɑɑ kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ bu.
Hɛ kɑ n go dumɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci dumɑiize ɑmmɑ n go dimiize dumɑ. Hɑnibɑ mɔsɔngu mogure no wɑlɑ dimiize ŋmɑni fɔ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ yɑ gɑ dumɑiize no tɑkɑri zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ, dumɑiize kulu ndɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑri.
Gɑɑbɑsi yom kulu mɑnɑ ci gɑɑbɑsi dimi fɔ. Iburɑdɑm yom gundɑ gɑɑbɑsi dimi fɔ. Memunu yom gundɑ ngei ŋmɔne. Ciifi yom gundɑ ngei ŋmɔne. Ciro yom gundɑ ngei ŋmɔne.
Bɛɛnɛ tɑkɑri ndɑ gɑndɑ tɑkɑri mɑ goono. Ammɑ bɛɛnɛ deizɑ fɔ goono. Gɑndɑ deizɑ mo ŋmɑni no.
Afɔ yɑ ci weenu deizɑ, ɑfɔ hɑndu deizɑ, ɑfɔ mo hɑndɑriyɑize yom deizɑ. Bɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom mo kulu mɑnɑ ci ɑfɔ deizɑ dɔ.
Zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ nɑ bukɔei mo tunɑndiyom. Ǹ go gɑɑhɑm dumɑ fumbi kunɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu.
Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumɑ, bɛɛrɛ si kunɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ndɑ deizɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ndɑ dɑbɑri.
Ǹ go gɑɑhɑm hɑɑlikpɛ dumɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi biyɑ ŋmɔne. Gɑɑhɑm hɑɑlikpɛ goono. Biyɑ ŋmɔne mo goono.
À sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ cii: "Adɑmu, hɑibɔrɔ sintine tɛ hundikoni". Adɑmu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ mo yɑ ci hundi nokɔ, biyɑ ŋmɔne.
Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci biyɑ ŋmɔne, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci sintine, ɑmmɑ hɑɑlikpɛ di no. Biyɑ ŋmɔne mo dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ sintine tɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ lɑɑbu. Gɑndɑ bɔrɔ no. Bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ mo yɑ Kpe no kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ lɑɑbu zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ, yɑ nɑ ngei mo bɑrɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci gɑndɑ ŋmɔne yom. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ mo zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ, yɑ no ngei mo bɑrɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne yom.
I nɑ gɑndɑ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ wɔ tɑkɑri zɑɑ. Yɑ no ngɑ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ i gɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑri zɑɑ.
A nyɑizei, ɑ go wɔne cii. Gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ kuri si hini kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu. Fumbi mo si wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu tubu.
Gunɑ, ɑ go duje wɔne cii wom sɛ. I kulu si bu. Ammɑ Ikpɛ gɑ i kulu bɛrɛ.
À gɑ i bɛrɛ mefɔ mefɔ moo miilɑ fɔ, kuluu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ jinde gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ bukɔei kɑɑ tunu ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu. I yom wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ i bɛrɛ.
Gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ fumbu, kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ mɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu dɑm. Gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ bu mo, ɑ̀ mɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu dɑm.
Gɑɑhɑm mo kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ fumbu kɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu dɑm. Gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ bu mɑ kɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu dɑm. Sɑɑ di Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ bu gonu gɑɑŋmɑɑyom kunɑ".
"E bu, mɑni n nɑɑji? E ciyomɑ, mɑni n gɑɑŋmɑɑyom?"
Bu nɑɑji yɑ ci dulum. Dulum dɑbɑri mo yɑ ci Ikpɛ fɔndɑ.
Ammɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i no gɑɑŋmɑɑyom i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ nyɑize binebɑɑkɔei, wɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori. Wɑ si zinji. Wɑ himmɑ dɑm kɑ tɔntɔnu Kpe gbei kunɑ zɑmɑ wom bei wom gbei mɑnɑ ci kɔnu Kpe kunɑ.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ noyom kɑ ǹ meigu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Gɑlɑte Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ, wom mo wɑ tɛ yɑ di.
Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ cini kɑɑ ngɑ nooru kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑrikɑ. À mɑ ɑ̀ dɑm nooru jisiyom dɔ. Nooru meiguyom mɑ si tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ.
Wom mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ tɑbɑi suubɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ tirɑ yom. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ wom noyom mɑ.
De bine, ɑ̀ kɑɑ sɑbɑ hɛɛ bumbum mɑ yɑ kpei, ǹ gɑ ɑ dum.
