A kɑɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu zɑmɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu nɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ.
Hɑnibɑ mɑ, ɑ jiribi hinkɑ tɛ wom dɔ wɑlɑ mɑ yɑ hɑrigu tɛ wom dɔ nodi. Wom mɑ ɑ kɑmbɑzɑ nungu kɑ ɑ gɑ kpei.
Mɑɑsɑnkulu wɔ, ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ di wom bisɑyom gɑɑ. A gɑ bɑɑ yɑ jiribi yom tɛ wom dɔ de Kpe tu ɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ Efese wɑngɑrɑ kɑlɑ Pɑntɛkotu jingɑru.
Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɔ bɑmbɑtɑ feeri ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
De Timote kɑɑ, wom mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ goono wom gɑme hɑmburu si. Timote gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe gbei sɛ zɑngɑ hɛɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ɑ̀ fɛntɛ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɑzɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ɑ dɔ bɑɑni zɑmɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu, ngɑ ndɑ nyɑizei.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci nyɑize Apolo sendi, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ himmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei wom dɔ ndɑ nyɑize yom. Ammɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ bɑ cɛnɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du dɑɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ.
Wɑ bɑtu. Wɑ cɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ. Wɑ tɛ hɑibɔrɔ yom. Wɑ gɑɑbi dɑm wom bɔm gɑɑ.
Hɛ kulu mɑ tɛ wom gɑme kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine.
Wom go bei Tifɑnu ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu bɔrɔ yom, ngei yɑ ci Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu gɑnɑkɔ sintine yom. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm no mo kɑ cini tɑmtɛrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ. Mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei, hɛ fɔ himmɑ nɑ ɑ gɑ wom no.
Wom wɔ, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom sɛ ndɑ beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ cɛrɛ bɑndɑ.
A go fɑihã ndɑ Tifɑnu ndɑ Futɑnɑ ndɑ Akɑilɑ kɑɑyom zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ gɑziɑ wom dɔ hɛrɛ.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ bine yeenɑndi ndɑ wom ŋmɔne yom mo. Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ bɔrɔ wɔne dimi yom sɛ.
Azi lɑɑbu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom go wom fɔɔ. Akilɑ ndɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ hundi kunɑ, ngei mɑ go wom fɔɔ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe kunɑ.
Nyɑizei kulu gɑ wom fɔɔ. Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ gɑ wom fɔɔ mo. Ngɑ wɔ, hɛɛ bumbum yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ si bɑɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci lɑɑliɑntɛ. E Kpe, kɑɑ.
Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
A bɑɑkɑsine goono wom kulu dɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. Ami.

Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no Ikpɛ binebɑɑ dɔ. Hɛɛ ndɑ i nyɑize Timote, i yom yɑ go wom fɔɔ, wom kɑ wom ci Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ. I go hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu kulu fɔɔ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
I mɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɑɑbu. Ngɑ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ suuji, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kulu.
À go kɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi i tɑɑbi kulu kunɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ du kɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ goono tɑɑbi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kunɑ yɑmɑrɑndi. I mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ i sɛ.
Zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze yom go bɑ i kunɑ, yɑ no i yɑmɑrɑndiyom mo go bɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.

Ammɑ kɑ i go kɑnkɑm, ngɑ di tɛ no wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom ndɑ wom fɑɑbɑ sɑbu sɛ. Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ go kɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi, ngɑ di tɛ no wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom ndɑ wom fɑɑbɑ sɑbu sɛ mo. Yɑ no wom mɑ du yɑmɑrɑndiyom hɑli wom mɑ hini suuru ndɑ guruguze fɔlɔnkuei kɑ i yom mo, i go du wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom.
Bɛɛjɛ kɑ i gundɑ kɑ simbɑ wom, ɑ̀ sinji kɑ boori. I go bei de wom gundɑ bɑ ndɑ i yom kɑnkɑmi yom kunɑ, wom gundɑ bɑ mo ndɑ i yom yɑmɑrɑndiyom kunɑ.
Nyɑizei, i si bɑɑ wom mɑ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ, kɑ simbɑ ndɑ i kɑnkɑmi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i sɛ Azi lɑɑbu. À nɑ i tɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À bisɑ i yom gɑɑbi hɑli ɑ̀ tɔ i lɑɑkɑli hunu i hunɑyom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ i bumbum, i bei i bɔm gɑɑ kɑ bu nɑ guuri zɑɑ i bɔm hɑli i mɑ si i bɔm nɑɑne. Ammɑ i go Ikpɛ nɑɑne, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go bukɔei tunɑndi.
Ikpɛ mo nɑ i kɑɑ bu bɑmbɑtɑ wɔ kunɑ. À go kɑ i kɑɑ mo. I nɑ i bɛɛjɛ sinji ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ i kɑɑ mo kpɛɛnɛ.
Wom mo, wom go kɑ i gɑɑ ndɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom. Yɑ no Ikpɛ tu ndɑ gomini noyom kɑ i du bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ ɑduwɑ yom sɑbu sɛ hɑli bɔrɔ boobo mɑ sɑɑbuyom tɛ kɑ simbɑ i yom.

Wɔne yɑ ci i bɛɛrɛ. I bine kunɑ sendi go tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ i gɔrɔ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ yɑ mo wom dɔ hɛrɛ ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ cimi kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ. I mɑnɑ i gɔrɛ tɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ ɑmmɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ gomini.
I si hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni hɑntum wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ wom go coo. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm mɑ. A bɑɑ wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm sã sã.
Zɑngɑ wom mo, wom fɑhɑm jɛrɛ fɔ kɑ i yom yɑ ci wom bɛɛrɛ sɑbɑbu. Yɑ no wom mo, wom ci i bɛɛrɛ sɑbɑbu Kpe Yesu hɑnu hine.
Nɑɑne wɔne kunɑ, ɑ bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ jinɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ du bɑrikɑ hinkɑntɛ.
Zɑ wom dɔ mo, yɑ bisɑ kɑ kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu. Zɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu kpɛɛnɛ yɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ kɑmbɑzɑ yɑ kpei Yude lɑɑbu.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go wɔne miilɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii ndɑ siikɑ siikɑ dee? Wɑlɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ gɑ miilɑ hɑndunyɑ lɑsɑbu bɔm nɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli yɑ cii oò, oò ndɑ ɑwo, ɑwo?
Ammɑ Ikpɛ yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no. À sɛ no, i sendɑ kɑ i tɛ wom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ oò ndɑ ɑwo.
Hɛɛ ndɑ Silɑfim ndɑ Timote nɑ Ikpɛ Ize, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ wom gɑme. Wɑɑzu kɑ i tɛ i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ oò ndɑ ɑwo. À tɛ ndɑ oò kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli yom kulu, ɑ̀ dɔ no ǹ ŋmɔne oò goono. À dɔ mo no i go cii ɑmi kɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ i suubɑ wom bɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
Ngɑ mɑ yɑ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm i gɑɑ. À nɑ i nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ i bine yom kunɑ zɑngɑ deimi jɛrɛ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ hundi bɔm, wom bɑkɑɑyom sɛ nɑ yɑ nɑ kɑɑ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
I sindɑ hini wom nɑɑne bɔm, ɑmmɑ i yom yɑ wom bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom no wom fɑihã sɑbu sɛ. Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, wom go cɛ kɑ boori.
Ammɑ ɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ ɑ bine kunɑ yɑ si ye wom dɔ ndɑ binesɛrɛ.
De ɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi, mee yɑ nɑm yɑ fɑihã, de ɑ̀ nɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bine sɑrɑndi di?
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ bine mɑ si sɑrɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ himɑ yɑ fɑihã ndei. A nɑ wɔne hɑntum nɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ di si tɛ. A gundɑ nɑɑne ngɑ di wom kulu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ fɑihã mɑ ci wom kulu ŋmɔne.
Kɑnkɑmi bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ ndɑ binesɛrɛ ndɑ mundi boobo no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ bei ɑ gundɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ binesɛrɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ hinne bine nɑ ɑkpɛ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ wom kulu bine no ɑ̀ sɑrɑ. Zɑngɑ jɛrɛ fɔ bine nɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ yɑ si cii kɑ bisɑ.
Ciiti kɑ jɑmɑ tɛ bɔrɔ sɛ, ɑ̀ wɑsɑ.
À sɛ no, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ himɑ no dom, wom mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ hɑli binesɛrɛ mɑ si ɑ̀ tɑɑni.
À sɛ nɑ, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ cɛbɛ ɑ̀ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine.
À sɛ mo no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ kɑ wom bubure yɑ bei hɑli wom go hɛ kulu gɑnɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ wom go yɑɑfɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ, hɛɛ mo ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ. De ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ wom sɑbu sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ jine.
A mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ Setɑm mɑ si du i gɑɑ dɑɑmɑ. I gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sijirɑ yom bei.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ Toɑsɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ, Kpe nɑ fɔndɔ feeri ɑ sɛ.
A lɑɑkɑli mɑnɑ kɑni zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ di ɑ nyɑize Titu. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ǹ too kɑ kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu.
I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu zɑmɑ sɑɑ kulu ɑ̀ go kpeindɑ i yom jine i mo gɑɑŋmɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Nungu kulu no ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ beiyom kɑɑtɛrɛ i dɔ zɑngɑ wɑidi bɑmbɑriyom.
I yom yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ Ikpɛ sɛ beerem kɑ ǹ go fɑɑbɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci gɑme kunɑ.
I bɑrɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɛ yɑ di zɑngɑ bu hɛo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ bu. Cindei mo sɛ i bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hundi hɛo kɑ ɑ̀ go hundi no. Mee yɑ wɑsɑ hɛ nge yom di sɛ?
I si kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɛrɛ zɑngɑ jɑmɑ gɑ tɛ liibɑ sɛ. Ammɑ i go sendi cimi kpɑrɛ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ jine.
I yom mo i sinti kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ i bɔm sɛ kpɛɛnɛ noyɑ bɑ? Zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ i mɑ bɛɛrɛ tirɑ yom hɑntum wom sɛ no wɑlɑ kɑ du bɛɛrɛ tirɑ yom wom dɔ?
Wom yɑ ci i tirɑ kɑ Ikpɛ hɑntum i bine yom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ bei. Bɔrɔ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ coo mo.

Wɔne wɔ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no, wom yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ tirɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu i gbei tɛyom dɔ. À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ hɑntumyom hɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ hundikpɛ. À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum tɑndi yom gɑɑ ɑmmɑ iburɑdɑm yom bine yom kunɑ.
Nɑɑne wɔne Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ nɑ i gundɑ Ikpɛ dɔ hɛrɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci i bumbum i mɑ hini kɑ hɛ fɔ lɑsɑbu i bɔm gɑɑ no bo. I hinɑ kulu Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ go hunu.
Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ i no hini i mɑ tɛ ɑlikɑwɑli teji gbeiteeri yom. I mɑnɑ ci tirɑ biiriize gbeiteeri yom ɑmmɑ i ci Ikpɛ Biyɑ gbeiteeri yom. Tirɑ biiriize gɑ wi nɑ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ cɛ gɑ hunɑndi nɑ.

Moisi fɔndɑ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ jeeri ndɑ biiriize yom tondi yom gɑɑ. À tɛ deizɑ hɑli Isirɑilɑ ize yom mɑnɑ hini kɑ moo sinji Moisi moodumɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ moodumɑ deizɑ sɑbu sɛ. Deizɑ wɔ gundɑ beeniyom.
Yɑ mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gbei tɛ deizɑ kɑ bisɑ.
Ciiti kɑ zeeri gbei tɛ deizɑ. Yɑ mo cɛɑndiyom susu gbei, ɑ̀ bisɑ fɑ kɑ bɑ deizɑ dɔ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ deizɑ dom, ɑ̀ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ deizɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ.
Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ gundɑ deizɑ. Yɑ mo wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ, cɛ tɛ deizɑ kɑ bisɑ fɑ.
À sɛ no, zɑ kɑ i gundɑ bɛɛjɛ ngɑ di, i go gbei tɛ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ.
I si tɛ zɑngɑ Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fɑtɑlɑ dɑm kɑ ngɑ moodumɑ dɑɑbu, zɑmɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom mɑ si moo sinji kɑɑri bisɑntɛ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ lɑɑkɑli goono dɑɑbɑntɛ hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go Alikɑwɑli Zeenɔ coo kulu fɑtɑlɑ goono ǹ sɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ fɑtɑlɑ kɑɑ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no ɑ̀ tɔ ngɑ mee.
Bɑ hunkunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go Moisi tirɑ yom coo, kulu fɑtɑlɑ goono ǹ bine yom bɔm.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ bɛrɛ Kpe dɔ hɛrɛ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ.
Kpe cɛ bine, Biyɑ no. Nungu kɑ Kpe Biyɑ goono, nodi no bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ goono.
Ammɑ i kulu kɑ i moodumɑ yom goono feerɑntɛ, i gɑ Kpe deizɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ diji kunɑ. Ikpɛ go kɑ i bɛrɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ tɑkɑri, deizɑ kɑ kpei deizɑ dɔ. Kpe Biyɑ dɔ no deizɑ wɔ go hunu.
I du suuji Ikpɛ dɔ. Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ i gundɑ gbei wɔne mo i si fɑrigɑ.

Ammɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑwi, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cini tɛ tugu kunɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ furu. I si dirɑ ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ. I si Ikpɛ Sendɑ mo siirɑndi ɑmmɑ i go cimi cii sã sã. I go kɑ i bɔm cɛbɛ iburɑdɑm bine kunɑ sendi dɔ Ikpɛ jine.
Ammɑ de ǹ nɑ i Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ dɑɑbu, beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci sɛ no ɑ̀ go dɑɑbu.
Zɑmɑni wɔ ŋmɔne ikpɛ nɑ dɑnɑmtɛrɛ dɑm beerem kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne fɑhɑm gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli Bɑɑru Hinno deizɑkpɛ kɑɑri mɑ si hɑɑgɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Bɑɑru Hinno deizɑ wɔ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ tɑkɑri.
I si kɑ i bɔm bɑɑru fɛɛ, ɑmmɑ i gɑ wɑɑzu ko cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Kpe no. I go cii i yom yɑ ci wom tɑm yom Yesu sɑbu sɛ.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, kɑɑri mɑ hɑɑgɑ kube bindi bindi, ɑ̀ nɑ kɑɑri dɑm i bine yom kunɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm nɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ deizɑ beiyom hɑɑgɑndi i sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ moodumɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ hɑizici wɔne goono i sɛ lɑɑbu kusu yom kunɑ zɑmɑ dɑbɑri bɑmbɑtɑ wɔ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hunu i dɔ.
Kɑnkɑmi dimi dimi kulu nɑ i tɑɑni ɑmmɑ i mɑnɑ tutubu. I lɑɑkɑli tunu ɑmmɑ i mɑnɑ zɑm bɛɛjɛ.
Ǹ go kɑ i guruguzɑndi ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i furu. Ǹ go kɑ i zeeri ɑmmɑ i mɑnɑ hɑlɑci.
Sɑɑ kulu i go Yesu bu jɛrɛ i gɑɑhɑm yom kunɑ zɑmɑ Yesu hundi mo mɑ hunutɛrɛ i gɑɑhɑm yom kunɑ.
I yom kɑ i go hunɑ, sɑɑ kulu ǹ go kɑ i dɑm bu kɑmbɛ Yesu sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ Yesu hundi mo mɑ hunutɛrɛ i gɑɑhɑm yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ goono buyom bɔm.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, bu go gbei tɛ i kunɑ ɑmmɑ hundi mo go gbei tɛ wom kunɑ.
Zɑngɑ i kulu gundɑ nɑɑne fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "A nɑɑne. À sɛ no, ɑ sendi." I yom mo i go nɑɑne. À sɛ no, i go sendi.
I go bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Kpe Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, ɑ̀ gɑ i tunɑndi Yesu dɔ. À gɑ i cɛɑndi ngɑ jine wom bɑndɑ.
Wom sɑbu sɛ no hɛ kulu goono hɑli gomini kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu bɔrɔ boobo dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm sɑɑbuyom mɑ bɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ.
À sɛ no, i si fɑrigɑ. Bɑ de i tɛrɛ bɔrɔ fɔ go sɑrɑ, ǹ go kɑ i bine yom kunɑ bɔrɔ tejɑndi hɑnu kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu.
I mɑɑsɑ kɑnkɑmi dɔgɔnɑntɛ go kɑɑndɑ i sɛ deizɑ ndɑ bɑyom kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Deizɑ wɔ kɑnkɑmi neesiji tɑɑbi dɔgɔnɑntɛ ŋmɔne no.
I moo yom si sinjɑntɛ hɛ yom kɑ mɑɑ go di gɑɑ kɑlɑ hɛ yom kɑ moo si di. Hɛ yom kɑ moo go di, bisɑntɛ yom no ɑmmɑ hɛ yom kɑ mɑɑ si di, ǹ sindɑ beeniyom.
I go bei hɑndunyɑ gɑɑhɑm wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ i goono ɑ̀ himɑ kuuru bukɑ. De ɑ̀ hɑlɑci i gundɑ cinɑri fɔ Ikpɛ dɔ, fuu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ. À goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, beeniyom si.
Cimi no, i go dure kuuru bukɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ i go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑ i fuu bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne dɑm i sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm i sɛ, ǹ si i gɑru bumbum.

Cimi nɑ, i yom kɑ i goono gɑɑhɑm kuuru wɔ kunɑ i go dure ndɑ jɛɛjɛ. À mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ mɑ i gɑɑhɑm wɔne hobu kɑ kɑɑ bɑ, ɑmmɑ i go bɑɑ Ikpɛ mɑ bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne dɑm i sɛ. À mɑ ɑ̀ dɑm i sɛ hɑli hundi mo mɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono buyom bɔm gonu.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ i kunɑ, Ikpɛ no. À nɑ i nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i deimi jɛrɛ.
À sɛ no sɑɑ kulu i gundɑ himmɑ. I bei zɑ kɑ i goono gɑɑhɑm wɔne kunɑ i gɑ mooru ndɑ Kpe gɔrɛ dɔ.
Nɑɑne nɑ i gɑ dirɑ ndɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ diyom.
I gundɑ himmɑ. I bine gɑ bɑɑ i mɑ gɑɑhɑm wɔne nɑm kɑ gɔrɔ Kpe dɔ.
À sɛ nɑ, de gɑɑhɑm wɔne kunɑ no i bo gɔrɔ wɑlɑ i kɑɑ hunu ɑ̀ kunɑ no, i dee go wetere i mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
Tilɑsi no i kulu mɑ cɛ Mɛsiyɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ jine hɑli bɔrɔ kulu mɑ du ngɑ tɛyom bɔm kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, de ihinno no wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ nɑ.
Zɑ kɑ i go Kpe hɑmbure bei, ɑ̀ sɛ no i go ceeci i mɑ beerem bɛrɛ. Ammɑ i ci bɔrɔ kpɑrɛ yom Ikpɛ sɛ. A go tɑmmɑ mo i ci bɔrɔ kpɑrɛ yom wom bine kunɑ sendi kunɑ mo.
I si i bɔm sifɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom sɛ. Ammɑ i go wom no dɑɑmɑ wom mɑ fɑɑre ndɑ i yom. Wom mɑ du hɛ fɔ kɑ tu kɑ yeti beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go fɑɑre ndɑ tɑkɑri, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ bine.
De i ci bɔmsikpɛ yom, i ci yɑ no Ikpɛ sɛ. De i ci bɔmkpɛ yom, i ci yɑ nɑ wom sɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine go kɑ i fum zɑmɑ i go wɔne bei siikɑ si zɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bu bɔrɔ kulu sɛ, yɑ di gɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu bu.
Mɛsiyɑ bine bu bɔrɔ kulu sɛ, zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hunɑ ǹ mɑ si hunɑ kpɛɛnɛ ngei bɔm sɛ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ tunu ǹ sɛ.
Hɑli ɑ̀ tɔ mɑɑsɑnkulu, i si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu bei zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ dom bɑ kɑ i nɑ Mɛsiyɑ bei zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ, i si ɑ̀ bei kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ yɑ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci tɑkɑhɛ teji. Hɛ zeenɔ yom bisɑ. Gunɑ, hɛ kulu tɛ iteji.
Hɛ kulu mo, Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ go hunu. Ngɑ yɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɑbɑ dɑm i yom ndɑ ngɑ gɑme Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. A nɑ i no sɑsɑbɑndiyom gbei mo.
Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no Ikpɛ goono ko sɑbɑ dɑm ngɑ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ gɑme. À si kɑ iburɑdɑm yom tɑɑli yom lɑsɑbu ǹ sɛ. À bine nɑ sɑsɑbɑndiyom sendi tɑlifi i gɑɑ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ i bɑrɑ nɑ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ mee i go wom no himmɑ ko ŋmɑɑrɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ, wom mɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ fɑ.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ dulum bei. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i sɛ dulum zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ i mɑ tɛ Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu.
I yom mo, i go gbei tɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ. À sɛ no, i go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wɑ si Ikpɛ gomini tɑ kɑ tɛ kɔnu.
À cii: "Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ. Fɑɑbɑ hɑnu kunɑ mo, ɑ nɑ n gɑɑ." Gunɑ, mɑɑsɑnkulu lɔkɑci hegu. Mɑɑsɑnkulu fɑɑbɑ hɑnu nɑ.
I si dɛrɛyom hɛ sɑbɑbu dɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu jine zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si i gbei yɑnce.
Ammɑ i go kɑ i bɔm cɛbɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ i yom yɑ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri yom no. I go gbei tɛ ndɑ suuru bɑmbɑtɑ. I goono tɑɑbi kunɑ. I goono zɑme kunɑ. I goono kɑnkɑmi kunɑ.
Ǹ go kɑ i bulɑɑlɑ mo. Ǹ go kɑ i dɑm kɑsu kunɑ. I goono kɔsɔngu kunɑ. I go gbei gɑɑbɔ yom tɛ. I go bɑtu ndɑ himmɑ. I go meehɔ zɑɑ.
I go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hinneyom kunɑ. I gundɑ beiyom. I gundɑ suuru kuku. I go bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ cɛbɛ. I gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. I gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ.
I go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mo cimi sendi kunɑ. I gundɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri. I gundɑ cɛɑndiyom susu wɑngu jiine yom kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
I gɑ gbei tɛ bɛɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ hɑwi kunɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ ndɑ sendi hinno. Ǹ nɑ i gunɑ zɑngɑ zɑmbɑkpɛ yom, ɑmmɑ cimi no i go cii.
I yom yɑ ci zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si bei, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ boobo go kɑ i bei. I ci zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ bu ɑmmɑ gunɑ, i go hunɑ. I ci beerem kɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ i wi.
I ci beerem kɑ ǹ bine gɑ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ i go fɑihã sɑɑ kulu. I ci tɑlikɑ yom, ɑmmɑ i go bɑrikɑ dɑm jɑmɑ gɑɑ. I sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu, ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu i ŋmɔne no.
To. Wom Kɔlɛntei, i sendi wom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. I nɑ i bine yom feeri mo wom sɛ sã sã.
I mɑnɑ i bine yom dɑɑbu wom sɛ. Wom yɑ nɑ wom bine yom dɑɑbu i sɛ.
Wom mo, wɑ tɛ i sɛ yɑ di. A go sendi wom sɛ no zɑngɑ ɑ koo yom sɛ. Wom mo, wɑ wom bine yom feeri.
Wɑ si meigu zɑngɑ zuu fɔlɔnku kunɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. Ifɔ yɑ goono Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu ndɑ ilɑlɔ gɑme? Wɑlɑ ifɔ gɑɑ no kɑɑri ndɑ kube gɑ meigu?
Ifɔ yɑ goono Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Beliɑ gɑme? Wɑlɑ ifɔ yɑ nɑɑnekɔ ndɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ meigu?
Ifɔ yɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ ndɑ tooru yom meigu? Wom yɑ ci Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ cii: "A kɑɑ gɔrɔ ǹ kunɑ. A kɑɑ dirɑ ǹ bindi kunɑ. A kɑɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ tɛ ɑ jɑmɑ."
À sɛ nɑ Kpe cii: "Wɑ hunu ǹ bindi kunɑ. Wɑ fee ndei. Wɑ si lɑmbɑ hɛ ziibɔ gɑɑ. A kɑɑ wom tɑ.
Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ Bɑɑbɑ. Wom mo, wom kɑɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ koo yom, koo hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ koo weibɔrɔ yom. Kpe, hɛ kulu Dɑbɑrikpɛ cii yɑ di."
Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ bine bɑɑkɔei Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli nge yom di tɛ i sɛ. À sɛ no, i mɑ i bɔm hinnɑndi gɑɑhɑm ndɑ biyɑ ziibɑndikɔ kulu gɑɑ. I mɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ tɔɑndi Ikpɛ hɑmbure kunɑ.
Wɑ wom bine yom feeri i sɛ. I mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dɛrɑndi. I mɑnɑ hɑsɑrɔ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. I mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
À mɑnɑ ci kɑ wom ciiti kɑ zeeri sɛ no ɑ go wɔne cii. A cii kɔ kɑ wom goono i bine yom kunɑ zɑ bu hɑli hunɑ.
A gundɑ nɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ wom gɑɑ. A go fɑihã ndɑ wom kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. A bine du himmɑ wom sɑbu sɛ. A binekɑɑne go tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom i tɑɑbi kulu bindi bindi.
Cimi no, sɑɑ kɑ i kɑɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu mo i mɑnɑ du hulonzom kulu. I du kɑnkɑmi dimi boobo kɑmbu kulu gɑɑ. Beerem kɑkɔ ndɑ i yom. Hɑmburu mɑ goono i bine yom kunɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛnɑndi yɑmɑrɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi ndɑ Titu kɑɑyom.

À mɑnɑ ci ndɑ Titu kɑɑyomɑ hinne mo no, ɑmmɑ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ Titu bumbum du wom dɔ kpɛɛnɛ. Titu deede i sɛ bɛɛjɛ kɑ wom gundɑ ɑ sɛ. À deede i sɛ mo wom mundi ndɑ wom hɑnyɑ kɑ wom gundɑ ɑ sɛ. À sɛ no ɑ go fɑihã hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
Bɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi ndɑ ɑ tirɑ, ɑ mɑnɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ de ɑ dom bei. Bɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ de ɑ dɑm bei, ɑ di no kɑ ɑ tirɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi bɑndɑ fɔ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go fɑihã. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ wom binesɛrɛ gɑɑ, wom tɔ tuubiyom dɔ. Wom bine sɑrɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ hɑli hɛ kulu kunɑ wom mɑ si du muruse i dɔ.
Binesɛrɛ dimi kɑ Ikpɛ go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ tuubi dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ sɛ. Tuubi mo no bɔrɔ si tunɑndi. Ammɑ binesɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu hɑndunyɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bu.

Gunɑ, binesɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. À hɛi wom kunɑ kokɑri ndɑ wom bɔm hinnɑndiyom mo. Gunɑ, binetɔnɛ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ guuri ndɑ himmɑ ndɑ fɑɑsɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Hɛ kulu kunɑ wom nɑ wom bɔm cɛbɛ kɑ wom hinne ɑsiiri wɔ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ. A mɑnɑ hɑntum bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ sɑbu sɛ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ zɑmɑ kokɑri kɑ i gundɑ wom sɛ mɑ hunutɛrɛ wom sɛ Ikpɛ jine.
À sɛ no, wom nɑ i no himmɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu kpɛɛnɛ. I go fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Titu binekɑɑne sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ wom kulu nɑ ɑ̀ bine yeenɑndi.
A nɑ fɑɑri tɛ Titu gɑɑ ndɑ wom. Wom mɑnɑ ɑ hɑwɑndi. I nɑ hɛ kulu cii wom sɛ cimi bɔm. Yɑ nɑ i fɑɑri kɑ i go tɛ ndɑ wom Titu gɑɑ mo tɛ cimi.
Titu gundɑ wom binejijire kɑlɑ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɔngɔ wom gɑnɑyom. Sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ kube wom hɑmburu kɑ gɑsi.
À sɛ no, ɑ go fɑihã ndɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ nɑɑne wom gɑɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ.
Nyɑizei, i go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gomini no Mɑsedoni Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ.
Tɑɑbi suiyom boobo kunɑ ǹ fɑihã bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ tɑlikɑtɛrɛ lɑlɔ kunɑ ǹ nɑ noyom tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
A gɑ ci sɛdɑ ǹ nɑ ngei hinɑ nɑ hɑli ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ bumbum hini. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ bine fɔ.
Ǹ nɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ i mɑ kpeindɑ gomini kɑ ngei tɛ kɑ meigu hɑlɑɑlɑntei sɛ.
Noyom kɑ ǹ tɛ bisɑ hɛ kɑ i tɑmmɑ. Sintine jinɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm nɑ Kpe sɛ. À bɑndɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ, ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm nɑ i yom mɑ, i sɛ.
À sɛ nɑ, i nɑ Titu nɑ himmɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti ɑ̀ mɑ gomini gbei wɔ mɑ tɔnɑndi wom dɔ.

Ammɑ wom gɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu hɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ sendi kunɑ. Wom gɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu beiyom kunɑ ndɑ himmɑ kulu kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom gundɑ i sɛ kunɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ wom mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu gomini wɔ mɑ kunɑ.
A si sendi zɑngɑ kɑ meire nɑ bɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ cindei himmɑ sɑbu sɛ ɑ gɑ sendi kɑ wom bubure kɑ di hɑli wom bɑɑkɑsine gundɑ bine fɔ.
Wom gɑ kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini bei. Bɑ kɑ bɑrikɑkpɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ tɑlikɑ wom sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɑlikɑtɛrɛ gɑɑ wom mo tɛ bɑrikɑkpɛ yom.
Wɔne kunɑ ɑ diyom no ɑ go cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ gundɑ wom sɛ hɑnfɑni. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ wom sinti kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hinne bo ɑmmɑ wom du binebɑɑ zɑ mɑnɑm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, mɑɑsɑ hɛ kɑ wom sinti, wɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi. Zɑngɑ wom binebɑɑ tɔnɑndiyom goono, yɑ no tɛyom mo goono hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ bɔm.
De noyom goono ndɑ bine fɔ, hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ gundɑ bɔm ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ sindɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci i mɑ dɔgɔnɑndi cindei sɛ nɑ bo, wom wɔ, wom mo tɑɑbi ɑmmɑ kɑ wom mɑ sɑbɑ.
Hɑli sɑɑ kɑ wom goono bɑyom kunɑ wom mɑ hini kɑ beerem gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ goono bɑnji kunɑ. Hɑnu kɑ wom mo wom goono bɑnji kunɑ, ngei mo goono bɑyom kunɑ ǹ mɑ hini kɑ wom gɑɑ hɑli wom mɑ sɑbɑ.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunnɑ iboobo, ɑ̀ wɑsɑ ɑkpɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunnɑ cɛnɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ."
I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ fɔlɔnku dɑm Titu bine kunɑ wom sɛ.
À nɑ i yɑmɑrɑndiyom tɑ. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ himmɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ bumbum nufi ngɑ bine dɔ ngɑ mɑ kpei wom dɔ.
I go nyɑize fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu go nyɑize di sɑɑbu ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ.
Ngɑ di bɑ si mo, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑɑru i bɑndɑ gomini gbei wɔ kunɑ. I gɑ gbei wɔ tɔnɑndi kɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Kpe sɛ kɑ cɛbɛ mɑ kɑ wom gundɑ bine fɔ ngɑ di kunɑ.
I gɑ lɑɑkɑli mɑ hɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si du kɑ i yɑnce kɑ simbɑ ndɑ nooru beeri wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kɑmbɛ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori no i go ceeci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kpe hinne jine ɑmmɑ ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom mo jine.
I nɑ i nyɑize wɔne mo dɔntɔm ǹ bɑndɑ, ngɑ kɑ sɑɑ boobo i cini kɑ ɑ̀ himmɑ sui. Mɑɑsɑ mo ɑ̀ tɛ himmɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ tɔntɔnu nɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wom gɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Titu wɔ yɑ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ ndɑ hɛɛ wom sɑbu sɛ. I nyɑize yom mo kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dum, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom go kɑ ǹ sɑmbɑ no. Ǹ go kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ mo.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom jine wom bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i go fɑɑre ndɑ wom.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑɑkɑsine hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɔ yɑ hɑntum wom sɛ.
A go wom bine fɔ bei, sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ go fɑɑre ndɑ wom Mɑsedoni beerem jine. A go cii kɑ Akɑyɑ beerem sɔlu beeni zɑ mɑnɑm. Wom himmɑ di bine nɑ nyɑize jɑmɑ zukum.
Ammɑ ɑ nɑ nyɑize yom dɔntɔm wom dɔ hɑli sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i go fɑɑre ndɑ wom, ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ kɔnu. A nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm zɑmɑ wom mɑ sɔlu mo zɑngɑ ɑ cii.
De Mɑsedoni beerem kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ ǹ mɑ si gɑru wom mɑnɑ sɔlu hɑli hɑwi gɑ i dii nɑɑne kɑ i gundɑ wom gɑɑ sɑbu sɛ. Yɑ mo no hɑwi kɑɑ wom dii.

À sɛ no, ɑ gunɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ sɛ yɑ nyɑizei nɑ himmɑ ǹ mɑ kpei wom dɔ jinɑ kɑ wom noyom kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ, kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ kɔ meigu. À gɑɑ no sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono sɔlɑntɛ zɑngɑ gomini hɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ tilɑsi.
Wom mɑ wɔne bei. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑ cɛnɑ, cɛnɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑ iboobo mo, iboobo no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi.
Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ miilɑ ngɑ bine dɔ, binesɛrɛ mɑ si, tilɑsi mɑ si. Ikpɛ gɑ bɑɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go no ndɑ fɑihã.
Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ngɑ gomini kulu tɔntɔnu wom sɛ ndɑ bɑyom, zɑmɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ wom mɑ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ sɑɑ kulu. Wom mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu mo gbei hinno yom kulu sɛ.
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "À no kɑ dɑɑru. À nɑ tɑlikɑ yom no. À cɛɑndiyom susu goono, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom."
Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑkɔ nɑ dimi ndɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ, yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom no dimi kɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu. Wom cɛɑndiyom susu mo kɑɑ bɑrikɑ tɔntɔnu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
À go nɑm wom mɑ tɛ bɑrikɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑli wom hini kɑ noyom tɛ ndɑ bɑyom. À gɑɑ no, ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ noyom kɑ wom sɑmbɑ i dɔ.
Gɑɑkɑsine wɔ kɑ wom go tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom zɑme hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑm mɑ bɔrɔ jɑmɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Gɑɑkɑsine wɔ gɑ cɛbɛ hɛ kɑ wom bɑrɑ. À sɛ nɑ, jɑmɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ wom nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno gɑnɑ. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu mo ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom kɑ wom fɑrisi ndei ndɑ cindei kulu.
Ǹ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom sɛ, ǹ gundɑ wom bɛɛjɛ mo gomini beeri kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ wom dɔ sɑbu sɛ.
I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ɑ̀ noyom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ cine.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom bindi kunɑ ɑ bɑrɑ nɑ wom kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ, ɑmmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ si wom dɔ ɑ bɑrɑ no yɑru.
A gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ, wom mɑ si ɑ tilɑsi yɑ gbei ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. A go miilɑ yɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ i gunɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom.
I go dirɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑmmɑ i si tɑngɑm ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli goono ndɑ.
I wɑngu jiine yom mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom. Ikpɛ wɑngu jiine dɑbɑrikpɛ yom no kɑ nungu gɑɑbikoni yom zeeri ndei.
I go lɑsɑbu kulu ndɑ fɑɑre kulu zeeri kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm beerɑndi kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ beiyom. I go lɑsɑbu kulu dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑnɑyom kɑɑ kube, i sɔlu mɑ i mɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ si gɑnɑ bɑnɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ sɛ.
Tɑkɑri nɑ wom gɑ gunɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ nɑɑne ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ ngɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ bei kɑ i yom mo Mɛsiyɑ bɔrɔ yom mo zɑngɑ nge yom.
Kpe nɑ i nɑ hini. À nɑ i nɑ ndɑɑ̀ zɑmɑ i mɑ wom nɑɑne cini. À mɑnɑ i nɑ hini zɑmɑ i mɑ wom zeeri. De ɑ go fɑɑre cɛnɑ fɔ ndɑ hini wɔ, hɑwi si ɑ dii.
A si bɑɑ beerem mɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ go wom hɑmburɑndi ndɑ ɑ tirɑ yom.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii: Pɔlu tirɑ yom gɑɑbu, ǹ futu mo. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bumbum goono i kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm bɑrɑ hinɑbunu no. À sendi mo mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ bei kɑ hɛ kɑ i gɑ hɑntum i tirɑ yom kunɑ de i si wom dɔ ndɑ hɛ kɑ i kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ i kɑɑ wom dɔ, ǹ kulu ɑfɔ nɑ.

I si bɑɑ i mɑ i bɔm dɑm wɑlɑ i mɑ i bɔm sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ ngei bɔm sɑɑbu. Ngei wɔ neesiji nɑ ǹ tɛ ngei bɔm sɛ kɑ ngei bɔm neesi. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ ngei bɔm. Ǹ sindɑ fɑhɑm.
Ammɑ i yom, i si bɑɑ i mɑ fɑɑre kɑ bisɑ i kɔrɔme, kɔrɔme bɔm kɑ Ikpɛ Kɔrɔmekpɛ dumbu, i mɑ kpei hɑli wom dɔ.
Kɑ i kpei hɑli wom dɔ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ, i mɑnɑ bisɑ i kɔrɔme.
I si fɑɑre ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ i kɔrɔme. Ammɑ i gundɑ bɛɛjɛ wom nɑɑne mo tɔntɔnu kɑ beeri hɑli i bumbum gbei bɑ tɔntɔnu kɑ beeri wom gɑme i kɔrɔme kunɑ.
I mɑ wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm lɑɑbu yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑli wom bisɑntɛ. Yɑ no i mɑ si fɑɑre ndɑ hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni tɛ ngɑ kɔrɔme kunɑ.
Ammɑ "bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑre, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑɑre Kpe kunɑ".
À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm sifɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ go tɑbɑtɑndi bo, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ Kpe go sifɑ.
A gɑ bɑɑ dee no wom mɑ ɑ sɑmutɛrɛ jɛrɛ ɑ sɛ cɛnɑ. Ammɑ cimi nɑ, wom mɑ suuru ɑ sɛ mo.
A go cɛnsɛ ndɑ wom ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛnsɛ dimi. A nɑ wom no kunye fɔlɔnku sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ. A mɑ wom cɛɑndi ɑ̀ jine zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ hinno kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑru bei.
Ammɑ ɑ go hɑmburu hɑli zɑngɑ gondi nɑ Efe zɑmbɑ ndɑ ngɑ cɛmbɛrɛ wom mo, wom lɑsɑbu yom mɑ si sɑrɑ. Wɑ si bɑndɑ bɛrɛ miilɑ hinno yom sɛ kɑ wom gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.

Ammɑ zɑngɑ sendi bɔrɔ go kɑɑ wom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go Yesu fɔ ŋmɑni bɑɑru fɛɛ wom sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci wɔ kɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ wom sɛ di. Hɑnibɑ wom go biyɑ ŋmɑni fɔ tɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ wom tɑ dom. Hɑnibɑ wom du bɑɑru hinno ŋmɑni fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ wom tɑ. A go hɑmburu hɑli wom go suuru ndei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
A go tɑmmɑ hɛ kulu gɑɑ no yɑ nɑ gɑziɑ diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ ǹ kulu.
Ammɑ bɑ de ɑ si ŋmɑɑni sendi, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ si zɑm beiyom. I bine nɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ wom gɑme hɛ kulu dɔ hɛ kulu kunɑ.
Wɑlɑ ɑ nɑ tɑɑli fɔ tɛ no kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ wom bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ wom sɛ, bɑnɑndi si?
A nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔ yom kɔm kɑ du ǹ dɔ bɑnɑndi kɑ wom gɑɑ.

Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ ɑ goono bɑɑyom kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ tɛ jɛrɔ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ zɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu, ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ hɛ kɑ gɑziɑ ɑ sɛ. Hɛ kulu gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ bɔm jɛ yɑ si tɛ wom sɛ jɛrɔ sɑbu sɛ. A gɑ ɑ bɔm jɛ mo.
Ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ cimi kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ ɑ gɑ cii Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ ǹ si kɑ ɑ gɑnji yɑ fɑɑre.
Ifɔ sɛ ɑ cii yɑ? A si bɑɑ wom sɛ no? Ikpɛ go bei kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom.
Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ go tɛ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ hɑli yɑ beerem wɔ kɔbɛ kɑɑ. Beerem wɔ go bɑɑ kɔbɛ ǹ mɑ fɑɑre kɑ cii ngei gɑ gbei tɛ zɑngɑ i yom.
Beerem nge yom di diyɑ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom nɑ. Ǹ ci gbeiteeri zɑmbɑntɛ yom. Ǹ go kɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ yom.
À bine mɑnɑ ci mɑmɑci hɛ. Setɑm bumbum gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ kɑɑri dɔntɔneize.
À sɛ nɑ wɔne mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ de ǹ gbeiteeri yom mo go kɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu gbeiteeri yom. Ǹ lɔkɑci beenɑntɛ ǹ kɑɑ du ngei gbei bɑnɑndi.
A go cii kpɛɛnɛ, bɑmee mɑ si ɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ sɑmu. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wɑ ɑ tɑ zɑngɑ sɑmu. Hɛɛ mo, yɑ fɑɑre cɛnɑ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii wɔ, ɑ si cii zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu Kpe dɔ. Ammɑ zɑngɑ sɑmutɛrɛ kunɑ ɑ go sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ gundɑ ko fɑɑre.
Jɑmɑ go fɑɑre zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli goono ndɑ. Hɛɛ mɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ nɑ.
Zɑ kɑ wom yɑ hɑikusu yom no wom go suuru ndɑ sɑmu yom ndɑ bine fɔ.

Hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go wom dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑ. Hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ wom dii wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi. Hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wom sɑm moojine gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, wom go suuru ndɑ beerem di ndɑ bine fɔ.
Hɑwi gɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑ̀ ciiyom, zɑngɑ dee i yom wɔ i tɛ hinɑbunu yom nɑ. Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ tu ngɑ mɑ fɑɑre ndɑ hɛ fɔ, hɛɛ mɑ, ɑ du ko fɑɑre kɑ bisɑɑ̀. A gɑ sendi no zɑngɑ sɑmutɛrɛ kunɑ.
Ebulu yom nɑ bɑ? Yɑ nɑ, hɛɛ mɑ. Isirɑilɑ ize yom no bɑ? Yɑ nɑ, hɛɛ mɑ. Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no bɑ? Yɑ no, hɛɛ mo.
Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri yom no bɑ? Yɑ no, hɛɛ mo kɑ bisei. A go sendi zɑngɑ sɑmu. A nɑ gbei tɛ kɑ bisei. Ǹ nɑ ɑ kɑru ce bɑɑbɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ dɑm kɑsu ce bɑɑbɑ. A di bu dullu ce boobo.
Ce gu yɑ nɑ, Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ ndɑ korongɑ mee weitɑɑci ɑfɔ si.
Ce hinzɑ yɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ kɑru ndɑ goobu. Ce fɔ mo ǹ nɑ ɑ cetu ndɑ tɑndi yom. Hɑsɑrɔ tɛ ɑ sɛ tɛku bɔm ce hinzɑ. A nɑ zɑɑri fɔ ndɑ ciini fɔ tɛ tɛku bɔm.

A gɑ nɑɑru ce bɑɑbɑ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ isɑ bɔm. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ zee yom dɔ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ ɑ dimi yom dɔ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ dimi cindei dɔ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ gɑnji yom kunɑ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ tɛku bɔm. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ nyɑize tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom dɔ.
Kɑnkɑmi kunɑ ɑ nɑ gbei futu yom tɛ. A zɑm jiibi ce boobo. A mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ. A mɑɑ jo. A nɑ meehɔ yom zɑɑ cɛrɛ bɔm. A mɑɑ yeeni. A gɔrɔ bumbum.
Afɔ yom kɑ yɑ nɑ cii bɑ si, hɑnu kulu mo ɑ go gɔrɔ ndɑ kɑrihã Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu sɛ.
Mee yɑ ci hinɑbunu kɑ yɑ nɑ ci hinɑbunu? Mee no ǹ dɛrɑndi ɑ bine mɑnɑ kukure?
De ɑ̀ sɑbɑ bɔrɔ mɑ fɑɑre nɑ, ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ no ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑrikɑkpɛ beeniyom si, ɑ̀ go bei kɑ ɑ si tɑngɑri.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ Kpe Aletɑ gbeiteeri gɑɑbikoni fɔ nɑ beerem dɑm kɑ hundi Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ mee yom kulu gɑɑ ngɑ mɑ du kɑ ɑ dii.
Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ zumɑndi cilɑ beeri fɔ kunɑ fune fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono yɛmbɛ gɑɑ hɑli ɑ du kɑ kɔmɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ fɑɑri tɛ ɑ̀ sindɑ ɑ sɛ hɑnfɑni. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu diyom ndɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ du Kpe dɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ.

A gɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bei. Jiiri wei cindi tɑɑci goono mɑɑsɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ hɑli bɛɛnɛ hinzɑntɛ. Ammɑ ɑ si bei de cimi ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ kɑ kpeindɑ no, wɑlɑ de diyom fɔ no. Ikpɛ yɑ bei.
A go kɑ ɑkpɛ bei. Ammɑ ɑ si bei ndɑ cimi ɑ̀ goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ no wɑlɑ diyom fɔ no. Ikpɛ yɑ bei.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑ Nungu Hinno bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. A mɑɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ si cii kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tu iburɑdɑm sɛ ɑ̀ mee mɑ ǹ sendi.
A gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ ngɑ di. Ammɑ ɑ si fɑɑre ndɑ ɑ bɔm de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ.

De ɑ gɑ bɑɑ yɑ fɑɑre dom, ɑ si ci sɑmu zɑmɑ cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii. Ammɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ bɔm fɑɑre nɑm. A si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di ɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑ ǹ go cii ɑ gɑɑ.
Yɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ mo ndɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ kɑriji fɔ dɑm ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ. Kɑrijɑ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ Setɑm sɑmbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gooru gooru zɑmɑ yɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ.
Ce hinzɑ no, ɑ nɑ Kpe ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wɔne kɑɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
À bine cii ɑ sɛ: A gomini wɑsɑ ni zɑmɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ nɑ ɑ dɑbɑri cini tɔ. À sɛ no ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ ihinno ndɑ ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɑbɑri mɑ du kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ bɔm.

Ngɑ di sɛ no, ɑ̀ go kɑɑni ɑ sɛ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom kunɑ ndɑ zɑme yom kunɑ ndɑ guruguze yom kunɑ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi yom kunɑ. À go kɑɑni ɑ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ci hinɑbunu, sɑɑ di gɑɑ dee no ɑ tɛ gɑɑbi.
Fɑɑre kunɑ ɑ tɛ sɑmu. Wom yɑ nɑ ɑ tilɑsi. Wom dɔ no ɑ himɑ yɑ du bɛɛrɛ. Yɑ nɑ gɑziɑ diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ ǹ kulu. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu yɑ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ kulu.
Cimi nɑ diyɑtɛrɛ ɑlɑmu yom ɑ nɑ ǹ tɛ wom bindi kunɑ. A nɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kokɑri kulu ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom.
Ifɔ gɑɑ no wom gɑziɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cindei? Yɑ nɑ tɛ wom sɛ jɛrɔ bɑ si, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ wom gɑziɑ bɑ? Wom mɑ ɑ yɑɑfɑ ndɑɑ̀.

Gunɑ, ce hinzɑntɛ neyɑ kɑ ɑ sɔlu yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. A bine si gɔrɔ wom jɛsɛ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom hɑibɑrikɑ yom nɑ ɑ go ceeci. Ammɑ ɑ go bɑɑ wom bumbum. À mɑnɑ ci koo yom yɑ meigu bɑhɛi yom sɛ ɑmmɑ bɑhɛi yom yɑ meigu ngei koo yom sɛ.
À sɛ no hɛɛ wɔ, ndɑ fɑihã no ɑ gɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu wi. A gɑ ɑ bumbum mɑ no wom hundi yom sɑbu sɛ. Bɑ de kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, wom bɑɑkɑsine ɑ sɛ gɑziɑ.
Tɑ. Yɑ nɑ gɔrɔ wom jɛsɛ bɔm. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑɑ tɑmmɑ cɛmbɛrɛ nɑ ɑ tɛ kɑ du wom.
Beerem kɑ ɑ dɔntɔm wom dɔ, ɑ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ wom ŋmɑɑ nɑ?
A nɑ Titu dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei wom dɔ. A nɑ nyɑize fɔ mɑ dɑm ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Titu nɑ wom ŋmɑɑ bɑ? Bine fɔ kunɑ nɑ i dirɑ. Turubɑ fɔlɔnkuei kunɑ no i dirɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Zɑ jɛyom wom go lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom dɔ nɑ i gɑ kɑ i bɔm hinnɑndi. Ikpɛ jine no i go sendi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Hɛ wɔ kulu mo, ɑ bine bɑɑkɔei, i go kɑ ɑ̀ cii no wom nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ.

A go hɑmburu sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ yɑ wom gɑru zɑngɑ ɑ si bɑɑ. Hɛɛ mo, wom gɑ ɑ gɑru zɑngɑ wom si bɑɑ. À mɑ si ci yɑ gɑru wom gɑme zoji wɑlɑ cɛnsɛ wɑlɑ binefute wɑlɑ kɑkɔ wɑlɑ sendi yɑmɔ wɑlɑ ciine wɑlɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ wɑlɑ kɔsɔngu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ cɛnɑndi wom jine. A bine mo mɑ si sɑrɑ bɔrɔ boobo sɛ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ dulum tɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tuubi mo kɑ fee ndɑ ziibi ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ kɑ ǹ tɛ.
A ce hinzɑntɛ neyɑ kɑ ɑ go kɑɑ wom dɔ. "Sɛdɑ hinkɑ wɑlɑ ihinzɑ gɑ ɑsiiri kulu gɔrɛndi".

A jinɑ kɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ce hinkɑntɛ. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ si wom dɔ, ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii kpɛɛnɛ kɑ jisi. A gɑ hɑntum beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ dulum tɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑ si ǹ bɑkɑɑ. A si cindei mɑ kulu bɑkɑɑ.
Wom gɑ sɛdɑ fɔ ceeci kɑ Mɛsiyɑ go sendi ɑ kunɑ. Tɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tɛ wom sɛ hinɑbunu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑɑbikoni wom gɑme.
Hinɑbunutɛrɛ dɔ ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑnji. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri gɑɑ. I yom mo, i tɛ hinɑbunu yom ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ammɑ i kɑɑ hunɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri gɑɑ wom hɑnfɑni sɛ.
Wo wom bɔm neesi ko wom bumbum gunɑ kɑ di hɑli wom goono nɑɑne kunɑ. Wom go bei kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ goono wom kunɑ bɑ? De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wom si hini kɑ wom nɑɑne cɛbɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom mɑ bei kɑ i yom wɔ, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i furu.
Ammɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ si hɛ lɑlɔ kulu tɛ bɑ cɛnɑ. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ beerem mɑ di Ikpɛ nɑ i tɑbɑtɑndi, ɑmmɑ kɑ wom mo kɑ ihinno tɛ, i yom mo i mɑ ci zɑngɑ furɑntɛ yom.
I sindɑ dɑbɑri fɔ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cimi. Ammɑ i mɑ cimi gbei tɛ.
I go fɑihã sɑɑ kɑ i tɛ hinɑbunu yom. Wom go tɛ gɑɑbikoni yom. I gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ ci tɔɑntɛ yom.
À sɛ nɑ, kɑ ɑ si wom dɔ ɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ hɑntum wom sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ yɑ si futu wom gɑɑ. Kpe nɑ ɑ nɑ hini wom nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom zeeriyom sɛ.
Kɑ beeni ndɑ nyɑizei, wɑ fɑihã. Wɑ wom nɑɑne tɔɑndi. Wɑ cɛrɛ nɑ himmɑ. Wɑ gundɑ lɑsɑbu fɔlɔnku. Wɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑkɑsinekpɛ ndɑ Lɑɑkɑli Kɑnekpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wom.
Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Hɑlɑɑlɑntei kulu gɑ wom fɔɔ.
Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ bine fɔ meiguyom, ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wom kulu. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci diyɑ. A diyɑtɛrɛ mɑnɑ hunu iburɑdɑm yom dɔ. A mɑnɑ du ɑ̀ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔ mo. Ammɑ ɑ tɛ diyɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
Hɛɛ ndɑ nyɑizei kulu kɑ ǹ goono ɑ dɔ, i go Gɑlɑte Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu fɔɔ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑni kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
Yesu wɔ nɑ ngɑ bɔm no i dulum yom sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ i kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni lɑlɔ wɔ kunɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bɔm.
Deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
A go mɑmɑci ndɑ kɑ wom go wɑɑsu kɑ fee ndɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ Mɛsiyɑ gomini gɑɑ. Wom kpei bɑɑru hinno ŋmɑni fɔ dɔ.
Ammɑ Bɑɑru Hinno ŋmɑni fɔ si. Ammɑ beerem yɑ goono kɑ ǹ go wom bitɑndi. Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno biriji.
Ammɑ bɑ i yom wɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɛɛnɛ yɑ nɑ bɑɑru ŋmɑni fɔ fɛɛ wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ i wɑɑzu wom sɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci lɑɑliɑntɛ.
Zɑngɑ i jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cii mɑɑsɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑru hinno ŋmɑni fɛɛ wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ wom tɑ kɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci lɑɑliɑntɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ, ɑ go wetere beerem mɑ tu ɑ sɛ no, wɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑ tu ɑ sɛ? Yɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ no ɑ go ceeci bɑ? De ɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ, dom ɑ si ci Mɛsiyɑ tɑm.
Nyɑizei, ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ fɛɛ wom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ iburɑdɑm lɑsɑbu yom.
Yɑ nɑ du ɑ̀ iburɑdɑm dɔ wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dendenɑndi bo. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ.
Wom mɑɑ ɑ gɔrɛ bɑɑru sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono Yuifu yom gɑnɑyom kunɑ. A nɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ guruguzɑndi hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ ko kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
Wom mɑɑ mo zɑngɑ ɑ kpei jine Yuifu yom gɑnɑyom kunɑ kɑ bisɑ sɑrɑ boobo ɑ dimi kunɑ. A tɛ himmɑntɛ kɑ bisei, i cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ jisi kɑmbu zɑ ɑ nyɑ gunde kunɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ngɑ gomini gɑɑ.
À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ Ize kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ yɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ, mefɔ mefɔ yɑ sɑwɑrɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu.
A bine mɑnɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ diyɑ. Ammɑ ɑ kpei Alɑbi lɑɑbu. À bɑndɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
Jiiri hinzɑ bɑndɑ ɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm zɑmɑ ɑ mɑ Piɛɛ bei. A gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ jiribi wei cindi gu.
Ammɑ yɑ nɑ di diyɑ yom bɑ ɑfɔ kɑlɑ Yɑkɔfu, Kpe cɛɛnɛ.
Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ, gunɑ Ikpɛ jine ɑ si tɑngɑri pɑi.
À bɑndɑ ɑ kpei Siriɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Siliciɑ lɑɑbu.
Yude lɑɑbu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ ǹ si ɑ bei mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Ǹ mɑɑ hinne nɑ ǹ gɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i guruguzɑndi, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne fɔndɔ bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ sɑɑ fɔ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Jiiri wei cindi tɑɑci bɑndɑ ɑ ziji Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ. A nɑ Titu mɑ zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ.

A kpei nodi nɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ. A Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ ci jinɑ yom, ǹ sɛ no ɑ feeri kɑmbu zɑmɑ yɑ si gbei kɔnu tɛ wɑlɑ kɑ jinɑ kɑ gbei kɔnu tɛ.
Ammɑ bɑ Titu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Gɑrɛku ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsɑndi kɑ dɑmbɑngu.
Sendi wɔ tɛ no nyɑize tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom sɑbu sɛ kɑ ǹ mɔnɔ kɑ hurɑ i kunɑ. Ǹ huro kɑ i bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ kɑ i gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ gunɑ gunɑ hɑli ngei mɑ du kɑ i dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ.
I bine i mɑnɑ tu kɑ i bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ǹ sɛ bɑ lɔkɑci cɛnɑ zɑmɑ Bɑɑru Hinno ŋmɔne cimi mo gɔrɔ wom gɑme.
Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ cii ǹ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ zɑngɑ ǹ bɑrɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ bɑ si ndɑ ngɑ di. Ikpɛ si bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ. Bɔrɔ beeri yom mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɔntɔnu ɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ ǹ di Ikpɛ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ yɑ fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi Piɛɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ fɛɛ Yuifu yom sɛ.
Ikpɛ nɑ gbei tɛ Piɛɛ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ diyɑ Yuifu yom sɛ. Yɑ mo no Ikpɛ nɑ gbei tɛ hɛɛ mo, ɑ kunɑ yɑ tɛ diyɑ dimi cindei sɛ.

Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Sefɑ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ beerem cii ngei yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑɑsɑ yom, ǹ di gomini kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ nɑ. Ǹ nɑ i no nyɑizetɛrɛ dɑmyom kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ, hɛɛ ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ sɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ kpei dimi cindei dɔ, ngei mo mɑ kpei Yuifu yom dɔ.
Ǹ cii i sɛ hinne i mɑ hɔngɔ tɑlikɑ yom. Ngɑ di niyɑ no ɑ gundɑ.
Ammɑ kɑ Piɛɛ kɑɑ Antiɔku ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm moo ndɑ moo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ.
Zɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑnɑ hunu Yɑkɔfu dɔ, Piɛɛ cini ŋmɑɑ ndɑ dimi cindei. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ hunu ŋmɑni, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ hɑmburu Yuifu yom.
Yuifu yom mo ndɑ Piɛɛ nɑ munɑficitɛrɛ tɛ hɑli Bɑɑnɑbɑ mo ye ǹ bɑndɑ ǹ munɑficitɛrɛ kunɑ.

Ammɑ kɑ ɑ di ǹ si dirɑ susu ndɑ zɑngɑ Bɑɑru Hinno cimi goono ndɑ, ɑ sendi Piɛɛ sɛ ǹ kulu jine. À cii: De ni, kɑ n ci Yuifu n goono zɑngɑ dimi cindei ɑ̀ nɑ ci zɑngɑ Yuifu yom, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ dimi cindei tilɑsɑndi ǹ mɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɑ gɑnɑ?
Ǹ nɑ i hɛi Yuifu yom, ɑ̀ nɑ ci dulumkoni yom dimi cindei kunɑ.

I go bei mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci Moisi fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ no, Ikpɛ go bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu. Ammɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. I yom mo i nɑɑne Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gɑɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ du cɛyom susu nɑɑne gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. I si du ɑ̀ Moisi fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Sɑbɑbu yɑ ci kɑ bɔrɔ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi susu fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ.
De i go ceeci i mɑ du cɛyom susu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ beerem di i yom yɑ dulumkoni yom no, Mɛsiyɑ nɑ i dɑm i mɑ dulum tɛ bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ.
De ɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini hɛ yom kɑ ɑ zeeri, ɑ go kɑ ɑ bɔm cɛbɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ noyɑ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, fɔndɑ dɔ nɑ ɑ bu fɔndɑ sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ hunɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.

Ǹ nɑ ɑ kɑnji Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ go hunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ yɑ gɑ hunɑ. Mɛsiyɑ yɑ go hunɑ ɑ kunɑ. Hundi wɔ kɑ ɑ go hunɑ ndɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ɑ go hunɑ no ndɑ nɑɑne. A go nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ hɛɛ kɑ ngɑ bɔm no kɑ bu ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
A si Ikpɛ gomini yeti kɔnu zɑmɑ de Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom dɔ no cɛyom susu goono, Mɛsiyɑ bu no kɔnu.
E Gɑlɑte sɑmu yom kɑ wom bɑrɑ, mee yɑ nɑ wom dɛrɑndi hɑli wom si cimi gɑnɑ? Wom moo jine no ǹ nɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑnjɑntɛ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ yɑ bei wom dɔ hinne neyɑ. Fɔndɑ gbei yom bɔm no wom du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dee wɑlɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ nɑɑne nɑ?
Wom sɑmutɛrɛ tɔ hɑli yɑ wɔ? Wom sinti ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Mɑɑsɑ wom yɑ wom bɔm tɔɑndi ndɑ wom bɔm gɑɑbi bɑ?
Wom nɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm nɑ kɔnu bɑ? Awo, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kɔnu.
Ikpɛ bine go wom no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom tɛ wom gɑme. Fɔndɑ tɛgbei bɔm no ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ dee wɑlɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne?
Zɑngɑ yɑ no Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ, Ikpɛ nɑ nɑɑne lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛyom susu kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ bei beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ nɑɑne, ngei yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ koo yom.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ bine jinɑ kɑ jisi kɑ Ikpɛ mɑ dimi cindei cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ. À gɑɑ no Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ kɑ cii: "Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kulu kɑɑ du bɑrikɑ n dɔ."
Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ dom ɑ̀ nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ, yɑ no beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne, Ikpɛ gɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ, ǹ goono lɑɑli cire. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Lɑɑliɑntɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si moo dɑm ko tɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑntumɑntɛ fɔndɑ tirɑ kunɑ".
Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ du cɛyom susu Ikpɛ jine fɔndɑ bɔm. Ngɑ di tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no, domi "nɑɑne bɔm no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu kɑɑ hunɑ".
Bɑ kɑ fɔndɑ si nɑɑne bɔm Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go fɔndɑ meire yom gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ kɑɑ hunɑ ǹ gɑɑ".
Mɛsiyɑ nɑ i fɑnsɑ fɔndɑ lɑɑli gɑɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ lɑɑliɑntɛ i sɑbu sɛ. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Lɑɑliɑntɛ no bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ tuuri gɑɑ".
Ngɑ di tɛ mo no zɑmɑ bɑrikɑ kɑ Ikpɛ no Abulɛmɑ sɛ mɑ tɔ dimi cindei gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ. À tɛ mo hɑli i mɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑɑne dɔ wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ i mɑ du.
Nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ sendi no ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm kulu go fɑhɑm ndɑ. Bɑ iburɑdɑm ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑhirɑndi, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi wɑlɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom tɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ sɛ. À mɑnɑ cii bɑndɑ yom sɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ boobo no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cii "n bɑndɑ sɛ" zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
A go wɔne cii. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli dɑhirɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ dɑm. Fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ jiiri zɑngu tɑɑci ndɑ wɑrɑnzɑ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ɑlikɑwɑlɑ tunɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɔnu.
De fɔndɑ dɔ nɑ tubu go hunu, dom ɑ̀ si hunu ɑlikɑwɑli dɔ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ tubu ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli gɑɑ.

Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ sɛ no fɔndɑ goono? Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔntɔnu nɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom sɑbu sɛ kɑlɑ bɑndɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑlɑ tɛ mɑ kɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɑ sɑmbɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom dɔ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑsɑbɑndikɔ fɔ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
Sɑsɑbɑndikɔ wɔ mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku sɑsɑbɑndikɔ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ wɔ ngɑ fɔ nɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, fɔndɑ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli yom no bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ. De Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini kɑ hundi nɑ, dom cɛyom susu hunu fɔndɑ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu dɑm kɑ dɑɑbu dulum dɑbɑri cire zɑmɑ ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ no beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ.
Hɑli nɑɑne kɑɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i jisi kɑ dɑɑbu fɔndɑ cire nɑɑne sɛ, nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ fɔndɑ tɛ i sɛ zɑngɑ koo bɑtukɔ noyɑ kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ du cɛyom susu nɑɑne gɑɑ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ nɑɑne kɑɑ i si kɑɑ bɑtukɔ dɑbɑri cire kpɛɛnɛ.
Wom kulu Ikpɛ ize yom no nɑɑne dɔ zɑmɑ wom go nɑɑne Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ.
Wom kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ wom mirɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom nɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɑkɑ zɑngɑ tɑɑfɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ fɑyɑnkɑ si Yuifu ndɑ dimi cindei gɑme wɑlɑ tɑm ndɑ bɔrɔcini gɑme wɑlɑ hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ gɑme. Wom kulu ci ɑfɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
De wom ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom, wom ci Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom noyɑ. Wom ci tubukɔ yom mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli goono ndɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, sɑɑ kulu kɑ tubukɔ goono koo cɛnɑ, fɑyɑnkɑ si ngɑ ndɑ tɑm gɑme, bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ci hɛ kulu kpe.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ goono koo bɑtukɔ yom ndɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑlɑ lɔkɑci kɑ bɑɑbɑ jisi.
Yɑ nɑ i yom mo. Sɑɑ kɑ i goono koo cɛnɑ yom, i goono tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom sɛ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci tɔ, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize dɔntɔm, Ize kɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi fɔndɑ cire.
À kɑɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono fɔndɑ cire fɑnsɑ hɑli i mɑ du kootɛrɛ dɑmyom kɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom.
Zɑ kɑ wom ci koo yom Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize Biyɑ dɔntɔm wom bine yom kunɑ. À go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
Zɑngɑ yɑ n mɑnɑ ci tɑm kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ n ci ize. Zɑ kɑ n ci ize, n tɛ Ikpɛ tubukɔ mo Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Sɑɑ di wom mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bei ɑmmɑ wom tɑmtɛrɛ tooru yom sɛ wɔ kɑ yom ǹ hɑɑli gɑɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci ikpɛ yom.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ, wom go kɑ Ikpɛ bei, hɑli yɑ mo Ikpɛ go wom bei. Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ ye hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom gɑɑ, hɛ kɔnu yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi? Wom bɑɑ wom mɑ ye hɛ nge yom di tɑm yom kpɛɛnɛ?
Wom go hɑnu yom ndɑ hɑndu yom ndɑ Iɔkɑci yom ndɑ jiiri yom lɑsɑbu kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
Wom tɛyom wɔ sɑbu sɛ ɑ go hɑmburu, hɑnibɑ gbei kɔnu nɑ ɑ tɛ wom gɑme.
Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wom mɑ goono zɑngɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ hɛɛ mo ɑ goono zɑngɑ wom. Wom mɑnɑ dɛrɛ ɑ sɛ bɑ ce fɔ.
Ammɑ wom go bei gɑɑhɑm hinɑbunu kunɑ nɑ ɑ nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno zɑ sintine.
Bɑ kɑ ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ ci suiyom hɛ wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ fɛntɛ. Wom mɑnɑ hungu hɛɛ. Ammɑ wom nɑ ɑ tɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize, zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu cine.
Bine, ifɔ yɑ ci wom bɑrikɑ? A go wom sɛdɑ kɑ cii de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, dom wom mɑ wom moo yom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ ndei.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom go kɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ gɑ cimi cii wom sɛ?
Beerem di kɑ ǹ gɑ wom dɛrɑndi gundɑ himmɑ kɑ simbɑ wom, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci himmɑ hinno. Ǹ go bɑɑ nɑ ngei mɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑni i sɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ gundɑ himmɑ ngei dɔ hɛrɛ.
À boori bɔrɔ mɑ gundɑ himmɑ hɛ hinno gɑɑ sɑɑ kulu. À si boori bɔrɔ mɑ gundɑ himmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ hinne.
A koo yom, ɑ gɑ mɑɑ doori wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ gɑ hɛizɛnyɛ tɛ kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ boori wom kunɑ.
Oò, bɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ goono wom bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ jinde bɑɑnɑndi. Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ kɑrihã wom sɑbu sɛ.
Wom mɑ cii ɑ sɛ, wom kɑ wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire, wom si fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ fɔndɑ gɑ cii bɑ?
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii Abulɛmɑ du koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ. Afɔ kɔngɔ gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi, ɑfɔ mɑ bɔrɔcini weibɔrɔ gɑɑ.
Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu kɔngɔ di gɑɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ hɛi no ndɑ zɑngɑ gɑɑbɑsi goono ndɑ. Wɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi bɔrɔcini weibɔrɔ di gɑɑ mɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi no ɑlikɑwɑli gɑɑ.
Hɛ nge yom di ŋmɔne yɑɑse yom neyɑ. Weibɔrɔ hinkɑ di himɑ ɑlikɑwɑli hinkɑ no. Afɔ Sinɑi tɑndi kuku dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Tɑmtɛrɛ sɛ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi. Ngɑ yɑ ci Agɑi.
Agɑi wɔ Alɑbi lɑɑbu kunɑ Sinɑi tondi kuku no ɑ̀ himɑ. Agɑi sɑbɑ mɑ ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm mɑɑsɑ ŋmɔne, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ goono tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ ngɑ kɑɑ yom.
Ammɑ Yerusɑlɛm bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔcini, ngɑ yɑ ci i kulu nyɑ.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "E weibɔrɔ, ni kɑ n mɑnɑ hɛi, n mɑ fɑihã ndɑ binekɑɑne kɑ kuwɑ. Ni kɑ n mɑnɑ hɛiyom dɑɑri bei domi weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunyɑ fee ndɑ, ɑ̀ koo yom bɑ kɑ bisɑ kunyekpɛ koo yom."
Ammɑ nyɑizei, i yom yɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ize yom no zɑngɑ Isɑɑkɑ.
Ammɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ hɛi gɑɑhɑm dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ hɛi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ guruguzɑndi. Yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ goono bɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ.
Ammɑ ifɔ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ gɑ cii? "N mɑ kɔngɔ gɑɑrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ koo zɑmɑ kɔngɔ koo si tubu pɑi ndɑ weibɔrɔ bɔrɔcini koo".
À sɛ no nyɑizei, i mɑnɑ ci kɔngɔ ize yom ɑmmɑ i yom yɑ weibɔrɔ bɔrɔcini ize yom no.
Mɛsiyɑ nɑ i fɑnsɑ kɑ i nɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ. Ngɑ di sɛ wom mo cɛ kɑ boori bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ wɔ kunɑ fɑ. Wom mɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ wom dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ zuu kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
Gunɑ, hɛɛ Pɔlu ɑ go sendi wom sɛ, de wom tu ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu, Mɛsiyɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu hinsɑ wom sɛ.
A go sɛdɑ mo kpɛɛnɛ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tu ǹ mɑ ngɑ dɑmbɑngu ɑ̀ ci gɑrɔkoni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ fɔndɑ kulu tɔnɑndi.
Wom kulu kɑ wom go cɛyom susu ceeci fɔndɑ gɑɑ, wom fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ. Wom dɛrɛ gomini gɑɑ.
I gundɑ bɛɛjɛ Ikpɛ gɑ i cɛɑndi susu ngɑ jine. I go kɑ ngɑ di bɑtu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ i nɑɑne dɔ.
Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ zɑ bɑngudɑmyom hɑli zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Ammɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gbei tɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ gundɑ nɑfɑ.
Dom di, wom go zuuru ihinno. Mee yɑ nɑ wom dii kɑ jɛ wom mɑ si cimi gɑnɑ?
Bɔrɔ bɛrɛyom wɔne mɑnɑ hunu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wom cɛɛ dɔ fɑ.
Buuru hɑmine kɑsɑmi cɛnɑ go buuru gɑɑtɑ kulu tunɑndi.
A gundɑ nɑɑne wɔne wom gɑɑ Kpe kunɑ kɑ wom si lɑsɑbu ŋmɑni tɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi, bɔrɔ kɑ dimi no kulu kɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑ bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, de ɑ go bɑngudɑmyom sendi wɑɑzu kpɛɛnɛ, ifɔ sɛ ǹ go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi kpɛɛnɛ? Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ si tɛ kɑtiyom hɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
A go bɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi, ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm dumbu dumbu kɑ ye zɑngɑ bɔrɔ mɑntɑm yom.
Nyɑizei, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ sɛ. Ammɑ wom mɑ si bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ wɔ tɛ kɔbɛ bineibɑɑi sɛ. Ammɑ wɑ tɑmtɛrɛ cɛrɛ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
Moisi fɔndɑ kulu sendi fɔlɔnku kunɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi. Ngɑ neyɑ: "N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm".
Ammɑ de wom go cɛrɛ nɑmɑ ko cɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm yom, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli wom mɑ si cɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ sã sã.
Ammɑ ɑ go cii no, wom mo dirɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ. À gɑɑ no wom si bineibɑɑi tɔnɑndi.
Bineibɑɑi go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bineibɑɑi. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cɛrɛ hɑli hɛ kulu kɑ wom go bɑɑ mɑ si tɛ, wom si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mo.
Ammɑ de Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go wom cendi, kulu wom si Moisi fɔndɑ cire.
Bineibɑɑi gbei yom bine tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no ǹ goono. Ngei neyɑ, zinɑ ndɑ meiguyom zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ ziibi ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ,
ndɑ tɑɑru gɑnɑyom ndɑ zimɑtɛrɛ ndɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ ndɑ zoji ndɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ bine fute, kɑkɔ ndɑ feefee ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni,

ndɑ molɑgɑ, ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom ndɑ bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu ndɑ hɑnɑsuɑ ndɑ hɛ nge yom di dimi kulu. Kɑ simbɑ hɛ nge yom di, ɑ go wom kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ jisi zɑngɑ ɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii kɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ nge yom di dimi tɛ, ɑkpɛ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu pɑi.
Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɑnfɑni neyɑ, bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ binekɑɑne, ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ suuru kuku ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ booriyom ndɑ nɑɑne,
ndɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ bɔm hiniyom. Fɔndɑ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ nge yom di gɑnji.
Beerem kɑ ǹ ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom ǹ nɑ ngei dulum hɑɑli kɑnji ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑyom futu yom ndɑ ɑ̀ bineibɑɑi.
Zɑ kɑ i gɑ hunɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, i mɑ dirɑ mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
I mɑ si ci fɑɑrikpɛ yom ko cɛrɛ zukum kɑ cɛnsɛ cɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Nyɑizei, de wom bei bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ, wom kɑ wom tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ wom mɑ ɑkpɛ dɑm fɔndɔ. Ammɑ wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ bɑɑniyom. Ni mɑ, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ n bɔm, n mɑ si du suiyom.
Wom mɑ cɛrɛ time jɛrɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ wom go Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi noyɑ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ hɛ fɔ no, ɑ̀ bɔm no ɑ̀ go zɑmbɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ bɔm gbei yɑɑse gunɑ. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ hini kɑ fɑihã ngɑ bɔm hinne sɛ. À nɑ ci bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɔne gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu gɑ ngɑ bɔm jɛrɔ jɛrɛ no.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ cooɑndi ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ nɑfɑ ngɑ hɛ hinno yom kulu kunɑ.
Wɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom zɑmbɑ. Bɔrɔ si Ikpɛ hɑɑru. Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go dumɑ, ngɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ngɑ bineibɑɑi sɛ, fumbi nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi bineibɑɑi dɔ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dumɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɛ, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
I mɑ si fɑrigɑ ndɑ ihinno tɛyom. Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ gɑɑ, i kɑɑ bɑrikɑ wi de i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, kɑ i gundɑ dɑɑmɑ i mɑ ihinno tɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ, hɑli yɑ mo nyɑize yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono nɑɑne fɔndɔ kunɑ.
Wɑ gunɑ biiriize beeri yom kɑ ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ ndɑ ɑ bumbum kɑmbɛ.
Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ booriyom cɛbɛ moo diyom gɑɑ, ǹ go wom tilɑsi nɑ ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ go tɛ yɑ di no domi ǹ mɑ si ngei guruguzɑndi hinne Mɛsiyɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Nge yom kɑ ǹ dɑmbɑngu, ngei bumbum si Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu domi ngei mɑ du kɑ fɑɑre ndɑ wom gɑɑhɑm.
Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑɑ ɑ gɑɑ yɑ fɑɑre ndɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ. À dɔ no Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑnji ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ mɑ hɑndunyɑ sɛ.
Zɑ bɑngudɑmyom hɑli zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ yɑ ci tɑkɑyom teji.
Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ fɔndɔ wɔ goono ndɑ, lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ suuji mɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne Isirɑilɑ bɑndɑ mɑ.
À mɑ si filɑ kpɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ mɑ ɑ tɑɑbɑndi zɑmɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gundɑ Kpe Yesu bidɑlɑ yom ɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ.
A nyɑizei, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ wom biyɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ. A gɑ tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wom hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ kɑ wom goono Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ. Wom yɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
I mɑ Ikpɛ, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ngɑ bɑrikɑ dimi kulu dɑm i gɑɑ, bɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ.
Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ i suubɑ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑndunyɑ sinji. À nɑ i suubɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom, beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli ngɑ jine.
Bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i kɔdɔrɔ mɑ i mɑ tɛ ngɑ ize yom kootɛrɛ dɑmyom dɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ nɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ no.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no i mɑ ngɑ gomini deizɑkpɛ sifɑ, gomini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i sɛ Binegɑnji kunɑ.
Yesu kunɑ mo i gundɑ fɑnsɑyom ɑ̀ kuri gɑɑ. À go kɑ i yɑɑfɑ mɑ ndɑ i dulum yom ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gomini hɑizici goono ndɑ.
À nɑ i nɑ ngɑ gomini ndɑ bɑyom hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ fɑhɑm dimi kulu kunɑ.
À nɑm i nɑ ngɑ binebɑɑ duje bei ɑ̀ miilɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ikpɛ gbei yɑ ci ngɑ mɑ tɑkɑhɛ kulu meigu sɑɑ kɑ zɑmɑni yom kube kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
Ikpɛ go hɛ kulu tɛ ngɑ binebɑɑ sɑwɑri bɔm. À jinɑ kɑ i kɔdɔrɔ ngɑ miilɑ bɔm i mɑ ci tubu hɛ Ikpɛ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ i yom kɑ i jinɑ kɑ bɛɛjɛ sinji Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, i mɑ ci sifɑyom hɛ Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ.

À kunɑ no wom mo, wom nɑɑne sɑɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ cimi sendi. Cimi sendi yɑ ci Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ fɑɑbɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm wom gɑɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑlikɑwɑli ngɑ mɑ no.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ ci i tubu sɛ deimi jɛrɛ. Hɑnu go kɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ ngɑ dei fɑnsɑ, i mɑ ci sifɑyom hɛ ɑ̀ deizɑ sɛ.
A mɑɑ bɑɑru kɑ wom nɑɑne Kpe Yesu gɑɑ. A mɑɑ mo wom gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ.
À sɛ no, ɑ si cɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbuyom wom sɛ ko hɔngɔ wom ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
A go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑbɑ deizɑkpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom sɛ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom no hɑikusutɛrɛ biyɑ ndɑ ndɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ biyɑ hɑli wom mɑ Ikpɛ bei gumo gumo.
A go ŋmɑɑrɛ mo ɑ̀ mɑ wom bine yom kpɑrɑndi hɑli wom mɑ bɛɛjɛ bei kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ. Wom mɑ bei mo hɑizici dimi kɑ ɑ̀ ci tubu deizɑkpɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kunɑ.
A go ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ bei mo hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑbikoni bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ i kunɑ, i yom kɑ i go nɑɑne.
À nɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi mo ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ.

À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi meire kulu bɔm ndɑ hini kulu bɔm ndɑ gɑɑbi kulu bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri kulu bɔm. À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi mɑɑ kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ cɛɛ bɔm, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑni wɔ hinne kunɑ bo ɑmmɑ ndɑ zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kunɑ mo.
Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee cire. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm mɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɛ kulu bɔm Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm. Mɛsiyɑ go hɛ kulu tɔnɑndi sã sã. Ngɑ yɑ ci mɑrgɑ tɔnɑndikɔ.
Wom mo, dom wom gɔrɔ bukɔ yom wom tɑɑli yom ndɑ wom dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.

Ǹ kunɑ nɑ wom jinɑ kɑ dirɑ sɑɑ fɔ ndɑ zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ zɑmɑni goono ndɑ. Wom dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ bɑtumɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ goono ndɑ. Biyɑ no kɑ ɑ ci Ibilisi, ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
Beerem di kunɑ nɑ i yom mo, i jinɑ kɑ dirɑ i bineibɑɑi bɔm. I nɑ i bineibɑɑi ndɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu yom tɔnɑndi. Dulum hɑɑli kɑ ǹ nɑ i hɛi ndɑ dɔ, i tɛ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ bine tɔ ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ cindei.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ suuji bɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ i yom ndɑ.
À bɑɑkɑsine sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ i hunɑndi ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑ kɑ i tɑɑli yom kunɑ i gɔrɔ bukɔ yom. Gomini dɔ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑɑbɑ.
À nɑ i tunɑndi mefɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ. À bine nɑ i gɔrɛndi mefɔ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ngɑ gomini hɑizici bɑmbɑtɑ cɛbɛ ɑ̀ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ i sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Gomini dɔ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑɑbɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. À bine mɑnɑ hunu wom dɔ. Ikpɛ noyom no.
À mɑnɑ ci mɑ tɛgbei yom dɔ no fɑɑbɑ hunu hɑli bɔrɔ mɑ si ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi.
I yom yɑ ci Ikpɛ gbei. À nɑ i tɑkɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ gbei hinno yom sɛ. Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ gbei hinno yom sɔlu zɑmɑ i mɑ dirɑ ǹ kunɑ.
À sɛ nɑ, wɑ hɔngɔ wom jinɑ kɑ gɔrɔ dimi cindei gɑɑhɑm dɔ. Bɑnguize yom go ci wom sɛ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu ize yom, dumbuyom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ gɑɑbɑsi gɑɑ.
Wɑ hɔngɔ lɔkɑci ngɑ di wom sindɑ Mɛsiyɑ. Wom sindɑ lɑɑbuizetɛrɛ gɑɑbi Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ. Wom tɛ yo yom ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛyom gɑɑ. Wom sindɑ bɛɛjɛ. Wom sindɑ Ikpɛ mɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Wom jinɑ kɑ felem ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom mɑɑnɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kuri gɑɑ.
Ngɑ yɑ ci bɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i gɑme. À nɑ dimi hinkɑ tɛ ɑfɔ. À nɑ kpɛsɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i fee ndɑ cɛrɛ zeeri.

À nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Moisi fɔndɑ meire yom, wɑtom sendikpɑrɛ yom wi ngɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dimi hinkɑ tɑkɑ ngɑ bumbum kunɑ kɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku teji. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ bɑɑni tɛ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ hɑli gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku kunɑ ngɑ mɑ ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ sɑsɑbɑndi mo Ikpɛ dɔ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ di wi.
Yɑ no Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑni tɛyom fɛɛ wom sɛ. À nɑ bɑɑni tɛ wom kɑ wom felem ndɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ, gɑme.
À gɑɑ no i kulu ɑfɔ fɔ gundɑ huroyom Bɑɑbɑ dɔ ndɑ Biyɑ fɔlɔnku.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑnɑ ci yɑ yom kpɛɛnɛ wɑlɑ ceeyo yom. Ammɑ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntei wom tɛ bɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ yom. Wom tɛ Ikpɛ fuu bɔrɔ yom mo.
Ikpɛ nɑ wom cini diyɑ yom ndɑ ɑndebi yom bɔm, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci fuu kpɛsɛ. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bumbum mo yɑ ci mimbɑri tɑndi.
À kunɑ no cinɑri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ kɑ boori, ɑ̀ go tunu kɑ tɛ nungu hɑlɑɑlɑ Kpe kunɑ.
À kunɑ no wom mo Ikpɛ go wom cini mefɔ wom mɑ tɛ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
À sɛ no, hɛɛ Pɔlu kɑ ɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kɑsuize wom dimi cindei sɑbu sɛ, ɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Wom mɑɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ nɑ ngɑ gomini yɑ gbei tɛ wom sɑbu sɛ.
Kɑɑyomtɛrɛ gɑɑ nɑ ɑ du duje beiyom. A jinɑ kɑ sendi cɛnɑ fɔ hɑntum wɔne bɔm kɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom go tirɑ di coo, wom hini kɑ fɑhɑm kɑ ɑ gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ duje beiyom.
Zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ Ikpɛ mɑnɑ dujɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ iburɑdɑm yom sɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑngɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ diyɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom sɛ ndɑ ɑndebi yom sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
Duje di neyɑ. Dimi cindei ci tubukɔ yom ndɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom. Ǹ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku. Ǹ huro mo mefɔ Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ gɑɑ.
A tɛ gbeiteeri Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gomini no ɑ sɛ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑbikoni bɔm.
Hɛɛ kɑ ɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ, ɑ sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gomini wɔne no yɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɑizici bɑɑru wɑɑzu dimi cindei sɛ. Hɑizici wɔ bɔrɔ si hini kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu.
Ikpɛ nɑ gominɑ no mo yɑ cɛbɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ ǹ mɑ duje di tɔnɑndiyom bei. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ nɑ duje di tugu ngɑ dɔ zɑ zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔ mɑɑsɑ meirekpɛ yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni bei.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no ngɑ miilɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɔm, miilɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
À kunɑ no i gundɑ yɑrutɛrɛ zɑ kɑ i nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ huro Ikpɛ dɔ, hɑmbure si.
À sɛ no, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wɑ si wom yɑrutɛrɛ nɑm guruguze yom kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ wom sɑbu sɛ. Ngei yɑ ci wom deizɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ gɑ sɔmbu i ŋmɔne Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ jine.
À dɔ no fuu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ fuu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ go du ngei mɑɑ.
A go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom no gɑɑbi ndɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ wom bine yom kunɑ ɑ̀ deizɑ hɑizicikpɛ bɔm.
À mɑ wom nɑ gɑɑbi hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑ gɔrɔ wom bine yom kunɑ nɑɑne dɔ. Wom mɑ tɛ kɑɑji kɑ sinji bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
À sɛ no ɑ gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ hini kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine tɛfɛyom ndɑ ɑ̀ kuuyom ndɑ ɑ̀ guuse ndɑ ɑ̀ gure yom.
Wom mɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine wɔ bei, bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ beiyom kulu. Wom mɑ tɔ mɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑyom kulu.
Ikpɛ hini kɑ tɛ ndɑ bɑyom gumo gumo kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu kɑ i go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ wɑlɑ hɛ kulu kɑ i go lɑsɑbu. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no ndɑ zɑngɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ i kunɑ goono ndɑ.
Deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ zɑmɑni yom kulu gɑɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛɛ kɑsuize Kpe sɛ, ɑ gɑ wom no himmɑ, wom diro mɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ cɛɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ.
Wom mɑ dirɑ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ kulu ndɑ bɑɑniyom kulu ndɑ suuru dimi kulu. Wom mɑ cɛrɛ kɔtɔ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
Wom mɑ wetere kɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ bine fɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ɑ̀ go wom hɔ gɑɑ.
Gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku goono ndɑ Biyɑ fɔlɔnku zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ bɛɛjɛ fɔlɔnku kunɑ wom cɛɛ yom gɑɑ.
Kpe fɔlɔnku yɑ goono ndɑ nɑɑne fɔlɔnku ndɑ mirɑndiyom fɔlɔnku.
Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ kulu Bɑɑbɑ. Ngɑ yɑ goono hɛ kulu bɔm. À goono ǹ kulu gɑme. À goono wom kulu kunɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gomini no i ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ Mɛsiyɑ noyom neesiji bɔm.
À sɛ no, Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ tɑm boobo ngɑ bɑndɑ. À nɑ noyom tɛ beerem sɛ."
Ifɔ yɑ ci ɑ̀ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ de ɑ̀ nɑ ci kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ zumbu hɑli gɑndɑ ŋmɔne nungu guusɔ yom kunɑ?
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu, ngɑ yɑ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ hɑli bɛɛnɛ yom kulu bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ kulu tɔnɑndi.
À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom no ǹ mɑ ci diyɑ yom. Afɔ yom ci ɑndebi yom. Afɔ yom ci Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzukɔ yom. Afɔ yom tɛ kurukɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci cɛbɛkɔ.
À nɑ ǹ nɑ hɑli hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mɑ tɔ gbei tɛyom sɛ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm mɑ du kɑ kpei moojine.
À nɑ ǹ nɑ mɑ i kulu mɑ du kɑ ci ɑfɔ nɑɑne dɔ Ikpɛ Ize beiyom kunɑ. I mɑ tɔ bɔrɔ mo kɑ tɔ Mɛsiyɑ hɑɑli tɔnɑntɛ cine.

Yɑ di gɑɑ i mɑ si ci koo cɛnɑ yom kpɛɛnɛ hɑli cɛbɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni mɑ i fum nee hɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ i feeni yɑ hɛrɛ zɑngɑ tɛku boosu yom, zɑngɑ hɛo mo go fɑɑru. Cɛbɛ wɔ hunu iburɑdɑm yom fɑfɑguɛ kunɑ kɑ i dɛrɑndi ndɑ ngei cɛmbɛrɛ.
Ammɑ kɑ i gɑ cimi cii bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ i mo beeri hɛ kulu kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔm.

À dɔ no, gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kulu go meigu hɑli ɑ̀ boori kɑ hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ. Kɑ dɔbu fɔ fɔ kulu go kɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ gɑɑhɑm go beeri kɑ ngɑ bɔm cini bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ dɔbu fɔ fɔ kulu go kɑ ngɑ gbei tɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii kɑ sɛdɑ Kpe kunɑ neyɑ. Wɑ si dirɑ kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ go dirɑ ngei lɑsɑbu kɔnu yom kunɑ.
Kube kunɑ no ǹ fɑhɑm goono. Ǹ tɛ zɑngɑ yo yom hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kɑ Ikpɛ go no sɛ. Ǹ si ngɑ di bei ǹ binesɛndɛ yom sɑbu sɛ.
Ǹ bine kunɑ sendi si hɛ fɔ cii kɑlɑ ǹ huro hɑwizetɛrɛ kɑ ziibi dimi dimi kulu tɛ ndɑ himmɑ.
Ammɑ wom wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ no wom nɑ Mɛsiyɑ dendeni.
Dɑhiri wom nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ wom cooɑndi ɑ̀ kunɑ cimi bɔm Yesu kunɑ.
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ wom sintine gɔrɛ, wom mɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ kɑɑ, wɔ kɑ bɑɑyom futu zɑmbɑntɛ go hinɑ.
Wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ mɑ wom tejɑndi mɑ wom bine lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ.
Wɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ teji fɑkɑ, wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ tɑkɑ ngɑ himɑndi bɔm. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ kɑ cimi gɑnɑyom go kɑɑndɑ.
À sɛ no, wom mɑ tɑngɑri kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ cimi sendi ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ zɑmɑ i kulu bɑrɑ no cɛrɛ dɔbu yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ wom bine tɔ, wɑ si dulum tɛ. Weenu mɑ si kɑm wom binetɔnɛ bɔm.
Wom mɑ si Ibilisi mɑ nɑ dɑɑmɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cini zee, ɑ̀ mɑ si zee kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gbei tɛ. À mɑ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du hɛ kɑ ngɑ no bɔrɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɑnji kunɑ.
Sendi fumbɔ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si hunu wom mee kunɑ. Sendi kɑ ɑ̀ boori gɑɑkɑsine sɛ mɑ hunu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑndɑ gomini beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ sɛ.
Wom mɑ si Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bine sɑrɑndi mɑ, Biyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm ndɑ wom gɑɑ fɑnsɑyom hɑnu sɛ.
Hɔɔtɛ kulu ndɑ bine futu kulu ndɑ binetɔnɛ ndɑ kɔsɔngu kulu ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ kulu ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ dimi kulu mo, ǹ kulu mɑ hunu wom bindi kunɑ.
Wom mo bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ. Wo suuji cɛbɛ cɛrɛ sɛ. Wo cɛrɛ yɑɑfɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Ikpɛ dendeni zɑngɑ kɑɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom.
Wo dirɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ i yom kɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑm kɑmbɛ i sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑ zɑngɑ sɑrɑɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ Ikpɛ sɛ.
Ammɑ zɑ zinɑ zɑ ziibi wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu ǹ mɑ si bɑ ǹ ciine tɛ wom bindi kunɑ. Wɑ si ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hegu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ.
Yɑ no, zɑ hɑwi sendi zɑ sendi yɑmɔ wɑlɑ hɑnɑsuɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ, ɑmmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ ci sɑɑbuyom.
Wom gɑ wɔne bei zinɑteeri kulu wɑlɑ ziibɑntɛ wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu kɑ ɑ̀ ci tooru gɑnɑyom dimi fɔ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ tubu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si wom zɑmbɑ ndɑ sendi kɔnu yom zɑmɑ hɛ nge yom di sɑbu sɛ no Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ go kɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ bɔm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si meigu ndei.
Sɑɑ fɔ wom gɔrɔ kube ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom tɛ kɑɑri Kpe kunɑ. Wɑ dirɑ zɑngɑ kɑɑri ize yom.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɑnfɑni goono bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu ndɑ cimi kunɑ.
Wom mɑ ceeci kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Kpe sɛ.
Wom mɑ si meigu hɛ fɔ kulu gɑɑ ndɑ kube gbei yom kɑ ǹ si hɛi ɑmmɑ zɑti wɑ bɔgu ǹ bɔm.
Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ tugu kunɑ, ǹ ciiyom zɑti hɑwi nɑ.
Ammɑ hɛ kulu kɑ kɑɑri hɑɑgɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ tɛrɛ hɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci kɑɑri.
À sɛ no ǹ cii: Tunu, ni kɑ n go jiibi. Tunu bukɔei gɑme, Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ kɑɑri n bɔm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ zɑngɑ wom go dirɑ. Wɑ si ci zɑngɑ sɑmu yom ɑmmɑ zɑngɑ hɑikusu yom.
Wɑ lɔkɑci zɑɑ zɑmɑ hɑnu lɑlɔ yom no.
À sɛ no, wom mɑ si ci zɑngɑ sɑmu yom ɑmmɑ wom mɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe binebɑɑ.
Wɑ si bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ goono, ɑmmɑ wɑ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Wɑ cɛrɛ dii ndɑ Somu yom betu yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ betu yom ndɑ dɔɔni yom kɑ ǹ hunu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Wɑ betu Kpe sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔɔnu wom bine kunɑ.
Wo Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu sɑɑ kulu hɛ kulu sɛ, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ cɛrɛ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ hɑmbure kunɑ.
Wɛndɛ yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom kunye yom sɛ zɑngɑ wom go tɛ Kpe sɛ.
Kunye yɑ ci wɛndɛ ŋmɔne bɔm zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ ci mɑrgɑ ŋmɔne bɔm, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm. Mɛsiyɑ bumbum mo ci ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑkɔ.
Zɑngɑ bine Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ gɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ, wɛndɛ yom mo mɑ tɛ ngei kunye yom sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ hɛ kulu gɑɑ.
Wom mo kunye yom, wom mɑ bɑɑ wom wɛndɛ yom zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm no ngɑ mɑ bu ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ.
À nɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi ngɑ bɔm sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hinnɑndi nyumeyom gɑɑ Sendɑ dɔ.
À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ mɑrgɑ jisi ngɑ jine, mɑrgɑ deizɑkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑ tombi fɔ. Suugu yom mɑ si, wɑlɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ nge yom di, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ, tɑɑli si.
Yɑ no kunye yom mo, ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ bɑɑ ngei wɛndɛ yom zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ngei gɑɑhɑm. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ, ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ bɔm.
Bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bine hungu ngɑ gɑɑhɑm ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑimɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑ tɛ ngɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ.
I bɑrɑ no ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom ndɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ ɑ̀ biri yom.
"À sɛ no hɑibɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ nɑm kɑ dɔbu ngɑ wɛndɛ gɑɑ. Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku."
Duje wɔne beeri, ɑmmɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go sendi no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ mɑrgɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bɑɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ bɔm. Wɛndɛ mɑ mɑ ngɑ kunye dɑm.
Wom mo koo yom, wɑ wom bɑhɛi yom gɑnɑ Kpe kunɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ sɑbɑ.
"N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ." Ngɑ yɑ ci meire sintine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑlikɑwɑli.
Alikɑwɑli di neyɑ: "N mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ bɑɑni. N mɑ hunɑ kɑ jɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ mo".
Wom mo bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ si kɑm wom kɑɑ yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ bine mɑ tɔ. Ammɑ wɑ ǹ biiri foorɑyom kunɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu Kpe dɔ.
Wom mo tɑm yom, wɑ wom hɑndunyɑ kpe yom gɑnɑ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom ndɑ bine fɔ zɑngɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ.
Wom mɑ si ǹ gɑnɑ ndɑ ǹ moo diyom kɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ. Ammɑ wɑ ǹ gɑnɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ tɑm yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
Wɑ tu tɑmtɛrɛ zɑngɑ wom go tɑmtɛrɛ Kpe sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
Wom bei kɑ ihinno kulu kɑ bɔrɔ tɛ, Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑ̀ sɛ bɑ ɑ̀ ci tɑm wɑlɑ bɔrɔcini.
Wom mo kpe yom, wom mɑ tɛ tɑm yom mo sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ di. Wɑ fee ndɑ deeniyom zɑmɑ wom go bei wom kulu ŋmɔne Kpe goono bɛɛnɛ. Bɑɑbɑɑ si ɑ̀ dɔ.
À bɑndɑ, ɑ nyɑizei, wɑ gɑɑbi dɑm Kpe kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑbikoni kunɑ.
Wom mɑ wɑngu jiinei kulu dɑm kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no. A gɑɑ no wom du kɑ hini kɑ cɛ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ibilisi cɛmbɛrɛ yom.
I si guruje ndɑ iburɑdɑm. Ammɑ i go guruje ndɑ meirekpɛ yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kube dɑbɑrikpɛ yom. I go guruje ndɑ biyɑ hɑnyɑ futu yom mɑrgɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ wɑngu jiine kulu zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no. À gɑɑ nɑ, wom hini kɑ cɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi hɑnu lɑlɔ hine. Sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ hɛ kulu tɔnɑndi, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ wom du kɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
Wɑ cɛ kɑ boori fɑ. Wom mɑ cimi zɑɑ kɑ tɛ kunɑcendi zɑ kɑ wom nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu fɑkɑ zɑngɑ jɛndɛ kpɛsɛrɛ.
Wom mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bɑɑni tɛyom i yom ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme sɔlu dɑm wom cee yom gɑɑ zɑngɑ tɑɑmu.
Ǹ kulu bɔm yɑ ci wɑ nɑɑne zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ kɔrɛ. Ndɑ nɑɑne di wom hini kɑ hɑngo ninikpɛ yom kɑ Ilɑlɔ go biri wi.
Wom mɑ fɑɑbɑ mo zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ guuru fulɑ. Wɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ zɑɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ tɑkubɑ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ wom no.
Lɔkɑci kulu wom mɑ ɑduwɑ dimi kulu tɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ yom dimi kulu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. Wom mɑ moo no ngɑ di sɛ ndɑ himmɑ kulu ko ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ.
Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ mo zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ no mee yɑ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ beerem mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno duje bei.
Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ, hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ. Wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ sɛ mɑ yɑ ɑ̀ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
Ammɑ wom mo, kɑ wom mɑ du bɑɑru kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ, i nyɑize Ticiku, i binebɑɑkɔ ndɑ gbeiteeri nɑɑnekpɛ Kpe kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ bɑɑru kulu cii wom sɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm wom dɔ wom mɑ du kɑ bei zɑngɑ i goono. À mɑ wom bine yom yɑmɑrɑndi mɑ.
Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ goono nyɑize yom gɑɑ. Bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ nɑɑne mo mɑ goono ǹ gɑɑ zɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu ndɑ Timote, i yom yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm yom. I go wom hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ fɔɔ. Wom kulu kɑ wom goono Filipi kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ cendikɔ yom ndɑ gɑɑkɔ yom, i go wom fɔɔ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
A go kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ gɑ hɔngɔ wom.
Wɑti kulu ɑ gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom kulu sɛ ndɑ binekɑɑne ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kulu kunɑ.
A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom bine fɔ meiguyom Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑ hɑnu sintinɑ kɑlɑ mɑɑsɑ.
A tɑbɑi wɔne yɑ cimi nɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei hinno wɔ sinti wom bine yom kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi kɑlɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu.

À sɑbɑ mo yɑ lɑsɑbu wom kulu gɑɑ zɑngɑ yɑ di domi wom goono ɑ bine kunɑ. Wom goono ɑ bine kunɑ zɑmɑ ɑ sesere yom kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɔrɛ kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno tɑbɑtɑndiyom mo, wom kulu meigu gomini kunɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
Ikpɛ yɑ ci ɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ wom kulu cewɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu binejijire.
A go wɔne ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Wom bɑɑkɑsine mɑ tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom kpɛɛnɛ beiyom kunɑ ndɑ fɑhɑm kulu kunɑ.
À gɑɑ no wom mɑ hɛ hinno yom bei. Wom mɑ hinne mɑ kɑ zɑm tɑɑli kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu.
Wom mɑ tɔ mɑ ndɑ bɑrikɑ yom kɑ cɛɑndiyom susu go hɛi Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ ndɑ sifɑyom Ikpɛ sɛ. Hundi yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ
Nyɑizei, wɔne no ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei. Hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ tɔ hɛɛ, ǹ tɛ no domi Bɑɑru Hinno mɑ kpei moojine.
À hunu tɛrɛ mo dogɑri yom kulu sɛ ndɑ cindei kulu sɛ hɑli ǹ gɑ bei kɑ ɑ goono sesere yom kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
A seseri yom mo nɑ nyɑizei boobo kɑ ǹ goono Kpe kunɑ no himmɑ. À gɑndɑ sɛ ǹ gundɑ binesɛndɛ bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ wɑɑzu tɛ, hɑmburu si.
Cimi no bɔrɔ fɔ yom go Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru wɑɑzu tɛ ndɑ molɑgɑ ndɑ kɔsɔngu ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
Molɑgɑkpɛ yom feefee kunɑ no ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu tɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ bine hinne zɑmɑ ǹ go tɑmmɑ ngei go binesɛrɛ tɔntɔnu ɑ sɛ no kɑ ɑ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ.
Bine fɔ kpɛ yom wɔ, bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ no ǹ go wɑɑzu. Ǹ bei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ jisi fɑɑsɑkɔ Bɑɑru Hinno sɛ.
Ifɔ bine no? Zɑngɑ no kulu, de munɑficitɛrɛ kunɑ no wɑlɑ de cimi no ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu tɛ. A go fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ di. A kɑɑ fɑihã mɑ.
A bei kɑ ngɑ di gɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑmbɛ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Biyɑ gɑɑkɑsine gɑɑ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑ bɛɛjɛ mo yɑ ci hɛ kulu kunɑ yɑ si hɔɔ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kulu hɑli yɑ mo mɑɑsɑ kpɛɛnɛ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ binesɛndɛ kulu ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, bɑ de ɑ gɑ hunɑ wɑlɑ bɑ de ɑ bu.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ sɛ hunɑyom yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Buyom mɑ yɑ ci liibɑ.
Ammɑ de yɑ hunɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ngɑ di yɑ ci ɑ gbei bɑrikɑ. A si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ suubɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ go sɑsɑ nungu hinkɑ kulu. A gundɑ guuri yɑ hunu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ di bisɑ ɑ sɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ wom sɛ yɑ gɔrɔ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
Zɑ kɑ ɑ go wɔne tɑbɑi ɑ bei ɑ bo hunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ hɑli wom mɑ kpei jinɑ. Wom mɑ du binekɑɑne nɑɑne kunɑ mo.
Wom fɑihã mo mo bɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ ɑ sɑbu sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.

Kɑlɑ de, wom mo dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno. Bɑ de ɑ kɑɑ di wom wɑlɑ yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ, yɑ mɑɑ wom go cɛ kɑ boori bine fɔlɔnku kunɑ. Yɑ mɑɑ mo wom go meigu kɑ guruje ndɑ nɑɑne Bɑɑru Hinno gɑɑ. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku mɑ.
Wom mɑ si nɑm beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ wom ǹ mɑ wom hɑmburɑndi bɑ cɛnɑ. Ngɑ di bine tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑlɑciyom sɛdɑ, ɑmmɑ wom sɛ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ wom no ngɑ gomini kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom mɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ hinne sɛ no ɑmmɑ wom mɑ mɑɑ tɑɑbi ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ mo.
À gɑɑ no, wom go meigu kɑ guruje ndɑ hɛɛ, guruje kɑ wom di ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ. Wom go mɑɑ mo ɑ̀ goono ɑ gɑɑ bɑ mɑɑsɑ.
À sɛ no, i go bei yɑmɑrɑndiyom goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ himmɑ noyom goono mo. Bine fɔ meiguyom goono Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. I go bei mo bɑkɑre ndɑ suuji goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Nge yom di sɑbu sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ binekɑɑne tɔnɑndi. Wɑ gundɑ lɑsɑbu fɔ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine fɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔ kɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ fɔlɔnku gɑɑ.
Wɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ ndɑ feefee wɑlɑ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɑndiyom kɔnu ɑmmɑ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ bɔm gunɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bisɑ ngɑ.
Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngɑ bɔm murɑdu yom hinne, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ lɑɑkɑli mɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom ŋmɔne.
Wɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ lɑsɑbu wɔne kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ ɑfɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ sɑrɑfɔtɛrɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi.
À tu ngɑ mɑ ikpɛtɛrɛ hini dɑbɑri nɑm. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm ci tɑm kɑ ye iburɑdɑm cine.
À hunu tɛrɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mo. À tu ngɑ mɑ kpei buyom gɑɑ, bɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ bu.
À sɛ no, Ikpɛ mo nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu. À nɑ mɑɑ fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ, mɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ mɑɑ yom kulu.
Ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ no Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ cɛnjɛ kulu mɑ sɔmbu, bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne yom ndɑ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom ndɑ gɑndɑ cire ŋmɔne yom.
Dɛɛnɛ kulu mo mɑ sɛdɑ kɑ cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Kpe, kɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.

A bine bɑɑkɔei, wom go kɑ ɑ sendi gɑnɑ sɑɑ kulu. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ jine hinne ɑmmɑ, hɑli yɑ mɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ ɑ si nodi wom go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ no, gbei kɑ wom go tɛ zɑmɑ wom jinɑ kɑ du fɑɑbɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom.
Ikpɛ yɑ gɑ gbei tɛ wom kunɑ hɑli wom binebɑɑ ndɑ wom tɛgbei mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
Wɑ hɛ kulu tɛ, gunu ndɑ kɑkɔ mɑ si.
À gɑɑ no, beerem mɑ si wom yɑnce. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ ihinno, Ikpɛ ize yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli zɑmɑni beerem siirɑntɛ ndɑ ilɑlɔ wɔ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑme kunɑ mo wom go kɑɑri zɑngɑ fitilɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Wom go hundi sendɑ sombu mo. À gɑɑ no ɑ kɑɑ fɑihã Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu hine zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ zuuru kɔnu wɑlɑ kɑ gbei tɛ kɔnu.

A go kɑ ɑ hundi lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ sɛjɛntɛ sɑrɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ munu Ikpɛ sɛ. Bɑ de ǹ gɑ ɑ hundi no zɑngɑ yɑ wom sɑrɑɑ ndɑ wom gbei bɔm, sɑrɑɑ ndɑ gbei kɑ wom go tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ, ɑ bine yee. A go fɑihã mo wom kulu bɑndɑ.
Wom mo, wom bine mɑ yee yɑ di, wɑ fɑihã mefɔ ndɑ hɛɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ niyɑ Kpe Yesu kunɑ yɑ Timote dɔntɔm wom dɔ hɑli cɛnɑ zɑmɑ hɛɛ mo yɑ du himmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ du wom bɑɑru.
A sindɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu zɑngɑ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sududu ndɑ wom goonoyom.
Ǹ kulu ǹ bɔm cini no ǹ go tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne.
Ammɑ wom go Timote sɛdɑ bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɑmtɛrɛ ndɑ hɛɛ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ koo cini mei ngɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ gundɑ niyɑ yɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ndɑ wɑɑsi zɑ ɑ di zɑngɑ ɑ goonoyom bɑrɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ nɑɑne wɔne Kpe kunɑ mɑ. Hɛɛ bumbum ɑ kɑɑ di wom hɑli cɛnɑ.
À gunɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ sɛ mo yɑ ɑ nyɑize Epɑfiru mo dɔntɔm wom dɔ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ gbei kunɑ ndɑ tɑngɑmi kunɑ, cɛ kɑ wom dɔntɔm ɑ dɔ. À nɑ sɑjo gbei kulu tɛ ɑ sɛ.
A gundɑ wom kulu cewɑ. À bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ zɛnjɛ.
À zɛnjɛ fɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑɑni bu gɑɑ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sisibi ɑ̀ sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ngɑ hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ ndɑ hɛɛ mo zɑmɑ yɑ si du binesɛrɛ binesɛrɛ bɔm.
À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ndɑ wɑɑsi hɑli de wom yɑɑrɑ kɑ di ɑ̀, wom mɑ fɑihã. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ binesɛrɛ mɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ Kpe kunɑ ndɑ fɑihã zɑllɑ. Bɔrɔ zɑngɑ yɑ dimi wom mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ gbei sɛ no ɑ̀ mɑɑni bu gɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ hundi neerɑ zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ wom gbei kunɑ ɑ dɔ hɛrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
A nyɑizei, mɑɑsɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cindi neyɑ. Wom mɑ fɑihã Kpe kunɑ. Bɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ hɛ fɔlɔnkuei hɑntum wom sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ sɛ kɑnkɑmi, ɑmmɑ wom hɑlɑsiyom sɛ no.
Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ iburɑdɑm hɑnsi yom, beerem nɑ kɑ ǹ ci gbeiteeri lɑlɔ yom no. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ beerem nge yom di kɑ ǹ ci dumbukɔ yom.
I yom yɑ ci bɑnguize yom. I go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ko fɑihã Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. I sindɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ nɑɑne.
A sindɑ gɑɑhɑm nɑɑne mɑ, bɑ kɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ hini kɑ nɑɑne gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni go tɑmmɑ ngɑ hini kɑ nɑɑne gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ, yɑ no hɛɛ mo, ɑ bisɑ ɑkpɛ.
Ǹ nɑ ɑ dɑmbɑngu no jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɛ. Isirɑilɑ dimi gɑɑ no ɑ hunu, Benzɑmim kundɑ kunɑ mo. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Ebulu bɔrɔ, nyɑ hɑli bɑɑbɑ. Moisi fɔndɑ dɔ hɛrɛ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ nɑ, hɛɛ.
Himmɑ mɑ dɔ hɛrɛ ɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ guruguzɑndi. Cɛɑndiyom susu dɔ hɛrɛ fɔndɑ gɑɑ, ɑ sindɑ tɑɑli.
Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ liibɑ, ɑ nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ muruse Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Yɑ mo no, ɑ gɑ hɛ kulu lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ muruse zɑmɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu bei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne Kpe. À sɑbu sɛ ɑ nɑ hɛ kulu muruse tɛ. A nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu mo zɑngɑ beegunu zɑmɑ yɑ du Mɛsiyɑ.
Hɛɛ mo yɑ bɑrɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ. A mɑnɑ du cɛɑndiyom susu Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom dɔ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ du ɑ̀ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ nɑɑne dɔ.
A bɑɑ yɑ du kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bei mo, ngɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. A bɑɑ yɑ meigu ndɑɑ̀ kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ ɑ̀ guruguze yom kunɑ. Yɑ himɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo ɑ̀ bu kunɑ.
A go bɑɑ nge yom di zɑmɑ zɑngɑ no kulu yɑ tɔ bukɔei tunɑndiyom gɑɑ.
A mɑnɑ tɔ doyom dɔ jinɑ. Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ tɔɑndi mo jinɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ go hɑmine ko du hɛ kɑ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ dii kɔ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ si lɑsɑbu ɑ jinɑ kɑ du ɑ̀, ɑmmɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku nɑ ɑ go tɛ. A go dinigɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɑndɑ. A go kpei susu ndɑ himmɑ kɑ tɔ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono jinɑ dɔ.
A go zuuru susu kɑ kpei doyom dɔ kɑ du tukunsi. Tukunsi di yɑ ci Ikpɛ cɛɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, i kulu kɑ i ci tɔɑntɛ yom, i mɑ gundɑ lɑɑkɑli wɔne. De bine hɛ fɔ kunɑ wom gundɑ lɑɑkɑli ŋmɑni fɔ, ngɑ mo Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ wom sɛ.
Ammɑ nungu kɑ i jinɑ kɑ tɔ kɔ, i mɑ dirɑ fɔndɔ fɔlɔnku bɔm ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku.
A nyɑizei, wom kulu mɑ tɛ ɑ dendenikɔ yom. Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ deedɑndi kɑ wom du i dɔ goono ndɑ.
Bɔrɔ boobo go dirɑ kɑ ǹ ci ibɛrɛ yom Mɛsiyɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ sɛ. A jinɑ kɑ ǹ bɑɑru cii ce boobo. Bɑ mɑɑsɑ mo ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ ndɑ hɛ̃ni.
Ǹ beenɑntɛ nɑ hɑlɑciyom. Ǹ ŋmɔne ikpɛ mo yɑ ci ǹ gunde yom. Ǹ deizɑ mo goono ǹ hɑwi kunɑ. Ǹ lɑsɑbu yom goono hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm.
Ammɑ i yom wɔ, bɛɛnɛ ize yom no. I go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ i fɑɑbɑkɔ bɑtu ɑ̀ mɑ hunu zɑ nodi.
Mɛsiyɑ gɑ i gɑɑhɑm bunɔ bɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑndi zɑngɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm deizɑkpɛ. À gɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ ndɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ngɑ meire cire.
À sɛ nɑ, ɑ nyɑize bine bɑɑkɔei, wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori Kpe kunɑ. A gundɑ wom cewɑ. A binebɑɑkɔ yom, wom yɑ ci ɑ binekɑɑne ndɑ ɑ tukunsi fulɑ.
A go Efodiɑ yɑmɑrɑndi, yɑ no Sintici mo. Ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku Kpe kunɑ.

Oò ni mo, bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ nɑɑnekpɛ gbei kunɑ, ɑ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ weibɔrɔ yom di gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ gɑɑ kɑ tɑngɑm ɑ bɑndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ. Cilimɑ mo ndɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ cindei kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom goono Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ gɑɑ weibɔrɔ yom di bɑndɑ.
Wɑ fɑihã Kpe kunɑ sɑɑ kulu. A go kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ, wo fɑihã.
Wom bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ mɑ hunutɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. Kpe mɑɑni.
Wɑ si kɑrihã ndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ, wɑ wom bɑɑyom cɛbɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑduwɑ yom ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom gɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
Ikpɛ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ fɑhɑm kulu kɑɑ wom bine yom ndɑ wom lɑsɑbu yom bɑtu Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.

À bɑndɑ nyɑizei, wom mɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi bɔm ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ. Wɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ yom kulu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛyom susu ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ ci ihinno ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ ci bɑɑkɑsine hɛ. Wɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ yom bɔm kɑ ǹ gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno mo. De hɛ nge yom di gundɑ booriyom wɑlɑ sɑɑbuyom, wom mɑ lɑsɑbu ǹ bɔm.
Hɛ yom kɑ wom dendeni kɑ tɑ kɑ mɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ di ɑ kunɑ, wom mɑ ǹ tɛ. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne no, ɑ̀ bo goono wom bɑndɑ.
A fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe kunɑ ndɑ kɑ mɑɑsɑ wom yɑɑrɑ kɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ hɛɛ. Bɑ kɑ wom lɑsɑbu ndɑ hɛɛ mo ihinno no ɑmmɑ dɑɑmɑ nɑ wom gɑziɑ.
A si sendi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ bɑɑyom bo zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ binekɑɑne dendeni goonoyom dimi kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ goono.
A ŋmɑɑni zɑme gɔrɛ. A ŋmɑɑni gɔrɛ bɑyom kunɑ mo. Nungu kulu ndɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ ɑ dendeni kɑ goono kungi kunɑ kɑ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ mo. A dendeni kɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ ndɑ zɑme kunɑ.
