Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ no gɑɑbi kunɑ no, ɑ hini kɑ hɛ kulu tɛ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, wom tɛ ihinno ndɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ gɑɑkɑsine ɑ kɑnkɑmi kunɑ.
Wom mo, Filipi bɔrɔ yom, wom bei zɑ wom sinti kɑ mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno, ɑ hunu kɑ gɑnɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu. Sɑɑ ngɑ di Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ huro kɑ ɑ gɑɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ noyom ndɑ tɑyom kɑlɑ wom hinne.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ ce fɔ fɔ hɑli ce hinkɑ wom nɑ sɑmbɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ bɑɑyom.
A si noyom ceeci ɑmmɑ ɑ go ceeci kɑ nɑm wom bɑrikɑ jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu.
A du ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ. A kungu ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom sɑmbɑ ɑ sɛ Epɑfiru bɑndɑ. À ci zɑngɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tu. À kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ mo.
Wom bɑɑyom kulu mo, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ ngɑ hɑizici deizɑkpɛ bɔm Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ.
Deizɑ mɑ ci i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami. Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ fɔɔyom neyɑ
Wom mɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu fɔɔ. Nyɑizei mo kɑ ǹ goono ɑ dɔ go wom fɔɔ.
Hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu gɑ wom fɔɔ, hɑli yɑ mɑ Kɑisɑ fuu ŋmɔne yom.
Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu diyɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ dɔ. I nyɑize Timote goono ɑ bɑndɑ.

I go wom hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom fɔɔ. Nyɑize nɑɑnekpɛ yom Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom kɑ wom goono Kolose wɑngɑrɑ, i go wom fɔɔ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
I go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu.
Zɑ kɑ i mɑɑ wom nɑɑne bɑɑru Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom gundɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ, i go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
Wom nɑɑne ndɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine go sinji bɛɛjɛ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ goono jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ wom sɛ. Wom gundɑ bɛɛjɛ wɔ kɑ wom jinɑ kɑ mɑɑ cimi sendɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑru Hinno.
Bɑɑru Hinno kɑɑ wom dɔ. Hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ go bɑrikɑ hɛi kɑ hɑnfɑni tɔntɔnu. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ɑ̀ go tɛ wom kunɑ zɑ hɑnu kɑ wom mɑɑ kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ gomini cimi kunɑ.
Wom nɑ ɑ̀ dendeni mo Epɑfɑru dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri nɑɑnekpɛ wom sɛ.
À nɑm mo i nɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine bɑɑru bei kɑ wom gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
À sɛ no, i yom mo zɑ hɑnu kɑ i mɑɑ wom bɑɑru, i mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ ɑduwɑ tɛyom wom sɛ. I go ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ tɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ beiyom hɑikusutɛrɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ fɑhɑm kulu mo kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go no.
I go ŋmɑɑrɛ mo wom mɑ dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Kpe sɛ hɑli wom mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ. Gbei hinno kulu kunɑ mɑ bɑrikɑ mɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ. Wom mɑ beeri mɑ Ikpɛ beiyom kunɑ.
I go ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ mɑ wom no gɑɑbi, gɑɑbi dimi kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri deizɑkpɛ bɔm hɑli wom mɑ hini suuru hɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
Wom mo Bɑɑbɑ sɑɑbu, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i tɔ i mɑ du bɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom tubu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑɑri kunɑ.
À nɑ i kɑɑ kube hini kunɑ kɑ kpeindɑ i yom ngɑ Ize Binegɑnji kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
À Izɑ kunɑ mɑ i du fɑnsɑyom ɑ̀ kuri dɔ, wɑtom ɑ̀ go kɑ i yɑɑfɑ ndɑ i dulum yom.
Bɔrɔ si du kɑ di Ikpɛ, ɑmmɑ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku no kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ i sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ goono zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɑkɑ.

A nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. À nɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono gɑndɑ tɑkɑ. À nɑ hɛ yom kɑ bɔrɔ hini kɑ di ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ moo si di tɑkɑ, zɑ kpetɛrɛ yom zɑ dɑbɑri yom zɑ meire yom zɑ hini yom. À dɔ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. A sɛ mo no hɛ kulu goono.
Ngɑ yɑ goono zɑ hɛ kulu mɑnɑ tɛ. À gɑ hɛ kulu hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ.
Ngɑ yɑ ci gɑɑhɑm bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ mɑrgɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci sintine ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ tunu bukɔei gɑme domi hɛ kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ jinɑ.
À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ hɑɑli tɔyom kulu mɑ gɔrɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.

À kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ mɑ ngɑ mɑ hɛ yom kulu sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ ngɑ, Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Zɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono gɑndɑ hɑli hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kulu sɑsɑbɑndi ɑ̀ dɔ. Mɛsiyɑ nɑ bɑɑni tɛ bɔrɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme ɑ̀ kuri dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ munu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ.
Wom mo, dom wom gɔrɔ yobi yom ndɑ ibɛrɛ yom wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ wom gbei lɑlɔ yom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ wom sɑsɑbɑndi ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑ̀ buyom dɔ domi ngɑ mɑ wom cɛɑndi ngɑ jine hɑlɑɑlɑ yom, tɑɑli si. Beriyom mɑ si ɑ̀ jine.

À go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ de wom bo gɔrɔ nɑɑne kunɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom sinjɑndi kɑ wom cɛɑndi. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ hɑli wom mɑ si bɛrɛ bɛɛjɛ gɑɑ, bɛɛjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Bɑɑru Hinno dɔ kɑ wom mɑɑ. Bɑɑru Hinno beerem wɑɑzu hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ. Hɛɛ Pɔlu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ tɛ Bɑɑru Hinno gbeiteeri.
Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go fɑihã ndɑ ɑ guruguze yom wom sɑbu sɛ. A go tɔnɑndi mo ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑnkɑmi kunɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm sɑbu sɛ, gɑɑhɑm di kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ mɑrgɑ.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ no ɑ tɛ gbeiteeri kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gbei kɑ Ikpɛ dɛcɛ ɑ bɔm wom dɔ hɛrɛ yɑ Ikpɛ Sendi tɔnɑntɛ tɛ.
Sendi tɔnɑntɛ di yɑ ci duje kɑ zɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom, zɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ.
Ikpɛ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci duje wɔ ŋmɔne hɑizici deizɑkpɛ dimi cindei gɑme. Duje wɔ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ goono wom kunɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɛɛjɛ deizɑkpɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ wɔ bɑɑru wɑɑzu no i go tɛ. I go bɔrɔ kulu kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ bɔrɔ kulu cooɑndi hɑikusutɛrɛ kulu kunɑ. I go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ i mɑ bɔrɔ kulu cɛbɛ tɔɑntɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ gɑ gbei tɛ kɑ tɑngɑm ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gbei dɑbɑri goono ndɑ, dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gbei tɛ ɑ kunɑ.
A go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei tɑngɑmi kɑ ɑ gɑ tɛ wom sɛ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono Lɑudise kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ beerem kulu sɛ mo kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ moo tɑɑci tɛ ndɑ hɛɛ.

A go tɑngɑm zɑmɑ ǹ bine yom mɑ du himmɑ. Ǹ mɑ meigu mefɔ mɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ du hɑizici kulu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu fɑhɑm tɔnɑntɛ tɑbɑtɑndiyom kunɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ duje bei sã sã, wɑtom Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bumbum.
Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no hɑikusutɛrɛ hɑizici ndɑ beiyom hɑizici kulu goono tugɑntɛ.
A go wɔne cii no zɑmɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si wom zɑmbɑ ndɑ ngɑ meecine kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ dɛrɑndi.
Bɑ kɑ ɑ si wom dɔ mɑɑ ndɑ moo, ɑ goono wom dɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. A gɑ fɑihã kɑ ɑ di wom go sɛsɛrɛ kɑ cɛ cɛrɛ bɑndɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi wom nɑɑne dɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ zɑngɑ wom nɑ Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu tɑ, wom mo dirɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ yɑ di.
Wom nɑ kɑɑji tɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ. Wom go cini ɑ̀ bɔm mo hɑli wom go sinji kɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ wom cooɑndi ndɑ. Wom nɑɑne go bɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli mo bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi ndɑ wɑlitɛrɛ ndɑ zɑmbɑ kɔnu. Cɛbɛ nge yom di hunu iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom dɔ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no Ikpɛtɛrɛ tɔyom kulu goono ko gɔrɔ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
À kunɑ no wom tɛ tɔɑntɛ yom, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci meire kulu bɔm ndɑ hini kulu bɔm.
À kunɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑmbɑngu. À mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ bɑngudɑmyom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑmbɑngu ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑngudɑmyom kɑ ɑ̀ ci dulum hɑɑli dɑbɑri kɑɑyom.
Ǹ nɑ wom fiji ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mirɑndiyom kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ wom tunɑndi ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mefɔ wom nɑɑne gɑɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri gbei kunɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
Wom dom gɔrɔ bukɔ yom wom tɑɑli yom ndɑ wom dulum hɑɑli zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu sɑbu sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ wom hunɑndi Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ mefɔ. À nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom kulu.
À nɑ i yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tilɑsi yom kɑ ǹ goono fɔndɔ hɑntumɑntɛ kunɑ tusu. Tilɑsi yom wɔ goono i gɑɑ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑnji bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ.
Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ meire yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom kɑɑ ǹ dɑbɑri gɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ tɛ no jɑmɑ bindi bindi kɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si nɑm bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ wom ciiti kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑm. Wɑ si nɑm mo ǹ mɑ wom ciiti ndɑ jingɑru wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑndu teji wɑlɑ ndɑ hulɑnzom hɑnu yom.
Nge yom di, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ ǹ ŋmɔne biyɑ nɑ, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm di yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.

Akpɛ wɔ go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ nɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛnɑndiyom ko kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom bɛɛrɑndi. À go huro hɛ yom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di hɑli iburɑdɑm hɑɑli lɑsɑbu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm beerɑndi kɔnu, sɑbɑbu si. Wɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ kpɛ dimi mɑ wom ciiti kɑ cii wom si tɔ wom bɑtɑ tukunsi gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ kpɛ dimi fee noyɑ kɑ hunu bɔm gɑɑ. Bɔm gɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kulu go beeri ko hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ dɔbu yom gɑɑ ndɑ linji yom gɑɑ. À go du beere kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ.
Wom bu Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ kɑ fee ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom. To. Ifɔ sɛ wom go wom gɔrɛ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ sendikpɑrɛ yom gɑnɑ?
Zɑngɑ ǹ cii: Si zɑɑ. Si tɑbɑɑ. Si hɑmɑ.
Hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci ngei gbei tɛyom gɑɑ, domi ǹ nɑ ǹ sinji iburɑdɑm yom fɔndɔ yom ndɑ ǹ cooɑndiyom bɔm.
Sendikpɑrɛ yom di himɑ zɑngɑ ǹ gundɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ zɑmɑ ǹ gɑnɑyom hunu iburɑdɑm binebɑɑ dɔ ndɑ bɔm cɛnɑndiyom ndɑ gɑɑhɑm tɑɑbɑndiyom kunɑ. Ammɑ nge yom di sindɑ hɑnfɑni bineibɑɑi bɔm hiniyom sɛ.
Zɑkɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom tunɑndi Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ, wom mɑ hɛ yom ceeci kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ. Nodi no Mɛsiyɑ goono kɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Wom mɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono gɑndɑ.
Wom bu. Wom hundi yom bine goono tugɑntɛ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci i hundi. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ wom mo wom kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, deizɑ kunɑ
Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ wom gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kunɑ wi. Ngei neyɑ, zinɑ ndɑ ziibi ndɑ cɛnsɛ futu ndɑ bineibɑɑi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu kɑ ɑ̀ ci tooru gɑnɑyom dimi fɔ.
Nge yom di sɑbu sɛ no Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ gɑ kɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hungu Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom bɔm.
Beerem wɔ kunɑ no wom dom gɔrɔ kɑ dirɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom go hunɑ hɛ nge yom di kunɑ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ, wom mɑ wɔne yom kulu nɑm, binetɔnɛ ndɑ binefute ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ ndɑ hɑwi sendi yom kɑ ǹ donɑ kɑ hunu wom mee yom kunɑ.
Wom mɑ si tɑngɑri cɛrɛ sɛ zɑ kɑ wom nɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom.
Wom nɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ teji fɑkɑ. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ tɑkɑkɔ, ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ ngɑ di tejɑndi beire kunɑ ngɑ himɑndi bɔm.

Bɔrɔ tejitɛrɛ wɔ dɔ fɑyɑnkɑ si. Gɑrɛku si wɑlɑ Yuifu wɑlɑ bɑnguize wɑlɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize. À sindɑ yobi wɑlɑ Sitɑncɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci yobi ɑnne wɑlɑ tɑm wɑlɑ bɔrɔcini. Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci hɛ kulu. À goono hɛ kulu kunɑ mo.
Wom ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne suubɑntɛ yom. Wom ci ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mo ndɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑkɔ yom. À sɛ no, wɑ suuji ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ ndɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ suuru hiniyom dɑm zɑngɑ jiine.
Wɑ suuru ndɑ cɛrɛ. Wɑ cɛrɛ yɑɑfɑ mo de bɔrɔ fɔ go wuuru ndɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi. Zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ, wom mo wɑ tɛ yɑ di.
Ǹ kulu bɔm yɑ ci wɑ gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine domi ngɑ yɑ gɑ wom hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ hɑli wom mɑ ci ɑfɔ.
Wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ mɑ wom bine yom mei. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ domi lɑɑkɑli kɑne wɔ no, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ ndɑ, gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku kunɑ. Wom mɑ sɑɑbu mo.

Mɛsiyɑ sendi mo gɔrɔ wom bine yom kunɑ ndɑ bɑyom hɑikusutɛrɛ kulu kunɑ. Wom mɑ cɛrɛ cooɑndi. Wom mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ ndɑ Sɑmu yom betu yom ndɑ sɑɑbuyom betu yom ndɑ dɔɔni yom kɑ ǹ hunu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Wɑ betu tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ mo ndɑ gomini wom bine yom kunɑ.
Hɛ kulu mɑ kɑ wom go tɛ sendi dɔ wɑlɑ gbei dɔ, wɑ ɑ̀ kulu tɛ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ɑ̀ dɔ.
Wɛndɛ yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom kunye yom sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ Kpe kunɑ.
Wom mo kunye yom, wɑ bɑɑ wom wɛndɛ yom. Wɑ si kutɑ ndei.
Wom mo koo yom, wɑ wom bɑhɛi yom gɑnɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ domi ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑni Kpe sɛ.
Wom mo bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ si kɑm wom koo yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ hɛo mɑ hunu.
Wom mo tɑm yom, wɑ wom hɑndunyɑ kpe yom gɑnɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ. Wɑ si tɛ ndɑ ǹ moo diyom hɑli wom mɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ bo ɑmmɑ wɑ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ Ikpɛ hɑmbure kunɑ.
Hɛ kulu kɑ wom go tɛ, wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ zɑngɑ Kpe sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
Wom go bei kɑ wom kɑɑ du tubu kɑ ɑ̀ ci wom tukunsi Kpe dɔ. Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe, ɑ̀ sɛ no wom go tɑmtɛrɛ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ, ilɑlɔ no ɑ̀ du. Bɑɑbɑɑ si Ikpɛ dɔ.
Hɑndunyɑ kpe yom, wom mo wɑ tɛ wom tɑm yom sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɑntɛ susu ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ. Wɑ bei kɑ wom mɑ, wom gundɑ Kpe fɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
Wo himmɑ dɑm ɑduwɑ gɑɑ. Wɑ sɑɑle dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom mɑ.
Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ fɔndɔ feeri ngɑ Sendɑ sɛ hɑli i mɑ hini kɑ Mɛsiyɑ duje sendi cii. Duje wɔ sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ goono kɑsu.
Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ yɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ cii tɛrɛkpɑrɛ mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ sendi.
Wom mo dirɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne jine. Wɑ lɔkɑci zɑɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli.
Sɑɑ kulu wom sendi mɑ ci ihinno kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ zɑngɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ciiri. Yɑ nɑ hɑli wom mɑ bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ sendi kɑ yeti bɔrɔ sɛ.
I nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ Ticiku yɑ gbeiteeri nɑɑnekpɛ no. Ngɑ yɑ ci i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ Kpe sɛ. À kɑɑ deede wom sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ.
À sɛ nɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm wom dɔ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom bei ɑ̀ mɑ wom bine yom mo no himmɑ.
A nɑ Onezim dɔntɔm ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Onezim yɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ, i nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ no. Ngɑ mo, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no. Ǹ kɑɑ wom no nee hɛ kulu bɑɑru.
Alisitɑku, ɑ kpɑɑsi kɑsuize go wom fɔɔ. Mɑɑku, Bɑɑnɑbɑ weimɑ ize mɑ go wom fɔɔ. Wom jinɑ kɑ du ɑ̀ bɔm kɔ fɔndɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii, de ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom dɔ wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Yɑsuwɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yusitu, ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ mo. Ǹ kulu Yuifu yom no. Ngei hinne yɑ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛ. Ngei mo yɑ nɑ ɑ yɑmɑrɑndi.
Epɑfɑru mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci wom nmɔne ɑfɔ, Mɛsiyɑ tɑm, ngɑ mo go wom fɔɔ. À go tɑngɑm mo wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu ndɑ ɑduwɑ yom zɑmɑ wom mɑ du kɑ cɛ tɔɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ yom Ikpɛ binebɑɑ kulu kunɑ.
A gɑ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go himmɑ dɑm kɑlɑ kɑlɑ wom sɛ ndɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Lɑudise kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Hiyɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ.
Lukɑ i lokotoro binebɑɑkɔ ndɑ Demɑ, ǹ go wom fɔɔ.
Wom mɑ nyɑizei kulu kɑ ǹ goono Lɑudise kpɑɑrɑ fɔɔ. Wom mɑ Nimfɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ fɔɔ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ tirɑ wɔ coo wom kulu jine, wom mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ coo Lɑudise Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom mo sɛ. Tirɑ kɑ Lɑudise Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom mo du, wom mɑ ɑ̀ coo.
Wom mɑ cii Alicipu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ gbei di kɑ ɑ̀ du Kpe kunɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
Hɛɛ mɑ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ nɑ fɔɔyom wɔ hɑntum ndɑ ɑ bumbum kɑmbɛ. Wom mo hɔngɔ ɑ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ. Gomini mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.

Hɛɛ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑfim ndɑ Timote, i yom yɑ go wom Tesɑlonikɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔɔ, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mɑ goono wom bɑndɑ.
I go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ i hɔngɔ wom i ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
I go hɔngɔ cɛyom si, wom gbei kɑ wom go tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ tɛgbei kɑ wom go tɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. I go hɔngɔ wom suuru bɛɛjɛ kunɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine.
Nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, i go bei Ikpɛ nɑ wom suubɑ nɑ.
I go bei i Bɑɑru Hinno mɑnɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ mee sendi gɑɑ hinne ɑmmɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ tɑbɑtɑndiyom kɑlɑ kɑlɑ mo. Zɑngɑ yɑ wom go bei i gɔrɛ kɑ i tɛ wom jine noyɑ wom sɑbu sɛ.
Wom tɛ i dendenikɔ yom ndɑ Kpe ŋmɔne yom mɑ. Wom nɑ Sendɑ tɑ kɑnkɑmi boobo kunɑ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ndɑ fɑihã kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go no.
Yɑ no wom tɛ deedɑndi nɑɑnekɔ yom kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu ndɑ Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu.
Zɑ wom dɔ no, Kpe Sendɑ dundum. A mɑnɑ ci Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu ndɑ Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu hinne no ɑmmɑ nungu kulu no wom nɑɑne bɑɑru kɑ wom gundɑ Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑru kɑ see. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɔ i mɑ hɛ fɔ cii kpɛɛnɛ.
Ngei bumbum gɑ kɑ i deede ndɑ kubeyom kɑ i du wom dɔ. Ǹ go kɑ i deede mo zɑngɑ wom fee ndɑ tooru yom kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Wom bɛrɛ kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cimikpɛ sɛ.
Wom bɛrɛ ko kɑ ɑ̀ Ize bɑtu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Ize wɔ nɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i kɑɑ binetɔnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kɑmbɛ.
Nyɑizei, wom bumbum bei kubeyom kɑ i du wom dɔ mɑnɑ ci kɔnu.
Wom bei Filipi kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom nɑ i guruguzɑndi kɑ i sendi yɑmu zɑ i mɑnɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. Ammɑ i du binesɛndɛ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kunɑ kɑ sendi wom sɛ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm, bɑ ndɑ tɑngɑmi boobo.
I himmɑ noyom si dɛrɛyom kunɑ wɑlɑ ziibi kunɑ wɑlɑ gulinci kunɑ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno tɑlifi i gɑɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ no, i go sendi. À mɑnɑ ci i go sendi hɑli i mɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ ɑmmɑ i mɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i bine yom neesi.
Wom go bei kɑ i mɑnɑ sendi kɑɑnɔ yom cii bɑ ce fɔ. Wom go wɔne bei mo kɑ i mɑnɑ sendi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom kɔbɛ. Ikpɛ yɑ ci i sɛdɑ.
I bine mɑnɑ bɛɛrɛ ceeci iburɑdɑm yom dɔ wɑlɑ wom dɔ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ cindei dɔ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu i hini kɑ tɛ wom sɛ jɛrɔ ndɑ dɑbɑri zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ yom.
Ammɑ i tɛ bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom wom kunɑ zɑngɑ ize nyɑ cini kɑ ngɑ koo yom tɛlɛtɛlɛ.
Yɑ no i yom mo i gundɑ wom bɛɛjɛ. À mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno hinne no ɑmmɑ ndɑ i bumbum mo domi wom tɛ i binebɑɑkɔ yom.
Nyɑizei, wom go hɔngɔ gbei kɑ i tɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ndɑ i tɑɑbi hɑli i mɑ si tɛ jɛrɔ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Yɑ no i nɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu fɛɛ wom sɛ.
I nɑ i gɔrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ tɛ kɑ ci cɛɑntɛ susu wom jine. I sindɑ tɑɑli wom jine, wom nɑɑnekɔ yom. Wom yɑ ci sɛdɑ yom ngɑ di bɔm, yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ mɑ.
Wom go bei mo zɑngɑ i gɔrɔ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu sɛ zɑngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ koo. I nɑ wom no himmɑ kɑ wom lɑɑkɑli kɑnɑndi.
I nɑ wom no himmɑ kɑ cii wom goonoyom mɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom cɛɛ ngɑ bumbum kpetɛrɛ ndɑ ngɑ deizɑ dɔ.

Wom no Ikpɛ Sendi tɑ, Sendɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ i dɔ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ mo ko bei ndɑ cimi ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm sendi. Sendi di go gbei tɛ wom kunɑ mo, wom kɑ wom ci nɑɑnekɔ yom. À sɛ no i yom mo, i go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, cɛyom si.
Wom mo nyɑizei, wom tɛ dendenikɔ yom Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ sɛ. Wom guruguze mo wom dimi yom kɑmbɛ kunɑ zɑngɑ ngei mɑ guruguze Yuifu yom dɔ.
Yuifu yom nɑ Kpe Yesu ndɑ ngei ɑndebi yom wi. Ǹ nɑ i yom mo guruguzɑndi. Ǹ si kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu mo.
Ǹ hungu i mɑ sendi dimi cindei sɛ hɑli Ikpɛ mɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ, ǹ go kɑ ngei dulum yom tɔnɑndi cɛyom si. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ tɔnɑntɛ zumbu ǹ bɔm.
Nyɑizei, i fee ndɑ wom lɔkɑci cɛnɑ fɔ. I si wom bɑndɑ ɑmmɑ i bine yom goono wom gɑɑ. I go guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ i mɑ di wom moodumɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
À sɛ nɑ, i bɑɑ i mɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. Hɑli yɑ mɑ hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ce fɔ yom, ɑmmɑ Setɑm nɑ i gɑnji.
Ifɔ yɑ ci i bɛɛjɛ wɑlɑ i binekɑɑne wɑlɑ i fulɑ tukunsi kɑ ɑ̀ ci i fɑihã? Wom yɑ ci i fulɑ tukunsi sɑɑ kɑ i goono i Kpe Yesu jine ɑ̀ kɑɑyom wɑtɛ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
Wom mo, wom yɑ ci i deizɑ ndɑ i fɑihã.
À sɛ no kɑ i mɑnɑ ye kɑ hini suuru kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i sɛ i yom hinne mɑ gɔrɔ Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ.
I nɑ i nyɑize Timote kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ gbeiteeri dɔntɔm wom dɔ. Timote yɑ ci i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ. I nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ wom sinji ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ wom no himmɑ wom nɑɑne kunɑ.
I nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm zɑmɑ wom mɑ sinji hɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si kɑmbɑ tɑɑbi wɔne yom sɑbu sɛ. Wom bumbum go bei kɑ tɑɑbi nge yom di sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ i jisi.
Sɑɑ kɑ i goono wom dɔ i jinɑ kɑ cii wom sɛ kɑ tɑɑbi bɑ kɑɑ i dɔ. À kɑɑ kɔ zɑngɑ wom gundɑ ɑ̀ beiyom.
À sɛ no hɛɛ mo, yɑ nɑ du kɑ hini suuru kpɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Timote dɔntɔm wom dɔ yɑ du kɑ wom nɑɑne bei. A gɑ hɑmburu hɑnibɑ suikɔ nɑ wom sui hɑli i gbei tɛ kɔnu.

Mɑɑsɑ kɑ Timote hunu wom dɔ kɑ kɑɑ i dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ i sɛ bɑɑru hinno wom nɑɑne ndɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine bɔm. À cii wom gundɑ hɔngɔyom hinno i sɛ sɑɑ kulu. À cii mo wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ di i yom zɑngɑ i go bɑɑ i mɑ di wom.
À sɛ no nyɑizei, i tɑɑbi kulu kunɑ ndɑ i kɑnkɑmi kulu kunɑ i gundɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ simbɑ wom, wom nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ.
Zɑ kɑ wom go cɛ ihinno Kpe kunɑ, mɑɑsɑ i go hunɑ.
Sɑɑbuyom dimi fɔ i mɑ tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ wom sɑbu sɛ, binekɑɑne kɑ wom kɑɑndɑ i sɛ Ikpɛ jine?
Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri i gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ di wom moodumɑ. I go ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ wom nɑɑne kunɑ tɔnɑndi mɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ bumbum kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kpei wom dɔ feeri.
Kpe mo bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom gundɑ cɛrɛ sɛ ndɑ ǹ kulu sɛ tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom zɑngɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ i gundɑ wom sɛ.
Yɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ mɑ wom bine yom no gɑɑbi wom mɑ gɔrɔ tɑɑli si hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine sɑɑ kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ go kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu.
À bɑndɑ nyɑizei, wom dendeni i dɔ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ dirɑ hɑli wom mɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ. I go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ wom no himmɑ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ wom mo tɛ yɑ di kɑ tɔntɔnu.
Wom go bei hɛ yom kɑ i nɑ wom dɑm Kpe Yesu dɔ.
Ikpɛ binebɑɑ yɑ ci wom hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ, wom mɑ wom bɔm fee zinɑ dimi kulu.
Wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ ŋmɑɑni mɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm diiyom hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ kunɑ.
Wom mɑ si tu bineibɑɑi mɑ wom gɑɑhɑm dii zɑngɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ si Ikpɛ bei gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ nyɑize dɑrigɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑmbɑ hɛ wɔ kunɑ. Kpe yɑ ci fɑɑsɑkɔ hɛ nge yom di kulu kunɑ. I bine jinɑ kɑ cii wom sɛ kɔ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑyɑnkɑ wom sɛ.
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i cɛɛ i mɑ gɔrɔ ziibi kunɑ ɑmmɑ i mɑ gɔrɔ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hungu cɛbɛyom di, ɑ̀ si hungu bɔrɔ. Ikpɛ no ɑ̀ go hungu, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom no ngɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci nyɑize bɑɑkɑsine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tilɑsi yɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum wom sɛ. Wom mo, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛbɛ wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
Wom bine go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu nyɑizei kulu. Ammɑ nyɑizei, i gɑ wom no himmɑ, wom mo bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu kpɛɛnɛ.
Wɑ himmɑ tɛ kɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑmbɑɑni si. Wɑ moo dɑm wom ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom gɑɑ. Wɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ wom kɑmbɛ yom zɑngɑ i nɑ wom dɑm.
Wom mɑ wom gɔrɛ tɛ ndɑ booriyom tɛrɛ bɔrɔ yom jine hɑli wom si tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ jɛrɔ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ bine si bɑɑ wom mɑ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ kɑni. A si bɑɑ wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ zɑngɑ cindei kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɛɛjɛ.
Zɑ kɑ i go nɑɑne kɑ Yesu bu kɑ tunu kpɛɛnɛ, yɑ nɑ i gɑ nɑɑne mo kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bu Yesu kunɑ, Ikpɛ kɑɑ kɑɑndei ngɑ bɑndɑ.
I go wɔne cii wom sɛ Kpe Sendɑ kunɑ. I yom kɑ i cindi ko hunɑ kɑlɑ Kpe kɑɑyom, i si jinɑ wɔ kɑ yom kɑni sɛ pɑi.
Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ jinde gɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize jinɑ jinde. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ mo Ikpɛ kɑkɑji gɑ funsu. À gɑɑ nɑ, Kpe bumbum kɑɑ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bukɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ jinɑ kɑ tunu.
Cɔfɔ i yom mo kɑ i cindi kɑ hunɑ, ǹ gɑ i kɔm kɑ i meigu ndei buru yom kunɑ kɑ Kpe kube bɛɛnɛ bɑtumɑ kunɑ. Yɑ no i bo goono Kpe bɑndɑ, beeniyom si.
À sɛ no, wɑ cɛrɛ yɑmɑrɑndi ndɑ sendi nge yom di.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɔkɑci nge yom di ndɑ ɑliwɑti nge yom di wom gɑ kɑ ǹ bei. À sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tilɑsi yɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum wom sɛ.
Wom bumbum, wom go bei cɑu cɑu kɑ Kpe hɑnuɑ kɑɑ nɑ zɑngɑ zee cini kɑɑ ciini kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ cii bɑɑni goono, kɑtɑru si, cɔfɔ wup hɑlɑciyom go kɑm ǹ bɔm mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑngɑ hɛizɛnyɛ doori kɑɑ weibɔrɔ gɑɑ. Ǹ bine si kɔmɑ pɑi.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, wom si kube kunɑ hɑli hɑnu bɑ wom jirisi zɑngɑ zee.
Wom kulu kɑɑriize yom no ndɑ hɑnuize yom. I mɑnɑ ci ciini ŋmɔne yom wɑlɑ kube ŋmɔne yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ, i mɑ si jiibi zɑngɑ cindei go tɛ. Ammɑ i mo lɑɑkɑli kɑ i bɔm ci bɔrɔ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go jiibi, ciini no ǹ go jiibi. Beerem kɑ bɑji go wi, ciini no bɑji go kɑ ǹ wi.
Ammɑ i yom kɑ i ci hɑnuize yom, i mɑ hini i bɔm zɑ kɑ i nɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine dɑm zɑngɑ jɛndɛkpɛrɛ. I mɑ fɑɑbɑ bɛɛjɛ tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ci i sɛ zɑngɑ guuru fulɑ.
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i jisi binetɔnɛ sɛ. À nɑ i jisi no i mɑ du fɑɑbɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Ngɑ wɔ bu i guribi domi bɑ i goono moo hɛi no wɑlɑ bɑ i kɑni nɑ, i mɑ hunɑ mefɔ ndɑɑ̀.
À sɛ nɑ, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ kɑ cɛrɛ nɑɑne cini ndɑ zɑngɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
Nyɑizei, i go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gbei tɛ wom gɑme sɛ. Ngei yɑ ci wom jinɑ yom Kpe kunɑ ko wom kɑɑbɑɑru.
Wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ǹ gbei sɑbu sɛ. Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ goono wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑme.
Nyɑizei, i go wom no himmɑ mo, wɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go yofune tɛ kɑɑbɑɑru. Wɑ bɔrɔ yeenɔ yom no himmɑ. Wɑ hinɑbunu yom gɑɑ ǹ zɑme kunɑ. Wɑ hini ǹ kulu suuru.
Wɑ lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ilɑlɔ bɑnɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑɑ. Ammɑ wɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno hɑmine sɑɑ kulu cɛrɛ sɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ mo.
Wo fɑihã sɑɑ kulu.
Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ, cɛyom si.
Wom mo sɑɑbu hɛ kulu kunɑ domi ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ binebɑɑ wom sɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ nini wi, wɑ si Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ wi.
Wɑ si ɑndebitɛrɛ fɛntɛ.
Wɑ hɛ kulu neesi kɑ ihinno dii kɑ jɛ.
Wɑ fee ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ dimi kulu.
Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go lɑɑkɑli kɑne no, ngɑ bumbum mɑ wom hinnɑndi sã sã. Wom bɔrɔtɛrɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci biyɑ ndɑ hundi ndɑ gɑɑhɑm, Ikpɛ mɑ ǹ jɛ kɑ ǹ mɑ sindɑ tɑɑli i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyom hɑnu.
Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wom cɛɛ, Nɑɑnekpɛ no. À gɑ ngɑ di tɛ mo.
Nyɑizei, wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ.
Wɑ nyɑizei kulu fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
A gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom mɑ tirɑ wɔ coo nyɑize hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu jine.
I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑfim ndɑ Timote, i yom yɑ go wom Tesɑlonikɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔɔ, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Ikpɛ i Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
Nyɑizei, ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu. Ngɑ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ zɑmɑ wom nɑɑne di gɑ beeri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu gundɑ cɛrɛ sɛ mɑ, ɑ̀ go tɔntɔnu.
À sɛ no i yom mo, i go wom sifɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ wom suuru sɑbu sɛ. I gɑ wom sifɑ mo nɑɑne kɑ wom gundɑ ko guruguze yom ndɑ kɑnkɑmi yom jɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Ngɑ yɑ ci sɛdɑ Ikpɛ ciiti cɛɑntɛ susu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm Ikpɛ mɑ lɑsɑbu wom tɔ wom mɑ hurɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Kpetɛrɛ di sɛ no wom go tɑɑbi.
À sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ no ɑ̀ mɑ kɑnkɑmi yeti beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ wom kɑnkɑm bɔm.
À sɑbɑ mɑ wom kɑ wom goono kɑnkɑmi kunɑ Ikpɛ mɑ wom no hulonzom i bɑndɑ. Ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunutɛrɛ zɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize dɑbɑrikpɛ yom.
Ǹ kɑɑ nini bɛllɛ kunɑ kɑ fɑɑsɑ beerem gɑɑ kɑ ǹ si Ikpɛ bei ndɑ beerem gɑɑ kɑ ǹ si kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno gɑnɑ.
Beerem nge yom di kɑɑ du bɑnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑlɑciyom, beeniyom si. Ǹ gɑ ǹ fee ndɑ Kpe moodumɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbi deizɑkpɛ mo.

Ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ Hɑnu di sɑɑ kɑ Yesu kɑɑ kɑ du bɛɛrɛ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne, ɑ̀ kɑɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu ngei bɑndɑ. Wom mo, wom kɑɑ mɑmɑci ndɑɑ̀ zɑmɑ wom cimɑndi i sɛdɑ gɑɑ kɑ i tɛ wom sɛ.

À sɛ no, i go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu ko kɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom lɑsɑbu kɑ wom tɔ cɛɛ yom wɔ. I go ŋmɑɑrɛ mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ngɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ miilɑ kulu tɔnɑndi wom nɑɑne gbei dɔ ngɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ.
Yɑ no i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ mɑ du bɛɛrɛ wom kunɑ. Wom mo wom mɑ du bɛɛrɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini goono ndɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyom gɑɑ ndɑ i meiguyom ɑ̀ dɔ, i gundɑ ŋwɑɑrɛyom wɔne.

Wom mɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom biriji ndɑ wɑɑsi wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu mo biyɑ fɔ sɑbu sɛ wɑlɑ sendi fɔ sɑbu sɛ wɑlɑ tirɑ fɔ sɑbu sɛ. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu zɑmɑ beerem cii bɑɑru wɔ hunu i dɔ kɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ Hɑnu kɑɑ kɔ.
Wɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ wom zɑmbɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ, domi Hɑnu wɔ si kɑɑ kɑlɑ de hunguɛ mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ. À si kɑɑ kɑlɑ de Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ mɑ jinɑ kɑ hunutɛrɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑlɑciize.
Ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ hungu hɛ kulu kɑ beerem cii Ikpɛ no kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi. Hɛ kulu kɑ beerem go bɛɛrɑndi mo, ɑ̀ hunguɑ̀. Kɑ jɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ gɔrɔ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ ko cii ngɑ yɑ Ikpɛ no.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ, ɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ cii wom sɛ. Wom go hɔngɔ ngɑ di bɑ?
Mɑɑsɑ wom bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ko ngɑ wɔ gɑnji ɑ̀ mɑ si hunutɛrɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci kunɑ.
Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom duje go gbei tɛ kɔ. Kɑlɑ de, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnji mɑɑsɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Sɑɑ di gɑɑ, Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ du kɑ hunutɛrɛ. Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ zeeri ndɑ ngɑ mee funsuyom. Kpe kɑɑyom kɑɑri mo gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ gɑ kɑɑ ndɑ Setɑm dɑbɑri kɑ gbei dɑbɑri dimi dimi kulu tɛ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom.
À kɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ cɛsusu dimi tɛ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci fɑfɑgu. Ǹ go hɑlɑci zɑmɑ ǹ hungu kɑ bɑɑ cimi hɑli ǹ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
À sɛ no, Ikpɛ mo nɑ dɛrɛyom dɑbɑrikpɛ tɑm ǹ gɑɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ nɑɑne tɑngɑri gɑɑ.
À gɑɑ no, beerem kulu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne cimi gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ bine go kɑɑni ndɑ gbei lɑlɔ tɛyom, Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri.

Ammɑ nyɑizei, Kpe binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu sɑɑ kulu wom sɑbu sɛ. I gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom suubɑ zɑ sintine wom mɑ du fɑɑbɑ sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi. Wom mo nɑɑne cimi gɑɑ.
Fɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ i Bɑɑru Hinno dɔ hɑli wom mɑ du i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ deizɑ mo.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ cɛbɛyom jɛ kɑ i nɑ wom cooɑndi i mee sendi gɑɑ wɑlɑ i tirɑ gɑɑ.
I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bumbum ndɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑ i yom kɑ i nɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom ndɑ bɛɛjɛ hinno ngɑ gomini gɑɑ.
À mɑ wom bine yom no gɑɑbi kɑ wom sinji sendi hinno kulu ndɑ gbei hinno kulu kunɑ.
À bɑndɑ nyɑizei, wom mo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ Kpe Sendɑ mɑ kɑru kɑ see ndɑ wɑɑsi nungu kulu. Sendi wɔ mɑ du bɛɛrɛ mo zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ wom dɔ.
Wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ mo i mɑ hunu bɔrɔ siirɑntɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑnɑ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom.
Ammɑ Kpe yɑ Nɑɑnekpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom sinji ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ wom woo Ilɑlɔ.
I gundɑ nɑɑne Kpe kunɑ kɑ simbɑ wom ko bei hɛ kulu kɑ i go cii wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Wom gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ.
Mɑɑsɑ, Kpe mɑ wom bine yom cendi kɑ kɑɑndɑ wom Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ suuru kunɑ mɑ.
Nyɑizei, i go wom dɑm i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ fee ndɑ nyɑize kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go yofune gɔrɛ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ cɛbɛ kɑ wom du i dɔ.
Wom bumbum go bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ i dendeni. I mɑnɑ yofune gɔrɛ tɛ wom gɑme kunɑ.
I mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ wom dɔ zɑngɑ binikom yom. Ammɑ tɑɑbi ndɑ fɑrigɑ kunɑ i nɑ gbei tɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri, domi i mɑ si tɛ zɑngɑ jɛrɔ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ gɑndɑ.
À mɑnɑ ci i sindɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ ɑmmɑ domi i mɑ i bɔm no wom sɛ zɑngɑ deedɑndi sɛ nɑ, wom mɑ i dendeni.
Yɑ no, sɑɑ kɑ i goono wom dɔ, i nɑ wom dɑm wɔne kɑ cii de bɔrɔ fɔ hungu kɑ gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ŋmɑɑ.
I mɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono wom kunɑ ndɑ yofune kɑ ǹ si gbei tɛ pɑi. I mɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm dɑm hɛ kulu kunɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ goono zɑngɑ yɑ, i go kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ ǹ no himmɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ ǹ mɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ngei bɔm ŋmɑɑrɑndi.
Ammɑ nyɑizei, wɑ si fɑrigɑ ndɑ ihinno tɛyom.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ i sendi gɑnɑ kɑ i gɑ cii tirɑ wɔ kunɑ, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ bɔrɔ di. Wɑ si kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ ɑkpɛ domi hɑwi mɑ ɑ̀ dii.
Ammɑ wɑ si ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm zɑngɑ nyɑize.
Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ bumbum kɑ ɑ̀ ci Lɑɑkɑli Kɑnekpɛ, mo wom no lɑɑkɑli kɑne sɑɑ kulu, zɑngɑ nɑ kulu. Kpe mɑ goono wom kulu bɑndɑ.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ go wom fɔɔ. Ngɑ yɑ ci jeeri kɑ ɑ bumbum cini tɛ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ ɑ tirɑ yom kulu kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ ɑ cini hɑntum.
I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no Ikpɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ meire bɔm ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i bɛɛjɛ bɔm.
Hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Timote, ni ɑ ize ndɑ cimi nɑɑne kunɑ. Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ ǹ mo goono n bɑndɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ di, n mɑ gɔrɔ Efese wɑngɑrɑ domi n mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɑm ǹ mɑ si cooɑndi cɛbɛ ŋmɑni yom bɔm.
Ǹ mɑ si ngei bɔm hɔ jendi yom gɑɑ mo ndɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom gɑɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ mee. Kɔsɔngu no ǹ cini kɑɑndɑ. Ǹ si nɑm Ikpɛ gbei mɑ kpei moojine nɑɑne kunɑ.
Meire wɔ sɑbɑbu yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bine hinno gɑɑ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno gɑɑ ndɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑ hɛ nge yom di hɑitɑ kɑ kɑmbɑ. Ǹ huro sendi kɔnu yom kunɑ.
Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ tɛ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom. Ammɑ ǹ si fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ cii ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑhirɑndi.
Ammɑ i bei kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ yɑ ihinno nɑ de bɔrɔ go gbei tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.

I gɑ bei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɔndɑ tɛ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu sɛ kɑlɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ hini hunguɛkpɛ yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ fɔndɑ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ndɑ dulumkoni yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ yom sɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ bɑɑbɑ wikɔ yom ndɑ nyɑ wikɔ yom ndɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ yom sɑbu sɛ mo.

Ǹ nɑ fɔndɑ tɛ zinɑteeri yom sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑbɑrɑ yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ zeekɔ yom ndɑ tɑngɑrikom yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ go ze tɑngɑri bɔm ndɑ hɛ kulu kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno sɑbu sɛ.
Cɛbɛ wɔ yɑ ci Bɑɑru Hinno ŋmɔne, Bɑɑru Hinno deizɑkpɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ.
A go sɑɑbu i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no gɑɑbi. A gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu domi ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu nɑɑnekpɛ kɑ ɑ dɑm ngɑ gbei kunɑ.
À nɑ ɑ dɑm gbei kunɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ ci Ikpɛ cɛnɑndikɔ ndɑ guruguzɑndikɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ futu. Ammɑ ɑ du suuji domi zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ nɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne kunɑ.
Ammɑ i Kpe gomini tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Sendi wɔne nɑɑnekpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɑ dulumkoni yom fɑɑbɑ. Hɛɛ mo yɑ ci dulumkoni yom kulu ŋmɔne ibeeri.

Ammɑ ɑ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ suuji tɛ hɑli Yesu Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ suuru kuku kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ. À nɑ suuji wɔ tɛ ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ ci dulumkoni yom ŋmɔne ibeeri domi yɑ tɛ deedɑndi beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ bɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Mɑɑsɑ, Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ sintiyom, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom, ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ, mɑɑ si di, Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑikusu, bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
A gɑ kɑ n dɑm wɔne ɑ kɑɑ Timote, ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ yom kɑ ǹ dɑm jinɑ kɑ tɛ n bɔm goono ndɑ. N mɑ tɑngɑmi hinno tɛ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom wɔ bɔm.
N mɑ nɑɑne jɛ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinnɑ. Nɑɑne di no bɔrɔ fɔ yom furu kɑ ɑ̀ jisɑndi zɑngɑ hi go sɑrɑ kɑ jisi hɑri kunɑ.
Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom yɑ ci Himene ndɑ Alɛsɑndi kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ dɑm Setɑm kɑmbɛ domi ǹ mɑ dendeni kɑ si Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi.
Ngɑ di sɛ, himmɑ kɑ ɑ go kɑ n no sintine yɑ ci, wo ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom beerem sɛ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom mo bɔrɔ kulu sɛ.
Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ yom ndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ domi i mɑ du kɑ i gɔrɛ tɛ ndɑ bɑɑni lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ, Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom kulu kunɑ ndɑ booriyom.
Ngɑ yɑ boori. À kɑɑni mo Ikpɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ sɛ.
Ikpɛ miilɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kulu mɑ du fɑɑbɑ kɑ kɑɑ cimi bei.
Ikpɛ yɑ ngɑ fɔlɔnku no. Sɑsɑbɑndikɔ yɑ ngɑ fɔlɔnku no Ikpɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ Bɔrɔ no, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
A nɑ ngɑ bɔm no kɑ ci fɑnsɑyom hɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. Sɛdɑ ngɑ di yɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ bumbum lɔkɑci gɑɑ.
Sɛdɑ ngɑ di sɛ no, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛkɔ ndɑ diyɑ. A go cimi cii Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. A si tɑngɑri. Hɛɛ yɑ ci dimi cindei cɛbɛkɔ nɑɑne ndɑ cimi kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ go bɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ nungu kulu. Ǹ mɑ kɑmbɛ hinno yom sombu, binetɔnɛ mɑ si wɑlɑ kɑkɔ.

Yɑ no ɑ go bɑɑ weibɔrɔ yom mo ǹ mo jiine kɑ ɑ̀ hegu dɑm ndɑ bɔm bɑɑnɑndiyom ndɑ lɑɑkɑli. À mɑnɑ ci ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm tɑɑlɑm ndɑ turu ndɑ wurɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ tondi kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom wɑlɑ ndɑ jiine cɑɑdɑntɛ yom.
Ammɑ ǹ mɑ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ gbei hinno yom zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom noyɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
Wɑ nɑm weibɔrɔ mɑ dendeni dɛnjɛyom kunɑ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ.
Ammɑ yɑ nɑ tu weibɔrɔ mɑ cooɑndi wɑlɑ kɑ hini hɑibɔrɔ bɔm, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mo goono ndɑ gɔrɛ dɛnjɛyom kunɑ.
Adɑmu nɑ Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Efe.
Ibilisi mɑnɑ Adɑmu zɑmbɑ ɑmmɑ Ibilisi nɑ weibɔrɔ zɑmbɑ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrum.
Ammɑ ǹ kɑɑ weibɔrɔ hɑlɑsi hɛiyom kunɑ de ǹ go himmɑ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
Sendi wɔne nɑɑnekpɛ no. De bɔrɔ fɔ go guuri ngɑ mɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cendikɔ, ɑkpɛ go gbei hinno guuri.

Ammɑ cendikɔ wɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ si di tɑɑli. A mɑ ci wɛndɛ fɔ kpɛ. À mɑ hini ngɑ bɔm. À mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ yo kube. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑni cooɑndiyom.
À mɑ si ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm no dufɛ sɛ. À mɑ si ci bine wɑɑsɔkpɛ. À mɑ si ci nooru bɑɑkɔ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ suurɑntɛ. À mɑ si ci fɑsɑdɑntɛ wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ.
À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hini ngɑ fuu hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ koo yom cɛbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
De bɔrɔ si ŋmɑɑni kɑ hini ngɑ fuu, mɛtɛ ɑkpɛ tɛ kɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ?
À mɑ si ci gɑnɑkɔ teji domi ɑ̀ mɑ si ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi kɑ kɑm Setɑm ciiti dimi kunɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno mo beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑm hɑwi kunɑ ndɑ Setɑm hirime kunɑ.
Yɑ no kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ yom mo, ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Ǹ mɑ si ci sendi hinkɑkpɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ si ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm no dufɛ sɛ kɑ bisɑ. Ǹ mɑ si ci nooru bɑɑkɔ yom.
Ammɑ ǹ mɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ nɑɑne ŋmɔne duje jɛ bine kunɑ sendi hinno kunɑ.
Ǹ mɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bubure kɑ di ǹ mɑ du kɑ tɛ mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ yom zɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ǹ gɑɑ tɑɑli.
Yɑ no wɛndɛ yom mo, ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Ǹ mɑ si ci kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ hini ngei bɔm. Ǹ mɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom hɛ kulu gɑɑ.
Mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ yom mɑ ci wɛndɛ fɔ kpɛ yom kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑni kɑ hini ngei koo yom ndɑ ngei fuu yom hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ gbei tɛ hɑli ɑ̀ boori, ǹ du ngei bɛɛrɛ nungu. Ǹ du yɑrutɛrɛ mo nɑɑne kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
A go wɔne yom hɑntum n sɛ nɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ n dɔ kɑɑyom bɛɛjɛ subɑsi.
De ɑ go jɛ n mɑ bei zɑngɑ n gɑ n bɔm dii Ikpɛ fuu kunɑ, fuu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi kɑɑsɑ ndɑ cimi tɛmbɛ.

Siikɑ si, Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom duje beeri. Ikpɛ hunutɛrɛ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ cɛyom susukpɛ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom di ɑ̀. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ. Beerem nɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ deizɑ kunɑ.
Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bine cii tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ lɔkɑci kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑ kɑmbɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ biyɑ fɑfɑguɛkpɛ yom ndɑ hɔllɛ yom cɛbɛ yom gɑnɑ.
Ngei yɑ gɑ tɑngɑri cii ndɑ munɑficitɛrɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi tɛ tiinɑ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu ndɑ nini.
Ngei yɑ gɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom nɑ mei ǹ mɑ si hiji. Ǹ go cii mo ǹ mɑ si ŋmɑɑri fɔ yom ŋmɑɑ, ŋmɑɑri kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ nɑɑnekɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cimi bei mɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ ihinno no. Afɔ mo kulu si ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ mɑ hungu de bɔrɔ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
À hɑlɑli no Ikpɛ Sendɑ ndɑ ɑduwɑ dɔ.
De n nɑ hɛ nge yom di feeri nyɑize yom sɛ, n kɑɑ tɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri hinnɑ. N gɑ kɑ n bɔm ŋmɑɑrɑndi ndɑ nɑɑne sendi ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ susu.
Ammɑ n mɑ hungu weizeenɔ yom jendi yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom. N mɑ n bɔm kokɑri tɛ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom kunɑ.
Gɑɑhɑm dungɑndiyom gundɑ bɑrikɑ cɛnɑ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom gundɑ bɑrikɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ, zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑlikɑwɑli mɑɑsɑ hundi sɛ ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ ŋmɔne mo sɛ.
Sendi ngɑ di nɑɑnekpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ i gɑ gbei tɛ ko goono hɑwi kunɑ domi i go bɛɛjɛ dɑm Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ kunɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ kulu Fɑɑbɑkɔ hɑli yɑ mo nɑɑnekɔ yom.
N mɑ hɛ nge yom di dɑm kɑ cooɑndi ǹ bɔm.
N mɑ si tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ dondɑ ni, n hɑiwɑsutɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ ci deedɑndi nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ sendi kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ biyɑ ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bine hinneyom.
Hɑli ɑ kɑɑ n mo coo. N mo himmɑ nɑ. N mɑ cɛbɛ tɛ.
N mɑ si sɑɑle kɑɑ noyom gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ. Noyom wɔ no Ikpɛ no n sɛ ɑndebitɛrɛ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ ngei kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ n gɑɑ.
N mɑ sɑɑle dɑm hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ. N mɑ n bɔm no ǹ sɛ domi n jinɑ kpeiyom mɑ hunu tɛrɛkpɑrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ.
N mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ n bɔm ndɑ cɛbɛyom di. N mo himmɑ dɑm hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ. Yɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, n gɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ ndɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ.
N mɑ si bɔgu hɑizeenɔ bɔm ɑmmɑ n mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ zɑngɑ n bɑɑbɑ yom. N mɑ hɑiwɑsu yom mɑ no himmɑ zɑngɑ n bumbum cɛɛnɛ yom.
N mɑ wei zeenɔ yom mo no himmɑ zɑngɑ n nyɑ yom, hundiyo yom mo zɑngɑ n weimɑ yom hinneyom kulu kunɑ.
N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci sokoni yom ndɑ cimi.
Ammɑ de sokoni gundɑ koo yom wɑlɑ hɑɑmɑ yom, nɑm ǹ mɑ dendeni kɑ cɛbɛ ngei fuu sɛ jinɑ kɑ ngei go kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. Ǹ mɑ bɑnɑ ngei bɑhɛi yom ndɑ ngei cɛɛ yom sɛ domi ngɑ yɑ boori. À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ mo.
Weibɔrɔ sokoni wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sokoni ndɑ cimi goono no ngɑ fɔ. À go kɑ ngɑ bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ Ikpɛ bɔm. À go himmɑ dɑm ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom ndɑ ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri.
Ammɑ sokoni kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bine dɛcɛ hɑndunyɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑyom bɔm, bukɔ no zɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
N mɑ hɛ nge yom di dɑm ǹ mɑ du kɑ zɑm tɑɑli.
Ammɑ de gɑnɑkɔ si lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom hɑli yɑ mo ɑ̀ fuu bɔrɔ yom, ɑkpɛ nɑ nɑɑne ze. À jɑɑsɑ mo bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne.
Hɑli n bɑ sokoni zɑɑ kɑ hɑntum kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kɑm jiiri weidu bɑndɑ. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ kunye fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ndɑ.

À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ gbei hinno yom yɑ ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ. Koo yom mo tunu ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ yo kube. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom cee yom nyunu. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑnkɑm gɑɑkɑsine. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go himmɑ dɑm gbei hinno dimi dimi kulu kunɑ.
Ammɑ n mɑ si sɑtɑrɑ sokoni yom hɑntum domi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ guuri go kɑ ǹ fum, ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ngei mɑ hiji. À gɑɑ no, ǹ fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɔ.
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ciiti ngei bɔm domi ǹ nɑ ngei sintine ɑlikɑwɑli ceeri.
Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ mo no ǹ bo ceeci ngei mɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑntɛ yom ko huro fuu fuu. À mɑnɑ ci ǹ tɛ dɑɑmɑntɛ yom hinne no bo ɑmmɑ ǹ tɛ kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom ndɑ mimɑndɑkpɛ yom mo ko hɛ yom cii kɑ ǹ si sɑbɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go bɑɑ sɑtɑrɑ yom mɑ hiji kɑ du koo yom. Ǹ mɑ ngei fuu yom dii. À gɑɑ no ǹ si gurujekɑri no dɑɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ i mɑɑ sɑrɑ.
Afɔ yom kɑmbɑ kɑ dɛcɛ Setɑm bɑndɑ kɔ.
De hɑibɔrɔ wɑlɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne gundɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom, ɑ̀ mɑ cini kɑ ǹ gɑɑkɑsine. À mɑ si ci Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ jɛrɔ, domi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ mɑ du kɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni cimi cimi yom gɑɑkɑsine.
Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cendi hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori ǹ mɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu kɑ ǹ tɔ ǹ mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ ce hinkɑ. Yɑ mo hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ kɑ wɑɑzu Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɔm ko cooɑndi.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N mɑ si tɑkumkumɛ dɑm hɑu mee gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dɑsɑyom gbei tɛ". À cii mo: "Gbeiteeri tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ du ngɑ bɑnɑndi".
N mɑ si beriyom fɔ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu fɔ bɔm tu, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ mɑɑ sɛdɑ hinkɑ wɑlɑ sɛdɑ hinzɑ mee gɑɑ no.
Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ gɑ dulum tɛ, n mɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm mɑrgɑ kulu jine, cindei mo mɑ du kɑ hɑmburu.
A go kɑ n dɑm Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize suubɑntɛ yom jine, n mɑ hɛ nge yom di jɛ. N mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ mo ndɑ bɑɑbɑɑ.
N mɑ si sɑsɑ kɑ Kpe ŋmɔne gbei kɑmbɛ dɛcɛyom tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. N mɑ si huro bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dulum yom kunɑ. N mɑ n bɔm kɑimɑ hinnɑntɛ.
N mɑ si bo hɑri bii hinne hɑm, n mɑ tɛ ndɑ dufɛ cɛnɑ n gunde sɛ ndɑ n gɑɑhɑm kɔbɑkɔbɑ sɛ.
Beerem goono kɑ ǹ dulum yom goono tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɔ hɑli ǹ gɑ ǹ ciiti. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom ŋmɔne yom si hunutɛrɛ kɑlɑ hɑli kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ.
Yɑ no gbei hinno yom goono tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. Wɔ kɑ yom mɑnɑ ci yɑ mɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ gɔrɔ tugɑntɛ.
Tɑm yom mo kulu kɑ ǹ goono tɑmtɛrɛ zuu kunɑ ǹ mɑ lɑsɑbu ngei kpe yom tɔ bɛɛrɛ kulu domi ǹ mɑ si Ikpɛ mɑɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ sendi yɑmu sɛ.

Tɑm yom kɑ ǹ kpe yom ci nɑɑnekɔ yom, ǹ mɑ si dondei domi nyɑize yom no. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ǹ sɛ ihinno zɑmɑ ǹ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom ndɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom. Ǹ kpe yom mo go lɑɑkɑli ndei kɑ hɛ hinno tɛ ngei mo sɛ. N mɑ cɛbɛ tɛ hɛ nge yom di bɔm kɑ himmɑ nɑ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cɛbɛyom ŋmɑni tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sendi hinno yom tu, ndɑ cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom.
Akpɛ wɔ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi. À si hɛ fɔ bei ɑmmɑ hãyom kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ siikɑ ndɑ kɑkɔ sendi yom no ɑ̀ go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Nge yom di kɑɑndɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ zoji ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom ndɑ ciine lɑlɔ yom
Ǹ kɑɑndɑ kɑkɔ kɔnu yom kɑ ǹ hunu beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ fɑhɑm sɑrɑ. Ǹ si cimi bei kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ gɑ tɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom yɑ ci fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ngei du liibɑ. Timote, n mɑ fɛɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom.
De bɔrɔ bine gɑ cii hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom yɑ liibɑ bɑmbɑtɑ no.
I mɑnɑ huro hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ. Yɑ no i si hini kɑ hunu ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ.
Zɑ kɑ i gundɑ ŋmɑɑri ndɑ jiine kɑ dɑm, ngɑ di mɑ i wɑsɑ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go guuri ngei mɑ tɛ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom ǹ go kɑm suiyom kunɑ ndɑ hirime kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ kɑm mo bineibɑɑi kɔnu bɑɑbɑ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ beerem cendi kɑ ǹ miri bu ndɑ hɑlɑciyom kunɑ.
Nooru bɑɑkɑsine yɑ ci hɛ lɑlɔ dimi dimi kulu kɑɑji. Nooru ceeciyom dɔ no bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɛrɛ kɑ kɑmbɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm bine gooru ndɑ binesɛrɛ boobo.
Ammɑ ni wɔ, e Ikpɛ bɔrɔ, n mɑ zuuru hɛ nge yom di sɛ. N mɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ suuru ndɑ bɑɑniyom hɑmine.
N mɑ tɑngɑmi hinno tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ. N mɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ n cɛɛ kɑ n tɛ fɑsɑlikɔ hinno sɛdɑ boobo jine.
A go kɑ n dɑm Ikpɛ jine, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ kulu hunɑndi ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu jine mɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fɑsɑli hinno tɛ Pɔnse Pilɑtu jine.
N mɑ meire wɔ jɛ, ziibi si, tɑɑli si kɑlɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ.
Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ jisi kunɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Dɑbɑrikpɛ fɔlɔnku ndɑ Bɑrikɑkpɛ, Dɑbɑrikpɛ yom kulu Dɑbɑrikpɛ, Kpe yom kulu Kpe.

Ngɑ hinne yɑ si hini kɑ bu. À goono kɑɑri kunɑ, kɑɑri kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ mɑɑni ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ bɑ ce fɔ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ di ɑ̀ mɑ. Bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom. Ami.

N mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ hɑibɑrikɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kunɑ dɑm ǹ mɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ. Ǹ mɑ si ngei bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ hɑibɑrikɑ yom kɑ ǹ si jɛ bɔm. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ bɔm, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i no hɛ kulu ndɑ bɑyom domi i bine mɑ kɑɑni.
N mɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ ihinno tɛ. Gbei hinno tɛyom mɑ ci ǹ hɑibɑrikɑ. Ǹ mɑ gundɑ noyom niyɑ. Ǹ mɑ sɔlu kɑ beerem gɑɑkɑsine.
Zɑngɑ yɑ ǹ go bɑrikɑ jisi ngei bɔm sɛ kɑ kpɛsɛ hinno tɛ zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kunɑ. Yɑ no ǹ kɑɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni dii.
E Timote, n mɑ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ tɑlifi n gɑɑ jɛ. N mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ meecine kɔnu yom sɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom. N mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ beire kɑkɔ ŋmɔne yom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci beire cimi cimi, ɑmmɑ tɑngɑri no.
Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii ngei go beire wɔ gɑnɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kɑmbɑ nɑɑne fɔndɔ sɛ. Gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ ni. Ami.

Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no Ikpɛ binebɑɑ dɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ hundi bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. A go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Timote, ni ɑ ize binebɑɑkɔ.
Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ, ǹ mo goono n bɑndɑ.
A gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. A go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno, zɑngɑ ɑ cɛɛ yom tɛ. Sɑɑ kulu ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ɑ cini hɔngɔ ni ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
A go hɔngɔ n mundi mo. A go bɑɑ yɑ di ni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ du kɑ tɔ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
A go hɔngɔ mo nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ. Nɑɑne di jinɑ kɑ gɔrɔ n cɛɛ weibɔrɔ Lusi kunɑ ndɑ n nyɑ Yɑnusi kunɑ. A go tɑbɑi mo kɑ nɑɑne ngɑ di yɑ goono ni mo, n kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ go kɑ n hɔngɑndi Ikpɛ noyom kɑ n du ɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛyom gɑɑ, n mo kɑ ɑ̀ hɛo dɑm.
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i no hɑmburu bine ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i nɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ bɔm hiniyom bine.
Ngɑ di sɛ n mɑ si nɑm hɑwi mɑ n dii ndɑ i Kpe sɛdɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ hɛɛ kɑ ɑ ci kɑsuize ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ n bɑ zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ tɑɑbi yom kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri goono ndɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɛ ndɑ cɛɛ yom hɑlɑɑlɑ. À mɑnɑ i cɛɛ i gbei yom bɔm bɑ ɑmmɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bumbum miilɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gomini bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ zɑ zɑmɑni yom mɑnɑ sinti.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ gɑɑ. Ngɑ wɔ nɑ bu dɑbɑri wi. À nɑ hundi ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ Bɑɑru Hinno dɔ.
Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm fɛɛkɔ ndɑ diyɑ ndɑ dimi cindei cɛbɛkɔ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go tɑɑbi hɛ nge yom di sɛ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu hɑwi si ɑ dii. A go bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ go nɑɑne. A go tɑbɑi mo kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ bɑtu hɑli Hɑnu ngɑ di.
Sendi hinno yom kɑ n mɑɑ ɑ dɔ n mɑ ǹ jɛ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ kɑ ǹ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Jisiri hinno kɑ Ikpɛ tɑlifi n gɑɑ n mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ.
N bei kɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono Azi lɑɑbu, ǹ kulu nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom yɑ ci Figelu ndɑ Hemojene.
Kpe mo suuji cɛbɛ Onesifoli hundi sɛ domi ɑ̀ cini kɑ ɑ bine yeenɑndi. Hɑwi mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dii ndɑ ɑ seseri yom.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ ceeci ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑlɑ ɑ̀ di hɛɛ.
Kpe mɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du suuji Kpe dɔ Hɑnu ngɑ di. Ni mɑ, n bei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ Efese wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ ize, n mɑ du gɑɑbi gomini gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Hɛ yom kɑ n mɑɑ ɑ dɔ sɛdɑ bɑɑbɑ jine, n mɑ ǹ tɑlifi hɑibɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni yom mo cooɑndi ndei.
Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ n bɑ zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ tɑɑbi kunɑ zɑngɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ wɑnguize hinnɑ.
Wɑnguize kulu si wuluwɑli hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑni wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ sɛ.
Zuurukɔ kɑ ɑ̀ huro jilɑm jilɑm kunɑ mɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ du ɑ̀ tukunsi, kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ zuuru ndɑ zɑngɑ zuure di fɔndɔ yom goono ndɑ.
À himɑ hɑifɑri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei dungɔ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ jine kɑ du kediɑ bɑrikɑ.
N mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ cii. À gɑɑ nɑ Kpe gɑ n no hɛ kulu fɑhɑm.
N mɑ hɔngɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme kɑ ɑ̀ ci Dɑfidi bɑndɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ goono ndɑ.
Bɑɑru Hinno di sɑbu sɛ no ɑ gɑ tɑɑbi hɑli ǹ nɑ ɑ hɔ zɑngɑ ilɑlɔ tɛkɔ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɔ fɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go tɑɑbi kulu jɛrɛ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ suubɑ sɑbu sɛ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ zɑmɑ ngei mo mɑ du fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ ndɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
Sendi wɔne nɑɑnekpɛ no. "Zɑ kɑ i bu Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ, i kɑɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
De i go suuru, i kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. De i gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ze, ngɑ mo gɑ i ze.
De i mɑnɑ nɑɑne, ngɑ wɔ goono ko ci nɑɑnekpɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm ze."
N mɑ kɑ ǹ hɔngɑndi nge yom di kɑ ǹ dɑm Ikpɛ jine, ǹ mɑ si kɑkɔ sendi yom bɔm. Kɑkɔ sindɑ fɔ kulu de ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɑlɑci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sɛ.
N mɑ guruje kɑ ci tɑbɑtɑntɛ Ikpɛ jine. N mɑ ci gbeiteeri kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ hɑwi ndɑ ngɑ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Sendi cimikpɛ fɑsɑli zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
N mɑ fee ndɑ meecinɛ kɔnu yom ndɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom. Beerem kɑ ǹ go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ ǹ gɑ tɔntɔnu kɑ kpei jinɑ no Ikpɛ hunguɛ kunɑ.
Ǹ cɛbɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ bi kɑ ɑ̀ bo gɑɑbɑsi ŋmɑɑ. Beerem nge yom di, ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom yɑ ci Himene ndɑ Filetu.
Ngei yɑ nɑ cimi fɔndɔ hɑitɑ. Ǹ go cii kɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom tɛ kɔ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑɑne zeeri.

Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu kpɛsɛ gɑɑbikoni kɑ Ikpɛ furu si zinji. À gundɑ sɛdɑ dɑmyom kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Kpe go bei beerem kɑ ǹ ci ngɑ ŋmɔne yom. Kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ cɛɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ fee ndɑ gbei lɑlɔ.
Fuu beeri kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wurɑ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu gbei jiine yom hinne yɑ goono ɑmmɑ tuuri ŋmɔne yom mo ndɑ lɑɑbu ŋmɔne yom goono. Afɔ yom goono gbei bɛɛrɛkpɛ sɛ, ɑfɔ yom goono gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ sɛ.

Ngɑ di sɛ, de bɔrɔ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑimɑ ihinno kɑ fee ndɑ bɛɛrɛ zɑmkɔ yom ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ jiine bɛɛrɛkpɛ gbei tɛyom sɛ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi mo ɑ̀ mɑ gundɑ nɑfɑ Kpe sɛ. Yɑ no ɑ̀ goono sɔlɑntɛ gbei hinno kulu sɛ.
Ammɑ n mo zuuru hɑiwɑsutɛrɛ bineibɑɑi sɛ. N mo cɛyom susu hɑmine ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne beerem bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ Kpe mɑɑ cɛɛ ndɑ bine hinno yom.
N mo hungu sɑmutɛrɛ hãyom sɛ ndɑ hãyom kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ yɑɑse. N go bei kɑ zoji no ɑ̀ gundɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ himɑ Kpe tɑm mɑ si zogu. Kpe tɑm mɑ bɑɑni bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ cooɑndi. À mɑ ci suurɑntɛ.
À mɑ ngɑ kɑkɔkɔ yom cɛbɛ bɑɑniyom kunɑ zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ Ikpɛ nɑm ǹ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ tuubi hɑli ǹ mɑ du kɑ cimi bei.
Ǹ lɑɑkɑli mɑ mɑ ye ǹ gɑɑ mɑ. Ǹ mɑ hunu Ibilisi hirime yom kunɑ, Ibilisi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dii kɑ ǹ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ ngɑ binebɑɑ tɛ.
N mo bei kɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑnu yom kunɑ, lɔkɑci gɑɑbɔ yom kɑɑ goono.
Iburɑdɑm bɔm bɑɑkɔ yom yɑ kɑɑ goono ndɑ nooru bɑɑkɔ yom ndɑ fɑɑrikpɛ yom ndɑ tɔtɔkpɛ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndikɔ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ hungu ngei bɑhɛi yom sɛ. Ǹ si sɑɑbu. Ǹ si bɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ.
Ǹ si gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɑɑli. Ǹ sindɑ suuji. Ǹ ci kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom, beerem kɑ ǹ si hini ngei bɔm. Binesendɔ yom mo no, beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ihinno fɛntɛ.
Ǹ ci ɑmɑɑnɑ ŋmɑɑkɔ yom ndɑ hɑribɔm wɑɑsekpɛ yom ndɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndikɔ yom, beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑne kɑ bisɑ zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ.
Ǹ himɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom mo ɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ gɑnɑyom dɑbɑri ze. N no zuuru bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom sɛ.

Ǹ kunɑ no bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ go mɔnɔ kɑ huro fuu yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi lɑɑkɑli kunɑ dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Weibɔrɔ yom wɔ tɔ ndɑ dulum yom, nge yom kɑ bineibɑɑi dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni nɑ ǹ dɛrɑndi.
Sɑɑ kulu weibɔrɔ yom wɔ go ceeci ko dendeni ɑmmɑ ǹ si hini kɑ tɔ kɑ cimi bei pɑi.
Bine zɑngɑ dimi Yɑne ndɑ Yɑmbe gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Moisi, yɑ dimi mɑ nɑ iburɑdɑm wɔne yom go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cimi. Ngei yɑ sɑrɑ ngei fɑhɑm kunɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ tɑbɑtɑntɛ yom mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ nɑɑne.
Ǹ si kpei jinɑ domi ǹ sɑmutɛrɛ hunutɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ zɑngɑ Yɑne ndɑ Yɑmbe.
Ammɑ ni wɔ Timote, n nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ yom gɑnɑ ndɑ ɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ɑ tɛ. N nɑ ɑ miilɑ gɑnɑ mɑ ndɑ ɑ nɑɑne ndɑ ɑ suuru ndɑ ɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ ɑ himmɑ.
N nɑ ɑ guruguzɑndiyom gɑnɑ mo ndɑ ɑ tɑɑbi yom. N bei guruguze yom ndɑ tɑɑbi yom kɑ ǹ tɔ hɛɛ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Ikoniɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Kpe bine nɑ ɑ kɑɑ ǹ kulu kunɑ.
Yɑ no beerem mo kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ hunɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom bɔm Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom ndɑ zɑmbɑntɛ yom hɛ lɑlɔ kunɑ no ǹ bo kpei jinɑ. Gbei lɑlɔ kunɑ no ǹ go beerem dɛrɑndi ko kɑ ngei bɔm dɛrɑndi mo.
Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ n dendeni kɑ cimɑndi, n mɑ kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ. N mɑ bei mo bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ n nɑ ǹ dendeni.
Zɑ n koo cɛnɑtɛrɛ n nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom bei. Sendi yom di hini kɑ n no hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ kpeindɑ ni fɑɑbɑ dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
Ikpɛ hulonzomyom dɔ no Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kulu hunu. À gundɑ nɑfɑ cɛbɛ sɛ ndɑ hinsɑyom sɛ ndɑ dɑmyom fɔndɔ sɛ ndɑ cɛyom susu ŋmɔne foorɑyom sɛ.
À gundɑ nɑfɑ hɑli Ikpɛ bɔrɔ mɑ bɑrɑ tɔɑntɛ. À mɑ ci sɔlɑntɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ mo gbei hinno tɛyom kulu sɛ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go kɑ n dɑm Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ jine, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ hundikoni yom ndɑ bukɔ yom ciiti. A go kɑ n dɑm Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ bɔm.
N mɑ wɑɑzu Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɔm. N mɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ tɑkɑkɑ, dɑɑmɑ goono, dɑɑmɑ si. N mɑ kɔnkɔm. N mɑ kɑɑbɑɑru. N mɑ himmɑ nɑ ndɑ suuru kulu ndɑ cɛbɛ cɑu cɑu.
Lɔkɑci fɔ go kɑɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm yom si bɑɑ ngei mɑ cɛbɛ hinno jɛrɛ. Ammɑ ǹ bineibɑɑi bɔm no ǹ kɑɑ cɛbɛkɔ boobo meigu ngei bɔm sɛ. Ǹ cooɑndiyom mo ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni beerem hɑngɑ sɛ.
Ǹ kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑɑbu cimi sɛ no kɑ ngei lɑɑkɑli kulu no jendi yom sɛ.
Ammɑ ni wɔ Timote, n mɑ n bɔm ci bɔrɔ hɛ kulu kunɑ. N mɑ tɑɑbi yom jɛrɛ. N mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzukɔ gbei tɛ. N mo kɑ n gbei tɔnɑndi mɑm mɑm.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go ci zɑngɑ hɑmyom sɑrɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ munu kɔ. A buyom mo bine lɔkɑci tɔ.
A nɑ tɑngɑmi hinno tɛ. A nɑ ɑ bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi. A nɑ nɑɑne jɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ tukunsi fulɑ cɛyom susu ŋmɔne jisi ɑ sɛ. Kpe yɑ Ciitikɔ cɛɑntɛ susu no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ no ndɑɑ̀ Hɑnu ngɑ di. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ hinne bo ɑmmɑ ndɑ beerem mo kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ.
Timote, n mɑ wɑɑsu kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ subɑsi.
Demɑ zuuru ɑ gɑɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni bɑɑkɑsine sɛ. À kpei Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Kesɑm mo kpei Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu. Titu mo kpei Dɑlɑmɑti lɑɑbu.
Lukɑ ngɑ fɔ yɑ goono ɑ dɔ. N mɑ kɑɑ ndɑ Mɑɑku zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ gbei sɛ.
A nɑ Ticiku dɔntɔm Efese wɑngɑrɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ n kɑɑ tunu kɑ kɑɑ, n mɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ kpɛ kuku kɑ ɑ jisi Toɑsɑ kpɑɑrɑ Kɑpu dɔ. N mɑ kɑɑndɑ tirɑ yom mo hɑli yɑ mo kuuru ŋmɔne yom di.
Alɛsɑndi guuru ciire zem di, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ hɑnyɑ fute boobo. Kpe mɑ bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom.
Ni mo, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ bɔrɔ di, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bine gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i sendi yom.
Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ cɛ ɑ sɛ ɑ sintine jinde deedeyom gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kulu zuuru ɑ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ mɑ si ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu ǹ sɛ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ cɛ ɑ sɛ. À nɑ ɑ no gɑɑbi mo hɑli ɑ hini kɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu cɑu cɑu, dimi cindei mo kulu mɑ mɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ kɑɑ muusu beeri mee kunɑ.
Kpe gɑ ɑ kɑɑ gbei lɑlɔ kulu kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ hɑlɑsi ngɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛ. Deizɑ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
N mɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ fɔɔ, ndɑ Onesifoli fuu kulu.
Alɑsitu gɔrɔ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ nɑ Tofimu mo nɑm Miletu wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ zɛnjɛ.
N mɑ wetere kɑ kɑɑ hɑli yeeni. Ebulu ndɑ Pudɑm ndɑ Linu ndɑ Kolodiɑ ndɑ nyɑizei kulu go kɑ n fɔɔ.
Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mo gɔrɔ ndɑ n biyɑ. Gomini mɑ gɔrɔ n bɑndɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Ikpɛ tɑm ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ kpeindɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne suubɑntɛ yom nɑɑne dɔ kɑ ǹ cɛbɛ ǹ mɑ cimi bei Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom bɔm.
Ǹ goono hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɛɛjɛ kunɑ. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si tɑngɑri, ɑ̀ nɑ hundi wɔ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ zɑ zɑmɑni yom mɑnɑ sinti.
Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ jisi kunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Sendɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Ikpɛ meire bɔm.
Hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Titu, ni ɑ ize ndɑ cimi i meiguɑntɛ nɑɑne bɔm. Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mɑ goono n bɑndɑ.
A sɛ nɑ, ɑ nɑ n nɑm Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi n mɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cindi ndɑ hinsɑyom sɑsɑbɑndi. N mɑ hɑikusu yom jisi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ wɑngɑrɑ kulu kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ n nɑ mei.
Jinɑ himɑ no ɑ̀ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ gɑɑ tɑɑli. À mɑ ci wɛndɛ fɔ kpɛ. À kɑɑ yom mɑ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom, koo yom kɑ bɔrɔ si ǹ beri ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ wɑlɑ ndɑ hungu sendi.

Cendikɔ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ si yɑnce zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑndɑbɔrɔ noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gbei tɑlifi. À mɑ si ci fɑɑrekpɛ wɑlɑ binekpɛ. À mɑ si ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm no dufɛ sɛ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine futu wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go liibɑ ziibɔ ceeci ndɑ himmɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ yo yom kube. À mɑ ci hɛ hinno tɛkɔ yom kpɑɑsi. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm ci bɔrɔ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu. À mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. À mɑ ci bɔm hinikɔ.
À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Sendi nɑɑnekpɛ dii kɑ boori kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ hini kɑ beerem no himmɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno, ɑ̀ mɑ hini gɑɑbɑkpɛ yom mo.
Bɔrɔ boobo goono, hɑli yɑ mo nge yom kɑ ǹ goono bɑngudɑmyom fɔndɔ kunɑ, kɑ ǹ ci hunguɛkpɛ yom. Meekpɛ yom no, ǹ go sendi boobo cii kɑ ǹ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Ǹ ci zɑmbɑkpɛ yom mo no.
Beerem nge yom di n mɑ ǹ mee yom dɑɑbu zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ fuu sukutum yom zeeri. Ǹ go cooɑndi hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ bɔm domi ǹ mɑ du liibɑ ziibɔ sɛ.
Kɛlɛtu beerem kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ǹ ŋmɔne wɑli cii: Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔrɔ yom tɑngɑrikom yom no sɑɑ kulu. Ǹ goono no zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm lɑlɔ yom. Yofuno ŋmɑɑri bɑɑkɔ yom no.
Sɛdɑ wɔ cimi nɑ. À sɛ no, n mɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm ifutu futu hɑli ǹ mɑ du gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ.
N mɑ si hɑngɑ dɑm Yuifu yom jendi yom sɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm meire yom sɛ kɑ ǹ hunu beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ cimi sɛ.
Cimi nɑ, hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom dɔ hɛ kulu hinne no. Ammɑ ziibɑntɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne dɔ, hɛ fɔ kulu si ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. Ǹ fɑhɑm ndɑ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi ǹ kulu iziibɔ yom no.
Ǹ go cii ngei go kɑ Ikpɛ bei ɑmmɑ ǹ gbei yom gɑɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ze. Fɛntɛkpɛ yom no, hunguɛkpɛ yom mo no. Ǹ si hini kɑ gbei hinno fɔ kulu tɛ.
Ammɑ ni wɔ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sɑbɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno, n mɑ sendi ǹ bɔm.
N mɑ cii hɑizeenu yom sɛ ǹ mɑ hini ngei bɔm. Ǹ mɑ nge bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Ǹ mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci gɑɑbikoni yom nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ suuru kunɑ.
Yɑ no n mɑ cii weizeenu yom sɛ ǹ mɑ bɑrɑ yɑ di ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ǹ ci Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom. Ǹ mɑ si tɛ kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ si ngei bɔm no dufɛ sɛ. Ǹ mo cɛbɛ tɛ hɛ hinno yom bɔm.
Ǹ mɑ sɑtɑrɑ yom cɛbɛ ǹ mɑ bɑɑ ngei kunye yom. Ǹ mɑ bɑɑ ngei koo yom mo.
Ǹ mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci hinnɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngei fuu yom. Ǹ mɑ ci bɔrɔ hinno yom. Ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ngei kunye yom sɛ domi bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si Ikpɛ Sendɑ sendi yɑmu.
Yɑ no, n mɑ hɑiwɑsu yom mo no himmɑ ǹ mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom.
Ni mo, n bumbum n mɑ n bɔm tɛ gbei hinno tɛkɔ deedɑndi hɛ kulu kunɑ. N mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cooɑndi cɑu cɑu cimi kunɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli.
N mɑ sendi hinno yom cii, sendi yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli domi hɑwi mɑ gurujekɑri dii. À mɑ si du hɛ fɔ lɑlɔ kulu kɑ cii n gɑɑ.
N mɑ tɑm yom mo no himmɑ ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ngei kpe yom sɛ. Ǹ mɑ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ si ǹ kɑkɔ.
Ǹ mɑ si ǹ zee mɑ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ cɛbɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ngei yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ hinno yom no. À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ gɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Ikpɛ bɔm cɛbɛ di booriɑndi hɛ kulu kunɑ.
Ikpɛ gomini kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ fɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ.
Gomini ngɑ di go kɑ i cɛbɛ i mɑ fee ndɑ Ikpɛ hunguɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu. I mɑ hunɑ mo ndɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kunɑ.
Gomini di go kɑ i cɛbɛ mɑ i mɑ gɔrɔ yɑ di kɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ deizɑkpɛ bɑtu kɑ ɑ̀ ci i bɛɛjɛ bɑrikɑkpɛ. Kɑɑyomtɛrɛ deizɑkpɛ wɔ yɑ ci Ikpɛ bɛɛrɛkpɛ, i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne kɑ i go bɑtu.
À nɑ ngɑ bɔm no kɑ bu i sɑbu sɛ, zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ i fɑnsɑ hɛ lɑlɔ kulu gɑɑ. À mɑ i hinnɑndi mo kɑ i tɛ ngɑ ŋmɔne jɑmɑ, i mɑ ci himmɑntɛ yom gbei hinno yom sɛ.
N mɑ sendi hɛ nge yom di bɔm. N mɑ himmɑ nɑ. N mɑ kɔnkɔm ndɑ hini kulu. N mɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ dondɑ ni.
N mɑ ǹ hɔngɑndi mɑ ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ meirekpɛ yom sɛ ndɑ hinikpɛ yom sɛ. Ǹ mɑ n sendi gɑnɑ. Ǹ mo goono sɔlɑntɛ gbei hinno kulu tɛyom sɛ.
Ǹ mɑ si bɔrɔ ciine. Ǹ mɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom kɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kulu cɛbɛ beerem sɛ.

Yɑ no i yom mo, sɑɑ di i gɔrɔ sɑmu yom ndɑ hunguɛkpɛ yom. I ci zɑmbɑntɛ yom. I ci bineibɑɑi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom dimi kulu tɑm yom. I gɔrɔ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ molɑgɑ. I ci mo bine hunguɛkpɛ yom kɑ hungu cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ, ɑ̀ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ iburɑdɑm kulu sɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ.
À nɑ i fɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cɛyom susu gbei kɑ i tɛ sɑbu sɛ bo. Suuji kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ i sɛ bɔm no ɑ̀ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ hɛiyom teji kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i nyume dɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i tejɑndi dɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumɑndi i bɔm ndɑ bɑyom i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ ci tubuize yom hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɛɛjɛ bɔm zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɑndi susu ɑ̀ gomini gɑɑ.
Sendi ngɑ di yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no. A go bɑɑ n mɑ tɑkɑkɑ hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ ǹ mɑ moo dɑm gbei hinno yom gɑɑ. Hɛ nge yom di boori. Ǹ gundɑ hɑnfɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
Ammɑ n mɑ fee ndɑ sɑmutɛrɛ hãyom, ndɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom ndɑ zoji ndɑ kɑkɔ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ zɑmɑ ǹ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Kɔnu yom mɑ nɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ feefee dɑm mɑrgɑ kunɑ n mɑ ɑkpɛ moorɑndi n gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑbɑɑru ce fɔ fɔ hɑli ce hinkɑ de ɑ̀ hungu.
N mɑ bei kɑ iburɑdɑm yɑ di dimi, bɔrɔ siirɑntɛ no. Dulum no ɑ̀ go tɛ ko kɑ ngɑ bɔm ciiti kɑ zeeri.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ Alitemɑ wɑlɑ Ticiku dɔntɔm n dɔ, n mɑ wetere kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ Nikɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ. Kpɑɑrɑ di no yɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ yɑ yeeni tɛ.
N mɑ lɑɑkɑli tɛ Zenɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ciitikɔ sɛ ndɑ Apolo sɛ kɑ ǹ kɑmbɑzɑ ǹ diro di kunɑ, hɛ fɔ mɑ si du kɑ ǹ gɑziɑ sɛ.
Nɑm i ŋmɔne jɑmɑ mɑ dendeni kɑ moo dɑm gbei hinno yom gɑɑ gudumuɑ sɛ domi ǹ gɔrɛ mɑ si ci kɔnu.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ bɑndɑ go kɑ n fɔɔ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ i yom nɑɑne kunɑ, n mɑ ǹ fɔɔ. Gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ kɑsuize no Mɛsiyɑ Yesu sɛ. Hɛɛ ndɑ i nyɑize Timote go kɑ n fɔɔ Filimɔ, ni i binebɑɑkɔ, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ gbei kunɑ.
I go Afiɑ i binebɑɑkɔ fɔɔ mo ndɑ Alicipu, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ tɑngɑmi kunɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go meigu n hundi kunɑ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu n sɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ n sɛ.
A mɑɑ n bɑɑru kɑ simbɑ n nɑɑne kɑ n gundɑ Kpe Yesu kunɑ ndɑ n bɑɑkɑsine mo kɑ n go cɛbɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ.
A go kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ n huroyom nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ i yom, ɑ̀ mɑ tɔntɔnu hɑli n mɑ fɑhɑm sã sã ndɑ ihinno kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
A nyɑize, i gundɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom mo n bɑɑkɑsine sɑbu sɛ zɑ kɑ n nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom bine yom yeenɑndi.
À sɛ no, ɑ̀ gundɑ yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ sendi n sɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ kɑ n dɑm hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ bɑɑkɑsine sɑbu sɛ zɑ kɑ hɛɛ Pɔlu ɑ goono hɑizeenɔ, mɑɑsɑ mo kɑsuize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
A gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ Onezim sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ ize Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono kɑsu kunɑ.
Dom ɑ̀ sindɑ nɑfɑ n sɛ ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ n sɛ ndɑ ɑ sɛ mo.
A go kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm n dɔ mɑɑsɑ. N mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ gɑɑ jɛrɛ fɔ.
Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ bine go bɑɑ nɑ yɑ ɑ̀ jɛ ɑ dɔ. A go bɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ n gurubi zɑ kɑ ɑ goono kɑsu kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ yɑ sɑwɑrɑ n gɑɑ. Hɛ hinno kɑ n go tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si ci zɑngɑ tilɑsi gɑndɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci ndɑ wom binebɑɑ.
Hɑnibɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑndi n dɔ bɑndɑ fɔ domi n mɑ ye kɑ du ɑ̀, beeniyom si sɑbu sɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ tɑm kpɛɛnɛ no n mɑ du ɑ̀. À bisɑ tɑm zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci nyɑize Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ɑ nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ ɑmmɑ hɑli yɑ mo n sɛ, n tɑm ndɑ n nyɑize mo Kpe kunɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, de n go kɑ ɑ dii zɑngɑ n bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ zɑngɑ hɛɛ bumbum no.
Ammɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ n zɑmbɑ hɛ fɔ kunɑ wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ n go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑihã goono ɑ̀ dɔ, n mɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ɑ bɔm.
Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ go wɔne hɑntum ndɑ ɑ bumbum kɑmbɛ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ. A si n hɔngɑndi ni mo, ɑ go kɑ n gɑihã n bumbum hundi.
Oò, nyɑize, n mɑ ngɑ di tu ɑ sɛ Kpe kunɑ. N mɑ ɑ bine yeenɑndi Kpe kunɑ.
Nɑɑne kɑ ɑ gundɑ n gɑɑ sɑbu sɛ no ɑ go wɔne hɑntum n sɛ. A go bei mo kɑ n kɑɑ tɛ kɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mo, n mɑ zumbuyom dɔ hinsɑ ɑ sɛ domi ɑ gundɑ bɛɛjɛ kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ fɔndɔ feeri ɑ sɛ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
Epɑfɑru kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑsu kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu sɑbu sɛ gɑ kɑ n fɔ.
Mɑɑku mɑ ndɑ Alisitɑku ndɑ Demɑ ndɑ Lukɑ, ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ, ǹ kulu gɑ kɑ n fɔɔ.
I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ wom biyɑ. Ami.
Zɑ dɑm dɑm Ikpɛ sendi i cɛɛ yom sɛ. À sendi ǹ sɛ ce boobo ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni ɑndebi yom dɔ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ jiribi yom wɔ kunɑ, Ikpɛ sendi i sɛ ngɑ Ize dɔ. Ngɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɛ kulu tubukɔ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ mo ɑ̀ no zɑmɑni yom kulu tɛ.

Ize di yɑ ci Ikpɛ deizɑ kɑɑri ndɑ Ikpɛ tɑkɑri cɑu cɑu. À go hɛ kulu jɛrɛ mo ngɑ sendi dɑbɑrikpɛ gɑɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i hinnɑndi i dulum yom gɑɑ ngɑ bumbum dɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ Ikpɛ Bɛɛrɛkpɛ beeri kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
À bɛɛrɛ bisɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom bɛɛrɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ mɑɑ tubu kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kunɑ, wɔ fɔ sɛ nɑ bɑ cɛ fɔ Ikpɛ nɑ wɔne cii? "Ni, n cii ɑ ize. Hunkunɑ no ɑ nɑ n hɛi." Wɔ fɔ sɛ mo no ɑ̀ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ngɑ mɑ yɑ ci Ize ɑ sɛ."
À bɑndɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Ize sintine dɑm hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kulu mɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi."
Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom mo ɑ̀ cii: "À go kɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom tɛ biyɑ yom. À go kɑ ngɑ gbeiteeri yom mɑ tɛ nini bɛllɛ."
Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii ngɑ Ize bɔm: "E Ikpɛ, n kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom pɑi. N kpetɛrɛ goobu yɑ goobu cɛɑntɛ susu no.
N bɑɑ cɛyom susu. N bine hungu mo Ikpɛ fɔndɔ hunguyom. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ n suubɑ kɑ bisɑ n bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom. À nɑ jii tusu n bɔm ndɑ jii kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ fɑihã beeri."
À cii mo: "E Kpe, sintine gɑɑ n nɑ gɑndɑ sinji. Bɛɛnɛ yom mo n kɑmbɛ gbei no.
Ǹ kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ ni wɔ, n bo goono beeniyom si. Bɛɛnɛ yom kulu kɑɑ zeeni zɑngɑ jiine yom cine.
Ǹ gɑ ǹ kunkuni zɑngɑ zɑrɑ cine. Ǹ gɑ ǹ bɛrɛ. Ammɑ ni wɔ, n bɑ goono. N si bɛrɛ. N jiiri yom sindɑ beeniyom."
Ammɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kunɑ, wɔ fɔ sɛ nɑ bɑ cɛ fɔ Ikpɛ nɑ wɔne cii? "N mo gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee dɛcɛyom dɔ."
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kulu yɑ biyɑ yom no. Gbeiteeri yom mo no kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ǹ sɑmbɑ ko gbei tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ bɑ fɑɑbɑ tubu. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
À sɛ nɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ lɑɑkɑli dɑm kɑ tɔntɔnu hɛ yom kɑ i mɑɑ gɑɑ. I mɑ lɑɑkɑli dɑm zɑmɑ i mɑ si du kɑ moorei.
Zɑ kɑ sendi kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom cii ǹ tɑbɑi, fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom mɑ ndɑ zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ kulu du bɑnɑndiyom kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ i tɛ kɑ kɔmɑ de i gɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ fɑɑbɑ beeri wɔ gɑɑ? Fɑɑbɑ wɔ Kpe sinti kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru cii. Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom mo, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi i sɛ.
Ikpɛ mɑ sɛdɑ ndei ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. À mo sɛdɑ ndei mo ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ go fɑrisi Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bɔm.
Hɑndunyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ, hɑndunyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm i go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom meire cire.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ sɛdɑ wɔne cii: "Ifɔ yɑ ci iburɑdɑm kɑ n go hɔngɔ ndɑɑ̀ wɑlɑ ifɔ yɑ ci ɑdɑmize kɑ n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑɑ̀?
N nɑ ɑ̀ zobu lɔkɑci bɑndɑ fɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom gɑɑ icɛnɑ. N nɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ dɑm ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ zɑngɑ fulɑ tukunsi. N nɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ n kɑmbɛ gbei yom bɔm.
N nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee yom cire." Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee cire, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ cindi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ i si di hɛ kulu goono ɑ̀ cee cire jinɑ.

Ammɑ i go di Yesu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ dɑm ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ ɑ̀ bu guruguze bɔm sɑbu sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu zobu bɑndɑ fɔ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom gɑɑ icɛnɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bu tɑbɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu gurubi kunɑ.
Hɛ kulu goono ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ. À dɔ nɑ mo hɛ kulu bɑrɑ. À sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kpeindɑ ize boobo ngɑ deizɑ dɔ, Ikpɛ mɑ Yesu, ǹ fɑɑbɑ jinɑ bɔrɔ tɔɑndi guruguze dɔ.
Yɑ nɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi ndɑ beerem kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi, ǹ kulu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ nɑ ǹ hunu. À sɛ nɑ, hɑwi mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ cɛɛ ngɑ nyɑize yom.
À cii: "A gɑ n mɑɑ fɛɛ ɑ nyɑizei sɛ. A gɑ n sifɑ kɑ betu mɑrgɑ gɑme."
À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "A go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ." À ye kɑ cii: "Gunɑ, hɛɛ ndɑ ize yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ no neyɑ."
À sɛ no, zɑ kɑ ize yom gundɑ bɑ kuri ndɑ gɑɑbɑsi kunɑ, ngɑ bumbum mo meigu ndei nge yom di gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ bu dɔ ɑ̀ mɑ Ibilisi kɑ ɑ̀ ci bu dɑbɑrikpɛ tɛ kɔnu.
Beerem mo kɑ bu hɑmbure sɛ ǹ nɑ ngei hundi wɑtɛ tɛ tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ fɑnsɑ mo.
Siikɑ si ɑ̀ nɑ ci Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɛ no ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ gɑɑkɑsine ɑmmɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ sɛ no, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ gɑɑkɑsine.

Ngɑ di sɛ no, ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ gundɑ ngɑ nyɑize yom tɑkɑi hɛ kulu kunɑ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ beeri, suujikpɛ ndɑ nɑɑnekpɛ mo Ikpɛ gbei kunɑ. À mɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndiyom gɑrɑndi hɛ beerem dulum yom ŋmɔne sɛ mo.
Zɑ kɑ ngɑ bumbum guruguze ndɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sui, ɑ̀ hini kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono suiyom kunɑ gɑɑkɑsine.
Nyɑize hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ wom mɑ du bɑ bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne cɛɛ yom kunɑ. À sɛ no, wɑ moo sinji Diyɑ ndɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri gɑɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu wɔ kɑ i go ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yom.
Ngɑ yɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi sɛ, zɑngɑ Moisi tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ jɑmɑ kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ.
Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu lɑsɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Moisi. À bisɑ Moisi zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fuu cini gundɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ bisɑ fuu bumbum.
Fuu kulu bɔrɔ fɔ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cini. Ammɑ hɛ kulu cinikɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
Moisi bine tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ Ikpɛ jɑmɑ kulu kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri. À tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ cii sɛ.
Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Ize kɑ ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ fuuɑ bɔm. I yom bine yɑ ci Ikpɛ fuuɑ, de i gɑ kɑ i nɑɑne ndɑ i bɛɛjɛ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
À sɛ no, zɑngɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ cii: "Hunkunɑ de wom go mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde,
wɑ si bɑ wom bine yom sendɑndi. Wɑ si ǹ sendɑndi zɑngɑ ǹ hungu Ikpɛ hɑnu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ sui gɑnji kunɑ.
Nungu kɑ wom cɛɛ yom nɑ ɑ sui kɑ ɑ bubure, ǹ di ɑ gbei yom hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci.
À sɛ no, ɑ bine tɔ zɑmɑni wɔne sɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ cii, sɑɑ kulu ǹ bine yom go dɛrɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ fɔndɔ yom bei mo.
Binetɔnɛ kunɑ bine ɑ̀ nɑ ze wɔne tɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ si huro ɑ hulonzom kunɑ."
Nyɑizei, wɑ lɑɑkɑli wom bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si gundɑ bine lɑlɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne hɑli wom gɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ sɛ.
Ammɑ wom mo cɛrɛ no himmɑ mɑ bɑ yom kulu kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hunkunɑ. À mɑ si tɛ wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ nɑm dulum mɑ ngɑ fɑfɑgu kɑ ngɑ bine sendɑndi zɑngɑ tiinɑ.
I gundɑ bɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no, de i go kɑ i nɑɑne kɑ i gundɑ zɑ sintine jɛ kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hunkunɑ de wom mɑɑ Ikpɛ jinde, wɑ si wom bine sendɑndi zɑngɑ ǹ tɛ hɑnu kɑ ǹ hungu Ikpɛ".
Mee yom yɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde kɑ ǹ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ? Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ hunu Moisi bɑndɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu di kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Mee yom sɛ no Ikpɛ bine tɔ hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci? Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ kɑ ǹ bukɔei dɑɑru gɑnji kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Mee yom gɑɑ no Ikpɛ ze kɑ cii ǹ si hurɑ ɑ̀ hulɑnzom kunɑ? Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ.
I bine di mo kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ huro hulonzom kunɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne.
Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli goono i sɛ hɑli hɔ̃ i mɑ du kɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ hulɑnzom kunɑ. À sɛ no i mɑ hɑmburu ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ wom bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ lɑsɑbu wom gɑziɑ wɑlɑ wom kɑɑ kɔkɔrɔ.
Cimi no ǹ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ wɑɑzu tɛ i sɛ zɑngɑ ǹ tɛ dɑm beerem sɛ. Ammɑ sendɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ mɑnɑ nɑfɑ fɔ kulu tɛ ǹ sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne gɑru ǹ gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ mɑɑ.

Ammɑ i yom kɑ i go nɑɑne, i go huro hulonzom di kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii: "A bine yɑ tɔ. A nɑ ze wɔne tɛ kɑ cii beerem wɔ si huro hulonzom kunɑ." Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di cii nɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gbei kube zɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑndunyɑ sinji.
Nungu fɔ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɔne cii jiribi iyɑntɛ wɔ bɔm: "Ikpɛ hulɑnzom ndɑ ngɑ gbei yom kulu jiribi iyɑntɛ hine".
À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Ǹ si hurɑ ɑ̀ hulonzom kunɑ".
Tɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ǹ jinɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ, ǹ mɑnɑ huro hulonzom kunɑ ǹ hungu kɑ gɑnɑ sɑbu sɛ. Bine, bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ cindi ǹ mɑ du kɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
À sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ mo nɑ hɑnu fɔ jisi kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hunkunɑ. Lɔkɑci boobo bɑndɑ ɑ̀ sendi Dɑfidi dɔ kɑ cii: "Hunkunɑ, de wom mɑɑ ɑ jinde, wɑ si wom bine yom sendɑndi."
De Yɑsuɑ nɑ ǹ no hulonzom, dom Ikpɛ si hɑnu fɔ kpɛɛnɛ sendi tɛ ngɑ di bɑndɑ.
À sɛ nɑ, hulonzom lɔkɑci cindi Ikpɛ jɑmɑ sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ huro Ikpɛ hulonzom kunɑ, ɑkpɛ hulonzom ndɑ ngɑ gbei yom zɑngɑ Ikpɛ hulonzom ndɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom.
Ngɑ di sɛ, i mɑ himmɑ tɛ kɑ huro ɑ̀ hulonzom kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si kɑm zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ deedɑndi di bɔm.

Ikpɛ Sendi yɑ hundikoni no, dɑbɑrikpɛ mo no. À mee kɑɑni kɑ bisɑ tɑkubɑ. Zɑngɑ tɑkubɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ gooru kɑ dumbu, Ikpɛ Sendi gooru kɑ tɔ bine dɔ ndɑ biyɑ dɔ ndɑ dɔbu yom dɔ ndɑ lonti yom dɔ. À go bɔrɔ lɑsɑbu yom ndɑ bine miilɑ yom gunɑ kɑ fɑyɑnkɑ.
Tɑkɑhɛ bɑ ɑfɔ si tugɑntɛ Ikpɛ jine, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Tɛrɛkpɑrɛ nɑ ǹ kulu goono. À moo goono ǹ kulu gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ tilɑsi i mɑ i tɛgbei deede.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, i gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ huro bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu, Ikpɛ Ize. Ngɑ di sɛ i mo i sɛdɑ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi.
I gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ sisibi i sɛ ndɑ i hinɑbunutɛrɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sui mo hɛ kulu gɑɑ zɑngɑ i yom, ɑmmɑ ngɑ wɔ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ i mɑ mɑɑni kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ dɔ, nungu kɑ gomini goono ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. I mɑ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ zɑmɑ i mɑ du suuji ndɑ gomini kɑ ǹ mɑ i gɑɑ lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ hegu.
Ikpɛ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri kulu suubɑ iburɑdɑm yom kunɑ. Iburɑdɑm yom sɛ mo no Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngɑ gbei kunɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ sɑrɑɑ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom cɛbɛ dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
À hini kɑ suuru ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ bei ndɑ beerem kɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ dɛrɛ zɑ kɑ ngɑ bumbum gundɑ londibunɔ kɑmbu kulu gɑɑ.
Hinɑbunutɛrɛ di sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ngɑ bumbum dulum yom sɑbu sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ jɑmɑ mo dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bɛɛrɛ wɔ zɑɑ ngɑ bɔm sɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Aɑrɔ mɑ cɛɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ bine mɑnɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ bɔm sɛ kɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri. Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "Ni yɑ ɑ Ize no. Zɑ hunkunɑ hɛɛ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ n sɛ."
À cii mo Somu yom tirɑ kunɑ: "Ni, n bɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ, beeniyom si, zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine."

Yesu wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm ɑ̀ nɑ ɑduwɑ yom tɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom. À nɑ ɑduwɑ yom tɛ ndɑ jinde beeri ndɑ mundi Ikpɛ gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ bu kɑmbɛ. Ikpɛ bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ gɑnɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
Bɑ kɑ hɑɑli dɔ ngɑ yɑ ci Ize, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ nɑ gɑnɑyom dendeni tɑɑbi yom kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm gɑɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔɑndi tɑɑbi kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ tɛ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ sɛ fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni Kpe.
Ikpɛ fɛɛ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri no zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine.
I gundɑ ciiyom boobo ngei di bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ feeriji gɑɑbu zɑmɑ wom tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ tɑru kɑ mɑɑ.

Wom himɑ wom mɑ tɛ cɛbɛkɔ yom, zɑmɑ zɑ jɛyom wom go du cooɑndiyom. Ammɑ hɑli hɔ̃ wom go bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ wom cooɑndi kpɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ meecine kulu hɛ sintine yom bɔm. Wom ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ woo, ɑ̀ nɑ ci ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ.
Bɔrɔ kulu bine kɑ woo no ɑ̀ go hɑm, izecire no. À sindɑ beire kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bɑɑru cɛɑntɛ susu.
Ammɑ ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ beerem kɑ ǹ tɔ bɔrɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no. Nge yom di tɛyom gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ nge lɑɑkɑli yom dɔnɑndi ihinno ndɑ ilɑlɔ beiyom kɑ kɑɑ cɛrɛ.
À sɛ nɑ i mɑ Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ sendi sintine yom nɑm ko kpei jinɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ gɑɑ. I mɑ si ye kɑ sendi kɑɑji sinji kpɛɛnɛ, wɑtom i mɑ si gbei bukɔ ŋmɔne tuubiyom kpɛsɛ furu iteji ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑɑ nɑɑneyom.
I mɑ si ye kɑ kɑɑji sinji kpɛɛnɛ mɑ wɑtom cɛbɛ nyunu nyunu ŋmɔne bɔm ndɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛyom bɔm gbei sɛ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom bɔm ndɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɔm.
I gɑ ngɑ di tɛ, de Ikpɛ tu.
Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ sɛ? Ǹ du kɑɑri ce fɔ. Ǹ nɑ bɛɛnɛ gomini tɑbɑɑ. Ǹ du bɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hinno tɑbɑɑ. Ǹ di zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ dɑbɑri yom mo.
Cɔfɔ de ǹ nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ ye kɑ bɛrɛ kpɛɛnɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi. Beerem nge yom di go kɑ Ikpɛ Ize kɑnji kpɛɛnɛ ko kɑ ɑ̀ hɑwɑndi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ gɑndɑ nɑ hɑri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑm ɑ̀ bɔm hɑm ɑliwɑti kɑ kɑɑ ɑliwɑti, dumɑiize zei. À kɑɑndɑ nɑfɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ fɑri. Gɑndɑ mo goono Ikpɛ bɑrikɑ kunɑ.
Ammɑ de ɑ̀ go kɑriji ndɑ kɑriji nyɑ yom zei, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ furu. Lɑɑliyom bɑ tɔ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Kɔkɔikɔkɔi nini no, ǹ kɑɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
Ammɑ i binebɑɑkɔ yom, bɑ kɑ i go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, i go wom tɑbɑtɑndi no. I bei kɑ wom goono fɔndɔ hinno bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne.
Ikpɛ cɛsusu no, kɑ ɑ̀ si dinigɑ gbei kɑ wom tɛ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine gbei kɑ wom cɛbɛ ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gɑɑkɑsine. Wom go kɑ ǹ gɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ hɑli hɔ̃.
I gɑ bɑɑ mo wom bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ himmɑ fɔlɔnku di cɛbɛ zɑmɑ wom nɑɑne mɑ gɔrɔ bɛɛjɛ tɔnɑntɛ kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
I si bɑɑ wom mɑ yofune. Wom mɑ beerem dendeni, beerem kɑ ǹ nɑɑne ndɑ ǹ suuru kuku gɑɑ ǹ go ɑlikɑwɑli yom tubu.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ze ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ ngɑ, ɑ̀ ze ndɑ ngɑ bɔm.
A cii: "Dɑhiri no, ɑ kɑɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm n gɑɑ. A kɑɑ nɑm n bɑndɑ mo mɑ bɑ."
Zɑngɑ yɑ, kɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑtu ndɑ suuru kuku ɑ̀ du hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑlɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ di.
Iburɑdɑm yom cini ze ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ ngei. Ze wɔ bine tɑbɑtɑndiyom no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑkɔ kulu wi iburɑdɑm yom gɑme.
À sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ guuri dɑm ngɑ mɑ ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli cɛbɛ tubukɔ yom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ ngɑ sɑwɑri si tunu. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ndɑ zeyom.

Hɛ hinkɑ goono kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɛrɛyom kɑ ǹ kunɑ Ikpɛ si hini kɑ tɑngɑri. Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ i yom kɑ i gundɑ tuguyom dɔ fɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ, hɛ hinkɑ di gɑ kɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. I mɑ doyom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ jini kɑ jisi i sɛ bɛɛjɛ dii ndɑ gɑɑbi.
Bɛɛjɛ wɔ i gundɑ nɑ zɑngɑ hundi sɛ jɛyom hɛ. Sinjɑntɛ nɑ. À gundɑ gɑɑbi mɑ. À nɑm i mɑ hurɑ nungu kɑ Ikpɛ goono, wɑtom lɑbude jine.
Nungu di no Yesu huro i sɛ jine kɑ fɔndɔ feeri i sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ ci Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri, beeniyom si zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine.

Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ wɔ, Sɑlim wɑngɑrɑ kpe nɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ Ikpɛ sɛ, Ikpɛ bɛɛrɛkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu. Sɑɑ kɑ Abulɛmɑ gɑ kɑɑ zɑ kpe yom wɑngu kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ dɔ, Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube. À nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ.
Cɔfɔ Abulɛmɑ nɑ ɑ̀ no zɑkɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ du wɑngu di dɔ. Sintine jinɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci cɛsusukpɛ. Sɑlim wɑngɑrɑ kpe no, lɑɑkɑli kɑnekpɛ noyɑ.
Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ sindɑ bɑɑbɑ. À sindɑ nyɑ. À sindɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom. À sindɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ sinti, ɑ̀ hundi sindɑ mee. À himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Ize. Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ wɔ gɔrɔ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ gɔrɛ, beeniyom si.
Gunɑ, bɔrɔ kpɛ bɛɛrɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Abulɛmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɛ zeenu nɑ zɑkɑ kɑɑ hɛ yom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑngu ŋmɑɑ.
Lefi bɑndɑ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ du fɔndɔ kɑ zɑkɑ tɑ beerem gɑɑ Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ beerem dɔ kɑ ci ǹ nyɑize yom, bɑ kɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no.
Ammɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Lefi bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ zɑkɑ tɑ Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ. À nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm bɔrɔ di gɑɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom tɛ.
Kɑkɔ si, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci icɛnɑ du bɑrikɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri ndɑ, ɑ̀ dɔ.
Nee wɔ beerem kɑ ǹ bu go zɑkɑ yom tɑ iburɑdɑm yom gɑɑ. Ammɑ yɔngɔ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ zɑkɑ tɑ, Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑkpɛ go hunɑ.
Ǹ hini kɑ cii mo Lefi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ zɑkɑ tɑ, ngɑ bumbum nɑ zɑkɑ no mo sɑɑ kɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ ɑ̀ no.
Sɑɑ kɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ kube, ǹ mɑnɑ Lefi hɛi jinɑ. À goono ngɑ cɛɛ cɛntɛ cire.

Moisi fɔndɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ jɑmɑ no, Lefi gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ bɔm no ɑ̀ goono. Ngɑ di sɛ, de tɔɑndiyom goono Lefi gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ si himɑ ǹ mɑ gɑrɑndikɔ ŋmɑni fɔ dɑm zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ cine kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Aɑrɔ cine.
Zɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ bɛrɛ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ fɔndɑ mo bɛrɛ.
Kɑ simbɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ go hɛ yom wɔ cii, dimi ŋmɑni fɔ bɔrɔ no. Dimi wɔ kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ hini kɑ mɑɑni gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ kɑ gbei tɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu go bei kɑ Yudɑ gɑɑ no i Kpe hunu. Yudɑ dimi wɔ bɔm Moisi mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ.
Hɛ kɑ i go bei cɑu cɑu kɑ tɔntɔnu neyɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ tunu, ɑ̀ himɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ cine.
Ngɑ wɔ, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom meire goono ndɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ beeni dɑbɑri bɔm.
Ikpɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: "Ni, n bo ci gɑrɑndikɔ, beeniyom si, zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine".
Zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ dom fɔndɑ yeti kɑmbu ɑ̀ hinɑbunutɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ tɛ sɑbu sɛ.
Fɔndɑ mɑnɑ kɑɑndɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku tɔyom dɔ. Ikpɛ kɑɑndɑ bɛɛjɛ hinno, bɛɛjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑm i go mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ ndɑ zeyom.

Lefi bɑndɑ yom mo mɑnɑ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ yom zeyom bɔm. Ammɑ Yesu ci gɑrɑndikɔ Ikpɛ zeyom bɔm. Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "Kpe ze, ɑ̀ bine si tunɑndi pɑi. Ni, n bɑ ci Gɑrɑndikɔ sɑɑ kulu, beeniyom si, zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine."
Zeyom di bɔm no Yesu ci zɑngɑ tɔlimɛ ɑlikɑwɑli teji sɛ, ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ izeenɑ.
Lefi dimi gɑrɑndikɔ yom di bine bɑ bututu, zɑmɑ bu nɑ ǹ gɑnji.
Ammɑ Yesu wɔ, zɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bo goono beeniyom si sɛ, ɑ̀ gundɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si ye bɔrɔ ŋmɑni fɔ dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ mo no, ɑ̀ hini kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ ngɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ hini kɑ ǹ no fɑɑbɑ tɔnɑntɛ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ ko huro ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ dɔ.
À sɑbɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i mɑ du gɑrɑndikɔ beeri fɔ zɑngɑ ngɑ, hɑlɑɑlɑ, bɑɑnikom, ziibi si. Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu dulumkoni yom kunɑ kɑ kpeindɑ hɑli bɛɛnɛ sɑmɑu.

À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri ŋmɑni yom. À mɑnɑ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ hɑnu kulu, sintine ngɑ bumbum dulum yom sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ beerem ŋmɔne yom sɑbu sɛ. Yesu wɔ nɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ cefɔ pɑp kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ gɑrɑndi hɛ.
Moisi fɔndɑ go gɑrɑndikɔ beeri yom dɑm, beerem kɑ ǹ si hini ngei bɔm. Ammɑ Ikpɛ zeyom bɔm Moisi fɔndɑ bɑndɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize kɑ ɑ̀ ci tɔɑntɛ beeniyom si dɑm Gɑrɑndikɔ.
Sendi kɑ i go cii wɔ kɑɑji neyɑ. I gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri wɔne dimi. À gɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ Bɛɛrɛkpɛ kɑrigɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
Ngɑ yɑ go gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ gbei tɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci kuuru bukɑ, cimi ŋmɔne. Bukɑ di Kpe bumbum yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ sinji, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm.
Ikpɛ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri kulu dɑm nɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sɑrɑɑ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom cɛbɛ Ikpɛ sɛ. Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ̀ tilɑsi i gɑrɑndikɔ beeri mɑ mɑ gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ cɛbɛ.
Bɑ de ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ si tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ zɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ cini sɑrɑɑ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm.

Gbei kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ nge yom di tɛ yɑ bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom himɑi yom ndɑ ǹ biyɑ yom no. Ngɑ yɑ ci zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Moisi cɛbɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kuuru bukɑ tɛ. Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "N mɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑli kɑ deedɑndi wɔ gɑnɑ kɑ ɑ cɛbɛ n sɛ tɑndi kuku bɔm".

Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gbei fɔ dɛcɛ Yesu sɛ. Gbei di boori kɑ bisɑ ǹ ŋmɔne di zɑ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndikɔ ɑlikɑwɑli sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ izeenɔ. Alikɑwɑlɑ wɔ nɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑlikɑwɑli yom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ izeenɔ yom.
