De sintine ɑlikɑwɑli sindɑ tɑɑli, dɑm ǹ si ceeci ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ ndɑ hinkɑntɛ.
Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ di tɑɑli ǹ dɔ ɑ̀ cii: "Hɛɛ Kpe, ɑ gɑ cii, Gunɑ, hɑnu yom go kɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑ ɑ gɑ ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ ndɑ Yudɑ dimi.
À nɑ ci zɑngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ hɔ ndɑ ǹ cɛɛ yom, hɑnu kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ yom dii kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu di. Ǹ mɑnɑ himmɑ tɛ ɑ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli di kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo, yɑ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Kpe cii yɑ di.

Alikɑwɑli wɔne, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Isirɑilɑ fuu sɛ hɑnu nge yom di bɑndɑ. A gɑ ɑ fɔndɔ yom dɑm ǹ lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ. A gɑ ǹ jeeri mo ǹ bine yom gɑɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ. Ngei mo kɑɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ. Yɑ no Kpe cii.
Bɔrɔ si ko ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine wɑlɑ ngɑ dimi cɛbɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ Kpe bei. Ǹ si cii yɑ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu yɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ bei, zɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ kɑlɑ kɑ kpei ǹ kulu ŋmɔne ibeeri.
A kɑɑ suuji cɛbɛ ǹ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu sɛ. A si hɔngɔ ǹ dulum yom ndɑ ǹ ilɑlɔ tɛyom pɑi."
Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑlikɑwɑli teji sendi, yɑ di gɑɑ sintine ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ yeti izeenu. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci dom ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ go zeeni, ɑ̀ mɑɑni beeniyom.
Alikɑwɑli sintine wɔ gundɑ sendikpɑrɛ yom no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gbei yom. À gundɑ nungu hɑlɑɑlɑ mo, hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne dimi.
Ǹ nɑ kuuru bukɑ tɛ. À gundɑ kpɛsɛndi fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Bukɑ di kunɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ fɔ goono ndɑ tɑbulu fɔ ndɑ buuru jisɑntɛ.
Lɑbude hinkɑntɛ bɑndɑ gundɑ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ.

À kunɑ wɑidi tɔnuyom dɔ kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ wurɑ goono ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ɑdɑkɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ wurɑ hɑri munu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Adɑkɑ di kunɑ gundɑ wurɑ kusu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ gundɑ mɑɑnɛ, ŋmɑɑri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À kunɑ Aɑrɔ goobu kɑ ɑ̀ boosu goono ndɑ tondi tɑbulu cɛnɑ cɛnɑ yom kɑ ǹ gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli sendi yom hɑntum.
Adɑkɑ di bɔm bɛɛnɛ gundɑ himɑndi hinkɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize deizɑkpɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ sɑsɑbɑndiyom dɔ sɛ bicire. À nɑ ci lɔkɑci wɔ no i gɑ ɑ̀ fɑsɑli.
To. Zɑ kɑ hɛ yom di goono sɔlɑntɛ, gɑrɑndikɔ yom go huro kuuru bukɑ kpɛsɛndi sintinɑ kunɑ sɑɑ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ gbei tɔnɑndi.

Ammɑ kpɛsɛndi hinkɑntɛ di mo kunɑ, gɑrɑndikɔ beeri ngɑ hinne yɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ce fɔ jiiri kunɑ. Ngɑ mo mɑnɑ hini kɑ hurɑ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kpeindɑ kuri kɑ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ bumbum tɑɑli yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ jɑmɑ tɑɑli yom kɑ ǹ tɛ zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go cɛbɛ ngɑ di gɑɑ kɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ mɑnɑ feeri jinɑ. À mɑnɑ feeri jinɑ zɑ kɑ sintine kuuru bukɑ gbei go hegu.
Kuuru bukɑ yɑ deedɑndi nɑ mɑɑsɑ jinɑ. Wɑtom ɑ̀ go cii noyom ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ, ǹ si hini kɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei yom wɔ tɛ bine kunɑ sendi tɔɑndi.
Kuuru bukɑ gbei goono ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɑm ndɑ nyunu nyunu dimi kulu bɔm ndɑ sendikpɑrɛ yom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm. Ǹ nɑ ǹ jisi kɑlɑ lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ mɑ hɛ kulu hinsɑ.

Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ ci Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri hɛ hinno yom kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑɑ sɛ. À huro kuuru bukɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ bisɑ sintine ŋmɔne. À kube kɑ bisɑɑ̀ mo. Kuuru bukɑ wɔ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ, iburɑdɑm kɑmbɛ yom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. À mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne tɑkɑyom.
Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du i sɛ fɑnsɑyom kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom, ɑ̀ huro Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ce fɔ pɑp. À mɑnɑ huro ndɑ hɑncine kuri wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑuize kuri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ huro ndɑ ɑ̀ bumbum kuri.
Hɑuyeji yom kuri ndɑ hɑncine yom kuri ndɑ hɑuize zɑnu boosu no ǹ go see beerem kɑ ǹ ziibi gɑɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ go kɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi kɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑhɑm hinnɑndi.

De ngɑ di ci cimi, hɑli yɑ mɑ Mɛsiyɑ kuri go wom bine kunɑ sendi hinnɑndi gbei bukɔ yom gɑɑ wom mɑ du kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ sɛ. Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ bɔm sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ, tɑɑli fɔ kulu si. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom dɔ.

À sɛ no, Mɛsiyɑ tɛ sɑsɑbɑndikɔ ɑlikɑwɑli teji ŋmɔne hɑli beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ mɑ du tubu kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À hini kɑ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ bu gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem fɑnsɑ, wɔ kɑ yom nɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrum sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono ɑlikɑwɑli sintine cire.
Nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ tubu ŋmɔne, tilɑsi kɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ di mɑ bu jinɑ.
Tubu tirɑ mɑnɑ tɛ bɛɛrɛ kɑlɑ bu gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛkɔ gɑ hunɑ.
À sɛ nɑ bɑ ɑlikɑwɑli sintine mo ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ sinji kɑlɑ de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ kuri.

Sɑɑ kɑ Moisi nɑ fɔndɑ meire kulu cii jɑmɑ kulu jine, ɑ̀ nɑ hɑuize yom kuri ndɑ hɑncine kuri zɑɑ ndɑ hɑri ndɑ soofu ciire ndɑ tuurinyɑ cɛnɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hisope. À nɑ kuri wɔ seesee tirɑ di bumbum gɑɑ ndɑ jɑmɑ di kulu gɑɑ.
À cii: "Wɔne yɑ ci kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɑ no wom sɛ".
Yɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ kuri di seesee kuuru bukɑ mo gɑɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gbei jiine yom kulu gɑɑ.
Bɔrɔ hini kɑ cii kɑ ǹ go hɛ yom bɑyom hinnɑndi ndɑ kuri Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm. Bine, de kuri mɑnɑ dooru mo, yɑɑfɑ si.
Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ̀ tilɑsi bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom himɑi yom mɑ du hinnɑndiyom zɑngɑ yɑ di. Ammɑ bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom bumbum, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ du ǹ hinnɑndiyom ndɑ gɑrɑndi yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ wɔne yom.
Mɛsiyɑ wɔ mɑnɑ hurɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi ŋmɔne deedɑndi. Bɛɛnɛ bumbum kunɑ nɑ ɑ̀ huro ko cɛ i sɛ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ jine.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ huro mo hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm sɑrɑɑ ce boobo zɑngɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri cini hurɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ kɑ memunu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kuri sɑrɑɑ jiiri kɑ kɑɑ jiiri.
De yɑ di no dom tilɑsi Mɛsiyɑ mɑ tɑɑbi ce boobo zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni beeniyom mee gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ kɑ dulum kɑɑ ce fɔ ɑ̀ bɔm gɑrɑndiyom gɑɑ.
Bine, zɑngɑ ǹ jisi iburɑdɑm yom sɛ, ǹ mɑ bu ce fɔlɔnku, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ciiti mɑ kɑɑ.
Yɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo nɑ ngɑ bɔm no ce fɔ ɑ̀ mɑ bɔrɔ boobo dulum yom jɛrɛ. À kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ ce hinkɑntɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci kɑ dulum kɑɑ ɑmmɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu fɑɑbɑ.
Moisi fɔndɑ gundɑ hɛ hinno yom biyɑ kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑɑ. À sindɑ ǹ tɑbɑiyom deidei. Gɑrɑndi nge yom di kɑ beerem go sɑrɑɑ cɛrɛ bɔm cɛrɛ bɔm jiiri kɑ kɑɑ jiiri, ǹ si hini kɑ ǹ tɔɑndi pɑi.
De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, dom ǹ cɛ ndɑ gɑrɑndi tɛyom. Beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi, zɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hinnɑndi ce fɔ pɑp, dom ǹ si bo hɔngɔ ndɑ ngei dulum yom kpɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Ammɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ nge yom di kunɑ ǹ bo hɔngɔ dulum yom jiiri kɑ kɑɑ jiiri kulu.
Yɑ no hɑuyeji yom kuri ndɑ hɑncine kuri si hini kɑ dulum yom kɑɑ.
À sɛ no, kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ cii: "N si bɑɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ, n si bɑɑ sɑrɑɑ. Ammɑ n nɑ gɑɑhɑm sɔlu ɑ sɛ.
Zɑ sɑrɑɑ kukurɑntɛ, zɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom dulum ŋmɔne, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑɑni n sɛ.
Bine, hɛɛ mo ɑ cii: E Ikpɛ, ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ n binebɑɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm n tirɑ kunkunɑntɛ kunɑ."
À jinɑ kɑ cii: N si bɑɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ. N si bɑɑ sɑrɑɑ. N si bɑɑ sɑrɑɑ kukurɑntɛ. N si bɑɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ dulum ŋmɔne. Ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑɑni n sɛ. Nge yom di kulu ǹ cini tɛ no ndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ goono ndɑ.
À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "E Ikpɛ, ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ n binebɑɑ tɛ". Ikpɛ bine nɑ sintine ŋmɔnɑ kɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ ihinkɑntɑ gɔrɛndi.
Binebɑɑ ngɑ di tɛyom sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ i hɑlɑɑlɑndi beeniyom si Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm sɑrɑɑyom ce fɔ pɑp gɑɑ.
Gɑrɑndikɔ kulu go cɛ ko gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ gbei tɛ hɑnu kulu. Gɑrɑndi hɛ fɔlɔnku yom no ǹ cini sɑrɑɑ, sɑrɑɑ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ dulum kɑɑ pɑi.
Ammɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ fɔlɔnku duumiɑntɛ tɛ ce fɔ pɑp dulum yom sɑbu sɛ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Zɑ sɑɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ go bɑtu kɑlɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kulu mɑ tɛ ngɑ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ.
Sɑrɑɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ no ɑ̀ nɑ beerem tɔɑndi, tɔɑndiyom duumiɑntɛ, ngei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi.
Ngɑ di no, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo go tɛ sɛdɑ i sɛ ngɑ di bɔm. Sintine ɑ̀ cii:
"Wɔne yɑ ci ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ kɑɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑnu nge yom di bɑndɑ. Kpe cii yɑ di. A gɑ ɑ fɔndɔ yom dɑm ǹ bine yom kunɑ. A gɑ ǹ jeeri mɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom gɑɑ."
À ye kɑ cii: "A si kɑɑ hɔngɔ ǹ dulum yom wɑlɑ ǹ tɑɑli yom pɑi."
Bine, kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ dulum yom yɑɑfɑ tɛ, gɑrɑndi tɛyom dulum sɛ si kpɛɛnɛ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, i gundɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Yesu kuri dɔ i mɑ du kɑ huro Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
Yesu nɑ fɔndɔ teji wɔ feeri i sɛ, fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi hɑli i mɑ hurɑ lɑbude gɑɑ, wɑtom ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm noyɑ.
I gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri mo kɑ Ikpɛ jisi ɑ̀ mɑ ci ngɑ fuu ŋmɔne bɔm.
Ngɑ di sɛ, i mo mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ ndɑ bine fɔ nɑɑne tɔnɑntɛ kunɑ. I mo mɑɑni zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ kuri seesee i bine yom gɑɑ kɑ i bine kunɑ sendi hinnɑndi ilɑlɔ gɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ Ikpɛ nyume ndɑ hɑri hinnɑ.
I bɛɛjɛ kɑ i gɑ sɛdɑ ndɑ i mee, i mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ jɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ, nɑɑnekpɛ nɑ.
I mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ cɛrɛ ko cɛrɛ zukum bɑɑkɑsine dɔ ndɑ gbei hinno yom dɔ.
I mɑ si Mɛsiyɑ jɑmɑ meiguyom mure zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɔnɑ kɑ cini tɛ. Ammɑ i mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ, hɑli yɑ mo mɑɑsɑ kɑ wom gɑ di Kpe Hɑnu go mɑɑni mɑ.
De i bɑ dulum tɛ ndɑ i binebɑɑ, zɑ kɑ i du cimi beiyom, gɑrɑndi hɛ kulu si cindi dulum yom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Ammɑ hɛ kɑ cindi i sɛ i mɑ bɑtu ndɑ hɑmburu, ciiti ndɑ nini dungɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ zojikɑri yom bɔm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ dɑɑrum, ɑ̀ mɑ bu sisibi si, bɔrɔ hinkɑ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ sɛdɑ bɔm.

Dee mɛtɛ nɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kpɛ sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Ize fɛntɛ? Dee mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ kuri ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ hinnɑndi gunɑ zɑngɑ kɔnu? Mɛtɛ no ǹ tɛ bɔrɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ gomini wɔ lɑlɑce?
Ammɑ i gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ fɑɑsɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ bɑnɑ." À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Kpe gɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ ciiti".
Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ kɑmbɛ kunɑ kɑmyom, hɑmburu hɛ fɔ fɑ.
Wom mo hɔngɔ hɑnu sintine yom, hɑnu yom kɑ ǹ kunɑ wom du Ikpɛ kɑɑri. À bɑndɑ mo, wom suuru kɑ tɑngɑmi beeri fɔ tɛ guruguze yom bindi bindi.
Nee hɛrɛ no ǹ nɑ wom tɛ hɑwi gunɑyom hɛ woobi gɑɑ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi gɑɑ. Yɑ hɛrɛ mo wom goono beerem gɑme kɑ ǹ du tɑɑbɑndiyom zɑngɑ yɑ.

Wom nɑ binejijire tɛ ɑ sɛ ɑ seseri yom kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ wom hɑibɑrikɑ yom tɑ wom gɑɑ. Wom tu ndɑ ngɑ di ndɑ fɑihã zɑ kɑ wom go bei kɑ wom gundɑ hɑizici yom bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ǹ boori kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom. Ǹ sindɑ beeni yom mo.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si wom yɑrutɛrɛ furu, yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑnɑndi beeri.
À himɑ wom mɑ hini suuru hɑli sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ wom mɑ du Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli tɔnɑndiyom.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hɑli cɛnɑ fɔ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ. À si jɛ mɑ.
Bɔrɔ bine kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɑntɛ susu, ɑ̀ go hunɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ ye bɑndɑ mɑ, ɑ bine si mɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑne."
Ammɑ i yom wɔ, i si bɔrɔ wɔne yom kunɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go ye bɑndɑ kɑ tɔ hɑlɑciyom dɔ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ nɑɑne kɑ ngei hundi yom fɑɑbɑ, ǹ kunɑ no i goono.
Nɑɑne bine yɑ ci hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go bɛɛjɛ tɛ ndɑ, ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndiyom. Nɑɑne wɔ go hɛ yom kɑ moo si di dɑhirɑndi.
Dom cɛɛ yom nɑɑne dɔ nɑ ǹ du sɛdɑ hinno.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no i go fɑhɑm Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɑkɑ nɑ ndɑ ngɑ mee sendi. I gɑ fɑhɑm mo hɑndunyɑ wɔ kɑ i go di, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ i hini kɑ di.

Nɑɑne gɑɑ no Abɛli nɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ, gɑrɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Kɑinu ŋmɔne. Sɑrɑɑ di gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ Abɛli cɛɑndi susu ngɑ jine zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑrɑndi yom tɑ. Nɑɑne ngɑ di gɑɑ no, bɑ kɑ Abɛli bu ɑ̀ go sendi hɑli hɔ̃.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Ikpɛ nɑ Henoku zɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si di bu sɛ. Beerem mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ kpɛɛnɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ. Hɑli Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ, Henoku gundɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ɑ̀ go kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
De bine nɑɑne si, bɔrɔ si hini kɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ pɑi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑɑne kɑ Ikpɛ goono. Ngɑ mo yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ceeci bɑnɑkɔ.

Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Ikpɛ nɑ Nowe kɑɑbɑɑru ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ moo mɑnɑ di jinɑ. Ikpɛ hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ Nowe nɑ hɑrihi tɛ kɑ ngɑ fuu kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ mɑ kɔmɑ. Nɑɑne di gɑɑ nɑ, Nowe nɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri. À ci cɛyom susu tubukɔ kɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne go du.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɛ ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ sendi gɑnɑ. À kpei nungu fɔ dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ tubu. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu kɑ kpei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ngɑ go kpei.

Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Abulɛmɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ yɑ nungu di kunɑ, lɑɑbu wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Kuuru bukɔ yom kunɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ gɔrɔ, ngɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu. Nge yom yɑ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli fɔlɔnku tubu Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ.
Abulɛmɑ gɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du kpɛsɛ sinjiyom hinno bɑtu. Wɑngɑrɑ wɔ Ikpɛ bumbum yɑ ci ciisɑkpɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ cinikɔ.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ Sɑhɑrɑ bumbum du dɑbɑri kɑ tɛ gunde. Bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑliwɑti mɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ hɛi. Sɑhɑrɑ lɑsɑbu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ngɑ sɛ, nɑɑnekpɛ nɑ.
À sɛ no bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku gɑɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ize hɛi, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no bɑndɑ yom hunu. Bɑndɑ yom di hunu no zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ hɑndɑriyɑize yom, zɑngɑ tɛku mee gɑɑ tɑɑsi kɑ ǹ si kɑbu.
Nɑɑne kunɑ no ǹ kulu bu. Ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ǹ sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hunne hɑli jinɑ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ kube. Ǹ cii ndɑ mee ngei yɑ yɑ yom no, ngei yɑ ceeyo yom no hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, ǹ go cɛbɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ lɑɑbu fɔ no ngei go ceeci.
De ǹ lɑsɑbu ndɑ lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ hunu, dɑm ǹ bɑ du fɔndɔ kɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye nodi.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ go guuri lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ ngɑ di. Ngɑ yɑ ci bɛɛnɛ. À sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ mɑnɑ hɑwi tɛ ndei ǹ mɑ ngɑ cɛɛ ngei ŋmɔne Ikpɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑngɑrɑ fɔ sɔlu ǹ sɛ.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ Isɑɑkɑ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ bubure. Abulɛmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ koo fɔlɔnku sɑrɑɑ zɑngɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ.
Ikpɛ cii Abulɛmɑ sɛ: "Isɑɑkɑ gɑɑ no, n bɑndɑ kɑɑ hunu".
Abulɛmɑ lɑsɑbu kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ Isɑɑkɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À sɛ nɑ deedɑndi ngɑ di gɑɑ Abulɛmɑ ye kɑ du ngɑ koo.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, Isɑɑkɑ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Esɑu gɑɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ Yɑkɔfu bɑ bu, ɑ̀ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Yosɛfu koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ kulu gɑɑ. À nɑ goobu nɑɑni ko kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ Yosɛfu bɑ bu, ɑ̀ sendi Isirɑilɑ ize yom bɔm ǹ mɑ hunu Eziputu lɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ nɑ mei kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ngɑ biri yom.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ Moisi hɛi, ɑ̀ nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tugu kɑlɑ hɑndu hinzɑ zɑmɑ ǹ di izecire booriyɑm. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɑmburu gɑndɑkpɛ fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ Moisi tɔ bɔrɔ, ɑ̀ hungu ǹ mɑ ngɑ cɛɛ Fɑrɑɔ koo hundiyo koo.
Moisi suubɑ ǹ mɑ ngɑ guruguzɑndi Ikpɛ jɑmɑ bɑndɑ kɑ bisɑ ngɑ mɑ dulum fɑrinmɑɑ bɑndɑ fɔ.
Moisi nɑ yɑnce gunɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu hɑibɑrikɑ. Ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ Moisi moo goono Ikpɛ bɑnɑndi gɑɑ.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no Moisi hunu Eziputu lɑɑbu. À mɑnɑ hɑmburu Eziputu gɑndɑkpɛ bine futu mo. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go di Bɔrɔ kɑ moo si di.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Moisi nɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru tɛ. À nɑ kuri seesee hɑli hɑlɑcikɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine yom hɑlɑci mɑ si kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne yom gɑɑ.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ Tɛku Ciire dem zɑngɑ nungu kɔgɔ. Ammɑ Eziputu ize yom kɑ ǹ bɑɑ ngei mɑ dem, tɛkuɑ nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ yɛmbɛ yom kɑm sɑɑ kɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hundi hɑli jiribi iye.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ no Lɑhɑbu weikuru fɔ mɑnɑ hɑlɑci ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hungu Ikpɛ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ceekpɛrɛtɑɑsi yom kube ndɑ bɑɑni.
Ifɔ yɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ? Lɔkɑci gɑziɑ kɑ yɑ Gideyɔ ndɑ Bɑrɑkɑ ndɑ Sɑmsɔ ndɑ Yɛfɛtɑ ndɑ Dɑfidi ndɑ Sɑmuɛli ndɑ ɑndebi yom bɑɑru cii.
Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ nɑ gbei wɔne yom tɛ. Ǹ gɑɑŋmɑɑ kpetɛrɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ nɑ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ. Ǹ du hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ muusu beeri yom mee yom dɑɑbu.
Ǹ nɑ nini dɑbɑri wi. Ǹ kɔmɑ tɑkubɑ meekɑɑnɔkpɛ kɑmbɛ. Bɑ kɑ hinɑbunu yom nɑ, ǹ du gɑɑbi. Ǹ gundɑ gɑɑbi wɑngu kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ yo wɑngɑri kuru yom gɑɑrɛ kɑlɑ ǹ zuuru.
Weibɔrɔ fɔ yom du ngei bukɔ yom kɑ ǹ tunu kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom bu bɔnɛ futu kunɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tu ǹ mɑ kɔmɑ bɔnɛ di kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ du tunɑndiyom kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ wɔne.
Ǹ dondɑ ɑfɔ yom mo kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom hɔ ndɑ seseri yom kɑ dɑm kɑsu.

Ǹ nɑ cetu ndɑ tɑndi yom kɑ wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom dumbu ihinkɑ ndɑ gɑrize. Ǹ nɑ ǹ sui. Ǹ nɑ ǹ wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ. Ǹ kpei nee, ǹ ye nee ndɑ hɑncine ndɑ feeji kuru bɛntɛ. Ǹ go bɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi.
Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ tɔ beerem di fɑ. Ǹ tɛ ceeyo yom gɑnji yom kunɑ ndɑ tondi kuku yom bɔm. Ǹ gɔrɔ gɔlɔ yom kunɑ ndɑ guusu yom kunɑ.
Beerem wɔ kulu, bɑ kɑ ǹ du sɛdɑ hinno nɑɑne dɔ, ǹ mɑnɑ du ɑlikɑwɑli tɔnɑndiyom.
Ikpɛ bine nɑ hɛ fɔ hinno jisi i sɛ hɑli ǹ mɑ si ci tɔɑntɛ yom, i si ǹ bɑndɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ sɛdɑ mɑrgɑ bɑkɑrɑ goono ko kɑ i hundi, i mɑ jɛrɔ timɔ kulu furu ndɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i kɑlikɑli fɑɑlɑ fɑɑlɑ. I mɑ zuure kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm i jine tɛ ndɑ himmɑ.

I mɑ moo sinji Yesu gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i nɑɑne ŋmɔne bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndikɔ. Binekɑɑne kɑ Ikpɛ jisi Yesu jine sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑbi hɑm bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. À mɑnɑ gunɑ kɑ bu zɑngɑ yɑ di, hɑwi no. À gɔrɔ mo Ikpɛ kɑrigɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
Wom mɑ lɑsɑbu ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ suuru ndɑ dulumkoni yom gɑɑbɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ wom bine yom mɑ si fɑrigɑ kɑ tɑm.
Wom mɑnɑ tɑngɑm hɑli kuri mɑ munu jinɑ kɑ guruje ndɑ dulum.
Wom dinigɑ himmɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ ize yom kɑ cii: "A koo, n mɑ si dondɑ Kpe foorɑyom. N mɑ si zɑm himmɑ mo sɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ n kɔnkɔm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ Kpe go bɑɑ, ɑkpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ foorɑ. Ize yom kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ, ngei no ɑ̀ sɔtɛ."
Wom mɑ suuru ndɑ Kpe foorɑyom. Ikpɛ go wom dii no zɑngɑ ngɑ ize yom. Bɑɑbɑ go kɑ ngɑ kɑɑ foorɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Ammɑ de wom mɑnɑ du foorɑyom zɑngɑ koo kulu du, wom tɛ zinɑ ize yom noyɑ. Wom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ize cimi cimi yom.
Zɑti i gundɑ bɑɑbɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ i hɛi, ǹ nɑ i foorɑ. I bine nɑ ǹ dɑm. Hɑli yɑ mo i Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ i bɔm yeti gɑndɑ kɑ hunɑ.
Bɑndɑ fɔ nɑ, i bɑɑbɑ yom nɑ i foorɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i foorɑ nɑ i hɑnfɑni sɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ du bɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.

Cimi nɑ, foorɑyom kulu sintine, ɑ̀ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ binesɛrɛ hɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci binekɑɑne hɛ. Ammɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ gɑɑ, foorɑyom ngɑ di kɑɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne bɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛyom susu beerem kɑ ǹ go dendeni ɑ̀ dɔ sɛ.
À sɛ no, wom kɑmbɛ yom kɑ ǹ fɑrigɑ ndɑ wom cɛnjɛ hinɑbunu yom, wom mɑ gɑɑbi dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
Wom mo fɔndɔ cɛɑntɛ yom tɛ wom cee yom sɛ zɑmɑ cee kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sumbɑru, ɑ̀ mɑ si du kɑ gbeeri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du bɑɑni.
Wom mo lɑɑkɑli kɑne hɑmine bɔrɔ kulu gɑme. Wɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ hɑmine mɑ wɔ kɑ de ɑ̀ si, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si di Kpe.
Wom mo lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si gɑziɑ Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, kɑɑji hɔɔtɔ kɑɑ zei wom bine yom kunɑ kɑ wom kɑnkɑm. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo ziibɑndi.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli zinɑteeri mɑ si goono wom gɑme wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ zɑngɑ Esɑu. Esɑu wɔ nɑ ngɑ dɑudutɛrɛ neerɑ ŋmɑɑri combu fɔ sɛ.
Wom bei kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Esɑu bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ du bɑrikɑ di. Ǹ mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ bɛrɛ, bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tuubi ceeci ndɑ hɛni.
Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni tondi kukuɑ gɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ hini kɑ hɑmɑ, tondɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii. Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni kube gɑɑ ndɑ kube bi ndɑ hɛo futu gɑɑ.
Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni kuluu hɛni gɑɑ. Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni jinde kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ beerem mɑɑ rɑ, ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ jinde di mɑ si sendi ngei sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ meire wɔne jɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Bɑ de gɑnjihɑm yɑ lɑmbɑ tɑndi kuku di gɑɑ, ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cetu ndɑ tondi wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ biri."
Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ di futu kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Moisi cii: "A hɑmburu kɑlɑ ɑ go gɑsi."
Wom mɑnɑ kɑɑ tɑndi kuku di dɔ ɑmmɑ wom mɑɑni Sionɑ tondi kuku dɔ. Wom mɑɑni Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ wɑngɑrɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yerusɑlɛm bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize bɑkɑrɑ fɑihã bɑtu dɔ.

Wom mɑɑni Ize sintine mɑrgɑ gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom hɑntum bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Wom mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ kulu ciitikɔ. Wom mɑɑni bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci cɛɑntɛ susu yom, nge yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ tɔɑndi.
Wom mɑɑni Yesu gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑsɑbɑndikɔ ɑlikɑwɑli teji ŋmɔne. Wom mɑɑni Yesu kuri seeseeyom dɔ mo, kuri seeseeyom kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ Abɛli sɑrɑɑ ŋmɔne.

Wom mo lɑɑkɑli fɑ. Wom mɑ si hungu kɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi sɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑɑru. Ǹ mɑnɑ kɔmɑ. Hɑli yɑ mo i yom. I si hini kɑ kɔmɑ de i nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi i sɛ zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
À jindɑ yɑ nɑ gɑndɑ zinji. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ngɑ yɑ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli wɔ tɛ kɑ cii: "Ce fɔ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ kɑɑ zinjiyom tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci gɑndɑ hinne ɑmmɑ bɛɛnɛ mo."
Sendi gureyom wɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ce fɔ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ go cɛbɛ kɑ tɑkɑhɛ kulu Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ zinji ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ si zinji mɑ du kɑ gɔrɔ.
À sɛ no, zɑ kɑ i du kpetɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si zinji, i mo kɑ i sɑɑbuyom cɛbɛ. I mɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ ndɑ i gbei kɑ i go tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ. I mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ gɑnɑyom hinno ndɑ hɑmburu.
I ŋmɔne Ikpɛ mɑ, nini no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ tusu.
Wom mo gundɑ nyɑizetɛrɛ bɑɑkɑsine.
Wom mɑ si dinigɑ yotɛrɛ tɑyom. Yɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑnɑ bei ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom tɑ kɑ dɑm ngei hundi yom kunɑ.
Wom mɑ hɔngɔ kɑsuize yom zɑngɑ wom goono hɔɑntɛ ǹ bɑndɑ. Wɑ hɔngɔ mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi, zɑngɑ wom goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
Ǹ kulu mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ hije sɛ. Hije dɑɑri mɑ si bɑrɑ ziibikpɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɛnɛbɛnɛ tɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go zinɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti.
Wom mɑ si wom bɔm no nooru bɑɑkɑsine sɛ. Wom bine mo yee ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ. Ikpɛ bumbum cii: "A si n nɑm pɑi. A si zuuru n gɑɑ pɑi."
Ngɑ di sɛ, i hini kɑ wɔne cii ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ: "Kpe yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑkɔ, ɑ si hɑmburu. Ifɔ nɑ iburɑdɑm hini kɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ?"
Wom mo hɔngɔ wom jinɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi fɛɛ wom sɛ. Wom mɑ hɔngɔ ǹ hɑndunyɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ǹ nɑɑne dimi dendeni.
Yesu yɑ ɑfɔlɔnku nɑ, bii ndɑ hunkunɑ. Yɑ mɑ no, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.

Wɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom bine yom cendi nee hɛrɛ wɑlɑ yɑ hɛrɛ ndɑ cɛbɛ teji ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. À boori gomini mɑ bɔrɔ bine sinjɑndi, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ŋmɑɑri kɑbiɑyom. Ŋmɑɑri kɑbiɑyom sɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑ ngei bɔm no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑnfɑni.
I gundɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ kuuru bukɑ kunɑ, ǹ sindɑ fɔndɔ ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Memunu yom kɑ ǹ kuri gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ cini kpeindɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ ŋmɔne hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ dulum sɛ, dɛbɛrɛ bɑndɑ no ǹ cini memunu yom di tɔnu.
À sɛ no Yesu mo guruguze dɛbɛrɛ kɔrɔme bɑndɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ bumbum kuri dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ i mɑ hunu kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ dɛbɛrɛ di bɑndɑ. I mɑ ɑ̀ hɑwi jɛrɛ.
Nee hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ i sindɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni, ɑmmɑ i go ceeci no wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ.
À sɛ no i mo kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ zɑngɑ sɑrɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ngɑ di yɑ ci i mee sendi yom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ i go sɑɑbuyom tɛ ɑ̀ mɑɑ sɛ.
Ammɑ wom mɑ si dinigɑ ihinno tɛyom ndɑ wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑɑkɑsine zɑmɑ sɑrɑɑ wɔ dimi yɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.

Wom mo wom jinɑ yom gɑnɑ. Wom mo bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom hundi yom. Jinɑ yom wɔ kɑɑ kpeindɑ ngei tɛgbei yom kɑ ǹ deede Ikpɛ sɛ. Wɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ binekɑɑne, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ndɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ di si hɑnfɑni fɔ kulu tɛ wom sɛ.
Wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ. I gɑ bei siikɑ si i gundɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno. I go bɑɑ i mɑ diro hinno tɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ.
Hɑli yɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ himmɑ wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ hɑli yɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
Ikpɛ Lɑɑkɑli Kɑnekpɛ nɑ i Kpe Yesu kɑ ɑ̀ ci feeji Kurukɔ Beeri tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kuri dɔ.
Ikpɛ mɑ wom tɔɑndi hɛ hinno kulu sɛ wom mɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ tɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ wom kunɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ. Deizɑ mɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wom mɑ himmɑ noyom sendi wɔ zɑɑ, zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ hɑntum wom sɛ iboobo.
Wom mɑ bei kɑ ǹ nɑ i nyɑize Timote tɑm. De ɑ̀ go kɑɑ subɑsi, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ kɑɑ di wom.
Wom mɑ wom jinɑ yom kulu fɔɔ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu. Itɑli lɑɑbu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu mo go wom fɔɔ.
Gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ nɑ Yɑkɔfu, Ikpɛ tɑm. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne mɑ. A gɑ tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wom dimi wei cindi hinkɑ sɛ, wom kɑ wom goono seeɑntɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. A go wom fɔɔ.
A nyɑizei, sɑɑ kɑ tɑɑbi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni du wom, wom mɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu binekɑɑne no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ.
Wom mɑ bei kɑ wom nɑɑne bubureyom go kɑɑndɑ suuru.
Ammɑ wɑ nɑm suuru mɑ ngɑ gbei tɔnɑndi domi wom mɑ bɑrɑ tɔɑntɛ kɑ si zɑm hɛ fɔ kulu.
De wom kunɑ ɑfɔ zɑm hɑikusutɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɔrɔ kulu nɑ ndɑ bɑyom. À si deeni mo. À gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑkpɛ sɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ nɑɑne, siikɑ mɑ si. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ siikɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ tɛku boosu yom kɑ hɛo go teeni ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ fum nee hɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ fum yɑ hɛrɛ.
Bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi mɑ si tɑmmɑ ngɑ du hɛ fɔ Kpe dɔ.
À si du zɑmɑ binehinkɑkpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɛrɛbɛrɛkpɛ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ yom kulu kunɑ.
Nyɑize tɑlikɑ mɑ fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ beeriyom.
Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mo mɑ fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ cɛnɑndiyom zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bisɑ nɑ zɑngɑ subu boosi.
Weenu go hunu ndɑ ngɑ hɛo dungɔ kɑ subu kɔgɑndi. À boosi mo kɑm. À boori tɑkɑri gɑ hɑlɑci. Yɑ no hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mo kɑɑ kɑm ɑ̀ murɑdu yom kunɑ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ suuru tɑɑbi kunɑ, zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci tɑbɑntɛ suiyom gɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du tukunsi fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi ŋmɔne. Fulɑ di ɑlikɑwɑli no Ikpɛ tɛ ngɑ mɑ nɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono suiyom kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si cii, Ikpɛ dɔ no suiyom hunu zɑmɑ ilɑlɔ si hini kɑ Ikpɛ sui. Ikpɛ bumbum mo si bɔrɔ sui.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu goono suiyom kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ bumbum bineibɑɑi nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kuse.
À gɑɑ no, bineibɑɑi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gunde ɑ̀ go dulum hɛi. Dulum mo kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bu.
A nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ si wom bɔm dɛrɑndi.
Noyom hinno kulu ndɑ noyom tɔɑntɛ kulu gɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci kɑɑri yom Bɑɑbɑ. Ikpɛ dɔ bɛrɛyom si, bicire si bɛrɛ.
À nɑ i hɛi iteji ɑ̀ bumbum binebɑɑ bɔm ɑ̀ cimi Sendi gɑɑ domi i mɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑhɛ yom ŋmɔne sintine.
Yɑ no ɑ nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, kɑlɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ wɑɑsu kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. À mɑ si wɑɑsu ndɑ sendi ciiyom. À mɑ si wɑɑsu mɑ ndɑ binetɔnɛ.
Bɔrɔ binetɔnɛ si Ikpɛ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ.
À sɛ no, wom mɑ ziibi kulu ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ kulu nɑm. Wom mɑ Sendi kɑ Ikpɛ dɑm wom bine yom kunɑ tɑ ndɑ bɑɑniyom. Sendi ngɑ di hini kɑ wom hundi yom fɑɑbɑ.
Ammɑ wom mɑ Sendi di dɑm tɛyom kunɑ. Wɑ si wom bɔm nɑ hɑngɑ dɑmyom hinne sɛ kɑ wom bɔm zɑmbɑ.
De bɔrɔ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Sendɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɛyom kunɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ moodumɑ tɑkɑri gunɑ diji kunɑ.
Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm gunɑ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ bisɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ dinigɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ moodumɑ bɑrɑ.

Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ moo dɑm Ikpɛ fɔndɔ tɔɑntɛ gɑɑ, fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ dinigɑ. Kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɛyom kunɑ. Akpɛ wɔ binekɑɑnekpɛ no ɑ̀ gbei yom kunɑ.
De wom gɑme kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini ngɑ mee, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm zɑmbɑ. Bɔrɔ ngɑ di wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑnɑyom ci kɔnu.
Gɑnɑyom hinno kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ ziibi i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine yɑ ci bɔrɔ mɑ kɔyɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom kunfɑ ǹ tɑɑbi kunɑ. À mɑ ngɑ bɔm jɛ mɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si hurɑ hɑndunyɑ ziibi kulu kunɑ.
A nyɑize yom, wɑ si nɑɑne kɑ wom gundɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ deizɑkpɛ gɑɑ tɛ ndɑ bɑɑbɑɑ.
Zɑngɑ sendi, bɔrɔ fɔ hurɑ wom mɑrgɑ kunɑ ndɑ wurɑ kɔlɔbɛ yom ndɑ jiine hinnɑ. Alifukɑru fɔ mɑ hurɑ ndɑ zɑrɑzɑrɑ ziibɔ.
Cɔfɔ wom nɑ wom moo yom sinji jiine hinno dɑmkɔ gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n mɑ gɔrɔ nee gɔrɛ dɔ hinno wɔ bɔm. Wom cii ɑlifukɑru mo sɛ: Ni, n mɑ cɛ nodi wɑlɑ gɔrɔ ɑ cɛ dɛcɛyom dɔ wɔ bɔm.
Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom go bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ wom gɑme noyɑ hɑli wom bɑrɑ ciitikɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ yom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?

A nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. Beerem kɑ hɑndunyɑ go lɑsɑbu tɑlikɑ yom, ngei nɑ Ikpɛ dɑm ǹ mɑ ci hɑizicɑntɛ yom nɑɑne kunɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu. Kpetɛrɛ wɔ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli nɑ, Ikpɛ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ rɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑlifukɑru fɛntɛ. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom yɑ go wom kɑnkɑm kɑ wom cendi kɑ dɑm ciitiyom dɔ jine.
Ngei mo yɑ gɑ Mɑɑ bɛɛɛrɛkpɛ wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ wom cɛɛ ndɑ cɛnɑndi. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
De wom go kɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi ndɑ cimi zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ gɑ cii: "n mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm", wom go kɑ ihinno tɛ.
Ammɑ de wom go bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ wom gɑ dulum tɛ. À gɑɑ nɑ fɔndɑ gɑ wom zeeri zɑngɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ yom.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ fɔndɑ kulu gɑnɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑfɔ hɑitɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ kulu hɑitɑkɔ.
Yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ cii: "N mɑ si zinɑ". À cii mo: "N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi". De bine n mɑnɑ zinɑ ɑmmɑ n nɑ bɔrɔ wi, n tɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ.
Wom mɑ sendi, wom mɑ tɛ mɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti ndɑ fɔndɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ.
Ciiti sindɑ suuji bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ suuji cɛbɛ sɛ. Suuji gɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ciiti bɔm.
A nyɑizei, de bɔrɔ fɔ cii ngɑ gundɑ nɑɑne ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne di cɛbɛ gbei yom gɑɑ, ifɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ bɔrɔ di sɛ? Nɑɑne ngɑ di hini kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ bɑ?
Zɑngɑ sendi, de nyɑize fɔ, weibɔrɔ wɑlɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑ bumbum, ŋmɑɑri mo nɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ hɑnu kulu.
Cɔfɔ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ kpei bɑɑni. N mɑ si mɑɑ yeeni. N mɑ kungu. Ammɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm, ifɔ nɑ ɑ̀ go hinsɑ?
Yɑ nɑ nɑɑne bɑrɑ ngɑ hinne. De nɑɑne sindɑ gbei yom, bukɔ no.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ cii: Ni, n gundɑ nɑɑne, hɛɛ mo ɑ gundɑ gbei yom. N mɑ ɑ cɛbɛ n nɑɑne, gbei yom si. Hɛɛ mo ɑ gbei yom gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ n cɛbɛ ɑ nɑɑne.
N gɑ tu cimi Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ no? To. À boori. Ammɑ bɑ hɔllɛ yom mo go tu cimi, ǹ bine go gɑsi.
E bɔrɔ yɑmɔ, n bɑɑ n mɑ bei kɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gbei, kɔnu nɑ bɑ?
Ikpɛ nɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɑndi susu gbei yom gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑɑ Isɑɑkɑ dɛcɛ bɑndɑ tɑndɑ bɔm. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
N di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne go dirɑ nɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom. À nɑɑne tɔ no ɑ̀ gbei yom gɑɑ.
À gɑɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ nɑ ngɑ di lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛɑndiyom susu." Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɛ ngɑ kpɑɑsi.
Wom di kɑ gbei yom gɑɑ no Ikpɛ go bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci nɑɑne hinne gɑɑ.
Yɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ weikuru Lɑhɑbu cɛɑndi susu gbei yom gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɑmbɑ tɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni fɔ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
Zɑngɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ hundi bukɔ no, yɑ no nɑɑne mo kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gbei yom bukɔ no.
A nyɑizei, wom kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo mɑ si tɛ cɛbɛkɔ yom zɑ kɑ wom go bei i yom kɑ i go cɛbɛ tɛ i kɑɑ du ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ jɑɑsɑ ǹ kulu.
I kulu go hɑitɑ hɛ boobo kunɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ hɑitɑ sendi gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ wɔ tɔɑntɛ nɑ. À gundɑ hini ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kulu bɔm.
Wɑ gunɑ, i go ɑlinzom yom dɑm bɑri yom mee domi ǹ mɑ i gɑnɑ. I go kɑ ǹ gɑɑhɑm yom kulu bɛrɛ bɛrɛ mɑ.
Wɑ gunɑ, bɑ hɑrihi yom kɑ ǹ beeri, hɛo futu yom go kɑ ǹ fum ɑmmɑ filɑfili cɛnɑ pititi yɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm fɔndɔ zɑngɑ hɑrihikpɛ gɑ bɑɑ.
Yɑ nɑ dɛɛnɛ bɑrɑ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ. À bine go fɑɑre hɛ beeri yom gɑɑ. Gunɑ zɑngɑ nini cɛnɑ gɑ hini kɑ gɑnji beeri kulu tɔnu.

Dɛɛnɛ bɑrɑ nɑ zɑngɑ nini. Hɛ lɑlɔ nungu no. Dɛɛnɛ goono i gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kunɑ kɑ gɑɑhɑm kulu sɑrɑ zɑngɑ nini kɑ i bɑhune mee ndɑ mee kulu tɔnu. Ngɑ bumbum mɑ ciiti beenɑntɛ ŋmɔne nini gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ diiɑndi.
Ǹ cini gɑnjihɑm dimi kulu ndɑ ciro yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɛku hɑm yom foorɑ. Iburɑdɑm yom mo yɑ nɑ ǹ foorɑ.
Ammɑ dɛɛnɛ wɔ bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ foorɑ. Dɛɛnɛ yɑ hɛ lɑlɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ nɑji futu.
Ndɑ dɛɛnɛ no i go kɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. Ndɑ dɛɛnɛ mo no i go iburɑdɑm yom lɑɑli, beerem kɑ Ikpɛ tɑkɑ ngɑ himɑndi bɔm.
Yɑ nɑ, mee fɔlɔnku kunɑ sɑɑbuyom ndɑ lɑɑliyom go hunu. A nyɑizei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono yɑ di.
Fɔci fɔlɔnku gɑɑ hɑri hinno ndɑ hɑri hɔɔtɔ hunu bɑ?
A nyɑizei, jee nyɑ hini kɑ hɛi olibe bɑ? Lɛzɛ̃ nyɑ hini kɑ jee hɛi bɑ? Yɑ no fɔci hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ciiri ciiri, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ hɑri kɑɑnɔ pɑi.
Wom kunɑ, mee nɑ hɑikusu? Mee no fɑhɑmkpɛ? À mɑ ngɑ gbei yom cɛbɛ gɔrɛ hinno gɑɑ bɑɑniyom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu hɑikusutɛrɛ dɔ.
Ammɑ de wom gundɑ cɛnsɛ hɔɔtɔ ndɑ kɑkɔ wom bine yom kunɑ, wɑ si fɑɑre ko tɑngɑri cimi bɔm.
Hɑikusutɛrɛ ngɑ di mɑnɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ, gɑndɑ ŋmɔne nɑ, iburɑdɑm hɑɑli ŋmɔne no, Ibilisi ŋmɔne no.
Nungu kɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ kɑkɔ bine goono, kɔsɔngu ndɑ gbei lɑlɔ dimi dimi kulu mo goono nodi.
Ammɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɛɛnɛ sintine jinɑ ihinno no, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑnekpɛ nɑ. Boorikpɛ ndɑ bɑɑniyomkpɛ nɑ. À tɔ ndɑ suuji ndɑ gbei hinno yom. À sindɑ bɑɑbɑɑ. À sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ.
Beerem kɑ ǹ go lɑɑkɑli kɑne ceeci, lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ no ǹ go cɛɑndiyom susu bɑrikɑ wi.
Zɑ mɑni no wɑngu yom go hunu? Zɑ mɑni zoji go hunu kɑ kɑɑ wom kunɑ? Wom bineibɑɑi dɔ no ǹ go hunu kɑ tɑngɑm wom dɔbu yom kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
Wom go hini ɑmmɑ wom sindɑ. Wom go bɔrɔ wi, wom go cɛnsɛ. Wom bine si hini kɑ du ɑ̀. Wom go zogu, wom go wɑngu, ɑmmɑ wom sindɑ domi wom si ŋmɑɑrɛ.
Wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑmmɑ wom si du zɑmɑ wom gɑ hɑitɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ kunɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ wom bineibɑɑi tɔnɑndi.

Wom ci zɑngɑ zinɑteeri yom zɑmɑ wom go kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ibɛrɛtɛrɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ. Wom go kɑ ngɑ di bei bɑ? Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kpɑɑsi, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ.
Wom tɑmmɑ sendi kɔnu nɑ bɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ ɑ̀ cini guuri ndɑ cɛnsɛ wom sɑbu sɛ"?
Ammɑ Ikpɛ go gomini bɑmbɑtɑ no. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ go cii: "Ikpɛ hungu bɔmbɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go gomini no bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom sɛ."
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Wɑ hungu Ibilisi, ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ mooru wom.
Wɑ mɑɑni Ikpɛ, ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni wom. Wɑ wom kɑmbɛ yom nyunu, dulumkoni yom. Wɑ wom bine yom hinnɑndi, wom binehinkɑkpɛ yom.
Wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ. Wɑ bɛrɛɛ tɛ. Wɑ hɛ. Wom hɑɑri mɑ ye bɛrɛɛ. Wom binekɑɑne mɑ ye binesɛrɛ.
Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Kpe sɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom bɛɛrɑndi.

Nyɑizei, wɑ si cɛrɛ sendi yɑmu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ nyɑize fɔ sendi yɑmu wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti, ɑ̀ go fɔndɑ sendi yɑmu. À go fɔndɑ ciiti mo. De bine n go fɔndɑ ciiti, n mɑnɑ ci fɔndɑ gɑnɑkɔ ɑmmɑ n tɛ ɑ̀ ciitikɔ.
Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku yɑ ci fɔndɑ nokɔ. Ngɑ yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ fɑɑbɑ, ngɑ yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ hɑlɑci. Ammɑ ni, ni no mee kɑ n mɑ ciiti n gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ?
Mɑɑsɑnkulu ɑ kɑɑ wom gɑɑ, wom kɑ wom cini cii, hunkunɑ wɑlɑ subɑ i kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ, i jiiri fɔ tɛ nodi. I tenku, i du liibɑ.
Wom si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ subɑ. Ifɔ yɑ ci wom hundi yom? Ǹ bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ dullu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu bɑndɑ fɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dɛrɛ.
Dom wɑ cii, de Ikpɛ bɑɑ, i hunɑ kɑ wɔne tɛ wɑlɑ wɔ.
Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom go wom bɔm bɛɛrɑndi wom fɑɑre kunɑ. Bɔm bɛɛrɑndiyom zɑngɑ yɑ, ilɑlɔ no.
Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ihinno bei ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ngɑ wɔ dɔ dulum no.
Mɑɑsɑnkulu ɑ kɑɑ wom gɑɑ, hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom. Wɑ hɛ, wɑ wuuru bɔnɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ wom bɔm sɑbu sɛ.
Wom hɑibɑrikɑ yom fumbu. Nɑnɑbɑnu yom mo nɑ wom jiine yom ŋmɑɑ.
Wom wurɑ ndɑ wom ɑnzɛrɛfu kɛdiɑ nɑ ǹ dii. Kɛdiɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dii, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tunu kɑ tɛ wom gɑɑ sɛdɑ kɑ wom gɑɑhɑm yom mo ŋmɑɑ zɑngɑ nini. Wom nɑ hɑibɑrikɑ meigu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ jiribi yom kunɑ.
Wɑ gunɑ, gbeiteeri yom kɑ ǹ nɑ wom fɑri yom wi ǹ go hɛ bɑnɑndi kɑ wom hungu kɑ ǹ bɑnɑ sɑbu sɛ. Fɑriwikɔ yom di hɛni tɔ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Kundɑkpɛ hɑngɑ dɔ.
Wom nɑ wom wɑtɛ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑne ndɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑyom kunɑ. Wom nɑ wom bine yom kungɑndi zɑngɑ wiyom zɑɑri hine.
Wom nɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu ciiti kɑ zeeri. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ wi, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hungu wom.
Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, wɑ tɛ suurɑntɛ yom kɑlɑ Kpe kɑɑyom. Wɑ gunɑ hɑifɑri go kɑ ngɑ dumɑiize hɛiyom hinno bɑtu kɑ suuru ndɑ, kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du sintine hɑri yom ndɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑri yom.
Wom mo, wɑ tɛ suurɑntɛ yom. Wɑ wom bine yom dɑhirɑndi domi Kpe kɑɑyom mɑɑni.
Nyɑizei, wɑ si gunu ndɑ cɛrɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ si wom ciiti kɑ zeeri. Wɑ di, Ciitikɔ go fuu mee.
A nyɑizei, ɑndebi yom kɑ ǹ sendi Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom mɑ ǹ tɑɑbi ndɑ ǹ suuru dendeni.
Wɑ gunɑ, i go cii binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ go suuru tɑɑbi kunɑ. Wom mɑɑ Yobu suuru bɑɑru. Wom bine di hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ Kpe tɔ no ndɑ sisibi ndɑ suuji.
Ammɑ ɑ nyɑizei, hɛ kulu sintine yɑ ci, wɑ si ze ndɑ bɛɛnɛ. Wɑ si ze ndɑ gɑndɑ. Wɑ si ze ndɑ zeyom dimi kulu. Ammɑ wom oò mɑ ci oò, wom ɑwo mɑ ci ɑwo domi wom mɑ si kɑɑ kɑm ciiti kunɑ.
Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono tɑɑbi kunɑ bɑ? À mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ goono binekɑɑne kunɑ bɑ? À mɑ sɑɑbuyom betu tɛ.
Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sindɑ bɑɑni bɑ? À mɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ jii toli ɑ̀ bɔm Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
Aduwɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ zɛnjɛkom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑɑni. Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. De ɑ̀ nɑ dulum yom tɛ mo, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndei.
Wɑ wom tɑɑli yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ. Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ domi wom mɑ du bɑɑni. Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu ɑduwɑ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ mo.
Eli yɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑɑli zɑngɑ i yom. À nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ no ndɑ niyɑ hɑri mɑ si kɑm. Hɑri mɑnɑ kɑm mɑ hɑli jiiri hinzɑ ndɑ hɑndu idu.
À ye kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ, bɛɛnɛ hɑri kɑm. Gɑndɑ nɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ hɛi.
A nyɑizei, de wom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑmbɑ cimi gɑɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti cimi di dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ wɔne bei.
Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ go dulumkoni yeti fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɑ, ɑ̀ go dulumkoni di hundi fɑɑbɑ bu gɑɑ. À gɑ ɑ̀ dulum boobo mo dɑɑbu.

Hɛɛ Piɛɛ, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no. A go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wom suubɑntɛ yom sɛ, wom kɑ wom kɑru kɑ see ko ci ceeyo yom dimi cindei lɑɑbu yom kunɑ. Wom kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom goono Pontu lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Kɑpodoce lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Azi lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Bitiniɑ lɑɑbu.

Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom suubɑ ngɑ beiyom kɑ jisi bɔm. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi Ikpɛ sɛ. À nɑ wom suubɑ wom mɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sendi gɑnɑ ko du hinnɑndiyom ɑ̀ kuri kɑkɑsuyom gɑɑ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ ndɑ bɑyom.
I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ. À suuji beeri kunɑ i du hɛiyom teji bɛɛjɛ hundikoni sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme dɔ.
I mɑ du mo tubu kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ si ziibi, kɑ ɑ̀ si dɛrɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ tubu di jisi wom sɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
Ikpɛ dɑbɑri go wom bɑtu nɑɑne dɔ fɑɑbɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ lɔkɑci kunɑ.
Wom go fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ wɔne sɑbu sɛ, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu kɑ mɑɑsɑ wom bine go sɑrɑ bɑndɑ fɔ ndɑ bubureyom dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni.
Nɑɑne kɑ wom gundɑ, ɑ̀ bubureyom bɛɛrɛ bisɑ wurɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci, kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɑɑbi zɑngɑ nini kunɑ kɑ gunɑ. À bubureyom wɔ mɑ kɑɑndɑ sɑɑbuyom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ hine.
Wom go bɑɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, bɑ kɑ wom mɑnɑ di ɑ̀. À kunɑ mo wom go fɑihã ndɑ binekɑɑne deizɑkpɛ kɑ mee si hini kɑ cii. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne mɑ, bɑ kɑ wom si di ɑ̀.
Wom kɑɑ du wom hundi yom fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ kɑ wom nɑɑne gɑ gɑɑrɛ.
Fɑɑbɑ wɔ ɑndebi yom nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ gomini kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ wom sɛ bɔm.
Ǹ ceeci kɑ bei zɑmɑni fɔ no wɑlɑ lɔkɑci fɔ no Mɛsiyɑ Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ kunɑ cɛbɛ. Biyɑ wɔ jinɑ kɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze ndɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ guruguze bɑndɑ.

Ikpɛ bine nɑ wɔne kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑndebi yom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ bɔm sɛ no ǹ nɑ ngei gbei tɛ, ɑmmɑ wom sɛ nɑ Mɑɑsɑ fɛɛkɔ yom nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ wom sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ, wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Hɛ nge yom di kunɑ no, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom go guuri ngei mɑ moo dɑm.
À sɛ no, zɑngɑ bɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ kunɑcendi hɔ gbei sɛ, zɑngɑ yɑ wɑ wom fɑhɑm sɔlu. Wɑ wom bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Wɑ wom bɛɛjɛ kulu dɛcɛ gomini bɔm, gomini kɑ Ikpɛ bɑ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ wɑtɛ.
Zɑngɑ koo yom go kɑ ngei bɑɑbɑ gɑnɑ, wɑ si wom bɔm no wom dom bineibɑɑi sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom gɔrɔ sɑɑ fɔ zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
Ammɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ, wom mo wɑ bɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom wom gɔrɛ kulu kunɑ.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Wɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ yom zɑmɑ hɛɛ yɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ no".
Wom go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛɛ wom Bɑɑbɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si ciiti ndɑ bɑɑbɑɑ tɛyom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ kulu ciiti ɑ̀ gbei bɔm. À sɛ no wom mo wom hɑndunyɑ ceeyotɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ hɑmbure.
Wom go bei mo zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ wom goonoyom kɔnu gɑɑ, goonoyom kɑ wom tubu wom cɛɛ yom dɔ. À mɑnɑ wom fɑnsɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɑlɑ wurɑ.
Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ no ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ kuri bɛɛrɛkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ zɑngɑ feejiize kuri, feejiize kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mɛrɛyom dɔ, ɑ̀ sindɑ tombi bɑ nungu fɔ.
Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ suubɑ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑndunyɑ sinji, ɑmmɑ wom sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ wom sɛ lɔkɑci beenɑntɛ yom.
À dɔ nɑ, wom go nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli wom nɑɑne ndɑ wom bɛɛjɛ mɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ bɔm.
Wom nɑ wom hundi yom hinnɑndi cimi gɑnɑyom gɑɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ hɑli wom mɑ du bɑɑkɑsine nyɑizei sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ. À sɛ no wɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ bine fɔ.
Ǹ nɑ wom hɛi iteji, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci dimiize kɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑ gɑɑ ɑmmɑ dimiize kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ gɑɑ. Dimiize di yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendi hundikoni kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Iburɑdɑm kulu goono no zɑngɑ subu. Iburɑdɑm deizɑ kulu mo goono zɑngɑ subu boosi. Subu kɔgu, boosi mo kɑm.
Ammɑ Kpe Sendi wɔ, ɑ̀ bo goono no, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom." Ngɑ di yɑ ci Bɑɑru Hinno Sendɑ kɑ i nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ fee ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ kulu ndɑ gulinci kulu ndɑ munɑficitɛrɛ ndɑ molɑgɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom kulu.
Zɑngɑ izecire yom gɑ bɑɑ woo, wom mɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendi zɑngɑ woo hinno hɑli wom mɑ du kɑ beeri.
Wom mɑ bɑɑ rɑ zɑngɑ yɑ zɑ kɑ "wom tɑbɑɑ kɑ Kpe yɑ Gominikpɛ no".
Wom go kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci tɑndi hundikoni. Dɑhiri beerem hunguɑ̀ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ ci suubɑni, bɛɛrɛkpɛ no Ikpɛ jine.

Wom mo wom bɑrɑ zɑngɑ tɑndi hundikoni yom kɑ Ikpɛ go cini ndɑ. À go fuu cini zɑngɑ Biyɑ kunɑ ŋmɔne hɑli wom mɑ ci jɑmɑ gɑrɑndikɔ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom. Wom mɑ sɑrɑɑ Biyɑ kunɑ ŋmɔne yom tɛ mo kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ tɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
À gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ cii Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kunɑ: "Gunɑ, ɑ go mimbɑri cire tɑndi sinji Sionɑ kunɑ. Tɑndi suubɑntɛ, bɛɛrɛkpɛ nɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɔɔ pɑi."
À sɛ nɑ, tondi hundikoni di gundɑ bɛɛrɛ wom dɔ, wom kɑ wom go nɑɑne. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ nɑɑne, ngɑ yɑ ci "tondi kɑ cinikɔ yom hungu, ngɑ yɑ tɛ mimbɑri cire tondi sintine".
À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Kɑtiyom tondi ndɑ dɛrɛyom tondi beeri mo no". Ǹ go kɑti ɑ̀ gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Sendi di gɑnɑ. Ǹ sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di jisi.

Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom yɑ dimi suubɑntɛ no. Wom yɑ Kpe ŋmɔne jɑmɑ sɑrɑɑ tɛkɔ yom no. Wom yɑ dimi hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ. Wom yɑ ci jɑmɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ngɑ ŋmɔne. I ci yɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ kɑ kɑɑ kube kunɑ kɑ wom dɑm ngɑ kɑɑri hinno kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ hɑnyɑ hinno fɛɛ.
Sɑɑ di wom mɑnɑ ci jɑmɑ, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne jɑmɑ. Wom mɑnɑ du suuji dom, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom du suuji.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ go wom no himmɑ wom kɑ wom ci ceeyo yom, yo yom hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Wom mɑ fee ndɑ bineibɑɑi hɛ yom kɑ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hundi.
Wom mɑ gundɑ gɔrɛ hinno dimi cindei kunɑ. Hɛ kulu kunɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ wom ciine ndɑ bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ, ǹ mɑ di wom gbei hinno yom. Cɔfɔ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ suuji cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ.
Kpe sɑbu sɛ, wom mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ iburɑdɑm yom ŋmɔne hini kulu sɛ zɑngɑ gɑndɑkpɛ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɛ kulu bɔm.
Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci beerem kɑ gɑndɑkpɛ cini dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ wɔ kɑ yom go hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ tɑɑbɑndi kɑ ihinno tɛkɔ yom sɑɑbu.
Wɔne yɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ no. Wom mɑ ihinno tɛ. Wom mɑ sɑmu yom kɑ ǹ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ sendi yom denjɑndi gbei hinno tɛyom gɑɑ.
Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔcini yom. Wɑ si wom bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ tɛ zɑngɑ dɑɑbiri kɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ dɑɑbu, ɑmmɑ wɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ tɑm yom.
Wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ iburɑdɑm kulu sɛ. Wɑ bɑɑ nyɑizei. Wɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. Wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ sɛ.
Gbeiize yom, wom mɑ ye gɑndɑ wom kpe yom sɛ hɑmburu kunɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kpe hinno yom sɛ wɑlɑ kpe bɑɑnɔ yom hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ ndɑ kpe gɑɑbɔ yom mo sɛ.
Ngɑ di yɑ sɑbɑ de bɔrɔ go tɑɑbi jɛrɛ bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ Ikpɛ jine, ɑ̀ nɑ ci ɑ̀ tɑɑli sɑbu sɛ.
Bɛɛrɛ fɔ yɑ goono de wom tɑɑli sɑbu sɛ ǹ gɑ wom lunkutɛ, wom gɑ hini suuru? Ammɑ de wom go hini suuru tɑɑbi kunɑ ihinno kɑ wom go tɛ sɑbu sɛ, ngɑ yɑ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo tɑɑbi i sɛ. À nɑ deedɑndi nɑm i sɛ kɑ wom mɑ ngɑ cee lɑwɑli yom gɑnɑ.
À mɑnɑ dulum fɔ kulu tɛ, ɑ̀ mee kunɑ mo gulinci sendi mɑnɑ hunu.
Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ woo, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ woo kɑ bɑnɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbɑndi, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tu ifutu. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɑlifi no Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go ciiti ndɑ cɛyom susu gɑɑ.
Ngɑ bumbum nɑ i dulum yom jɛrɛ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji tuuri gɑɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ bu dulum yom sɛ kɑ hunɑ mo cɛyom susu sɛ. Wom du bɑɑni mo ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ mee yom gɑɑ.
Dom wom gɔrɔ bibirɑntɛ yom zɑngɑ feeji yom, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom ye Kurukɔ dɔ, wom hundi yom Bɑtukɔ.
Yɑ nɑ wom mo wɛndɛ yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom kunye yom sɛ. Bɑ de ɑfɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ si Sendɑ bɛɛrɑndi, wom gɔrɛ gɑɑ bɑ mee sendi si, wom mɑ ǹ cendi.
Wom gɑ ǹ cendi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di wom gɔrɛ hinno ndɑ wom bɔrɔ dɑmyom.
Wom tɑɑlɑm mo ɑ̀ mɑ si ci mɑɑ gɑɑ tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ turu ndɑ wurɑ kɔlibɛ yom ndɑ jiine cɑɑdɑntɛ yom.
Ammɑ wom tɑɑlɑm mɑ ci bine kunɑ ŋmɔne. Ngɑ yɑ ci bine bɑɑnɔ ndɑ bine bɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ. À gundɑ bɛɛrɛ mo Ikpɛ jine.
Dom di, wɛndɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ngei kunye yom sɛ. Yɑ nɑ ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ ngei bɔm tɑɑlɑm.
Zɑngɑ yɑ Sɑhɑrɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ sendi gɑnɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ kpe. Sɑhɑrɑ gɑɑ bine no wom weibɔrɔ yom, wom hunu kɑ tɛ koo weibɔrɔ yom ko kɑ ihinno tɛ. Hɑmburu fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dii kɑ wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi.

Yɑ no wom mo kunye yom, wɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wom wɛndɛ yom ndɑ lɑɑkɑli ko fɑhɑm ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ. Wom mo bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ngei mo go gomini kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi tubu ndɑ wom mefɔ. Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ hɛ fɔ kulu mɑ si du kɑ tɛ kpɛsɛrɛ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom sɛ.
À bɑndɑ wom kulu, wɑ gundɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku. Wɑ tɔ ndɑ sisibi cɛrɛ sɛ. Wɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛbɛ nyɑizei sɛ. Wɑ ci suujɑntɛ yom, bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom.
Wɑ si ilɑlɔ bɑnɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ. Wɑ si woobi bɑndɑ ndɑ woobi. Ammɑ wɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ hɑli wom mɑ bɑrikɑ di tubu.
Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ hundi kɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ di hɑnu hinno yom, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ dɛɛnɛ jɛ ilɑlɔ gɑɑ. À mee mɑ mɑ si gulunci sendi yom cii.
À mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ilɑlɔ sɛ kɑ ihinno tɛ. À mɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmine.
Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu gɑɑ no Kpe moo goono. À hɑngɑ mo goono ǹ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ. Ammɑ Kpe moodumɑ bɛrɛ kɑ hungu wɔ kɑ yom gɑ kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ."
Mee bine yɑ go hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ wom sɛ de wom gundɑ ihinno tɛyom himmɑ?
Ammɑ bɑ de wom go tɑɑbi cɛyom susu gbei tɛyom sɑbu sɛ, wom ci bɑrikɑkpɛ yom. Wɑ si hɑmburu iburɑdɑm yom sendi futu yom. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu mo.

Wɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe wom bine yom kunɑ. Sɑɑ kulu wom mo goono sɔlɑntɛ mo kɑ tu kɑ yeti beerem kulu sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ gɑ wom hã bɛɛjɛ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ. Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ ndɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ hɑmburu.
Wɑ gundɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno mo. Yɑ no sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go wom ciine ndɑ bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ go wom gɔrɛ hinno kɑ wom gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ sendi yɑmu, ɑkpɛ yom mɑ hɔɔ.
De Ikpɛ binebɑɑ no bɔrɔ mɑ tɑɑbi ihinno tɛyom sɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ bɔrɔ mɑ tɑɑbi ilɑlɔ tɛyom sɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ mo bu ce fɔ pɑp dulum yom sɑbu sɛ. Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cɛsusukpɛ bu beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛsusu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpeindɑ i yom Ikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑmmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hunɑndi.
Biyɑ wɔ kunɑ no ɑ̀ kpei wɑɑzu biyɑ yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono jisɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ.
Beerem wɔ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ dom sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ suuru kuku ko bɑtu Nowe wɑtɛ. Sɑɑ di no, Nowe go hɑrihi tɛ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ cɛnɑ fɔ, wɑtom bɔrɔ ɑhɑku, fɑɑbɑ hɑri kɑmbɛ.

Hɑri ngɑ di mirɑndiyom yɑɑse no kɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go wom fɑɑbɑ. À mɑnɑ ci gɑɑhɑm hinnɑndiyom ziibi gɑɑ no, ɑmmɑ sɛdɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bine kunɑ sendi hinno gɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔ hɛrɛ. À go wom fɑɑbɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tunuyom bukɔei dɔ.
À kpei bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ kɑmbɛ ŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom ndɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ yom kulu yeti gɑndɑ ɑ̀ cire.
Ngɑ di sɛ zɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze i sɛ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, wom mo wɑ niyɑ fɔlɔnku hɔ wom gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ guruguze gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ɑkpɛ nɑ dulum nɑm.
À sɛ no, ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm hundi kɑ ɑ̀ cindi kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si hunɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ.
À wɑsɑ i sɛ lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ i gɔrɔ kɑ dimi cindei binebɑɑ tɛ. Dom i dirɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ bineibɑɑi ndɑ bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu ndɑ hɑnɑsuɑ ndɑ bɛnɛbɛnɛ yom ndɑ tooru gɑnɑyom kɑ Ikpɛ fɛntɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ mɑ beerem mɑmɑci ndɑ wom zɑmɑ wom si meigu ndei ko bɛnɛbɛnɛ tɛ kɑ bisɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ go wom woo.
Beerem wɔ gɑ ngei tɛgbei yom deede Ikpɛ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu kɑ hundikoni yom ndɑ bukɔ yom ciiti.
À sɛ no ǹ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ beerem wɔ sɛ kɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ bu, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du ciitiyom iburɑdɑm yom dɔ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ hunɑ ngei biyɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ jine.
Bine hɛ kulu beeniyom mɑɑni. Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ wom bɔm ci bɔrɔ kɑ sɑɑle dɑm ɑduwɑ tɛyom gɑɑ.
Ammɑ ǹ kulu bɔm yɑ ci wɑ gundɑ cɛrɛ bɑɑkɑsine kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, zɑmɑ dulum boobo no bɑɑkɑsine gɑ dɑɑbu.
Wɑ yɑrɛ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ, gunugunu mɑ si.
Zɑngɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu du Ikpɛ noyom, wɑ ɑ̀ dɑm cɛrɛ gɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gomini dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni bɑndɑbɔrɔ hinno yom.

De bɔrɔ fɔ go sendi, ɑ̀ mɑ sendi ndɑ Ikpɛ meecine. De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ tɑmtɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ Ikpɛ go kɑɑndɑ, hɑli ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi hɛ kulu kunɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ngɑ wɔ deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ goono ɑ̀ sɛ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom guruguze kɔnnɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɛ kɑ wom bubure, wɑ si nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ wom mɑmɑci.
Ammɑ zɑ kɑ wom gundɑ bɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze kunɑ, wɑ fɑihã zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ deizɑ kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ mo wom mɑ hurɑ fɑihã ndɑ munyɑ kunɑ.

De beerem nɑ wom yɑnce Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ, wom ci binekɑɑnekpɛ yom. Biyɑ deizɑkpɛ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ Biyɑ ɑ̀ goono wom bɔm. Cimi no, ngei wɔ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi yɑmu kɑ cɛnɑndi ɑmmɑ wom wɔ, wom gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
Ammɑ wom kunɑ, bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si tɑɑbi zɑngɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ wɑlɑ zee, wɑlɑ zɑngɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ wɑlɑ zɑngɑ ɑsiiri ŋmɑni yom kunɑ mee dɑmkɔ.
De bɔrɔ go tɑɑbi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ, hɑwi mɑ si ɑ̀ dii, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ.
Lɔkɑci bɑ kɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ mɑ sinti ciitiyom ndɑ Ikpɛ fuu. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ sinti ndɑ i yom, mɛtɛ yɑ kɑɑ ci beerem wɔ kɔkɔrɔ, nge yom kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno gɑnɑ?
"De kɑlɑ dɑcɑti no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu du fɑɑbɑ, mɛtɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu Ikpɛ ndɑ dulumkoni mo kɑɑ bɑrɑ?"
À sɛ no, beerem kɑ ǹ go tɑɑbi Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bɔm, ǹ mɑ ngei hundi tɑlifi Tɑkɑkɔ nɑɑnekpɛ gɑɑ ko kɑ ihinno tɛ.
Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ goono wom kunɑ, ɑ go kɑ ǹ no himmɑ, hɛɛ mo kɑ ɑ bɑrɑ hɑikusu zɑngɑ ngei. A go tɛ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze sɛdɑ. A gundɑ bɑ mo deizɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
A gɑ wom no himmɑ wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Ikpɛ kuru kɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi wom gɑɑ zɑngɑ kurukɔ. Wom mɑ si tɛ mo ndɑ tilɑsi ɑmmɑ ndɑ binebɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Wom mɑ si tɛ mo liibɑ ziibɔ sɛ ɑmmɑ ndɑ bɔm noyom.
Wom mɑ si dɑbɑri kuru di bɔm kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm wom kɑmbɛ ɑmmɑ wom mɑ ci deedɑndi kuru di sɛ.
Sɑɑ kɑ Kurukɔ Beeri kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ, wom kɑɑ du tukunsi fulɑ deizɑkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ.

Yɑ no wom mo hɑiwɑsu yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom sɛ. Wom kulu, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ cɛrɛ sɛ. Wɑ bɑɑniyom dɑm zɑngɑ jiinei dɑmyom zɑmɑ "Ikpɛ go hungu bɔmbɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go gomini no bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom sɛ."
Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ kɑmbɛ dɑbɑrikpɛ mɑ wom yeti gɑndɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ wom bɛɛrɑndi sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci kɑɑ.
Wɑ wom kɑrihã kulu dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli bo goono wom gɑɑ.
Wɑ wom bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Wɑ bɑtu. Wom zojikɑri, Ibilisi go wom hundi kɑ dure zɑngɑ muusu beeri. À go ceeci bɔrɔ kɑ ngɑ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
Wɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ zɑ kɑ wom sinji kɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ. Wom go bei tɑɑbi fɔlɔnku yom yɑ go tɛ wom nyɑize yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ.

Ammɑ Ikpɛ, gomini kulu Kpe, ɑ̀ no wom cɛɛ ngɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni dɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ wom tɑɑbi bɑndɑ fɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ngɑ bumbum yɑ kɑɑ wom tɔɑndi. À kɑɑ wom tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ wom bine yom no gɑɑbi. À kɑɑ wom sinji mo.
Deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
A nɑ tirɑ cɛnɑ wɔ hɑntum wom sɛ ndɑ Silɑfim gɑɑkɑsine, ngɑ kɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu nyɑize nɑɑnekpɛ. A go wom no himmɑ ko tɛ sɛdɑ wom sɛ kɑ wɔne yɑ ci Ikpɛ gomini cimi cimi. Wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
Mɑrgɑ suubɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑbiloni kpɑɑrɑ ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ. Yɑ no ɑ ize Mɑɑku.
Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ wom kulu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ Simɔ Piɛɛ, hɛɛ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ diyɑ. A go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wɔm sɛ wom kɑ wom du nɑɑne bɛɛrɛkpɛ ndɑ i yom, i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ cɛyom susu gɑɑ.
Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu beiyom kunɑ.
Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛtɛrɛ dɑbɑri nɑ i nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi i mɑ hunɑ ndɑ, ɑ̀ beiyom dɔ. Ngɑ yɑ nɑ i cɛɛ ngɑ deizɑ dɔ ndɑ ngɑ booriyom dɔ.
Yɑ mo no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli bɛɛrɛkpɛ bɑmbɑtɑ bɑmbɑtɑ yom tɛ i sɛ. À nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom di no zɑmɑ wom mɑ meigu ndɑ Ikpɛ hɑɑli zɑ kɑ wom kɔmɑ fumbi wɔne gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ bineibɑɑi sɑbu sɛ.
Ngɑ di bumbum sɛ mo no, wom kulu wɑ himmɑ dɑm kɑ booriyom tɔntɔnu wom nɑɑne gɑɑ, booriyom gɑɑ mo beire.
Beire gɑɑ mo wɑ bɔm hiniyom tɔntɔnu. Bɔm hiniyom gɑɑ mo, wɑ suuru tɔntɔnu. Suuru gɑɑ mo, wɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom tɔntɔnu.
Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ mo, wɑ nyɑize bɑɑkɑsine tɔntɔnu. Nyɑize bɑɑkɑsine gɑɑ mo wɑ bɑɑkɑsine tɔntɔnu.
À himɑ hɛ nge yom di mɑ goono wom gɑɑ kɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu mo zɑmɑ ǹ nɑm wom mɑ si gɔrɔ kɔnu. Ǹ nɑm wom mɑ si zɑm bɑrikɑ mɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ beiyom kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ hɛ nge yom di si ɑ̀ gɑɑ, diyom dumbɔkpɛ no zɑngɑ dɑnɑm no. À dinigɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ hinnɑndi ngɑ dom dulum yom gɑɑ.
À sɛ no, nyɑizei, wɑ himmɑ dɑm kɑ bei ndɑ cimi Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ wom suubɑ. Ngɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, wom si kɑti pɑi.
Yɑ no Ikpɛ kɑɑ tu wom sɛ wom mɑ huro ndɑ bɛɛrɛ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ, ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom kunɑ.
À sɛ no, ɑ go wetere kɑ wom hɔngɑndi hɛ nge yom di sɑɑ kulu. Wom go hɛ nge yom di bei zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom sinji kɑ boori cimi kunɑ.
Oò, ɑ go lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɑbɑ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ kuuru bukɑ, yɑ wom hɔngɑndi hɛ nge yom di.
A bei kɑ ɑ buyom mɑɑni kɑ yɑ fee ndɑ kuuru bukɑ wɔ zɑngɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ.
Ammɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ wetere kulu tɛ hɑli bɑ ɑ dirɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bu, wom mo hɔngɔ hɛ nge yom di lɔkɑci kulu.
Hɛ kɑ sɛ ɑ gɑ kɑ nge yom di cii yɑ ci kɑ i mɑnɑ jendi cɛmbɛrɛkpɛ yom gɑnɑ. Ammɑ i nɑm wom nɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑyom bei. I tɛ sɛdɑ mo ndɑ moo, i yom kɑ i di ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ.
À du bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, sɑɑ kɑ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ deizɑ kulu dɔ kɑ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm. À cii: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji, kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ du binekɑɑne.
I yom mɑ, i mɑɑ jinde ngɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ sɑɑ kɑ i goono Yesu bɑndɑ tɑndi kuku hɑlɑɑlɑ bɔm.

I gundɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi mo kɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑi kɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ i di. Wom go tɛ ihinno kɑ wom go lɑɑkɑli yeti ɑ̀ gɑɑ zɑngɑ wom gɑ lɑɑkɑli yeti fitilɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑri kube kunɑ. À gɑ kɑɑri kɑlɑ mɑ mɑ sinti boyom, susubɑ hɑndɑriyɑize mo mɑ tunu kɑ kɑɑri wom bine yom kunɑ.
Wom mɑ wɔne bei mɑ jinɑ, Ikpɛ Sendi kunɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ kulu sindɑ fɑsɑliyom bɔrɔ fɑhɑm bɔm.
Andebitɛrɛ mɑnɑ hunu bɔrɔ fɔ binebɑɑ dɔ, bɑ ce fɔ. Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne bɔrɔ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom fum hɑli ǹ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom cii.

Andebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom goono jɑmɑ di kunɑ dɑm. Zɑngɑ yɑ mɑɑsɑ cooɑndikɔ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ goono wom gɑme kunɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ mɔnɔ kɑ huro kɑ kɑɑndɑ cɛbɛ yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ cimi, cɛbɛ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ hɑlɑciyom. Bɑ Kpe mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dei, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ ze. Ǹ kɑɑ hɑlɑciyom cendi ndɑ wɑɑsi ngei bɔm.
Bɔrɔ boobo bine gɑ ǹ gɑnɑ ǹ hɑlɑciyom kunɑ. Ǹ sɑbu sɛ no, ǹ go cimi fɔndɔ di sendi yɑmu.
Hɛ bɑɑyom futu gɑɑ no cooɑndikɔ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ wom fɑfɑgu ndɑ ngei sendi zɑmbɑkpɛ yom. Ammɑ zɑ dom Ikpɛ jisi kɑ ǹ ciiti, ɑ̀ si jɛ. Ǹ hɑlɑciyom bɑ tɔ.
Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ bɑkɑɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cetu ciyomɑ guusu guusɔ kunɑ. Ǹ goono hɔɑntɛ nungu kɑ kube goono. À nɑ ǹ jisi ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ sɛ.
Bine, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ dɑm jinɑ hɑndunyɑ bɑkɑɑ kɑlɑ Nowe kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɑndiyom susu fɛɛkɔ. À nɑ Nowe fɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ iye fɔ mɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri tɑm hɑndunyɑ beerem bɔm kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ ǹ hɑlɑci. À nɑ ǹ zeeri kɑ ǹ yeti boosu. À gɑɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ tɛ deedɑndi beerem sɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
À nɑ Lotu kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu kɑɑ. Lotu bine sɑrɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ tɛkɔ yom hɑwizetɛrɛ gɔrɛ.
Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu wɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ gɔrɛ tɛ ǹ gɑme. À nɑ ngɑ hundi cɛɑntɛ susu tɑɑbɑndi mɑ ifutu futu mɑ kɑ bɑ kulu beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ si ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ, ǹ tɛyom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di kɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
Zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ngɑ di tɛ Lotu sɛ, ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑni kɑ ngɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom kɑɑ tɑɑbi kunɑ. À ŋmɑɑni kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛɑndi susu jisi ciiti hɑnu sɛ ǹ mɑ du bɔnɑndiyom.

Yɑ mɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ kɑ bɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ǹ bine ziibɑndi. Ǹ gɑ meirekpɛ fɛntɛ mɑ. Binesɛndɔkpɛ yom nɑ, tɔtɔkpɛ yom. Ǹ si hɑmburu kɑ gɑsi mɑ ndɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ bɛɛnɛ deizɑ kpɛ yom woo.
Bɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑɑbi ndɑ dɑbɑri kɑ bisei ǹ si kɑɑndɑ woobi ciiti ǹ bɔm Kpe jine.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ nge yom di zɑm lɑsɑbu nɑ zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hɛi ǹ mɑ dii kɑ hɑlɑci sɛ. Beerem wɔ gɑ sendi kɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si fɑhɑm woo. Ǹ kɑɑ hɑlɑci nɑ ngei hɑsɑrɔ sɑbu sɛ.

Ǹ bɑ du ngei tɛyom kɑ ǹ sindɑ cɛyom susu bɑnɑndi. Ǹ ci beerem kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ ngei bineibɑɑi tɛ ko fɑɑriŋmɑɑ zɑɑri kpɑrɛ kunɑ. Beerem nɑ kɑ ǹ ci zɑngɑ tombi yom ndɑ ziibi yom. Ǹ go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ ngei zɑmbɑ kunɑ kɑ jingɑru ŋmɑɑ ndɑ wom.
Zinɑ mookpɛ yom no kɑ ǹ si cɛ mo ndɑ dulum tɛyom pɑi. Ǹ go beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sinji kɑ boori hiri kɑ dii. Ǹ nɑ ngei bine dɔnɑndi hɛ bɑɑyom futu. Lɑɑliize yom mo no.
Ǹ nɑ fɔndɔ cɛɑntɛ nɑm kɑ dɛrɛ. Bine, ǹ go ɑndebi Bɑlɑm, Bezo koo fɔndɔ gɑnɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ cɛyom susu bɑnɑndi.
Ammɑ fɑrikɑ fɔ nɑ Bɑlɑm dulum bɔgu ɑ̀ bɔm. Fɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si sendi, sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm jinde. À nɑ ɑndebi di hɔllɔkomtɛrɛ jɛ.
Bɔrɔ nge yom di bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ tondi guusu fɔci yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɑri, buru yom kɑ hɑri hɛo feeni. Ikpɛ nɑ kube bi tici tici nungu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom jisi ǹ sɛ.
Ǹ go fɑɑre sendi kɔnu yom cii. Ǹ go beerem hiri kɑ dii bineibɑɑi gɑɑ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ tɛyom gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ kɔmɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono dɛrɛyom kunɑ dɔ.
Ǹ gɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ǹ sɛ bɑ kɑ ngei bumbum gɑ ci fumbi tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑŋmɑɑ bɔrɔ bɔm, bɔrɔ ci ɑ̀ sɛ tɑm noyɑ.

Ǹ kɔmɑ hɑndunyɑ ziibi yom gɑɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ ɑ̀ beiyom dɔ. À bɑndɑ de ǹ kɑɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ wuluwɑli hɑndunyɑ ziibi yom kunɑ, hɑndunyɑ wɔ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm. Ǹ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ goonoyom, ɑ̀ jɑɑsɑ sintine gɔrɛ.
Ǹ mɑ si cɛyom susu fɔndɔ bei ɑ̀ bisɑ, de sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ meire hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ no ǹ sɛ.
Hɛ kɑ yɑɑse wɔne gɑ cii, dɑhiri no ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ gɑɑ. "Hɑnsi go ye hɛ kɑ ngɑ bumbum yeeri gɑɑ". Kpɛɛnɛ, "kpisɔ nyɑ kɑ ǹ nyume, ɑ̀ ye kɑ bimbilo bɔtɔgɔ kunɑ".
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ go tirɑ hinkɑntɛ wɔ hɑntum wom sɛ. Tirɑ wɔne kunɑ hɑli wɔ di kunɑ, ɑ gɑ wom fɑhɑm hinno yom tunɑndi ko wom hɔngɑndi.
Wom mɑ hɔngɔ sendi yom kɑ ɑndebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom jinɑ kɑ cii. Wom mɑ hɔngɔ mo Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ ɑ̀ meire kɑ i yom, ɑ̀ diyɑ yom cii.
Wɑ wɔne bei jinɑ kɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑnu yom kunɑ, dondɑcɛrɛkpɛ yom kɑɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi yom gɑnɑ.
Ǹ kɑɑ cii: Sɑɑ fɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑyom ɑlikɑwɑli tɔ? Sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i go hã yɑ ci kɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ cɛɛ yom bu, hɛ kulu goono zɑngɑ ǹ goono zɑ Ikpɛ sinti kɑ hɛ yom tɑkɑ.
Mure kunɑ no, ǹ go dinigɑ kɑ Ikpɛ mee sendi bɔm no bɛɛnɛ goono zɑ dɑm. Yɑ no gɑndɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ hunu hɑri kunɑ kɑ goono hɑri bindi bindi Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑɑ.
Yɑ no, hɑndunyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono dom, ɑ̀ hɑlɑci sɑɑ kɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri nɑ ɑ̀ gɔnu.
Ammɑ ndɑ sendi fɔlɔnku Ikpɛ nɑ mɑɑsɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑndɑ jisi nini sɛ. À go kɑ ǹ jɛ ciiti hɑnu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ciiti kɑ ǹ hɑlɑci.
Ammɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, wom mɑ si dinigɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ neyɑ. Hɑnu fɔlɔnku Kpe dɔ zɑngɑ jiiri dubu fɔ no. Jiiri dubu mo zɑngɑ hɑnu fɔlɔnku nɑ.
Kpe si mure pɑi ndɑ ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɔnɑndiyom, zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ suuru kuku i sɛ. À si bɑɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ hɑlɑci, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ.

Ammɑ Kpe Hɑnu bɑ kɑɑ no, zɑngɑ zee cini kɑɑ ciini kunɑ. Hɑnu ngɑ di, bɛɛnɛ kɑɑ bisɑ ndɑ kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ. Hɛ yom kulu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɛ ndei, ǹ kɑɑ dungu kɑ mɛnɛ. Gɑndɑ mɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ, nini gɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
Zɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ yɑ di, ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ bɑrɑ gɔrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom kunɑ.
À himɑ wom mɑ Ikpɛ Hɑnu bɑtu ndɑ bɛɛjɛ kɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑsɑ. Hɑnu ngɑ di wɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑyom sɑbu sɛ, bɛɛnɛ kɑɑ dii ndɑ nini kɑ hɑlɑci. Bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom mo kɑɑ mɛnɛ ndɑ dunguɛ.
Ammɑ Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli bɔm, i go bɛɛnɛ teji yom ndɑ gɑndɑ teji bɑtu, nungu yom kɑ cɛɑndiyom susu goono ndɑ gɔrɛ.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, zɑ kɑ wom go hɛ nge yom di bɑtu ndɑ bɛɛjɛ wɑ himmɑ dɑm. Kpe mɑ wom gɑru tombi si, tɑɑli si lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ.
Wɑ i Kpe suuru kuku lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ fɑɑbɑ lɔkɑci. Ngɑ nɑ i nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ Pɔlu hɑntum wom sɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no bɔm.

Yɑ mɑ nɑ Pɔlu hɑntum ngɑ tirɑ yom kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di sendi tɛ. Hɛ fɔ yom mo goono ɑ̀ tirɑ yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ fɑɑhɑmyom gɑɑbu. Hɛ yom wɔ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sinji kɑ boori go kɑ ǹ siirɑndi. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cindei mɑ siirɑndi ko kpei ngei bɔm hɑlɑciyom gɑɑ.
Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, zɑ kɑ wom jinɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di bei, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ si ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ mɑ si wom cendi dɛrɛyom kunɑ hɑli wom kɑɑ kɑm wom sinjiyom kunɑ.
Ammɑ wo beeri i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ ɑ̀ gomini ndɑ ɑ̀ beiyom kunɑ. Deizɑ mɑ bɑrɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, mɑɑsɑ kɑlɑ kɑ kpei, beeniyom si. Ami.
I go hɑntum wom sɛ Sendi hundikpɛ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ sintine kom, wɔ kɑ i mɑɑ, wɔ kɑ i di ndɑ i moo yom, wɔ kɑ i gunɑ, wɔ kɑ i kɑmbɛ yom nɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ.
Hundi di bine hunutɛrɛ. I di ɑ̀ mo. I go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru cii, Hundi di kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Ngɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ.
Wɔ kɑ i di, wɔ kɑ i mɑɑ, ngɑ no i go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru cii wom sɛ domi wom mo, wom mɑ ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ i yom. Ndɑ cimi i go ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ no ndɑ ɑ̀ Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
I bine go hɛ nge yom di hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom binekɑɑne mɑ tɔ.
Bɑɑru di bine neyɑ kɑ i mɑɑ Izɑ dɔ kɑ i go fɛɛ wom sɛ: Ikpɛ yɑ Kɑɑrikpɛ no. Kube si ɑ̀ kunɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
De i gɑ cii i ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ ɑmmɑ i gɑ dirɑ kube kunɑ, i go tɑngɑri. I si bo cimi gbei tɛ.
Ammɑ de i go dirɑ kɑɑri kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ bumbum goono kɑɑri kunɑ, i ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ cɛrɛ. À Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kuri mo, ɑ̀ go kɑ i hinnɑndi dulum kulu gɑɑ.
De i go cii i sindɑ dulum, i gɑ kɑ i bɔm zɑmbɑ. Cimi si i kunɑ.
De i gɑ kɑ i dulum yom cii, ngɑ wɔ Nɑɑnekpɛ no, Cɛsusukpɛ mo no, ɑ̀ gɑ i yɑɑfɑ ndɑ i dulum yom. À gɑ i hinnɑndi mɑ i tɛyom kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ cɛsusu gɑɑ.
De i go cii i mɑnɑ dulum tɛ, i go kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ tɑngɑrikpɛ noyɑ. À Sendɑ mo si i kunɑ.
A koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ gɑ wɔne yom hɑntum wom sɛ nɑ domi wom mɑ si dulum tɛ. De bine mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ dulum tɛ, i gundɑ Gɑɑkɔ fɔ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cɛsusukpɛ.
Ngɑ mɑ yɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndiyom hɛ i dulum yom sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci i ŋmɔne yom hinne sɛ bo, ɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu sɛ mɑ.
De i go kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no i tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ bei.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ, tɑngɑrikom no, cimi si ɑkpɛ kunɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ Sendi gɑnɑ, Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kube ɑkpɛ kunɑ. Wɔne gɑɑ no, i bo bei i goono ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑkpɛ mo dirɑ zɑngɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dirɑ.
A nyɑizei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci meire teji nɑ ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ, ɑmmɑ meire zeenu no kɑ wom du zɑ sintine. Meire zeenɔ yɑ ci Sendɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine.
Bine ɑ gɑ meire teji hɑntum wom sɛ, meire kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ ndɑ wom kunɑ. Kube go bisɑ, cɔfɔ kɑɑri cimi cimi hɑɑgɑ kɔ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ goono kɑɑri kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bine hungu ngɑ nyɑize, kube kunɑ nɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize, ɑ̀ goono kɑɑri kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Hɛ fɔ kulu si ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ hɑitɑ.
Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine hungu ngɑ nyɑize, ɑkpɛ goono kube kunɑ. À gɑ dirɑ mɑ kube kunɑ. À si bei nungu kɑ ngɑ go kpei zɑmɑ kube nɑ ɑ̀ dɑnɑndi.
Koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ no domi Ikpɛ nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom dulum yom Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.

Bɑɑbɑ yom, ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom go bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ sintine kom. Hɑiwɑsu yom, ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ no, domi wom gɑɑŋmɑɑ Ilɑlɔ bɔm. Koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom nɑ Bɑɑbɑ bei.

Bɑɑbɑ yom, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom nɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ sintine kom bei. Hɑiwɑsu yom, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom gundɑ gɑɑbi. Ikpɛ Sendɑ mo goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Wom gɑɑŋmɑɑ mɑ Ilɑlɔ bɔm.
Wɑ si bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɑlɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ, bɑɑkɑsine Bɑɑbɑ sɛ si ɑkpɛ kunɑ.
Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ hunu Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ dɔ. Ngei yɑ ci bineibɑɑi ndɑ hɛ kɑ moo di kulu ɑ̀ mɑ bɑɑ, ndɑ hundi ibɑɑi fɑɑre.
Hɑndunyɑ ndɑ ngɑ bineibɑɑi go beeni. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ bɑ gɔrɔ beeniyom si.
Koo cɛnɑ yom, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ guuru nee. Wom mɑɑ ǹ cii Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri go kɑɑ. Bɑ mɑɑsɑ Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri boobo tunu. À sɛ no i bei kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ guuru di no.
Ǹ hunu i kunɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci i ŋmɔne yom. De i ŋmɔne yom no, dom ǹ go gɔrɔ i gɑme. Ammɑ ǹ fee ndɑ i yom zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ cɛbɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ ǹ kulu mɑnɑ ci i ŋmɔne yom.
Wom wɔ, wom du jii toliyom kɑ ɑ̀ ci suubɑyom sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ dɔ. Wom go hɛ kulu bei mo.
Yɑ nɑ hɑntum wom sɛ zɑmɑ kɑ wom si cimi bei bo, ɑmmɑ kɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ bei sɛ no. Wom go bei mo tɑngɑri bɑ ɑfɔ si hunu cimi kunɑ.
Mee yɑ ci tɑngɑrikpɛ? Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii Yesu mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Akpɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri kɑ ɑ̀ go Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ize ze.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Izɑ ze, ɑkpɛ sindɑ Bɑɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ndɑ ngɑ mee ngɑ wɔ Ize di ŋmɔne nɑ, ɑkpɛ gundɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo.
À sɛ no, hɛ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine, wɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mo goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. De hɛ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, wom mo, wom kɑɑ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ Ize ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ.
Alikɑwɑli kɑ ngɑ bumbum tɛ i sɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
A nɑ wɔne yom hɑntum wom sɛ mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ wom dɛrɑndi.

Wom wɔ, toliyom suubɑyom sɛdɑ kɑ wom du Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ dɔ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ hɑli wom si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ wom cɛbɛ. Ammɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ toliyom suubɑyom sɛdɑ go wom cɛbɛ hɛ kulu, ngɑ mo yɑ ci cimi. À mɑnɑ ci tɑngɑri. Ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛbɛ, wom mo goono ɑ̀ kunɑ yɑ di ndɑ gɔrɛ.
Mɑɑsɑ koo cɛnɑ yom, wom mo goono ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ domi sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunu tɛrɛ i mɑ yɑru. Hɑwi mɑ si i dii ɑ̀ jine ɑ̀ kɑɑyom gɑɑ.
De wom go bei ngɑ yɑ cɛsusu no, wom mɑ bei mo bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ dɔ no ǹ nɑ ɑkpɛ hɛi.
Wɑ gunɑ fɑ bɑɑkɑsine dimi kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ i no hɑli ǹ mɑ i cɛɛ Ikpɛ ize yom. À sɛ no, hɑndunyɑ si i bei domi hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bei.
A bine bɑɑkɔ yom, mɑɑsɑ i bɑrɑ nɑ Ikpɛ ize yom. Hɛ kɑ i kɑɑ ci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hunutɛrɛ jinɑ. Ammɑ i go bei sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunutɛrɛ i kɑɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ domi i kɑɑ di ɑ̀ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ goono.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛjɛ ngɑ di Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm hinnɑndi zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ hinne.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bo dulum tɛ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ tɑɑmu. Dulum bine yɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑ si ndɑ fɔndɑ.
Wom bine go bei kɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunutɛrɛ nɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ i dulum yom kɑɑ. Dulum mo si ɑ̀ kunɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑ̀ si bo dulum tɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dulum tɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑnɑ di Mɛsiyɑ no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei mo.
Koo cɛnɑ yom, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bo cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu zɑngɑ Yesu ci Cɛsusukpɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dulum tɛ, Ibilisi dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Zɑ sintine no Ibilisi cini ko dulum tɛ. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ Ize hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Ibilisi gbei yom hɑlɑci.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ si bo dulum tɛ domi Ikpɛ dumɑi goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. À si hini ko dulum tɛ domi ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ.
Wɔne gɑɑ no, ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ ize yom ndɑ Ibilisi ize yom fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. Yɑ nɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize mo.
Bɑɑru kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine, ngɑ neyɑ. I mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ Kɑinu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ilɑlɔ ŋmɔne. À bine tɔ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ wi. Ifɔ sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ wi? À nɑ ɑ̀ wi nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom bɑrɑ ilɑlɔ yom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ gbei yom cɛyom susu ŋmɔne yom no.
Nyɑizei, wɑ si mɑmɑci de hɑndunyɑ bine go hungu wom.
I go bei i bisɑ bu gɑɑ kɑ tɔ hundi dɔ domi i go bɑɑ i nyɑize yom. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine ngɑ nyɑize sɛ, ɑkpɛ goono bu kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bine go hungu ngɑ nyɑize, bɔrɔ wikɔ no. Wom go bei kɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni ngɑ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
Wɔne gɑɑ nɑ i go kɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine bei domi Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ hundi no i sɑbu sɛ. À himɑ i mɑ i hundi yom mɑ no nyɑize yom sɑbu sɛ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ hundi sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ di mo ngɑ nyɑize bɑnji kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sisibi ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑngɑ mɛtɛ dimi nɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ?
A koo cɛnɑ yom, i bɑɑkɑsine mɑ si tɛ sendi gɑɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ hinje kpɑrɛ hinne, ɑmmɑ tɛyom gɑɑ cimi kunɑ.
Ngɑ di gɑɑ no, i go bei i yom yɑ cimi bɔrɔ yom nɑ. I gɑ i bine tɑbɑi Ikpɛ jine mo.
Bɑ de i bine go kɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri, i go bei Ikpɛ beeri kɑ bisɑ i bine yom. À go hɛ kulu bei mo.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, de i bine si kɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri kulu i yɑru Ikpɛ jine.
Hɛ kulu kɑ i go ŋmɑɑrɛ i go du ɑ̀ Ikpɛ dɔ, zɑmɑ i go kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ. I go tɛ mo hɛ yom kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ̀ meire. I mɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. I mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ meire kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i nɑ goono ndɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ikpɛ mo goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Wɔne gɑɑ no i go bei kɑ Ikpɛ goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no gɑɑ.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ si cimɑndi biyɑ kulu gɑɑ ɑmmɑ wɑ biyɑ yom bubure kɑ di hɑli de Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom no. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ domi ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri boobo go seesee hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Wɔne gɑɑ no wom go kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ bei. Biyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, biyɑ ngɑ di Ikpɛ ŋmɔne nɑ.
Biyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, biyɑ ngɑ di mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. Biyɑ di yɑ Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri nɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ, kɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɔ.
Koo cɛnɑ yom, wom yɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom no. Wom gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm, zɑmɑ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ, ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
Ngei wɔ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom no. À sɛ no ǹ go sendi hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm. Hɑndunyɑ mɑ go hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
I yom wɔ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom nɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bei, ɑ̀ hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne mo ɑ̀ si hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ. Ngɑ di gɑɑ no, i go cimi biyɑ ndɑ dɛrɛyom biyɑ fɑyɑnkɑ.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, i mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ domi bɑɑkɑsine wɔ Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ. À go kɑ Ikpɛ bei mo.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, ɑ̀ si Ikpɛ bei no domi Ikpɛ cɛ bɑɑkɑsinekpɛ nɑ.
Wɔne gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize fɔlɔnku dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ domi i mɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
Wɔne yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci i go bɑɑ Ikpɛ bo, ɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ bɑɑ i yom kɑ ngɑ Ize dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndiyom hɛ i dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
A binebɑɑkɔ yom, zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑ i yom zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ i yom mo i mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ di Ikpɛ bɑ ce fɔ. De i go bɑɑ cɛrɛ Ikpɛ bo goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. À bɑɑkɑsine mo goono i kunɑ kɑ kube.
À gɑɑ nɑ i gɑ bei i goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ngɑ mo goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ zɑmɑ i gundɑ ɑ̀ Biyɑ.
I di ko tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ngɑ Ize dɔntɔm no ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɑndunyɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go tu kɑ Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no, Ikpɛ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Akpɛ mo goono Ikpɛ kunɑ.

I nɑ bɑɑkɑsine bei kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ i sɛ. I go nɑɑne bɑɑkɑsine di gɑɑ mo. Ikpɛ yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsinekpɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑkpɛ goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
Zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ goono, yɑ no i yom mo, i goono hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ. À dɔ no bɑɑkɑsine kube i kunɑ hɑli i mɑ yɑru ciiti hɑnu hine.
Hɑmburu si bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Ammɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ kube, ɑ̀ go hɑmburu gɑɑrɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑmburu, ciiti sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ go hɑmburu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑmburu mo, ɑkpɛ mɑnɑ kube bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
I yom wɔ, i gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine Ikpɛ sɛ no domi ngɑ yɑ jinɑ kɑ bɑɑ i yom.
De bɔrɔ fɔ go cii ngɑ gɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bine gɑ hungu ngɑ nyɑize, tɑngɑrikom nɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize kɑ ɑ̀ moo go di, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si di?
Mɛsiyɑ dɔ nɑ i du meire wɔne. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize mo.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cimɑndi Yesu gɑɑ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑkpɛ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ hɛi, ɑkpɛ go bɑɑ ize yom mo kɑ ɑ̀ hɛi.
Wɔne gɑɑ no i bei kɑ i gɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ ize yom kɑ i go bɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑ kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ.
Wɔne yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine Ikpɛ sɛ, i mɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ. À meire yom bine si tim mo.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, hɑndunyɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑkɔ no. Gɑɑŋmɑɑyom yɑ ci i nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
Mee yɑ ci gɑɑŋmɑɑkɔ hɑndunyɑ bɔm? Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cimɑndi Yesu gɑɑ kɑ Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no.
Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑri ndɑ kuri dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑri dɔ hinne ɑmmɑ hɑri ndɑ kuri dɔ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo go tɛ sɛdɑ domi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ ci cimi.
Ihinzɑ wɔ yɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Sendɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Ihinzɑ wɔ yɑ ɑfɔ no.
Ihinzɑ bine yɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ngei yɑ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ hɑri ndɑ kuri. Ihinzɑ wɔ kulu tu mefɔ.
De i go beerem sɛdɑ tɑ, Ikpɛ sɛdɑ beeri kɑ bisɑ. Ikpɛ yɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ngɑ Ize bɔm.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ gundɑ sɛdɑ wɔne ngɑ bumbum kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ tɛ tɑngɑrikom, domi ɑkpɛ si nɑɑne sɛdɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑndɑ ngɑ Izɑ bɔm.
Sɛdɑ di bine neyɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ i nɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À Ize kunɑ bine no hundɑ goono.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Ize, ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi di. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ Ikpɛ Ize, ɑ̀ sindɑ hundi di.
A nɑ wɔne yom hɑntum wom sɛ no, wom kɑ wom gɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize mɑɑ gɑɑ domi wom mɑ bei wom gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Wom mo nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize mɑɑ gɑɑ.
I gɑ wɔne tɑbɑi ɑ̀ dɔ. De i go hɛ fɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ goono ndɑ, ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ.
Zɑ kɑ i go bei Ikpɛ go hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ i gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ, i go bei kɑ i du hɛ kulu kɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ.

De bɔrɔ fɔ go di ngɑ nyɑize go dulum tɛ, dulum kɑ ɑ̀ si kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no hundi. À gɑ ɑ̀ no beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go dulum tɛ, dulum kɑ ɑ̀ si kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ. Dulum goono kɑ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ. Yɑ nɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ dulum ngɑ di sɛ.
Zɑm kɑ cɛsusu kulu dulum nɑ Dulum mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ si kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ.
I go bei kɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ si bo dulum tɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ bo kɑ ngɑ bɔm jɛ no. Ilɑlɔ si ɑ̀ dii.
I go bei i yom wɔ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom no. Hɑndunyɑ mo kulu goono Ilɑlɔ dɑbɑri cire.
I bine go bei Ikpɛ Ize kɑɑ. À bine nɑ i no fɑhɑm hɑli i mɑ Ikpɛ cimi cimɑ bei. I bine goono ko gɔrɔ Cimi cimɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ cimicimɑ ndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
Koo cɛnɑ yom, wɑ wom bɔm jɛ tooru yom gɑɑ. Ami.
Hɛɛ hɑikusu, hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ weibɔrɔ suubɑntɛ, ni ndɑ n koo yom kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ cimi kunɑ. À bine mɑnɑ ci ɑ hinne yɑ go bɑɑ wom, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cimi bei.
I kulu go bɑɑ wom, cimi kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ sɑbu sɛ. Cimi wɔ goono i bɑndɑ, beeniyom si.
Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑbɑ Ize cimi kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
A fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ n ŋmɔne ize fɔ yom gɑru ǹ go dirɑ cimi kunɑ meire kɑ i du Bɑɑbɑ dɔ bɔm.
Mɑɑsɑ ni mo wei wɔ, ɑ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ. À mɑnɑ ci meire teji no ɑ gɑ hɑntum n sɛ, ɑmmɑ wɔne kɑ i du zɑ sintine no.
Wɔne yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine, i mɑ dirɑ ɑ̀ meire yom bɔm. Meire noyɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine wom mo dirɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
Zɑmbɑntɛ boobo huro hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ si cii Yesu Amɑsihu kɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kunɑ. Bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi zɑmbɑntɛ no, Amɑsihu zojikɑri no.
Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm hɑli hɛ kɑ i tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si dɛrɛ i sɛ ɑmmɑ i mɑ du bɑnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ.
Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑ si ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ, ngɑ ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ kunɑ ɑkpɛ sindɑ Ikpɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑkpɛ wɔ gundɑ Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Izɑ.
De bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑɑ wom dɔ, ngɑ ɑ̀ si kɑɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ ngɑ di, wom mɑ si ɑ̀ tɑ wom fuu kunɑ. Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ too mo ndɑ bɑrikɑ.
Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ too ndɑ bɑrikɑ, ɑkpɛ huro ɑ̀ gbei lɑlɔ yom kunɑ noyɑ.
A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ hɑntum wom sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ tirɑ ndɑ hɑntumyom hɛ. A go bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ kɑ sendi wom sɛ mee ndɑ mee domi i binekɑɑne mɑ tɔ.
N weimɑ suubɑntɛ, ɑ̀ koo yom go kɑ n fɔɔ. Ami.
Hɛɛ hɑikusu, hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Gɑyu, ni ɑ bine bɑɑkɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ cimi kunɑ.
A binebɑɑkɔ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ du bɑrikɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ. N mo goono mo ndɑ gɑɑhɑm bɑɑni zɑngɑ n hundi goono bɑɑni kunɑ.
A fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ nyɑize yom kɑɑ kɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii ni wɔ, n go cimi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
A sindɑ fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru ɑ ize yom go dirɑ cimi kunɑ.
A binebɑɑkɔ, n ci nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ kɑ n go tɛ nyɑize yom sɛ, yɑ no bɑ nyɑize yo yom sɛ.
Ǹ nɑ n bɑɑkɑsine sɛdɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ jine. N gɑ kɑ ihinno tɛ de n go kɑmbɑzɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tunu.
Ǹ go diro tɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ gɑɑkɑsine fɔ kulu tɑ dimi cindei dɔ.
Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ̀ himɑ i yom mo i mɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom gɑɑkɑsine domi i mɑ ci ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom ǹ gbei kunɑ cimi sɛ.
A nɑ tirɑ cɛnɑ fɔ hɑntum Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ Diotɑfɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci ǹ jinɑ, ɑ̀ si kɑ i sendi tɑ.

À sɛ no de ɑ kɑɑ, ɑ kɑɑ hɔngɔ gbei lɑlɔ yom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɛ. À nɑ i sendi yɑmu kɑ futu i sɛ. Ngɑ di bine mɑnɑ wɑsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si nyɑize yom tɑ mo. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ ǹ tɑ mo, ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ gɑnji kɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ.
A binebɑɑkɔ, n mɑ si ilɑlɔ dendeni ɑmmɑ n mɑ dendeni hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei hinno tɛ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei lɑlɔ tɛ mo, Ikpɛ no ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di.
Ǹ kulu tɛ sɛdɑ Dimitiyo sɛ ndɑ cimi bumbum mo. I yom mo i go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ. N bine bei i sɛdɑ yɑ cimi no.
A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ yɑ hɑntum n sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ hɑntum n sɛ ndɑ hɑntumyom hɑri ndɑ hɑntumyom hɛ.
A go bɛɛjɛ yɑ di ni, ɑ si jɛ, hɑli i mɑ sendi mee ndɑ mee.
Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ goono n gɑɑ. I kpɑɑsi yom go kɑ n fɔɔ. N mɑ i kpɑɑsi yom kulu fɔɔ ndɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom.
Hɛɛ Yudɑ, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm ndɑ Yɑkɔfu nyɑize mɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum beerem sɛ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ. À nɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi ko kɑ ǹ jɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛ.
Suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine mo tɔntɔnu wom sɛ.

A binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ nɑ himmɑ kulu dɑm yɑ hɑntum wom sɛ fɑɑbɑ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i meigu cɛrɛ. À bine tilɑsi ɑ gɑɑ yɑ hɑntum wom sɛ kɑ wom no himmɑ wom mɑ tɑngɑm nɑɑne sɛ. Nɑɑne wɔ no Ikpɛ tɑlifi hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gɑɑ ce fɔ pɑp.

Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɔnɔ kɑ huro i gɑme kunɑ, beerem kɑ zɑ jɛyom ǹ ciitiyom kɑ zeeri goono hɑntumɑntɛ. Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. I ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gomini mo, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ. Ǹ go Kpe Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ze.
Ammɑ bɑ kɑ wom jinɑ kɑ wɔne yom kulu bei, ɑ go bɑɑ mo yɑ wom hɔngɑndi Kpe nɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ fɑɑbɑ kɑ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu kɑmbɛ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne hɑlɑci.
Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom mo mɑnɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngei bɔm meire yom kɑlɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm gɔrɛ dɔ nɑm. Kpe nɑ ǹ jisi seseri yom gɑɑ, beeniyom si kube kunɑ ciiti hɑnu bɑmbɑtɑ sɛ.

Wɑ hɔngɔ mɑ Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ ǹ hundɑntɛ kpɑɑrɑ yom. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm dɑm zinɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize wɔne yom kɑ ceeci ngei mɑ kɑni ndɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli. Ǹ goono i jine zɑngɑ deedɑndi kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ ciiti ndɑ nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
Yɑ no, beerem kɑ ǹ hɑndiri go kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi tunɑndi kɑ bɑ ǹ gɑɑhɑm yom ziibɑndi. Ǹ gɑ meire fɛntɛ ko bɛɛnɛ deizɑkpɛ yom woo.
Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize beeri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Misɛli kɑkɔ ndɑ Ibilisi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Moisi bukɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tu kɑ kɑɑndɑ woobi ciiti ɑ̀ bɔm. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii: Kɑlɑ Kpe mɑ ɑ̀ bɔgu ǹ bɔm.
Ammɑ beerem wɔ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si ǹ bei no ǹ go sendi yɑmu. Hɛ fɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ fɑhɑm hɑɑli gɑɑ zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ lɑɑkɑli, beerem ngei yom di go kɑ ngei bɔm fumbɑndi ǹ dɔ.
Kɑito beerem wɔ, domi Kɑinu fɔndɑ no ǹ gɑnɑ. Ǹ go zuuru mo kɑ huro Bɑlɑm dɛrɛyom kunɑ bɑnɑndi sɛ. Ǹ hɑlɑci mo Korɑ hunguyom kunɑ.

Ngei wɔ bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ tondi tugɑntɛ yom hɑri kunɑ wom nyɑizetɛrɛ jingɑru yom kunɑ. Ǹ si hɑmburu mo sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go jingɑru ŋmɑɑ ndɑ wom. Kurukɔ yom no kɑ ǹ go kɑ ngei bɔm hinne kurum. Ǹ goono no zɑngɑ buru yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɑri kɑ hɛo go feeni. Tuuri yom no kɑ ǹ sindɑ ize hemɑru wɑtɛ, ǹ dɔgu mo no. À sɛ no, ǹ bu ce hinkɑ.
Ǹ himɑ mɑ no zɑngɑ tɛku boosu yom futu ko kɑ ngei bɔm hɑwi kufu kɑɑtɛrɛ. Ǹ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hɑndɑriyɑize bibirɑntɛ yom. Ikpɛ nɑ kube bi tici tici nungu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom jisi ǹ sɛ mo.
Ǹ sɛ no Henoku kɑ ɑ̀ ci Adɑmu hɑɑmɑ yom ŋmɔne bɔrɔ iyɑntɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, Kpe go kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ bɑkɑrɑ.
À gɑ kɑɑ nɑ kɑ ciiti ǹ kulu sɛ. À go kɑɑ kɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ gbei lɑlɔ yom bɔgu ǹ bɔm. À go kɑɑ sendi futu yom kulu bɔgu ǹ bɔm kɑ dulumkoni yom kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
Ngei wɔ, gunugunukpɛ yom no ndɑ wuurukɔ yom. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ. Fɑɑre sendi yom yɑ cini hunu ǹ mee yom kunɑ. Liibɑ fɔ sɛ no ǹ go meekɑɑne tɛ beerem sɛ.
Ammɑ wom wɔ, ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ hɔngɔ sendi yom kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ yom jinɑ kɑ cii.
Ǹ cii wom sɛ kɑ lɔkɑci beenɑntɛ dondɑcɛrɛkpɛ yom kɑɑ goono ko dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ŋmɔne bɑɑyom futu goono ndɑ.
Ngei yɑ go feefee dɑm. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ. Ǹ sindɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo.
Ammɑ wom wɔ, ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ wom bɔm cini wom nɑɑne hɑlɑɑlɑ bɔm. Wɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
Wɑ wom bɔm jɛ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ko kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ suuji bɑtu hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ.
Wɑ suuji cɛbɛ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go siikɑ sɛ.
Afɔ yom mo wɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɑmburu kɑ ǹ kɔm nini gɑɑ. Wo hungu bɑ ǹ jiine yom sɛ kɑ bineibɑɑi nɑ ǹ ziibɑndi.
Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom jɛ hɑli wom mɑ si kɑti. À gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom cɛɑndi ngɑ deizɑ jine, tɑɑli si fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ.
Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ yɑ ci hɑikusu, i Fɑɑbɑkɔ mo no. Deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ hini, ǹ mo bɑrɑ ɑ̀ sɛ mɑɑsɑ ndɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.

Kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑɑru neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ tɑm yom sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ. À si jɛ mɑ. Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize sɑmbɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ feeri ngɑ tɑm Yohɑnnɑ sɛ.
Yohɑnnɑ tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ kulu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ di, wɑtom Ikpɛ Sendɑ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛdɑ.
Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ tirɑ wɔ coo ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom go mɑɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom wɔ. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no zɑmɑ ǹ go sendi yom kɑ ǹ hɑntum tirɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑɑ kɑ gɑnɑ, domi lɔkɑci mɑɑni.

Hɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ, ɑ gɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ iye kɑ ǹ goono Azi lɑɑbu fɔɔ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ hunu ɑ̀ dɔ. À goono mɑɑsɑ. À goono dom. À go kɑɑ mɑ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne wɔ hunu mo Biyɑ iyɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine.

Ǹ hunu mo Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ nɑɑnekpɛ. Bɔrɔ sintine kɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ gundɑ dɑbɑri hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe yom kulu bɔm. A go bɑɑ i yom. À nɑ i nyume i dulum yom gɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ kuri.
À nɑ i dɑm i mɑ tɛ kpe yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom ngɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
Gunɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ndɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom. Moo kulu kɑɑ di ɑ̀, bɑ wɔ kɑ yom nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑru. Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kɑɑ wuuru ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ. Oò. Ami.
